I-Sun International Umhlaba ovusa amadlingozi  ngokuphindwe kankulungwane

I-Sun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni nangaphandle, ngamaqembu e-Sun International agqame kwangu-20 amahotela aphezulu emhlabeni jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamathalente, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlangano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile.

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi, noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyethembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!



Isicelo sokubekelwa indawo e-Sun International. Uma udinga ukubhukha ithikithiki lendiza noma ukwenza noma imaphi amalungiselelo okuhamba sizothanda ukuphakamisa ukuthi ubekise indawo usebenzise i-Travel Agent noma i-Tour Operator.

Ngcafaza lapha ukuze ubuke uhla olunakho konke lwe-Tour Operators.

Inombolo yakho eyimfihlo yekhasimende le-Sun International (Sun Pin): (Uma ikhona)

Uma ungayazi inombolo yakho eyimfihlo yekhasimende le-Sun International (SunPin), ungangenela okukodwa okulandelayo iTrade: IATA, ASATA, Individual: MVG noma inombolo yobulunga bekilabhu yesikhathi samaholide.


Ishisekelwe izakhiwo eziningi zase-Victoria ezinhle eKimberley, nokusondelana kwedolobha nendawo enomlando wesitimela samalahle, I-Flamongo Resort ne-Entertainment World kuzodonsa lobobuhle obunjengenganekwane nesitayela sezinqola zesitimela nesiteshi kwakuqala kwase-Victoria. I-Flamingo Resort ne-Entertainment World izoba nalezi zinto ezilandelayo: Ikhasino enamatafula awu-7 okudlala nemishini yokudlala ewu-200. I-Salon Prive enamatafula awu-3 okudlala nemishini ewu-50 yokubiza. Indawo yokuthengisa utshwala yasekhasino (i-Junction Bar), neyokuthengisa ukudla yasekhasino futhi ( i- Puffing Billy's Restaurant) okuqondene kuphela nabantu abeze ekhasino. Indawo lapho kuthengiswa khona ukudla okusheshayo, edayisa izingubo nendawo yokuzijabulisa ezungeze indawo yemidlalo yalabo abeze ekhasino uma ufuna okusha okudayisayo nokokuzijabulisa. Indawo yokudayisa utshwala  nokudla kwamazwe ngamazwe ngenkululeko enemikhanya yomabonakude esakaza ezemidlalo ezibalulekile ezenzeka umhlaba wonke. Indawo lapho imindeni ingazijabulisa yodwana enezinto eziningi ukuzikhethela uma befuna ukuzijabulisa, Umpheme wokubuka izithombe, indawo lapho kunakekelwa izingane zidlale zigadiwe nendawo yomdeni engaphandle yokuzithokozisa. Ihotela elinamagumbi awu-48 anakho konke (i-Flamingo Hotel) nendawo yokuqasha amakamelo enamagumbi awu-68 anokungaphelele nokho (i-Flamingo Lodge), Kokubili kwakhiwele ukunakekela abavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe nabakuleli, izivashi zasekhasino, izihambi nezithunywa ezize emhlanganweni. Indawo lapho kugcinwe khona ezobuciko enamagumbi aphumele ngaphandle amathathu angangena abantu abawu-200.

Ezokukweleta 
Amakhadi okukweleta angamukeleka emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangempela. Amakhadi e-Gold, amakhadi e-American Express namakhadi e-Diners anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500. ( Sicela nazi ukuthi i-American Express izovumela kuphela ukuthatha amakhadi aqala ngenombolo u-3768). Mayelana nokukweleta sicela uthintane nomshayi sisefo osedesikini ukuthola olunye ulwazi. Amasheke; amasheke abantu azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziyi-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangempela. Amasheke agarantiwe ibhange angamukelwa uma ehambisana nomazisi kanye nekhadi lokukweleta elihambisana nalo, Yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe okuvumeleke ukuthi siwamukele usuku ngalunye. Uyacelwa ukuthi uthintane nomshayi sisefo ngemininingwane ephathelene nohlobo lwesheke okungenzeka ukuthi ulusebenzise. Imishini yokukhipha imali iyatholakala kuyo yonke indawo yasekhasino, isebenza amahora ungu-24 ngosuku. Amasheke ezihambi (Travellers' Cheques); wonke amasheke ezihambi ayamukelwa kuphela uma ezosayinwa phambi kukamshayi sisefo, kanye nomazisi uveziwe. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe (Canadian Dollar, Ditch Guilder, French Franc, German Mark, Swiss Franc, British Sterling kanye ne United States Dollar) iyamukelwa uma ufuna izingcezu edesikini lasekhasino. Uma ufuna ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthola i-Moloti, sicela uthintane nedesika elingasemnyango. Incwadi yemvume yokungena kwelinye ilizwe nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka uma kushintshwa noma yini yakwelinye izwe.




Ikhosi yegalofu yase-Lost City
Abadlali begalofu bakhexa imilomo ngobuhle bendawo yekhozi yegalofu uma ushaywa umoya i-par-72 Lost City Golf Course. Ubukhona bezinto eziqanjiweyo zase-Afrika zikhona yonke indawo futhi zicacile, kakhulukazi kwengakholeki indlu yekilabhu eyakhiwe ngesitayela sase-Zimbabwe.

Isitayela sokuhlelwa kogwadule lwekhozi yegalofu sinokuheha kwamanye amazwe ngakho konke okukhona nangomhleli wayo, uGary Player oseyibuke njengenye yamakhozi awathandayo. Ekubeni ukuhlelwa kwayo okuhle kuvimbekile, ikakhulukazi ebusika lapho utshani bugundeka khona eBayview. Yize noma iBayview yenza ibhola ligingqike kahle, yayingahlelelwe ukudundubala nemimango enzima lokho okwenzela ekuvuseni amadlingozi enselelo yelost City Golf Course. Ngo-May 1998, isu elikhulu lokulungisa indawo lathathwa eLost City Golf Course ukubuyisela indawo engenatshani yaseBayview ngeKikuyu, utshani obunikeza i-Gary Player Country Club isimo esihle ngendlela emangalisayo uphela noma uqala unyaka. Kukho konke, inani eliyi-330000 square metres lezidindi lendlalwa, ngokulingana no-5000 square metres ngosuku awokugcina endlalwa ngo-September uqalwa ka-1998. Ngokwabaka Evergreen Gardens, inkampani eyayinikwe inkontileka, kwakuwumsebenzi omkhulu kunayo yonke wokwendlala izidindi eNingizimu Afrika owake waba khona. Umklamo wezigidi ezewu-4 zamarandi waqala ngohlelo lokuchelela olwaluhlelelwe ukubulala lokho okwabe kukhona, emva kwalokho kwalandela ukususwa kotshani obabungaphezulu, ukuvundiswa komhlabathi, ukwendlalwa kwezidindi kanye nokulungiswa ngaphezulu, kwenziwa konke.Njengoba ukugcwaliswa okunomqondo endaweni entsha yokudlalela,ukulungiswa kahle kwendawo ebeyinganatshani sekwenziwe, kubalwa kuko ukuhlelwa kahle kwezindunduma, ukuthalalaliswa kwemimango, ukususwa kokunye okumilile, kanye nokwandiswa kwezinye izindawo zokushayela. Indawo enotshani obugundiwe beKikuyu entsha eseLost City Golf Course izoqinisekisa unyaka wonke usesimeni esihle unikeza obumangalisayo nobusha ubuhle: indawo enotshani obugundiwe obuhle obuluhlaza inikeza ukwahlukanisa phakathi kwezihlahla zasendle nendawo engenamsebenzi enezindunduma zikadoti okunye kwezinto ezenza lekhozi ihlabe umxhwele. Ukushintshwa kwesimo sendawo nokuphakama akuyithinti inselelo nokuqungela isibindi umdlalo, njengoba isakhiwo sokuqala esifake phakathi izimbobo ezicashile nemibhoshongo kusasobala. Izinga le-Lost City Golf Course nesiqhingi sayo esisha esenebe ngotshani baso iKikuyu iqinisekisa abadlali begalofu ukuthi bazojabulela umdlalo okhumbulekayo ovuselelayo nonokubukeka okuhle.UMA UFUNA OLUNYE ULWAZI THINTANA NO-LARA ROSS E- SUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (0110 780 7684




I-Sun City imisa indawo yezamabhizinisi enakho konke



Ihhovisi elinobungcweti ngenhlalo okuphilwa phakathi kwayo elisezingeni lamazwe ngamazwe.

Indawo yezamabhizinisi enolwazi lwezemisebenzi oluningi ngendlela engenakulinganiswa olutholakala khona, ukusukela ekwenzeni amagama okubhala namaletha ngendlela efinyenziwe kuya ekukhiqizeni amaphepha abhalwe ngemibala egcwele nokuvezwa kwezinto ezibonakalayo nezizwakalayo, sekukhona e-Sun City.

"jengenye yezindawo okuyiwa kuzo uma kubanjwe imihlangano emikhulu eNingizimu Africa, i-Sun City iyaziqhenya ngezinto ezinikezelayo kulomkhakha wamakhasimende, nakosomabhizinisi ngamunye ngamunye. Ngoba sibuqamama kwezinye zezinto ezijwayelwe ukutholakala ezindaweni ezinkulu, kumele sihlangabezane nalezo zidingo kwi-site endaweni okuvakashelwa kuyo kusho uHerliane Portenschlager, i-Guest Relations Manager e-Sun City."

"kuze kube manje, izivakashi ezidinga usizo kwezamabhizinisi bezisizwa umnyango wethu onamandla we-Desktop Publishing (DTP) kubalindisivalo emahotela okuvakashelwa kuwo. Izinto ezifana nezinhlelo zemihlangano noma amapheshana azo bekuyingxenye yomsebenzi wethu, ukufeksa, ukukopisha nezinye izidingo bekwenziwa."

"Manje, nokho, sesenyuse umsebenzi waze wafinyelela ezingeni lamazwe ngamazwe, ngokwenza indawo yamabhizinisi eseyimile izimpande ngokugcwele, egcwele futhi ngemisebenzi yokubhala, iziteshi zama-cumputer zabantu ngabodwana ngasese, ukufeksa, uku-email nokutholakala kwi-intenet."

Indawo yezamabhizinisi endaweni ephansi yokuzijabulisa e-Sun City, iphethwe umphathi we-DTP uSonia Jansen. Umabhalane oqeqeshwe ngokugcwele futhi osebenza ngokugcwele uzonakekela izidingo zabavakashi anikeze ukuhlangana phakathi kwabo nomnyago we-DTP lapho bekudinga."
Inikeza isitobhi sesitolo esisodwa ngokupheleleyo." Kusho uHerliane.


Isebenza phakathi kuka-7 ekuseni no-7 ebusuku phakathi nezinsuku naphakathi kuka-8 ekuseni kuya ku-1 emini ngoMgqibelo nangeSonto. Indawo yamabhizinisi izonikeza abavakashi izinto okubalwa kuzo okulotshwe kube kuthathelwe emshinini wokubamba inkulumo ubuye uyikhiphe, ukwenziwa kwamagama, ukuhlela nokubhala. Imisebenzi ejwayelekile yehhovisi izoba nokukopishwa ngemibala nangokumnyama nokumhlophe, Ukutholakala kwezinto zokubhala ezilintwentwe nokubhala nge-PowerPoint. Izivakashi zizokwazi ukuthenga izinto zokubhala bese imibhalo yabo ihlanganiswe futhi iboshwe.

Abasebenzi bazobekisela izivakashi banikezele ngezinto zokuxhumana ezifano ne-email, ukufeksa nezigijimi.


Umnyango we-DTP uhlangabezana nohla olubanzi lwezidingo ezibalulekile ekuhlanganeni okunempumelelo, kubalwa amaphepha ezaziso, amabhukwana nezincwajana, amakhadi alengiswayo anamagama, amakhadi endawo namaphepha okulotshwe kuwo ukudla komuntu ngamunye kanye namakhadi abantu omsebenzi.

Umsebenzi wokubhala ungenziwa amakhasi futhi indawo inenhlanganisela yamabhuku egcwele umbala wePantone okubalwa kuyo owegolide nowesiliva. Amaphepha okwazisa anganikezelwa ngezimo ezinkulu ezinjengo-A2, A1 no-A0. Iyavulwa kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuMgqibelo kusukela ngo-8 ekuseni kuya ku-5 ntambama bese ivalwa ngeSonto.

"I-Sun City njengendawo lapho kubanjelwa khona imihlangano yezamabhizinisi manje ayilinganiswa nalutho ngokwempela,"kusho uHerliane.

I-Sibaya Resort ne-Entertainment World (Sibaya) izokhombisa ukutshalwa kwezimali okusha okudle izigidi zamarandi ezewu-890 kwingqalasizinda eKwaZulu- Natal

Indikimba enkulu yeSibaya Resort ne-Entertainment Worlds iphakamisa ugqozi lwamaZulu iqoqele ndawonye ubuhle bokwehlukana kwamasiko, namafa, imilando, futhi ibonise konke okwenza iKwaZulu - Natal ibe isiFundazwe esingafani nezinye nesishintshashintshayo. Isibaya ihlanganisa ubuciko bamasiko emvelo kaZulu, ubuciko bokwakhiwa kwezindlu, izindaba zasendulo ezinobuciko bezesayensi yemisebenzi ethile, nendlela yesimanje. Ukuqamba umqondo owumlingo neqiniso empilweni, ukuhlala kokuphithana kuyisikhashana kuzobonakala ngobungcweti, kuzohalalisela. Kunokuthikalalisa ubuhle bemvelo bendawo ezungezileyo. I-Afrisun KZN izindawo eziwu-2000 ezibukwayo manje ukulungiselwa ukupaka ezihlelelwe ukwamukela izidingo zokupaka okuphithizayo. Indawo ihlelelwe futhi nezinqola, amabhasi namathekisi.

Indawo: Indawo itholakala phakathi kuka-N2 no-M4, ngaseNingizimu nje ka-M27 (Umdloti Beach Interchange). Indawo ingangamamitha awu-20 ngaphezu kolwandle futhi iyindawo ephakeme kunazo zonke izindawo ezizungezile, ujabulele ukubona kanye,kanye ugu kusuka eThekwini kuya e-Umdloti Beach nezindawo ezizungezile ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo. Ukuzijabulisa; Izivakashi zizozijabulisa ngezinhlobonhlobo zezokujabula nokuhehayo. ISibaya izonikeza izivakashi indawo yokuphumula, yokudla, yokuphuza nokuhlanganyela lapho ingekho imidlalo yasekhasino nezinto zakhona, konke kungenise ngobuhlakani ekujabuleni okuphelele. ISibaya ayiyona indawo yempilo yasekhasino kuphela nje. Iyindawo lapho kugujwa khona ubuhle besiko likaZulu. I-Zulu Encounter, indlu yokulalela enezihlalo eziwu-1000, izokhombisa izinto zasebusuku nalapho kudlalwa khona imidlalo. Umkhiqizo obalulekile okhombisa ngempilo nezikhathi zeNkosi uCetshwayo izovula inkundla. I-Zulu Encounter izoletha eKwaZulu - Natal umbukiso we-Afrika ophilayo

ISibaya futhi sizonikeza isivakashi ubungcweti bonke boqobo kwi-Zulu Village, egcwele izindawo zokudla, imakethe edayisa ezamasiko omdabu, ihholo lemicimbi, umdanso wokushaywa kwezigubhu, abaculi nezimbongi, ukulwa ngezinduku nabaxoxi zindaba. Izinyanga ezilapha ngokwesintu nabaprofethi bazosho ngempilo nangekusasa lesivakashi esinesibindi ngokwanele ukungena emgedeni wesangoma. Kwenziwani lapho: Isakhiwo esikhulu esinesiqongo sezimu, esakhiwe ukukhombisa ukufanekisa ubungcweti bokwakhiwa kwezindlu zakaZulu, esinezinhlangothi ezingamaphiko esinxeleni nasekudleni, anezidlu zehotela zezivakashi eziwu-200. Lezizimpondo zikhombisa izimpondo zenyathi enkulu yaseKapa nendlela iNkosi uShaka eyayihlela ngayo amabutho uma kuliwa impi eminyakeni yamakhulu ayi-19. ISibaya sizohlanganisa izingxenye ezintathu: Ikhasino, iSibaya nendawo yokuzithokozisa, kubalwa nekhasino enemishini yokugembula ewu-800 namatafula awu-26,indawo yokulungisa ininwele kanye nezimbitshana zePrive ezinendlu yokuphumula yangasese, indlu yokuphumula yabanamakhadi eMVG, ihotela elinohlobo lwezindlu zenkanyezi enamakhona awu-4 eziwu-200, izindawo zokuthengisa ukudla notshwala ezinhlobonhlobo, izinto zemindeni zokuzithokozisa, inkundla eyindlwana yemidlalo enhlobonhlobo enezihlalo eziyi-2500 engangenisa abeze edilini abawu 500. IZulu umgubho obalulekile wesiko likaZulu, unikwa indawo futhi ubukiswe ezindaweni zokuzithokozisa. IZulu lizonika abavakashela eSibaya imibukiso ejabulisa ezindabeni zasendulo. Okuqanjiweyo, izinganekwane kanye namasiko abantu abadumile bendabuko base-Afrika. Amagumbi awu-200 akusasa e-Tropical Lodge, nendawo yeKwaZulu-Natal Tourist Information. Umklamo we-Afrisun KZN uzoveza okunye ukutshalwa kwezimali okuhlobaneni kwengqalasizinda njengengxenye yohlelo olukhulu lwezindawo ezezungezile.

Ukudla kwaseSun International
Akukaze kube khona esikhathi esilufifi eCarnival City! Uyamenywa ukuzoziphumulela kwenye yezindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala noma ujabulele uhlobo lokudla oluyi-five star kwenye yezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla eziphambili kakhulu.

Ukudla; izindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala nezitolo zekhofi. Ukudla; iLotta Foods indawo ethengisa ngokudla engafaniswa nezinye nenobungcweti obugabiselayo, iLotta Foods ukudla kwasekhishini okumangalisayo nokubabazekayo ezinhlotsheni zokudla okutholakala kunoma iyiphi indawo ethengisa ngokudla engxenyeni eseNingizimu yezwe, ngamanani aphansi ngendlela emangalisayo. Itafula eligcwele ukudla linikeza i-boboetjie, okhari, i-carvery, inkukhu yethandori kanye nezitshalo ezigcwele sengathi ingadi, ezisitimiwe. Kulandelwa ukudlana okungatheni okungamakhekhana athelwe ukhasitadi, okunye okumuncwana noma okubabayo nokudlana okumnandi kakhulu okugcinwa ngakho edineni kwazo zonke izinhlobo. Uma ufuna ukuvula inhliziyo, iLotta Foods indawo okumele ube kuyo - kuyinani elilodwa, yidla ngendlela oyithandayo, ukuziphonsa ekudleni nje. I- Matssuya Pacific Restaurant; uma ukunambitha kwakho kushintshela kokushisayo kakhudlwana, iMatsuya Pacific Restaurant izosuthisa ngisho nolokokunambitha osekukhathele. Ikhishi lamasiko asempumalanga linohla kusuka ezifubeni zenkukhu eziyolisiwe kuya ekudleni okuwuswidi nokumuncu okwenza umzuzu wokunambitha ungakhohleki. I-Squires Legendary Grills; Okwabo okuhamba phambili isiteki - inyama yesinqe ethanjisiwe nejuzayo i-T-bone isidlo sosuku. Ichachambiswe ngokuyikonakona noma ibekwe etsheni elishisayo. I-Squires Loft yaziwa ngenyama yabo yenkomo ewuhlobo oluphambili, elungiswe kahle yasikelwa okuhle kodwa. I-Giovanni; Ukudla okuqamba izinga elisha eNingizimu Afrika lekhishi lase_Ithali, eligcizelela ubuhle obubukekayo nobunobuhlakani ngendlela obuvezwa ngayo, ubumsulwa nokunambitheka. Izinto ezifana namasaladi ahlwabusayo eMozzarella, ophasta batamatisi nabakhilimu, namaphiza enziwe ngogqozi awukunambitheka ongakulindela e-Ithali. I-Ocean Basket; Ikhishi lamazwe ngamazwe futhi abadli bedina bangajabulela ukwahlulwa kwi-Hors D' Oerve imbaza yaseKapa ebhakiwe eyenziwe ngososi webhotela likagalige. Ngokwesigaba esikhulu, ama-langoustine aphakeme kakhulu, njengezinhlobonhlobo zokudla kwasolwandle - ulwandle lwezibiliboco ezivezwa ngokwehlukana futhi okujatshulelwa kakhulu izingcweti ezithengisa ngokudla okusheshayo eziholayo, uma udinga ukudla ujahile. I-Londo Pie, Sausage Sloon, Maharani Curry, Milky Lane, Juicy Lucy, KFC, Little Leonard's, Giovanni Express. Lezi izindawo zingasetshenziswa futhi nayizivakashi ezize ePocket Park.

Ama-Showbar. I-SuperSport Arena Sportbar yokuvuselela amandla, amagangangozi, ngena ngokungangabazi eSuperSport Arena Sports'Bar lapho ungabuka khona imidlalo idlalwa bukhoma isakazwa umabonakude uvezwa emphemeni omkhulu nasezindongeni ze-video. Umoya uwugesi futhi kukhona ngisho nemidlalo ye-video yabadala yalabo abazizwa bedinga okuyikonakona kwempela. Yizwa isigqi sase-Afrika ubuka amabhendi edlala. Izandla zenza into yazo okungakaze kubonwe. Ithuba leSuperbet layo yonke inhlobo yomdlalo wakho liyatholakala. I-Magic Bar; Thatha isikhashana uzikhiphe ngokuphuza uziphumulele e-Magic Bar. Umlumbi wethu uzokwenza ukhangwe amaqhinga akhe ahehayo nokuthonya okunobuciko. I-Carnival Bar; i-Carnival City's "Liberace" ijabulisa izivakashi ebusuku endaweni yabo yokuphumula ethengisa ngotshwala enezihlalo eziwu-70, ngesikhathi uphumule ujabulela ukuphuza i-Pinnacolada's noma i-Pimms. Ukudla noma uphuzo oluyingxubevange olubukekayo olugiliwe umlumbi odayisa ngotshwala ogila imikhuba yabo uzokujabulisa aqede ukoma kwakho. Ama-Coffee Shops; I-WB Hiccocks Coffe Co. yeRossini; Ukuzikhethela ezinhlotsheni eziwu-50 zekhofi ingxubevange yokudla, amakhekhe nokudla okulula. I-Fego Coffee Shop; Ukudayisa okusezingeni, enikeza amakhekhe abhakiwe aselungele ukudliwa nokudla okulula kuyatholakala.




Ukudla nokuzithokozisa
Hlala uncike ubuke umbukiso endaweni esandlu enompheme enezihlalo eziwu-5000. Kunanezinto eziningi zokudlala zezingane nezokuzithokozisa kusuka kwesanda kukhishwa i-Ster -Kinekor ukupenda ubuso nemidlalo ye-video.

ICinnematropolis - Iqoqo lamabhayisikobho awu-6 nezihlalo eziwu-900, abukisa izithombe ezisanda kukhishwa ngu-Ster-Kinekor - odume kakhulu esifundeni okwamanje ongenayo neyodwa ibhayisikobho. I-Big Top; I-Big Top, umpheme onezihlalo eziwu-5000 wemidlalo enhlobonhlobo waseCarnival City owavulwa ngoDesemba ka-1999, ekuqubuleni komculo ongafaniswa nalutho nezinto ezibukwayo "Cirque du Carnival". Selokhu yavulwa iBig Top seyiveze izinto ezingefaniswe ngabantu abadumile bamazwe ngamazwe abafana noHelmut Lotti, uBryan Ferry noSmokie. Isingenise futhi ububenyebenye besibhakela esiqhwiza umentshisi, "Night of Legends". I-Night of Legends isisikhombise abadlali besibhakela okubalwa kubo nodumile wakuleli u-"Baby" Jake Matlala, nomdlali sibhakela futhi wase-Eastern Cape uHawk Makebula. Ngo-March 2000, uHelmut Lotti wabonisa i-"Out of Africa" ne "Best of Classics" emakhonsathini akhe, okwabonakala kweyenkulu impumelelo yaphinda futhi, iCarnival City yakhombisa ngokwesithembiso ukutshengisa ukuthokoza okuyisimangaliso endaweni eyisimangaliso. Ababukeli bakuthanda ukubuyisela kwakhe amaculo adumile aseNingizimu Afrika nokwengeza ekwenyukeni kwezinga lemali nasekujabuleleni kwazo zonke izinto zikaHelmut Lotti, ingxenye yesibili yombukiso yagqamisa uMichael Junior, owajabulisa ababukeli ngobukhona bakhe eshashalazini obelekwe ubuhle nezwi lakhe elihle ngokumangalisayo. UBryan Ferry isihlabani sePop, owokuqala neRoxy Music owazamazisa iCarnival City ngo-April. UFerry, omunye wesithunzi esingapheliyo somculo, wagalela esakhiweni esisha sekhasino yaseBrakpan. IBig Top isiziveze ukuba enhle indawo kusuka ekuzwakaleni endlini nasekubukeleni uhlezi, njengoba iziphephezelo zisendaweni ekahle kakhulu. I-Big Top, ibhukula ngokushesha ukuqala ukuba nkulu kwezomculo eGauteng. Izincwajana zokukhona okulingana nezidingo ezibalulekile nokuzihlelela ziyatholakala  ngaphakathi, njengoba izidingo zingafani kwikhasimende ngekhasimende. Okwalapho kuthengiswa khona ngotshwala kutholakala ngokukweleta ngamakhadi noma ngokuthenga ngokheshi okwejwayelekile. Ngokutholakala kwayo endaweni enhle kakhulu, ingqalasizinda emangalisayo nalo lonke uhla lokudla nokokuphuza. Inhlalakahle yaseCarnival City inikeza indawo esezingeni lomhlaba. Inkudla; Yenza ubusuku ngayo: Inkundla yethu enezihlalo eziwu-350 izokwenza uhlale esihlalweni sakho ube ubuka imidlalo yethu elangazelekayo yenkundla.

Ukujabula kwezingane ngeMagic Company. Ina-Three Ring Circus; U-Ring One iyiMagic Jungle okungena onemvume - indawo enezinto zokudlala ezithambile zezingane ezineminyaka ewu-4 kuya ku-10. Abadala abavunyelwe ngaphandle uma ehamba nengane! Lelitende elinemibala yonke yesekisi line-Barbie World, iPlay Station World, nendlu yokuzipenda ngopende bemibala, amabhayisikili amancane kanye neKids Karaoke, ingabalwa indawo ethambile yokudlala egqame ngemibala yezingane, ukuthi zikhwele ezintunjeni ezinkulu, amanethi okukhwela nebhola lesiziba. U-Ring Two indawo enhle ngendlela emangalisayo yokuzithokozisa yemindeni yeminyaka yonke enolayini abawu-12 beCosmic Ten-Pin Bowling, amatafula endawo yokubhukuda esitayela saseMelika, indawo yebhodi lokushesheleza namatafula okudlala ibhola lomoya. U-Ring Three, Okusha ukuxhumana kwe-Computer nemidlalo yokulingisa kuyatholakala. Ku-Ring Three kubalwa izimoto eziwu-8 zohlobo lweDaytona zomjaho nesimbuluzo esisha se-Star Wars. Yini ungazami inhlanhla yakho emidlalweni yokuhlengwa kokudlala ngeqiniso lapho amathikithi angawinwa khona bese eshintshwa ePrize Shop ukuthola uhlelo lwemiklomelo emangalisayo.




Lapho ikhona 
Indawo engangamahekthari awu-44 eBrakpan ekhawuliswe umgwaqo omkhulu okhokhelwayo u-N17 oya eNyakatho, u-R23 (Heidelberg Road) oya eMpumalanga, u-R554 (Elsburg Road) oya eNingizimu ne Century Road oya eNtshonalanga.

Indawo yokuhlala ehotela. Isivakashi sehotela laseCarnival Club sizothokozela konke iCarnival City enakho. ICarnival Club de'cor iyisitayela futhi ilungele labo abafisa ukuziphumulela bekude nesixhokoxhoko sezakhiwo. ICarnical Club inokuthembela kwezivakashi kwangasese nokomuntu ngayedwana, kusukela kwamahle nahlotshiswe kahle amagumbi nezindawo lapho kwamukelwa khona kuya kwemangalisayo indawo yokuhambahamba. Isimo esithule sithe cwaka nokunakekelwa okwedlulele kunika abavakashi igunya lokujabulela isikhathi ngaphandle nje nangaphambi kokuthi baze bangene ekhasino nokusebenzisa izinto zokuzijabulisa ezingaphakathi. I-Road Lodge, Igugu lemali elimangalisayo kwezinhle nezihlotshiswe ngokumangalisayo izindlu eziwu-94 zase-Road Lodge, etholakala kahle eduze kweCarnival City, eduze nomgwaqo. Ivulwa amahora angu-24 ngosuku, I-Road Lodge incike ekubalulekeni kwemali nokutholakala ngayo. Ukubiza kwezindlu ezikahle zibiza ngokwehlukana ngokoyedwa, ababili noma abathathu abantu abahlala kuyo ngokuhlanganyela, ezinhle nezihlotshiswe kahle izindlu.


Ukuthenga. Zitike noma utike othandiweyo wakho kakhudlwana ngokuthenga eCarnival City. I-Carnival city inesikhathi sentokozo kuzo zonke izitolo! Khetha phakathi kweziqeda phunga noma okuhambisana nakho. Thatha uhambo endaweni evulekile eWaners noma impilo emhlabeni wemifanekiso ehlekisayo eCarnival Studio Store. Gcina izinyo lakho liwuswidi liphilile noma zitholele iCD oyithandayo!

I-Map yaseNingizimu Afrika		Ufika kanjani eCarnival City?




Entsha sha eseGauteng, eheha ngendlela engakaze ibonakale - iCarnival City ayifani nalutho owake walubona - idolobha lapho uzohamba uwedwa ushiye omunye engathintekanga.

Ngaphansi umbhoshongo ophakemeyo wamatende amakhulu ashona phezulu ngendlela emangalisayo nemibukiso ye-laser. Ukuphephezela kwesiwengu wengu somsindo esichanguzayo sikuvimbezela kuwo wonke amakhona alendawokazi enkulu. Imishini yokudlala njengokungabonwa ihlo, izindawo ezidayisa ngokudla okuphambili, ezithengisa ngotshwala ezishisayo khona, imibukiso, izitolo namabhayisikobho. Kukhona okuthile kwawo wonke umuntu, uyazikhethela ukuthi ufuna ukuba ubani. Ikhasino yaseCarnival City inogqozi olushayisa ngovalo. Izinsimbi. iminsenenezo, ukukhanya nohleko okutholayo ebusuku. Amatafula awu-60 nezinhlobo zonke zemishini yokudlala ewu-1 750 isiyonke, kubalwa nemiklomelo yaseSun International exhumene edumile. (njenge-Dream Machine, iSuper Slam nePoker Magic) kanye neMillenium Mania ngomklomelo omncane nje olingene izigidi ezimbili zamarandi. Ihlotshiswe njengeminye imihlaba yamaphupho eyimilingo, kuyagcwala ukuthi amaphupho amaningi aba iqiniso lapha. I-Carnival Club Salon Prive umhlaba wemidlalo engakaze ibonwe futhi ihlotshiswe okobukhosi kakhulukazi kuma-rollers aphakeme.

Indawo 
I-Carousel itholakala ku-N1, amakhilomitha angu-55 eNyakatho yePitoli kungeneka kalula emgwaqeni omkhulu.

I-Carousel ingangemizuzu ewu-35 ushayela usuka ePitoli nehora elilodwa ushayela usuka eGoli ngemoto. Indlela yonke idlula emgwaqeni omkhulu futhi inikeza ukushayela kalula ukhululekile kusuka kuwo womabili lamadolobhakazi amakhulu.

I-Map yaseNingizimu Afrika

Indawo yokulala. Ihotela lohlobo lwe-5 star iCarousel itholakala ngaphandle kwendawo enkulu kude nokukhwishisa nokuwalazela kwezindawo zethu ezithengisa ukudla nekhasino uqobo lwayo. Ngokunakekela izivakashi emqondweni, ihotela iCarousel ilungisela kakhulu usuku olulodwa noma ezimbili uhleli futhi inikeze umoya ofudumele nowasekhaya, ngezisebenzi ezilula nezisheshayo ukukusiza nezinobungani

Amagumbi awu-57 asehotela:- amagumbi awu-6 amahle kakhulu - isethi eyodwa - amagumbi awu-5 okungabhenywa kuwo-igumbi elilodwa  leparaplegic - amagumbi awu-44 asezingeni elijwayelekile angamabili. Wonke amagumbi adlala iM-Net amahora awu-24. Ukunakekelwa kwegumbi kuyatholaka amahora awu-24. Ukudla kwasekuseni kutholakala endlini yokuphumula yasehotela kusuka ngo-7:00 kuya ku-11:00

Amahora okusebenza
Ingxenye yamatafula asekhasino ivulelwa umphakathi kusuka ngo-12:00 zonke izinsuku.

Amatafula azohlala evuliwe kuze kube amahora asekuseni, kuncike ekusebenzeni. Imishini yokudlala ivulwa amahora angu-24 zonke izinsuku, izinsuku eziwu-7 ngesonto. Isalon Prive isebenza kusuka ngo-12:00 uma kuceliwe kuze kube amahora asekuseni, kuncike esidingweni samakhasimende.



Imidlalo yamatafula
Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli noma kumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukubekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.

Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino oyithandayo!

Imibuzo? Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi udlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo esinawo kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa - ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Imishini yokudlala
I-Carousel ingenye yezindawo ezingcono kakhulu zemishini yokudlala enemishini okunganani ewu-948.

Imishini yezigidi zamarandi i-Million Mania ne Dream Machine yonke enikeza imiklomelo yenani eliqala ku-R1 000 000. Eminye imishini edumile enkundleni enkulu kubalwa i-Wheel of Gold. i-Red Eye Nickels ne Starlight Express, ngesikhathi labo abafuna ukudidizela o-50c kuphela bejabulela i-Roller Coaster. Uhla luphakathi kuka 50c no-R100 emishinini yokudlala.

Ezokukweleta 
Amakhadi okukweleta; Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangampela. I-American Express, i-Diners, namakhadi e-Gold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. I-Amercan Express isivumela kuphela ukwamukela amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500.

Mayelana nokukweleta thintana nomphathi wekhasino osemsebenzini noma umphathi wemishini osemsebenzini ngolwazo oluthe xaxa. Amasheke. Amasheke abantu nje kanye namakhadi okukweleta ahambisana nawo agaranta isheke azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esingangezinsuku eziwu-14, ehambisana nomazisi wangampela. Amasheke agarantiwe yibhange angamukelwa uma ehamba nomazisi wangampela nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta, yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha ngosuku. Uyacelwa ukuthi uthintane nomshayi sisefo ngemininingwane emayelana nohlobo lwesheke ongalusebenzisa.

Imishini yokukhipha imali (ATM's) ingatholakala eduze kwedesika lomshayi sisefo elikhulu enkundleni yasekhasino (amatafula), eduze kwe-Kingsbar emishinini esenkundleni, eduze neJoker Bar enkundleni yemishini naseduze kwedesika leMVG enkundleni yemishini. Ama-ATM's ayatholakala amahora awu-24 ngosuku. Ama-Travellers' Cheques; Wonke ama-Travellers' Cheques ayamukelwa kanye nencwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe noma umazisi waseNingizimu Afrika. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe edumile uma ufuna izingcezu edesikini likakheshi ekhasino. Ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthola amarandi aseNingizimu Afrika, sicela uthintane nomnyango wezezimali. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe iyadingeka uma ushintsha imali. Bonke abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika abahleli okwesikhashana nabahleli unomphela benencwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe abavunyelwe ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe.

Amakhadi eMaestro. Amakhadi eMaetro angasetshenziswa nomazisi odingekayo noma inombolo eyimfihlo.


Imidlalo yamatafula
Uma ujabulela ukudlala amatafula, kukhona uhla lokuzikhethela lwe-American Roulette, Poker, Blackjack nekhethekile i-Diamond Rush Progressive Blackajck. ICarousel inamatafula awu-37 esewonke, wonke anabaphathi abaqeqeshwe kahle nokukhokhelwa njalo.

Umbhoshongo ophakeme onezitezi ezine wendawo enkulu yamatafula unikeza ukukhanya nendawo enomoya nethuba lokudlala i-American Roulette, Blackjack nePoker ukwengenza kwi-Diamond Rush. Ungathola ithuba lokuwina umklomelo osukela ku-R50000 ematafuleni e-Diamond Rush BlackJack ngokuvele nje ubeke omunye u-R5 kalula wokubheja. Ukuhlanganiswa kokuwina 0-7 abathathu bamadayimane - isikhokhele ngesikhathi isidlule u-R1000 000.

Uhla kwi-American Roulette lusuka ku-R5 kuya ku-R100 kwinombolo, kodwa ukugcina okuphakeme kuyatholakala ngesicelo. Isigcino seBlackjack neDiamond Rush siqala ku-R50, sigcine ku-R1000. I-Poker Ibiza kusuka ku-R25 kuya ku-R250. Uma ufuna usizo ukufunda ukudlala imidlalo etholakala kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa, ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa


Imidlalo yamatafula

I-Salon Prive
Lekhasino enakho konke kwayo, enedesika likakheshi, indawo ethengisa ngotshwala, ukudla kanye nezindlu zokugeza, inikeza izinga eliphezulu endaweni enhle kakhulu nebanzi, kuqala emananini aphezulu; u-R25 kwe-American Roulette no-R200 kwi-Blackjack nePunto Bunco - ukugcizelela kusezidingweni zomdlali.

Ukwengeza, Indlu yangasese ingabekiswa ngaphambili ukuqinisekisa ukuba yedwa komdlala owinayo. I-Crystal Club Salon Prive ibekelwe abadlali kuphela.




Imihlangano
Lezi zindawo ezilandelayo ziyatholakala ukulungisela izidingo ezibalulekile nenani labeze emhlanganweni:

Itende elikhulu. Hlala phansi (Ukudla okuzodliwa sekulungisiwe) - lilungele abantu abangu-800. Hlala phansi (itafula okulandwa kolu ukudla likhona) - ilingene abangu-1000. Amakhonsathi - abangu-3500 iHan Palace isitayela segumbi yebhodi - yabangu-16. Isitayela sebhayisikobho - yabangu-80. Isitayela sendlu yokufundela yabangu-60. Umcimbi wengxubevange wotshwala - yabangu-100. Hlala phansi ( ukudla okuzodliwa kulungisiwe) - kwabangu-100. Hlala phansi (itafula likhona) - labangu-100.

I- BJ's Monkey Business Café, iGiovanni's Ristorante, iSquire's Express Restaurants. IGiovannis inikeza ngohla lokudla okuphambili kwase-Ithali kusuka kuma Pizza kuya kwi-Pasta ye-Veal nokunye okuningi. IGiovannis inikeza ukunakekelwa kwangempela kwase-Ithali nanjengendlela ehlotshiswe ngayo, ngetshe elihashazelayo elingaphakathi nesiketekete esilengayo kanye nendawo elungiswe kahle ngaphandle engaphezu kodonga kulabo abajabulela umuzwa nokudla I-Pizza

ISquire Loft Exporers Club, iphupho labathandi besiteki, inikeza uhla lwenyama ethambileyo enhle ngendlela emangalisayo, kanye nokuningi abathandi benyama abangazitika ngako. I-Squires Loft inemihlobiso emangalisayo eyenziwe ngobungcweti nezinto eziqoqekayo ezihlobise izindonga nophahla nangaphakathi. Okusuka kumabhele ePolar kuya kwendala indizamshini, kanye nohla lwezithombe zeminyaka eseyadlula. I-Squires Loft iyakwenanela ukuvakashelwa noma ngabe nje uzobuka izimangaliso ezisodongeni. I-Curry Tarven, Lokhu akukona kwalabo abasheshe baphathwe isinxi senhliziyo. Woza uzojabulela ikhishi langempela laseMpumalanga uzizwele ubungcweti nobumnandi obumangalisayo bengxenye yezwe. Udumo luka-Breyani wabo, iCurry Tarven inikeza ukunambitheka kwase-India ongasoze wakukhohlwa. Izindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala kusuka kwezishukumisa umzimba kuya kwezihlekisa kakhulu ukukhombisa kaninginingi - ICheyenne Saloon inakho konke! Jabulela umoya wase-Wild West ngesikhathi usalinde umbukiso olandelayo wokuhlaba ikhefu uqale. Dansa ubusuku bonke nabangani, ngomgqumo wamabhendi aziwayo noma ujabulele umbukiso womdlalo ohlekisa ngokuhlabeza! Izindawo nasezindaweni zokudlala imishini.

I-Cheyenne Saloon: I-Cheyenne Saloon isibe enye yezindawo ezinkulu yezokuzithokozisa isikhathi eside, ye-Pitoli ne-Goli, ingenisa izihambeli ezithanda uSmokie, uBarry Hilton, uKevin "Bloody" Wilson uGarry kanye nama-Peacemaker, iBallyhoo, iBlrney Brothers, i-Abbot kanye ne Grabb kanye namaculo amnandi nemidanso emangalisayo efana ne- "Rocket neSpies", ne-"Take This", i-"Inferno" kanye ne-"Magic Moments". I-Cheyenne Saloon ivuliwe njalo ngoLwesihlanu neMigqibelo ebusuku kusuka ku-19hoo, ngesikhathi esijwayelekile semibukiso sika-21hoo. Amathikithi ayo yonke imibukiso yase-Cheyenne ayatholakala lapho kudayiswa khona amathikithi noma eminyango ngamanani ajwayelekile okungena emibukisweni u-R20 umuntu. ULwesihlanu  neMigqibelo ebusuku.

IGalofu
ICarousel ingumxhasi omkhulu weyokuqala nowokuphela kwayo iSenoir Amateur Golf Tour South Africa. Isenzeko sokuqala senzeka ngo-1997 no 1999 wabona thina sixhasa uhambo onyakeni wabo wesithathu.

IGauteng Central Series yohambo iqala ngomhlaka-16 ku-August 1999. Ukungenela kukunye uR200.00 futhi umdlalo uwodwa udlala ngaphezu kwezinsuku eziwu-3 kanye nezimbobo eziwu-54 nesigcino sezithiyo sika-18.
Ngomhlaka-5 kuya ku-7 ku-October 1999 umdlalo useModderfontein G. C.
Ngomhlaka-19 kuya ku-21 ku-October 1999 eBenoni C. C.
Ngomhlaka-2 kuya ku-4 ku-November eRoodekpo C. C.

ICarousel yavulwa ngo-1991 futhi seyibe enye yamakhasino anempumelelo ase-Sun International. Ithuthukiswa izivakashi zasemini emqondweni, indlela eyiyo nesebenza ngayo ibhukulele izivakashi zosuku.

Ukuhamba uza eCarousel usuka kwenkulu indawo yethu yokupaka, uhlangana ngokushesha nendadi yethu yamarose ebukeka kahle kakhulu egqamisa iCarousel Horses nokugqama kwamanzi esabekayo nendawo enesiqongo sebhilidi egcwele ukukhanya kwemvelo. Indawo enkulu evulekile isiza ukuvela kwamagilasi amawindi nophahla ngamathayela afakwe kahle phansi nezinsila ezinhle zikamabula. Sixhasa indawo enkulu ewumbhoshongo yokubuka I-Video senzela izingane, kanye nendawo lapho kunakekelwa  abantwana egadwe ngendlela enokucophelela, kanye nendawo enkulu yokudlala abadala egqamise kokubili imishini yokudlala namatafula.

Ingqikithi yengilazi enombala ibuyekezwe ekhasino ngengilazi enombala eyisiqongo emboze indawo yamatafula. Esigabeni sokuqala iCarousel yayiyikhasino enkulu kunawo wonke engxenyeni eseNingizimu. ICarousel idumile futhi ngendawo yayo enkulukazi yokuzithokozisa. ICheyenne Saloon esifakela umculo esiwaziyo nemidanso emihle kakhulu. Siyindawo edume umhlaba wonke ngomdlalo wesibhakela odlalwa lapha futhi sekuke kwadlalwa ezinkulu ezinjengo-Roberto Duran, Corrie Sanders, Baby Jake Matlala, Vuyani Bhungu nomunye omusha kakhulu uLehlohonono Ledwaba. Sinikeza okuthile kuwo wonke umuntu futhi selokhu yavulwa seyibe isikhonkwane ku-N1 eNyakatho nePitoli. Ngabanikazi bezigidi ngokushesha abawu-90 kumele sibe abangcono kakhulu ukubheja kubo.

Imihlangano
IGaborone Sun iyindawo enhle kakhulu ukubambela imihlangano, kusomabhizinisi ofuna ukuphuma ngaphandle emsindweni wedolobha elikhulu.

Akukhona kodwa okukhona ukuba nayo yonke into edingekayo ngaphakathi, indawo yemihlangano, namagumbi ebhodi, kodwa kukhona nezindawo zokuthengisa ngotshwala nezokuzithokozisa ezinhle kakhulu kwimihlangano nje. Impahla nomsebenzi, umata osodongeni nodonga, isilungiso moya, ugesi ongagadwe muntu onezinkinobho zokwenza kube luvivi, ama-PA systems, izinto ze-Black-out, ucingo, izinto ezidingeka emihlanganweni, imipheme ephathekayo - I- 1x Da-lite, iPicture King Overhead projector, imibhobho ezimelayo kanye nama-Portable PA system azimelayo, inkundla yokudansa ephathekayo, ama-lectens aphathekayo, umshini wokudlala amakhasethi, izinto zesiteji eziphathekayo noma ama-Fashion ramps TV, imishini ye-VHS video, iPiped music, i-3 Phase power, ucingo, amabhodi amhlophe evideo projector, iprojector ewu-35mm yemifanekiso, imilenze yokudebela I-Flipchart.

Ukwengeza, indawo ifakwe izingcingo ukuhumusha kanye kanye nedokodo lokuhumusha lesikhathi eside elibheka yonke indawo yomhlangano. Indawo yezitolo (itholakala phakathi nehotela), ezemibiko, ezokukopisha, ezobubhalane, ezezimbali, ezokuhumusha, ukuxhumana ngocingo, imifanekiso nezingcingo.

Igumbi lokuhlangana, Igumbi elikhulu lokuhlangana: Lingahlukaniswa amagumbi amathathu. Ukwengeza kukhona amanye amagumbi okuxoxisana awu-5 angasetshenziselwa ukuhlangana. Indawo inakho konke ngaphakathi nendawo engumhume eyindlela yokuhlanganisa ezinye nendawo yokuhlangana okokuqala enendawana ethengisa ngotshwala.

Ikhasino iMarang itholakala ehotela iMarang eFrancistown, eBotswana.

Uphahla lotshani, isakhiwo samatshe nemihlobiso yamasiko esintu ase-Afrika kwasekhasino iMarang kudonsa ubu-Afrika bese iboleka umoya ofudumele nonenjabulo. Ukukhanya kukagesi, imisindo nezinsimbi zokuwina imiklomelo emikhulu zenza ikhasino ibe indawo okunesiqiniseko ukuyivakashela.

ISun International eGaborone Sun ilungele izinga elonobuntofontofo nenjabulo ngesikhathi futhi isendaweni enhle kwezamabhizinisi.

Amagumbi akunika ukuzizwa usekhaya ube ungekho ekhaya lapho ungaphumula noma uzizwele amahora athile usuphumile emsebenzini. Indawo enayo yonke impahla yokubambela imihlangano namagumbi ebhodi anikeza osomabhizinisi intokozo. Kukhona futhi izindawo zokuthengisa utshwala nezokuzithokozisa ezinhle kakhulu ekubambeni imihlanganywana nje. Zitholele kokudliwayo nokokuzithokozisa ezindaweni ezahlukene ezithengisa ngokudla. Ikhasino nemidlalo ejwayelekile yamatafula nemishini edumile yokudla yase Sun International yenza amaphupho aphumelele.

Ukuthenga: Izitolo phakathi ehotela, isitolo seCurio, indawo yokulungisa izinwele, indawo yobuhle, inkampani yezokuthutha, u-opharetha wezohambo, isikhungo samabhizinisi. Abadayisa ngezindlu kanye namabhange.

Indawo
IGaborone Sun itholakala eGaborone, inhlokodolobha yaseBotswana. Kuyimizuzwana nje embalwa kuphela ukusuka edolobheni nasesikhungweni samabhizinisi, ezakhiweni zikaHulumeni, naseNyuvesi yaseBotswana.

Isikhumulo sezindiza; Ukusebenza kwansukuzonke kwesikhumulo sezindiza okuqondile kuyatholakala eGaborone ukuya esikhumulweni sezindiza eGoli. INingizimu Afrika idlula ngaseBotswana no Comair ne SAA Express. Ezomoya zaseBotswana zisebenzisa uhlelo lwangaphakathi. Ukuxhumana kwaphesheya kwezilwandle kuyatholakala usebenzisa ezinye izindiza zakwamanye amazwe. Ulwazi lohambo lwamazwe ngamazwe. Ukulungiswa kwezimali zibe ukheshi, amasheke ezihambi, noma ngamakhadi okukweleta (I-American Express, iDinners Club Card, iMastercard, ne Visa). Imali iPula. Kuncono ukuqala ubheke ukuthi kushintsheka ngamanani anjani ngaphambi kokuvakasha. Amaposi omngcele waseGaborone noma ama-Visa.

Imidlalo yamatafula
Ukusebenza; Amtafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli nomakumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukubekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.
 
Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino oyithandayo!

I-Black Jack
Umgomo womdlalo. Umgomo womdlalo ukudonsa isandla samakhadi angangenani elisondele ku-21 kunalawa aphethwe umdayisi, ngaphandle kokuqhuma okuwukudonsa angaphezu kuka-21. Isandla esiphethe amakhadi awu-2 ano-Ace nanoma imuphi u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing kubizwa ngeBlackjack bese kukhokha u-3 kuya ku-2.

Kudlalwa kanjani; Ukudlala, umdlali ngamunye kufanele abheje (okungenani okuncane okusetafuleni) ebhokisini lokubheja eliphambi kwakhe. Umphathi wetafula wabela umdlali ngamunye ikhadi elilodwa, bese ephinda futhi enika umdlali ngamunye elesibili yena azishiye nelilodwa. Wonke amakhadi abiwe abheke phezulu. Kuqala umdlali ongakwesokunxele somphathi, umdlali ngamunye kumele enze isinqumo esisodwa kwezinhlanu (buka ngezansi) esiqondene namakhadi amabili lawa abelwe wona, naleli khadi eliphethwe umphathi. Umphathi unikeza umdlali ngamunye ushintsho: Okokuqala, yima, ungathathi amanye amakhadi, Okwesibili, Donsa, Thatha elinye ikhadi noma amakhadi ukuze azinike amathuba okuthola okusondelene no-21, Okwesithathu, Wahlukanise, Uma umdlali abelwe amakhadi amabili, umdlali unikwe ithuba lokuzikhethela ukwahlukanisa amakhadi awadlale njengezandla ezimbili ezahlukene. Ngesikhathi umdlali ehlukanisa amakhadi, kufanele abheje, okulingana nenani abheje ngalo ekuqaleni, ekhidini lesibili ngaphambi kokuthi umphathi amabele elinye ikhadi. Uma lamakhadi amabili achithiwe kungamakhadi o-Ace, umdlali angathola elinye ikhadi lesandla ngasinye, kodwa uma omunye u-Ace abiwe, kungahlakazwa futhi. Inani, uma u-Ace kulezi zandla ngasinye ethathwa njengo-11. Okwesine, Ukuphinda kabili, umdlali angaphinda kabili isiteki sakhe konoma yimaphi amakhadi amabili okungewona iBlackjack. Okwesihlanu, Ukudela, uma umdlali ebona ukuthi amakhadi akhe okuqala amabili akasona isandla esiqinile ukuthi angawina, angadela ukubheja kwakhe okuchaza ukuthi ulahlekelwa ingxenye yesiteki sakhe futhi amakhadi akhe ayasuswa. Angakwenza lokhu kuphela emva kokwabiwa kwamakhadi okuqala nangaphambi kokwabiwa kwamanye amakhadi. Akadeli ngo-Ace womphathi.

Isandla somphathi, uma isandla somphathi sinenani lika-16 noma ngaphansi, umphathi kufanele adonse elinye ikhadi. Uma isandla somphathi sinenani lika-17 noma ngaphezulu, umphathi kufanele ame. Ukulungisela ingozi ngemali, Uma ikhadi lokuqala likamphathi liwu-Ace, abadlali bangavikela ingozi ekubhejeni kwabo bavikele ukuthola kukamphathi iBlackjack. Lokho kusho ukuthi umdlali angabheja, kungabi ngaphezu kwengxenye yokubheja kokuqala, ngaphambi kwebhokisi lokubheja engxenyeni ebhaliwe ukulungisela ingozi. Uma umphathi ethola iBlackjack, ukubhejela ingozo kuyakhokhelwa kusuka ku-2 kuya ku-1 (lokho okulingana nokubheja kokuqala). Uma umphathi engayitholi iBlackjack, imali yokulungisela ingozi iyalahleka futhi umdlalo uyaqhubeka njengokujwayelekile. Ubani owinayo futhi ubani olahlekelwayo? Uma inani lesandla somdlali sisondela ku-21 kunaleso somphathi, umdlali uwina yonke imali (lokho akubhejele). Uma inani lesandla somphathi sisondela ku-21 kunaleso somdlali, umdlali uyalahlekelwa imali abheje ngayo. Uma inani lesandla somphathi lilingana nelomdlali, umdlali ugcina imali yakhe abheje ngayo (kuyamiwa). Uma umphathi nomdlali bobabili bethola iBlackjack, kuyamiwa. Uma umphathi eqhuma, bonke abadlali bayawushiya umdlalo bewine ngishi nemali. Uma umdlali enoBlackjack (okuwu-Ace kanye nelinye ikhadi elinesithombe noma u-10) umphathi engawutholi, umdlali ozokhokhelwa kusuka ku-3 kuya ku-2 emalini abheje ngayo. Uma umphathi enoBlackjack, umdlali engenawo, kodwa ebe enamakhadi awu-21, umdlali uzolahlekelwa imali yakhe.





Ezokukweleta
Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangempela. I-American Express, iDiners namakhadi eGold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000 (I-American Express isivumela kuphela ukuthatha amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768). Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500. Ukukweleta, sicela uthintane nomphathi wekhasino osebenzayo ngaleso sikhathi ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.
Amasheke, amasheke abantu nje awavunyelwe eBotswana.
Imishini yokukhipha imali emibili ephethwe ibhange iBarclays (eBotswana) nebhange iFirst National (eBotswana) iyatholakala ngaphakathi ekhasino. Amasheke ezihambi; amasheke ezihambi ayemukelwa. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; Yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe ukushintshwa ibe iPula - sicela uthintane nebhange elisehotela noma idesika lomlindisivalo. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka uma ushintsha imali yakwelinye izwe.




Ukudla nokokuzithokozisa
Imidlalo yokuphumula; Ubulunga beGolf Course Complimentary kweseceleni iGaborone Country Club. Ichibi lokubhukuda; amathawula echibi lokubhukuda ayatholakala. Izinkundla ezimbili zebhola lomphebezo lesimo sezulu lonke. Amarakhethi namabhola akhona. Izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalwa lishayelwa engosini yezindonga ezimbili ezinesilungiso moya. Amarakhethi namabhola akhona. Okuhehayo kwangaphathi. IGaborone yakhethwa njengenhlokodolobha yeBotswana ngo-1965. INyuvesi iBotswana, iNational Museum ne-Art Gallery nenkundla yezemidlalo yesizwe konke kuyatholakala edolobheni. Umculo nemidlalo yeshashalazi kuyalungiselwa eMatisong Cultural Centre. Eduze nedolobha kukhona iGaborone neMokolodi Game Reserves. Uhambo lokuzijabulisa luyalungiselwa ukuya kwezinye izindawo abantu abazithandayo ngaphandle kweGaborone; ezifana no-Okavango Swamps, iChobe neMoremi Game Reserves.




Imidlalo yamatafula
Uma ubutatata bemishini bungakwenelisi thatha inselelo kwi-Roulette, iBlackjak noma iPoker

Sinikeza amatafula angu-6 e-American Roulette, ngalokukubheja okulandelayo kusuka kokuncane kuya kokukhulu: 1@ P2 - P50; 4@ P5 - P100; 1@ P10 - P200. amatafula angu-4 eBlackjack  nawo akhona ngalokukubheja okulandelayo kusuka kokuncane kuya kokukhulu: 2@ P20 - P500; 2@ p50 -P1000. Itafula leRaise Em Poker elinikeza ukubheja okuncane kuka-P21 okukhulu kuka-P200. Uma udinga usizo ekufundeni ukuthi idlalwa kanjani imidlalo edlalwa kumakhasino ethu. Singajabula ukukufundisa. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Izikhathi zokusebenza
Ingxenye yamatafula ekhasino ivulelwa umphakathi kusuka ngo-13;00 nsukuzonke.

Amatafula azohlala evuliwe kuze kube izintathakusa ekuseni, kuncike ezingeni lokusebenza. Ingxenye yemishini ivuliwe nsukuzonke kusuka ngo-10:00 kuze kube nini kodwa ivaliwe ngePhasika. I-Salon Prive isebenza kusuka ngo-20:00 kuze kube nini.




IMagic Poker
IMagic Poker umdlalo omusha ojabulisayo osuka eSun International okuvumela ukuba udlale iStud Poker ngokubheja kwe Progressive. Sesazise manje iMagic Poker Joker eyikhafi elikhulu, nebhokisi lokubheja leBluff elikhokhela amathuba ka-3 kuya ku-2 uma umdayisi engavuli.

Kudlalwa kanjani; Ukuba semdlalweni nokwabelwa amakhadi akho awu-5 kufanele ubheje kwi-Ante boc. Uma ufisa ukudlala ukubheja okuqhubekayo, kufanele ubeke kanye kanye. Lokhu kubheja kuhlale kuwu-R25 futhi kuzimele kokunye ukubheja. Umabi uzokwaba amakhadi awu-5 ewabhekise phansi kumdlali ngamunye emdlalweni nawu-5 kuyena nelingaphezulu libheke phezulu. Khumbula ukuthi iMagic Poker Joker ikhadi elikhulu. Kufanele manje unqume ukuthu ufisa ukuqhubeka nomdlalo ngokubheja ebhokisini lokubheja, okulingana nalokho kwe-Ante, noma uyasonga okuchaza ukuthi uzolahlekelwa ukubheja kwakho kokuqala kwe-Ante. Ngesikhathi konke ukubheja sekubekiwe umdayisi uzoveza amakhadi akhe. Uma unesandla esingcono kunesikamdayisi, uzokhokhelwa njengokwamathuba owathole etafuleni. Kodwa-ke uma umdayisi enesandla esingcono kunesenu, uzolahlekelwa yikho kokubili i-Ante yakho nokubheja kwasebhokisini lokubheja. Esikhathini lapho umdayisi engavuli kanti wena isandla sakho sikhona, ukubheja kwakho kuzokumela (awuwini futhi awulahlekelwa) futhi uzokhokhelwa ngisho imali yokubheja kwakho kwe-Ante. Uma isandla sakho singaveli futhi nomdayisi engavuli, kokubili ukubheja kwakho kwebhokisi nokwe-Ante kuzobuyela ngaphandle.

Ukubheja okuqhubekayo. Ukubheja okuqhubekayo kuzokukhokhela uma unesandla esilingana noma esingcono kune-apir yoJack. Ukubheja kufanele kubekwe kanye kanye ukubheja kwe-Ante, ngaphambi kokwabiwa kwamakhadi. Lokhu kubheja kukhokhela noma ngabe umdayisi uyavula noma akavuli. Umklomelo oqhubekayo obekiwe ukhokhelwa eRoyal Flush ngaphandle kweMagic Poker Joker. Ukubheja kwe Bluff; Ukubheja kweBluff kungaphandle kanti kungadlalwa uma ukholelwa ukuthi umdayisi uzovula. Ukudlala lokhukubheja kufanele  ubeke ukubheja ebhokisini lokubheja okulingana nokubheja kwakho kokuqala kwe-Ante bese ubheja kwiBluff emakiwe> Ukubheja kweBluff kufanele kube okuncane kuka-R25, bese kungaba ukuphindaphindwa ngo-R25 kuze kube inani lokubheja kwe-Ante. Uma umdayisi eveza isandla sakhe, uma engenawo u-Ace/King noma okungcono, uzokhokhelwa u-3 kuya ku-2 ekubhejeni kwakho kweBluff. Kodwa-ke, uma evula uzolahlekelwa yilokho kubheja.

IPunto Banco
IPunto Banco umdlalo wekhadi wasekhasino odumile ovumela abadlali babhejele udonga noma baphikise udonga
Ukuthenga izingcezu. IPunto Bunco idlalwa ngezingcezu ezitholakala etafuleni kumphathi noma edesikini likamphathi. Isimo setafula. Itafula lePunto Banco ngezingxenye eziwu-3 zokubheja ngasecaleni ngalinye letafula. Indawo yePunto (umdlali). Inawo -yeBanco (udonga), kanye nengxenye yokubheja eseceleni ebizwa ngokuthi i-Tie, iDraw noma indawo i-Egalite. Abadlali abangu-14 bangahlala etafuleni, ngamunye nendawo yakhe yokubheja ngaphambi kwakhe. Ukwengeza kubadlali abahlezi, iPunto Banco ingangenisa inani labadlali abamile.

Kudlalwa kanjani. Umdlali ngamunye uyazikhethela ukubheja eceleni lePunto (umdlali) noma leBanco (ibhenka). Umdlali enesicathulo uwudonga. Inhloso yomdlalo ukuthola okusondelene nonombolo u-9 ngokungenzeka. Umdlali ohlezi ubheja ezindaweni zePunto, ukubheja kwePunto kusetshenziswa yiwo wonke umuntu. Ingxenye yePunto kanye nokubheja kweBunco kubekwa kwinombolo yokuvimba yeBunco ehambisana nenombolo ebekiwe ngaphambi komdlali. IPunto neBanco kwabelwa amakhadi amabili emunye ngamunye wabadlali. Ikhadi lesithathu lingabekwa esandleni ngasinye, kunvike emphumelweni wamakhadi okuqala amabili. Isandla esiwinayo yileso esithola amakhadi alinganiselwa enanini elisondle ku-9. Uma inani elihlanganisiwe lamakhadi lidlula ku-10, u-10 awunakwa (isibonelo. U-8 no-4 okulingana no-12, u-10 awunakwa, bese inani seliphelele kube u-2). U-10 noma ikhadi lesithombe kubalwa njengokungekho. Inani lamakhadi awu-2 lika-8 noma lika-9 libizwa nge-Natural. Ukwengeza ekubhejeni okukodwa iPunto noma iBanco, abadlali bangabheja futhi kwi-Tie okuwukuthi isamba senani lamakhadi esandleni sePunto sizofana nesamba senani lamakhadi asesandleni seBanco. Konke ukubheja kweTie kufanele kunikwe umphathi ukuze kubekwe. Esenzekweni seTie, ukubheja kwePunco neBanco kuyedluliselwa emdlalweni olandelayo, bese ukubheja kweTie kuyakhokhelwa ku-8 kuya ku-1. Abadlali kufanele babheje kokukodwa iPunto noma iBanco ukudonsa amakhadi.

ISalon Prive		
ISalon Prive yethu ingaphandle kwenkundla enkulu yekhasino, yenzelwe abadlali abaqavile. Sinikeza amatafula awu-2 e-America Roulette (i-P5 neP10) netafula leBlackJack (iP50). Lendawo ibekelwe kuphela abadlali.

Imishini yokudlala 
Ukujabulela ukudlala kukhona imidlalo eminingi ongakhetha kuyona exhumene yonke nemiklomelo eqhubekayo okutholakala kuyo iMillion Mania.

Okungakusiza izitodlawana ezinompheme eziwu-3, zonke ziyadayisa futhi ziyahlenga, zitholakala ngasecaleni langakwesokudla lapho kungenwa ngakhona ekhasino. Imali iyadingeke ukudlala kuyo yonke imishini. Ukufaka kuqala ku-50t (ithebe) kuya ku-P5 (iPula)

I-American Roulette
I-American Roulette; I-American Roulette iyathokozisa, umdlalo wasekhasino ogcwele intokozo nonezinhlobo eziningi zokubheja. I-Roulette idlalwa ngezingcezu ezingajwayelekile ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. Leze zingcezu zuhlukaniswa ngemibala okwenzeka ukuthi izingcezu zomdlali ngamunye zihlukaniseke kwezabanye abadlali etafuleni. Lezi zingcezu zemibala azinanani noma kuphi ekhasino, fuhti kufanele zishintshelwe kukheshi etafuleni uma umdlali eseqedile ukudlala. Abadlali bangathenga lezizingcezu zemibala ngokheshi kumphathi, noma basebenzise ikhadi lokukweleta ukuthenga izingcezu zenani edesikini likakheshi, ezingasetshenzisiwe etafuleni ukuthenga izingcezu zemibala

Isondo le-American Roulette. Isondo le-American Roulette linezimbobo eziwu-37; ezimnyama eziwu-18; ezibomvu eziwu-18 neyodwa eluhlaza eawu-zero. Indlela youkbheja; Indlela yokubheja ivumela abadlali ukuthi babheje ngezindlela ezihlukene eziningi. (Buka indlela yethu yokwenza ekhombisayo ngenhla kwaloluhla noqwembe lokukhokhela ngaphezulu). Khumbula iRoulette umdlalo odlalelwa ukuzithokozisa. Izinombolo zonke zinoshintsho olulingana nanoma iyiphi inomboloephumayo emjijweni ngamunye. Lokho okuyinimbolo ewinayo kunoma imuphi umjijo ayinabuthi emphumelweni womjijo olanelayo.

Kudlalwa kanjani. Beka ucezu lwakho lombala noma lwenani enkundleni. Umphathi uzojija ibhola. Ungabheja emva kokuba umphathi esememezele "Akusekho ukubheja" - ibhola selizowela phansi kwinombolo ewinayo. Inombolo ewinayo izokhonjiswa ngokubekwa kukamaka kuyona. Umdayisi uzosusa konke ukubheja okungawinanga enkundleni bese ekhokhela ukubheja okuwinile. Noma ikuphi ukubheja okubekwe enkundleni emva kokuthi umphathi esevalile isikhathi sokubheja, kuzobizwa ngokuthi "akukho ukubheja" bese kubuyiselwa emumva kumdlali.

Ukubheja nokukhokhelwa
Ukubheja kwangaphakathi
Ukubheja kwe-Straight up u-35 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja noma iyiphi inombolo ehamba yodwa, isibonelo u-3, 7, 10.
Ukubheja iSplit u-17 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja noma yiziphi izinombolo ezisondelene, isibonelo u-4 no-5
Ukubheja iStree u-11 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja zonke izinombolo ezintathu emugqeni, isibonelo u-13, 14 no-15.
Ukubheja iCorner u-8 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja izinombolo ezine ezisondelene, isibonelo u-23, 24, 26 no-17.
Ukubheja iSix Line u-5 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja izinombolo ezisemigqeni emibili ezisondelene, isibonelo u-7, 8, 9, 10, 11 no-12.

Ukubheja kwangaphandle
I-Dozen u2 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja izinombolo eziyishumi nambili ezilandelene, okungaba u-1 kuya ku-12, u-13 kuya ku-24, noma u-25 kuya ku-36.
Ama-Culumns u-2 kuya ku-1 Ukubheja izinombolo zonke eziyishumi nambili ohleni olulodwa.
I-Red noma iBlack u-1 kuya ku-1 ukubhejela zonke izinombolo ezibomvu ( noma zonke ezimnyama)
I- Odd noma I-Even u-1 kuya ku-1 ukubhejela zonke izinombolo eziwugweje ( noma zonke ezilinganayo).
u-1 kuya ku-18 noma u-19 kuya ku-36 u-1 kuya ku-1 ukubhejela izinombolo eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili ezilandelanayo.
Ngesikhathi u-zer ewin, Konke ukubheja kwezinhla noma -dozen kuyalahlekelwa. Ukubheja kokulinganayo kuyalahlekelwa ingxenye yokubheja iyabekwa. Noma yikuphi ukubheja okungekho ku-zero, noma inhlanganisela ya-zero, kuyalahlekelwa.




Imidlalo yamatafula
Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli nomakumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukubekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.

Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino oyithandayo!


Imibuzo? Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi udlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo esinawo kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa - ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Ukudla nokokuzithokozisa
Okuhehayo kwasendaweni
I-Windhoek, I-Windhoek inhlokodolobha yaseNamibia, yilapho kuhlezi khona abaphetheyo, abashayi bomthetho namajaji kahulumeni waseNamibia nalapho kutholakala khona isizinda sezamabhizinisi ezwe, ezamasiko nezemfundo. Nokuba nodumo lokuba elinye lamadolobha ahlanzekile ase-Afrika, lonomoya wokujabula nowokuba nezizwe eziningi. Ukuhambela ukuzijabulisa ngokubona ezamasiko. Ikolishi lomculo nobuciko, umdanso webhale nomdanso wezimanje. Imidlalo yeshashalazi enobungcweti e-National Theatre, Umdanso webhale nomculo. I-Warehouse Theatre itholakala ebhilidini elidala labavubeli. Itheatre ekhululekile, enikeza umculo nemibukiso yomuntu ngamunye. I-Franco Namibia Cultural Centre ibukisa izithombe ezinsukwini zesonto, ezesiNgisi nezesiFrench. Iphinde futhi igqugquzele ubuciko baseNamibia. Ukudla

Indlu ngayinye ingasetshenziswa ngokuvala indawo enomsindo. Okusalayo ukulungiselelwa kwezindlu kwesidlo somdanso wabantu abawu-400, noma umhlanganywana omncane wabantu abawu-10 kuyatholakala ngokulingana. Kodwa eSun siyaqonda ukuthi bathini ngokuthi " umsebenzi wodwa hayi ukudla" -ngalokho isizinda sethu semihlangano sesibe usaziwayo ngokuba khona kwezinto eziningi zasebusuku lapho izithunywa zingaphumula khona emva kosuku olude

Isizinda semihlangano sihlotshiswe ngokwejwayelekile njengokohla lwezindlu eziholayo eziwu-6. Indlu ngayinye ingasetshenziswa ngokuvala indawo enomsindo. Ngena kwenye yezindawo ezivulekile yehotela elihle e-Afrika bese uthatha ukubukeka okuhle nokushintshashintshayo kweMaseru,inhlokodolobha eyichweba laseLesotho.

Ikhosele emaphethelweni ogu lwecheba,iLesotho Sun yakhiwa kusuka kulelichweba elifanayo lesintu yaqoshelwa ukuxubana nomsuka wayo nezintaba. Phakathi kwayo kukhona izingadi ezinhle, ihotela likulungele ukubhekana nezinzwa zakho bese lenze ukuhlala kwakho kube okuphumelelayo. Okubukeka kangcono umlingo wezintaba  - uhlola izintaba zomlingo zeMaluti zaseLesotho,usebenzisa iLesotho Sun njengomgogodla. Imigwaqo yonke mihle, yenza uhambo oluya ezintabeni lube ihora elilodwa ushayela. Uma ufuna ukuhamba ngento enezinyawo ezine, jabulela ukuhamba ngezinqola zamahhashi. Lemizamo ephephile yokuhlola izindonga zemifula nezimpophoma seyibe nedumela nento eyenzeka kalula.

Imishini yokudlala
Kukaningi umnikazi zigidi enziwa phakathi bobufithifithi bezibani nobufasafasa bemishini yokudlala. Woza uzozizamela inhlanhla yakho komunye wemishini ewu-86.

Ngokukufanele; Izitodlwana ezinompheme ezinabashayi zisefo ezintathu zitholakala kahle hle ekhasino ngaphakathi. Uhlweza luyadingeka ukudlala imishini yo-50c,M1, M2, noM5,olukuvumela ukuchitha isikhathi eside udlala umshini wakho owuthandayo.Udumo lwemishini ye-Poker luyenyuka sonke isikhathi.Izinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo ziyatholakala ezinikeza imiklomelo emikhulu.ukulungiselela okuthe xaxa kwalezizidingo iSun International yatshengisa umklomelo wayo wokuqala omkhulu wePoker oqhubekayo ngo-1995. IPoker Magic, umdlalo odlalwa ngokufaka uM1, yakha umklomelo oqala ngo-M100 000. Futhi owokuqala eLesotho umshini wamaphupho odume ngokwakha abanini zigidi njalo nje. Lomklomelo uxhumene namanye amakhasino eSun International futhi ayikaze ikhokhe ngaphansi kuka-M1 000 000.

Ikhasino inikeza i-American Roulette edumile kanye neziteki ezimbili eziphansi neziphezulu emdlalweni yeBlackjack.

Ukubeka ematafuleni kuzongafani umdlalo nomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizobeka ibhodi likamaka elikhombisa ukuthi kubhejwa ngamalini. I-American Roulette umdlalo omnandi onentokozo okubhejwa ngezinhlobonhlobo eziningi futhi udlalwa ngezingcezu zekhethelo ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. Sinamatafula awu-4 e-American Roulette ngalokukubheja okulandelayo:
Okuncane: M5 	Okukhulu: M100

Umgomo weBlackjack ukudonsa isandla samakhadi esisenanini eliseduze kuka-21 ngaphezulu kwelomphathi,ngaphandle kokuqhuma (ngaphezu kuka-21). Isandla samakhadi amabili ano-Ace nanoma imuphi u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing sibizwa ngeBlackjack futhi sikhokha u3:2. Sinamatafula awu-4  eBlackjack ngalokukubheja okulandelayo:
Okuncane: M20		Okukhulu: M200
Okuncane: M50		Okukhulu: M1000

Uma udinga usizo ekufundeni ukuthi kudlalwa kanjani noma yimuphi umdlalo odlalwa ekhasino,singajabula ukukufundisa ngasese uma ufuna. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Ukufaka ematafuleni kuzoshintsha umdlalo nomdlalo.Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa ukuthi kubhejwa ngamalini. Imihlangano
Indlu iMabopane eyaqanjelwa idolobha, lapho iMorula Sun itholakala khona, lolusizo lutholakala ezingadini zehotela - indlu enhle kakhulu yase-Afrika enepali nayo naphahla lotshani. Iyisakhiwo sezinto eziningi esingahlala abantu abangafika ku-250 ngesitayela sasesithombeni noma abangu-120 bedili noma bomshado. Indlu isangahlukaniseka ukushintshela izinto eziningi ezifana nezinto ezisekamelweni lomhume.

Esithombeni,Lendawo inhle kakhulu kwimibukiso yobumbano. Ihlala abantu abangu-65 futhi inesilungisomoya.I-Club 7 Arena: I-Club 7 Arena inawo engasetshenziselwa izinto eziningi futhi kulula ukuthi ingasetshenziselwa ikhonsathi lejezi njengoba iyindawo yamadili ezidlo zakusihlwa.Ububanzi bayo buwu-500 - iyisitayela sesinema noma indawo yesidlo sabangu-200.Inayo yonke impahla enomsindo,ukukhanya nesiteji somdlalo weshashalazi.Impahla nemisebenzi.Ukusebenza kwempahla yemihlangano kubalwa emgodleni wedili.Wonke amathuluzi emihlangano yesimanje ayatholakala, ukuwabala ama-Overheads Projectors,iVideo kanye neData Projector yamabonakude onesibani esikhulu one DSTV Satellite TV.




Ukukweleta

I-American Express, i-Diners, namakhadi e-Gold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. I-American Express isivumela kuphela ukwamukela amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500.Mayelana nokukweleta thintana nomphathi wekhasino osemsebenzini noma umphathi wemishini osemsebenzini ngolwazi oluthe xaxa. Amasheke. Amasheke abantu nje kanye namakhadi okukweleta ahambisana nawo agarantiwe isheke azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esingangezinsuku eziwu-7, ehambisana nomazisi wangempela. Amasheke agarantiwe yibhange angamukelwa uma ehamba nomazisi wangempela nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta, yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha ngosuku. Incwadi yemvume yokungena kwelinye izwe kanye nethikithi lendiza langaleso sikhathi kuyadingakala ukushintsha konke kwakwelinye izwe.

Ukudla nokokuzithokozisa
Indawo yokuthengisa ngokudla iMorula. Lendlu ihlotshiswe ngesitayela esinzulu esintshontsha izimpande zase-Afrika - ngemibala emihle nokugcizelela okunzulu bobuntofontofo nokubukeka

Amafasitela ayizithombe abheke edamini kanye nesidlo sokuqala sasebusuku sidliwa kubhekwe ubuhle nobumsulwa bokushona kwelanga. Amatafula okudla okubandayo nokushisayo akunikeza konke  okwethembile ukukuthola noma okulindele ngempela nalokho obungakulindele. Ophayana ababhakwe ngalesosikhathi ukuvula inhliziyo yakho noshizi, izinyama ezibandayo nokudla kwasolwandle. Amatafula okudla kwasemini amabili ayatholakala lapha kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ibha yamasaladi inyama eyosiwe eqotshiwe netafula loswidi kuwukudla kosuku. Ngezimpelasonto ubona ezihlwabusayo zangempela izindishi ziphuma. Ukwengeza kubalwa edumile iMogolian Stir Fry nokukhethiweyo kokumanzisa umlomo. Elifanayo itafula liyatholakala njalo kusihlwa kanye ne-a la carte menu iyatholakala ngelantshi nangedina. Uhla olugcwele lwewayini likunikeza okungcono kwensimu yamagilebhisi aseNingizimu Afrika futhi kuhlale kwenezelwa ikhethelo lamabhodlela aphuma kwisela.

I-Bodiba Bar. Okuhlangene nendawo ethengisa ngokudla iMorula indawo ethengisa ngengxubevange yotshwala iBodiba.Indawo enhle kakhulu ukucima ilanga noma ukuziphuzela nje. Inabantu abaningi futhi indawo epholile kulabo abafuna ukuthatha ikhefu besuka ezinkundleni lapho zisha khona ngemidlalo. I-Bugattis itholakala ngaphandle nje kwekhasino enkulu nezinkundla zemishini. Lendawana inaka izidingo zabadlali abasendleleni kanye nemindeni efuna okulula nje. Yize noma isendaweni lapho kudlalwa khona, imindeni kanye nezingane ingangena idlule umnyango ovulekela ngasepaki, yezimoto. Uhla lokudla ikhombisa izinhlobo zamabhega amnandi,amasemishi nophaya konke ngamanani alingene iphakethe lakho.

Ukuzithokozisa Umnyombo wenjabulo eMorula Sun imidlalo yona uqobo, kodwa ngani lezozinto zihlale zidlalelwa phakathi kwangaphandle endaweni engaphandle enhle yasehotela noma eClub 7 Arena - indlwana encane eyenza okuningi iyodwa esetshenziselwa ukudonsa umculo namadili. Okunye okuhle ongakuthola kulendawo amakhonsathi e-jazz, ama-disco, imidanso kanye nomculo we-cabaret. Okokuzithokozisa kwezingane. I-Morula iyindawo enhle yemidlalo yabadala, kodwa nezingane zinakho okwazo futhi. Inkulisa. Abasebenzi abawaziyo umsebenzi nabanakekelayo enkulisa engaphansi komhume wehotela ebhekela izingane ezisandakuzalwa nesezikhulakhulile. Ivulwa nsuku zonke kusuka ngo-09:00 kuya phakathi kobusuku. Kungenwa mahhala. I-Jungle Gym. Umhlaba omuhle kakhulu weJungle Gym onokujabula, ulutsheku lwakhona khona la.Yonke impahla yeJungle Gym yakhiwe ngamapali eSeligna aqinile nezindophi ezenziwe ngokwemvelo. Izingane zijabulela izinsuku ezinde ezishisayo ukuqeda ukushisa lapho. Okutholakala echiubini lokubhukuda, indingilizi, ichibi elicwebile lezinsuku ezivilaphisayo nezishisayo.

I-Video Arcade. I-Magic Company inemidlalo eminingi yesimanje edumile yezingane eyzinhlobo ze-Video nezinhlobo zemidlaloyokuxhumanisa izingane. Izinhlelo. Ngamaholide ezikole uhlelo lwezingane lokuzithokozisa luqhutshwa umxhumanisi oqeqeshiwe nowaziyo umsebenzi. Ehlobo ichibi lokubhukuda liyisizinda lapho zenzeka khona.Ukuhlala kwezingane Izihlalo zokuhlala izingane kuyalungiselelwa kumamukeli wasehotela. Ezemidlalo nokuziphumulela Izivakashi eMorula Sun zingajabulela lezi ezemidlalo ezilandelayo: Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo eziwu-2,inkundla eyodwa evalekile phezulu yeVlleyball, igalofu,umdlalo wamanziwokudoba, ukushebeleza eqhweni, ukudubula, ukuthutha ngengqukumbanyana, ibhola le-splat liyalungiselelwa - konke kunendlela elula ukuya kuyo ushayela.

Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli nomakumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. Ikhasino 
Ukudlala sekube okunye kwezinto ezihehayo eMorula Sun. Indawo yemishini yokudlala ikhombisa uhla lweSun International lwemiklomelo eqhubekayo ethandwayo, okubalwa;

Ukukweleta


Okusha kokuthutha okuqondile ngomoya phakathi neSun.
I-Sun City nehotela iTable Bay kuxhunyaniswe amabhanoyi iSA Express ahlelwe ngezikhathi. Ihotela iTable Bay nePalace eSun City, amahotela amabili kwaholayo emhlabeni ekugxileni kweSun International, azoxhunyaniswa amabhanoyi aqondayo ahamba ngezikhathi ngezinsuku ezintathu esontweni ekuhlelweni okusha okuzoqalwa iSouth African Express Airways ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 24 ka1998.

Ukusebenza kuzonikeza amabhanoyi aqondayo ahamba ngesikhathi asuka eKapa kuya esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilnesberg, anikeza uhambo lwezindizamshini olulodwa nolubumbene.

"Lokhu kuyintuthuko ephezulu nebalulekile, exhumanisayo njengoba yenza, izindawo ezinhle ezimbili ezinkulu ze-Afrka, zozimbili phakathi kohlu lwamahotela aholayo omhlaba," kwasho uTobin Prior, uDirector weDivisional wezindawo zokuvakasha weSun International. "Amabhanoyi aletha izivakashi ngqo kusuka esangweni kuza e-Afrika kuze enkabeni yayo bese enika izivakashi ithuba lokuba sezindaweni zethu zokuvakasha eziphambili, okuwuhambo nje olungaphezu kwamahora amabili uhamba ngendiza". Kokubili ihotela iTable Bay, eyavulwa ngoJune ngonyaka odlule, nePalace yeLost City anikwa izinga lokuba amahotela aholayo uqala lonyaka, futhi iPalace isamenyezelwa njengendawo yokuvakasha ephambili e-Afrika kulandela ukubalwa okwenziwa iConde Nast Traveller.

Ukusebenza kweSouth African Express Airways kuzosuka eKapa ngoLwesithathu nangoLwesihlanu ngo-11:00 kufike esikhumulweni sezindiza iPilanesberg ngo-13:05, ngazo futhi lezozinsuku isuke ePilanesberg ngo-14;00 ukufika eKapa ngo-16:25. NgamaSonto, indiza izosuka eKapa ngo-11:30,ifike esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilanesberg ngo-13:45 bese elibuyayo lizoba ngo-14:30, lifike eKapa ngo-16:55. Amanani okugibela kulezizindlela azoqala ngomhlaka 25 ku-Oktoba ka 1998 kuya ku-31 ku-Oktoba ka 1999 azoba uR1 050 uhambo olulodwa (kungabalwa iVAT namathekisi asesikhumulweni sezindiza).

Abagibeli  bazondiziswa kwi SA Express enezihlalo eziwu-50 iCoadiar Regional Jet 200 BER (i-Express Jet). Inkampani eyaqala ukwenza umsebenzi ngo-April 1994, inezindizamshini ezintsha nezisezingeni eliphezulu e-Afrika, futhi ethwala abagibeli abawu-60 000 ngenyanga phakathi kwezindawo eziwu-14.
