Ukumemezela abangeneli baka-Miss South Africa 2000
"Ubuhle ngaphansi kwesibhakabhaka sase-Afrika" imemezela uphawu olusha.

Ukufuna uMiss South Afrika 2000 yikho okukhulunywa ngakho ngamafomu okungenela okungubukhangukhangu bobuhle bezwe, umqhudelwano wokugcina ozobanjelwa eSun City Superbowl ngomhlaka-9 December. Ukufuna ukukhomba abangenele kuqala kulenyanga. Okunye koshintsho okubalulekile kobukhangukhangu kulonyaka isiqubulo esisha nesisho esithi,"Beauty Under African Skies", okubonakala efomini yokungenela atholakala kwaSpar nasezazisweni zakwaKwikspar, ezinkampanini zePR, isemahhovisi e-ETV, ihhovisi elikhulu lika-Miss South Africa. Usuku lokuvala  ukungenela umhlaka-8 September. Kuzobe kukhona uhlelo olusha lokuya konobuhle nendlela izimo ezizobe zihlelwe ngayo esiteji zizobe zizintsha eSuperbowl. Ukufuna uMiss SA obalulekile ongenele kuzokwenzeka kulo lonke izwe ngalenyanga kanti nalo lonke ulwazi oludingekayo luzonikezwa kubaxhumanisi ngalesi sikhathi. Uhlu lokwahlulela kokuqala kuzobe kusezithombeni ezilethwe kanye namafomu okungenela bese lokhu kulandelwa ukubonana kuxoxwe nabangeneli abafaneleyo, okungenzeka babe ngaphezu kuka-40 ngedolobha.

Amafomu okungenela kulonyaka anohlu lwemibuzo ngabangeneli, okubalwa izinhloso zakhe, imfundo ephakeme asake wakuwina, ezokumodela kanye nakwenzayo, kuhambisana nolwazi nje olojwayelekile lwezokubala neminyaka yobudala. Uma ukubonana sekuphelile kuzomenyezelwa abangu-24 abaphumele okokuqala, emva kwalokho umphakathi uzokwazi ukuvotela labo abathandayo emasontweni amabili. Abawu-8 abangeneli bazokhishwa ngaleyondlela bese kusala abawu-16 abazongenela okokugcina. Bazobe sebengena kunoBuhle ngomhlaka-8 December. Abesifazane abahlulelayo babheka njengabagqoki ababalulekile bomqhele kaMiss SA ukuthi basesimweni yini, ubuholi nezinto abazithandayo, ukuxhumana nolwazi nje oluhle oludingekayo lwaseSouth Africa nolusha lwezindaba zomhlaba. Ozowina kunobuhle uzongenela obunye ubukhangukhangu uMiss World no Miss Univers.

Ngolwazi olubalulekile sicela ushayele kulayini wolwazi waka Miss SA: 083 910 7876 noma u-email: misssa@sunint.co.za Uma ufuna ukubuza mayelana nezindaba xhumana noLara Ross ku- 011 780 7684 noma e-mail : 1ross@sunint.co.za




I-ACSA ithatha iPilanesberg International Airport



Inkampani yezikhumulo zezindiza iSouth Africa (ACSA) isingenele esivumelwaneni seminyaka ewu-25 nohulumeni wasesifundazweni eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ukuthi ithathe iPilanesberg International Airport (PIA) esizoqala ukusebenza kusuka ngoLwesine, mhlaka 1 April 1999.



Isivumelwano - esibe imiphumela yezingxoxo eziphumelele ngezindlela ezintathu zokuxoxisana phakathi kwabaphathi besikhumulo, uhulumeni wesifunda kanye nomkhakha wangaphandle ulayini onendlela yokusebenza yeACSA ukweseka ohulumeni bezifunda kanye nabaphathi besikhumulo.

Kusho uDick Ackerman, umqondisi omkhulu weACSA, "Sikholelwe ukuthi iPilanesberg inokubaluleka okukhulu njengomxhumanisi ukwenyusa izinga lezokuvakasha eReplublic yaseNingizimu Afrika."

"IPilalensberg izoba ngaphansi kwendlela yokuphatha yeJohannesburg International Airport futhi izosivulela ithuba lokuqamba imisuka yendlela enhle yokuthi izikhumulo zezokuvakasha zizophathwa kanjani," kusho uRoy Mackey, umphathi weJohannesburg International Airport (JIA).

"Sizokwazisa izindlela nobuciko bokusebenza nokuphatha okuzoqinisekisa ukuthi akukho ukudlala ngomsebenzi. Ukuphumelelisa lokhu sicabanga ukweseka abasebenzi basePilannesberg izikhathi zonke ukwazisa izindlela ezintsha nokuthi baqeqeshwe."

Abasebenzi abaveli bekhona ePIA, bazothola ithuba lokusebenzela iACSA, lokho okubanika ithuba lokuqeqesheka okwengeziwe kanye namathuba entuthuko yomkhakha wezokusebenza kulaba basebenzi.

"Isandulelo sethu sokuqala ukwenza intuthuko kwingqalasizinda edingekayo ezoheha ezomoya inyuse izinga lezokuvakasha ezindaweni ezakhele. Ukutshalwa kwemali engango-R20 million kuzokwenziwa kulentuthuko  okubalwa kowo nokulungiswa komgwaqo, indawo yamathekisi, nezindawo zokupaka izindiza ukuze izindiza ezinkulu nezithwele abantu abaningi zikwazi ukupaka, ezifana ne-MD80's DC9's ne Boeing 737's," kusho uMackey.

Izingxoxo ngezinkontileka ezifanayo nezinye izikhumulo zezindiza e-Afrika yonkana, kakhulukazi emazweni emiphakathi ethuthukayo aseNingizimu ne-Afrika zilindeleke ukuthi ziphothulwe maduzane.

Isivumelwano sithanda ukuba sibe nomthelelana wezokuvakasha endaweni, njengoba izindiza eziningana ezisuka ekapa, eThekwini, nasePort Elizabeth ziya ePilannesberg zizoba nabagibeli abavakashayo abaningana.

Izindiza ezixhumayo e-Kruger National Park zizoba khona, ezizobe zixhumanisa kakhulukazi izindawo zokuvakasha zaseNingizimu Afrika.

Ukwengeza,ukushintsha kwebukekayo iVictoria Falls eZimbabwe kuzokwenzeka uma nje I-ACSA isiphumelele ukubuyisa ukugqama kwe-Pilannesberg emazweni ngamazwe.

Isifundazwe saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, iSun International neACSA sebevumelene ukusebenza ndawonye ngepulani enobunyoninco ekuhwebeni, ezonyusa ezokuvakasha esifundazweni.

"Sesithole ukuxhaswa okukhulu kakhulu emkhakheni wezamabhizinisi, uhulumeni kanye namakhosi akhele indawo esifundazweni ngesivumelwano sepia ngalokho-ke sikholelwa ekutheni kuzoba umsebenzi wenhlanganisela ozoba nempumelelo ozokwenza futhi wonke umuntu azuze kubo bonke abahlanganyele." Kusho u-Ackerman.

Ngonyaka odlule isikhumulo sikwaze ukuqukatha abagibeli abangu-44 000 futhi iCASA iceba ukunyusa lelinani ngangaphezu kwamaphesenti awu-35 ngonyaka.

I-ACSA ithembisa iSun International esimeme i-PIA  ngayo leyomigudu enakekelayo nenokuwazisa umsebenza eseyilethe amathuba ezokuvakasha, ukuthi ibuyekeze futhi iphumelele kumakhasino nezindawo zokuvakasha ezingomakhelwane neSun City kanye nePalace yeLost City eSun City.

NGOLWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS E-SUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO: (011) 780 7684 NOMA I-FAX: (011) 780 7535.




I-Pilanesberg African Wild Dogs eDarung Debut Hunt
I-Zebra, iBuffalo, zitholele okuningi ngaphezu kokuqhathanisa kokukhona

Zingaphandle laphaya zingcwele ukuzimisela. Into yokuqala  esanda kuba khona ePilanesberg ekudonsela ukudla kwakusihlwa amva kokukhululeka kuma-hectare awu-55 000 e-National Park ezungeze iSun City, umhlambi wama-zebra, ngokungesabi, badlulele phambili ukuthola ibaffalo. Ngempumelelo ekugcineni bathatha idlela ye-impala.


Ngokucophelela ilandelwa iField Ecologist Gus Van Dyk yesifunda saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, kuzo lezozindlela izilwane ezesabekayo kakhulu sezingenisiwe epaki, ipaki iyindawo engangama-hectare awu-1,5 lapho ihlanganiselwe khona. Amasonto ngaphambi kokuthi izinja zidedelwe, izinja ezintathu zesilisa ezindala, ezazalelwa ekuthunjweni, sezifakiwe otshanini obendlalelwe izilwane zemidlwane ezinezinyanga eziwu-8 ubudala, onina bayo, kanye neyesifazane endala enkulu.

Ukungeniswa kwalezinja ezintathu zesilisa kuleliqoqo kwaba ukucacamela okukhulu komsebenzi wokuqala, njengoba inja yokuqala yesilisa idingakala ukusebenza okukahle kwepaki, nokuvimbela imidlwane ukuthi iye konina. Ezesilisa ezindala, ezihlala e-Outdshoorn, ngokushesha zangena phakathi, manje ezesifazane zombili sezimithi, kusho uMnumnzana van Dyk. Impi yokubanga ubukhulu isaliwa namanje phakathi kwalezi ezintathu zesilisa, kusho yena.

Lomklamo wokuxhasa kweSun International ka-R150 000 ungowamanje ezinhlelweni eziphumelelayo ezifakelwe ukungenisa izinhlelo zempilo yezilwane, okubalwa kuzo ibhubesi kanye nengulube. Izinja kanye nobhejane omusha ezifakiwe esigabeni esedlule yizo izilwane eziyingozi ezilwaneni ezingatholakala epaki.

UGus waloba phansi izinsuku eziwu-10 zokuqala ezilandla ukukhululwa kwezinja endaweni yezilwane, kanti umbiko ufundeka njengombhalo wefilimu wempilo yezilwane eNational Geographic. Zakhululeka, kwase kwaqala ngokushesha ukuhlola izindawo ezizungezile, ngokuqaphela kwashanelwa i-arc engamamitha awu-500.Zase zithamela ilanga lokukhululeka kwazo okusha, zihlangana nabavakashi abambalwa epaki, zigibela izintaba. Ubusuku bazo bokuqala zabuchitha osebeni lomfula ongangamakhilomitha amabili ukusuka esizindeni sazo.

Ngosuku olulandelayo zakhwela izintaba, emva kwamahora awu-80 enkululeko yazo, zaphiwa intiwane umphathi wendawo. Sezinomfutho, zakhuphukela esicongweni sePilanesberg, zase zibukela ukuzama ukubulala kwazo kokuqala. Njengoba izebra ingeyona inyama yezinja zasendle, ukuzama ukuthola eyodwa akuphumelelanga. Emva kokuhamba ngamandla endaweni evulekile, ukuxhumana kwalahleka nezinja amahora angu-36, njengoba nemisakazo yase imemezela ukuthi izilwane ezintathu azisatholakali.


Ngesikhathi seziqhamuka futhi emakhilomitheni angu-10 enyakatho yendawo yazo emgwaqeni iBakgatla, zaphiwa ukudla futhi, ezinsukwini eziyisithupha emva kokukhululwa kwazo, nguGus nethimba lakhe.

Ukunye okubalulekile ngezinja ukuthi zihlale ngaphakathi emingceleni yepaki, ukuthi ukuhlangana kwazo kokuqala kulofenisi obiyele kagesi kwakuwukukhululeka, njengoba zazingeke zilinge ukuphuma ngawo. Izingxoxo zokuqala phakathi kwabaphathi bepaki kanye namakhosi ezindawo zabangela ukuthi amakhosi azonswinya abafiki abasha bese bazisa amaphathi ngokulimala kwempahla noma ukweduka.

Ukugcwala ukushisekeleka, izinja zazama ukubamba ibaffalo, lokho kwadala ukuthi uvalo emhlambini owaweluswe ukuphipha ukuthukuthela bokubhodla njengoba izinja zazizincinza emadolweni, kodwa kwakungekho okufana nokubulala.

Kwaba I-impala encane yesilisa eyagcina isithole ukuthi ibulawe kokuqala epaki, futhi zabonakala ziyidla ngokuphanga. Iyodwa inja eyabonakala ilimele kulokhukuzingela, kodwa yatholakala iba ngcono.

" Ukugoqa, umhlambi uza kahle, " kusho uGus. " Umama uqala konke okwenzekayo, bese edlendletheka amamitha angamakulu ambwalwa kusuka emhlanjini, kanti eyesifazane yokuqala, "u-Antie", uhlala exabana njalo. Zozimbili zibonakala zimithi kanti izinkomba zalokhu zizoqhamuka ngokushesha.

"Ukuthuthuka kokuzingela zezinye izindlela zokuphila zibonakala ziqhubeka kahle. Njengoba umhlambi uthola ulwazi lwezilwane kanye nezindawo zamanzi, impumelelo yokuzingela kwazo kufanele ithuthuke ngokushesha. Kuze kube yilesosikhathi, umhlambi uzoqhubeka ukuthola ukudla amaqabuqabu kubekiwe ukuzigcina zinamandla futhi zinomfutho. Amabhubesi akakakhombisi ukuba yinkinga ezinjeni okwamanje, kanti ukuhlangana phakathi kwezinja namabhubesi akukaze kubikwe.

" Kuyabonakala ukuthi Umama Wemvelo nokungaphakathi kuzona kuyaqinisekisa ukuthi izinja ziphila usuku nosuku empini ukuzihlelela zona ekhaya lazo elisha. Zidinga isikhathi nendawo. Ngethemba umhlambi uzokuthola kokubili ePilanesberg."

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NORALA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Entsha iSun City Extravaganza Resonates Kumgqumo wokushaya okunjengokwenhliziyo kwe-Africa

Umgqumo! Umshini onezingilazi oveza imibalabala wezinto zasePan African   Umgqumo we Afrika unikeza impilo kwentsha iSun City Extravaganza. Ebizwa ngoMgqumo! Iveza izinto ezintsha, ezidlula endleleni enempumelelo yokudlule, bese ihlanganisa lokhu nalokhu umqambi akubiza kokuthi "ububenyebenye bezinto zasePan Africa."

Manje izilungiselele ukugqanyiswa ezindabeni ngomhlaka-19 ku-January ku-2000 kanti ngokubonakala kokuqala ku-November, Umgqumo! Ungumhumuzo wokuqala eSun City ukukhiqizwa endlini isiyonke. Ecatshangwe umqondisi womnyango weTheatre wezokujabula weSun City, onesiphiwo uNico Brits kwase futhi kwaqanjwa futhi kwahlukaniswa iqembu le-Artistic lika-Ivor Jones, uNico Brits kanye noKaren Cutts, ukukhonjiswa komkhiqizo kugqugquzelwe amasiko ase-Afrika yonkana, osentshezwe abantu abangu-6, emunye eletha ubungcweti nobunyoninco emkhiqizweni. Kungokokuqala emlandweni, umbukiso uzokhonjiswa ngaphandle kokungenela nokubamba iqhaza kwabantu bangaphandle, ukusebenza kwayo okumangalisayo okwenziwe ulwazi leqembu lezokuzithokozisa.

Izihlelo zilungiswe nguPieter du Toit, yahlotshiswa nguNico Brits, ukukhanya nguKaren Cutts, kanye nokuqondisa nguIvor Jones. Umculo waqanjwa futhi walungiswa nguMarc Mitchel kanye noAlssandro Batazzi. Kusukela ekuvezweni kombala endaweni evulekile, ekuqhakazeni kokugcina kobuhle be-"Foot Tappin", izibukeli zizothatheka yilobukhazikhazi benjabulo egcwele ukwehlukana kwe-Afrika. Ukugqugquma komgqumo kuzothatha izibukeli kuzibeke ezweni elingekho kude kunokulona ngempela. Ilungiselwe ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule, iqembu labangu-26 lizobe linamantombazana akhonjiswayo athakathayo kanye nomculi oholayo, uStella Magabe. Bazojabulisa izibukeli ngezinto ezehlukene kusuka ekugqugqumeni kwamadilamu abukekayo, e-eeirie Legends yomlilo ekhombisa umndondoshiya wesithwabathwaba nomlilo wangampela, kwayengayo amaphupho kaSharan.

Ukukhonjiswa kwemibukiso egqugquzelayo yomgqumo emasikweni ahlukene amahle, kuhlanganisa umdanso wamaNdiya kanye nomculo onomdanso womdabu wase-Afrika kanye nomculo, kubonakala endaweni enhle efulathelene nempophoma. Izibukeli zizobe sezisekugcineni kwezihlalo zazo ngesikhathi umbukiso usufika kwi-'Foot Tappin' Fun Finale. Umgqumo! wenzelwe okumuntu ngayedwana ngabasebenzi abangakusebenzisa ukukhombisa imicimbi  yokunikezela imivuzo yokuphumelela kanye nemicimbi eyizipesheli. Umbukiso uhlelwe ngalendlela yokuthi izinto ezahlukene zingakhonjiswa ngokwahlukana kwazo ukushiya indawo yokwenziwayo kanye neyezikhulumi. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 KANYE NE-FAX KU: (011) 780 7535.

I-Sun City igubha ukudla enyangeni yesithupha eF&B Festival



Kusukela ekudleni komphefumulo kuya kokwasolwandle endaweni evulekile okuvakashelwa kuyo.

I-Sun City igubha ukudla izinyanga eziyisithupha kulonyaka enyangeni ngayinye kuze kube u-December, ingqikithi eyehlukene izokhonjiswa endaweni yokuvakasha ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla eziphakeme.


Izinto ezizobe zikhona kubalwa kuzo ukwehlukana kokukhonjiswa kokudla komphefumulo ngoSeptenber, kanye ne-Oysters ukuvala isenzeko, ukuhlanganisa nedumile iKnysna Oyste Festival.

"Umshikashika wonke wezinyanga eziwu-6 eF&B uqondise ukukhombisa amakhishi ethu kubavakashi kanye nokungezelela ulwazi lwabo ngeSun City, ngaso lesosikhathi bekhombisa amakhono abapheki," kusho uJohn Airey, umqondisi wendawo eF&B.

Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezizobe zihlanganyele lomkhankaso kubalwa iVilla Del Palzzo neCrystal Court esePalace yeLost City, iPeninsula esehotel iCascades, iHarlequin esehotela iSun  City, kanye neMarula eseCabanas.

Ngo-August, indawo yokuvakasha izobe igubha ubungcono obudlulele benyama yenkomo koxhunyaniswa kokukhonjiswa yiJakie Daniels - ezobe ikhombisa iBourboun marinades kanye neFlambe Creations, ngabapheki nendawo ngayinye bekhombisa ubunyoninco babo.

U-September usilethela okuhle kakhulu okungejwayelekile eVilla del Palazzo, lapho abathaki ababili bamawayi ase-Itali bezobe benjengo "sommeliers" endaweni yokudla, bekhombisa amawayini angcono kakhulu ase-Itali ekujabuleni kwezivakashi. "Futhi enyangeni sizokhombisa ngokwethu imibukiso yengqephu ikhombisa umsebenzi wabathungi base-Itali izinto zabo ezitholakalayo eNingizimu Afrika, kanye nohla olumangalisayo lobucwebecwebe olusuka eTuscany" kusho uJohn. 


Kanye kanye nalokhu, iVilla nayo izokhombisa iSoiree Culinaires' ngemiculo eyehlukene okubalwa kuyo,"A Night at the Movies", "An Evening with Andrew Lloyd Webber" kanye nobusuku "From Beethoven to the Beatles", konke kukhombisa,kukhombise ngokulandelana abaculi abahamba ngabane abazobe besinikeza umculo wokudansa odonsa ingqikithi.

Mhlawumbe okuzobe kubukeka kakhulu kulezizinto kulomgubho kuzobe kungamatafula abapheki - "Ubusuku ngaphansi kwezinkanyezi"okungukuthi abavakashi bazobe behlezi ematafuleni azobe entanta osebeni olungaphambi kwendawo yokudla iCrystal Court ePalace yeLost City. Ukudla kwakusihlwa, okuzobe kwethanyelwe izintatheli eziphezulu kanye nabacwaningi, kuzokhombisa uKhisimusi ozobe usevwa kuyo yonke indawo yokuvakasha futhi uzobe uhambisana nomculo esiwunikezwa abaculi abacula ngabane.

"Ukusuka kwalomcimbi kuzoba indlela okuzobe kusevwa ngayo," kusho uJohn. Kwisigaba ngesigaba, sizokhombisa ezivakashini ibhokisi leJapanese Bento kulona okuzobe kukhona isampula esincane nje ukukhombisa okusaswidi kukaKhisimusi okuzobe kusevwa ezindaweni zokudla eziphambili zendawo yokuvakasha. Lokhu kuzobe kubalwa kukho nokudlana okulula okumnandi kakhulu. Ngalendlela, abathandi bokudla bazokwazi ukuthola umqondo wokudla kukonke uma bezikhethela endaweni yokuvakasha ngalesisikhathi sokujabula samaholide."

U-September uletha ukudla komphefumulo eSun City,kanti futhi nezindawo zokudla zizobe ziseva "Kusuka ekhaya kuya eKhaya" izindishi ezinokudla okuhlukahlukene kwamakhishi. Izindishi zizobe zineSeared Tuna edliwa newasabi Mashed Potato - "okuhle komphefumulo njengoba kukuhle nasemzimbeni, futhi," kusho uJohn.

Kodwa ngo-October yonke imicabango yokuzibamba ekudleni kufanele ibekwe eceleni njengoba indawo yokuvakasha yonke izobe igubha i-"Disirable Dessert" kuzo zonke izindawo zokudla eziphambili. Mhlawumbe okumbi kunako konke kuzobe kuyisinkwa esinebhotela wePudding Palette, ukukhombisa lezizindlela eziyisimangaliso zezinhlobo zokudla. 


U-November uletha uCrayfish Creations,okungukuthi izivakashi zingasuka kulendawo ziye kwenye kulenyanga, kukhonjiswa izindlela ezicokeme ezisetshenziswa abapheki abahlukene ukulungiselela lokukudla kwasolwandle.

Bese kuthi ngoDecember, njengoba ukuduma kwezulu kuqoqanela ePilanseberg,kuzobe kungamaRaining Prawns eSun City kulabo abanokunambitha lokudla kwasolwandle, kuzobe kusevwa ngamabhakede agcwele kanti futhi izivakashi ziyamenywa ukuthi zidle ngangendlela ezingathanda ngayo.

"Siyakujabulele ukukhombisa okuhle kakhulu esinakho ukukunikeza kanti ezinyangeni ezimbalwa,izivakashi zizobe ziphethwe abapheki abaqeqeshiwe," kusho uJohn Airey.

Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa sicela uthintane noLara Ross kulenombolo yocingo: 011 780 7684 noma kwi-email lross@sunint.co.za




I-Bumber Spring Break
Izindawo zokuzilolonga zaseNingizimu Afrika, i-Ocean Warriors, ikhombisa ngoSeptember 22 isenzeko esikhulu samakhalenda ezinkulungwaneni zabenzi bamaholide baseNingizimu Afrika, ngesikhathi sebeqoqa sebengcwele eSun City's Valley of Waves ngesiSpring Break - izinsuku eziyishumi ukunama okungakholakali, kusukela emncintiswanweni omkhulu omuhle ngokumangalisayo wabakhi bemizimba baseNingizimu Afrika.

" Minyaka yonke kuso lesisikhathi, sikhombisa umgubho omangalisayo wokujabula nokuzithokozisa eValley kanti futhi yonke iminyaka siyaphumelela ukunikeza okuthile okuhambisana nanoma ikuphi ukunambitha - okwezingane,okungakaze kubonwe," kusho uDean Pitt, umphathi weValley. "I-Springbok into elindelwe yiwo wonke umuntu. Abantu abaningi basenza isenzeko sabo samaholide esigqamile esifishane. Ezinsukwini eziyishumi silinde izivakashi ezisenanini lika 40 000 abajabulela indawo evulekile nezinhlobonhlobo zemiqhudelwano nemibukiso."

Into ezenzekayo zisukela emidlalweni yasesiteji ekhonjiswa usuku lonke, enokubukeka okunzulu, ebusukwini obuhle bokubhukuda nasemcimbini wasebhishi omkhulu. Iningi lemiqhudelwano ihleliwe ngosizo lwabaxhasi, kanti lokhu kubalwa kukho ukuhlolwa kwamakhono kweSAB Golf Chip ngabaqhudelani abasebenzisa izinto zabo zokudlala igalofu ukufaka amabhola ezimbobeni ezincane ukuwina imiklomelo emikhulu. Umxhasi omkhulu kulonyaka uRed Bull, ozokhombisa izenzeko ezitisithupha, okubalwa kuzo umbukiso wokudlala esiteji kanye nokuzilolonga komzimba. Imidlalo yasolwandle izobe ikhonjiswa ebhishi ukuthi iyinto enjani ngongcweti bayo baseNingizimu Afrika bawolomdlalo abadumile kanye neStreet Skate naso sizobe sikhonjiswa. I-Red Bull izokwenza umcimbi omkhulu wasolwandle, ongomunye wokukhombisa okusekhalendeni iSpringbreak.

I-Vodacom's Ocean Warriors izovusa amadlingozi ezihlwele ngamakhono ukudlala olwandle kanye nabanqobi bezinhlobo ezahlukene bazobe bekhulula izinyama zabo kwi-South African Body Building Expo. Umqhudelwano wezimfundamakhwela, lapho abavakashi bengakhombisa khona amakhono abo ukuwina imiklomelo, usemakhadini abo futhi, njengakuMiss Bikini Pageant wamantombazana akho konke okudingayo.  Abaphathi beSun City bakwazile futhi ukuthi banikeze indawo yokubonakala kweqembu labadansi abadumile, iPylse of Africa, eseyidlale ukuheha ababukeli cishe ezweni lonke. I-Dairymaid ixhase umbukiso wasesiteji ngemidlalo yabo yansuku zonke ehlukene. Akukho ngisho umzuzu wokuchithwa eValley ngaleSpringbreak. Izivakashi zizobe zijatshuliswa futhi zivinjezelwe izinto ezifana neHooch Volley Ball Tournament, iYou/Huisgenooit Weekend Stage Events, iStrongman kanye neLifeguard Demonstrations, iTug o' War Treasure Hunt, iKamp Kwena Entertainment kanye nezokuzilolonga kanye nokusha kulonyaka okubukeka ngendlela emangalisayo. Njenesaziso semigubho, i-5fm izobe isakaza bukhoma eValley nesikhathi seSpringbreak.

I-Valley of Waves indawo eyisizinda seLost City. Lomhlaba wase-Afrika wamaphupho uhehela abavakashi emoyeni wokwakudala kanye nempucuko engakaze ibonwe. Kulesisizinda, iValley of Waves,  kwasemandulo iwumsuka we "The Valley of the Sun" iyiWater Park enkulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni yezokujabula - umbuso wenjabulo wabafuni bamadlingozi. Kukhona okuthile kwawo wonke umuntu eValley of the Waves - ukuzizwa uthola amandla amasha endaweni enokugqugquzela.  Amathikithi ayatholakala endaweni ewathengisayo noma eValley of the Waves.  Abadala uR40 abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-13 Izingane nabahola impesheni uR25 Izikhathi u-10h00 kuya ku-17h30 nsukuzonke. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa sicela uthintane noLara Ross kulenombolo yocingo: 011 780 7684 nom kwi-email lross@sunint.co.za



I-Botanical Walking Tours Inaugurated eSun City
Izingadi eLost City manje zinokubukeka kweBotanic Garden  Ukuzihambela nje ezingadini ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo futhi ezitshalwe kahle ezinkulu zaseSun City sezivuliwe kulandele ukukhishwa kwenhle I-map ekhombisayo, ekhombisa izindawo ezinhlanu ezinkulu ongazithanda, kanye nokukhonjiswa kwezihlahla, ezinezinombolo namagama.

Ngesikhathi iLost City isungulwa ngo- 1989, omunye wemiklamo emikhulu kwaba ukusungulwa kwendawo yezihlahla ukutshala izihlahla ezingama-hectare angamakhulu ububanzi endaweni yayo. Ngo-1992 ngesikhathi iLost City ivulwa, izitshalo ezingaphezu kuka-23 700 zahlanyelwa kwathi eziwu-244 000 zagodlwa. Namhlanje ingadi inezitshalo ezibalelwa ku-3 000 ezehlukene ngezinhlobo, kanye nokuqoqwa okunobuchwepheshe kwama-palms awu-400 ahlukene. Ohlelweni lokutshala okwaqala ngo-1991, izihlahla ezingaphezulu kuka-22 esezivuthiwe nesezikhule ngokwanele zatshalwa. Ingadi ihlukaniswe amahlathi awu-22 ahlukene, okungukuthi kuwona awu-80% awokuzimilela bese kuthi amanye atshalwa. U-Gordon Kershaw, umphathi omkhulu kwezokuphathwa kwezingadi, ukuzimisela kwenkampani ngomklamo weminyaka ewu-7 usuphumelelise ukuvela kwalezizingadi ezigqugquzelayo, usho nokuthi uhambo lwaba imiphumela yamaqembu ezezingadi ngokukhethwa kwezihlahla zaseLost City.Zonke izihlahla manje zinezinombolo zazo  kanye namagama azo ngokwebotanic. Ukukhonjiswa kwezihlahla kuzokwenziwa kube khona kubavakashi ukuze bakwazi ukuthola imvelo ehlukene. Ukugqama kweBotanic Garden kwenza ukukhonjiswa nokuthola umlando nemvelaphi yazo zonke izitshalo.

Abavakashi baseLost City Botanical Gardens bazokwazi ukubukela izinhlobonhlobo zamakhulukhulu ezinyoni kanye nokunye okudonswe izitshalo kanye nezinhlelo zokudla okutholakala ezingadini. Ukuhamba okuwu-5, okuningi kwako kuyisikhathi esiyimizuzu ewu-90: yiBaobab Tour, ethatha abavakashi ibayise kwenhle nebukekayo ikhozi kusuka eLost City Golf Course Club House, udlula  ezindaweni ezomile zemvelo zezitshalo kuya eBaoba Forest enezihlahla eziwu-300 esezikhulile. Lelihlathi litshalwe ngezihlahla ezisuka eVenda, esikhulu esingangama-tons awu-40 futhi singangeminyaka ewu-300 ubudala. I-Beach Tour, yabaneminyaka noma emingaki noma ubukhulu, eqala eMonkey Spring Plazza, idlule eCrocodile Valley, ishone phansi eRoyal Staircase, iValley of Waves, kanye nemumva. Abavakashi bazobona izitshalo ezisosebeni emasebeni ahlukene endawo, okubalwa kuwo neWild Coast. Uhambo lukuthatha eGong yeSun Lion kanye neCrocodile Valley Forest, etshalwe izihlahla ezinkulu ukudonsa amajuba aluhlaza.

I-Spider Web Trail, enezehlakalo ezithile, izothatha indlela kusuka eMonkey Spring Plazza idlule eSlide Hill, ukuya eSpider Web Bridge kudlule eHippo Gorge nasebhishi. Indlela ihamba kwezinhle izitshalo zemvelo ezihehayo, iTropical rain Forest kanye neJacarandas. I-Flamingo nenkukhu yamanzi kweyezinye zezilwane ezibonwa kulendlela. ILost City Crock Pit Tour iqala eBaobabs, idlule ehlathini i-Euphorbia, idlule eLost City Golf Course. Izinto ozibona endleleni izitshalo ezomile ezimelwe i-Euphorbia kanye nezinhlobo ze-Aloe, endleleni uma udlula indawo yezingwenya. I-Cascade Gardens ukuya eWater World Tour ithatha ukushisekeleka phezu kwebholoho elizwinga lisuka eWelcome Garden Centre, ukuya eCascade Pool Deck. Bazobona ihlathi elivuthiwe loqalo, imikhiwane, iShefflera kanye nezinhlobo zeChorisa. Ekugcineni kwehlathi, izivakashi zizodonselwa ngeCascades Aviary, zidlala iGary Player Country Club neWaterworld kuya emumva eSun City Hotel pool deck.

Izinhloso zalokhu kuhamba ukuthi abavakashi bazokwazi bephelezelwa noma bezihambela, begadwe I-map bese bezisungulela olwabo uhambo. " Ukutshalwa eSun City kuwukubaluleka kwezesayensi kanti inhloso yethu ukuthu siyenze ibe edumile neyaziwayo njengenkulu iBotanical Gardens eNingizimu yonkana nje," kucacisa uKurt Peter, umqondisi wezemisebenzi, eSun City Resirt. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NORALA ROSS KULENOMBOLO YASESUN INTERNATIONAL U: (011) 780 7684.


Hamba kokuluhlaza eSun City
I-Sun International kusemqondweni wayo ngokugcwele emsebenzini wayo ekuvikeleni imvelo kanye nokusebenzisa imvelo ndlela.
Amanzi yiwo mhlawumbe ayinto ebalulekile ezweni lase-Afrika neLost City eSun City yenzelwe ukuthi iconsi neconsi lamanzilenze umsebenzi umude. Ngesikhathi uGary Player ecelwa ukuzisayina iLost City Golf Course entsha wacelwa ukuqamba ikhozi ezoba engonyile yamanzi. Umphumela ikhozi eyisitayela sogwadule ngokomnotho. UGary neqembu lakhe bayaziqhenya eqinisweni lokuthi ama-hectare awu-30 kwangu-55 ekhozi ayachelewa amapayipi, kanye nezihlahla, umgwaqo omkhulu kanye nobuluhlaza kuluhlaza konke. Imihosha, imichachazo kanye nezimpophoma zekhozi zisebenzisa amanzi asebenzile asuka ekulungisweni kwezitshalo eSun City. " Asinawo amanzi esizowamosa," kusho uGary, "ngokunjalo ikhozi kufanele ibe nomnotho, njengokwezitshalo."

I-Sun City isiyonke isebenzisa amanzi angangama-cubic meters awu-9 000 ngosuku kulingene ukufakela izidingo zedolobha elincane. Amanzi adonswa edamini iVaalkop okuyingxenye yokusebenza kwedamu iHartebeestpoort. I-Sun City inikezwe amanzi angangama-cubic meters awu-12 000 ukuwasebenzisa ngosuku, okwamanje, indawo isasebenza ngaphansi kwamanzi ayo.

Unjiniyela othintwayo uPhilip Pybus weStewart, Scott Ltd, iyona ndoda eqondene nokusetshenziswa kwamanzi yiSun City nokukhucululwa kukadoti. Usimisele ngempela ukusebenzisa izikalo ezinikezwe iSun International endaweni yokuvakasha. " Ukugobhoza kwendawo yokuvakasha kusetshenzwa ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu ehlanzekile kanye nokubuye isetshenziswe ekhozini yegalofu.

"Amanzi ahlanzekile asetshenziselwa izidingo zeLost City Jungle. Uma kukhona labo abathi lamanzi angasetshenziswa kangcono kwenye indawo, impendulo yami ingaba ethi uma inani lalamanzi elifanayo lalisetshenziswa ifemu, akekho owayephakamisa iso. Futhi, iLost City inikeza imivuzo yomnotho engebalwe kubantu basendaweni, ngaphezu kokuba amafemu amaningi ayengenza." Njengengxenye yomgomo kahulumeni wesekhaya, imizi eminingi esondelene neSun City inikezwa izidingo ezingcono zamanzi, kanti futhi abaphathi bendawo bahlale befuna izindlela zokonga amanzi nokuxhasa imiphakathi eyakhele.

Lapho kunesidingo iSun City iyaxhasa kwezokubuyiselwa komkhiqizo. Inyanga ngayinye imithwalo egcwele yamagilasi, amathini, ama-plastic kanye namaphepha kuyabuyiselwa emumva, ngesikhathi izindimbane zamahenga epulasitiki ebuyiselwa kubawashi nasemalondolo ukusetshenziswa futhi. Esikhathini esifushane esedlule izinto zeziqandisi zibuyiselwa ngegesi engenabuthi. Indawo isizinikele emklameni wokubuyisela ngokugcwele lapho wonke amathini namabhodlela asuka ezindaweni zokuphuza emahotela ziyahlungwa bese zidayiselwa izinkampani zokubuyisela. Ukwengeza kulokhu, Izibi zasemakhishini kanye nodoti nje zisetshenziselwa ukufundisa izingadi zemifino zasePalace. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO U; (011) 780 7684


Izindlu zaseSun City  Hamba ngendlela nge Guestlink Global
Umabonakude wokuxhumanisa onikeza ukuxhuma usendlini nge-cumputer, ukuxhumana kwezivakashi iSun City isibe ngumholi embonini yezokunakekela eNingizimu Afrika ngokuveza kwayo kokuqala ukufakelwa kweGuestlink Global, umabonakude wokuxhumanisa osetshenziswa izivakashi ezindlini zazo.

Lendlela inikeza izivakashi ukungena kwi-internet, I-email, indlela yokuthola izikweletu zazo, ukubuka ivideo kanye, okokuqala, nokusetha ucingo olungenakuduka oludlula kwiGuestlink TV. Akufani nezindlela zakuqala lapho i-internet yayingasetshenziswa ngabasebenzisi abambalwa ngesikhathi esisodwa, iGuestlink Global Interactive Television inikeza inombolo engagcini yabavakashi ukungena entweni eyodwa. Imilayezo itholakal ngokwethembeka, icacile futhi ngokushesha, kanti futhi lendlela iyayigcina imilayezo yezivakashi eziyithola  ngesikhathi zihlezi. Lendlela yeGuestlink Global Interactive Television inikezwa abakwa-TTS Telcall Television Systems, umnikezi ezifundeni eziseNingizimu Afrika. U-Riku Karlsson, usekela Mongameli we-Operations yeGuestlink eFinland, wathi iTTS yakhonjwa njengomnikezeli wesifunda ngoba enedlela yakhe ende ukuzikhethela akuthandayo embonini yokunakekela umhlaba wonke. "I-TTS ihlanganyele nathi esikweni lethu bese ithatha inikeza izinga eliphezulu lomsebenzi ofundelwe odingwa yilemboni," kusho yena.

Umqondisi wezemisebenzi weSun City uSteven Bagg wathi ukufakelwa kwalendlela ezindlini zasePalace yeLost City, ihotela iSun City, ihotela iCascade kanye neCabans, kwayingxenye yonke yohlelo olwegcina indawo yokuvakasha ibe ephezulu kwintuthuko yezesayensi umhlaba wonke - noma ngaphezulu kwayo ngezinye izindlela. "Izivakashi zethu  abantu abanolwazi lwezinto ngokwedlulele abajwayele izinto ezingcono kakhulu umhlaba ongazinikeza. Izinto ezifana nalezi ziqinisekisa ukuphinde zibuye futhi."

"I-TTS iyazihlangabeza izidingo ezintweni eziningi," kusho uGraham Wood, iChief Financial Officer yeSun City. " Kwakubalulekile kithina ukuthi umfakeli wamabonakude wezokuxhumana esamkhetha kufanele afakele zonke izinto ezidingekayo. I-TTS inikeza umabonakude bese ixhuma amakhebula , ifakele izithombe, I-software ne-hardware, bese beganda umsebenzi uma usuxhunyiwe. Konke lokhu kukhokhelwa kancane kanca eminyakeni ewu-5. Inkampani nayo isithuthuke kakhulu ngalomsebenzi wayo omuhle, isisebenze lomsebenzi iminyaka engu-27." 

Ngokomphathi wezinto zokusebenza we-IT emnyangweni we-computer eSun City, uFeddie Siebert, lendlela isetshenziswa nge-remote control esetshenziswa ngobungane noma ibhodi lokhiye elixhunyiwe, ukuvimbela isidingo sokuxhuma ibhodi yokhiye nomabonakude. Kusho ukuthi lendlela ingasetshenziswa noma kuliphi ikhona lendlu. Manje izinga lazo zonke izivakashi ezihlala ePalace yeLost City naseSun City ehotela elikhulu, lendlela yohlobo lokuqala izofakelwa ngokushesha nakuwo wonke amanye amahotela ezokuvakasha. " I-internet yasendlini manje isisezingeni eliphezulu kubavakashi bamazwe nagmazwe kanye neTTS iyaqhubeka nokucelwa amanye amahotela aholayo ukufakela loluhlelo. Entsha iGuestlink Gobal ingeyokuqala yohlobo lwayo kanti futhi izogcwalisa konke okufunwa abavakashi", kusho uSm Danon, uMD weTTS. Okwamanje kwangaphezu kuka-1 300 amahotela kanye nasezindlini ezingaphezu kuka-250 000, iGuestlink ingumholi kwezobuchwepheshe kwezokuxhumana emahotela. Ngoba yiwo umgomo wabo kulomsebenzi, iGuestlink iyakwazi ukuthuthukisa nolungisa lomsebenzi njalonjalo. Esivumelwaneni phakathi kweTTS namahotela, yonke imali engenayo ngenxa yalendlela, iyahlukaniswa ngokulingana. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa sicela uthintane noLara Ross kulenombolo yocingo u: 011 780 7684 noma uRonel eTTS ku; 011 466 1803.



Ukuhlangana nemvelo eSun City
I-Sun City izihlanganise nobuhle obukhangayo, imidlalo kanye nezokuzithokozisa. Kodwa indawo iphinde inikeze futhi amathuba amahle ukuhlangana nemvelo ekuqaleni nje. Indawo inobobo lwayo kanye nakwesokudla sayo iGame Reserve engangama-hectare awu-55 000 (136 000 - acre).

I-Sun Iternational ifakela ngkwezimali ekuthuthukeni kwe-reserve, ebizwa ngokuthi iPilanesberg National Park, Futhi isiyisize ukuba enye yezinhle kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika. Ipaki iyindawo yemvelo ye"Big Five"; ngaphandle kwamabhubesi, kukhona izindlovu eziwu-55 kanye nezinyathi eziwu-80 kanye nomphakathi ophilile wobhejane nengwe. Ingulube, ihippo kanye nengwenya nakho kukhona ngezinombolo ezimbalwa. Idlelo ligcwele imihlambi yezinyamazane. Kulula ukumaka inkolongwane, itsessebe, insephe, igemsbok,  ired hartebeest, iwildebeest, indlulamithi kanye nezinye izilwane ezinkulu eziwu-17 ezidla okuluhlaza. I-pilanesberg indawo enhle ukufunda ukuthi imvelo isebenza kanjani ihlangene ngaphambi kokuthi umuntu abe khona, kanti futhi kukhona nezinye izinto ezinhle  nabavakashi abafundayo ezisepaki. Kukhona indawo yokungena epaki eyimizuzu embalwa ushayela kusuka emahotela Sun City, ngaleyondlela kulula ukuhlala endaweni ewuhlobo lwe-five-star esezingeni eliphezulu futhi ube uchitha izinsuku zakho endaweni evulekile enezinto eziningi. Abavakashi futhi bangahlala epaki. IManyane Complex iyindawo engangama-hectare awu-10 engaphakathi kothango lukagesi; kukhona inkambi yetende, izindlu zohlobo lamaswisi, indawo yamacaravans awu-100, amachibi amabili okubhukuda, indawo ethengisa ngokudla kanye nendawo yokukhempa. IComplex inesizinda sokufunda lapho kukhona izifundo zempilo yasendle ezinikezwa abasebenzi basepaki.

EManyane kukhona izindlela eziphephile ezihanjwa abavakashi uma behamba ngabodwana lapho behlangana khona nezilwane ezingenalaka ezifana nempofu, ikudu, iphiva, impala kanye nezindlovudawana. Kukhona izihlobo zezinyoni eziwu-250 epaki; eManyane eziningi zazo zingafundeka ngokwezinhlobo ezimbili . Ezinye izinkambi ezibiyelwa iBosele, enekamelo elilala abantu abaningi kanye nezinto zokupheka zamaqembu amakhulu; iMakwe, enamatende awu-10 kanye nezindlu ezifana nezamaSwizi eziwu-10; iMetswedi, enamatende awu-6; iKololo eyinkambi encane kunawo wonke, enamatende awu-4 acokanyiswe entabeni. Isivakashi singashayela imoto yaso epaki emigwaqeni engangamakhilomitha awu-160 emihle, ame endaweni yepicnic evikelekile ngokubiyelwa. Kodwa izindawo zokushayela ubuka indawo, izindawo zokuhamba kanye nokundiza ngamabhaluni kungabhukhwa ngenkampani yesivumelwano - iPilanesberg Safaris, enehhovisi ehotela iSun City. Izinhlobo zemithi emilayo yemvelo zePilanesberg ziyaheha ngobuhle, kodwa iJungle yaseLost City iyahlula. Ihlathi eladla izigidi ezingu-21 zamarandi, elingangamahectare awu-25 (62 acres), limilwe izitshalo eziyizigidi eziwu-1,5 kanye nezihlahla eziqhamuka ezindaweni ezehlukene zezwe; uhhafu wezitshalo eziwu-4 000 azikaze zitshalwe ngaphambili.

Ijungle inezindawo eziwu-22 ezehlukene ezimele isikhathi esomile esiswakeme sezulu.  Ehlathini lemvula, izihlahla ezifana ne-ebony, nezingqangu zokhuni lobisi kanye nebhishi ebomvu, ende enkungwini. Hhayi kude kakhulu, kungxenye enye izihlahla zohlobo lwe-baobab kakhulu enyanyathekile ngamagatsha ayo. I-Aloe Suzannae yase Madagascar inezimbali ezinde ngangamamitha awu-5. Ezinikeza iphunga elihle ngokuqandula ikhanda ebusuku kanye namalili angaphezu kuka-60 000 amile kakhulu kwenye ingxenye yehlathi. Kunezitshalo zepalm lapho ezingaphezu kuka-300 okubalwa kuzo eziphuma eUSA, ePanama, e-Ecuador kanye naseFiliphi. Emaphethelweni ehlathi kukhona ama-euphorbias aphuma eSaudi Arabia kanye nomunga kwekameli osuka eKallahari Desert, ohlangene nehlathi lemvelo lazeNyakatho Ntshonalanga. Kulendawo, iReebok noNkonka abaphuma ePilanesberg National Park beza ngokubonakala okukhulu; kanye neKudu isiyabonakala ngamawindi ePalace. Omoya opholile nomnandi wejungle usudonse isibalo esikhulu sezinyoni nezilwane. Umhleli wendawo uPatrick Watson watshala izihlahla zefig kuzo zonke izingxenye, ngoba zidonsa izinyoni; kude le, izilwane ezingaphezu kuka 190 izinhlobo zazo sezenze ihlathi laba ikhaya lazo. Abavakashi bangancoma indawo eyingcwele, amahansi aseGibhithe amadada. Ingxenye ye-boababa isidonse izintaka zendawo, amantiyane, kanye nokudla okundizayo kwangaphakathi. Ipredators enjengokhozi lweWalburg kanye neqhawekazi elinomqala omnyama kucekela phansi umphakathi wezilwane ezihuquzela ngesisu. Izimfudu ezinobungani kanye nemhlwathi, azinengozi kumuntu, kuyenzeka zibonakale.

Izindawo ezinamanzi kwijungle zigcwele kakhulu izinhlanzi ezingaphezu kuka-9 000, okubalwa kubo nebhavula, itilapia kanye nolunye uhlobo lwenhlanzi olungandile. Kukhona izihlelo zokwazisa imvelo yendabuko. Uma usexhaphozini lamanzi emgodini weshumu nantathu waseLost City Golf Course kukhona izingwenya zaseNile eziwu-36, ezinye zazo zicishe zibe amamitha amabili ubude. Zakhuliswa ezingadini zaseKwena eSun City, lapho izingwenya ziyinanto eheha abavakashi kuleyandawo. Uhamba ukhululeke endaweni eyakhiwe ngokhuni, abavakashi kwesinye isikhathi baba novalo lokuthi bazokuwela phansi eduze kweFootloose, ende ngangamamith awu-4,7 yesilisa. Eduze kwehotela iCascades, ineti esongeleke phakathi kwezihlahla ezinkulu yakha indawo enkulu yokuhamba ngaphansi lapho abavakashi bebuka khona amakhulukhulu ezinyoni zihamba phezu komhlaba.  Kukhona amagwinsi aphuma empumalanga ye-Afrika nase-India, nezinyoni ezinezifuba ezibomvu eziphuma eChina kanye nopholi abaphuma kude nempumalanga. Izilwanyana zendabuko  zisukela kwamancane amantiyane nema-wydahs kuya  kumandwa amakhulu. Indlu yokufuyela izinyoni inikeza amathuba ambalwa ukubona izinyoni nokuthatha izithombe kalula kunokuzibuka nje ngaphandle. Ubuhle obukhangayo kanye nolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba kusengxenyeni eyodwa yeSun City. Kubavakasheli bemvelo, Indawo yokuvakasha enkulu kunazo zonke eNingizimu ne-Afrika inikeza ukujula, edlile kakhulu  emvelweni yomhlaba. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Osaziwayo kanye nabadlali abadumile be-Major Lost City Cycling Challenge

I-Jacaranda 94.7fm, esakaza ngomoya ukuzuzela umdlavuza. U-Miss South Afrika uSonya Raciti uzobe ekhona ephakathi kwabavakashi bethu abaphezulu kwi-Cansa Lost City Cycle Challenge yesibili ezoba khona eSun City nasezindaweni ezizungezile ngoSeptember 4 ngokosizo lweCancer Association of South Africa (cansa).

Uzobe ehola uhla okubalwa kulo noMiss Gauteng Heidi van Zyl kanye nabagibeli bamabhayisikili abaphezulu uGary Beneke noRobbie McIntosh  noJacques Fullard ( owawina I-1999 Argus). Lomdlalo wamabhayisikili, oqala kubagibeli bamabhayisikili abaqalayo kuya kompetha, futhi onomklomelo wokuqala wenkulungwane eyodwa yamarandi, uzoba ngaphezu kwamakhilomitha awu-103, awu-69 kanye nawu-19, uxaswe iSun International, iJacaranda 94.2fm, iOld Mutual, iReebok, iPowerade kanye ne-Amino Research, kanye nabanye abaxhasi abazibandakanyile. Abagqugquzeli babiza abazibandakanyile kulomdlalo owadonsa abadlali abawu-1 800 ngonyaka odlule. Umdlalo weqembu nawo uyalungiselelwa. Izindlela ezintathu zizovumela noma ubani kusuka kwizimfundamakhwela kuya ezinganeni ukuzijwayeza ukubamba iqhaza kanti futhi abaqedayo bazothola amamedali. Abaqedayo kumjaho wamakhilomitha awu-103 bazothola amamedali esiliva angango-60mm.

Imali yokungenela, ezodluliselwa esikhwameni seCANSA, iwu-R40 kumdlali ngamunye, uma ikhokhwa ngaphambi kuka-14/08/99, kanti izoba uR60 uma ikhokhwa eSun City ngobusuku buka-September 3. Amafomu okungenela angatholakala ezitudiyo zeJacaranda 94.2fm  eSamrand, ezitolo zomdlalo, ebhukwini iRide noma kwi-website, www.trigon.co.za/lostcity.  Indawo yokulala yabazibandakanyile kanye nabalandeli babo ilungisiwe eCabanas eSun City. Inani ledlu eyidabuli, kubalwa nokudla kwasekuseni kwababili behlanganisele uR578,00 umuntu emunye ubusuku obubili, kanti inani ledlu yoyedwa uR1 048 ubusuku obubili. Izindlu zemindeni zizobiza uR692 umuntu emunye ehlanganisele ubusuku obubili kubalwa nokudla kwasekuseni, kanti ezabodwana zizoba uR1276 iyodwa. Imali yendlu yezingane uR120 ubusuku bubodwa. Ukubekisa, sicela ushayele uEvril noma uBonnie kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780 7586/7482. Imibuzo ingaqondiswa ngokushayela lenombolo: (012) 379 4616 noma (012) 664 2498 emva kwesikhathi somsebenzi.



I-Lost City
Umcabango ohahayo weminye yemiqondo ekhaliphe kakhulu yaseNingizimu Afrika, uSol Kerzner, wadonsa isizwe ngesikhathi iLost City ivulwa ngoDecember ka-1992.

Ukuqanjwa kabusha kwempucuko endala eyinsumsnsumane okukhona kuyo umhlaba omkhulu wamanzi, ihlathi elicinene kanye nejungle enePalace njengoba indawo engemumva kwaba isenzeko esibalulekile seSun City. Ukuzijabulisa ngeSpearheading eNingizimu Afrika, iSun City ilethe ukukholeka kweLost City kubantu. Indaba yasendulo inakho lokho.... "Amakhulu eminyaka ngaphambi kokuba imikhumbi emide kuphushwe ngayo, kude ngaphambi kokuqala kwempucuko yasentshonalanga. Isizwe samaNomadi eNyakatho ne-Afrika saqala ukufuna umhlaba omusha, izwe loxolo nokuningi. Isizwe sasifuna iminyaka eminingi sifuna lendawo yemilingo, kwathi ekugcineni isicelo sabo sabuyiselwa. Indawo abayithola ngaseNingizimu yaba indaba yasemandulo iValley of Sun, eyaziwa namhlanje ngeValley of the Waves. Akukona ukuthi baletha ubunyoninco bamasiko kuphela, kodwa bafika nolwazi lokwakha olwaluseceleni okunanamhlanje ngokwezinga. Kukhona okuthile okuyigugu okwaqanjwa: kusukela ekuqhakazeni kwesiningolo idolobha elimangalisayo elinePalace enhle ngendlela emangalisayo". Umlando weLost City ushiwo izizwe zase-Afrika zesifunda saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, ungokutholakala kwempucuko eyayilahlekile ekucinaneni kweValley of Waves. I-Valley of Waves ungumnikazi wokuqanjwa kabusha kwamapaki amanzi emhlabeni - Umbuso wokuzijabulisa wabafuni bokuvusa amadlingozi. Lapho abavakashi bekwazi ukujabulela uhambo lwe-spine-chilling kuya phansi ezindaweni ezingaphansi komhlaba kanye nohambo oluqonde ebhishi engakholeki.

Ukujabulela iValley of Waves kuqala njengoba usuke ubeka unyawo ngaphandle emhlabeni wamaphupho weGrand Pavilion, uya eBridge of Time. Ingwe enkulu eqube edwaleni igadeiTemple of Creation. Maqabuqabu,  ukudonseka kwentambo eqaqekayo kushona phansi emhlabeni ophumela ngaphandle kwe-Temple, amehlo engwe ayashintsha abe bomvu, intuthu nesitimu esiphuma emiseleni yedwala. Imisindo yamatshe ancibilikayo ehlihliza ebhadla amagwebu kungezwakala njengoba egobhoza  ngaphansi kweBridge of Time, okuvevezela  ngokuqhumuka okunamandla. IBridege of Time ingukwahlukana ngokwebanga kusuka eValley of Waves kuya eHall of Treasures. I-Hall of Treasures umhume onobungcweti obumanagisayo, obonakala uvezwe ngaphandle kwedwala kodwa  okunjengomucu obonakala ngamehlo - Indawo yombukiso ongajwayelekile nongakhohleki nemicimbi. Ukuthola insalela yedolobha lakudala njengoba uzobuza kulamahectare angu-25 esinyokotho esizungeze iValley of Waves. Umklamo owenziwe umuntu wendawo oqukethe okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-1.6 zezihlahla, izitshalo kanye zokwedlaleke phansi. I-Palace, okungubucwebe beLost City ihotela eligidlabezayo lamaphupho elihlelwe laba okuphikisana nesifunda sePilanesberg. I-Palace izungezwe izintaba kanye namadlelo amangalisayo ase-Afrika. I-Lost City - izwe lombono nokufanekisa.


Izingane nazo zingadlala umjaho mabhayisikili e-Cansa Lost City Cycle Challenge

I-CANSA Lost City Cycle Race engomhlaka-4 ngoMgqibelo kuSeptember  ka-1999, ithembisa ukuba injabulo kumndeni wonke ngokwengezwa ngemidlalo yamabhayisikili akwaChappies anamasondo amathathu ezingane ezincane ezineminyaka esukela kwemibili kuya kweyisithupha. Lomdlalo wokuzijabulisa olula oyindlela yekhilomitha elilodwa ivulelwe kuzo zonke izingane ezineminyaka ephakathi kwemibili neyisithupha amabhayisikili aba anamasondo amathathu, iBMX, iskuta noma noma anamasondo amabili noma amathathu. Umhleli uWerner Theron uthi akumdlalo walutho. " Kungumdlalo wokuzijabulisa ozodinga ukugewuka okuningi okunokuthilaza." Futhi ayikho imiklomelo kwabawinile, kodwa umngeneli ngamunye uzothola ikapisi lakaChappies, ibheji eliyinkinobho kanye nemedali ngokuqeda umjaho. Ukwengeza, bonke abangeneli bangena mahhala eSun City's Valley of the Waves ngosuku lokunikezelwa  ibheji eyinkinobho yakwaChappies. Imali yokungenela uR20 ingane iyinye kanye nenani lomndeni eliyisipesheli likhona lwezingane ezimbili noma ngaphezulu eziqhamuka emndenini owodwa. Imali izodluliselwa kwaCANSA. Umphathi wamaka wakwaChappies uTshihulwane Tshivhase uthi inhloso yeChappies National Tricycle Series ukugqugquzela abangeneli ezintweni ezenziwayo ngomzimba kusuka umuntu esemncane. "Ukungenela kwezemidlalo kuyingxenye ebalulekile empilweni engcono yomzimba, ukubhalansisa impilo njengomuntu omdala," uthi, "Futhi isikhathi esihle sokuqala ukugqugquzela lesitayela sempilo yiso lesisikhathi saleminyaka." I-Chappies Tricycle Ride eSun City ngomhlaka-4 kuSeptember iqala ngo-09:00. I-Chapiie Chipmunk kanye nabanye abadlali abathandwayo bazobe bekhona ukujabulisa izingane emva komdlalo. Abangeneli bayamenywa ukuvakashela iKamp Kwena, ikilabhu yezingane yosuku yaseSun City. Ikilabhu inikeza imidlalo eyisipesheli, okubalwa kuyo ukujomba izindlwana, imibukiso yasesiteji, imidlao yomculo nemidanso, ukudla u-ice -cream, ukupenda ubuso kanye nokunye kokuzijabulisa. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa noma ukungena, thintana noLara Biesot-Thoron kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 477-3399 noma nge-email mitten@mweb.co.za. Ukungenela kuzobe kwamukelwa nangoLwesiHlanu, ngomhlaka-3 kuSeptember phakathi kuka-17:00 no-20:00 knye nango-07:00 ngalo usuku.

I-Valley of Waves
I-Valley of Waves indawo emaphakathi yeLost City. Lomhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika ucwilisa abavakashi emoyeni wasemandulo kanye nasempucuko yakwamanye amazwe.

I-Valley of Waves, emandulo eyayiyi-"Valley of the Sun", ungumpetha wezokuzithokozisa ngamapaki amanzi emhlabeni - umbuso wokujabula wabafuni bbezokuvusa amadlingozi. Umfula iLazy ongagcini ngamazombezombe azungeza isiqhingi seValley of the Waves ngamamitha angu-500, uthwele amanzi ayizigidi ezimbili zamalitha kanye nezingane ezizijabulele, ezile zilunguza kancane emabhamuzeni amanzi emashubhini okubhukuda anemibala. Isiqhingi sinomuzi wasemandulo okunesitolo sezinto zokubhukuda, isitolo soswidi kanye nendawo yokudla. Kukhona amakhapheshana kanye nezindlu ezinesikhathi kanye nempahla yokuqashwa. I-Roaring Lagoon ingokwedlulele okugcwalisa injabulo. Njalo emizuzwaneni engu-90, insimbi iyakhala ukuvusa izinzwa zakho. Igagasi elingango-1,8m ukuphakama nomshudo ongango-35kms ngehora lishaya isihlabathi sasebhishi sisidonsa kanye nalo odongeni. Okulingana neRoaring Lagoon iTemple of Courage. Izinhliziyo zabanesibindi ziwela phansi ngamamitha angu-17 uwolokohlo lwamanzi, agijima ngaphansi kwebhuloho bese engenela echibini lokubhukuda ekugcineni komshushuluzo - akukona kwabanezinhliziyo ezingaphilile.

Ukwengeza kwiTemple of Courage imishushuluzo ewu-4 yamanzi. Ngakwesonkunxele seTemple of Courage kukhona imayini yeDayimane, okuyindawo yokusuka yomjaho omazombezombe. Ichibi lokubhukuda elincane  elinikeza ukugeza okuncane nje emva kokuvuka kwamadlingozi ngomjaho ngasendaweni eshelelayo iScorpio. I-Tarantula engaphansi komhlaba ivusa amadlingozi nayo - ezungezwe ubumnyama, engahlome ngalutho kodwa ngeshubhu, uhamba emihosheni engaphansi ezintabeni uthatha ikhefu ngesipiti. Olalela umsindo obangwa uwena udududuma umuntu okujaha ngemumva naye ohamaba emaceleni entaba. Njengoba usuphumela elangeni awulindi ukukhwela intaba futhi uzisabise wena futhi ngokunganteli. Abathameli belanga bangathamela ilanga endaweni ezungeze izindawo zeRoyal Baths ngesikhathi bezijabulisa ngotshwala obuyingxubevange okumnandi okutholakala endaweni eseceleni kwechibi lobhukuda iObservatory Bar  ebukela ngaphesheya iRoaring Lagoon.  I-Amphitheatre evulekile eseduzane - I-Royal Arena ikhona ngokokuzithokozisa okudlalwayo futhi ingahlala ababukeli abangu-800. Kukhona okuthile komuntu ngomuntu eValley of Waves - impilo enika amandla amasha endaweni emangalisayo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



I-Palace yeLost City engcono kunawo wonke e-Afrika.
I-Palace yeLost City engcono kunawo wonke e-Afrika ngokukwe US Conde Nast Traveller. I-Palace yeLost City eseSun City indawo yokuvakasha ephambili e-Afrika - futhi lokho kusemthethweni. Ngokomthetho weUS Conde Nast Traveller, ibhayibheli lezokuhamba undiza amazwe ngamazwe, lelihotela eliyindawo yokuvakasha egidlabeza ngako konke nenenjabulo yaseNingizimu Afrika lathatha umqhele wokubusa ngokubalwa okuphakeme kweReaders' Choice, equkethe abafundi bayo abangaphezu kuka-30 000.

Umhleli ophethe weConde Nast Traveller, uThomas J Wallace, unikeze umklomelo kwiPalace yeLost City ebukhazikhazini bomgidi eMalibu, eLos Angeles kulelesonto. Okokuqala ngqa izwekazi lase-Afrika liveze okwalo ekubaleni  kweConde Nast Traveller, okwenziwa minyaka yonke eseyize yaba ngu-11. Ngaphambilini, izindawo zokuvakasha zase-Afrika bezihlanganiswa nalezo zase-Asia, kanti iUS kanye nezindawo zase-Europe bezizimela zona ngokwazo. Abafundi bavota benikwe imibuzo ukuthi balinganise phakathi kwezindawo ezihlaba umxhwela nalezo ezibhedayo asebake bazivakashela, emikhakheni yezindlu, ukunakekelwa, ukudla/izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla, indawo, kanye nemidlalo nokwenziwa khona. I-Palace yathola amaphoyinti amaningi, kulandela iMount Kenya Safari Club eyaphuma isibili, iLittle Govenors Camp eseKenya eyaphuma isithathu kanye neMala Mala eseNingizimu Afrika eyaphuma isine.

NgokweConde Nast Traveller - kanye nabafundi bayo abagxekayo - Ukugqama kwePalace yeLost City njengendawo ephezulu yezokuvakasha e-Afrika kusho ukuthi ukuyenga nalomgqumo wokuba engafani nalothu nakho kwenza indawo ibe ngephezulu ezindaweni eziwu-100 eziphezulu emhlabeni. I-Palace yeLost City ibekwa  kunombolo 38 emhlabeni ngokweConde Nast Travellers engcono kwezingcono ngo-1998 - Kumahotela nasezindaweni zokuvakasha, uPhilip Georgas, Umdondisi wezingxenye zezindawo zokuvakasha zaseSun International usethole ukuhloniswa okuphakeme. "Kubalulekile ukuthi umklomelo akuwona nje kuphela wokubukeka kwehotela  nokuhlelwa kwalo nokubaluleka kwesakhiwo, kodwa ngokusebenza kwalo okusezingeni eliphezulu nendawo yokulala ewubucwazicwazi," kusho uGeorgas.


65
Okungatholakali njalo kweLost City Kind 
Indawo yokuvakasha eSun City isiza ukwethulweni kwenja enkulu enhlalweni yemvelo into enkulu, Ngicabanga ukuthi ngiyanithanda... uReg Presley enza sengathi usho lamazwi - izinja ezinkulu zijabulela  lokhu kumemezela okumagange. Ukubukeka kwazo okungafani  nokwezinye, kwenza imvelo igqame nakho konke okwayo okwenza zibukeke.

Inja yasendle ingenye yezilwane ezisabekayo emhlabeni kanye nanokudela kwayo ngokugqama kwayo ngobungozi, kunesidingo esikhulu ukwakha nokuvikela umphakathi wezinja zasendle ezindaweni ezizifanele. Kuyisimo esiyingozi ukwakha iziqhingi semiphakathi yezinja ezihlala ngazodwana kusuka esimweni ebezihlala kuso ukuze kuvikeleke umphakathi ekuhlaselweni izifo ezinkulu  nokuba uhlupho kwazo, ngolokho futhi kube kwengezwa inani nokwehlukana ngokufuzo. Ngokubhekwa kwazo okunokucophelela, Izinja zasendle zingahlaliswa futhu zigadwe endaweni ezilungele, engacobelela ngokubaluleka ukwanda kwazo ngendlela youkuphila kwezilwane. Indawo engamahectare angu-55 000, iPilanesberg National Park engnasi isifo samalaleveva ezungeze idawo yokuvakasha iSun City ikwazile ukuqamba ngokuphumelela ukwethulwa kwezihlelo zezilwane zasendle, khona maduzane nje kubalwa nebhubesi nengulube yehlathi. Isibe indawo ekulungele ukulinga ukufaka nezinja zasendle."Sinesibopho ezilwaneni ukuzinikeza indawo enjengezulu eliphephile", kusho uGus Van Dyk - oyiField Ecologist, ePilanesberg National Park". Ulwazi olotholakele ngokulinga lesisenzo luzoba ukufaka isandla okukhulu echibini lomhlaba wonke lolwazi oludingekayo ukulondoloza nokugcina izinja zasendle".

Amapaki aseNyakatho Ntshonalanga kanye nebhidi yezokuvakasha iqonde iSun International ukuthi ixhase ukufakwa kwezinye izinja futhi zasendle epaki. Ipaki ingumphetho wendawo yokuvakasha iSun Cityfuthi idlala indawo ebalulekile kwezokuvakasha eziqondene nolwazi lwezemvelo. "Sasijabulela kuphela ukuzibophezela" kusho uPhilip Georges, umphathi wengxenye yezokuvakasha, eSun International. " Kungumklamo ongakholeli nokho kanye nezinkulungwane zabavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe nabendawo abeze eSun City bazozuza ngokukwazi ukubuka lezizilwane ezingejwayelekile endaweni abahlala kuzo" Okwamanje kukhona ezimbili zesifazane ezindala kanye nabandlwane abahlanu (okukhona kubo ababili besifazane kanye nabathathu besilisa) endaweni ehlelwe kahle abahlala kuyo ePilanesberg National Park. Imindlwane ingangezinyanga eziwu-7 ubudala. Izinja zasendle zatholwa epulazini eAll Days District esifundazweni saseNyakatho. Iqembu okubalwa kulo umbambi wangasese kanye nomzingeli oqeqeshiwe babamba iqhaza ukubamba lezizinja ngaphambi kokuthi umnikazi pulazi adicilele phansi lomhlambi, ngoba zazibamba imfuyo yakhe. Ngebhadi babengenalo ulwazi lokuthi iPilenesberg National Park yayiwufuna lomhlambi ngalokho abalisebenzisanga ithuba ngaphambi kokuba baqala ukuzibamba base bethola ingxenye yomhlambi eyabanjwa.

U-alpha enye yezinja yesifazane kanye nemidlwane yakhe ewu-9 bambiwa ngaphansi komhume. Imidlwane yakhe yathunyelwa eWildcare (Animal Rehabilitation Centre) ukuthola ukunakekelwa okunobunyoninco nokondliwa kanti unina wathunyelwa eDe Wildt. Enye futhi yesifazane yabanjwa ekhejini elalicushiwe emhumeni. Ngalesisikhathi, isiFundazwe saseNyakatho sazibandakanya sakomondela izinja. Izinja zanikezelwa esifundazweni saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga ePaki yakhona kanye nakuTourism Board esimweni sokuthi izinja kwakufanele ukuthi zikhululwe. Eyesifazane esancane, eyesifazane eyi-alpha kanye nemidlwane emihlanu yizona zilwane okwamanje sezisePilanesberg endaweni yazo. Eminye imidlwane izosetshenziswa ezinhlelweni zokugcina inzalo. Isikhathi sokugcinwa kwazo siyingozi njengoba sivumela izilwane ukuhlala endaweni yomsebenzi. Ukungeniswa kwezinja zesilisa akuthembakali kahle njengoba amathuba akhona awukuthi izinja zesilisa kanye nemidlwane zingevumelane zodwa hleze zixabane. Isikhathi sokuhlala kwazo sizonikeza izilwane ithuba lokubonakala kanye nokuqeqeshwa kufenisi wogesi, okubalulekile ukuthi izilwane kufanele zihlale ngaphakathi endaweni yazo. Kuzozinika isikhathi futhi sokuzifundisa zona uqobo ukuthi zingawathola kanjani amanzi, ukudla kanye nokwenziwa ibhubesi  endaweni eseduze ezungeze indawo yazo. Lolulwazi luzosiza izilwane emasontweni okuqala zilandela ukukhululwa kwazo. Izinja ezinkulu zasendle eziphuma endaweni eyipulazi zijwayele ukuba ingozi, zibe namahloni futhi ziyaphunyuka ngenxa yokuhlupha kwazo okuqhubekayo. Kulandela isikhathi sokujwayela, izilwane kufanele zikhululeke bese zivumela abavakashi abahlakaniphile ukuthi bazibuke nokuthi kube lula ukuba kuzona. Imidlwane isiphinde yahlanganiswa nezinja ezindala zesifazane kanti manje imizamo ukuthi kutholakale ezinye zesilisa ezimbili noma ezintathu ukuze umhlambi uphelele. Imizamo yokuthi kutholakale ezesilisa ezimbili eZimbabwe noma eBotswana okwamanje iyazanywa. Uma nje ezesilisa sezingenisiwe emhlambini umhlambi ungakhululwa. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.


Iphepha elinamaqiniso ngePalace yeLost City
UMLANDO:"Eminyakeni engamakhulukhulu ngaphambi kokuthi imikhumbi kuphushwe ngayo, kudala ngaphambi kwempucuko yasentshonalanga, isizwe namanomadi siqhamuka enyakatho ne Afrika sabekisa sifuna umhlaba omusha, umhlaba woxolo kanye nokuningi"Isizwe safuna iminyaka eminingi sifuna okufana nendawo yemilingo, kwathi ekugcineni isicelo sabo saphendulwa. Izwe abalithola laliseningizimu laba umlando weValley of the Sun, eyaziwa namhlanje ngoValley of Waves. Akukona nje ukuthi baletha nabo isiko elinothile, kodwa baletha namakhono okwakha okwakuyinto eseceleni nje okunanamhlanje ngokwezinga. Kukhona okuthile okwaqanjwa: Kusuka ekuqhakazeni kobobo idolobha elimangalisayo nePalace enhle ngendlela emangalisayo, umhlaba onothe ngaphezu ngokwedlulele  ababengakaze bawubone ... Njalo ukuqhekezeka komhlaba kwayiveza indawo enhle kangaka, abasindayo babaleka, ababuye besabuyela emumva base beyishiya yatholwa futhi yabuyiselwa abacwaningi bemvelo emakhulwini eminyaka emva kwalokho. Namhlanje sesiyibuyisele esimweni sayo sodumo "Zitholele ihotela elimanagalisayo ngokwedlulele emhlabeni" INDAWO iPalace itholakala ekucinaneni kokwena kwesifunda sePilanesberg sezwe laseNingizimu Afrika. Izungezwe izintaba kanye namahlathi amangalisayo ase-Afrika kanti okubuqamama nje iPilanesberg Natuional Park lapho izindlovu, obhejane, amabhubesi kanye nezilwanyazane ezincane ziziphilela ngokukhululeka endaweni yazo yemvelo. OKUFUNYANISWA  eGauteng, indawo enkulu yezamabhizinisi ingangamakhilomitha awu-187 ubude. Isikhumulo sezindiza iJohannesburg International Airport iyatholakal khona lapho, okutholakala kuso izindiza zangaphakathi nezamazwe aphesheya. I-Pilanesberg Airport iyimizuzu eyishumi nje kuphela ukusuka eSun City kanti futhi inikeza izindiza iSA Express Airways ukuya  nokubuya eGoli naseKapa kanye nezindiza zangasese. IZULU Kufudumele kuya ekushiseni nokoma. Amazinga okushisa? C Kusuka kuJanuwari kuya kuMeyi kuphezulu ngo-36, kuphansi ngo-26 Kusuka kuJuni kuya kuSepthemba kuphezulu ngo-28, kuphansi ngo-12 kusuka ku-Okthoba kuya kuDesemba kuphezulu ngo-36, kuphansi ngo-26 INTELA I-Value Added Tax ewu-14% UGESI 110 Volts / 220 Volts. IZITHUTHO ZASESIKHUMULWENI SEZINDIZA iSun City inikeza ukunakekela okumnene ukuya noma ukubuya ePilanesberg Airport AMAKHADI OKUKWELETA Wonke amakhadi okukweleta asetshenziswayo ayamukelwa UKUGQOKA Ngosuku: Okuzothile Ebusuku: Izinhlobonhlobo zengqephu yezokuvakasha iVilla del Palazzo: Ukubukeka kakhulu OKWANGAPHANDLE NOKWANGAPHAKATHI iPalace yeLost City eSun City ingenye yezindawo ezidonsa abavakashi ngobuhle emhlabeni, ukwethula umcabngo womuntu nendawo yekhaya kwezobuciko nokwakha kusuka eminyakeni yamakhulukhulu eyadlula e-Afrika. Okuzungeze ihotela indawo engangamahectare awu-25 yobobo lwezimbali enezitshalo ezingaphezulu kuka-600 000, izihlahla kanye nemishana engatheni. Ihlathi elihle lohlobo lwezihlahla i-palms kanye nezihlahla zezithelo ezingekholeke, ihlathi eliswakeme letrophiki, ihlathi lezihlahla zomdabu ezomile, ihlathi lepalm yobukhosi elinepalm ezungeze ichibi lokubhukuda. Kunezihlahla esezikhule ngokwanele ezingaphezu kuka-4 000, okubalwa nezingamamitha angu-40 ubude, kusukela enkabeni yamahlathi ahlukene, kukhona nezinye izihlahla eziwu-240 000, ezinye zazo zinhle ngendlela emangalisayo - zikhula zisuke embewini. Ihlathi elicinene likhombisa imvelo ngezingxenye zayo ezintathu: ikhanophi eneqabunga elide ngangamamitha awu-40, ezilandela yona zinde ngokuyingxenye yazo, kanye nezitshalo emhlabathini ophansi. Kukhona nezitshalo eziyivelakancane  kanye nezihlahla ezifana nohlobo lweDracaena ephuma eSeychelles, iAloe Suzannae ephuma eMadagascar, iEuphorbias ephuma eSaudi Arabia kanye nezinye izinhlobo eziningi ezingaphezu kuka-40 zepalm ezitholakala kubaqoqi bazo baseUSA, ePanama, eEcuador kanye naseFilidi, ukubala nje ezimbalwa, Zakhuliswa endaweni yokutshal izitshalo ngaphambi kokuba zitshalwe ngaphandle. Izinyoni nazo ziyatholakala ngomnotho wempilo yezinyoni ukujabula. Lendawo ecinene inezindlela zokuzihambele kanye nezimpophoma amaxhaphozi kanye namachibi kanye nezindawo eziningi okuqhamuka ngazo amanzi ezahlukene nezokuhamba. Isakhiwo sangaphandle sePalace zibuyekezwe impilo yezinto zasendle. Izinyoni ezinkulu ezinezimpiko ezivulekile zibonakala zindiza zisuka ezindongeni eziphakeme, ziya emibokweni yezindlovu phansi naphezulu kanye nasemabhulohweni kanye kanye nensimbi enkulu ebhulonze engenye yokudumile kwase-Afrika ibonakala ekugcineni kokungenela kweElephant Atrium yehotela, iShawu, indlovu ethandwa kakhulu engenye yezimpilo eziwu-7 zeKruger Park ... Indoba eyayibuyisela empilweni umqophi waseNingizimu Afrika uDanie de Jager,  ngokwakhe umsebenzi wokubuyisela lendlovu ngensimbi bekungumsebenzi wothando. Kubonakala kufana nokunempilo ngoba kuthathelwe empilweni, kuwo wonke amakhona, kusuka ecosheni lendlebe ubude okungu-4,5 amamitha kusuka emhlabathini, kuya ekugcineni emazwaneni. U-Shawu ubuhle bodwa noma esefile.

Ukungena ePalace bumemezela ubuhle bayo. Umgwaqo wokushayela udlula ehlathini elomile lamaqabunga nezibi zezimpande zezihlahla ngaphambi kokuba ufike ebholohweni elimangalisayo elihamba ngaphezu kwamanzi ayimpophoma namabhamuza bese ufika ebaleni elikhulu elinezihlahla ezimbili zePalm yaseWashington kanye nempophoma emangalisayo yengulube yehlathi, ngaphambi kwePorte Cochere. Ngaphambi kwezinyoni kukhona izinhla ezimangalisayo, kanye nezinyawo zendlovu ekuqaleni kwazo. Lokhu kuxhasa iPorte Cochere kanye nezingwe ezigadile emakhoneni ayo amane. Ngephesheya kweyadi kuqhamuka umnyango omude ngangamamitha awu-8 ubude, onezicabha zawo eziyindilinga phezulu zokhuni ezimile zivuliwe zilindele ukwamukela abavakashi ePalace. Lendawo yokuhlaba ikhefu ikhombisa futhi ingaphakathi lePalace. Lelikamelo elingumhume lide ngangamamitha angu-25 ukuphakama nangu-16 ukuvuleka lihlelwe ngezinhla ezingu-6. Uphahla lwalo lunu-aculus maphakathi ludidiyelwe ngopende izinhla eziyisithupha zikhombisa ukucinana okungefaniswe. Okuzungeze lelikamelo izinhla eziyizingxenye, ezibekwe ukuphikisana nodonga, ngokudabula okwesikati nokuhlotshiswa ngokwetshe, kanye nokubunjwe ngesandla kugubha imvelo yomhlaba. Engxenyeni engaphesheya yekamelo kukhona umamukeli kanye nedesika lokwamukela, eliyindilinga  ngokwesandla kwesapele pommele ngaphezulu ngokwerosa verona nomabula we-quagga. Kwimaphakathi lekamelo, kumi itafula eliziphumulele emakhanda amabhubesi amane nengaphezulu lalo lendlalwe ngezinkuni ezizinhlobo eziwu-8 ezahlukene. Iphansi lalo liyamangalisa ngokwalo, linezinhlobo ezingu-38 zokuma komabula kanye negranite.  Ngamunye undlalwe ngesandla wapholishwa ngesandla ngendlela enamaqabunga enhliziyweni izungezwe izilwane eziyizinhlobo eziyisithupha, yase imbozwa isiyingi esingaphakathi nesingaphandle ngokwemicu yezebhra. Ngale kwekamelo kukhona izitebhiso ezehlela eCrystal Court. Ukwakhiwa kwezitebhiso zakho kungubungcweti ngokwakho, ukuhlanganiswa kwebhulonze nezinhlayiya zetshe, zagqokiswa omabula. Isibani esinamagatshagatsha okukhanyisa esihle ngendlela emangalisayo esiseCrystal Court sikhombisa ubumsulwa bamqabunga epalm, ngezibambo zawo ezenziwe ngebhulonze kanye namaqabunga uqobo lwawo ambozwe izinhlayiya zamatshe, kungangamamitha amahlanu ububanzi. Izinhla, zingamamitha awu-15 ukuphakama, okubonakala kwenziwe ngepalm zeziqu zoqalo, kuboshwe kwakinayitelwa ngentambo, kwaphumulela ezinyaweni zendlovu echaza indawo yonke. Konke ukubonakala kwendlomvu kubuyangaze indawo yonke yeCrstal Court. Iminyango yegilasi, ihlelwe ngamamitha angu-7 ukuphakama, evulekela ngemumva bese inikeza ukubonakala okugingqikayo kweValley of Waves ... Yonke indawo umuntu uyabuka, umuntu ubona kuphela okwehlukile. AMAGUMBI EZIVAKASHI KANYE NOKUPHAKATHI   iPalace inamagumbi ayinani elingu-338 esewonke, okubalwa kuwo ajwayelekile angamabili, ajwayelekile amakhulu, awemindeni, awohlobo lwe-paraplegic, kanye nanobucwebecwebe. Kukhona izinhlobo eziyishumi nantathu zokuma kwezindlu ezehlukene, okuyizinhlobo ezitholakala ngeziyisithupaha ezincane, eziyisithupha ezohlobo oluphambili, ezintathu ezobucwebecwebe kanye nenkulu kakhulu. Lena enkulu kunazo zonke ingukufinyeza ukukhombisa okuphathelene nobukhosi, nezindonga zayo ezihlotshiswe ngesandla ngokhuni lwe-maple kanti futhi akukho okungaphansi kuka-800 komuntu ngamunye, ukuhlwe ngokwesiko futhu kwenziwa ngesandla. Iyinye yalezindlu inombhede omkhulu, nendawo yokuhlala, indawo yedesika, i-armoire, izingcingo ezimbili ezinezintambo zangaphandle, indlwana yokugeza engaphakathi kanye nesigcini zingcwadi. Kukhona futhi nedlu yesivakashi kapowder, i-sauna kanye nethala lelenceku. Zonke izindlu ezijwayelekile zifana nesethi ngendlela ezihlotshiswe ngayo, nendawo yazo yokungena ehlotshiswe ngokomlenze wenkawu. Zonke nenesisefo sokugeza esihlukene ngendlu yokugeza engaphakathi. Indlu ngayinye ihlukile kwenye, esinye isitayela sinendawo yokuhlala enetafula nesihlalo eziphakeme ezimbili, izihlalo zokuphumula, itafula elakhiwe okwempala phezulu kanye ne-arnoire enomabonakude, isisefo kanye nesiteshi senceku. Ezinye zithanda ukuba zinkulu kanti zinosofa, isihlalo sokuphumula, iclover leaf ottoman, itafula lekhofi, idesika nesihlalo. Ukunakekelwa okuthile kuyanikezwa esivakashini ngasinye uma sifika ePalace. Izimoto ziyagadwa; yize noma ukupaka ngokwakho kuwukuzikhethela. Zonke izivakashi ziyaphelezelwa ukuya emagunjini azo ngabaphathelene neGuest Relations emva kokubhalisa, bese zaziswa ngokutholakalayo okuhlukene ePalace. Ukunakekelwa okukhulu kuyatholakala ezindlini zezivakashi, kusukela emathawuleni okusula ecaleni  ngalinye lombhede kuya kwawokugeza nobhasikidi oqukethe iziqedaphunga ezahlukene. UKUDLA iCrystal Court - ehlala abantu abangu-342 Ukuhlaba ikhefu, indawo ethengisa ngokudla ezungezwe umfula, othelelwa izimpophoma. Izinhla zamatshe amahle aziphumulele ezinyaweni zendlovu,  kanti impophoma emaphakathi iphophoma ngemumva kwezindlovu ezinamazinyo, lapho imiboko yazo ithululela amanzi ezitsheni sebhulonze. Indawo enkulu yekamelo inezihlalo eziwu-180 nenye indawo yokuhlala engahlala abantu abawu-100, kanye nabangu-62 endaweni nje engatheni. Indawo ethengisa ngokudla iseva ukudla kwasekuseni, okwasemini nokwasebusuku. Ukudla kukhombisa amatafula amazwe ngamazwe kodwa anomthelela wase-Afrika ngokunambitheka okunjengokwamachops esiklabhu iKaroo, imibengo yenkomo kanye nesifuba senkukhu ekhuliswe ngombila esisevwa nemifino kanye nodali othelwe ngaphezulu, okuqalelwa mhlambe utamatisi onongiwe no-anyanisi oyisaladi onoshizi wepicorino onongwe ngogalige, upelepele kanye ne-antshovi. Okunye okuhehayo kulendawo ethengisa ngokudla itiye lantambama, elinikezwa ngezinhla ezintathu: amasamishi anokhukhumba, isalmoni, inkukhu kanye nenyama kuphelekezelwa amakokombane kanye nezithelo ezintsha  ezimbozwe ngokhilimu, ilamula kanye nezithelo ezilondolozwe ngoshukela zokuzenzela. Ukuzikhethela kokuningi ematiyeni ahlukene kanye nokuvutshelwe okusha. Umculo mkhoma uyanezezela emoyeni wokungcebeleka uziphumulele. I-Crystal Court ivula amahora angu-16 ngosuku, izinsuku eziwu-7 ngesonto. I-Villa del Palozza - ehlala abantu abangu-202 Ibonakala senagthi ibhokisana elincane lobucwebe elinombala livele emabhamuzeni amanzi, iVilla del Palazzo ibhekene neGrand Pool. Ukudla kudala izinga elisha eMzansi Afrika emakhishini aseNyakatho neNtaliyane, agcizelela ubuhle ngkukhonjiswa, kobumsulwa nokunambitheka. Izinto ezifana, iMozzarella esanda kwenziwa, upasta weSemolina, iBraseolla kanye nemnandi iTartuffos, iGelatos kanye nePatselles kwenziwa futhi kusevwe ngabapheki bokudla kwaseNtaliyane abakhethiweyo nabapheki beRanges, abathole ukuqeqeshwa okusezingeni eliphezulu ukubhekela amakhishi kanye nomsebenzi weVilla del Palazzo.

I-Palm Court Lounge - ehlala abantu angu-23. Isondelene neVilla del Palazzo, iPalm Court Lounge iyindawo enhle kakhulu ukuhlangana khona kanti futhi yenziwe yaba yinhle ukuphuza iziphuzo ngaphambi kokudla kwakusihlwa nangemumva kwakho futhi ezisevwa izinceku ezinobungani, abakusiza ukuqambela indawo yokuphumula nefudumele. I-Pool Restaurant / iSnack Bar iPool Restaurant inikeza ukudla okugcizelela ebululeni bokungenela kusuka kumasamishi kuya kwawokungenela amasaladi kuya esitekini sefajitas. Ukuzikhethela ezihlotsheni zika-ice cream wokuzenzela, kanye nezinye izinhlobo zokudlana okumnandi ezihlukene, nazo ziyatholakala. Itafula leziyoliso lidumile kanye neSnack Bar, kutholakala eduze kweGrand Pool okutholakala khona ingxubevande yomdabu ngaphansi komthunzi opholile wepavilion. Ukudlela endlini Ukudlela endlini nokudla ngasese endlini yakho noma endaweni yakho. Ukunakekelwa amahora angu-24. I-Tusk Lounge / Bar Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala esezingeni eliphezulu itholakala eTusk Lounge lapho idecor igubha khona indlovu enamazinyo emangalisayo eseyidonse imicabango yempilo yasendle yezithandani noma kuphi. Lezizindlovu eziyisithupha, ezime ngazimbili ngaphezu kweTusk Lounge zingamamitha awu-5,6 ukuphakama, isisindo singamathani amabili iyinye futhi zenziwe ngokhuni lwe-Indonesia Aquara, olusinda ngaphezu kwe-ebony, zase zihlanganiswa ngensimbi ezungezile. I-Tusk Lounge nendawo yayo yothswala nendawo elungiswe kahle ngaphezulu yokuhlala, zibhekene neValley of Waves kanye nechibi elimaphakathi. Ukwengeza ebar egcwele okokuthengisa, kukhon uhla lwmawayini kanye nokunakekelwa kwekilabhu, ihora lengxubevange kanye nokuhamba phambili okukhethwe kwi-hors d' oevres kuyasevwa ngokuhambisa nomculo onikezwa ipiano. ITAFULA / IZIDINGO ZOKUHLANGANA Ngaphakathi kwiPalace kukhona izindlu ezintathu zokuhlangana ezivulekela endaweni enendlovu ewumhume ebuyekezwe insimbi enkulu ekwakhiwe ngayo uShawu. I-Royal Chamber Enye yezindlu enobukhazikhazi eneminyango yayo eyakhiwe ngaphansi kwamafasitela ebhekene nezingadi. Lendawo enkulu ngokuphindwe kabili ingangenisa abantu abangu-90 bedili kati abangu-120 abeze amhlanganweni. Itafula letshe elimangalisayo elihlotshisiwe lama emhumeni ngasekungeneni kweRoyal Chamber, lingasetshenziselwa ukubhalisa. Ngaphakathi eRoyal Chamber; uhlobo lomuthi oluthile oluhle lufinyelela phezulu luthinta uphahla olohlotshisiwe kahle lapho amakhanda ezindlovu esebenza njengama-corbels. Kusukela ophahleni kulenga izibani ezine ezingazintathu ngohlobo lwebhulonze kanye nezimpondo zefaoux. Ekugcineni kude le egunjini kukhon itafula leconsole liziphumulele ezinyaweni zendlovu. I-Orchid Room / iProtea Room Ekugcinenei kude le emhumeni wendlovu, ngemumva kukaShawu, kukhona amagumbi amabili okubambele imihlangano, iyinye ingamamitha awu-7 ephindwe kawu-6,5, ingenisa abantu abangu-60 abahlangene. Indawo ithwele okuthile okunomsoco, izinhlobo ezimangalisayo zezingadi. Izindonga zimbozwe okusandwangu ethambileyo okwe-aqua marine nezinyo le-palest. Ukugcizelela kwamaqabunga apendwe ophahleni, kanye nezibani zesitha samatshe kanye nezindonga ezihlotshiswe ngobhulonze zase zilengiswa amatshe. Amagumbi futhi amatshe enziwe ngesandla, amatafula econsole ocingo kanye nezihlalo ezinhle ezintofontofo. Yonke impahla enhle iyatholakala, yebo, futhi ihlala isesandleni amahora angu-24 ngosuku. Abasebenzi abaqeqeshiwe ukusiza abemihlangano. Amadili ePalece ayinto ehlale ikhumbuleka njalo ngenxa yokudla kwakhona okungefaniswe nangendlela okuhlelwa ngayo izinto ebukhazikhazini obuzungezile. EZOKUZITHOKOZISA / UKUNAKEKELA IZIVAKASHI Igalofu iGary Player Country Club iLost City Golf Course kanye neCountry Club Swimming Wonke amahotela anamachibi awo okubhukuda iSquash Sun City Complex: Izinkundla ezintathu zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili zitholakala eGary Player Country Club Waterworld Anikeza noma imuphi umcabango ngomdlalo wamanzi echibini lethu langasese elikhulu, okunjenge-jet -skiing, water-skiing kanye ne-parasailing. IWindsurfing iWavepool, iWavepool kanye neLazy River Ride kutholakala eValley of Waves iSafaris iSchedule Game Drives, iHot Air Balloon Flight, iPrivate Game-Drives kanye neRhino Trails ePilanesberg Game Reserves iHorse Riding Itholakala nje emva kweCabanas Hotel iTennis Eduze kweGary Player Country Club kunezinkundla eziyishumi nambili zethenisi, ezinompheme eziwu-5 Umdlalo wamabhayisikili nawo ayaqashisa eGary Player Country Club iJogging Izindlela zokugijima zihlelwe khona la ezinkundleni zegalofu.

I-Bowling Green Gym, iSauna, iJacuzzi, iMassage umbukiso waseTheatre Ibhayisikobho kukhona amabhayisikobho amane kanye kanye namaShowscan Cinema iDiscotheque imishini yokudlala imidlalo yasekhasino iGrand Pool Kusuka eGrotto Loggia, izitebhisi zikudonsela endaweni elungiswe kahle yeGrand Pool lapho kunendawo yokuhlala yabangu-200 ezihlalweni zokuphumula kanye nokubuka kanye kanye iValley of Waves. Indawo yokuhlala futhi yabangu-200 iyatholakala endaweni esasiqhingi. Izivakashi ziyaphelezelwa ukuya ezihlalweni zazo bese siyanakekelwa ngokufanela ukuthi zikuthole ngabasebenza endaweni yokubhukuda. Ukusevwa kotshwala obuyingxubevange kuyatholakala. Ichibi lokubhukuda lezingane litholakala endaweni ekujana neGrand pool, lapho izingwenya emaceleni, izinyoni kanye namaxoxo kukhala emanzini, kukhalela abancane kuya kubo. Indawana ethengisayo yePool itholakala eGrand Pool, Lendawana inikeza izinhlobonhlobo zamafutha ezokuzishukumisa, izinto zokugcoba, izibuko, okokuvikela ilanga, amabhuku kanye namaphephandaba. I-Lost City Golf Club Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili, ipar 72  ikhozi yegalofu ePalace, iyisitayela sekhozi ewugwadule eyahlelwa iGary Player Design Company. Ikhozi isiyonke isebenzisa isimo samahlathi emvelo ukuba yilobucosololo eyibo, nokukhombisa amadwala kanye nezindonga ezigugulekile ezibonakala ziyingozi, kanye nechibi lengwenya ephilayo emgodini weshumi nentathu. Indlu yekilabhu, emamitheni angamakhulu ambalwa ukusuka iPalace inikeza izinto ezijwayelekile, okubalwa kuzo izinduku zokushaya igalofu, izindlu zokushintsha, amakhabethe okugcina impahla, indawo ethengisa ngotshwala nokudla. IZITOLO ZEPALACE Iqoqo lePalace linikeza uhlobo oluhle lwezinto zelogo kusukela ezingubeni kuya eziphweni. Ingubo zendawo yokuvakasha. ITigers Eye inikeza izihlobonhlobo ukuzikhethela emsebenzini wezandla wase-Afrika. Imisebenzi yezandla kanye nokwesifunda okwenziwe ngezandla. UKUNAKEKELWA KWEZIVAKASHI Idesika lokwamukela Umamukeli wethu unikeza usizo olophambili ekukuhleleleni nokukulungisela okokuzithokozisa kokubili ngaphakathi kwendawo nangaphandle. Umamukeli wethu angakusiza :ukukulungiselela uhambo lwakho - okokuhlala ingane yakho - izindawo ongazithanda - ezemidlalo - ukuthola ukuhamba ngelimozini ephambili - okokuthenga kanye nokwenziwayo okubalulekile - izinto zokubhala Umamukeli angakulungiselela izicelo zezivakashi zethu ukuthola ulwazi noma ukunakekelwa ezilimini ezahlukene zakwamanye amazwe kanti futhi lolusizo lutholakala amahora angu-24 ngosuku.
