Ihotela eliholayo lomhlaba
I-Palace yeLost City - ukwethula umcabango kumuntu kanye nekhaya lobungcweti nezokwakha. Imibhoshongo ekuyiyona ebonakalayo ejubalele yePalace iyakuqhweba uma nje ungena eSun City Resort. Impilo yasendle emangalisayo ebaziwe kanye nemiboko yezindlovu okuveza ubukhosi bendawo kuyisethulo sokuqala emasikweni ase-Afrika kanye nendabuko. Uma ushayela udlula ihlathi elomile lekholali nezihlahla ze-camel-foot kanti phesheya kwebhuloho eligxamalazele ichibi lamanzi usungenile-ke  ebukhazikhazini bePalace. Ekufikeni kwakho ekungeneni kumlindisivalo, wamukelwa umlindisivalo wePalace ogqoke izingubo zendabuko zaseNyakatho ne-Afrika. Iminyango emangalisayo ubude bayo obungamamitha ungu-8 esandilinga yePalace evulekela kwenhle indawo le eqheliswe ngokupendwe ngesandla endaweni engamamitha angu-16 ububanzi. Iphansi elimangalisayo nalo elihlotshiswe ngesandla, indawo yokwamukela ehlotshiswe ngomabula phezulu kanye nedesika lomlindisivalo kunezela ubuhle bendawo.

Ngaphambili nje kwendawo kukhona iGrand Staircase eholela kwiCrystal Court Restaurant, enophahla olophakeme namamitha angu-30. Ukukhanya kubonakala ngezibani ezilenga phezulu ezibenyezela okwezinhlayiya zamatshe ezihamba ngazinhlanu. Ngaphansi kwezibani kukhona okusasitsha okuthwelwe izindlovu zebhulonze. Okuncikene nodonga lweCrystal Court izinhla ezingamamitha angu-15 ezilingisa ubunjalo bezinto zemvelo; amaqabunga epalm, izinyawo zendlovu, uqalo kanye ne-cordage. Amafasitela ayingobela, angamamitha angu-7 ubude, akubukisa ngaphandle ukucinana kwendawo kwezingadi zeLost City.
 
Okubonakala ezingadini zeLost City ukuphakama kwengaphambili lePalace okubuyekezwe ubudondoshiya kwezinhla ngaphandle kweCrystal Court kanye nephansi elihle elifanelana  ngaphezu kwalo. Indlu ezinamakamelo amahlanu yeVilla del Pal ngaphandle.



I-Sun City ikhulisa imakethe ngesiko  -   ngokungeko esikweni


Uma ubheka okuholayo emsebenzini, izinto kanye nempoqo kuveza umsebenzi wesiko ngokusobala weSun City, ukuzithokozisa kanye nokokuzijabulisa okuphambili kanye kanye nezinga elingafaniswa nalutho e-Afrika sekuholele ekukhuleni kwamazwe ngamazwe ekuhwebelaneni kwezindawo zokuzijabulisa, kusho umqondisi wengxenye, izindawo zokuvakasha, weSun International, uPhilip George.


"Okuvamile akukhombisi umgomo wethu wokuthi thuthu ngegxathi elilodwa lokho okudlula okulindelwe amakilayente ethu kuwo wonke amazinga. Amaqembu abaphathi azinikele emaqenjini angawodwana kanye namakhulu, izinhlelo ezicatshangwayo zemigomo yesiko okuyikona okusebenza ngempela futhi osekusize ukwethusa amakilayente ethu amadala kanye namasha umhlaba wonke," kusho yena.

Kwengeza uGeorgas:"Ngaphandle kwalendawo yemihlangano engaphakathi kanye nokwakhiwa kwayo, indawo eyakhiwe kuyo nje iyodwa eyisipesheli iSun City isivele yayenza yaba indawo yomhlaba ongayikhetha."

Kwimaphakathi lehlathi lase-Afrika, indawo itholakala endaweni engamakhilomitha angu-180 kusuka edolobheni elihle kakhulu lezwe, okufinyeleleka kuyo ngomgwaqo kanye nezomoya, lapho umuntu efikela esikhumulweni sezindiza esisezingeni eliphezulu ngokugqama kwamazwe ngamazwe. Ekulungele ukungenisa izithunywa ezingu- 1 300 kumahotela angu-4 asezingeni eliphezulu, iSun City iyindawo ephephile, indawo enamasango kanti ukwengeza inikeza izinto okungezokuphumula.

Inamakhosi ompetha amabili egalofu, enye yazo okuhlala kuba khona umdlalo wegalofu ongefaniswe e-Afrika njalo ngonyaka kanti futhi uba ngophezulu ohleni ekuvezweni kowamazwe ngamazwe, iNedbank Million Dollar Golf Challenge.

Okumangalisayo okumaphakathi nolwandle, iValley of Waves, kanye nokuphakama kwayo okubenyezelisa ibhishi, kwakha ingemumva kwingqalasizinda yonke okubalwa kuyo neWater World kanye nohambo olunendawo yokuphumula.

"Okuphezulu ohleni okungawona amathuba agqamile ukukhombisa ukubaluleka kokuvezwa kwamasiko ezingeni lomhlaba, ukukwazi ukudayisa umbukiso omuhle kakhulu ngokubhensayo okudingwa kakhulu nabantu ngabodwana, ukuwenza kube ngokudayisekayo noma ithuluzi lokuzuza elihlala lingahambisani nalutho," kusho uGeorgas. Uyakuveza lokhu ukuthi Umgqumo!, konke okusha, abadlali, umculo wangaphakathi kanye nomdanso okuhle eSun City Theatre, kwenziwe ngendlela yokuthi kungasetshenziswa njengedawo yokuziphumulela ekuvezeni isiko ngokwedlulele.

"Kodwa ukuze uhlale wazi njengoba indawo yokuzikhethela e-Afrika kubavezi bamasiko, sibe nesiqiniseko eminyakeni eminingi ukuthi asithembeli ethubeni elilodwa elihle ngesikhathi. Ukukhula kwesidingo samazwe ngamazwe ukuhlangabezana nempilo yasendle yase-Afrika kungaphezu kokuba kuhlangatsheziwe eSun City,"

Ukuvezwa kwamasiko kungabandakanya nohla lwempilo ngamahectare angu-55 000 endawo yePilanesberg National Park ekungeneni nje endaweni yokuvakashs, ngokokuzijabulisa kanye nezamabhizinisi - noma ukwenza idili ube ubuka iBig Five ezintweni zase-Afrika - amahlathi athe ntshi empilweni yokwasendle. Izingadi ezimangalisayo zeSun City kulonyaka zibe nokugqama okufaniswa nokwezingadi zeBotanic, futhi zakha umsuka wezinkambo ezihlukene eziyisithupha zemvelo ezithatha izivakashi zisifake phakathi kwenhle indawo yemmvelo ye-Afrika. Okuhle kakhulu kulabo abakujabulelayo ukuba kwibhothani, ukubonakala okumangalisayo kwezitshalo ezinhle ngokumangalisayo.

Kuchaza uGeorgas: " Kungukubonakala okunjengalokhu, kanye nobungcweti kanye nokuqamba okumangalisayo kweqembu lokungaphakathi kwamasiko okungekona nje kuphela ukuthi bakhulile ngokosomabhizinisi, kodwa okuqinisekisa ubukhulu bebhizinisi ngokuphindiwe.

" Okukodwa okukhulu kwezinto eziphikisana nebhizinisi eliphindiwe kunoma iyiphi indawo eveza amasiko, i 'been-there-and-done-that', lapho kungekho okushintshayo ukulinga abaqambi ukubuyisela izithunywa zabo emumva. ESun City  ziyakhukhombisa lokhu futhi kuhlale kukhona njalo okuthile okuqanjiwe kanye nokusha ukunikeza amakilayente ethu, sibe futhi siqinisekisa ukuthi kukhona ukuvumelana ekusebenziseni izinto ezidingekayo, ezifana nomsebenzi wokunakekela, ukubhekelela ngokudla, usizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kanye nokudingekayo nje. Singanikeza noma yimuphi umgomo kanye nanoma yikuphi okungefaniswe - futhi ngokwanela okulingene."

UGeorgas uthi enye I-drawcard ubukhona beSun City ezingeni lamazwe ngamazwe. "ngesikhathi kusungulwa ukuvezwa kwamasiko aseNingizimu Afrika, igama eliqhamuka emqondweni ekuzungezeni kwamazwe ngamazwe iSun City. Iyindawo yokuphelela yokuzikhethela ngokwayo iyodwa. Ngalokho iyindawo enkulu futhi, isizinda sokuvezwa kwamasiko esisezingeni lomhlaba kungumklomelo omkhulu kumakilayente ethu amaningi, athola ukuthi iqiniso lokuvezwa kwamasiko kubanjelwe eSun City kunanikeza isiqiniseko sokuza kwabantu abaningi." Ibhuku elinesigqi elingaphambili ezincwadini eziza eminyakeni eyishumi ezayo lingukuhombisa okubalulekile kokudonsa kweSun City ebusweni bukuqhudelana okusha, kusho yena.

ISun City futhi iyisimo uqobo lwaso "sesitobhi esisodwa sesitolo samasiko", esinikeza ingqalasizinda yonke endaweni eyodwa - indawo yokulala, okokuzithokozisa, amadili, ezemidlalo kanye nokuchitha isizungu. Futhi eyanele futhi enayo yonke imaphlaisizinda samabhizinisi okokuqala nje, ukuthi indawo yonke yokuveza amasiko ingahlelwa futhi ukudwetshwa kwayo kanye nokuyikhombisa kungakhiqizwa kuyona indawo. Inazo zonke izinto engakaze zivezwe zobuchwepheshe obuphambili bomsebenzi, kusuka ekwakhiweni kwamagama kanye ne-stenography ekukhiqizweni kombhalo obhalwa ngemibala kanye nokukhonjiswa kwe-audio-visual.

"ISun City ingangenisa izithunywa ngesitayela esiphezulu, banikwe konke abakudingayo, babekwe ezosweni zasebhishi, ubathathe ubabeke kwi-safari, ubajabulise kwi-Superbowl noma ngaphandle ehlathini, bese ubanikeza impahla yohlobo lwe -state-of-the-art ngobuchwepheshe kanye nokuxhumana kongcweti bezemihlanagno. Amaqembu amancane abantu abangu-20, kuya ku-1 300 izithunywa, iSun City izokwenza umhlangano ube okhumbulekayo," kusho uGeorgas. Amahotele awu-4 anobucwebecwebe aseSun City awuhla olusuka kwiCabanas engase caleni lechibi kuya kwihotela leSun City elivusa izinzwa kanye nolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba lweCascades enhle kakhulu. Ewungqo shishilizi phakathi kwazo iPalace yeLost City .

Ihholo labaphathi zikhwama eSun City's Entertainment Centre indawo yaseNingizimu Afrika enezinhlobonhlobo zezinto neshintshashintshayo, elungele noma eyini kusukela emadilini kuya emibukisweni kuya emgqumeni wobusuku obungefaniswe. Inenkundla engasetshenziselwa izinti eziningi iyodwa ewu-1 250 square metre ububanzi. Inezindawo ezimbili ezihlukene enye kwenye ngezitebhisi ezintathu kanye nengadi yedwala engathi umlingo ubuyengezwe izindlulamithi ezilinganayo ezintathu ezakhiwe ngebhulonze eziqoshwa nguDanie de Jager. Indawo emaphansi ingu-740 square metres kanti emaphezulu ingu-510 square metres. Ihholo labanikazi zikhwama libonakala liyindilingana ngaphandle kobuso bedwala nophahla lukafayibe, olodala ukubukeka okungumdlalo.

Izindlu zemihlangano e-Entertainment Centre kanye naseLost City zinikeza abaphathi ukukhululeka, impahla esezingeni eliphezulu kanye nenye impahla engadingeka. Ukwengeza, ngaphakathi eSun city kuneminyango esezingeni eliphakeme yezemidlalo yeshashalazi ezokusiza ekuqambeni kanye nasekuhleleni okushintshashintshayo. Indawo enkulukazi yemihlangano iSun City Superbowl enendawo yokuhlala izithunywa ezingu-6 000. Lendawo evulekile engaphathi esandlu inezibani ezicolekile kanye nempahla yemisindo e-Afrika. Amadili aphakeme abantu abangu-1 300 bezokudla behlezi phansi ematafuleni angurawondi bangangeniswa.

IRoyal Ballroom etholakala eLost City ingahlala izithunywa ezingu-1 200 behlezi ngesitayela somhlangano noma behlezi ematafuleni angurawondi angahlala abantu abangu-1 000. Umnyango wezamadili uzokuhlobisela ngobuciko amatafula ngesitayela sesiko lendwangu kanye nokuhlelwa kwezimbali ngesitayela, kuncike emgomeni womuntu ngomuntu. IRoyal Ballroom ingaphinda futhi ihlukaniswe.

Indlu iPilanesberg  iyindlu engashintsheka ezindaweni zonke zemihlangano kanti futhi ingangenisa izithunywa ezisuka ku-1 400 zamadili engxubevange kuya ku-750 kwabeze esidlweni okuhlalwa phansi kuso. Indlu ihlukaniseke kabili kanye nezingxenye ezikwazi ukungenisa izithunywa ezingu-850 edilini lengxubevange noma izithunywa ezingu-220 ezihlezi ngesitayela somhlangano, noma izithunywa ezingu-420 ezize edilini.

Ezinye izindlu zemihlangano e-Entertainment Centre kubalwa kuzo i-Eagle, iHawk, i-Owl, iKestrel, iLynx, iCivet, iLeopard, iCheetah, iLion, i-Eland, iSable, i-Impala kanye neKudu. Lezi zindlu zingangenisa izithunywa eziphakathi kuka-16 kuya ku-64 kuncike emcimbini.

Ihotela iSun city inezindlu ezintathu zemihlangano ukuzikhethela kuzona. IBaobab ingahlukaniseka  futhi engangenisa izithunywa eziya ku-600 zomcimbi wengxubevange noma ezingu-350 ngesitayela somhlangano. Izindlu seAcacia neJacaranda iyinye ihlala izithunywa ezingu-30 ngesitayela sase-theatre noma ngesitayela sesidlo sakusidlwa esisezingeni. Izindlu zingahlanganiswa ukwakha indlu eyodwa yomhlangano engahlala izithunywa eziya ku-60.

IPalace yeLost City, enye yamahotela aholayo emhlabeni inezindlu ezine zokuhlangana. ICouncil Chamber eyakhiwe ngekhuni ehlala abangu-16 ntofontofo ezihlalweni okwazi ukukhululekisa izandla emaceleni etafulaneni elincane, ngaphansi kwesibani esilengayo esiyibhulonze. Izindlu zokuhlangana zeProtea kanye ne-Orchid iyinye ekala u-7m x 6.5m, Futhi engangenisa abeze esidlweni sakusihlwa abangu-30. Sezihlanganisiwe, lezi zindlu ezimbili ezinobucwebecwebe zinikeza indawo ewu-92 square metres.

IPalace yeLost City yavotelwa phakathi kwangcono emhlabeni amakhulu.

IMagazine Poll
IPalace yeLost City eSun city ivotelwe yaba ihotela lesithathu e-Afrika elingcono kunawo wonke futhi lesithupha emhlabeni, ekukhetheni obekuphethwe phakathi kwezinkulungwane zabafundi bokushicilelwa kwesemthethweni iDiner's Club iTravel & Leisure.

"Kuhlale njalo kuqinisa ukuthola ukwaziswa kwaloluhlobo, ikakhulukazi ekushicilelweni kwamazwe ngamazwe kanye futhi nalapho ukuncoma kwabafundi kungangcengwa," kusho umqondisi wezemisebenzi wesun City, uKurt Peter. " iPalace ihlale ibekwa phezulu ekuhlolweni kwezindawo zemihlaba, kanye nobulunga bayo bamahotela aholayo omhlaba kulibeka ezingeni elehlukile - indawo esiyilwela kanzima ukuyithola." Futhi okubalwayo emiphumeleni yokuvota kwe-Afrika kanye neMaphakathi leMpumalanga amahotela iCascade eseSun City eyavotelwa yaba eyeshumi nanhlanu kanye nehotela iSun City yaba eyamashumi amabili nanye.

Imibuzo eyenziwa abaqondisi beTravel & Leisure, ngokuhlanganyela neYankelovich Partners, yathunyelwa koteni lokuqala lonyaka u-1999 ezinkulungwaneni sabafundi, kucelwa imibono yabo ngamahotele, amahotele amakhulu namancane, amadolobha, iziqhingi, ezokuthutha ngomoya, ezokuvakasha ushaywa umoya, izinkampani eziqashisa ngezimoto, kanye namahleli bezokuvakasha. Zonke izimpendulo zaqoqwa ngokufihlekile ngabahleli beYankelovich Parteners.

Imiphumela yabekwa ngokwamazinga ezimpendulo kuthinta kakhulu izinto ezidingekayo. Abafundi babeka amahotela ngokwezinhla eziwu-5: izindlu noma indawo yokulala, ukunakekelwa, izinto ezitholakala khona noma okwenziwayo, indawo atholakala kuyo, kanye nokubiza kwawo. Lokhukubalwa kwabe sekuhlelwa, kudala imiphumela epheleleyo. Inombolo encane yezimpendulo yaba ebalulekile ukwenzelwa ukuthi ibalwe. Unyaka wesine manje selokhu kwenziwa loluphenyo kanti iPalace yabakhona kulolo luhla eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI LOKUXHUMANA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684




Umlando weLost City ngo-Gerald Allison
I-FAIA Wimberley Allison Tong & Goo "Kudala ngaphambi kokuqala kwempucuko yasentshonalanga, isizwe esasisuka eNyakatho ne-Afrika sasifuna iNingizimu saze sathola lesisihohoba esasifihlekile ekuqhekekeni okwadalwa ukuqhuma komlilo wakudala, isihohoba esibusiseke ngomhlabathi ovundile, umndlalo oxhaphakile kanye nezimpophomana zamanzi. Inyamazane kanye neMpala zazigalobha ngaphansi kwalezo zibhakabhaka, kanye nasemithinzini yamachibi, amahipho ayithe nje qaphu qaphu.

Laba bantu bakudala bakha umuzi wezindlu nje ezilula esihohobeni, base behlala ngesigqi kanye nezikhathi. Ngokuzwana kanye nezitshalo kanye nezilwane. Kwase kuba khona isomiso esikhulu, esasizobhubhisa abantu bakudala ukube izinkawu ezinobungani zazingaphonsi izithelo kanye namabheri ezihlahleni eziphakeme. Isizwe saphila futhi sanda. Amaplathinamu namadayimane atholakala esihohobeni, aletha ubugwili obukhulu. Emgedeni omangalisayo owaziwa ngehholo labaphathi zikhwama, yilapho abantu babegcina khona umcebo wabo ongaziwa futhi omningi. Ekugcineni, abantu besihohobe baba nomcebo owanele kanye nolwazi lokwakha idolobha elihle, elinomqhele wepalace yendlu yobukhosi.

Ipalace yakhiwa esiqhingini echibini ngasenhloko yesihohobe. Ubungcweti bokwakha obungefaniswe badonsa izindlela ezikhumbulekayo zemibhoshongo, izindlu kanye nezingobela ngezindle aeziyizinkulungwane kusukela ezindaweni ezizungezile zomhlaba wemvelo wase-Afrika. Izingwe ezengamaqhawe zaba abalindi abaqoshiwe, zinwebela emakhoneni ompheme ngaphezu kweminyango yepalace. Impophoma, iShrine yeSacred Monkey, zaba isethulo ekunwebeleni kwezinkawu ezasiza isizwe ukuthi siphile. Abadwebi abawaziyo umsebenzi wabi bahlobisa ipalace. Imivini ezungelezayo, amaqabunga esihlahla sepalm, izimbali zeprotea kanye nezepalm enkulu zazihlaliswa njalo etsheni. Izidalwa ezifana nendlovu, ibhubesi, ikudu, izinkawu, izinyoka kanye nezinyoni zazifanekiswa ngamatshana amibalabala, ezindongeni kanye nakokubaziweyo. Lemifanekiso yayitholakala phahleni, ezinsikeni kanye nasezibambelelweni zokuzivikela endlini; kanye nasembhoshongweni phezulu, ophakeme ngamamitha angu-70 ubude iKings Tower, owaphakama ngaphezu kwepalace, njengemalangabi okuhlaba umkhosi.

Iminyaka eminingi, labantu bahlala ngokuthula futhi bezijabulele edolobheni labo lobukhosi. Kwase kwathi ngelinye ilanga isibhakabhaka saba mnyama kwathi ukucinana kwathatha ubumnyama kwasonga  lokh kubukeka. Amandla agcwele okuzamazama komhlaba kwavuthuza isihohoba. Umhlaba ongaphansi kwedolobha wafukula ngamandla amakhulu. Amandla amakhulu afana nesandla sezimu elidiniwe kwabhidliza izakhiwo njengoba abantu babebheke ngengebhe ekuqhumeni kwetshe. Zazingekho izinkubela, ngoba abahlali babexwayisiwe yiGongo leSun Lion ukuthi bahlangane eRoyal Arena, eyayi ngathinta ukuzamazam komhlaba. Abanye abantu balibalekela idolobha, abaphindanga babuya. Kwabuya iNkosi nomndeni wayo kuphela abathola ukuthi uma bebuya amathumbu omhlaba ayeseshintshile ama ngezinye izindlela.  Iziphethu zabhoboka ngasemaceleni entaba,  kanye nangaphansi kwaqhumaka amanzi ngemisele emikhulu ngaphezulu okwaba amachibi lapaho abantu babebhukuda khona uma bethanda. Ukuzamazama komhlaba kwadala uxhaxha lwezimpophomanyana kanye nezindlela zamanzi. Ipalace, ngemisuka yayo eyayithe nsthi amatsheni, yasinda nakho konke okwayo kodumo. Iminyaka, umndeni wasebukhosini  wakha izindlu zayo zobukhosi, kodwa emva kokufa kwelunga lokuigcina ipalace yakhula ngokushesha yaphinda futhi yacasha ekucinaneni kobucwebe.

Idolobha lalahleka, kwase kwasala umlando oxoxwayo wakudala ogabiselayo ngobuhle balo elaliyibo. Sekucishe kube iminyaka eyizinkulungwane ezintathu kwazamazama umhlaba, eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlula  ezinkulungwanei ezimbili zeminyaka, umkhawulezo wabacwaningi bezinto zasendulo bayelamela lencithakalo. Isihohoba sasemandulo kanye neLost City kwaba amagama umholi wabacwaningi alinika izinto azithola ekucwaningeni kwabo. Amagama angampela ePalace kanye nehholo labaphathi zikhwama ayacaca manje uma sekucwaningwa izinto, aqanjwa nge-Annals of the City,  akuficwanga ngesikhathi sokumbululwa kwezinto, njengoba iqembu labacwaningi bezinto zasendulo behlela imisebenzi yokubuyisela izinto ababezitholile esimweni sazo njengoba zazinjalo. Namhlanje, iPalace iyacwebezela futhi ekhanda lesihohoba, iyakhazimula futhi inhle ngendlela emanganlisayo ngaphezu kwesibuko esidalwa amanzi. Iphinde futhi, njengoba ibuyekezwe imimoya yasemandulo eyigadile ukubonakala kwayo okubheke phansi - ingwe, indlovu kanye nekudu - injabulo iyoba yilokho emiselwe khona yawo wonke umuntu obeka unyawo lwakhe ngaphezu komlingo wesihohoba, noma ohlamba emanzini aso. Injabulo iyoba nkulu kulabo abakhwela ekucwazimuleni kwePalace, noma abafuna umcebo ungashiwo ekushoneni kwemihume yeHall of Treasure".



Ukuvezwa kwamaqiniso ahehayo kanye nezibalo ezithusayo ngeLost City

ILost City eseSun City ingenye yezindawo ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo futhi  engumkhuba wokuheha abavakashi emhlabeni.

Indawo yokuvakasha, yavulwa ngo-December ka-1992, idala kabusha imfihlakalo kanye nezimanagliso zakudala, impucuko yakudala yendawo engangamahectare angu-25 enokucinana kwezinto ngokwedlulele, echusha ngendawo enhle ngokumangalisayo enezindawana zamanzi kanye nezindawo eziyingozi kwiValley of Waves, okungenkulu kunawo wonke futhi enokuziqambela kwayo yodwa okungakaze kube khona. ILost City ibiza izigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi ( ngokwase-US ibiza izigidi ezingu-280 zamadola noma idigi ezingu-170 zamaphawundi) ukuyakha. Umklamo waqedwa ezinyangeni ezingu-28 nje kuphela, okuyisikhathi esincane kakhulu salebinza elibukhuni kangaka. UKWAKHIWA KWELOST CITY Umhlaba owasuswa endaweni ulingana nama-cubic metres angu-1 750 000 Idwala elaqhunyiswa lilingana nama-cubic meteres angu-85 000 Inani lezitini ezasetshenziswa zilingana nezigi ezingu-30 Inani lendawo isiyonke enomata ilingana nama-square metres angu-50 000 Indawi isiyonke enomabula ilingana nama-square metres angu-5 650 Indawo isiyonke ependiwe ilingana nama-square metres angu-425 000 Indawo isiyonke eno-murals ilingana nama-square metres angu-3 400 Indawo engaphandle yamachibi namachitshana lingana nama-square metres angu-70 500 Ubude bamapayipi afakwa alingana namamitha angu-150 000 UKWAKHIWA KWEPALACE KANYE NEVALLEY OF WAVES Ngesikhathi esimaphakathi nokwakhiwa, cishe abantu abangu-5 000 babesebenza kulomklamo. Ngonyaka wokuqala wokwakha, isibalo cishe saba yizitini  eziyisigidi esisodwa sasindlalwa phansi ababelki besitini abangu-200 inyanga iyodwa. Cishe izingcezu ezingu-15 000 ezazenziwa ngamabomu zazisetshenziselwa.
 
Ukwakha ubuphandle bobuso bangaphambili bePalace. Kukhona amamitha angu-75 000 emibhobho kagesi ePalace kanye cishe nokukhanya kwezibani okungu-6 500. Ikamelo lokungena ebukhosini lenophahla oluphakeme ngamamith angu-25 ngaphezu kwephansi kanye namamitha angu-16 ububanzi. Ukwakhiwa kwayo kwaba yinselela enkulukazi, okufana nophahla lweCrystal Court engamamith angu-29 ukuphakama, okufanele luxhase izinkundla ezingu-5 zendlu ngaphezu kwayo. Umbhoshongo omude kunayo yonke imibhoshongo eyishumu yePalace ungamamitha angu-70. Yonke iminyango ewu-338 yezindlu zokulala yethimba isacezu lwendilinga. Iminyango emide kunayo yonke epalace iphakeme ngamamitha angu-8. UKUHLELWA KWEPALACE NGAPHAKATHI Izinhlelo zangaphakathi zepalace zaqanjwa uTrisha Wilson weWilson & Associates, iDallas, iTexas. Eduze kwezinto zonke zePalace zazenziwa ngokwesiko. Ngamaphesenti angu-85 azo zonke izinto zangaphakathi zasuselwa khon eNingizimu Afrika.

EPalace, okokuqala eNingizimu Afrka, impahla eyenziwe ngezandla yasetshenziswa kuzo zonke izindawo zomphakathi kanye nasezindlini zezivakashi zehotela. Akukho neyodwa indwangu noma omata oyosesthenziswa futhi, noma kuphi. Zonke lezinto zazakhiwela  futhi zahlotshiselwa iPalace yon ayodwa kuphela. Ukupendwa kophahla lwegumbi lokungena ebukhosini kwakhiwa kwafana nendlela okopendwe ngayo iMichelangelo epende iSistine Chapel eseRome. Ukwavezwa kwendawo yaseAfrika, iphila nezilwane kanye nezinyoni, kwathatha cishe amahora angu-5 000 ukuthi iphele. Isibani esikhanyisa eCrystal Court singaphezu kwamamitha angu-5 ububanzi, ngokufola okunamamith angu-4,2. Imiboko eyisithupha yezindlovu, eme ngemibili ngaphezu kweTusk Lounge Bar, ingamamith angu-5,6 ukuphakama, isisindo singama-tons angu-2, kanti futhi yakhiwa ngezingcezu ezine zokhulu lohlobo lweIndonesian Square, olusinda ngaphezu kwe-ivory. ISIZINDA SOKUZITHOKOZISA  Isizinda sokuzithokozisa siphindaphindiwe ngosayizi kanti futhi siphinde sahlelwa ngu-Henry Conversano & Associates, esizwa ngu-Paul Steelman. IBridge of Time, ekuholela esizindeni sokuzithokozisa kuya eValley of Waves, sinyakaza ngangamamilimitha angu-2 uma intaba yomlilo iqhuma ngaphansi kwebhuloho. Ikhompuyutha enezinhlelo ezihlelwe ukuhlela nokubhekela okungenziwa ukubonakala komsindo nokuzwakala kwawo lokho okudala ukuqhuma okulingisayo. Ingwe engamamitha angu-7,6 ukuphakama, amakhanda amabili angamamitha angu-9 namamitha angu-6, kanye nengwe  egogobele engamamitha angu-5,4 ubude kanye nenkawu engamamitha angu-4 kufanekisiwe ebusweni bedwala lesizinda sokuzithokozisa esibhekene neValley of Waves. Kukhona izihlahla zepalm ezingu-168 ngaphakathi esizindeni sokuzithokozisa. Iziqu zazo zakhiwe ngamashubhu engilazi kafayibe asongwe ngamagxolo futhi zihluma ngempela, amaqabunga alondoloziwe. Indlela esabisi edalwa ufayibha umboza uphahla lwehholo lamaphathi zikhwama. Lesisibhakabhaka sasebusuku singesikhulu kunazo zonke esilungisiwe eNingizimu Afrika.

ILOST CITY JUNGLE Ukucinana kweLost City kwakhiwa umhleli wezindawo uPatrick Watson kanye noDave Kirby weTop Turf Gardens. Ukucinana kuthatha amahectare angu-25 kanti futhi kubiza izigidi ezingu-25 zamarandi (ezingu-8 zamadola noma ezingu-5 zamaphawondi). Izitshalo ezingaphezu kuka-1 600 000, izihlahla, imishana emincane kanye nokumboze phansi kutshaliwe. Kukhona izinhlobo zezinto ezitshaliwe ezingu-3 200. Amaphesenti angu-75 ezitshalo awezendabuko zaseNingizimu Afrika. Kukhona izihlahla ezingaphezulu kuka-4 00 esezikhule ngokwanele ezatshalwa. Ihlathi elicinene lilinganisa imvelo, ngesihlahla sohlobo lwekhanophi eside ngamamitha angu-40, ezilandela sona zinguhhafu walobobude kanye nezitshalo eziphansi emhlabathini. Ibaobabs enkulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni ukutshalo isizitholele ikhaya layo elisha eLost City. Izitshalo ezinkulu kunazo zonke ezinesisindo esingamathani ayela ku-75 kanti futhi ezineziqu ezibanzi okuya emamitheni angu-6. Ihlathi lebaobab lakhiwe ngezihlahla ezingu-380 esezivuthiwe, ezinye zazo sezineminyaka engamakhulu ambalwa ubudala. Imbewu kanye nezitshalo okuqhamuka e-Australia, eZimbabwe, eComores, eMozambique kanye naseMadagascar. IKHOZI YEGALOFU YASELOST CITY Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili, par 72 ILost City yakhiwa ngokubiza okuyizigidi ezingu-15 zamarandi (ezingu-5 zamadola noma ezingu-3 zamaphawondi). Ikhozi ithatha indawo engangamahectare angaphezulu kuka-100 kanti futhi inezindawo zamanzi ezithatha ama-square metres angu-28 000. Ikhozi idinga ukuchelelwa ngamanzi angama-cubic metres angu-2 300 ngosuku, Imbobo iyodwa ikhombisa iphakathi lezihlahla ezintathu nezihlahla ezine, okunikeza ukukhululeka okukhulu komdlali.Okuluhlaza kweshiyagalolunye nokweshumi nesishiyagalombili kuphela ngaphambi kwendle yekilabhu. Zibalelwa ezinkulungwaneni ezingu-12 izibukeli ezingahlala zizungeze lobuluhlaza obubili. Imigodi wesishiyagalombili, weshumi nanye, weshumi nantathu kanye noweshumi naneyonke ikhombisa izihlahla ezikhulile ekuphakameni okuphakathi kwamamitha angu-15 nangu-25 ngaphezu kwendawo ephansi. Umgodi weshumi nantathu uyi-par 3 namanzi akhombisa ukuvikeleka kwesokunxele ngaphambili kobuluhlaza. Izingwenya eziphilayo zeNile zihlala lapho.

IVALLEY OF WAVES Lokhu ukuhlangana okukhulukazi kwamanzi kanye nepaki yamanzi okwake kwakhiwa endaweni eyodwa, noma akuphi emhlabeni. ILazy River ugonciza ngamamitha angu-500, uthwele amalitha ayizigidi ezimbili zamanzi. Ichibi iRoaling Lagoon lithwele amalitha ayizigidi eziyisishiyagalombili zamanzi kanye nendawo enhle yokubhukuda engamamitha angu-1,8 isidaliwe, ihamba amakhilomitha angu-35 ngehora kusuka odongeni lwedamu kuya endaweni eyakhiwe kahle eyibhishi elinesihlabathi elingamamitha angu-120 ubukude. Kukhona imichachazi engu-13 emikhulu, izimpophoma ezingu-20, imifula yezintaba engu-2 kanye nezindawo azingu-5 ezimanzi eLost City ezingadini ezicinene. Amanzi athwelwe izindawo zokuzithokozisa, izindawo ezihlotshisiwe kanye namachibi okubhukuda angamalitha ayizigidi ezingu-23. Umchachazo omkhulukazi owenziwe kweseyake yakhiwa, ekuhlanganisweni kwesisindo samanzi nokuphakama, umchachazo iGrotto, oseduze kwamachibi okubhukuda eRoyal Baths. Ungamamitha angu-11,5 ukuphakama nangu-12 ububanzi, futhi aphophoma komfutho ongangama-cubic metres angu-1 200 ngehora. Ukwengeza ngedamu elingama-megalitre angu-10 elakhiwelwa ukunikeza amanzi ekwakhiweni kanye nasekufakeleni kwamanzi ezingadini. Olayini bokufakela ababili abasha bafakiwe uhulumeni kusuka edamini iVaal kuya eSun City. Lokhu kunikeza isiqiniseko sokungena kwamanzi ukuhlangabezana nezigidi ezilishumi zamalitha ngosuku adingwa yiLost City.
