Abahlangana nohlobo lweLost City
Izivakashi zeSun City zingajabulela ukubuka umdlalo okwenziwe kwaba okomuntu ePilanesberg National Park eseduze anagamahetare angu-55 000.

IGametrackers, etholakala ehotela eSun City, manje inikeza izinto eziningana ukuzikhetela kubavakashi kanye nasethandeni izinto zasendle. Uma ukujabula kwakho kulele ekufuneni  "iBig 5" kusho ukuthi iSafari izokuthinta (ukushayela kwasebusuku nakho kuyatholakala). Ngokwezigigaba nangokucophelela iRhino Hiking Trail izokujabulisa. Kulabo abafuna injabulo, zama iBalloon Safari kanti kulabo ababambelele emasikweni, thatha uhambo lomuzi wendawo wamasiko. Ukugcizelela kweSafari ukubeka iBig 5. Abagadi abaqeqeshiwe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zithola I-African Safari yangampela ekhwelwa abantu abangu-6 iLandvruiser. Izivakashi zingabuka ubhejane ubhavumula odakeni ezibhuquza kulo olupholile kanye nezindlove eziyizinkunzi zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaceni kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ufakazi ozithulele ubukela ibhubesi libulala, njengoba nokuncanyana kuzidlela kungasoli ngozi endaweni yokuqhuma komlilo. Kwela izintaba, kude kusuka kwiKadding Crowd, ungabuka umhlambi wezinyathi njengoba zisaxakekile nje ukuphila zingagadiwe zikhululekile. AmaLandcruisers enziwe aba nezimfanela ezifudumele nezingubo zokulala kulabo abagodolayo,  okuvunguza ohambweni lwasebusuku. Zizwele ukuhamba ebusuku kwempilo yasendle lapho izingwe zibonakala ngaphansi kokukhanya kwenyanga yendawo eyomile.

Uma ufisa ukubuka umdlalo othize, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izokuthinta kulezozigigaba zezivakashi. Funa iNyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo ngaphakathi eLatsatsing Game Park. Umgadi uzokhombisa ulwazi lwakhe lwalezizidalwa - zizwele kanye ngalendalo emangalisayo yaseAfrika. Ekuseni kakhulu, ukuqhuma kwemibala kuqhamuka ngale kokuphuma kwelanga. Abagibeli bakhwela iHot Air Balloon, jabulela iwayini elizoyizayo laseNingizimu Afrika ngaphambi kokubuka ubungako obugcwele bepilanesberg National Park. Uma uhlala phansi ufikela endaweni yokuphumula lapho kusevwa khona ukudla kwasekuseni. ISun City izungezwe imishini yamasiko ahlukene. Jabulela izindaba zendabuko zesizwe, ohambweni lwamasiko lomuzi iLedig. Uhambo luvakashisa kwi-"shanti" yendawo, isikole sezokutshala, amahhovisi esizwe kanye nokokugcina ingazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele eshibhini lakhona. Lokhu nje ubumnandi bezinto ongazothola. Kukhona namanye amasafari atholakalayo okubalwa kuwo nokudla kwasekuseni kwasehlathini kanye nohambo lokushona kwelanga. Shayela isizinda sethu esiphakathi ukubekisa kulenombolo yocingo (011) 780 7800 ngohambo lwasendle. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Amaqiniso ayishumi nanhlanu anqobayo ngobuhle ngLost City
ILost city ibiza izigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi. Umsebenzi waqala ngo-August ka-1990, wathatha nje kuphela izinyanga ezingu-28. ILost City yavulwa ngoDecember ka-1992. Ihostela elibiza izigidi ezingu-4 zamarandi lakhiwa ukuhla abasebenzi endaweni yesakhiwo. Kiwmaphakathi nomsebenzi wokwakha, kwakukhona abantu abalinganiselwa ku-5 000 emsebenzini, kubalwa nabasebenzi abasuka ezinkontilekeni ezingu-100. Inani likakhonkolo elinama-cubic metres angu-4 000 lalibekwa zinyanga zonke. Ukwakha ipalace kwadinga amathani angu-3 300 ansimbi ukuqinisa izinti, ezingamakhilomitha angu-2 900 ubude. Izitini ezingu-2 000 zazibekwa ababeki bezitini. Okhileni abawu-9 bemibhoshongo babesethsenziswa kanye kanye. IPalace inemibombo engangamakhilomintha angu-12 yezilungiso moya, amakhilomitha angu-500 owaya bakagesi kanye nezikhanyiso ezingu-6 500. Endlwananeni yeNkosi yePalace kukhona izinto ezakhiwe ngezandla zamasiko ezingu-800, kubalwa kuzo izindwangu nomata. Ipalace yadinga omata ongamasquare metres angu-15 000 bendlalwa. Ehholo labaphathi zikhwama kukhona izimbali ezisezitsheni zokhuni ezalandwa eBali. Kukhona izihlahla zepalm ezingu-168 ehholo labaphathi zikhwama. Indawo ecinene yaseLost City ineziteshi zokuchelela ezingu-300, ezinganyelwe ngaphezulu izinhlokwana ezingu-9 000, izinhlokwana ezichelelayo ezingu-2 500, kanye nezilungiso moya ezingu-10 ezishukumisa umoya. Kukhona ipayipi lokuchelela elingamakhilomitha angu-30 endaweni yeLost City.



Okungokwakho wedwa nje okuhle kakhulu
Ihotela elihle ngokumanaglisayo iPalace, elinokomlando, lakhiwelwa iNkosi ngokwempucuko yasemandulo lokho okwenza lesihosho esihle kube ikhaya labo kuze kube badicilelwa phansi ukuzamazamza komhlaba. Manje "sekubuyiselwe" endaweni yakhokho endala yodumo, iPalace inikeza izivakashi ukunakekelwa kobukhosi. 

IPalace ingukubukeka okudonsayo kokuningi. Kusukela ekubenikhona kwemiboko yendlovu kuya ekubukekeni kwenhle ibhulonze kanye nezinhlayiya zamatshe ezikubeka emhlabeni wamaphupho ocinene ubuhle okuchaphakela ebuhleni bephansi elinamathayela kanye nophahla olwenziwe. Bonke lobu buhle bufanelene nobeNkosi.

Indlu ngayinye kulezi ezingu-338 ezinobucwebecwebe kanye nokuphakathi kunikeza ukunakakelwa kwasebukhosini nokubukeka kwezinto ngaphandle okumangalisayo ngaphezu kwamanzi kanye nokucinana. Okungaphakathi ifenisha eyenziwe ngezandla ekhombisa izinhlobo zonke zemithi emilayo yase-Afrika. Ukuthintwa ngesandla kukhonjiswa kuyon ayonke ifenisha.

Izivakashi zasehotela iPalace zingahlamba echibini elikhulu noma zizihambele phansi emachibini lobukhosi aseValley of Waves. Zijabulele ingxubevange emaceleni echibi noma eTas Bar emangalisayo. Ukudla kwehla esiphundu endaweni yakho enobunyoninco ngokuphekea iCrystal Court noma Villa Del Pallazzo lapho ikhishi elicolekile  kuyilo lobuciko.

IPalace yeLost City - Ihotela eliholayo emhlabeni.



Umlando weSun City kanye neLost City
ISun City indawo yokuvakasha eseNingizimu neAfrika edume kakhulu futhi enobucwebecwebe; nangempela igama layo selibe elifaniswa nenhlalo enhle, injabulo kanye nokuzithokozisa okumtoti. Itholakala kumakhilomitha angu-187 entshonalanga ayeGoli, iSun City inamahotela amane amahle kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo, ezokuzithokozisa, okwangempela kokuzithokozisa kanye nemiqhudelwano. Ingenye yezindawo zokuvakasha ezimbalwa emhlabeni enomqhudelwano wemigodi emibili yeshumi nesishiyagalombili yekhozi yegalofu. Indawo futhi ixhasa nezinye izindawo zaseningizimu ne-Afrika ezinezinto ezinhle zokuzithokozisa. ILost City neSun City kuyizigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi  zomhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika  okhimbisa amahlathi amahle kanye namachibi amangalisayo. IPalace yeLost City ingenye yamahotela amahle ngendlela emangalisayo emhlabeni. ISun City yatholwa umthandi wezenjabulo  waseNingizimu Afrika uSol Kerzner. Maphakathi nonyaka ka-1970 waba nomqondo wokwakha indawo yokuvakasha eyikhasino ewubucwebecwebe maphakathi nehlathi laseAfrika. Umsebenzi waqala ngojulayi mhlaka-15, ngo-1978 kanti indawo yavulwa ngomhlaka-7 kuDecember ngo-1979. Ngalesosikhathi indawo eyayibonakala igqamile kwakuyizindlu ezingu-340 zehotela iSun City kanye nekhozi yegalofu yemiqhudelwano emikhulu iGary Player. Ikhozi yegalofu manje iyona edumile - futhi esebenza kakhulu - e-Afrika. Ezinye izinto kwakuyichibi lokubhukuda elingamamitha angu-55, ichibi elakhiwe ngumuntu lemidlalo yamanzi, inkundla yebhola lomphebezo kanye nekhasino enamakhulu emishini yokudlala kanye namatafula okugembula angu-50. Indawo yokuqala yabiza ngaphezu kuka-R1.18 billion, izigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi zachithwa kwakhiwa iLost City. Okuxhuma iLost City iPilanesberg National Park, indawo engangamahectare angu-55 000 eyavulwa ngosuku olongemva kokuba indawo yamukele izivakashi zayo zokuqala. Emva nje kwesonto ikhethini lavuleka eExtravaganza Theatre knti iNingizimu Afrika yaziswa ngokwakwenzeka kuleyondawo. Umculi wokuqala owadlala kulenkudla kwaba nguCliff Richard. ISun City yaba indawo enempumelelo ngangokuthi yanwetshwa ngokushesha. Emva konyaka ngqo iSun City ivuliwe, amagumbi angu-284 eSun City Cabanas ayesenikeza indawo yokulala imindeni. Selokhu iSun City yavulwa, imidlao emikhulu idlalwa njalo khona. Mhlambe omukhulu nodume kunayo yonke iNedbank Million Dollar Challenge eyatholakala ngo-1980. Kungumdlalo unemali futhi uhluke kunayo yonke. Ngangoba umema abadlali abaphezulu ukuthi baqhudelane kumklomelo wokuqala oyisigidi samadola (ase-US). USteve Ballesteros, uDavid Frost, uNick Price kanye noBernard Langer bangabanye babadlali begalofu asebake bawuwina lomdlalo weMillion Dolla Challenge.

Phakathi no-1981 iSun City yathola inkundla yokuzithojkozisa ebiza izigidi azingu-30 zamarandi. Kulolophahla olulodwa kwakukhona izindawo zokuthengisa ngokudla, amabhayisikobho, izinkundla zemidlalo, amagumbi emihlangano kanye neSyuperbowl engahlala abantu abangu-6 000 enohlobo lomsindo lwe-state-of-the-art. UFrank Sinatra wavula iSuperbowl ngoJulayi mhlaka-24 ka-1981. AmaSuperstar afana noRod Stewart, Elton John, Wet Wet Wet kanye noJoe Cocker sebeka badlala lapho kanye neminye imidlao eminingana yesibhakela yomhlaba seyawinwa eSuperbowl. Ngo-1992 inkundla yokuqala yokuzithokozisa yaphindaphindwa ngobukhulu ngokunezezelwa kweholo labaphathi zikhwama, okuyinxenye yeLost City. Ingaphandle libonakala sengathi lakhiwe ngaphandle kwetshe eliphilayo, lambozwa ngemifanekiso yezilwane zaseAfrika. Okubanakala kakhulu kwingaphandle lesakhiwo umfanekiso omkhulu wengwe. Ihholo labaphathi bezikhwama likhombisa imisindo imishini ye state-of-the-art yokudlala kanye nemidlalo yevideo yesimanje kanye nokilingisayo, okuhambisana nemibukiso ekhinjiswa emaceleni ngamanani asezingeni eliphezulu. Kukhona futhi namabhayisikobho amaningana, izindawo zokuthengisa ukudla kanye nezitolo, kuzona zozimbili lezizindawo ihholo labaphathi bezikhwama kanye nenkundla yezokuzithokozisa, manje sezihlelwe kabusha futhi zaqanjwa nge-The Jungle Casino. UDecember ka-1984 wabona ukuvulwa kwezindlu ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo ezingu-242 zehotela iCascades. ICascades, eyabiza izigidi ezingu-50 zamarandi ukwakhiwa, ithatha indawo engangamahectare amane ezingadi zethrophikhani. Kukhona izindawo zamanzi ezingama-square metres angu-7 740, okubalwa kuwona imichachazo  engu-12 kanye nezimpophoma. Ubuningi bempilo yezinyoni ezingadini sekwenze kwaba okunye kwezinto ezihehayo eSun City. NgoJanuwari ka-1986, imonorail yokuqala yaseNingizimu Afrika - iSkytrain - yaqala ukusebenza. Izinqola zayo ezintathu iyodwa ethwala abagibeli abangu-100 futhi ihamba phakathi kwepaki yezimoto yeSun City kanye nenkundla yokuzithokozisa.

ISun City idume ngemiklomelo yayo emikhulu ekhokhwa imishini yayo yokudlala. Umklomelo othandwa kakhulu kulendawo iDream Machine yabunjwa ngo-1987 futhi exhumana nezinye izindawo eziningana. Umklomelo unenani lokuqala eliyizigidi ezimbili zamarandi kodwa yaphindwa yabunjwa ngo-1995 futhi manje isinenani eliqala esigidini esisodwa samarandi futhi elikhuphukayo ngocezo olulodwa olufakiwe ebange lemishini exhunyiwe. IMillion Mnia futhi nayo ingomunye umklomelo oqhubekayo  uxhunyiwe ongakaze ukhokhe ngaphansi kwesigidi samarandi. IGumbi lemazwe ngamazwe elidumileliyindlu enhle kakhulu lamakilabhu adlalayo elinekhasino yangasese nenhle ngokwedlulele eSun City. Ubulunga bunqunyelwe labo kuphela abadlali bammatafula abaphezulu abathanda ukudlalela iziteki ezinkulu. Ngo-1990 ukwakhiwa kwaqalangomzamo omkhulu kakhulu elandweni weSun City - iLost City. Lomhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika uncike esigqini sempucuko eyalahleka eseyitholakele ekucinaneni kweValley of Waves. Njengoba izivakashi zididekile ekucinaneni zithola insalela yokwasalayo kwedolobha lakudala kanye nomcebo wezinto zokuzijabulisa. Lendawo ecinene ingenkulu kunazo zonke esezake zenziwa umuntu, enezihlahla ezingaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa nengxenye kanye nezitshalo. Maphakathi lalendawo kukhona ihlathi elicinene. Imisele yamanzi iguduza phakathi kwalokhu kucinana, isukela ezimpophomeni ezincanyana kuya kwezinkulu. IValley of Waves iyipaki yamanzi enkulu kakhulu emhlabeni kwezisezingeni eliphezulu, enezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, amachibi okubhukuda, izinkambo ezipholile kanye neRoaring Lagoon, lapho amadlali bamanzi bedlala imikhakha engamamitha amabili.

Inhliziyo yeLost City iPalace, ihotela elinamagumbi angu-338 eyabiza izigidi ezingu-400 ukuyakha. Ubuciko obungathi amaphupho bokwakhiwa kwezakhiwo kwahlotshiswa ngemifanekiso yezilwane zasendle. Igumbi ngalinye linendawo eyanele futhi linempahla yalo lodwa esezingeni eliphezulu. Ukunakekelwa nezinto ezitholakala khone zihambisana nezinga lesakhiwo.

Ngo-1993 iLost City Golf Course yavulwa eSun City. Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili, par 72 usebenzisa ubuhle bemvelo bePilanesberg Mountains ezizungeze iSun City. Izingwenya zinbukela abadlalai zisemachibini emgodini weshumi nantathu. UGary Player owahlela lekhozi wathi, "Ayikho eminye imigodi yeshumi nesishiyagalombili emhalbeni engadluala eyekhozi yaseLost City ngakho konke onakho". Selokhu iLost City yavulwa ngoDecember ka-1992, izivakashi zilokho zilangazelela ukuza eSun city ngamanani acishe abe izigidi ezintathu ngonyaka. Uhlelo lwezentuthuko lweSun international belubheke ekwakhiweni kabusha kwamahotela aseSun City. Ihotela iSun City selakhiwe kabusha ngenani eliyizigidi ezingu-132 zamarandi futhi elikunikeze ukubukeka ukusha nobulona obusha. Ezinye futhi izigidi ezingu-16 nengxenye zamarandi zichithelwe kwezinye izindawo zehotela iCascades, kanti ukunwetshwa nokwakhiwa kabusha kwaqedwa eCabanas ekwanza ikhuphuke ngenani lezindlu zibe ngu-380. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTH XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Uzamcolo wesitayela kanye Nobuhle obubukekayo - iCascades
Ukuphophoma kwamanzi agijima ehlathini lethrophikana kungumsuka weCascades - elinye lamahotele ahlelwe kahle emva kwamanye amahotela ase-Africa's Kingdom of Pleasure - iSun City.

ICascades inendawo yezivakashi yangasese neyomuntu ngayedwana, kusukela emagunjini ahlelwe kahle kanye nezindawo zokwamukela ukuya ezingadini ezihlelwe ngethrophikana ngobuhle. IPeninsula Restaurant kanye neLounge, nephansi lazo lomabula weVerona kanye nomata we-woven kanye nokubukeka kwemibala yezinyoni zindiza phezu kwezihlahla zethrophikana. Izindonga zihlotshiswe ngokwegolide, izihlalo zintofontofo nangokwombala osakhilimu kanye nokuxhophayo okulenga emawindini. Imaphakathi legumbi linganyelwe itafula lokhuni elakhiwe ngesandla ngendlela enhle ngokumangalisayo elinembali engenazimpande etshaliwe kulo phakathi nendawo. Izimbali nazo zinikeza ukuheha kweLounge, lapho izindonga zilenga imidwebo yamanzi emihle. Ugqozi ngemumva komhlobiso olukaTrisha Wilson wenkampani yaseMelika yabadwebi bangaphakathi, iWilson & Associates, owahlobisa futhi iPalace yeLost City. Wabuye futhi wathatha lokukumangalisa kwezingadi wakungenisa emagunjini nasemakamelweni, ngokhuni nombala woju oludala, izindonga nemithunzana yegolide noma I-buttercup, i-buutercup eningana kanye nerusset komata kanye nokokumboza izihlalo kanye nokokumboza imibhede okunezimbali zethriphikana kanye nezamakhasi. Ezindlini ezinobucwebe, izindonga zona zinikezwe upende ophambili wokufudumele okusagolide, kuthi ezindlini ezincane umhlobiso ugcizelela emvelweni yokuluhlaza noku-ivories, kwabonakala kokuluhlaza okusasibhakabhaka. Izindlu zehotela ezingu-243 zinikeza ukuzikhethela ezindlini eziningi kanye nokuhambisana nazo. Okungenzeka kube okungajwayelekile nokwangasese, isibonelo, ngaphezu kokwengadi? Okwaqala kwenzelwa ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu ngayedwana kukaSol Kerzner, kunechibi lakho lokubhukuda kanye nejacuzzi endaweni yakho kodwa. Noma, kwalowomuzwa ophezulu womhlaba, kukhona indlu evaliwe. Kukhona ikheshi elikuthatha likubeke lapho ufuna ukuya khona. Izipho zokwamukela kubalwa kuzo amasiliphazi akhe, izimbali, ishampeni kanye nobhasikidi ogcwele izithelo (ithuba elingcono kakhulu ukuzama isithelo sekiwi esimnandi ngendlela emangalisayo kanye nogilayindeni, futhi owaziwa njengesithelo i-passion!).

Ezinye izinti ehotela iCascades kubalwa kuzo iVistas Bar ebhekene nezingadi, indawo ethengisa ngokudla okungajwayelekile iGrotto ngaphansi kwezimpophoma kanye nesitolo sekhofi iBrazillian esiseduze kwendawo evulekile. Ngasecaleni elingaseMpumalanga, kukhona indawo evulekile evumela izivakashi ukuthi zizihlalele ngaphandle kwezindlu zazo engadini iPeacock, zibuka izinyoni ezinhle njengoba zizipha ukudla ngesikhathi zilalele amanzi njengoba zizidansela ngaphezu kwamanzi aseduzane. Ikhishi elimangalisayo liyatholakala khona eCascades. Izivakashi zaseCascades zidla ngokukhanyiselwa ikhandlela ePeninsula Resataurant lapho izithako ezintsha zihalalisela ulinga kokudala okulungiswe ngokuziqhenya iqembu labapheki laseInternational. Amanani angangakanani ayatholakala khona phakathi kwendawo ehlelwe kahle yeGrotto Restaurant - indawo esezimpophomeni zamanzi.

Ubumnandi obuzwa uma ungena ezingadini zeCascades ube ulalele umculo wezinyoni ezitholakala uma uhambahamba phakathi. Ngokungavinjelwa, uzohamba phakathi kwamakhulukhulu ezinyoni eziqhamuka emhlabeni wonke - amakhwezi aqhamuka eMpumalanga ne-Afrika, Izinyoni ezinezifuba ezibomvu eziqhamuka eChin kanye nezipelo eziqhamuka kude neMpumalanga. Izinyoni zendawo zisukela kumaCranes aluhlaza okwezulu licwathile kuya kwamancane amaWaxbills. Ihotela iCascades linikeza izivakashi ithuba lokuphumula emoyeni ongcono kunovunguzayo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOMNYANGO WEZOKUXHUMANA NOMPHAKATHI, ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




IHoneymoon Heaven eseCascades
Umuzwa wothando uhlala usemoyeni eCascades, ihotela lobukhosi enkabeni yeSun City lapho ubuhle obubukekayo buhlangene nenjabulo kanye nokugcizelela kusoxolweni nasekuzijwayezeni okumnandi.

Ihotela laziwa ngezingadi zalo zethrophikana, lapho izithandani zingahamba zimbambene ngezandla zidlula izindonga zamadamu zidansa kanye namabhamuza ezimpophoma, zivilapha enethini eliwumbhede ophanyekiweyo endaweni esithekile yangasese ezungezwe imibala emangalisayo, egqame nokuluhlaza kwesibhakabhaka kanye nomsindo ocwebile womculo wezinyoni, bese zidla ePeninsula Restaurant lapho ichibi libathinta ezinyaweni. Kulabo abazochitha uthando lwabo, kanye nezithandani ezigubha imigubho yeminyaka ewu-25, ewu-40 noma ewu-50 zashada, iCascades iyakwazi ukwenza lolosuku lube olukhumbulekayo. Ukwamukeleka komuntu abakutholayo uma bengena enkundleni okungenwa kuyo, kulandelwa ukubhalisela kwezindlu, ngokushesha kwenza bazizwe bengababalulekile. Ukumamatheka kulula futhi kulula ukuba nakho, Futhi lokho kuyindlela ihotela eliqala ngako ukunakekela.

Izindlu zehotela ezingu-243 zinikeza ukuzikhethela ezindlini eziningi kanye nokuhambisana nazo. Okungenzeka kube okungajwayelekile
nokwangasese, isibonelo, ngaphezu kokwengadi? Okwaqala kwenzelwa ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu ngayedwana kukaSol Kerzner, kunechibi lakho lokubhukuda kanye nejacuzzi endaweni yakho wedwa. 

Noma, ukuthola umuzwa ophezulu womhlaba, kukhona indlu evaliwe. Ungena njengokugwinya kwelinye lamakheshi asezingeni eliphezulu liye liyokubeka enkundleni yeshumi nanhlanu. Akekho omunye onelungelo lokungena kuleyondlu ngoba idinga ukhiye oyisipesheli wokulivula. Kuleyondlu ababili bathola izipho zokubamukela ezifana namasiliphazi akhe, izimbali, ishampeni kanye nobhasikidi ogcwele izithelo (ithuba elingcono kakhulu ukuzama isithelo sekiwi esimnandi ngendlela emangalisayo kanye nogilayindeni, futhu owaziwa njengesithelo i-passion!).

Abathandanayo futhi bathola ibhuku lokugcina izithombe lapho bengabeka izithombe zabo zomshado. Kodwa izithombe zokukhunjulwa zingathathwa nganoma isiphi isikhathi, ngalokho-ke umthwebuli zithombe waseSun City uzokujabulela ukuthatha lokokuhlangana kwababili kwabathandanayo noma komgubho womshado ngendlela abazovumelana ngayo bona bodwa. Kanti futhi ukudla kwababili kwenziwe kwaba mnandi kakhulu ngesikhathi kujatshulelwa njengengokuphuzwa ngokushona kwelanga noma ngasiphi esinye isikhathi sengxubevange emacaleni echibi lokubhukuda noma eVistas Bar ebhekene nengadi. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Ubukhazikhazi bekhasino elisehotela iSun City
Ubukhazikhazi bekhasino elakhiwe kabusha ngokwesigqi seHarlequin ehotela iSun City buthumela ukuzungezisa emgqumeni omusha wokujabulo okuthokozisayo enkabeni yendawo.

Ukwakhiwa kabusha kwekhasino kube ingxenye yemali eyizigidi ezingu-170 zamarandi yokulungisa ihotela iSun City, lona lilodwa elibize izigidi ezingu-200 zamarandi ukulithuthukisa okwaqalwa endaweni isiyonke ngo-1995. IKhasino laseSun City lavulwa okokuqala ngoDecember ka-1979, kwaziswa abaseNingizimu Afrika okokuqala, isitayela seLas Vegas sokuba nolwazi lomhlaba kwezemidlalo. Ukuba nodumo kwalo ngokushesha okwaholela ekufakweni kwamatafula amaningana kanye nezinye izinto zangasese zokudlala. Lokhu kwandiswa kwaseduzane sekuthathe ithuba lemibono yamazwe ngamazwe ekuhlelweni kanye nasekuhlotshisweni ukudala indawo enomuzwa wokujabula. Ngaphezu kwendawo yokungena ekhasino, kusukela enkundleni yehotela leSun City, impophonyana yezinhlavu ziphophoma echibini elimbozwe okusandwangwana ukunikeza umuzwa sengathi seliyashona ilanga kudonsekela emanzini, kumemezela injabulo nenhlanhla okumelwe kujatshulelwe lapho.

Kusukela ekungeneni, izingcezu ezinkulu ngangemitha ezicwebezela okupholishiwe ngebhulazo zibekiwe kumata ukudala umgwaqo wamaphupho ophuzi ngokombala. Lendlela iholela abaphanti ukuthi badlule izindodla zezingcezu esisagolide ezibonakala ukuxhasa uphahla kanye nezinye futhi izindodla zezingcezu ezixube umbala ezibonakala zebhajwe ezindongeni ukuya eHarlequins Bar naseLounge okubhekene namatafula asekhasino. Ngemumva kweBar kukhona elikhulu, isondo elihlale lizungeza lenhlanhla, elishwibeka lime liphinde lishwibeke futhi ngesitayela esithusayo, ngesikhati isondo le-roulette lizungeza amahora ematafuleni abukeka saluhlaza eduzane. Inkundla enkulu ingeniza izikhoxe ezimbili ezinkulu. Kukhona amatafula angu-16 e-America Roulette, awu-20 eBlackjack, awu-2 ePoker, elilodwa leDice noma iCraps, amathathu ePunto Banco kanye nelilodwa lemidi Punto Banco.

ISalon Prive yethu kanye ne-International Room yethu yangasese kunamatafula awu-16 okubalwa kuwo aweRoulette,aweBlacjack, awePunto Banco kanye naweBaccarat. Ukubheja okuncane nokukhulu kusuka ku-R5 kuya ku-R500. namatafula emali enkulu ayatholakala kuphela eSalon Prive kanye naseInternational Room. Zombili lezi zimukela labo abadlali abaphezulu abafuna ukudlalela iziteki ezinkulu ngasese, kanye nabadlali baphesheya kwezilwandle abangaxoxisana ngokudlalela isiteki ezinkulu, ngokubalwa kwemali yabo abayifakile yakwamanye amazwe. Kukhona futhi imishini yeSalon Prive eduze kwamatafula enkundla, lawo anemishini ewu-74 engangenisa abaphanti abancamela ukudlalela iziteki ezinkulu zo-R5, R10, R25 kanye noR100. Umgodi omaphakathi ufake ngaphansi igumbi elihle elimboziwe elihlotshiswe ngeHarlequin. Lokukukhonjiswa kohlobo lwase-Italy leminyaka yamakhulu angu-16 sekufaniswe nokuhlakanipha kanye nomoya ophezulu wephungangezwa, manje yini enye engakhonjiswa ukuba ibe khona? Amadayimane emibala kanye nonxantathu abasuka ekugqokeni kwendabuko sekuhujelwe ezintweni eziningi ukuhlobisa ikhasino.

Umgomo wokuhlobisa ikhasino uthelelwe indawo ethengisa ngokudla eseduzane, ebizwa nje ngokuthi iHarlequins, etholakala phakathi nekhasino Bar kanye neDisco Night Club. Emhumeni weSun City, yebo, kukhona umhlaba wobukhencekhence bemishini yekhasino yokudlala. Imishini engu-429 okubalwa kuyo emihlanu yeSuper Jackpots - iMillion Mania, iDream Machine, iSuperslam kanye neFruits of the Forest. Manje , ekungqwaphazeni kwezingcezu zasekhasino, ungajabulela izinhlobo eziningi zemidlalo, sijoyine bese ushayela kude izinkinga zakho njengoba usuphezulu ebukhwishikhwishini kanye nasenjabulweni yalokokuwina. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




USteven umqondisi wezemisebenzi ophethe eSun City



Abasebenzi abanobuchwepheshe ngokokusebenza futhi abanamakhono ahlukene kulomsebenzi walemboni yokunakekela kungumgomo woMqondisi wezemisebenzi weSun City uSteven Bagg, oneminyaka engu-34.


USteven, osechithe isikhathi eside emsebenzini wakhe iminyaka ewu-14 ephethe iSun international, ethola amatomu okusebenza ngokweqembu lapho imiphumela yoshintsho isikhombisile futhi indawo yokuvakasha isebenzenza ngokuthi ngxi ngobumnyama.

"Ngiyakwazi ukuthatha isitokwe sabanikazi besiteki nokubona ukuthi emunye angasevwa kanjani." kusho uSteven. "Bangabathengi, abasebenzi kanye nabanikazi beziteki. Kufanele ngiqiniseke ukuthi abanikazi zeziteki bathola okulinganayo kanti futhi ngabathengi ngifuna ukuqhuba ukukweneliseka okukhonjwe uhlelo lwezivakashi zethu eziqavile, okwamanje okusabalwa njengokungu-9 kokungu-10. Okwabasebenzi, ngifuna ukubona ukusebenzisa kwabo amakhono ngokuphindaphindiwe njengendlela ejwayelekile, kokubili kwempumelelo eqhubekayo kwendawo yokuvakasha, kanye nokuhlomula kwabasebenzi.

"Ekuzungezweni okujwayelekile kokusebenza kwamahotela, ngithanda ukubona abasebenzi abakhona benza umsebenzi wabo ngokugcwele bese futhi ngokunikezwa imihlomulo eyengeziwe - bethatha izindawo zalabo abajwayele ukuqashwa ngezikhakthi ezidinga umsebenzi. Amarekhodi ethu kwiNatinal Qualification akhombisa ukuthi lokhu kungumsebenzi ophumelelayo. Imivuzo wokuba namakhono ahlukahlukene kubasebenzi ngaphakathi endleleni okusetshezwa ngayo - ekusebenzeni noma kuphi embonini yokunakekela - kuyimikhakha eminingi lapho umuntu ngamunye ebekwe khona, kuncike elwazini lakhe lokukwazi emikhakheni eminingi. Ngihlose ukwandisa umoya wokusebenza phakathi kwabasebenzi."Ubuchwepheshe yenye yezinto uSteven azithandayo, futhi uzogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa ngokwanele kwezinto zobuchwepheshe ngazo zonke izindlela zokuphatha kanye nokusebenza kwendawo yokuvakasha, okubalwa kuzo ukushesha kwezinto zokuxhumana kanye nokuphendula kokudingekayo. Uhlola ukusebenza kwekhadi lobuchwepheshe ukuthi lisebenze endaweni yokuvakasha.

Njengamanje uqedela iziqu zakhe zeMasters in Business Administration, uSteven waqala umsebenzi wakhe wasehotela ngo-1986 ehotela eHeerengracht eCape Town futhi waqeqeshwa neqembu lehotela laseProtea. Wangena eSun International ngo-1989 eFish River Sun, kwathi ekuhambeni kwesikhathi waba umphathi wabahlali, kwase kuthi futhi eMpekweni Sun Marine, waba umphathi jikele.

Selokhu aba iGM yehotela iSun City, esehlanganise indawo yokuvakasha ngoJuni ka-1997, kanye  futhi nomphathi wezokusebenza kweCascades, ihotela iSun City. ICanabas, iVacation Club, I-Entertainment Centre kanye nokwahlukana kwamagumbi endawo.

Njengomphathi wezokusebenza kwendawo, uthatha umsebenzi wendawo yonke indawo lapho ukusebenza kwakhe kuzoba banzi kakhulu ngokufaka bonke abasebenzi bendawo yokuvakasha ekuthuthukiseni isiko lokusebenza kweqembu.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 KANYE NE-FAX: (011) 780 7535.




Umgqumo! Umkhiqizo wekhono elicolekile ngokuhambisana
Ichireographer ngayinye iletha umehluko ongapheliyo Umsebenzi omuhle ngendlela emangalisayo ngamunye yiwo owenza uMgqumo! Engefaniswe I"Afriganza" ezobekwa e-Extravaganza Theatre ehotela iSun City kusukela ngoNovember inguphisi ocolekile owenziwe ngabangedwana abayisikhombisa ama-choreographers.

Yize noma ngakunye kunguMgqumo! Kakhulukazi ngumsebenzi womuntu ngamunye, inkaba yako itholakala emtheleleni we-Afrika - kanti futhi lomcana udala ukuhambisana lokho okwenza lombukiso ube ngojabulisayo. Imikhiqizo emikhulu, iqembu likaTarnia Norman kanye noClarence Swartland, bobabili ngokudlala kwabo okudumile kanye nomsebenzi wokuba ama-choreographers ezinhlotsheni ezahlukene zomdanso, yibo abaqondene nombukiso ozovezwa kokuqala, owesibili kanye nowesithupha - I-Afriganza, okuyiyona ehlela umuzwa, iBronze Seduction kanye neSaharan Dreams. Kowesine nowesihlanu, kuzobe kudlala iWaterfall Adagio kanye neFire Procession. uTArnia noClarence yibona abenza umkhiqizo omkhulu ngo-1989 kanti futhi selokhu kwaqanjwa izinhlobo eziningi zokuvezwa kwamakhono ahlukene. Basaziwa kakhulu ngokwabo, okwehlukile futhi okusezingeni eliphezulu lokudlala.

I-CV kaBheki Ndlovu oneminyaka emithathu ikhombisa imibukiso nemidanso engcono kunayo yonke yaseNingizimu Afrika, kanti futhi umsebenzi wakhe usudunyiswe kakhulu kwiSarafina, emidlalweni yabo yebhayisikobho kanye nemibukiso. Ikhono lakhe lokudansa lasetshenziswa futhi kwiShowboat, kwiWizard of Oz, kwiJesus Christ Superstar kanye nakwiBaletsatsai yakamumva yeSun City. Kwi African Beat, umdlalo wesithathu emibukisweni, ungumgqugquzeli nomaluleki kanye nomdansi. Umthelela kaJayesperi Moopen utholakala kakhulu ebucikweni baseNingizimu Afrika. Inyuvesi yaseMadras eIndia emkhakheni wezeFine Arts, usebhodini yabaphathi beCivic Threatre bese ehlala futhi esihlalweni esiphathe iDance Alliance. Kusemkhakheni womdanso lapho aziwa khona kakhulu, kakhulukazi emsebenzini wakhe lapho ethuthukisa khona umdanso waseNdiya kanye nezegqi zakwamanye amasiko. Emdlalweni wesine woMgqumo, udansa iVision of Rhythm, kanti ngempela, useqambe nomculo ngalenkundla. Lona ngumdlalo ophelelisela ubuhle beWaterfall Adagio.

ILegends of Fire, ingumdlalo wesihlanu, iyizinkundla ezintathu, inkundla iyodwa iyadanselwa. Ipuppeteer eyaziwayo, uAdrian Kohler wayeqondene nokuvulwa kwalomdlalo, lapho isithombe sezimu esidlaliswayo sihlela inkundla. Lokhu kulandelwa iFire procession ngemikhiqizo emikhulu kanye nokuphakama komdlalo ngomdanso weMask odanswa iAdele Blank - eyagcina iqeqeshwe iJohannesburg City Ballet Company, kwase futhi kuba iPACT, kwi-opera nasemkhiqizweni womculo. Uqeqeshiwe futhi nakwi-Contemporary nasemdansweni wejazz, imithelelela ayilethayo ekungezeleleni eMgqumeni! UyiNhloko yeFree Flight Dance Company ayiqamba ngo-1987, ungumdansi wechoreographer nomqeqeshi wayo.

U-Owen Lonzer uselokhu adansa kusukela eneminyaka eyishumi wase ethatha umsebenzi wakhe wokuqala eneminyaka ewu-14. Usedansele ukuphelelisa umbukiso, iFoot Tappin' Fun. Umsebenzi wakhe emdansweni walandelwa iminyaka ekuthuthukeni embonini wokwazisa nakweyokuzithokozisa kanti maduzane nje usejoyine uhla lwaseNingizimu Afrika lwabadansi abaphezulu bohlobo lomdanso wechoreographer. Ubengoqondene nomdanso wechoreography emibukisweni enjengoDooWah Boys II, iNunsense 3, iLa Cage aux Folles kanye neJohannesburg Follies 2000.



IHarlequin's Reastaurant kanye neDisco Nightclub esehotela iSun City

UHarlequin wayengoshayela phezulu, umdlali onomoya ophezulu neminyaka yenkulungwane namakhulu ayisithupha; oshintshashintshayo okanye nathi othandayo ukubona kanye nokubonwa futhi owaziyo ukuthi impilo yangempela ukuze igcwaliswe ifunani.

Manje yikuphi okungaba okwemvelo ngokwedlulele ngolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba nanobuhle bendawo ethengisa ngokudla kanye nekilabhu yasebusuku yomdanso ukudonsa leyongqikithi efanayo? IHarlequin's kanye nendawo yomdanso exhopha amehlo eseduze kwayo ingenye phakathi kwezihehayo izindawo zekhasino esanda kuvuselelwa esehotela iSun City. OkwakuyiRaffles endala, sekushintshwe  ngezigidi ezinhlanu zamarandi ukuthuthukiswa okwakuyingxenye yezigidi zonke ezingamakhulu amabili zamarandi ukuthuthukisa okusanda kuqedwa endaweni yokuvakasha. IHarlequin's ingengafaniswa, egcwele ulwazi oluningi kanti futhi iyindawo enobungani, lapho ukupheleliswa kwenjabulo kutholakala ewayinini elicolekile kanye nokudla sekucoleke ezingeni lobucwepheshe.

Ingangenisa abadli besidlo ababalelwa ku-74, kanti futhi indlela okuhlalwa ngayo iqinisekisa lokokuhloba, njengezindawo ezimbili eziyizingxenye zangasese ezingenisa imicimbi yangasese yabantu ababalelwa kwabangu-10, noma lowomuzwa wekhanda wokuba ingxenye yesixuku kokwenzeka ekhasino. Itafula elide lomcimbi elendlalwe indwangu esagolide nesikhumba leluleke ngaphansi kweHarlequin, eligcwala lonke udonga, lapho yonke indawo yokuhlala ingezihlalo ezimnyama ezihlotshiswe ngokusagolide, kwase kumbozwa ngomhlobiso wemibala yedayimane leHarlequin.

Inkolo yokuzithokozisa into enkulu eHarlequin's, kusukela ekuhlanganeni namatafula kuya emakhishini amangalisalo kanye nohla oluhehayo lwewayini. Okwengezelayo kobumsulwa be-ivory endwangini egqize ngevelivethi ebubende kundlalwe ngokucoliseka kwendwangu kasilika obubende, amathuluzo okudla esiliva aqhamuka eGermany, ezinhle ngokumangalisayo ezibonakala ngezinhlayiya ezinezelelwe izingilazi zamanzi eziqhamuka eMiami eHarlequin eluhlaza, kanye nezikhazimula ngokumhlophe eziqhamuka eChina. Umhlobiso osemdansweni uyamangalisa, inhlanganisela yegwadle, insimbi ye-crome kanye nengilazi kudala ukuzivoca okuholela ekutheni wonke umuntu enze okuthile. O-DJ bathola umgqumo usuka ebhuthini enefulemu elinamatshana amibalabala, ngezibani ezihlelwe esibukweni esisandilinga emsukeni waso.

Amatafula, ame ngokuthandelwa insimbi, abekwe kuyo yonke indawo ngaphandle kwalena ecwebezelayo, inkundla lapho kudanswa khona. Ngaphezulu, izibani ezishintshashintshayo ezisophahleni zisuka ngaphesheya ensimbini yekhromu ehlelwe ngokubhekene nensimbi eluhlaza okusasibhakabhaka, kanye nezibani ezinde ezivunguza okwesihlabathi, ezizungeze ngokwensimbi yekhromu kanye nengilasi enemibalabala eminingi. Indawo ethengisa ngokudla iHarlequin's kanye neDisco Nightclub okwabantu abakhaliphile, abantu ababonakalayo abazihlelayo izinto zabo futhi abaziyo ukuthi impilo ijatshulelwa kanjani. Yebo, uHerlequin yena uqobo lwakhe wayevumelana nalokhu. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (0110 780 7684.



I-Orchid Restaurant
Ikhishi lase-Asia lesiminya, elilungiswe lasevwa ngendlela yaseMpumalanga osekube umkhuba wokuziqhenya eminyakeni engamakhulu amaningi, isihlele amaqoqo abadli bokudla kwentsha i-Orchard Restaurant yasehotela laseSun City.

Kusukela eqenjini lasekhishini, eliphethwe umpheki uBeng Haut Chew, kuya kumaphathi be-restaurant abangoBokmun Chan noLiu (uLouis) Yi, nabasebenzi okungathi abaseMpumalanga njengelanga liphuma. Ngasekudleni, umrco polo usekhuphukele kwelinye izinga ukukuthola. I-Orchid ayifaniswa nalutho olunye ngenxa yendlela yayo yokuhlanganisa ubuciko ngendlela elula, kanye nokuthonya okulula ngezivakashi eziqhamuka emasikweni ahlukene ziyaziswa kulendlela yokudla. Amatafula ababazekayo, amnyama, isibonelo, andlalwe ngako kokubili izipuni zokudla etafuleni zaseNtshonalanga kanye nezindukwana  zakhona zokudla. Imicwana egqamile enokubenyezela okumhlophe yaseChina inebhodlela likasosi elinamakhona enziwe ngomsebenzi wezandla. Okulinganayo ngeqiniso obhasikidi bokustima ugonothi, izitofu ezigcwele amatafula, izindishi zenonja, amabhodwe obumba kanye nemisebenzi emincane.

Indishi encane yengilazi etafuleni ngalinye, iqukethe ezimbalwa zangempela izimbali ze-orchid, zilingisa imibala emihle ngokumangalisayo ye-orchard edwetshwe ezidongeni. Ukulungiswa okubanzi kokhuni olusongene lwemvelo kanye nobunye ubuhle be-orchard kwamukela izivakashi njengoba ziphelekezelwa ukuya ematafuleni azo ngabaphelekezeli bakhona abagqoke okwakhona komsebenzi. Ukhuni olumdaka ngokunothileyo ludala umhlobiso wesihonqa esakhiwe ngokuphanjanisiwe esizungeze wonke amakhona okudala umuzwa wokuhlukana kwamagumbi ngendlela efanisiwe ndawonye. Umcimbi omncanyana wabantu abangu-11 bangeniswa egunjini leKampani, elihlukanisiwe nendawo enkulu yokudla ngezibuko ezivulekela emaceleni, kanye nezinye izndawo zangasese ezakhiwe ngendlela yokuhlala ngokwemicimbi ye-alcove uma uhamba ngezindonga.

Yize noma yonke into ilungiswe ngobumsulwa endaweni engahlala abantu abangu-118 yokudla, udumo lwayo nokushesha komsebenzi ngaphakathi zikwenza ikwazi ukungenisa abantu abangu-250 kusihlwa; kodwa kukhona ukulingeka okungenakwehlulwa ukuhlola ukudala abanako okumangalisayo. Umpheki waseSingapore ophethe uBeng Huat Chwe wafika Orchird eminyakeni eminingana eyedlule njengomphathi  wabapheki baseChina eRoyal Abjar Hotel eDubai, elandela ukufika kwakhe eSwiss Grand hotel eSeoul, eKorea. Umsizi wakhe ongomChina uSong Chang usesebenze iminyaka engu-10 emakhishini aphezulu asezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla emadolobheni aseChina eXian, eGuilin naseShanghai. Iqembu lakhe lasekhishini liqeqeshiwe emakhishini aseIndonesia, eKorea, eTaiwan, eThailand, eCombodia, eLaos, eMalaya, ePhiliphi naseChina; konke okukhonjiswa ekudleni. Noma kunjalo, izivakashi ziphumule okwangampela ngenxa yokunakekelwa okunobungani okusezandleni zomphathi wendawo, uBokmun Chan kanye nomsizi wakhe, uLouis.

UMnumzane uChan wafika e-Orchid ephuma eDragon Court i-Restaurant yaseChina esehotela laseSheraton naseTowers eKuwait, futhi uLouis wachitha iminyaka eminingana eqenjini eliseHoliday Inn China ngaphambi kokuba athuthele eNingizimu Africa. Ukwaziswa okuhle ekudleni ukuzikhethela okukhethekile kwaDim Sum. Igama lalamaqebelengwana amancanyana amnanadi lichaza ukuthi "Thinta inhliziyo",futhi amangalisayo, isibonelo, ingxubevange yenyama yengulube egayiwe kanye namakhowe aseChina asongwe azungeza umdambi, okufika etafuleni kukubhasikidi wokukubilisa kushisa. Manje sekuyidada elinongiwe ngephunga elimnandi, okufakwe phakathi nekhekhe lepani eliwucezu eliqale landlalelwa ngososi osaswidi kabhontshini. Ukulandela, zama okumnandi okusaswidi kanye nokumuncwana okuwumdambi ongakaze ukunambithe, okulandelwa iAyam Pandan (amathanga enkukhu angenamathambo anongwe ngokwaseMalesia) kanye nesiklabhu esinongwe ngokumangalisayo, izithelo ezithosiwe zagovuzwa ndawonye (ezibizwa ngeLuohan emva kweChinese Buddhist monk) - kungumuzwa okude omnandi wabadli bezithelo ukuzigcina beyibo. Indlela engcono ukulinga ukudla ukuthatha ithuba lokuncanyana okunikezwa kuqala kunokuba uthathe indishi enkulu, kanye okubiza njalo njalo. Kodwa akekho ozoncamela ukwehlukanisa uqweqwe lwekhekhe olubizwa ngePanda lapis, noma uKa Ti ice cream oqhamuka eThailand. I-Orchid esehotela iSun City ivulwa kusukela ngo 18h00 kuya ku 23h00 nsuku zonke phakathi nesonto bese kuze kube u 24h00 ngezimpelasonto. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



I-Calabash Restaurant
Khohlwa ukukhanywa, "ukumamatheka ebusweni bengwenya". Ebudididini behotela iSun City, entsha iCalabash Restaurant, ifana nokungaphezulu ngokwedlulele ukuzanelisa kokuqhesha. 

Insimbi ebunjiwe yakhe izibambo zeminyango kanye nezibambelelo zokusiza ngasekungeneni, izinhlobonhlobo zemibala zesitensela ewulayini odongeni kanye nokufekethiswe ngezinhlamvana zamatshe amibalabala ocwesheni lwensimbi lwendlaleke ngaleya kwetafula. Umhlobiso, okuseqinisweni, ungudumo lwase-Afrika kanye namatafula abubulayo nako kugubha ukunakekela kwase-Afrika, ngayo yonke into kanoma ubani.

I-Calabash isibe indawo enkulu nedumile iminyaka eminingi, kodwa manje isilungiswe kabusha njengenxenye yokulungiswa okukhulu kwango 1995 yokulungiswa kwehotela lilonke laseSun City. Umphumela ungophilayo, onobungani, indawo yokudla yemindeni lapho kugxilwe ekudleni okungcono ngendlela emangalisayo, okusevwa zonke izinsuku zesonto kusukela ngo 17h30 kuya ku 23h00. Ukudla kwe a' la carte kukhombisa ukuzikhethela okukhulu kwezindishi ezigqugquzelayo kusukela ezweni lase-Afrika okulungiswe kahle kakhulu ngezinongo ezimsulwa ngokwedlulele. Ukuhamba uye eNyakatho ne-Afrika ukuqala ukudla okunesaladi leWhite Nile, noma uhlole ilebanese Delights kweMiddle Eastern mezzel okufana ne-hummus, tabouleh, baba channouj, muthabal kanye ne-labenah, noma mhlawumbe ulinge okuthile okulula okufana namakhowe amnyama osiwe athelwe ngaphezulu usosi kashizi weChedda omnandi kakhulu.

Kukhona ubobotie wangemapela owenziwe ngokuphakathi nendawo, isiklabhu esigayiwe esikhari, izinhlobo zesosatie nenyama yenkomo enongiwe, inkukhu kanye nama-apricot omisiwe avuvuzelwe ngokokunandisa, kanye nemendlela yentshe okunososi wewolintshi kanye newolintshi salamula okuqhamuka ngqo eKapa. Bese kuba khonaimihlobiso ebukwayo emihle ngokumangalisayo yokosiwe kanye nokhari, okuhambisana nepasta, okugriliwe kanye namadombolo, kanye nokhumbulekayo uphaya we-Etosha venison. Okukhethekile kwezingane kukhombisa okululana okufana namaqebelengwana, obhontshisi kanye nemeshi, kanye neminywana yamadombolo egriliwe, kanti futhi akekho umthandi kashokoledi okufanele aphuthelwe u-ice cream kashokoledi. Akukona nje ukuthi ucwiliswe kushokoledi kuphela kodwa futhi usevwa kanye namaqebelengwana kashokoledi. Khohlwa isilinganiso. Vele nje uzitike! Okunamathekela phansi ezindongeni amaqoqo emifanekiso yakudala yase-Afrika, okuhambisala nocelemba wase-Ningizimu neMelika kanye namabheshu ahlotshiswe ngobuhlalu. Kunqamula imikhonto yezandla ezinsikeni, isibani esimangalisayo sikhombisa izinkawu ezine zijubela endlini ekhanyisela ngokukhaya kwamagilobhu ezidladleni zazo, kanti uphahla luhlotshiswe ngamaqabunga epalm.

Ezinhlangothini, amakhawunta amatafula awokubaziweyo kwendlove, inyathi kanye nendlovudawana, okunye kuzimele kona ngokwakho okunye kunamathele emihonqeni yamagatsha esihlahla. Okubaziweyo kungokunye okuhlobise amatafula, kusukela ezitsheni zokunongisa ukudla kuya ekuhlelweni kwezigujana ezincanayana kanye notshani olomisiweyo ezitsheni zokhuni, I-Calabash iyi-restaurant engamaqabuqabu lapho umuzwa wokunambitheka kusukela kokubili inyakatho neningizimu ye-Afrika kuhlanganela khona kokufanayo. Akumangalisi ukuthi ingani idume kangaka ngezingwenya. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NORALA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KUNELOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684




Inkaba yeSun City - ihotela iSun City
Ihotela iSun City ingukuzithokozisa ngendlela ebalulekile empilweni endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City. Okubalulekile ngehotela okunye kobuhle obukhangayo kanye nolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba.

Kusukela esikhathini ungena endaweni evulekile izinzwa zakho zibhudukezwa imihlobiso yobugagu bobuciko kanye nokuhlelwa kweziwici ezimangalisayo. Indawo emaphakathi isishintshelwe ukuba ukucinana kwmaqabi othsni bemfunda, amanzi achachazayo kanye nezimbokodo, okuzungeze imishini yokugembula eshehsayo ewu-400, ekhenceza kude ngaphansi kweLobby Lounge. Ukufika eLobby Lounge izivakashi zenyuka ngentambo enqamula kahle elekelelwa ngezinyathelo zetshe kanye nokhuni lwakudala. Egcwaliswe ngokwedlulele ngokwaseTheki kanye nendwangu ebomvu klebhu eyemboze izihlalo ngobuhle obumangalisayo obuhlobise iLobby Lounge ebhekene nezingadi zaseparadesi. Kuyindawo yokuziphumulela ubuke umbukiso odlulayo njengoba ungafisa ukunambitha isamishi le-Atrium Club elilandelwa onothile upastri waseFransi kanye necappuccino. Izihlahla ezinde zepalm nezimbali zetripicana zihlobise izingadi zeparadesi ngaphansi. Opholi abanemibala egqamile bavunulisa uhlobo lwembadlana emhlophe ekhanyise kanye nokuhlotshiswa kukamata kuyizimbali ezingi ezisagolide kanye nezibomvu tebhu.

Ingaphakathi elihle ngokumangalisayo lehotela iSun City lacatshangwa nguTrisha Milson we Wilson & Associate, iqembu lamazwe ngamazwe lokuhlobisa elaqamba ingapakathi elihle ngokumangalisayo lePalace yeLost City. Njengesivakashi sehotela iSun City uzomangala ngokujabula ukuthola ukuthi igumbi lakho lingelinomyango opholile ongafaniswa. Amagumbi ayamangalisa bese akhanyiswe phezulu ukukhanya kwelanga okumangalisayo. Imibala ebusayo onsundu ngokubomvu okufudumele kanye nokushisiwe kwewolintshi okuhlotshiswe ngokusagolide. Impahla yasendlini eyenziwe ngezandla yaseNingizimu Afrika isinindwe ngesimo sombala woju yaqedelwa ngomhlobiso othinta umuthi omnyama opendwe ngopende owenza ukhazimule. Izindonga ezihlotshiswe ngezimbali ezincane ezinombala ophuzi, kanye nezinhlobonhlobo ezinhle zezindwangu ezilekelela imihlobiso efudumele yokwempahla yasendlini. Amakhethini anemigqa eyisikotshi kanye nokusagolide okukhombisa ukubukeka kwangaphandle okumangalisayo kwe Gary Player Golf Course. Izindwangu zokundlala imibhede zimbozwe imibalabala kanye notshani ngokuma kwezithelo ezifana nethungulo, okusawolintshi nokuluhlaza. Ubuzoyizoyi bekhasino bugujwa ubukhona bephunga-ngezwa neHarlequin enomoya ophezulu. Ukugqama komhlobiso kanye ne joie de vivre umlingiswa weHarlequin kugcizelela umumo wekhasino. Kusukela ekukleklebukeni kwenjabulo kwabadlali becrap kuya kwabamsulwa bejamile bepoker - nawe futhi uzokwahlulwa kuloludumo olohehayo.

Ingqikithi yomhlobiso ithwelwe kuze kufike kwemangalisayo engumakhelwane iRestaurant iHarlequins. amatafula andlalwe ngendlela enhle ngokumangalisayo ase ahlotshiswa ngezindwangwana ze-ivory nebubende evelivethi, andlalwe izipuni zokudla ezisasiliva kanye nezithengwe eChina izitsha zobumba ezilula kakhulu. Kungangena abadli besidlo abayela ku 74. Indlela okuhlalwa ngayo iqinisekisa ihoba, kukhona izindawo ezingohhafu zangasese ezingangenisa imicimbi yangasese enabantu abayela ku 10. Ingilazi eluhlaza yaseHarlequin Restaurant yengezela izingilazi ezinhle ezinezinhlayiya. I-Harlequins Restaurant kanye nekilabhu yasebusuku okokukhalipha, abantu ababonakalayo abahlela ukuqonda kwabo nabaziyo ukuthi ijatshulelwa kanjani impilo. Itafula elamazwe ngamazwe kanti abadli besidlo bangazibandakanya ngenjabulo kwi Hors D' Oerve yembasa ebhakiwe yaseKapa eyenziwe ngebhotela likasosi kagalige kanye nopelepele osaswidi kanye nezimvuthu zesinkwa noma isampula yeSpringbok pistacho terrine okunokwama-apricot. Okwesidlo esikhulu, ama-langoustines aphakeme kakhulu, njengakwinyama yenyamazane ebilisiwe. Uma ukunambitha kwakho kujikela kokuhlwabusayo kakhudlwana, njalo I-Orchid retaurant izokwanelisa ngisho nalokho kunambitha kwakho okusekukhathele. Ikhishi lomdabu lase-Asia lihlele kusukela edadeni leJasmine elifusiwe elisezwa lisemeqebelengwaneni epani kanye nososi osaswidi kabhontshisi kuya ezifubeni zenkukhu enongiwe yaseMalesia. I-Thai, iKa Ti ice cream umuzwa wokunambitheka njengoba kundlalwe ekhekheni iPanda Lapis.

Ngokwamakhishi omdabu aseNingizimu Afrika, iCalabash Restaurnat izokwamukela ngesitayela sangempela sase-Afrka. Itafula elibubulayo likunikeza iboboetjie, okhari, icarvery kanye nezitshalo zemifino okubilisiwe, kulandelwe ukudla okunamakhekhe okuthelwe ukhasitede okuzokona kanye nesibiliboco sepestri esinoshukela esidakiwe. I-Calabash ilapho imizwa yokunambitha evuselelayo kusukela eNyakatho kanye neNingizimu kuhlangana khona. Kwimaphakathi lehotela iSun City kukhona iTheatre. LeTheatre eyaziwa kakhulu yaziwa ngemikhiqizo egidlazayo kanye nokuhlelwa kwayo okumangalisayo. I-Baletsatsi njengamanje ekhonjiswa etheatre akubuzwa ukuthi yiyona ehamba phambili kumatheatre akudala eyake yakhiqizwa eNingizimu Afrika. Ibophela isayensi eliphathelene nezinganekwane lase-Afrika, ihlanganisa umhlaba wamaphupho kanye nemicabango yamaphupho. Indaba kaBaletsatsi ixoxwa ngokulinganisa, umdanso, imigilingwane kanye nongomkhuba wesekisi. Umculo wangempela usuhlangene kanye nomdanso wechoreography ongafaniswa nalutho kuthatha ababukeli kubayise emhlabeni wamaphupho nomlingo. "Umhlaba wamaphupho nomlingo ikona ihotela laseSun City eliyikho", kusho Umpahthi jikelele, uSteven Bagg. "Injabulo engafaniswa nalutho olunye kanye nokuzitika yikho ukushaya komgqumo wehotela".


!Funk! Ngena phakathi ugcwalise isikhala
I-Cabaret eCabanas njengoba iSun city ilalelela i-Extravaganza entsha. Njengoba ukulalela kwezwe lonke kufuna amakhono aphezulu aseNingizimu Afrika okudlala ukudlalela iExtravaganza entsha yeSun City ekupheleni konyaka, yonke icabrethi eculayo , edansayo yenyuselwa iPalm Terrace ehotela iCabanas kusukela ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 5.

Umbukiso, !Funk!, izoqhubeka amasonto ayisithupah njengoba iExtravaganza ise "dark" bese amalungiselelo enziwelwe iExtravaganza ukungena esikhaleni sombukiso okhona manje, iBaletsatsi ngoNovemba. I-Baletsatsi eseyinezinyanga eziwu-18 izogcina ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 3. "Sibuze uPaul Warwick Griffin ukuthi asikhuphulele imikhiqizo ye-!Funk!. Umsebenzi wakhe uyancomeka, Futhi waziwa kakhulu ukudlaleni kwakhe kwiJesus Christ Superstar kanti futhi njengoRocky emkhiqizweni weRocky Horror Picture Show," kusho uKaren Cutts, Umpahthi wezokuzijabulisa, endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City. "Ungumculi futhi ungumdansi futhi unenkampani yakhe yokukhiqiza esesiyinike amandla eshashalazini lombukiso we!Funk!."

Inkampani kaPaul isidlale eshashalazini isikhathi esingangamasonto ayisithupa ngempumelelo enkulu idlala iBest of Broadway eCabanas ngonyaka odlule. I!Funk! ichazwa njengedlala imizuzu engu-60 ingami ukujabulisa ngomdanso wayo oqhubekayo owuzungezunge, ikhombisa sonke isikhathi umculo othandwayo kusukela kowawo 1970 no 80. "Umkhuba womdanso oqinile usuwaziswe embukisweni nguDavid Gouldie umdansi wecoreography owawina umklomelo weVista," kusho uPaul. Okwahlukanisa ngongulinganayo okwamanje futhi okusaboniswana ngako ngabesifazane ababili abaphezulu eNingizimu Afrika abahlabelelayo. "sizobe sikhombisa abanyakazi besikhathi - uGloris Gaynor, uDian Ross iPointer Sisters kanye noDonna Summer phakathi kwabo. Umbukiso uzobe unomuzwa wokubuyisa okudala ngesiphetho senkulungwane minyaka, ababukekayo, nababukeka beheha - uhlobo loAbba luhlangana noPriscilla Queen weDesert," kusho uPaul.

UPaul maduzane nje uqede umsebenzi weRocky Horror Picture Show eNico Cape town kanti impumelelo yakhe enkulu edlule bekungu-Queen kwi-Opera ne Jesus Christ Superstar. I-!Funk! izothola ukubenyenzela ngokokuqala emoyeni ngesikhathi iqala ukudlala eSun City, kodwa umqambi wayo ngeke abe pakakathi kwabadlali. UPaul uzobe eseqenjini lomdlalo weJesus Christ Superstar ePitoli ngalesosikhathi.

"Imibukiso esiyikhombisayo eSun City ithanda ukuba ingxenye yoshintsho lwendlela eyaqalwa esikhathini esithize esedlule, okungukuthi siyenze yaba inhloso yethu ukubona amakhono amaningana aseNingizimu Afrika kwiSuperbowl kanye nasekwezinye izindawo zethu. Imibukiso yethu yokuqalela emifishanyana - iSunday matinees ngo 3 ntambama - ibizonikeza injabulo ngokwenhlalayenza, futhi ifake abaseNingizimu Afrika abaphezulu abafana noPieter Dirk Uys, uSteve Hofmeyer kanye noNataniel. I-Trader Horns, iyaqala yaba indawo yabaculi asebemkantshubomvu, isiphenduke inkundla yokuzikholisa yamakhono mamasha aseNingizimu Afrika okushaya izinsimbi. "I-Extravaganza entsha izobe nayo ikuwo lowomoya. Njengoba silalela ezindawenmi ezinkulu, kanjalo sibheka abaculi abaqeqeshwe kakhudlwana abasebancane - abadansi abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka 18, asebeqeqeshwe  ngendlela egqamile, futhi abanamakhono okwenza izinto ngezindlela ezahlukeneyo ukudlala izinhlobonhlobo zemidanso eyahlukene," kusho uKaren. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Isitayela sokuhlala seCabana - iCabanas eSun City
Ukuziqabula umzimba, injabulo esemfihlakalweni yeCabanas esesun City ingumuzwa osheshayo umuntu awutholayo ngesikhathi emukelwa. Ihotela lokuziphumulela elimaqabuqabu kunawo wonke amahotela aseSun City, iCabanas inikeza indawo yokulala ejwayelekile ibe inobuntofontofo.

Indawo yokwamukela ivulekile bese iba nendawo yesoso evulekile ebhekene neplam Terrace. Okutshaliweyo okuhehayo kubekwe kwazungeza iphansi elinamathayela, kanye nezindonga ezithe ukuhwaqazela yase iba nophahla oluqoqe utshani bemfunda betropiacana kanye nezimbali, konke kunikezela emuzweni ngokushesha wokuba sekhefini. Ngasemumva kwedesika lendawo yokwamukela kukhona izithombe ezenziwe odongeni njengamathayela ezinhle kakhulu, igcwele opholi, onongozolo, izinyoni ezinkulu eziqhelile, izimpangele, ozekamanzi kanye nezimabuli. Olunye uchungechunge lwezihlahla zepalm kanye nengqondo yezemidwebo okunsundu ngokubomvu, amabala obhuluwu kanye namaqabunga aluhlaza agijima ezindongeni esihwabuzela isihlabathi zeplam Terrace. ICabanas ibhekene necala lechibi elibukekayo ngendlela engena ngqo ezingadini ezinhle zetropicana, okukunikeza ingemumva eliklabusayo ngenxa yezinyoli ezakhele khona. Amapikoko amahle kakhulu ayabonakala ngamaqabuqabu ngaphambi komnyago wengilazi okuholela endaweni yakho yokulala.

Izivakashi zingazikhethela phakathi kweyejwayelekile kanye nakwecokeme iCabanas, zonke zibe zinesilungiso-moya kanye nazo zonke izinto zikagesi zesimanje. ICabanas eyejwayelekile inikeza isisefo esingaphakathi egunjini lokulala, kuthi ezihambisana nazo ezicokeme zona zikhombisa indlu yokugezela egcwele. Ingxubevange emsulwa yopende bemihle imibala bugqugquzela ubumsulwa kanye nomoya wokuphumula waseCabanas. ICabanas yaseSun City inikeza ukuzikhethela kokudla okuthathu - abapheki bakhipha unyawo ekuqambeni isigqi sesitayela samatafula ongasibona ngamehlo engqondo ePalm Terrace. Okugriliwe okuthanjisiweyo nokusajusi kuyatholakala e a la carte Morula Restaurant naseBar. Inani elilula lokwasemini kuyatholakala eMorula Café. ISun City ibinikezela ngisho nasemalungeni amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, okubalulekile iparadesi yokuzithokozisa ehlelelwe kahle izingane zayo yonke iminyaka. Izinhlelo ezibhekwe ngokuphelele zemidlalo kanye nezinto zokudlala eKwena's Castle, khona emagcekeni eCabanas: inkundla yemidlalo enhle ngokumangalisayo, indawo yezilwane kanye nenkundla yokudlala enakho konke kokudlala. Ukuzihambela ungcebeleke kafushane nje unqamula amagceke aluhlaza amahle ngokumangalisayo eCabanas kukulethela umhlaba wenjabulo nentokozo eSun - Waterwolrd. Kukhona nemidlalo yokushebeleza emoyeni, ukuzwinga emoyeni, ukushushuluza emanzini kanye neyalabo abafuna ukuhambahamba emanzini uziqhafela ngenjabulo, kukhona isikebhe esikuthatha sikuzungezise ichibi ngesikhathi sokushona kwelanga. ICabanas yaseSun City - ukuziphumulela okungekhona kokugcina umthetho nje yiko okungcono kunakho konke. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOMNYANGO WE PR, ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Okuphuphekayo eTable Bay
Ngesikhathi kugujwa umjikelezo wamahotela uJean Mestriner ukhuluma ngokusetshenzwa kwehotela iTable Bay yiSun International ngenani lezigidi zamarandi ezingu 250 ngokwemithetho elishumi, ungaxolelwa ngokungaboni kahle.

Izivakashi ezivakashela ukuphathwa kwenxanxathela yehotela kungenzeka zithole ukumangala okwedlulele ngezinkomba zabasebenzi abancengisisayo ukukhumbula ukuthi kukhona "Abesifazane nabesilisa abaseva abanye besifazane nabesilisa." Kodwa uma konke lokhu kwenza lelihotela elisendaweni enamanzi kube sengathi indawo yokuthengisela impahla iVictoria engathi sina engenanjabulo, cabanga kabili. Kulendawo, kusho uMestriner, imithetho yendlu ayinakwenza lutho ngezimpoqo nezinkolo noma iphutha ekulinganiseni isikhathi sokwenzeka kwesehlo esithile, kanye nakho konke okuhambisana nokuphakama kwezinga lomsebenzi. Umthetho wokufakaza wesithupha: "Asisoze saphendula ezivakashini noma kwabanye abahlanganyeli, 'lokho akuwona umsebenzi wami'. Siyohlala sisiza futhi senza okungaphezu kokulindelekile". Kuchaza uMestriner: "Inhloso yethu enkulu ukunakekela izivakashi zethu - yingakho sikhokhelwa nje". Lomgomo usukhokhe imivuzo emikhulu eminyakeni eminingi. UMestriner wayeyindoda eyashintsha ihotela le-five star iJerusalema laba ihotela lokuqala ledolobha iGlat Kosher, wagcina futhi nehotela iKwala Lumpur's Regent laba eliphezulu ezingeni, wavulela iWashington Regent ekwaziweni amazwe ngamazwe, wavuselela ihotela iWindsor Court eliseNew Orleans .ekugcineni wathatha umsebenzi wokuvula iPalace yaseLost City.

Impumelelo yakhe lapho yaba kafushane okubukeka kahle kakhulu kanti namhlanje ihotela liyaphindaphinda ngokuzuza isizinda ngokwedlulele emaphesentini ako 90. Ukuthi nje qabu qabu noMestriner qobo lwakhe wayephethe umcimbi kaMongameli Mandela eqala ukuphatha abantu abangu 1 200 abahlonishwa kanye nabaphathi bezifundazwe. Ubufakazi bokucophelela kwakhe ngemininingwane kutholakala ngokushesha lapho ungeke uthembe khona "kulayini ophambili"-kanogada kanye nakubaxhumanisi bolayini bokuxhumana. Ukushaya icingo ulushayela ehotela kukhombisa ukuphendulwa okunobungani: "Sawubona, ihotela iTable Bay. Ngingakusiza kanjani ngocingo lwakho?" uMestriner ukubiza lokhu ngokuthi "ukumamatheka okuhamba ngezingcingo" echaza ukuthi wonke umehluko omncane nje usiza ekudaleni ukunakekela kweqiniso okwamukelekile. Njengengxenye uthina wakhe kulendlela yokuhlanganyela,abasebenzi babizwa "ngabahlanganyeli" Ukuxhumana nehotela ngolayini oxhumene ngendlela abasebenza bexhumene ngayo bese ungena kwenkulu iPorte cochere, ekungenisa emakhelekheleni, indawo enamathayela enziwe ngemabula. Uphahla olulula ngaphakathi kusukela emawindini aphakeme futhi kukhona izindawo zamaziko ezinkulu ezakhiwe ngomabula ezenzelwe umoya obandayo wasebusika waseKapa.Uma ufika etable Bay, uzothola umuzwa ushaya khona kanye nokuthanda umsebenzi okubonakalayo.Lapho kungekho ongabazayo ukuthi ubani ophethe, abasebenzi basebenza ngokuxhumana noMestriner ngendlela engagcini nje umthetho kodwa enobungani. Uyajabula ngalencazelo ayinikezayo:"Uma ingemumva lendlu liphilile, uma ukushaya kwenhliziyo kuhamba kahle, lapho ususengxenyeni yakhona ngaphakathi."Akukho lapho uthola khona ukusebenza ngendlela yokuphatha ebonakala kakhudlwana kwase-Atlantic Bistro, indlu yokudlela yabasebenzi seyasuswa endleleni yenkantini yakudala njenge foie gras kusuka kuma slap chips. Ukudla kuphanyekwa kusasele isonto (omunye useyasola ukuthi abasebenzi abanikwa ukudla okusalile) kanye namathuluzi okudla nawokufaka ukudla ahlotshiswe ngokwesiko. Kuza njengokungesona isimangaliso ukufunda ukuthi uMestriner udlani lapho yena qobo lwakhe. Uyachaza:"Asinawo amazinga aphindwe kabili".Umhotela owazalelwa ukuba ngumhotela ongumDutch uyena ophethe lobubumnandi baloluhlobo, osebenza kalula nje kodwa nemiphumela ephakeme osekumenze wabo ngomunye womhotela emhlabeni:"Uma kungekona okusezingeni,akusetshenziswa. Yikho konke okwenza ihotela libe elingafaniswa namanye".UMestriner ukhombisa ibhuku lokuqeqesha elinikeza incazelo entsha ngemininingwane ngayinye:"Lichaza konke ngokubaluleka kwakho kusukela ebudeni kwamsede burns kwabahlanganyeli besilisa kuya ekwakhiweni kwamacici abahlanganyeli besifazane. Asikusebenzisi okokulayitha kwacwazi okushibhile ukulayitha ugwayi wezivakashi, kanjalo namatekisi athutha izivakashi zethu kufanele bahlangabezane nezinga esikulo lomsebenzi wethu ophezulu". Uthini ngobubenyebenye obungenakuvinjelwa? "Kuzoba khona ama-goofs, kodwa yindlela esiwaphatha ngayo eyenza umehluko. Abahlanganyeli bethu (ulisebenzisa leli temu ngokucikilisha) bazizwa besekhaya kanti lowo muzwa uze uphumele nakubavakashi bethu". Uthi uyazibona nje yena qobo lwakhe njengongoti omusha kwezamahotela? "Yebo, kuyangijabulisa impela njengoba ngetha uhlobo lomkhiqizo wami uqobo. Ngingungcweti ekuqambeni amahotela aphezulu kodwa kufanele ngibe nesandla esikhululekile cishe kukho konke. Kuyacaca ngeke ngikwazi ukwenza konke ngingedwa. Ngisebenza neqembu elincane, elizizwayo, nelisebenza ngokuzimisela eTable Bay, futhi sisonke sesilenze leli  hotela laba eligqamile ngempela". Ecelwa ukuba achaze ngesitayela sehotela, uqhamuka nezinto eziningi zobuhle beVictoria, kodwa futhi nengxubevange enmandi  ewuntanga neyasekhaya ngobuhle kanye nokuthinta iNewport Beach. "Sengathi ukugcizelela okukhulu kukwiVictoria, ingozi eyenza ihotela libe elifuthelene," kuchaza uMestriner, kanti futhi akukona eliyikho. "Angisoze ngakwenza okwenziwe ngaphambilini, ngincamela abanye abantu bakopelele kumina". Uvuma ngokuthokoza ukuba ngumchithi mali omkhulu, kodwa ugcizelela uyawuthola umvuzo kuyo yonke leyomali. "Engingasoze ngakwenza ukunqamula umsebenzi nezinga lawo ngenxa yokunqunyelwa - yingakho umsebenzi wasekhaya ubalulekile".

Uyayibeka nje iTable Bay njengengcono edolobheni? UMestriner unesiqiniseko ngalombuzo:"Ayi okwamanje. Kufanela kuqala siziveze thini. Kukhona ingozi yangempela ekuqhosheni noma ekuzethembeni ngokwedlulele". Ukholelwa sekutheni iKapa linokuningi okubalulekile njengendawo yezokuvakasha kanye neyemihlangano emikhulu. "Singethe silazise esikahthini esingangeminyaka emihlanu. Ezokuvakasha zizoba okuhamba phambili ekusingeniseleni imali - kodwa uma senza kahle umsebenzi. ITable Bay ingelinye igxathu emkhondweni oyiwona wona". Phakathi kwezinto eziphilayo zehotela: Uhla lwalo lamawayini oludluelel luzokhombisa amalebula aseNingizimu Afrika (ngezizathu ezicacile, iChampagne izobe yiyo kuphela ezokwehluka). Kusho uMestriner ngalesizathu esikhaliphile: "Nginezikhathi zokuvuthwa kweMeerlust iyodwa. Yingani kumele ngibheke phesheya kwezilwandle?"Zonke izimoto zipake njengezezinceku lazipaka khona uma zifika futhi zilungiselelwa njengokwezidingo zazo. Ukulungisa yonke into ehotela elisha nakho akukho esikweni. Esikhundleni sokuthi izivakashi zethu zilinde edesikini eliphambili ukunakekelwa, ziyaphelekezelwa futhi ukuya ezindlini zazo bese zilungisa yonke into ngesikhathi ziphuza itiye lamaChina. Isikebhe sohlobo oluphambili kanye nesikebhe futhi esinamandla kuboshelwe khona ehotela okwezivakashi uma zifuna ukuzithokozisa. Wonke amagumbi akhombisa ama-bar amancane asebenza ngekhompuyutha, akala ubungako bokukhona bese futhi esho nokuthi kubiza malini ezivakashini ngokwawo engasetshenzwa muntu ezivakashini ukuthi ziphuze okungakanani kwamalini. Igumbi ngalinye linomshini wefax, ongaxhunyaniswa nokusebenza kwesatallite ukuthola imilayezo noma kuphi emhlabeni. Emyalezweni ukwengeza ukuthinta elinye izinga esimweni esinakekelayo noma kanjani, indawo yokushobinga yabesilisa izogcwaliswa omabula abambalabala (umsebenzi wokuqala kaMestriner wayesebenzisa amagaqa esiqandisi emsebenzini ofanayo). Ama-Aficionados azozikhethela iCuban kanye nezinye izinhlobo ezicolekile zikasigazi esukela enanini lika R10 kuya ku R250 ukubiza kwawo.




ICuban Coup e-Atlantic Grill
Ngaphandle kokungacatshangwa abaseNingizimu Afrka noma abaseMelika, ikhulu leminyaka lamashumi amabili libe nomusa kubabhemi ngaphezu kwanoma esiphi esinye isikhathi emlandweni. Ukusho nje, eminyakeni ewu 400 emhlabeni abaphefuzi balahlekelwa ukukhomba kwabo kanye namakhala emthethweni wokubhema.

Njalo kusho indoda eseyibeke ababhemi besigazi baseNingizimu Afrika yabathi ngxi embusweni obukekayo, uTheo Rudman, yena ekanye noJean Mestriner weSun International, benze iTable Bay yasekapa yaba izulu lalabo abathanda kakhulu iHavana. Usigazi weCuba, ophakathi kwababiza kakhulu emhlabeni, wenza amaphesenti awu-50 amarandi angu-30 000, izinhlobo ezingu 24 zikasigazi zigcinwe endaweni efanelekile - ezinye zigcinwe lapho kunomoya khona oshisayo ebhekekile lapho kufanelwe zigcinwe khona - endlini yehotela yamawayini. Abanye bayatholakala okubalwa kubo labo abaphuma eHonduras, eDominicin Republic, eNicaragua, eJamaica'a Macanudo, odayiswa kakhulu kunayo yonke emhlabeni, kanti futhi, nezinkulu izingcezu zeDitch."Osigazi bafana newayini, izinhlobo zobuwona zingaqhathaniswa nezamawayini abomvu namhlophe. NjengoBurgundy yewani, kanjalo neCuba eyesigazi. Inani elihle lingatholakala kunoma yiliphi izinga etable Bay eqoqweni likasigazi, uqala ku-R4,50.

Kodwa, kusho umbhali wencwajana enquma imithetho yababheni iRodman's Complete Pocket Guide wesigazi (osesikhwameni sephepha, into enone uJohn Platter), akubalulekile noma akuncomeki ukusukela iChurchill yemizuzu engu 90 kube iRobusta yemizuzu engo 30 (noma iRothschild) ingakwenza lokho. Konke kuncike ekushubeni, ukudingeka komoya oswakeme noma ukudingeka kokungabikhona kwayo. Ubude buyize nje, ngesikhathi ekuyisona esishodayo. Ukushuba,uzodonsa ngomhaha ngentshisekelo, amafu anuka kamnandi, umsebenzi omkhulu kanye nomcabango omiyo. Awuzisoli ngesigazi kusho uMnumzane uRodman, futhi okuhle kodwa okunikwa ukuzinikela kwakho okungehlukaniswe. Okulula, uzogwinya intuthu.

Ake sithole lendaba yempilo kuwo wona lomsebenzi: usigazi akuwona nje wokuthi uchaza ukuhogela umoya omubi. Cha, eqinisweni, ilenjimbilili ephuma epipini likagwayi yonke. Ukunambitheka okubalwayo, futhi uMnumzane Rodman uyafunga ukuthi ikhwelo lakhe elicolekile kanye nokunambitheka kwewayini kuthuthukiswe ukubhema usigazi. Kungukuzilolonga, usho ngokuncoma. Ubhema cishe abayela kwabahlanu ngelanga, echaza ukuthi lenjimbilili ephuma epipini likagwayi kanye nekolitayi kwehlile, i-ammonia ayisekho kusigazi ocolekile. Kungumkhiqizo wonke kagwayi, ngokokusonga okuluntwentwe okutshalwe ngokuqinisekisa ngaphansi kwezimo ezishukashukayo ematendeni ama-muslim  abiza ngokwedlulele. Ukukhanyisa nje kulendaba yomoya oswakeme, ukuthi njengoba usigazi weCuban uzwela kangaka ukuthi ugoma ukuqeda umsebenzi wawo ezinsukwini ezimbalwa uma ungabekiwe endaweni ewulungele, usigazi ongcono kunayo yonke wedutch wona eqinisweni womile futhi ungonakala ngokungafaniswa uma ungase uswakanyiswe. Iqabuka elide elingaphuki likasigazi weCuban, unakekelwe futhi walungiswa ngokungalinganiswa, kufanele ugcinwe emswakameni. Usigazi kagwayi waseDutch, uqotshwe futhi wasongwa, awunakulimazeka, futhi unikeza intuthu encanyana."OweDutch ufana newayini elimhlophe kwelibomvu leCuban,"kusho uMnumzane Rodman. Ukuvuka kokuthanda usigazi, uqhubezele ayi kancane ngokugqugquzela komlingisi omkhulu u-Arnold Schwarznegger kanye nabanye, usuzalele kaninginingi okusha, noma eqinisweni, okudala, into emisiweyo,ikilabhu. Yaqanjwa Ngesikhathi sikaVictoria lapho abantu babevunyelwe ukubhema bakhululeke emphakathini lapho umkhuba wawuhwaqabalisiwe, ikilabhu labantu selaphenduka laba okungasetshenziswa, kuze kube manje, ezinsukwini zokufa kwempilo zeminyakeni yenkulungwane "ubuciko obumsulwa" bokubhema sebuvukile. E-United States ngonyaka odlule, amakilabhu angu 500 ababhemi asunguliwe. Kulabo babaleki abasuka ezindaweni lapho kungavunyelwe ukubhema khona eKapa, iTable Bay inikeza isikhoselo. Buka lendawo ngezindaba ekilabhini labo lesigazi! Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noHeather Munetsi: Umphathi wepublic Relations kulenombolo yocingo: (011 780-7572 iFax: (011) 780-7535.




Isizathu sezothando ukujaha ezokuqala
Igumbi elisha lemisebenzi letable Bay. Isitayela saseVictoria sePavilion sengilazi nensimbi ebiza izigidi zamarandi angu 1.6 sengeze kokuphezulu ehotela laseKapa. Ukuthinat kokokuqala kuyasethsenziswa ekuzameni ukukhombisa okusha kwenhle ngokumangalisayo ihotela iTable Bay eKapa, ukuhlangabezana nosuku lokugcina lwangemplea lukaSeptemba mhlka 21. Ihotela selengeze ungxande omuhle wesitayela sePavilion seVictoria ezindaweni zalo zemisebenzi, kanti futhi umcimbi wokuvula kuzoba umshado wababili absebancane basedolobhenmi.

"Siyajabula ngenqubekela phambili esesibe nayo futhi sinesiqiniseko sosuku lokuqeda kahle ngesikhathi ukwenzela umsahdo", kosho uLuigi Marrai ophethe umklamo womsebenzi iSIP, okade futhi eyingxenye yeqembu lokwakha, elihlanganise uhlelo lokwakha lwehotela olobumbene.

Amarandi ayizigidi ezingu 1.6 ukwengeza ehotela, elivulwe onyakeni owodwa odlule, lingaseMpumalanga ye porte cohere kanti lixhumene nendawo yokuhamba eya kumabula, wendawo ebuso busishiyagalombili. IPavilion ibekwe nje ebaleni elikhulu elisedolobheni nje ngaphandle kwendlu yeTable Bay ezenza eyomdanso. Kanye nezikhoselo ngemumva kwezindonga zomlando zamanzi, ekhombisa ubuphandle bobuso bengaphambili lehotela elingasenyakatho. IPavilion engama squere metres angu 195 izongenisa abantu abangu 120 emcimbini wengxubevange yotshwala kanye nabangu 60 uma behlezi ematafuleni azimele omsebenzi omileyo. Ihlanganiswa nehotela ngendlela yokuhamba emboziwe, ine-bar yangasese kanye nendawo yokunakekelwa futhi izosevelwa kusuka emakhishini asehotela.

"Izinto zehotela ezikhona njengamanje zibe sekucindezelekeni okunzima zikweleta udumo lwetable Bay. Ukwengezwa komsebenzi ofana nalo wawudingeka ngempela kanti futhi uzozihlonza ngokushesha njengokudumile njengazo zonke izindawo zethu," kusho umqondisi jikelele weSun International eKapa uJean V Mestriner. Ihotela selibe nemicimbi emikhulu ephakeme yangaphakathi kanye neyamazwe ngamazwe eminyakeni eyedlule, kubalwa kuyo umhlangano omkhulu wezabavakashi abaphezulu be British International be IT&T - umcimbi wokuziqhenya, ayi kuphela kwehotela, kodwa kweNingizimu Afrika, manje eseyiyindawo yokuma kwimap yomhlaba kwezokuvakasha. Okunye okubalulekile ukuba namadoda ohulumeni bomhlaba, okubalwa kuwo uMongameli waseFrance uJacques Chirac kanye neqembu labaphelezeli bakhe njengesivakashi sehotela.

UMnumzane uMarrai uchaza ukuthi ingqalasizinda yangempela yendawo entsha ebivele ikhona kulendawo ngaphandle kwendawo yokudansa futhi isidinge ukubuyekezwa kanye nophahla, okwenziwayo njengamanje. Lokhu kukhombisa umhlobiso ngensimbi,ingilazi kanye nohlobo lokwenziwa kophahla lweVictoria.




ISun City, iphupho lase-Afrika
Indawo yokuvakasha ebalwa kweziphakeme kunazo zonke emhlabeni - ephezulu e-Afrika, Njalo ngonyaka, abavakashi baya khona abayizigidi bakhangwa isiqiniseko esiphilayo somlando wesizwe owalahleka, ePalace enhle ngendlela emangalisayo ngemibhoshongo yayo ejubalele kanye nesimangazayo isiqongo kanye nebhishi elingaphakathi elinjengomlingo eliwashwa amakhulu amagagasi. ISun City iphupho langempela lase-Afrika, eliphakathi enkabeni yehlathi elendlalekile.

Uma ibukwa usemoyeni phezulu, indawo iyabonakala, ngezindawo eziyizungezile ezingayivunulisi, njengeparadesi enkulukazi eluhlaza, ivele njengobucwebe obuphikisana nezintaba ezimangelengele ngasemumnva ngasesifundazweni saseNyakatho-ntshonalanga seNingizimu Africa, ngangamakhilomitha awu-182 ukusuka eGoli. Kwezizathu ezinye ezenza uze eSun City. Kuqala kwakuyi Mecca yokudlala, isishunduziwe ngezikhathi, kanti kanjalo njengoba ikasino iseyiyo into eheha kakhulu kanye nezixuku zabadlali bemishini bebheke ithuba lenhlanhla, izihambi zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nabachithi bamaholide basekhaya beza eSun City ukuzozitholela okwase-Afrika ngokugcwele. IPilannesberg National Park eseduze inikeza ukuhamba ushayela ubukela indawo noma uzihambela ngezinyawo ngendlela ehleleke ngokwedlulele, ngayo yonke iBig Five imelwe. ISun International isizibandakanyile ekwazisweni kwezilwane zendawo ePaki -okusanda kwenzeka nje, isize ngezimali ekwakhiweni kwepaki yezinja ezinkulu zase-Afrika okube yimpumelelo enkulu ekhulule amahectare angu 55 000 epaki. Ipaki yasuselwa kusukela kumahectare angu 1.5 eBom lapho ibihlanganise khona izinja ezintathu ezindala zesilisa ezazalelwa ekuthunjweni kanye nemidlwane enezinyanga ezingu-8 ubudala emikhulu nayo, onina bayo, kanye neyesibili injakazi enkulu endala.

ISun City manje isingukugxila komsebenzi omusha nokusebenza kwezindiza, kusukela ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 31 kuwo lonyaka, ngabakwa SA Express Airways, baxhumanisa izizinda ezinkulu zokuvakasha ePilannesberg, eSkukuza naseHoedspruit, kanye nendiza eqonde eKapa. Lomsebenzi unikeza ukundiza uya noma ubuya nsuku zonke esikhumulweni sezindiza esesanda kulungiswa iPilannesberg eseSun City, uye eSkukuza, eHoedspruit naseKapa. Inhloso ukuvumela abavakashi ukuzikhethela amathuba angcono okuvakashela lezizindawo ezinkulu zozintathu ebuntofontofweni bezokuthutha ngomoya nezindizamshini ezincane. Amakhozi aseSun City okudlalela imiqhudelwano emikhulu igalofu ahlelwe ngendlela kaGary Player, imidlalo yayo yamanzi kanye neminye imidlalo eminingi ekhona, yonke iyaziwa. Ukudlalela umqhudelwano omkhulu weNedbank Golf Challenge usubeke iSun City ezingeni eliphezulu lomdlalo wegalofu wamazwe ngamazwe. Injabulo yakhona ingumlando, kanti futhi abaculi abaphezulu bomhlaba badlala eSuperbowl enezihlalo ezingu 6 000, kanye nase theatre yaseSun City, imidanso emihle kakhulu kanye nezibukeli kuyadlalwa.

Okugqamile phakathi kwezinto zaseSun City iValley of Waves emangalisayo ngobuhle bayo, lapho ukukhukhumala okuhla kakhulu okucishe kube ngamamith amabili ubude kudaleka bese injabulo yolwandle ilethwa ngokugcwele phakathi nezwe. Inkudla yokudlala yaseWaterpark ibala imidlalo ejabulisayo ejulukisayo yamakhayisiliki. Okutshaliwe okumangalisayo okuzungeze iSun City, kanti izingadi zayo zenziwe zathatha ukugqama kweNational Botanic Gardens, ezehlukene kusukela ehlathini elicinene kuya endaweni yemvelo yomdabu. Indawo eyakhiwe ngobuciko emanzi idala ukugcwala kwamanzi okudingekile kwemvelo. Kukhona amahotela amane amakhulu eSun City kanti elihamba phambili elihle iPalace yeLost city, kanye nezinga lokwalo eliphakeme ngokumangalisayo. Ubuciko bezokwakha ongakucabanga kanye neziqeshana ezidlaliselayo ziyavuselela kanti indawo yokulala ikugcina ngesigqi sasebukhosini. Izilwane eziqoshiwe, kanye nalezo ezisetshenziswa ekufekethiseni ngezinhlamvana zamatshe kanye nokukhululeka kwezakhiwo, sisodwa sakha ingxenye yendaba yedolobha elalahleka, kanti esihle kunazo zonke iShawu ibhulonze eyindlovu yenkunzi elithatha libuse yonke indawo lapho libekwe khona. Amagumbi asezingeni eliphezulu ngobucwebe kanye nokwasepalace kuhlotshiswe ngokunothileyo kakhulu. Ihotela ngalinye eSun City linendawo ethinta kokudla esezingeni eliphezulu, okumele amakhishi amadolobha anolwazi lokudla okuhle kakhulu. AneVilla del Palazzo, enye futhi indawo ethengisa ngokudla yasePalace, iCrystal Court, yona yenza ukudla okulula kosuku, bese kuba okukhudlwana okuhlukahlukene kwakusihlwa. Okukhona kukho nokwasolwandle, ingulube igame nenkomo.

Ihotela elihle elinesigqi samanzi iCascades iyikhaya kweyaziwayo iPeninsula Restaurant,egcine isiko elicolekile legumbi lokugrila, lapho ehotela eSun City, ukudla kutholakala e-Orchid, lapho konke ukudla okuqhamuka emazweni asepacific Rim kukhonjiswa khona. Futhi ehotela iSun City kukhon iCalabash Restaurant egxile kakhulu ezinhlotsheni ezahlukene ezimnandi zokhari kanye nokugriliwe kanye neHarlequins nokudala kwayo okukhethiweyo, okubalwa kuko izindishi ezimangalisayo zaseNingizimu Afrika. ECabanas, iMorula Restaurant yaziwa ngesitayela sayo esimaqabuqabu kanye nokungafaniswa okosiwe ngamalahle, kokubili inyama nokudla kwasolwandle, kanti lePalm Terrace yehotela iyindawo ethengisa ngokudla encike ematafuleni abandayo nashisayo ahlukene ahlwabusayo. Isun City inothile ngomgwaqo osuka eGoli kanye noqonde ngqo ngendizamshini encane esuka eKapa. Indawo yamawayini engcono kunazo zonke eNingizimu Afrika eTable Bay
Kukhona amabhodlela ewayini aphakathi kuka 3 000 no 4 000 endlini yamawayini ehotela iSun International Table Bay ebhekene namanzi eKapa. Futhi, ngaphandle kweChampagne, wonke aqhamuka eNingizimu Afrika.

Umhotela ophezulu uJean Mestriner uthi iTable Bay iseva abavakashi basekhaya kanye nabaphesheya kwezilwandle, kanti ngokubona kwakhe, amawayini aseKapa anikeza phakathi kokungcono okukhona emhlabeni. "siqinisekisa emawayinini aseKapa futhi ayaziwa kubadayis mawayini ethu. Akukho okungafani esikunikezayo - kangangoba kukhona ngisho elika R35 ibhodlela," kusho yena. Uyathinta, njengesibonelo ezinhlelweni zeMeerlust."Kokhona izinhlobo ezintathu ezitholakalayo, kanye nokunyukayo kuphinda emumva ko 1976, iMeerlust Cabernet Sauvignon 'yawo 80 kuya ku 86', iRubicon yawo '82 kuya ku94', kubalwa kuwo neMagnums kanye neRehoboams.

Amawayini amhlophe aphuma eConstania abala asemazingeni afana neBuitenverwachtig Buiten Blanc, iGroot Constania Gewurtztraminer, iDurbanville enikeza iBloemendal Savignon Blanc, ngesikhathi ibellingham Chardonnay Haute Cabriece, iCherdonnaya/ Pinot Noir, iL' Ormarins Pinot Gris kanye ne ngenakhuni iCherdonnaya yeMont Rochelles ikhombisa iFranschhoek, iHerderberg emhlophe ibala iVergelegen Chardonnay kanye neSouvignon Balnc. IPaarl yona inikezwa iFairview, iGlen Carlou neNederburg ngezinhlobo zeChrodonnay, iBukettrambe kanye neChenin Blanc. IDe Wetshof, iSpringfield neSandvliet indizisa ifulegi ngezifunda zeRobertson/Klein Karoo, ngenkathi iStellenbosch iletha eyayo iWeisser Riesling ephuma eKaapzicht, iCherdonnay ephuma eSxonburg, iChardonnay ephuma eTalana Hill ne Zonnebloem's Savignon Blanc.

ISwart neTheuniskraal baletha ngokuzethemba eyabo iChardonnay ne Senillon Chardonnay ephuma kubadayisi bamawayini eTulbagh/ Swartland ngesikhathi iwalker Ban ne-Overberg zinikezwa yiPaul Cluver's Auction Selection Chardonnay yango 1993, iBouchard Finlayson Chrdonnay ne Hamilton Russel Chardonnay. Abomvu wona aqukethe okujabulisayo nokumangalisayo okuphuma eConstania, eDurbanville, eFranschhoek, eHelderberg (ngo ngqo shishilizi weMeerlust), ePaarl, eRobertson, eStellenbosch - ngesiqephu sika 46 - seTulbagh ne -Overberg. Bafaka iRustenberg Dry Red yango 1974, iMagnum yeBertram Shiraz yango 1985, eyango 1987 i-Alto Cebernet Sauvignon, iKanonkop Pinotage yango 1987 ne-Uitkyk Cabernet/ Shiraz yango 1994. Amawayini asogwadule athuthwa bese ekhonjiswa endlini yamawayini eTable Bay anjengesithunzi njengese KWV Tanige kusukela ngo 1929 kanye nokumbalwa okwavela ngo 1948 kubadayisi abafanayo, phakathi kwabangu 18 abanye futhi. Kanti iChampagne iqhamuka emagameni angahlanganyeli bomahlaba nokucolisekile: iKrug (iGrand Cuvee yango 1985, no'87), iBolliger, iLaurent Perrier, iLouis Roeder iMoet et Chandon, iBeuve Clicquot, iBeanmount neTaittinger.
