Ihhovisi lezendawo lamazinga amazwe ngamazwe
Ngesikhathi ihotela iSun International Table Bay iyikhaya usuka ekhaya, kubahambi basekhaya nabamazwe ngamazwe kanye nabachithi bamaholide, labo abaseKapa ngomsebenzi bazothola ihhovisi ehotela elilingana nanoma iliphi abangalenza kakhulukazi bezenzela bona.

Isizinda samabhizinisi ehotela sinikeza ihhovisi lendawo lohlobo lwe-five star nakho konke okusha empahleni yamahhovisi. Okuthathe indawo yama-squire metres angu 125, isizinda samabhizinisi sisenkabeni yokubalulekile okwenziwayo ehotela, eduze kwendawo yokudayisa enkundleni yokuqala ofika ngezitebhisi ezihambayo enkundleni ephansi, izitolo namahhovisi eWaterfront V no A eseduze. Imizuzwana nje ushayela usuka eCBD, isizinda samabhizinisi sitholakala kahle kakhulu njengendawo yokuhlangana okubalulekile kakhulu.

Abaphathi bendawo baqeqeshiwe kanye nawo wonke amalungiselelo enokunakekelwa kwangaphandle kanye nabafakeli bempahla basezingeni eliphezulu bahlelwe ihotela. Ukuseva umuntu ngamunye kosomabhizinisi kanye nalabo abeze emihlanganweni emikhulu, imisebenzi yobubhalane kubalwa nokushicilela komsebenzi okade uqoshwa wenziwa amagama alotshwiwe kanye nokusetshenzwa kokuhlotshisiwe osekuvele kukhona, kubalwa nokukhishwa kokushicilelwe okubekwa ematafuleni, ukugaywa kwemisebenzi ibhalwa kanye nokukopishwa kweminye imisebenzi, kumele izigqebhezana zamagama abo zenziwe kanye namakhadi endawo eqoshiwe.

Ukunqunyelwana kwesikhathi kungenziwa, kanye nezithunywa nezigijimi zihlelwe ukuyisa imisebenzi edolobheni, ngaphakathi ezweni kanye nangaphandle. Ukusebenza kwefax kusebenza ngaphakathi ezweni lonke kanye naphesheya kwezilwandle ukwamukela noma ukukhipha ngaphandle, kanti futhi imisebenzi ingahunyushwa uma kuceliwe. Ukuqasha ukusebenza kwempahla yehhovisi kusebenza kulabo abafisa ukuba nemihlangano noma benikeza izinkulumo bekhombisa okuthile. Kulokho kubalwa nama-overhead projector, ama-slide projector, omabonakude, kanye nokokuthwebula izithombe kwevideo, njengoba amafax, omakhalekhukhwini, amakhompuyutha amancane, okokukhipha amagama kanye nokokuqopha umsindo nako kutholakala. Amahhovisi amathathu angasese nawo ayatholakala, kukhona kuwo idesika, iredenza, umabonakude, iPC ene-Microsoft Software yakamumva kanye nesikhiphi magama alotshiwe. Kukhona ucingo ehhovisi ngalinye kanye nokungena kwi-email, kwi-Internet kanye neFax. Kukhona igumbi lebhodi elingangenisa abantu abangu-10, ibhekene netheku kanye neTable Mountain, inomabonakude owu-72 cm, iVCR, i-overhead ne-slide projector, ivideo yokuthwebula umhlangano nakho konke okwenzekayo, ukungena kwi-email, i-Internet, kanye nebar encane. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noHeather Munetsi: uMphathi wePublic Relations kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780-7572 iFax: (011) 780-7535.




ICamelot International ithatha indawo yeSpa.
ICamelot International ithatha indawo yeSpa ehotela iTable Bay, Isizinda sezempilo sokuqala saseNingizimu Afrika edolobheni, ehotela iSun International Table Bay, seyithathwe iqembu lezempilo kanye nokunakekelwa kwesikhumba iCamelot International.

ICamelot eyasungulwa ngo 1985, futhi ephethe izizinda zezempilo kwezinye izindawo zokuvakasha ezimbili zeSun International, iGary Player Health Spa eseSun City kanye neHealth and Beauty Spa eseZimbali Lodge KwaZulu-Natal. Ingumnikazi futhi wezinto ezimbili endaweni yaseGoli lapho inezizinda zayo. Inhloko yaCamelot International, uDebbie Meddjan umelaphi owaqeqeshwa eStellenbosch, wathi ukuthola kwakhe isizinda sezempilo kwakungukuhlanganyela nesun International.

Ukunakekela nokwelapha eTable Bay Spa ngaphambi kokuphatha kwabasebenzi abakhethwe iCamelot kugcwalisa ubuhle bengqalasizinda yokutholakala khona. Isizinda sezempilo sakhelwa ihotela ezingeni eliphezulu lamazwe ngamazwe ngesikhathi esiseminyakeni engaphezulu kwemibili eyedlule, futhi sesibe indawo yekhefu edumile yezivakashi ezisehotela, kanye nakubahlali baseKapa. Ngamagumbi okulaphela odlondlobele, izingubo zokujima kanye nempahla yakhona okubalwa kuyona ezokwelapha zase-Europe nezaseMelika, isizinda sezempilo sibekwe kahle ngobunyoninco eduze kwechibi lokubhukuda elimbozwe ngophahla elihle ngokumangalisayo leTable Bay.

UNkosikazi Merdjan wathi iqembu lakhe ligxile empilweni esezingeni nasekunakekeleni isikhumba futhi ubehlela ukwazisa ngezobuchwepheshe zakamumva nje, kanti ukugcizelela kuhleleka ngokwelashwa okwehlukene eTable Bay Spa. Izinhlelo zemikhiqizo yama-thalassotherapy azimisele yokwelapha okuphathelene nezasolwandle sekukhona, kuhlangene nokuphambili kakhulu ukwelashwa okwehlukene iphytotherapy ephathele nezitshalo, iHydrotherapy kakhulukazi ezindlini ezinempahla nayo ingebalulekile kakhulu ukwelapha, kusho yena.

ICamelot igxile ezinhlelweni zabantu ngabodwana ezivakashini, noma ngabe izivakashi zehotela noma abahlali bendawo, inhloso lapho isekwelashweni kwezophuzo olodakayo. Okokuzinakekela kosuku kuyatholakala, kanye ngisho nokokuzelapha emaceleni amachibi okufana ne-reflexology kanye nokuphathwa phathwa ngasemumva emhlane kuyatholakala kwabavakashi. Amaphakethe okuzinakekela kosuku anomvuzo anikezelwa ezinkampanini ezibheke ukunikeza abasebenzi imivuzo. "Sigxile futhi nasekunakekeleni ezokuhlinzelwa ukufakwa isikhumba sikacwazi ezigulini, futhi sibheke phambili ukunikeza loku kunakekela kubo bobabili abavakashi bangaphakathi nabaphesheya kwezilwandle," kusho uNkosikazi Merdjan.




Ihotela iTable bay - Engenye kwaholayo
Ihotela iTable Bay yabizwa njengenya kwaholayo amahotela omhlaba esikhathini esingangezinyanga eziyisithupha ivulile. Ihotela iTable Bay eseVictoria ne-Alfred Waterfront eKapa isibekwe yaba ephezulu kwahlonishwayo emhlabeni ngokungenisa kwayo emahoteleni aholayo aphezulu ngezinga emhlabeni, ijoyina indawo yamahotela aphezulu awu0308 nje kuphela emazweni angu 68.

"Sekube futhi enye indaba ka-Oscar ngeTable bay," kusho uJean V Mestriner, umqondisi wesifunda weSun International eNtshonalanga Kapa eqondise entweni eletha inhlanhla ehotela, u-Oscar, isithombe saseKapa sebhulonze epholishwe kahle ngokumangalisayo esime phakathi nendawo ebukekayo ngasekungeneni okungaseningizimu. U-Oscar ukhombisa ngokwehlukana ngezithombe ukumaka umlando omfishane owenziwe ngamatshe ngobuhle obumangalisayo behotela, okubalwa kuzo ezifaka omongameli kanye namakhosana, abaculi abadumile, onobuhle kanye nezinkinsela kwezamabhizinisi."Ukuqinisekisa lokukubekwa phezulu kosaziwayo emhlabeni kuqheliswe ukungena kwethu emahoteleni aholayo omhlaba, enye yezinhloso zethu kusukela ngesikhathi ihotela lisungulwa." Kosho uJean V Mestriner.

Isitayela sikaMnumzane Mestriner sokuphatha esingafaniswa nesamuntu samahotela asewavulile amazwe ngamazwe, sekuholele ekungagejini ekubekweni kwabo ohleni lwamahotela aholayo umhlaba wonke. Abahlanganyeli bethu emahotela baphendule ngokuncoma ekucelweni inselelo yokuphumelela esiqongweni sempumelelo ngamahotela ethu,"kusho yena. Amahotela adlule asephathe kuwona wawabeka ezingeni laholayo, ngesitayela sakhe sokuqeqeshwa okungafaniswa, noma amahotela aholayo abe ehlanganyele kuwo, kubalwa kuwo ihotela iWindsor Court eseNew Oeleans, iBel Air eseLos Angeles, iRegent eseKuala Lumpur kanye neRegent eseWashington DC.

IPalace yeLost city aseSun City, eyavulwa nguMnumzane Mestriner, nayo isithathwe yabekwa kwaholayo amahotela omhlaba. Okwamanje nje usethathe ukulungiswa kabusha kweBlue Train: "nayo engikholelwa ukuthi uzokulungela ukungena emahoteleni aholayo omhlaba, uma yayingekho emasondweni," kusho uMnumzane Mestriner. Uhla lwamahotela aholayo omhlaba aseqoqweni langempela lobuhle obuyisimanga bobucwebe bendawo yokulala kanye nokunakekelwa okwedlulele okutholakala kuwona. Inhlangano, ebunjwe ngabaphathi abaphezulu bamahotela adumile, ikhombisa ubuhlakani obungakaze bubonwe nokuqina komsebenzi okubophene, kanti ukuwavakashela kwenziwe ukuqinisekisa amahotela angamalunga asaligcinile izinga lomsebenzi okuwuwona akhethelwa wona.

Inhlangano imelwe izindlu zezivakashi ezingaphezu kuka 92 000, futhi igcina amahhovisi okusebenza nawezifunda ezindaweni ezingu-15 emhlabeni. Amagama adume kakhulu ahlanganyele nalomsebenzi kubalwa kuwo, iPeninsula eseHong Kong, iRaffles eseSingapore, iRitz eseParis, iPlaza eseNew York, iKing David eseJerusalem, iWindsor Court esenwe Orlearns, iBel Air eseLos Angeles, iRegent Beverly Wilshire eseBeverly Hills kanye neLondon's Claridges, Isavoy, iDorchester kanye neHyde park.



Iphepha eliqukethe amaqiniso ngehotela iTable Bay
IKapa, yidolobha elidala eNingizimu Afrika elasungulwa ngo 1952 njengendawo yokuphumula ngasogwini lwaseNingizimu Afrika . Lendawo yayenzelwe imikhumbi yaseDutch East Indian Company. Endaweni enobuhle obumanaglisayo, okumanje kuyindawo ethandwa abavakashi.

Indawo ethandwa kakhulu abavakashi yiVictoria ne-Alfred Waterfront, egcinwe nesathandwa njengechweba elisebenzayo indawo yayo enegmumva yiTable Mountain. Ihamba iyoshaya etable Mountain, okunamagagasi ashaya umoya onamandla ngaseNyakatho owenzela udumo lwePeninsula igama elithi "IKapa leziphepho" igama eliphikisana kakhulu nezibongo zeFrances Drage ezithi eziphakeme ezithi"IKapa elizothile kuzozonke ezindawo ezigudala umhlaba." IKapa elinokuphikisana empeleni. KwiWaterfront yomlando, ihotela elakhiwe elingayona ingqayizivele kwindawo elikuyo kodwa eliyingqayizivele kumhlaba wonke ngendlela yokudla kwalo nokungcebeleka okutholakala khona. Ihotela iTable Bay iyamangalisa, igxamalazele udonga olwakhiwe ngesidala esihambisana nesitayela esihambiselana nendawo ekuyo. Iyindawo eyisakhiwo esiyigugu, indlela eyakhiwe ngayo nangendlela esebenza ngayo namazwe ngamazwe. Izindlu zibhekene nechweba, noma iRobben Island, ijele elikhulu laseNingizimu Afrika elalihlala uMongameli omdala uNelson Mandela iminyaka engu 27 eboshiwe, noma ibhekene nedolobha kanye neTable Maountain. Ihotela lavulwa nguMunumzane Mandela ngomculo wezimfiloji ngoMay 1997 okwalandela umgubho omkhulu owawuhanjelwe izikhulu zizobona ubukhazikhazi bedolobha.

Indlela yokungena. Ihotela ligqagqe ngemizuzu ewu-20 kusukela esekhumulweni sezindiza saseKapa kanye nemizuzu emihlanu kusukela enkabeni yedolobha. Kanti ngakwesokudla somnyango kukhona izitolo ezinkulu, ezinezimpahla ezinhlobonhlobo nezinika amathuba amakhulu okuhamba ubuka. Okujwayelekile lapha izivakashi eziyizigidi ezingu 16 ezifika lapha njalo ngonyaka. Isimo sezulu. IKapa linesimo saseMediterranean esinobusika obubandayo nelanga elishisayo nomoya owomile. NgoDesemba kuya kuMashi, izulu liyashisa, liphole kusukela ngo-Epreli kuya kuJuni, Ubusika, ngoJulayi kuya kuSeptemba, bupholile bunezimvula nentwasahlobo yaseKapa enezimbali nokubalela kusukela ngo-Oktoba kuya kuNovemba. Intela, iVAT ikhokhelwa 14% ephinde ikhokhelwe emaphandleni ezidayisayo zidayiswa izihambeli zangaphandle.

Ugesi ungu 220 volts. Ezokuhamba, imoto eshayelwayo iyatholakala ukuya nokubuya ehotela nasesikhumulweni sezindiza. Nemoto engakuhambisa uma uyidinga iyatholakala. Indlela ongagqoka ngayo. Uma kukusihlwa ungagqoka -casual. Umphathi, iTable Bay ingaphansi kweSun International iphethwe ngumdondisi wesifunda  saseNtshonalanga Kapa, uJean Mestriner.  Abakhi balo, iCalifornia USA Architectural Design, iLouis Karol Architects , iCape Town Interior Design, iTrish Wilson and Associates, iDallas Texas USA . Ukungena, lapha kunendawo yokungena izimoto esuka esangweni elikhulu ize ifinyelele endaweni yokungenela ehotela. Endaweni yokupaka izimoto, izimoto zipaka abantu abaqashelwe ukupaka izimoto, zihamba ziphumele ngale konqenqema lodonga zihamba emgudwini oyibhodlela owagcotshwa noma owavulwa ngumntwana uAlfred ngo 1869 ozalwa yiNdlovukazi uVictoria. Endaweni ophumela kuyo uphumela endaweni eyakhiwe ngamapulangwe phansi, eqhamuka kwindawo yokwamukela izivakashi, nalapho kuxhumana khona izivakashi. IDining Atlantic Grill, lena yindawo eyi-restaurant enkulu yehotela , enkulu ngangama-square metres angu 400, ehlala abantu abangu 166 ngaphakathi, nabangu 108 ngaphandle onqenqemeni. Ehlotshiswe ngemura nangokhaphethi, ibhekene netheku kanye neTable Mountain.

I-Atlantic Grill idayisa ukudla kwasekuseni kwe a la carte, ukudla kwasemini nokwakusihlwa kwe a la carte. Inanebhodlela stolo elidayisa amawayini angu 600 kanye namaChampagne. ITable Bay yikhaya labantu abadla isigazu kanti utshwala obudayisayo bunhlonhlobo obomhlaba. Indawo yokuphumula enosilinga ovele obala, newindi elikhulu, eliphinde lenza ifremu ye-Oscar. Izitebhisi ezimbalwa ezisuka phansi kwindawo yokungena, Indawo yokudla, iseduzane kakhulu nolwandle, enemibhalo nemidwebo etshengisa imikhumbi ehamba phakathi kolwandle. Izivakashi ezingu 60 zingamukelwa kosofa abantofontofo nasezihlalweni ezithungwe zambozwa ngendwangu esezingeni eliphezulu. Yilapha lapho itiye laseTable Bay elidume kakhulu liphuzelwa khona ntambama yasebusuku, noma lapha izihambeli zingahambela khona zizophuza emva kokudla noma ziphuze itiye noma ikhofi lasekuseni. Ubusika, izindawo ezimbili zokotha umlilo zikufudumeza endlini entofontofo ehlotshiswe ngezimbali ezigqamile zakulelihotela. Kunomculo odlala e-gallery ephezulu, umculo we-Violina ne-harp ngezikhathi zetiye. I-Atlantic Bar yindawo yokuhlanganela nje ukuze abantu bathokoze. Lendawo ethengisa ngotshwala iyindawo engama-square metres angu 356, iyindawo enokudla kwe a la carte ngasosonke isikhathi, ikhofi namasaladi. Izindawo zokuhlangana, indlu yokudansela iyindawo enhle kakhulu ehlukene kabili-iyinye ingama-square metres angu 150. Ihlanganise indawo yokudansela engahlala abantu abangu 300. Kunendawo lapho kungahlalwa khona ngaphambi komcimbi ethatha abantu abangu-400 kuthi uma iminyango ivaliwe ingathatha abantu abangu 800. Igumbi lebhodi lincikene nendlu yokudansela ihlala abantu abangu 24 ifakwe konke okufanele imihlangano. Indlela enhle ophathwa ngayo iyayifanela indlela eyiyo lendlu yebhodi. Kukhona amakamelo ezivakashi. Ihotela iTable Bay inamakamelo angu 330 anezilungiso moya aqukethe izindlu ezihamba ngazimbili, izindlu ezinkulu, izindlu zemindeni, amakamelo okusiza izivakashi ezikhubazeke esingezansi, namakamelo awubukhazikhazi akanokusho. Kunamakamelo angu 26 amakhulu e-deluxe suites kanye nangu 3 egrand suite. Kunamakamelo ahlotshisiwe anamakhabethe awubukhazikhazi kanokusho. Ahlotshiswe ngomabula, yimure kanye namadesika okubhala futhi lilinye ikamelo line-bar encane kanye nokudla okungena izikhathi zonke amahora angu 24 ngosuku. Izindlu azamukeli muntu ebusuku kanti zilungiswa kabili ngosuku. Omabonakude abanama satellite. Izindlu zokugeza zinamashawa ahlukene apholisa amanzi, kanye kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezinamashawa ezandla. Kunezomisi zinwele ongazisebenzisa kanye nemithi yokuziphophotha evelele umhlaba wonke bese kuthi izinto izinsipho nokunye kuyanikezelwa kubavakashi. Kunezibuko. Nezingubo zokubhinca uma uya eshaweni kanye nama-slippers akhona. Izingcingo zikhona ngisho ezindaweni zokugeza, ezindaweni zokulala nakumadesika okubhala ngalinye. Ucingo lulunye lunesiqophi mazwi nento yokubamba ucingo olungenayo. ITable Mounatin Suite esenkundleni yesi 8 esehotela iTable Bay iyizulu elincane engakhohleki nakancane, kusukela emapulangweni kasilingi yakhona evele obala kamnandi kuya kukhaphethi, yimabula ehlobisile kanye nephansi lamapulangwe. Zonke Izingilazi zakhona ziyacwebezela kanti lonke isiliva lakhona liqinile. Izindlu zakhona zibheke ichweba, idolobha kanye neTable Mountain ngale. Ngale kobuhle bempahla, ipulangwe lakhona namakhava, iTable Mountain Suite inezinto eziwubukhazikhazi bodwa ngokwedlulele. Indlu yokulala, kanye namakamelo okubandakanayo kuwo izindlu zokugqoka, yokugeza izinhlobo ezimbili ezihlotshisiwe ngemabula phezulu kanye nobukhazikhazi bamapayipi amanzi, kanye nendlu yokugeza enkulu enamashawa amabili ahlukene, konke okuhlobise lona kuyimabula. Izindlu zokugeza zibhekene netheku, nedolobha neTable Mountain. Idina labangu 8 lingahlaliswa etafuleni lokudla kanti ikhishi lakhona lingalungiselwa umcimbi. Abaculi bakhona lapho umdlali wopiyano egadla inguzanguza yopiyano yakwa Stein. Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala ikala amakani angabiza kakhulu kanti neziphuzo zifakwa ezingilazini eziwubucwebe. Izitulo nosofa basendaweni yokuhlala bazothile futhi bantofontofo, bambozwe ngendwangu yekhethelo. ITable Mounatain Suite iyona enkulu kunawo wonke lawa awu 3 kwamakhulu amasuite ehotela lilonke. Lawa amanye iSignal Hill kanye neLion's Head womabili ahlobe ngokuhlukile, njengendlu yokugeza yaseVictoria kanye nompheme ongakwazi ukubona indawo engaphezu kuka 180 degrees ukubukeka. Isizinda samabhizinisi amazwe ngamazwe, lendawo engangama square metres angu 125 iseduze nendawo yokuthenga enkundleni yokuqala ehanjwa ngezitebhisi ezihambayo. Lendawo inendlu yebhodi engena abantu abangu 10 enalokhu okulandelayo; imisebenzi yobubhalane, umsebenzi wezokuhamba, kanye nendawo yokuboleka izimoto. Indlu yebhodi ibhekene netheku neTable neMountain. Kunomabonakude iVCR ivideo ucingo kanye nama bar amancane. Kanye nokudla okulula kuyatholakala. Kunamahhovisi angu 3 anakho konke ongakudinga lapho osomabhizinisi bengasebenzela khona noma basizwe abasebenzi balapho. Nomsebenzi wamaphepha nawo ungatholakala lapha njengokubhala, ukukopisha, kanye nokuningi okwenziwa khona ukusiza abemihlangano okubandakanye ukuhambisa amaphepha, uku-emaila noma uku fax. Kunedesika leRennie Travel esiza ekushintsheni imali yakwamanye amazwe, imoto ebolekisayo kanye nemininingwane mayelana nezindiza, ukuhamba ngebhasi nokuvakasha kanye nokubekisa indawo kulezindawo esezibaliwe ngenhla. Isizinda sezamabhizinisi siseduze nomnyango wehotela ophezulu ohlangana ngqo nezitebhisi ezihambayo okuphumela endaweni evulekile engangama square metres angu 4 000. IPhansi leHealth Club ne Spa kuya ophahleni lwengilazi okuhlanginisa lekilabhu yezempilo neSpa engangama square metres angu 300 ophumela ngqo endaweni yokucwala ubuso nendawo yechibi. Ubuka ngqo iRobben Island. ISpa inendlu yeistimu kanye nezinye izindlu zokwelapha. Abalaphi banikeza uluhla olubanzi lokwelapha okubalwa kulo ithassotherapy, ukuphathwa phathwa emumva emhlane, iShiatsu kanye ne-arometherapy. Abaqeqeshi abakufundele bayatholaka ejimini. Indawo yechibi, Lelichibi lingangama square metres angu 500 libhekene nelanga usuku lonke. Ubuntofontofo besivakashi, kukhona izihlalo ezintofontofo zelanga ezingu-60 eziseziqwini zokhuni ezizungeze lelichibi elihehayo. Ngakwelinye icala kuneBar eseva okuphuzwayo, ukudla okulula kanye nokudla okunempilo. Ukuzijabulisa, iV $ A Waterfront inikeza uhlobo olubanzi lwezinto ongazenza nongazibona, Endaweni yePierhead, izindawo ezimbili ezivulekile ezingenela olwandle I-Atlantic eseNingizimu kanye nezinye izinto zasolwandle eziphilayo ngezinhlobo zazo ezihlukene okubalwa kuzo umthili omkhulu, ovulekele olwandle. Okuseduze kwakho, kukhona okuningi okumangalisayo ongakubona. Inothile ezintweni zakudala ezasalayo, iSouth African Maritime Museum kwenza ukuphumela ngaphandle kube into ejabulisayo. Kukhona izimakethe, izinkundla zezitolo ezixubile kanye nezitebele, mama-cabarets kanye namaqembu adlala umculo bukhoma. Okokuhamba okuqashwayo izikhathi zonke okukunikeza yonke inhlobo yohambo  ngendlela ongayicabanga, kubandakanya uhambo olufishane ngasogwini, ukungcebeleke ogwini uya eBhishi iClifton kanye nokuzungeza iRobben Island, bese kuba khona i-Afga Amphitheatre, iV & A Arcade, i-Old Wharf, iFish Quay kanye neWaterfront Café. Uma ungabujabuleli ubuhle nezinhlobo ze V & A Waterfront, okunye ngaphandle kwalokho okukake iTable Bay, lapho ulindwe khona imidlalo engapheli kanye nejabulo yokubuka ubuhle bezwe. Izifunda zaseKapa ezidumile zewayini zilindele ukuhuha abavakashi kusukela emabhishi asagolide ngasemnyango, ukubhudukeza uhambo olungenakukhohleka lwezindawo zewayini zaseKapa. Ukuvakashela kwezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo izingadi zeKirstenbosch kuyimpoqo nokubuka izwe ushayela ugudla ugu akukaze kuhluleke ukushiya umuntu eshiselekile. Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla zisukela kwezinolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba, kuya kwezasesifundazweni saseKapa kanye namakhishi angaphandle kwezwe ahlangene kuso sonke isifunda. Ukuvakashela kwemangalisayo iCape Point, noma uzingcebelekele uzungenze iGreen Market Squire egandaywe ngamatshe enezinhlobo zezimpahla eziluchungechunge. IKapa futhi inikeza izinhlobo zokuhamba ngezinyawo indawo ende kanye nokuhamba unqamula ihlathi kanye nokukhwela intaba kanye nokuhamba uya phezulu eTable Mountain ngendlela yekhebula eyakhiwe kabusha. Ukuhamba ngamahhashi, nemicrilight, ukugibela amabhayisikili - eqinisweni ezemidlalo kanye nemidlalo yamanzi kwezinhlobo zonke kudonsa abavakashi bangaphakathi nabangaphandle abashisekileyo unyaka wonke futhi bengendana nesimo sezulu, amabhishi aseKapa amahle kakhulu adonsa ababoni bokubukekeyo, abadumisi belanga kanye nababhukudi unyaka wonke.




Ukunqoba kokusebenza ngokuhlanganyela namazwe angaphandle
Ihotela iSun International Table Bay - ukunqoba kokusebenza ngokuhlanganyela namazwe omhlaba "Ingxubevange ehambisanayo nemangalisayo yokwakhiwa kwamazwe ngamazwe kanye nobungcweti". Yiyona ndlela umakhi womklamo  uRick Brown achaza ngayo ihotela elihamba phambili iSun International table Bay eseKapa eV & A Waterfront.

Ihotela elingubucwebe lohlobo lwe five star elibiza izigidi zamarandi ezingu 250 selibe ngukunqoba ngempela kokuhlanganyela. Indawo yalo ebukwayo enhle kakhulu engasenyakatho, idonsa ukuthelelwa yiVictoria ngasesiqeshini sokwakhiwa, umhlobiso, umsebenzi wensimbi kanye nenkulu yesitayela se-gazebo iPorte cochere, ihambisana kahle kakhulu nengemumva leTable Mounatain, itheku elisebenzayo lomlando kanye nokwakhiwa kwalo kwekhulu minyaka lawo 19. Ngokuzwelana kwalo nolayini abalidlaliselayo bezakhiwo ezikhona esezenze usuku lokuqala lokuthuthuka kweQuay Six eseWaterfront,ihotela iTable Bay lifanekisa ngakunye ngakunye elikumele ngemithelela okunayo.

Futhi imithele eyayihlukene. URick Brown umele ezokwakha zaseNingizimu Afrika ukuqopha ezokwakha zikaLouis Karol, oqondene cishe nazo zonke izakhiwo eziseKapa eCBD ngesikhathi iqembu lezokuzithokozisa iLos Angeles based Landmark, babanye balabakhi basebenza ePalace yeLost City, babeqondene nokusungulwa nomsuka. Ukwengeza, inkampani yeV & A Waterfront yathintwa ekwakhiweni ngokwesayensi evele ikhona ngaphakathi endaweni. Okwangapahakathi kwasekuhlelwe nguWilson and Associates, inkampani yokwakha kwangaphakathi yaseMelika eyayiqondene nezinto ezimangalisayo ezisePalace yeLost City. Ezibandakanya nokugxila esimweni saseNingizimu Afrika wase ehlangabezane nezinkingana ezimbalwa, kusho uBrown, njengoba izindlela zokwakha, izinto zokwakha nokokuqeda kujwayelekile emazweni amaningi nokuthi ezimweni ezimbalwa lapho izinto zokwakha zasemazweni angaphandle kanye nezindlela ezokotshelwayo - kakhulukazi kanye neziphathelene nokufaka umabula phansi. Isakhiwo, kusho yena siyaheha okwangempela.

"isidingo samaphupho, njengoba sikhonjiswe ePalace, asigcinekanga. Ihotela liphendulela okulizungezile, kanye nokudonsa umkhondo, konke kuyatholakala eWaterfront, kwanetshelwa lona. " okuthandwa kakhulu abangaphandle, ukubolekwa kwalo izimpawu njengophawu emhlobisweni, okunye kwezinto eziningi zezimboni kanye nokuxhashazwa kwezindawo ezibukwayo konke kwaba izimpendulo zokuphilayo ngezikhathi ezifaneleyo." "Iqiniso lokuthi zonke izindlu nokwazo zonolwandle noma ukubukeka kwezintaba, kwakungokokuqala okwadingeka kubathuthukisi beSun International, ngesikhathi ukulondoloza kodonga olunqamula amanzi lomlando oluchusha ezindleleni zokuhamba zehotela zaziwumthetho wenational Momments Council." Ingaphakathi lehotela likhombisa izinyathelo eziveza izinto ezahlukene, eziningi zazo zingaphandle kwesakhiwo. Ukuhamba unqamula imifekethiso eyenziwe ngezinhlamvwana zikamabula wase-Europe ezinqanyulwe ngobuchwepheshe ngasekungeneni enkundleni enohlobo lokhuni oluhle kakhulu oluqhamuka ngaphandle kwezwe nesapulangwe eliba ngama square metres angu 200, isivakashi sibhekene namawindi abhekene neningizimu adlaliselayo, aveza cishe yonke iTable Mountain, kanye nokusebenza kwetheku khona ngaphansi. Ngaphansi kwalendawo yokungena ngaseningizimu, kukhona indawo yokuphumula enkulu enophahla lwayo olusandlu yesonto kanye namaziko amabili. Ngasentshonalanga kukhona iConservatory nebar kanye namakheshi akuthatha akuse enkundleni ephezulu enezitolo kanye neSpa. Umfanekiso odwetshiwe ngobuciko ensimbini nofaxaziwe ngamakhono aqukethwe eKapa - ubonakala ezitebhisini zikamabula eziya endaweni yokuziphumulela kanye nasezindongeni zengilazi eziseceleni ezitebhisini ezihambayo. IKapa ikhunkula ukhonkolo ngemibala enobuhlakani okudala izitsha eziqukethe amapalms enziwe ekhaya kanye nemichachazo.

Endaweni yokungena evulekile, amadesika aqophile okhuni olucolekila emaka isiteshi sokufikela ehotela, umlindisivalo, indawo yokwamukela, indawo lapho kutholakala khona ulwazi nalapho abavakashi bexhuma khona izinto. Uma ubheka ngasentshonalanga, ubheke ngasendaweni enekheshi, indawo evulekile enomhlobiso wakudala ukunikeza ukungenela osebeni lwekheshi, ngeminyango yawo ecwebezela okwedlulele efufuzelwe ngesitensela, evulwa ngamakhadi. Umphathi wezentuthuko weSun International eNtshonalanga Kapa, uBrian Read uyakuthinta ukuthi inkinga, umsebenzi ophezulu wokupenda ngokufusa wathathwa umkhandi we dockside umsebenzi wakhe owatholakala ungenasici. Umhleli weWilson and Associates uGeorge Aldridge ukhombisa izinkinga zokubeka izitebhisi zendlu egcina amabhuku endlini yamawayini e-Atlantic Grill, indawo yehotela eqavile ethengisa ngokudla. Indlu yamawayini igcina amabhodlela angu 4 000 kanye neqoqo losigazi abakhethekile kuphela esimweni esihle. Indawo ethengisa ngokudla, ngezindawo zayo ezinkulu ezimbili, enomaka ngokuhlonisa ngokwesiko okukhombisa amagilebhisi kanye nezithelo zaseKapa, kanye negumbi lokudla langasese elisesihosheni, kungaseMpumalanga yendawo yokuphumula futhi kubhekene neNingizimu kuya kwamangalisayo amagilazi amawindi abhekene nentaba netheku. Isibaya semikhumbi esiseduze, esikulungele ukungenisa umkhumbi omkhulu othwala abantu ohamba olwandle, sikhombisa igungu yomkhumbi khona embundwini wendawo ethengisa ngokudla. "Izindaba ezimangalisayo" kusho u-Aldridge. Okulingana nokumangalisayo imidwebo edwetshwe odongeni kulo lonke ihotela, ngezingqikithi zeKapa ezithathe indawo enkulu yodonga, kuya ophahleni oluhlotshiswe ngesitensela ezinezinhlobo zezithelo. Inani likakhonkolo ongangama-cubic metres angu 10 000 wathelwa ukuqeda lesisakhiwo samagumbi angu 330 eSun International Cape Flagship, ngonkintileka ehlangene eyabona umsebenzi wenkontileka nokwenza uqedwa ezinyangeni ezingu 18.




Izinto eziqhubekezayo nezimihlangano emikhulu
Izindawo zethu ezimbili zemihlangano zinempahla yolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba ezenziwe ngobuchwepheshe bonyaka, impahla yokusebenza eseqophelweni eliphezulu.

Itafula lokufundela elinempahla yokusebenzela lizosebenza: iOverhead video projector, umshini iVCR, ukukhanya, iSatellite yemigudu kamabonabakude, ikhompuyutha exhunyiwe, enye impahla ekhona kubalwa kuyo: iCorousel slide projector, i-overhead projector, ilaser pointer, iPA system, ibhodi elimhlophe lama-slide, ishadi leFlip, elinokokubhala namapeni, iEasels, iPodium, isiqophi samakhasethi, umshini weFax, olayini bocingo. I-International Bussiness Cetre ifakel izinhlobonhlobo zempahla uma befuna ukuziqasha kanye nomsebenzi wezobubhalane ngokugcwele okubalwa kuwo nokuhunyushwa kolimi, umsebenzi wezigijimi nezithunywa.

Amadesika amabili okunakekela ayatholakala endlini elungiselela umsebenzi. Lapha amaqembu angajabulela ukubhalisa kwangasese bebe beziphuzela iziphuzo zokuzijabulisa zokubamukela ngesikahthi izimpahla zabo zisayobekwa ezindlini. Ukugqugquzela ukubamukela, injabulo ephila ingalungiselelwa kanye nohla olubanzi ukuzikhathela lwezipho kuyatholakala. Kukhona ukuthuthwa kwempahla kanye nemali ekhokhelwa ukudilivwa kwempahla endlini. Indawo yokuhlanganela ngaphambi komcimbi ingasetshenziselwa imibukiso emincane. Izindwangu nokokunameka kungasetshenziswa ngapahakathi kwalezindlu zozimbili zokuhalanganyela kodwa zizimele futhi zingananyekiwe, zisetephuliwe noma zishayelelwe ngezipikili odongeni noma eminyango.

Uma kungunguthi iqembu lifuna ukundizisa ifulegi  lomhalangano, ipali lamafilegi libekwe ngapandle kwePorte Cochere. Azikho izindwangu zemibuso ezivunyelwe ekungeneni ehotela. Ukuhlolwa okuqondene nakho kuzokwenziwa kuwo wonke amaqembu.




UJean V Mestriner - Umqondisi wesifunda saseKapa
UJean V Mestriner - Umqondisi wesifunda saseKapa, iSun International uJean V Mestriner, uMqondisi wesifunda saseKapa weSun International, ungumcwaningi openda ngamabhulashi amakhulu okuhlokoza. Njengoba eselicungbungule kangaka izinga, inani kanye nobungako banoma ikuphi okuncanyana komklamo wakhe wehotela iTable Bay eseKapa eWaterfront, indaba isele esiqeshini sesilwanekazi asesikhandile. Isinqumo sesithathiwe, umsebenzi sewenziwe, uyaqhubeka.

Umsebenzi omkhulu yilokhu anamandla kokho. Akukona nje kuphela ukuthi iPalace ngaphansi kokubhekwa nguye yahlangabezana nokubizwa njnegenye kwahamba phambili emhlabeni wonke jikelele eSun International, kodwa umsebenzi wakhe wangaphambilini nawo waba nempumelelo eafanayo. Ebuka umsebenzi ongaka asewenzile ukukhand akabusha ihotela iWindsor Court eseNew Orleans, wayibona ikhuphuka ngezinga njengawesibili kwawaseMelika amahotela, kanye nesine ubungcono emhlabeni, njengoba yavotelwa yi Conde Nast Traveller, kanye nephezulu ohleni lwabahlaziyi abasemthethweni okubalwa kuko isitayela sempilo ngokunotha nangodumo, kanye neZagat Survey njehotyela eliholayo nelincanyelwayo - elin-e lezakhjiwo ezingu 21 zaseMalika ze "Five Diamond". Ngampambilini, ihotela iRegent eseWashington DC, yavulwa nguye ngo 1982, yaba nayo ihotela eliholayo emhlabeni, esevule ihotela iCresent Court Club neSpa okuseDallas ngo mnikazi wezigidigidi eziphindwe kabili zemali uCaline Hunt, waba nokwaneliswa ukuphumelela ukuba owesibili kwi Conde Traveller, kanye nowesine kwi US ngokwabe Lifestyles.

Impumelelo yakhe ephezulu uyibuka ngomcimbi wokuvula kaMongameli Nelson Mandela ethatha izintambo zombuso, umkhosi owawuhanjelwe abantu abangu 1 200, abahlonishwa kanye nabaphathi bezifundazwe, okunye kwezinto azenzaezaba yimpumelelo aziqhenyayo ngazo, Kanye kanye nokukhandwa kabusha kweRegent Kuala Lumpur ukuba ibe sezingeni ekulo manje njengephuma phambili eMalaysia kanye nokushintsha kwakhe i-five star iJerusalem Plaza ukuba ibe ihotela ledolobha iGlat Kosher. Kamumva kuwo lonyaka, iBlue Train edumile yaseNingizimu Afrika, yakhandwa ukuba ibe esezingeni eliphezulu ngokuhlanganyela kuka Jean Mestriner nomhlobisi wangaphakathi iTrisha Wilson, owayeqashwe iSpoornet njengomxhumanisi womsebenzi omkhulu, ukuthatha umsebenzi wokuvula noMaonameli wezwe osephumile uNelson mandela kanye nahamabisana naye uGraca Machel njengezivakashi eziqavile. Kodwa manje, usethathe umsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi ugcinwe usesimweni esiphezulu ehotela iTable Bay. Izitsha zomlotha kagwayi ezinhle ngokumangilisayo zaseChina ezindlini, okwengilazi ongakufisa - ngisho nezipopolo ezimbalwa zasemandulo zamawindi abheke ngasolwandle ezindlu ezinkulu nezinobucwebe kokne kwakhethwa nguye njengezinto zamasiko.

Amaphepha asezindlini zangasese awuhlobo olubhangqene ngamathathu enziwelwe ihotela, futhi ukugcina indawo yehotela yasemandulo, kulotshiwe ngemibhalo emincane, okumele abahlali abanamahlala bendawo yase V & A Waterfront. Amapheshana alula okusula ubuso wona ahamba ngawodwana esandleni, ayi ngemfuma nje engadingakali. Ezindlini zangasese zomphakathi azikho izomisa zezandla ezinomoya oshisayo, kodwa kukhona amathawula ahamba ngawodwana kakotini. Okokulala, izitsha zokudlela ezakhiwe ngobumba, ezinye izinhlobo zezitsha zobumba, izikhathi ezingu 24 zokuvuthwa kwamagilebhisikanye nokubalulekile ikhethelo langempela lisigazi eligcinwe ezindaweni ezifanele endlini yamawayini ye-Atlantic Grill enothileyo lenjabulo yabavakashi, konke kuhlolwe futhi kwasungulwa nguye. Ubona yonke into. Yebo, isitayela sakhe sokuphatha sesichazwe njengessiyinqwaba, akakwazi ukulinda. Usebizwe njengomuntu oqholoshayo. Kodwa cha, kusho yena, ukuqholosha kunomsuka wako ekungazini. Ungumphikeleli. Imibono yakhe incike emsebenzini aseke wawenza, ukhuluma ulimi lwezimboni aseke wazibona njengezihamab phambili ngomsebenzi emhlabeni, futhi, kusho yena, ukugxekwa kwakhe kuyahlonishwa.

UMnumzane Mestriner ubhala umbono wemiklamo yakhe ngaphambi kokuthi aqale umsebenzi, kanti futhi umbono wakhe udinga ukuthi uqale ufundwe yibo bonke abasebenza naye. Ukujiya kwebhotela okungumsebenzi wakhe ngempela kutholakala emakhasini encwadi yemibono. Abasebenzi abanayo inkantini. Esikhundleni senkantini, balethelwa ukudla kwabo ngezitsha zebumba zabo kanye nokokudala, izipuni, ezindaweni zabo ngabodwa zokudlela eziphethwe ngasese, e-Atlantic Bistro, lapho ukudla okuhlelelwe bona nje kujikeleza ngokwesinsuku zesonto. Bonke babizwa ngabahlanganyeli. Izindlu zabo zokugcina izimpahla zabo ziphethwe abamele ukuzigada. Baba nemihlangano nomqondisi wabo wesifunda futhi badle njalo naye noma nezinye izikhulu eziphethe etafuleni linye eBistro's Captain's Table. "Ihotela lihlukile kwawaseKapa, okubandakanya kulo izindlu zalo ezihlukile, isizinda sezempilo sokuqala esisedolobheni eNingizimu Afrika," kusho yena. "Senza umaka wethu edolobheningezinga lomsebenzi wethu esiwenzayo kanye nokuphakama kwalo. Inhloso kumele kube ekuphumelela phambili ekwakheni imali. Siphinda emumva lapho ukuba ngumhotela kuyikho ngempela. Ukunakekelwa komunu, uhla lwamawayini agcono kunawo wonke emawayinini aseNingizimu Afrka, awekho amatafula agcwele ukudla, kukhona amabhodwe awu-1400 ekhofi netiye ukuthi umuntu azithelele yena ngayedwa, ikhishi lekhofi elizimisele ngempela ngomsebenzi walo kanye nendawo yokupaka izimoto sengathi ezezinceku." Abavakashi baqhamuka lapho ngukabuswa khona - abasekhaya, abangaphakathi kwezwe lonkekanye nabasemazweni omhlaba. Indlela yokugqoka nje ejwayelekile e-casual. Okuncane nje ongakukhona okubiza uR1 500 ubusuku obubodwa, okukhulu, okuyela kuR10 000 endlini enobukhazikhazi obumangalisayo, kodwa ngeke uwabale amabhodlela ebar encane, ukusebenzisa icomputer, ngesikhathi ifax yendlu yakho ikuthumelela imisebenzi yakho lapho ufuna ukuthi iye khona, ikuqoqela imilayezo yakho futhi ikuvumela nokuthi uvule obesekudlulile, kanye neziteshi zezinceku endlini yakhe zikulethela itiye nekhofi elingezinhlobo zekhethelo. Ibize nje kuphela izigidi zamarandi ezingu 250, cishe esibiza kunazo zonke izakhiwo zamabhizinisi ezisedolobheni.




Umsebenzi omusha wezokuthutha ngomoya phakathi kwezindawo ezinkulu zokuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika zeSun International.

ISun City neTabla Bay zixhunyaniswe izindiza ezisebenzayo ze SA Express. Ihotela iTable Bay kanye nePalace eseSun City, amabili kwaholayo amahotela omhlaba emsebenzini weSun International, azoxhunyaniswa izindiza ezisebenza siqonde ngoq ngezinsuku ezintathu esontweni emsebenzini omusha ozovulwa iSouth African Axpress Airways ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 24 ku 1998.

Umsebenzi onikezela izindiza zokuqala ukusebenza eziqondayo ezisuka eKapa ziya esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilannesberg, esisebenzelana nokuhamba kwezindizamshini zangasese neziyinhlanganisela. "Lokhu kungumsebenzi wentuthuko obaluleke kakhulu, oxhumanisa njengoba wenza, iziteshi ezinkulu zase-Afrika, zozimbili ziphakathi kwamahotela aholayo omhlaba," kusho uPhillip Georgas, uMqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International. "Izindiza ziletha abavakashi ngqo kusukela ekungeneleni i-Afrika enkabeni yayo bese zinikeza abavakashi ithuba lokuthola ukwazi ngezindawo ezinkulu zokuvakasha, okungamahora ngaphezulu kancane kwamabili uhamba ngendizamshini encane." Womabili amahotela iTable Bay, eyavulwa ngoJuni ngonyaka odlule, kanye nepalce yeLost City ebekwa njengamahotela aholayo omhlaba ekuqaleni kwalonyaka, kanti futhi iPalace isimenyezelwe ukuba indawo yokuvakasha yeAfrika ehamba phambili kulandela ukuhlolwa ngabafundi belekelelwa abakhipha isigqugquzeli iConde Nast Traveller.

Umsebenzi weSouth African Express Airways uzosuka eKapa ngoLwezithathu kanyenoLwezihlanu ngo 11h00 zifike eseikhumulweni ePilanesberg ngo 13h15, kanti futhi ngazo izinsuku ezifanayo zizosuka ePilanesberg ngo 14h00 ukufika eKapa ngo 16h25. NgamaSonto, indiza izosuka eKapa ngo 11h30, ifike esikhumulweni ePilanesberg ngo 13h45 kanti indiza ephinda emumva izosuka ngo 14h30, ifike eKapa ngo16h56. Inani lokubiza lalezinkambo kusukela ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 25 ku 1998 kuya ku kumhlaka 31 Oktoba ku 1999 kuzoba ngu R1 050 uhambo lulunye (ingabalwa iVAT kanye namatekisi akuthutha esikhumulweni). Abagibeli bazondiziswa kwi SA Express enezihlalo ezingu 50 icanadair Regional Jet 200 BER (iExpress Jet). Inkampani, eyaqale ukusebenza ngo-Apreli ka 1994, isinezindiza ezintsha ceke futhi zohlobo olophambili e-Afrika, kanti zithwala abagibeli abangu 60 000 ngenyanga phakathi kwesindawo ezingu-14. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 76 84.




Ukushintsha kukanogada
Okulandelayo iqubo yamathenda ezinyangeni eziyisithupha. Isun City isiqashe onogada benhlangano yamazwe iFderla Guarding ukuqapha izivakashi. Njengamanje isigaba seASC Holdings, eyinhalangano yamazwe yonogada isiyaziwa kakhulu ngemisebenzi yayo emkhakheni wokunakekela eKapa. Lenkamapni izoqasha abasebenzi abangu 220, sekuhlangene nabaphathi kanye nezimenenja emsebenzini oseSun City. Inkampani esebenzayo ebizwa ngokuthi iFederal Northwest nayo futhi isiqanjiwe. "Abaphathi baseSun City bahlale benokuziqhenya ngobuciko bonogada ezindaweni zokuvakasha - ukuqapha kungokunye kwezinto ezisezingeni eliphezulu emhlabeni," kusho uMike Wentworth, uMphathi wonogada bezindawo zokuvakasha eSun City. "Ijika eliqale eminyakeni emine eyedlule yokusebenzisana nokusondelana nonogada esemgqeni wezinkambo yomhlaba, kanti lokhu kulandela ucwaningo ezindaweni ezinjenge-Universal Studio kanye neDisney. Kodwa ukuphepha kwezivakashi zethu kubalulekile, kanti sizobe sengeza izimpahla zokugada zikagesi ezindaweni zomphakathi ukuqinisekisa lokhu."

U-Andre Dumas, uMqondisi jikelele esigabeni sonogada ezinhlanganweni zomhlaba enkampanini yeASC Holdings uthe abasebenzi bakhe bazothola uqeqesho olunzulu ukusiza ukubanikeza imininingwane ngezokusiza nezokusebenza eSun City. Umphathi osebenza ngokuzimisela wezokuxhumanisa izivakashi uzokhethwa inkampani yakheukuqondana nezindaba ezijulile bese esebenza njengomxhumanisi phakathi kweFederal Guarding kanye nabavakashi uma kukhona isidingo. UDumas uqale ukuzenzela igama ophikweni lwengalo yomthetho ePitoli ngonyaka ka 1988 wabuye wakha uhlobo lweASC eGauteng, waphetha ngokuba sophikweni lokuvikela lonogada. Inzuzo yezinhlangano zomhlaba eNtshonalanga Kapa isinikeze inkampani yakhe ithuba lokuzozibonakalisa ophikweno lonogada  okuyiwona mkhakha omelelwe yilenhlangano yamazwe omhlaba. " Siyaqhubeka nokuphucula lomkhakha kanye nocwaningo lwethu lwaphesheya kwezilwandle, ikakhulukazi engqikithini yamapaki anjengo Bush Gaderns i-Universal Stdios kanye nempahla yakwaDisney, isisnikeze umbono omkhulu eqhazeni nasekuziphatheni kweqembu lonogada lokubaluleka nenjabulo yezemvelo." Ngaphezu kophiko lwengalo yezokuvikela inkampani yakhe ebheke eSun City, uthi wazi kahla kamhlophe ukuthi impumelelo yokuphathwa komsebenzi oyingcuphe kubalulekile emsebenzini onempilo.

Okokugcina, Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noLara Ross eSun International kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780 7684 noma kwi-email lross@sunint.co.za.
                           



Inkampani engumzali weTable Bay iSunWest, imboni yezimoto iKapa elincike kuyo ngenjabulo, eyaqanjwa nehloso ethile yokudala amathuba ezokuvakasha kulabo batshali bezimali ababenganikwanga amathuba ngaphambilini emlandweni, kakhulukazi labo abaqhamuka kuso lesi sifundazwe.

ISunWest inganyelwe amalunga amathathu amakhulu ayiphethe: iSun International eseNingizimu Afrika, ngamaphesenti angu 49, iGranda Parade Investments, ngamaphesenti angu 34, kanye ne-AfriLeisure namaphesenti angu 17, Okungaphezu kwengxenye komnotho weSunWest kunganyelwe ababengenawo amathuba phambilini, njengoba amaphesenti angu 53 esitokwe ephethwe ngamalunga aseNtshonalanga Kapa. ISunWest iphethwe ibhodi labaqondisi elimele labo ananezingxeney ezinkulu. KwiGrand parade Investments kuphuma usihlalo weSunWest, uPeter Swartz, kanye nosekela sihlalo, uHassen Adams. UPeter Bacon kanye no-Ian Douglas bangabaqondisi abakhethwe iSun International.

Umbono weSunWest ukuba yi-catalyst esebenzayo ngokuzimisela kwemboni yezokuvaksha ehlumelele eNtshonalanga Kapa, yona kanye echazwa ngokuzimisela kwabatshali zimali, ububanzi kanye nokubandakanya abanikazi zimali abanabo, kanye nokuzimisela okusha okuqhudelaneni nezinga lokuphakama kwamazwe ngamazwe. Lombono uyabonakaliswa ehotela iTable Bay, ukutshalwa kwezimali kokuqala okukhulu nokwamanje kweSunWest. Ekuphatheni inkampani iSun International ngamaphesenti angu 49, iSunWest futhi inhlangene namaqembu ezinkampani ezinkulu zeSafren.

ISafren inkampani yomphakathi, esohleni lweJSE, kanti futhi iseqenjni lezimboni elikhulu eliseNtshonalanga Kapa. Imisebenzi yalo emikhulu iholwa ukuxhaswa iSafmarine, iRennies Group, kanye neKersaf Investments kanti futhi ibandakanya umsebenzi wozokuthutha ngemikhumbi nezomoya, imisebenzi yezokuthutha abavakashi, izindawo zokuvakasha zamahotela kanye nemidlalo yasemakhasino, okumblawa kwemisebenzi yamahotela kanye nokokuzijabulisa. IKersfa yona ithanda kakhulu imboni yokuzithokozisa eseningizimu ne-Afrika, kanye naphesheya kwezilwandle, kanti igxile kakhulu emidlalweni kanye nakumahotela. Yona iphethe mamaphesenti angu 80 eSun International kanye namaphesenti angu 43 eCity Lodge Hotels Ltd.

IsunWest isikhethe abaphathi beSun International ukubaphathela ihotela iTable Bay. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noHeather Munetsi kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780-7572.




Ukuzikhethela iholide ongakwazi ukulikhona - iSun City Vacation Club


IVacation Club eseSun City iyindlela yokuguqula isimo yeTimeshare, okuhlanganise amalunga angcono kakhulu kanye nemiqondo ecatshangiwe yolucobelelana ngolwazi kanye nakho konke okuhle kokuba isivakashi zendawo zeSun City.


Ake siphindisele ukuhlihliza emumva empilweni yakho. ISun City ikunikeza injabulo engapheliyo! Umnyeni wakho angakujabulela ukuchitha izinsuku zakhe ekhozini yaGalofu langempela laseNingizimu Afrika - iGary Player Golf Course, ikhaya leMillion Dollar Golf Challenge ngesikhathi wena nezingane nijabulela ukushona phansi eBig 5 eseduze nePilanesberg National Park.


ISun City futhi inikezazela ngisho emalungeni amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi elihlelwe kahle ngokubaluleki kwezingane zeminyaka yonke. Ngamaholide esikole kaJulayi, iKamp Kwena isihlanganise ndawonye izinhlelo ezimangalisayo ukugcina izingane senza okuthile futhi zizijabulisa. Imidlalo ihlelwe kusukela ekuvkasheleni ikhaya lezilwane, imicimbi yemidlalo efana nebhola lombhoxo. Imidlalo yanagphakathi nayo futhi isihlelwe kwaba khona efana nokulhobisa amabhisikidi, ukupenda amadwala kanye nemisebenzi yezandla nezobuciko. Kukhona imicimbi yezingqikithi ezithile kusihlwa - izingane zingazizwela ukunambitheka kwe-marshamallow braai noma ukukhetha owinile embukisweni wokukhetha ibhokisi. Izingane ezindadlana zingajabulela uhambo lokuya emdansweni zizungeze iWaterworld.


Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomyeni wakho ningazikhululekela  enjabulweni ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka kube ukuyengwa umshini wamaphupho noma ukuvuswa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma uma nifuna ubusuku bangaphandle bothando lwenu ninokuzikhethela izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba kweHarlequins kuya kokuthe cosololo kwe-Ochird. Ngesikhathi ujabulela impilo ecokeme, umgado wengane uzoqinisekisa ukuphema kwezingane zakho.


Unokuzikhethela kwendlu yokuhlala enakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala. Iyinye inesilungiso moya endlini yokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa wokulala oyidabuli ovumela kulale abantu ababili. Lezizindlu zokuhlala ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo nomshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezi kudla. Ukwengenza, ungazikhethela ukwenza indlu yokho inakekelwe.

Umqondo oqanjwe kabusha ongabheka kuwo wesingeniso
IVacation Club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha. Ingumholi wamazwe ngamzwe wokwabelanga ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqama kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

Ubulunga buyatholakala ngenani elincane nje elingango R3 900 kanye nomvuzo womqondo omusha okungabhekwa kuwo kuyanezezela ebungakweni bobulunga. Ubulunga benginziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumqondo weTriple Ripple. Amalunga ehlonyeliswa ngoR300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga nglinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonelo ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise amanye amathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Enkomfeni enkulu yamazwe ngamzwe yango 1997 yeRCI eyayibanjelwe iBerlin, ivaction Club yaseSun City yakhexisa imilomo yezithunywa ezingu 650 ngomsebenzi wayo ophezulu wokudayisa ophumelele ezinyangeni ezingu 12 zokuqala. Kuma-modules angu 24 336 atholakalayo, angamaphesenti angu 53 adayiswa onyakeni wokuqala. Leliphesenti lijwayele ukufinyelela kulo esikhathini esingangeminyaka emithathu. "Into engezelele empumelelweni yokuthola leliphesenti lokudayiswa esikhathini esifishane knagaka, ingatholakala kulomjikelezo wokujoyinisa abathathu nabo beze nabathathu njalo njalo bezothola umhlomulo," kuchaza uPhilip Georges, umqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha, eSun International.

Lomqondo womhlomulo oqanjwe kabusha wokwabelana ngesikhathi usube impumelelo enkulu, njengoba abanye abathuthuki bokwabelana ngesikhathi emhalbeni wonke jikelele sebeqala yona lendlela yokusebenza ngomhlomulo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.




Umsebenzi wokuqala wentuthuke yokwabelana ngesikhathi.
Umsebenzi wokuqala wokwabelana ngesikhathi nangakho konke okuhle okutholakala ekubeni isakhamuzi seSun City Resort.

Ivacation Club yaseSun City inikeza indawo yokulala engakhoneka emindenini eza njalo emaholidini, kuwo lomjikelezo wokuqala wezentuthuko. Ihlanganise amalunga agcono kakhulu kanye nemiqondo ecatshangiwe yolucobelelana ngolwazi kanye nakho konke okuhle kokuba isivakashi zendawo zeSun City. IVacation Club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha. Ingumholi wamazwe ngamzwe wokwabelanga ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqama kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

IVaction Club eseSun City isiqale ngemivizo yoomqondo omusha ukwabelana ngesikhathi okubalwa kuyo ukubuyiselwa kwengxenye yemali oyifakayo yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012 (kuncike sekuthini wathenga nini ubulunga). Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSunnCity Vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngayo yonke into etholwa isakahamuzi. Isun City inikeza injabulu engafaniswa! Abahalela igalofu bangazikhombisa ekhozini yegalofu ayi eyodwa kodwa amabili emiqhudelwano emikhulu. Imindeni ingajabulele ukubukeka kweValley of Waves kanye nokushisekelela imidlalo yebhola lomphebezo, elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nemigudi yokugijima. EWaterworld umuntu anagzijabulisa ekundizeni emoyeni knaye nokudlala emanzini kanti iSun City isinikezela ngisho amalunga amancane emindeni - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi ehlelwe kahle ihlelewa izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomyeni wakho ningazikhululekela  enjabulweni ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka kube ukuyengwa umshini wamaphupho noma ukuvuswa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma uma nifuna ubusuku bangaphandle bothando lwenu ninokuzikhethela izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba kweHarlequins kuya kokuthe cosololo kwe-Ochird. ISun City iphela ngasendaweni yokubuka imvelo ehamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park elikucinana okukhulu kwezinto zokubukwa. Akukona nje ukuthi kukhon i"Big 5" ekungeneni, kodwa indawo ayinangozi yamalaleveva. Kukhona ukuzikhethela okuningi ukubuka izimpilo zazesendle ezehlukene ukubukwa amalunga eVacation Club ezingazikhethela kuwo. Ukugcizelela kwi-Exclusive Safari ukubeka iBig 5. Ukugadwa ngobuciko kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zizokbukaiSafari yase-Afrika yangempela bekhwele bonke kwi-Landcruiser eyenziwe yaba nezihlalo ezingu-6. Izivakashi zingazibukela ubhejane uzibhuquza odakeni olubandayo kanye nezindlovu eyizinkunzi zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaceli kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ngufakazi othulile ebhubesini libulala, njengoba izilwanyan ezincane zizidlela zinganakile ubungozo ezikubona ehlane elinokuqhuma kwengozi. Phakathi kwezintaba ezikude neMaddened Crowd, ungabuka ubushazishazi benyathi njengoba zixakekile ukunganakwa nokukhululeka ezinako. Izimoto zokuhamba endle zinempahla yazo okuzingubo ezifudumele ukwembatha kulabo abagodolayo, ukuvunguza kokushayela ebusuku. Zitholele ubuhle bobusuku bezilwane zasendle zizihmabela ebusuku ngesikhathi izingwe zikhanyiswe ngaphansi kokukhanya kwenyanga ekhanyise lendawo esehlane.

Uma uhlose ukubuka okuthile kwakho wedwa, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izohlaba umxhwele ezivakashini ezizijabulisayo. Landela inyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo ngapakathi kweLetsatsing Game Park. Onogada uzokhombisa ulwazi lwakhe olunzulu lokubheka lemvelo - zizwele komunye ngalendalo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ekuseni ngovivi, ukuphuma kwemibala kuzovela kuphikisana nokungenasici ukushona kwelanga ngemumva. Abagibeli bazogibela bonke kwiHot Air Balloon, bese bebuka yonke indawo yePilanesberg National park. Uma seniyoma phansi nisuka emoyeni niyozithela kwezoqeda konke ebenikubuka ehlane lapho ukudla kwasekuseni okushaya khona kusevwa khona. ISun City izungezwe izinto eziveza amasiko ahlukene njengokwemibalabala. Jabulele amasiko ezinganekwane zesizwe, ngeCultural Tour ukuya eLedig Village. Uhmabo lukuvakashisa kwi-"shanti" yendawo, inkulisa, amahhovisi ezizwe bese kuthi ekugcineni ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele eshibhini elinentshisekelo. IVacation Club yaseSun City iyindawo yangempela ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza ube ujabulela ukba sekhaya elikude nekhaya ngendawo yokulala kanye nezinye izinhlelo zokwenziwayo. Unokuzikhethela kwendlu yokuhlala enakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala. Iyinye inesilungiso moya endlini yokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa wokulala oyidabuli ovumela kulale abantu ababili. Lezizindlu zokuhlala ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo nomshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezi kudla. Ukwengenza, ungazikhethela ukwenza indlu yokho inakekelwe. Izindlu lapho ungaziphekela khona ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zinikeza indawo yokulala ebiza uR5 800 ukuhlala izimpelasonto ezihlukene, okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngapahakathi kodwa wonke uzungeza amazwe ngamazwe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ilunga eliboshelelwe kwimpelasonto ethile kodwa lingajabulela ukushintshashintsha kunguthanda kwalo. Kulabo abafisa ukujabulela injabulo yseSun City isikhathi eside, ezikhathini ezifana nezibalulekile njangamaholide ephasika noma ngoJulayi, ungazikhethela okukodwa kokungu 11 okumiselwe, isikhathi sokuqala sezinhlelo zobulunga. Inani lobulunga leminyaka engu 12 ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala ngezikhathi zesonto elikhulu eSun City Vaction Club lisukela ku R15 000 kuya ku R40 000 lesonto leNedbank Million Dollar. Kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ikheshi ngokushesha kukhona inzalo ongayikhona ukuzikhethela kuyona. Inani elikhokhelwa izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili lisukela ku R733 ezimpelasontweni ekhululekile kanye no R1 612 empelasontweni enotho. Zitholele imivuzo yeTimeshare
ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City iyiphikankani lokwakhiwa kabusha kokwabelana ngesikhathi kwemivuzo.

Umvuzo obizayo owutholayo, ukubuyiselwa ingxenye yemali oyikhokha kokuqala yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012, Omunye umvuzo ukunganqunyelwa esontweni elithile onyakeni. Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthiubulungqa bokabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngako konke izakhamizi ezingakuthola njengezivakashi zeSun City Resort.

Umqondo omusha womvuzo okungabhekwa kuwo - iTriple Ripple, yengezela ubungako bamalunga. Ubulunga benginziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumqondo weTriple Ripple. Amalunga ehlonyeliswa ngoR300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga nglinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonelo ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise amanye amathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Abahambi bamaholide sebesheshe babona kokne okutholakalayo eVacation Club kanti onyankeni wokuqala besemakethe, ama-modules obulunga noma elilodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (kubalwa ubusuku bangoMsobuluko kuya koLwezine) noma elolodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (uLwesihlanu kuya eSontweni kubalwa nobusuku) ama-modules obulunga noma kokubili, okukunikeza ubulunga obuvikelekile iminyaka engu 16. Inani lubulunga liya ngokwenyuka kusukela kuR3 900 emasontweni akhululekile obulunga ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA ITHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.



ISun International Vaction Club - okunye kwekhefana lempilo

ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City ingumqondo omusha womqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi osewuthathwe njengonempumelelo kakhulu entuthukweni yokwabelana ngesikhathi - ngokudayisa okungaphezulu kwamaphesenti angu 90 kwokudayisiwe (okumele ukwabelana ngesikhathi kwamasonto angaphezulu kuka 11 000) esikhathini esingaphezulu kweminyaka emibili nohhafu.

Yini eseyenze umklamo weSun City ube ongafaniswa neminye nonempumelelo? Kukhona amaqiniso amaningana, angakhethi ukuhambisana. Ukubala ambalwa: indawo; uhlangothi olulodwa oluphakeme lweSun International; inani; ukwakhiwa komkhiqizo, okubalwa kuwo izindlu zokuhlala ongaziphekela kuzona ezisezingeni eliphakeme. Umuntu akumele akholwe ukuphakama kwezinga leqembu eliwufundele umsebenzi walo elaqanjwa ukwakha nokumaketha lentuthuko. ISun International yawenza umsebenzi wayo kanti ihlanganyele neqembu layo eloqeqeshwe ngokusengeni eliphezulu labathuthukisi nabadayisi abaqoqenene ebantwini abayizingcweti embonini yokwabelala ngesikhathi ababa nempumelelo ephezulu ekuziphatheni kwabo okubalulekile. Ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club bushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, nako konke ongakuthola njengesakhamuzi endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City yezivakashi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi banayo indlela yokungena kunoma iyiphi into eyenziwayo okubalwa kuyo igalofu emakhozini emiqhudelwano emikhulu emibili - iGary Player Country Club kanye neLost City Golf Course, ibhola lomphebezo, ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nokugijima emigudwini. 

ISun City inikeza ngisho namalunga amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi eyakhiwe ngendlela ehlukile yemidlalo kanye nokunye okwenziywayo eKwena's Castle, khona kanye emgcekeni eCabanas: inkundla yokudlala emangalisayo, ikhaya lezilwane kanye nendawo yokudlala enako konke okudingakalayo. Ukuzihambela okufishane ungcebeleka unqamula amagceke aluhlaza eCabanas kukulethela umhlaba wenajbulo eSun - Waterworld. Ukundiza emoyeni, ukuhamba emoyeni, ukusheleleza emanzini kanye nalabo abafuna ukungcebela emanzini, kukhona isikebehe esikuthatha sikuzungezise ichibi ngesikhathi sokushona kwelanga. ISun City isishintshwe iminyaka eminingi yaba indawo yokuphumula yomndeni. Ngentuthuko yenxanxathela yeLost City manje isikunikeza izinto ezininginingi ezenza ikhasino ibe okunye okuhehayo.

ISun City iphela kwenye indawo ykugcina imvelo enothile eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park enezinto eziningi zemvelo ngokwedlulele. Akukona nje ukuthi kune "Big 5" uma ungena ngasemnyango wayo, kodwa indawi ayinangozi kamalaleveva. Abemikhondo yepaki, batholakala ehotela iSun City, manje sebenikeza okuningi  ukuzikhethela kukho kubahlali. Uma uthanda ukufuna I"Big 5" njalo I-Exclusive Sfari izokuqhamuka (Kanti okungakuthatha ebusuku nakho kuyatholakala). IRhino Hiking Trail emangalisayo nenamandla amakhulu uzoyithanda. Kulabo abafuna injabulo, zama iHot Air Baloon Safari kanti kulabo abathnda kakhulu ezamasiko. Thatha uhambo lwendawo yasekhaya ubuke ezamasiko.

IVacation Club eseSun City iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza bese ujabulela ubuntofontofo bokuzizwa usekhaya elikude nekhaya okuyindawo yokulala. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala ezinesilungiso moya. Iyinye inendlu yokugeza enkulu enesisefo kanye nosofa wokulala ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Lezi zindlu ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo umshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezo kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izindlu ezinhle nezinakho konke zikunikeza indawo yokulala ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala kusukela enanini lika R5 800 nezimpelasonto ezikhululekile okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi, kodwa wonke unyaka uzungeza izwe. Izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zamasonto anokuthile zisukela kuR15 000 ngamaholide ezikole kaJulayi kuya kuR40 000 esontweni leNedbank Million Dollar. Inani lezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zisukela kuR733 ngempelasonto ekhululekile kanye noR1 612 ngempelasonto enokuthile. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




ISouth African Timeshare isibe bukhali umhlaba wonke
Imboni ephethwe ngezandla ezinobuciko inikeza okuphephile, okubiza kancane kubafaki zimali bamaholide, bathi abahambi maholide bazitholele ithuba lokuzijabulisa ngendlela abangayikhona unyaka wonke eNingizimu Afrika nangokwengezwa kwamathuba okukwazi ukushintsha izindawo zangaphakathi ngezangaphandle uhamba, ebebengeke bakwazi ukukwenza nanganoma iyiphi indlela abebengayizama. Lokhu ngumbono kaLoraine Rimmer, uMpathi wemakethe nokudayisa kwayo wezindawo ezinkulu zokulala zokwabelana ngesikhathi zeSun International, iVacation Club eseSun City. Izindlu ezinobukhazikhazi ongaziphekela kuzo zathuthukiswa iSun International ukunikeza imindeni ithuba lokujabulela zonke izininto ezidumile ezitholakala endaweni yokuvakasha - kusukela kwesinye izinto zemvelo ezibukwayo eNingizimu Afrika kweseduze iPilanesberg National Park kuya kwemangalisayo  nedumile iValley of Waves.

UNkosikazi Rimmer uthi abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika banamasonto abomvu endaweni yokuvakasha iGold Crown njengeVacation Club ingakwenza, ngokwe RCT, banokufanayo okuphakeme okulinganiswa nokomhlaba wonke okuzindawo zokulala. IRCT inezindawo ezingaphansi kwayo ezingu 3 500 zokuvakasha. Abahlali baseNingizimu Afrka banokukwabelana ngesikhathi ezweni labo bese bethola noba namahlolide aphesheya kwezilwandle, njengoba bekhokhela amanani abo ngamarandi, eNingizimu Afrika, ukuqhathanisa izindawo zokulala zaphesheya kwezilwandle, kusho yena. "Amanani akhokhwa ngamadola noma ngopondwe akazovunyelwa."

Ukwabelana ngesikhathi eNingizimu Afrika sekube kudala kakhulu, kusho uNkosikazi Rimmer, kanti futhi abathengi baqinisekiswa ukuphepha kokuthenga kwabo ngoksebenza nezinhlangano ezinamalekhodi ahloliwe, kanye nalabo abasebenzela iTimehsare Institute yeNingizimu Afrika (TISA) - inhlangano enamazinyo, enokusebenza kwayo okunomthetho oqinile okutholakala kubasebenzi bayo. Ukwengeza, imboni yazisaukukalwa okubalwa kuko isikhathi esipholile emva kokuthenga. Uyakugcizelela lokhu, ukuthi ukwabelana ngesikhathi ngaso sonke isikhathi kumele ibukwe ngengokutshal izimali emaholidini nasekuzijabuliseni, ayi njengokutshala izimali ukuqala ibhizinisi. "Iqinisekisa ukuthi umndeni, njalo ngesikhathi esizayo, uzoqhubeka ukukwazi ukuba namaholide ngenani ongakwazi ukulikhokha - yikho ukubuyiselwa lokhu babathengi abangathembela kukho".

Ivacation Club, kusho yena, isinikeze ukuthengwa kokwabelana ngesikhathi esikhathini esinqunyiwe onyakeni ka 2012, ngalesosikhathi uhhafu onamaphesenti angu 50 othenge ngawo uyobuyiselwa kuwe. " Kuncike ezinhlelweni eyakhikhiwe ngazo, isikhathi esiphelele sokwabelana ngesikhathi sibalelwa eminyakeni engu 15. Ngokunikeza isikhathi esinqunyiwe sobulunga, sicabangela isikhathi esingukuthi abanikazi bazofuna ukwehlisa izidingo zabo, bese sibanikeza okunye ukuzikhethela okulula. Lokhu kusebenza kakhulukazi ezinhlanganweni ezithatha ukwabelana ngesikhathi ukukusebenzisa njemivuzo yokusebenza kwabasebenzi babo. IVacation Club, kusho yena, inikeza izinto ezinkulu ngezigaba eziningana. Njengokwengqalasizinda seSun International esibe sendaweni vele, izinto zevaction Club zidayiswa ngokwenani elincane ngango R15 000 ngezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala esikahthini sokuqala sesingu 11 esinqunyiwe, ama-module onulunga esikhathi esikhulu (iPhasika kanye namaholide ezikole kaJulayi). Nom kunjalo, kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ukheshi ngesikahthi kukhona inzalo ongakwazi ukuyikhokha ukuzikhethela kuyona. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7000.




ISun City Vacation Club - Impendulo ekungcebelekeni kwamaholide asebusika

Njengoba ulele uzibhabhalele phakathi negceke ne G & T eceleni kwakho kanye nenoveli esanda kukhiswa kaJohn Grisham inamathele ezandleni zakho, njengoba ujusi wamathamo othswala besilungu ijini yehla ngomphimbo kanye nephunga lezoso sokwamasika ase-Afrika lithusa amakkala akho, uyacabanga - kumnandi ukuba sekubaleleni kwelanga laseNingizimu Afrika. Ukuphi? ESun City Vaction Club.

ISun City Vaction Club ikunikeza  njalo njalo, indawo yokulala ongayikhona yomndeni wakho wonke emsebenzini wokuqala wontuthuko yezokwabelana ngesikhathi. Kuhlanganisa ubulunga bekilabhu obungcono futhi obaqanjwa ngomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ngazo zonke izinto ezinhle zokuba isakhamuzi semangalisayo ngobuhle indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City.

ISun City ikunikeza injabulo engapheliyo! Njengoba ibhola lakho lindizela phansi kwavulekile amabala ekhosi yegalofu yaseNingizimu Afrika enothile - ikhaya leMillion Dolla Golf Challenge, umndeni wakho nawo uyajabula uhamba ushona pahnsi ngeBig 5 kweseduzane iPilanesberg National Park.  Abaqhaphi bendawo yokucgina kwemvelo batholakala ehotela eSun City abanikeza abahlali ukuzikhethela okuningi okushisekisa indawo. ISun City inikeza ngisho amalunga amancane omndnei wakho  - iKamp Kwena, isizinda zokuzithokozisa esihlelwe ngendlela ehlukile ukudlala izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Ukubonakala kalufifi kokushona kwelanga, umndnei wakho uqoqene uzungeze indawo yokosa. Sekuyisikhathi sokuvumelana. Usuthole indawo enhle ngokumangalisayo elungele zonke izidingo zomuntu. Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomkakho ningazibhudukeza ngokukhululeka ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka ukuthi ukyengeka komshini wamaphupho noma okuvusa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma ubusuku obunothando kakhudlwana ngaphnadle lapho onokuzikhethla kwezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba zeHarlequins kuya kwethe cosololo i-Ochird. Ngesikhathi ujabulela impilo ephakeme, umgadi wengane uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zakho ziphephile.

Unokuzikhethela pahakathi kwezindlu zokulala ezinamakamleo amathathu noma amabili. Iyinye inesilungiso moya kanye negumbi lukuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi elivulekile langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Ubulunga beVacation Club butheswa ngokukhetha eyodwa kwezingu 11 ezinqunyiwe. Ama-module esikhathi esikhulu, noma eyodwa yezimpelasonto ezingu 41 ezikhululekile (ubusuku boLwesihlanu kuya kobeSonto bubaliwe), okugcina ubulunga bube obeminyaka angu 15, kuze kube unyaka ka 2012.
