ISun City Vacation Club
ISun City Vaction Club ikunikeza  njalo njalo, indawo yokulala ongayikhona yomndeni wakho wonke emsebenzini wokuqala wontuthuko yezokwabelana ngesikhathi. Kuhlanganisa ubulunga bekilabhu obungcono futhi obaqanjwa ngomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ngazo zonke izinto ezinhle zokuba isakhamuzi semangalisayo ngobuhle indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City.

ISun International Vcation Club esesun City ingukuzuza okumangalisayo kokuqanjwe kabusha ukwabelana ngesikhathi okubalwa kuko ukubuyiselwa kwengxenye yemali oyitshala okokuqala onyakeni ka2012. Omunye umvuzo ukunganqunyelwa impelasonto ethile unyaka ngamunye. Enye into enhle yokwengezela ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club obushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngako konke okungatholwa isivakashi sendawo yokuvakasha esesun City. Isakhamuzi zaseSun City zingajabulela ukubuka komuntu ngamunye kweseduzane  nengangamahectare angu 55 000 iPilanesberg National Park.

Abaqaphi, batholakala ehotela iSun City, manje abkunikeza ukzikhethela okuningi kubahlali. Kukgcizelela kwe-Exclusive Safari ukubeka iBig 5. Onogada abqeqeshwe ngobciko bazoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zithola -African Safari yangempela zigibele zonke kwiLandcruiser enakho konke enezihlalo ezingu-6. Izivakashi zingabukela ubhejane izibhuquza kolubandayo udaka izigeza kanye nezinkunzi zezindlovu zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaceci kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ufakazi othulile ubukela ubhebesi libulala, njengoba izilwanyana ezincane zizidlela zinganake lutho oluyingozi okungazibhudukeza ehlane lokuqhuma kwamadwala. Okubenyezelayo le kude ezintabe ni kude neMaddened Crowd, ungabuka umhlabi wezinyathi zizichanasela zixakiwe nje ukuthi zangagadwa futhi zakhululeka kwenzenajni. ILandcruiser  inakho konke kokwephatha izingubo zokulala kulabo abezwa amakhaza, Kukhona nokukohmaba ebusuku. Zitholele ubuhle bobosuku bempilo yezilwane zasendle ngesikhathi izingwe zikhanyiswa inyanga ngapahnsi kwesibhakabhaka salelihlanekazi.

Uma uhlose ukubuka okuthile owehlukile, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izokuthatha ikuse kokumangalisayo. Landela iNyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo pahakathi kweLetsatsing Park. Unogada uzokukhombisa ulwazi lwakhe olunobuciko lokugada lendalo - zizwele komunye ngalendayo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ukuseni ngovivi, ukuphuma kwemibalabala okuphikisana nokungenasici ukushona kwelanga. Abagibeli bagibele bonke kwiHot Air Balloon, ujabulele ukunambitheka kwewayini elihlwbusayo laseNingizimu Afrika ngapambi kokubuka evulekile iPilanesberg National Park. Uma senehla nithathwa kulenjabulo ekade nikuyona niyiswe egame Lodge lapho nifike nithole khona okumanglisayo nokuhlwabusayo ukudla kwasekuseni.

ISun City izungezwe ugxubevange yezinhlobonhlobo zamasiko. Jabulela inganekwane yesizwe yamasiko, kwi-Cultural Tour ukuya eLedig Village. Uhambo lukuvakashisa kweyendawo "isahnti", inkulisa, amahhovisi esizwe kanye nokokugcina ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele kweshisekelisayo ishibhini. IVacation Club eseSun City iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza bese ujabulela ubuntofontofo bokuzizwa usekhaya elikude nekhaya okuyindawo yokulala. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala ezinesilungiso moya. Iyinye inendlu yokugeza enkulu enesisefo kanye nosofa wokulala ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Lezi zindlu ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo umshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezo kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Ukhetha eyodwa kwangu 11 anqunyiwe, ama-module esikhathi esikhulu noma elilodwa iphkathi nesonto kwangu 41 akhululekile (kubalwa ubusuku bangoMsombuluko kuya kobangoLwesine), noma impelasonto ezikhululekile (ubusuku boLwesihlanu nobesonto bubaliwe) ama-module obulunga noma kokubili, okukufaka okukunika ubulunga beVacation Club, iminyaka engu16. Inani lobulunga liya ngokunyuka kusukela kuR3 900 kuya kweikhululekile imodule yaphakathi nesonto ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili.  UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL LULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7000.




ISun City Vacation Club iyanda
Impahla enye entathu yeSun International izofakwa eSun City Vacation Club, umklamo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ophumelela ngempumelelo enkulu owavulwa iSun International ngo 1996 kanti manje amaphesenti angu 97 asekhona, izovulelwa kwezinye izimpahla zeqembu ukuba yiSun International Vacation Club.

Imemezela ukwandiswa kwayo, iuMqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International, uPhilip George, uthi isinqumo sokukhushulwa izinto zokwabelana ngesikhathi e-Ezulwini Sun eseSwaziland, iWild Coast Sun, kanye neFish River Sun, kwagqugquzelwa ukuphendula okunomfutho ngokwedlulele komphakathi kwiVacation Club eseSun City, "Ikilabhu laqalwa ukusungulwa ukunikeza abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika ithuba lokwabelana ngezinto abanazo engangafani kanye nezinto zeSun City emananini ezindawo zokulala abangawakhona. Kusukela emlandweni wokudayisa okumangalisayo - inzuzo eyizigidi enzingu 130 zamarandi eminyakeni emithathu - kwavele kewacaca ukuthi kukhona isidingo esikhulu ngokwedlulele salomkhiqizo.

"Manje, izinto ezintsha zizokwandisela ukuzikhethala kwamalunga aekilabhu okungezonezela inani lokibiza, lapho ubulunga buzokwandiswa kubahlali baseNingizimu Afrika abahamba amaholide abadinga amakhefu abangawakhona ezindaweni zokuvakasha ezinhle ngokwedlulele." Ukuvulwa kweVacation Club, kunenezela uGeorgas, sekufakele kakhulukazi empumelelweni yokubekwa kabusha kanye nenzuzo kwezezimali yaseSun City. "Sihlose ukufaka lendlela yokuphumelela efanayo kwezinye izindawo zokuvakasha.

"Ikilabhu ibheke ukuthola abazophatha kelezizndawo ezintsha kusukela emalungeni avele akhona, maphesenti angu 34 alabo asebeveli besebenzise lobulunga obuzishintshashintshayo be RC ukushintshisela kwezinye izindawo zokuvakasha. Akuzobizwa amali ngokushintsha phakathi kwiVacation Club, umphathi wokwabelana ngesikhathi uBrina Stocks, uthi ukwandiswa kwabiza kakhulu. Kweyodwa ngayodwa indawo kwezintsha izindawo zeVacation Club, izindlu zamahotela ezinobukhazikhazi zizoshintshelwa ukuba zibe izindlu zokwabelana ngesikhathi ngokwezinto zokukwazi ukuziphekal wena phakathi entuthukisweni yesibili ebiza izigidi zamarandi ezingu 7,5. Uthi ukushintshwa kwalezizindawo zokulala ezivele zikhona ukuba zibe izindlu ezinamakamelo okulala amabili ezingu 61 kuzomela okwengezwa kwama-module okwabelana ngesikahthi angu 6 500, okungaphezulu kwengxenye yesigamu kwekhona manje.

Umpathi wezokudayisa, uLoraine Rimmer, uthi okuhle ngobulunga beSun City Vaction Club kubala iRCI yako bokugqama kweGold Crown kwazo zonke izindawo zokuvakasha ezibandakanyenkayo, ukubalwa okuphezulu  kuvunyelwe yiRCI. Ukwengeza, wonke amasonto abomvu noma aphezulu ukushintshisa kwaphesheya kwezilwandle, okunika ababelani besikhathi okuhle kokushintshiselana nokwaphesheya kwezilwandle.

Amasonto okwabelana ngesikhathi eVacation Club ahlukaniswe ngezinsuku ezingu-4 eziphakathi nesonto, kanye nezingu 3 zempelasonto. Inani lokuvula emalungeni amasha aqala kusukela kokungaphansi kukaR4 500 kwaphakathi nesonto, kuya kuR7 00 kwempelasonto, kanyi amasonto amakhulu , okubalwa kuwo namaholide amakhulu kanye nesikahthi seMillion Dollar Golf Challenge, kusukela ananini likaR15 000 kuya kuR40 000. Inani liqinisekisiwe ukwenyuka ohleni olulandela iCPI, okungaphansi kohla lwezimakethe eziqhudelanayo. "Okunye ukwandiswa kweSun International vacation Club kuyathembisa," kusho uStocks. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA: THINTANA NOMYANGO WESUN INTERNATIONAL PUBLIC RELATIONS LULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684 NOMA: UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL VACATION CLUB KULUNOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7008.




Iminyaka  engu 21 yokwenza amaphupho aphumelele
ISun City eshintshela emlingweni ... futhi ibivele yenza njalo iminyaka engu 21. Yebo, kubukhuni ukukholwa, kodwa lendawo yokuvakasha emangazayo eyaqala ukuvulwa ngoDesemba mhlaka 7 ka 1979.

Isibe ingxenye engadedeli yezimpilo zethu selokhu kwathi nhlo, indawo yenjabulo, yezimanga, yemidlalo, yezokuthithokozisa kanye nokuthola ulwazi olusha. ISun City ayiqambanga kabusha imboni yokunakekela kuphela eNingizimu Afrika. Isiphenduke indawo eheha umhlaba wonke kanti futhi namhlanje isiyaziwa ngokumile iKruder National Park neTable Mountain eseKapa. Uebo iminyaka engu 22 eyedlule, kwakungekho lutho lapha kodwa ihlane nehlathi eliluhlaza elalihlukaniseke izigaba ezine zehlane lentaba yomlilo , amakhilomitha angu150  ubude bebanga lendawo . Lokhu kukodwa kuyamangalisa, ukuba eyodwa kwezimbili izintaba zamadwala aqhuma umlilo emlahbeni okukhona kuzo amadwala amakhulu ngokumangalisayo, kodwa ngesikhathi umqambi mahotela aseSun eningizimu ohlakaniphile uSol Kerzner endizela phezu kwalendawo ngendizamshini enophephela emhlane, ebheka indawo lapho ayengabeka khona ihotela elisha, wayengabheki indawo enobuhle bomhlaba ngokushisekelayo. Akubona lapho kwakuyisitsha semvelo ezintabeni khona lapho okusanda kwenziwa iPilanesberg National Park, futhi ayefuna ukukuthola kwakuyindawo ebukekayo yokwakha ihotela elibukekayo. "Yiyo indawo le!" esho ngokukhululeka, ebuka ehleli endizeni enophephela emhlane ngewindo layo. Iqiniso lokuthi yayingenawo amanzi, kanti futhi nokuthi okufakela amandla kagezi kwakungamakhilomitha angu 25 ubukude, umgqaqo ongcolile owawuseduze wawungamakhilomitha angu 7 kanti idolobha elaliseduze okungenani lalingamakhilomitha angu 40, kwakungezona izingqinamba ngokwakhe ngalesosikhathi. Lelodolobha, iRistenberg, lalikude ngamahora amabili ngomgwaqo emadolobheni amakhulu asePitoli naseGoli kanye neReef iyonke, okwakungamadolobha izivakashi zansukuzonke ezazithutheleka khona. USol Kerzner uyindoda yombono ... kanti futhi wenza izinto zenzeke ... ngokushesha. Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezalandela, ngoJulayi mhlka 15 ku 1978, isoyi lokuqala laphendulwa. Ekujulukeni kophahla ngoMeyi  ka 1979, uMnumzane Kerzner wachaza ukuthi "ukuba nendawo enhle ngokumangalisayo eyabe ingathuthukisiwe nakancane, sikwazile ukuqamba lapho kade kungaphili lutho khona inxanxathela yendawo yokuvakasha engafaniswa nayinye emhlabeni". Waqhubeka nokuthi "ISun City inkundla yokuqala yenxanxathela ehlanganise amanye amahotela amaningi akhona, yingqikithi yamapaki, izindawo nezindlu zekhethela zezakhamizi, nama-monorails njalo njalo." Kusukela nje ekuqaleni, waqala  ngamakhozi egalofu eligingqikayo, izindawo zamanzi, izinhlelo ezinkulu zezinto zokudlala imidlalo enhlobonhlobo, kanye nemidlalo nezokuzithokozisa ezigcwele umhlba awonke ukuzilinganisa nawo. ISun City ihlela amazinga amasha okuqamba kabusha ezokwakha ngobuciko kanye nomlando wakwakhiwa ngokushesha kwayo okusha futhi. Maduzane nje emva ezinyangeni ezingu 7 emva kokumanta kophahla, amagumbi angu 340 ehotela iSun City ayeselungile ukuthi ayengavulwa okokuqala. Kodwa okukodwa nje. Ichibi lokubhukuda laselilungile seligcwaliswe ngamanzi ngesikhathi abapendi beqedela indawo ephezulu. Kanti futhi abasebenzi base beqoqa amathuluzi abo okusebenza kanye nokhaphethi obomvu ube wendlwalwa emva kwabo nemizuzu embalwa nje ngaphambi kwe VIP yokuqala kanye nabezindaba bangne eminyango. Bazithola besendaweni evulekile yokungena engaphezulu kwebala lebhola lombhoxo, kanye ne-Aquaries bar ephephezela njengenkanyezi yomkhumbi ngaphezu kwenqwaba yemishini yokudlala. Imichachazo kanye nezibani zeTivoli pahakathi kwezitshalo zetropicana kanye nokunyakaza kokubenyezela kwkheshi lengilazi elihamba phakathi kwendawo evulekile yokungena kanye nezinkundla eziphezulu, konke kwakudale indlela ehambiselanayo okungafaniswa nokwedlulele nokukhanya okufuquzayo. Ngaphansi kwehotela kwakuphakama izihlahla zepalm eziphakema okungangamitha angu 14 zohlobo lweWashingtonia, kakhulukazi zasungulwa futhi zathuthelwa ekhaya lazo elisha ngaphandle kwechibi lokubhukuda elingamamitha angu 55, lenziwa laba likhulu ngoba uMnumzane Kerzner wayelifuna libe elingacwilisa ili-los engu 600.  Amapalms, kanye nohlobo lwezithombo lonezimbali ezithandelayo ngemibalabala engu 1 000 zazimboze icala lentaba ebhekene nehotela, lapho izigidigidi zezitshalo zaziqala khona ukuthola ikhaya lazo kanye nezihlahla lapho zazisekhayala lazo eliyingadi enhle ngokumangalisayo yaseSun City. Ukunikeza izingadi zeSun City okwazo okuzimpande ezinhle, inhlabathi engango 25 000 cubic metres yathelwa khona, kodwa lokho kufana nemitha eligcwele isandla uma kuqhathaniswa nezigidigidi zamacubic metres enhlabathi eyathelwa eCascades kanye naseLost City.

Akukho okufana nehotela iSun City okwakhe kwaba khona ngaphambilini kulelizwe. Ukubenyezela kwalo kanye nbunkentenkente kwakungukuphefumula kanye nokubiza kwalo, izigidi ezingu 250 zamarandi, kwakuyimali enkulu kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika ukuyichitha ngalezozikhathi zeminyaka yawo 1979. Uma kuqhathaniswa nenani lamanje, inani elatshalwa ekwakheni indawo yokuvakasha iSun City ligijima la ko R1,18 billion. Ngosuku olufanayo njengosuku lokuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwehotela iSun City, ompetha bebhola lomphebezo uBob Hewitt kanye no-Abe Segal baqala ukufundisa ezinkundleni zebhola lomphebezo ezingu 9. Ngosuku olulandelayo, uDesemba mhlaka 8, umakhelwane, ipilanesberg Game Reserve engamahectare angu 55 000 yavulelwa umphakathi, kanti ngomhlaka Desemba 12 uGary Player wawina umklomelo wakhe wokuqala uR100 000 emkhudelwaneni ophakeme owawubanjelwe ekhozini yena uqobo lwakhe ayiqamba. Emva kwezinsuku ezintathu, i-Extravaganza Theatre yavulwa ngomkbukiso wesitayela seLas Vega eyajabulisa ababukeli ngezintokazi zayo ezinhle ngokumangalisayo ezazigqoke izimpaphe zempangele kanye nokudlalwa kwayo okumangalisayo okungajwayelekile. Umculi wokuqala wamazwe nagmazwe ukuba khona kwaba ngu Cliff Richard. Ngempumelelo eyaba nayo iSun City ukuthi yamukela izivakashi eziyisigidi nengxenye ngonyka wayo wokuqala. Babedlala ezinkundlei zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ezavulwa ngoJanuwari mhlaka 1 ngo 1980. Bahambela imihlangano emikhulu kanye nokuvulwa kwezimoto. Babuka imiqhudelwano yamanqamu yeSun City Raffles Disco ngo-Epreli - khumbula amaRaffles? NgoJuni, uLeo Sayer wadlala eSun City, kanti ngoJulayi mhlaka 30, uMnumzane Basil Nakos wawina umklomelo wokuqala wesun City owawungamarandi angu 37 000. Imidlalo yasesun City yakhula kakhulu ngodumo kanti umklomelo wokuqala wamarandi angu 250 000 wavulwa umshini wamaphupho ngo Meyi mhlaka 8 ngo 1987, Ngo 1988, wanyukela emarandini angu 500 000 kanti ngo 1991 wanyukela futhi emarandini ayisigidi. Eminyakeni enyishumi nje kuphela indawo yokuvakasha yavulwa, imishini yokugembula yokuqala eyayingu 250 yanyuka yaba ngu 1000. Umshini wamaphupho waqhubeka nokukhokha umklomelo kaR4 048 353 ngo-Agasti ka 1993 ngesikhathi iGrand Slam ivulwa ngoDesemba ka 1993, eyayinikeza umklomelo omncane ngezigidi ezinhlanu zamarandi. NgoDesemba ka 1980, izinkundla eziluhlaza lokubhola zavulwa ngomqhudelwano kaBattle weSaxes ohlanganisa okungu 12. IComair yavula umsebenzi wezindiza eziya esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilanesberg eseduze neSun City, kanti ihhovisi lokuposa lazisa ukuba khona ngempumelelo kwendawo yokuvakasha ngokukhipha amakhava osuku lokuqala ngoDesemba mhlaka 6, usuku olwandulela usuku lokuzalwa kwayo lokuqala. Ngalo usuku uqobo lwalo, iSalon Prive entsha yavulwa ekhasino. Ngawo lowonyaka wokuqala, indawo yokuvakasha yathola ukumvuzo wokushintsha imali yngaphandle okungaphezu kwezigidi ezine zamarandi. Eminye imisebenzi engu 2000 yaqanjwa (engaphezulu kwengxenye yayo yatholwa umphakathi owakhele indawo). Bantu angu 250 000 babezithokozisa ekhasino kanti abngu 300 000 babegcwala embukisweni we-Extravaganza kanye neTheatre. Eqinisweni, iSun City qobo lwayo yazidonsela izivakashi eziningi esikhathini esiyizinyanga ezingu 12 zokuqala ngapezu kwezivakasha eNingizimu Afrika unyaka ngamunye. Yaqamba uSol Kernzer ngalesosikhathi ayekubiza "ngenkinga enkulu". "Ibizwa ngokuthi impumelelo," kusho yena, "futhi yaqala ngosuku esavula ngalo imnyango okokuqala onyaknei owedlule." Izixuku zabantu ezazigcwala endaweni ykuvakasha zaziphindwe kane ngaphezu kenombolo eyayilindelekile, kanti lokho kwabeka ukucindezeleka kuzo zonke izinto ezazisetshenziswa. "Ekuqaleni sakubeka phansi ukuthi egugwini leSun City? Ukungafaniswa nalutho," kwengeza uMunumzane Kerzner, "kanti futhi sacabanga emva kwezinga lokubhalwe phansi ukufinyelela kwi-Easter ukuthi sekutholiwe, kodwa izixuku zaqhubeka nokukhula, ayi kancane. Kanti ngenxa yokudingenga, saza ukuthi kwakumele sikhulu futhi sikhule ngokubalulekile." Buka ukubhula kwalesisho ukuthi sinjani. Umbono ayenawo wawulokhu undizile ngaphezu kwehlane ngalesosikhathi wawusebenza. Usuku lokuqala lokuzalwa lwesun City futhi kwabe kungumgubho wokuvulwa kweCabanas yeSun City enamagumbi angu 284, indawo yokulala elungele imindenei eyavulwa emagcekeni ehlikela phansi echibini iwaterworld elimangalisayo elinziwa ngezandla. Yebo, iWaterworld. Lokho futhi okunye, ichibi elikhulu elingangamamitha angu 750 ubude, elinikeza ama-square metres angu 400 amanzi acacile ukudlala imidlalo efana nokushesheleza amanzini, ukugijima ngezikebhe kanye nokundiza ngezikebhe. Elinesisindo samanzi angama cubic metres angu 1 300 000, kwathatha izinyanga ukuligcwalisa futhi kwabiza uR 1 700 000. Imidlalo nayo ezicinalele nje ngokwedlulele, kanye nezindawo zokuyidlala, inkundla enkulu yakhiwa ukungenisa anashayi sibhakela besisindo esikhulu somhlaba impi eyayiphakathi kukaWeaver nCoatzee ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 25 ngo 1980, Leyompi kwakungeyokuqala kwezingu 50 izimpi zesibhakela kanye nesicoc somhlaba (khumbula impi enkulu eyayiphakathi yeWorld WBA Junior Lightweight yompetha phakathi kukaBrian Mitchell noAlfred Layne? UMitchel wawina) kanye nalenkundla - okuncane nje okuphathelene nangalesosikhathi, kwakunguqamba indawo eyaphenduka iSuperbowl manje enezihlalo ezingu 6 000 enkundleni yokuzithokozisa. Yavulwa ngoJulayi mhlaka 24 ku 1981, kuhamba phambili uFrnak Sinatra. Waynza ngendlela yakhe njengoba kwenza uSol Kernzer, kwaba imigubho emikhulu emibili okungukwengeza endaweni emangalisayo yokuvakasha.

Osaziwayo abadumile badlala kusukela ngalesosikahthi. Ngesikhathi uRod Stewart beno-Elton John benikeza umdlalo ohlangene oyohlale ukhumbuleka, ngaphandle kwasesiteji akukho okunye okungcono ngaphandle kokuzabalaza ezinkundleni zebhola eligingqwayo eziluhlaza. Ubusuku bansuku zonke bunemibukiso, uStewart wakhahleli amabhola ezinyawo kubabukeli, ababewagcina njengesikhumbuzo. Indlovukazi yafika nezimpahla eziningi lokho okwenza ukuthi zindiziswe zodwa ngezindizamshini zazo. UBarry Manilow wafuna ngenkani ukuthi ithanela ehamba ngaphansi yakhiwe phakathi kwezindlu zakhe agqokela kuzona kanye neshashalazi (ibanga elingangamamitha amane) ngoba wayekholelwa  ukuthi kumele abalekele ukuqondana kwamehlo akhe ngesikhathi engena. Kanti umbukiso womlingo kaSpellbound unendawo encane yezilwane ezinkulu eyakhiwe ngemumva kwehotela ukugcina izingwe zabo zezinye izilwane ezifana nezingwe ezinemithente kanye nezimnyama, ezazinikwa izinkukhu ezingama-kg angu 300 isonto ngalinye. Isizinda sezokuzithokozisa sona qobo lwaso sasingukuqanjwa kabusha, esassibiza okulingana nokwabiza ihotela iSun City kanti futhi sawina iStell Construction Award ka 1982 ngokuhamba phambili kwezokwakhiwa. Isigaba sokuqala nesesibili somklamo sasebenzisa amatani angu 3 900 ensimbi (onkungaphezulu kwengxenye eyasetshenziswa ekwakheni ulayini wabagibeli ofana ne ss Windsor Castle). Izinsika ezinkulu eziphuma phezulu zesihonqa, zingububanzi obunqamula iSuperbowl evulekile enezihlalo ezingu 6 000 obungangamamitha angu 52, enesisindo esingamathani angu 170 bese sichitha amamitha angu 300 odonga oluncane. Isigidi samarandi, umshini womsindo owenziwe ngendlela yesiko onomkhiqizo wama-watts angu 35 000 ezipikheni ezingu 215 ezinemibhobho engu 110. Indlela yayo yokukhanyisa ehlanganise okuningi kulula ukuyisebenzisa emicimbini eminingi, okubalwa kuyo imibukiso, imihlangnao emikhulu, ukwaziswa kwemikhiqizo, kanye nokuvulwa kokusebenza kwemikhiqizo ethile. Kwabanjelwa kuyo umdanso wokushebeleza, ukushebeza eqhweni, ukushaywa kwamadilamu, umbukiso wokugxuma, iWheels of Fire eyashisa eSuperbowl ngawo wonke umsindo kanye nentokozo yomjaho weGrand Prix, futhi ngisho nokudayiswa kweSuperSun Brahman okwakungewona nakancane umsebenzi wenkunzendala. Kwakukhona okuningi kakhulu esizindeni sokuzithokozisa kunaseSuper-duper Bowl, nomakunjalo. Ngemishini yakho ebalulekile, umbukiso we-galaxy ishashalazi lakhona elingangamamitha angu 80 ububanzi kwakungesikhulu endaweni eseningizimu, umdanso, indawo enkulu kunazo zonke yebingo yohlobo lwayo emhlabeni, indawo yokubuka izithombe, izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla, amakilabhu ezemidlalo, kanye nezindawo zemidlalo yeClub Orleans kanye nezitolo, yangenisa abantu abangu 10 000 kalula. Ngokwezimpahla zemibuthano, lokhu kuhlela amazinga amasha ezobuchwepheshe, idecor kanye nokunakekela ngokomsebenzi wakhona. Ngo 1983, uSol Kerzner waqamba iSun International kanye nawo wonke amahotela anamakhasino ngaphambili okwakuphethwe iSouthern Sun wadonsela ekuphatheni kwenkampani entsha. NgoDesemba ka 1984 kwaqhamuka okunye futhi eSun City ngokuvulwa kwehotela elihle ngokumangalisayo nelinobukhazikhazi leCascade elinamagmbi angu 243. Inadwo yalo yezingadi engamahectare amane yaphinda fuhti yenza iSun City yaba ngundabuzekwayo edolobheni, ngemichachazo yazo emangalisayo neyenziwe ngobuciko , izimpophoma, izimpophonyana, kanye nemitata egcwaliswe ngemibalabala yezinhlanzi, konke kuvele phakathi kokutshaliwe okuluhlaza. Izinyoni ezinkulu ezifana nedada elikhulu, omakholwase kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zemibala yezinyoni ezizindizela ngokukhululeka phakathi kwezihlahla zemvelo, izihlahlana kanye nama-cycads ambalwa okutshalwe pahakathi kwedwala lendawo elisinda okungangamathani angu 4 000 ePilanesberg, okuvele ngkuhlakanipha pahakathi kwedalwa likakhonkolo elingangama-square metres angu 1 860 elibunjwe lisuselwa endalweni yemvelo, kanye nenxoza yengilazi engangama square metres angu 3 720 ukhonkolo owenziwe. Amadwala notshani bemfunda kudala ingemumva lamatshe adwetshiwe akhombisa ubuciko base-Afrika. Lokhukunwetshwa kwendawo yokuvakasha ngasemaphethelweni angaseceleni lentaba kwenza kubaluleke ngoJanuwari ka 1986 ukufaka iSkytrain Monorail, ehamba phakathi kwendawo yepaki yezimoto enwetshiwe esesangweni namahotela amathathu. Ngo 1989, abasebenzi bakhula baba ngu 3 200 kanti abangamaphesenti angu 90 babeqhamuka eBotswana abaqhamuka ezindaweni ezakhele. Emve kweminyaka engu 10, iSun City yanikezela ngezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezingangaphansi kuka 14, futhi ezilandela inkolelo kanoma ubani yokunambitheka, lokhu kwakusevwa yonke into kusukela emashibisini kuya kwezinkulu izindishi. UFrank Sinata wayesegombekile ngaphezu kwezinga likapasta waseNtaliyane osevwa yiSilver Forest esehotela iSun City lokhu ayekuthenga zonke izinsuku ebusuku. OkwaShirley Bassey beno-Ann-Margret, akukho okunye ngapandle kweDom Perignon neMoet at Chandon okungakwenza. UModern Talikni wayethenga amagaqa esiqandisi enziwe kuphela ngamanzi a-Vital. UKenny Rogers wayedla okukhulu kwe M & Ms (kwaseUS okufana nama-Smarties) okwakuthengelwe yena nje phesheya. NgoMashi ka 1991, kwakukhona uthosi omkhulukazi we"Cheers" ngesikahthi iCabanas Sunrise Cocktail, ixutshwe ngaphansi kocwaningo lwezikhulu ezaziqhamuka eGuiness Book of records, iba ingxubevange yotshwala enkulu kakhulu emhlabeni. Ingilazi enkulu, eyenzelwe kakhulukazi ukuthwala amalitha angu 1 500, yayigcwaliswa ngo-tequila, usulupa we-grenadine kanye nojusi wewolintshi nokaphayinaphu, kanti futhi ingilazi egcwele ejwayelekile yaphenduka yathengwa izixukuyakhuphula izinga elikhulu lenjabulo. Ngo 1992, isizinda sezokuzithokozisa saphindaphindwa ngokubukhulu ngokwengezelwa ngohholo lanaphathizikhwama (Hall of Treasures), okwathi ngokuhamba kwesikahthi lahlanganiswa neLost City. Ngokubukeka kwalo kwangaphandlenjengoba lidwetshwe edwaleni lakudalalase limbozwa ngemidwebo, ingaphakathi likhombisa ubuciko obumangalisayo ngokwedlulele bemishini yokudlala okukanye nemidlalo yevideo okuhambisana nakho kanye nesitayela sokuzijabulisa okulinganisiweyo kwemibukiso esemaceleni, okunenezelwe izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla kanye nezinto zemihlangano emikhulu. Isizinda sezokuzithokozisa esikhona sashintshelwa kwecinene ikhasino ngemishini yayo engu 350. Umsebenzi wase uqalwe ngezigidi zamarandi ezingu 830 yiLost City eminyakeni emibili yokwandulela, ngo 1990. lokho kwakungumklamo obalulekile nomkhulu ube wakhula futhi ngokumangalisayo ngokwendawo yezokuvakasha. ILost City ingumhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika ophakathi kwewubukhazikhazi iPalace ngemibhoshongo yayo eyenziwe ngemiboko yezindlovu okukhandiwe kwase kwadetshwa ngamaqabuna epalm. Yona iyodwa yabiza izigidi ezingu 400 zamarandi ukuyakha. Ichazwa njengenye yezindawo ezimngalisayo zomhlaba wesimanje, sayawina imiklomelo eminingi okubalwa kuyo nokuba ihotela eliholayo emahlabeni. Ngo 1998 iConde Nast Traveller Award yabeka indawo yayo ebukekayo nenobuciko bokwakha ngokumangalisayo ohleni lomsebenzi oncomekayo, amakhishi kanye nendawo yokulala.

Igubha ubuciko bokwakha nesiko lempucuko eyalahlekayo, kanti ukwamukela ngobukhosi kulindele isivakashi ngasinye. Ngemumva kokutholakala kwempuzi yebhulonze, kubanjwe amangqeshe aphakathi nendawo njengoba endizela ezidladleni ezivulekile zengulube yehlathi, njengendawo yokwamukela ejubalele enesandla esidwetshwe odongeni esiyiqongo, esinezitezi eziyisithupha ukuphakama. Ngaphezulu, imihlobisa yobuciko bokwakha nenothile ayifaniswa nalutho emhlabeni, ngokigidlabeza kwayo ngobuhle, ukupholiswa okwenzikwe ngokwesiko kunezelelwa ukupendwa okungafaniswa nalutho, imidwebo kany nemifekethiso eyenziwe ngezinhlamvwana zamatshe. Izinhla zetshe leFaux ziziphumulele ezinyaweni zendlovu, izingwe ezipendiwe ziqhamuka phakathi kotshani bemfunda ngaphezu kwezihlalo eakhelwe khona kanye namatafula andlalwe kahle ngokumanagalisayo eVilla del Palazzo, kanye nezitebhiso ezimfishane zezinhlayiya zamathse kanye nomabula zehlela endaweni ethengisa ngokudla iCrystal Court. Eduze nayo, ekugcinenei kwenye indawo evulekile, kume uShawu, enye yezindlovu zomlando ezinhle ngokumalngalisayo zaseKruger National Park  eziyisikhombisa, ibonakala ngokubholonze. Ubheke phansi eValley of Waves, manje seyixhumene nehholo labaphathi zikhwama lesizinda sezokuzithokozisa nge bholoho iBridge of Time. Uma ingwe ibhonga, amalangabi aqhuma phambili ephuma ezihonqeni ezingaphansi komhlaba, bese ibhuloho linyakze ngamandla akho. Kanti akokho okunye kokuzithokozisa nom kwemihlangano okufana nehholo labaphathi zikhwama okungatholakala Southern Hemisphere. IPalace enamagumbi angu 338,ngamachibi ayo okubhukuda, indawo yokudlala yakudala kanye neyokubuka, kuzungezwe ukucinana okwenziwe ngezandla emhlabnei okungenazo izigaba ezingaphansi kweziyisihiyagalombili yokutshaliweyo okusukela kwezimangalisayo izimbali ezihlobise ekucinaneni kubathandi bogwadule okungabheki ngaphandle kwendawo enyangeni. Izitshalo ezingaphezu kwesigidi nengxenye nezihlahla okubalwa kuzo esezindala ngaphezu kweminyaka engamakhulu, zaqoqwa, zachelelwa zase zitshalwa kahle endaweni engangamahectare angu 25, okudla ihlathi elihlotshiswe imichachazo ehamba kahle kanye nezikhukhula ezigijimayo. Ngaphansi kundlaleke iValley of Waves, ipaki lamanzi lokuzijabulisa labancane nabadala okungadlalwa kulo emanzini kwiRaaring Lagoon kanye nezitobhi zamanzi eziphakathi nendawo eziphuma eTemple of courage. Izimanga seLost City zakhonjiswa kumabonakude emhlabeni wonke ngoNovemba ka 1992 ngesikhathi indawo yokuvakasha inoMiss World pageant - okwakungokokuqala ingakaze ibanjelwe e-Afrika. Ababukela ababebalelwa ezigidini ezingu 600 zazibukele ipageant bukhoma ngokusebenza kwesatellite emazweni angu 73, futhi baziswa ngazo zonke iznto iSun City ezinikeza abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle. Okwathathwe neSun City kwaba abalungiseleli baMisi World ukuthi iPageant ibuyiselwe endaweni yokuvakasha eminyakeni eminingi eminye. Ukuvulwa kweLost City nePalace kwagujwa ngoDesemba ka 1992  ngenkanyezi ethe gqwa gqwa, isibhakabhaka sasebusuku umkhiqizo weson-et-lumierr ngoFrance's Jean Michel Jarre. Ukuqhumisa kwakhe izikwibhisi okukhulu kanye ne-laser beams, okubukwa ababukeli behleli ehlombe komunye ehlombe ebhishi lasevalley of Waves, bonke bajabulela ukushisekela kwabo bokukwazi ukuqamab izinto, Ngo 1993, iLost City Golf Course yavulwa. Izinto ezihlobise ubuhle bemvelo bePilanesberg Mountains ezizungeze iSun City ... kanye nezingwenya zibukela abadlali zisechibini emgodini weshumu nantathu. Mhlawumbe idumela elikhulu lomhlaba wonke, nama kunjalo, kujatshulelwa ikhozi yeGary Player Country Club, ikhaya leNedbank Golf Challenge. Umklomelo wokuqala weMillion Dollar wawinwa ngo 1980 nguJonny Miller wase-USA, eshaya uSeve Ballesteros. Kwaba yilapho, futhi yagcina, ukucutha kwegalofu okukhulu, ngendlela eyabe ishintshiwe emva kweminyaka embalwa ukuthi owinayo athathe yonke iminintiswano ewinayo. Kanti eseduze kwezindawo ezidayisa ngokudla eduze komgodi weshumi nesishiyagalolunye emangalisayo iGary Player Country Club Health Spa. Ngenombolo yesivakashi ezenyuka njalo ngonyaka eSun City, amanye amagumbi amakhulu anenezelwa eCabansa ngo 1995. Uhlelo olukhulu olwathatha izigidi zamarandi ezingu 236 ukulungiswa kabusha kwenziwe cishe kuyo yonke indawo yokuvakasha, okubalwa kuko ukuhlelwa kabusha ngokuphelele kwendawo evulekile ngasekungeneni kwehotela iSun City kanye nokungeniswa nokwaziswa kwezinye izintshalo ezimangalisayo ezingadini zeCascade. Enye yezintuthuko ezisanda kwenzeka kwaba iVacation Club, eyavulwa ngo 1996 ngoJuni. Lomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi oqanjwe kabusha usube impumelelo enkulu - kangangokuba yaze yaqanjwa ngokuthi iRCI's Marketer of the Yaer yango 1996, ngaphandle kokuvulwa isikhathi esingangezinyanga eziyisithupha onyakeni. Impumelelo yayo esheshayo ekwakheni inombolo ephezulu emikhiqizweni yokudayiswa kwalentuthuko - ngapakathi noma emazweni omhlaba - esikhathini esingangezinyanga eziyisithupha, kwaziswa inhlangano yamazwe ngamazwe yokushintshiselana ngokwabelana ngesikhathi. I-RCI yaklonyeliswa ngomklomelo weVacation Club Gold Crown. Kuhlale kukhona okuthile okusha nokujabulisayo eKingdom of Pleasure. Kusingathwe kokwsemandulo, indawo eyihlathi lase-Afrika, kukhona inkazimulo, ulwazi lwezinto zomhlaba kanye nokuhlihliza amahora angu 24, Kanti, yebo, umlingo usakhona ukuthatha iSun City ayi kuphela eminyakeni engu 21, kodwa kude ukuyongena kwenye inkulungwane minyaka. 	Umqondo oqanjwe kabusha ongabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso
IVacation club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha. Ingumholi wamazwe ngamazwe wokwabelana ngesikahthi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqama kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

Ubulunga buyathoalakala ngenani elincane nje elingango R3 900 kanye nomvuzo womqondo omusha okungabhekwa kuwo kuyanezezela ebungakweni  bobulunga. Ubulunga  bungenziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumgomo weTripple Ripple. Amalunga ahlonyeliswa ngo R300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga naglinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonela ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise mamathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Enkomfeni enkulu yamazwe ngamazwe yango 1997 yeRCI eyayibanjenlwe eberlin, iVacation Club yaseSun City yakhexisa imilomo yezithunywa ezingu 650 ngomsebenzi wayo ophezulu wokudayisa ophumelele ezinyangeni ezingu 12zokuqala. Kuma-modules angu 24 336 atholakalayo, angamaphesenti angu 53 adayiswa onyakeni wokuqala. Leliphesenti lijwayele ukufinyelelwa kulo esikhathini esingangeminyaka emithathu. "Into engezelele empumelelweni yokuthola leliphesenti lokuadayiswa esikhathini esifishane kanganka, ingatholakala kulomjikezo wokujoyinisa abathathu nabo beze nabathathu njalo njalo bezothola umhlomulo," kuchaza uPhilip Georges, umqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha, eSun International.

Lomqondo womhlomulo oqanjwe kabusha wokwabelana ngesikahthi usube nemphumelelo enkulu, njengoba abanye abathuthukisi bokwabelana ngesikahthi emhlabeni wonke jikelele sebeqala yona lendlela yokusebenza ngomhlomulo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL LULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.




Umsebenzi wokuqala wentuthuko yokwabela ngesikhathi.
Umsebenzi wokuqala wentuthuko wokwabelana ngesikahthi nangakho konke okuhle okutholakala ekubeni isakhamuzi seSun City Resort.

IVacation Club yaseSun City inikeza indawo yokuhlala engakhoneka emindenini eza njalo emaholidini, kuwo lomjikelezo wokuqala wezentuthuko. Ihlanganise amalunga angcono kakhulu kanye nemiqondo ecatshangiwe yokucobelelelan ngolwazi kanye nakho konke okuhle kokuba isivakashi sezindawo zeSun City. IVacation Club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha.  Ingumholi wamazwe ngamazwe wokabelana ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqma kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

IVacation Club eseSun City isiqale ngemivuzo yomqondo omusha ukwabelana ngesikhathi okubalwa kuyo ukubuyiselwa kwengxenye yemali oyifakayo yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012 (kuncike sekuthini wathenga nini ubulunga). Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngayo yonke into etholwa isakahamuzi. ISun City inikeza injabulo engafaniswa! Abahalela igalofu bangazikhombisa ekhozini yegalofu ayi eyodwa kodwa amabili emiqhudelwano emikhulu. Imindeni ingajabulela ukubukeka kweValley of Waves kanye nokushisekela imidlalo yebhola lomphebezo, elidalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujim, ukugibela amhhashi, ukugibela amabhyisikili kanye nemigudu yokugijima. EWaterworld umuntu angazijabulisa ekundizeni emoywni kanye nokudlala emanzini kanti iSun City isinikeza ngisho amalunga amancane emindeni - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi ehlelwe kalhe ihlelelwe isingane zeminyaka yonke.

Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomyeni wakho ningazikhululekela enjabulweni ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka kube ukuyengwa umshini wamaphupho noma ukuvuswa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma uma nifuna ubusuku bangaphandle bothando lwenu ninokuzikhethela izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlba kweHarlequins kuya kokuthe cosololo kwe-Ochird. ISun City iphela ngasendaweni yokubuka imvelo ehamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park elinokucinana okukhulu kwezinto zokubukwa. Akukona nje ukuthi kukhona i- "Big 5" ekungeneni, kodwa indawo ayinangozi yamalaleveva. Kukhona ukuzikhethela okuningi ukubuka izimpilo zasendle ezehlukene ukubukwa amalunga eVacation Club ezinagzikhethela kuwo. Ukugcizelela kwi-Exclusive Safari ukubeka iBig 5. Ukugadwa ngobiciko buzoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zizobuka iSafari yase-Afrika yangempela bekhwele bonke kwi-Landcruiser eyenziwe yaba nezihlalo ezingu-6. Izivakashi zingabukela ubhejane uzibhuquza odakeni olubandayo kanye nezindlovu eziyizinkunzi zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaceni kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ngufakazi othulile ebhebsini libulala, njengoba izilwanyana ezincanyana zizidlela zinganakile ubungozi ezikubona ehlane elinokuqhuma kwengozi. Phakathi nezintaba ezikude neMaddened Crowd, ungabuka ubushazishazi benyathi njengoba zixakekila ukunganakwa nokukhululeka ezinako. Izimoto zokuhamba endle zinempahla yazo okuzingubo ezifudumele ukwembatha kulabo abagodolayo, ukuvunguza kokushayela ebusuku. Zitholele ubuhle bobusuku bezilwane zasendle zizihambela ebusuku ngesikahthi izingwe zikhanyiswe ngaphansi kokukhanya kwenyanga ekhanyise lendawo esehlane.

Uma uhlose ukubuka okuthile kwakho wedwa, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izokuhlaba umxwele ezivakashini ezizijabulisayo. Landela inyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo ngaphakati kweLetsatsing Game Park. Unogada uzokhombisa ulwazi lwakhe olunzulu lokubheka imvelo - zizwele komunye ngalendalo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ekuseni ngovivi, ukupuma kwemibala kuzovela kuphikisna nokungenasici ukushona kwelanga ngemumva. Abagibeli bazogibela bonke kwiHot Air Balloon, bese bebuka yonke indawo yePilanesberg National park. Uma seniyoma phansi nisuka emoyeni niyozithela kwezoqeda ebenikubuka ehlane lapho ukudla kwasekuseni okushay khona kusevwa khona. ISun City izungezwe izinto eziveza amasiko ahlukene njengokwemibalabala. Jabulela amasiko ezinganekwane zesizwe, ngeCultural Tour ukuya eLedig Village. Uhambo likuvakashisa kwi-"Shanti" yendawo, inkulisa, amahhovisi ezizwe bese kuthi ekugcineni ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele eshibhini elinentshisekelo. IVacation Club yaseSun City iyindawo yangempela ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza ube ujabulela ukuba sekhaya elikude nekhaya ngendawo yokulala kanye nezinye izinhlelo zokwenziwayo. Unokuzikhethela phakathi kwendlu yokulala enamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala. Iyinye inesilungiso moya endlini yokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa wokulala oyidabuli ovumela kulale abantu ababili. Lezizindlu zokuhlala ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo nomshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifumdumezi kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukwenza indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izndlu lapho ungaziphekal khona ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zinikeza indawo yokulala ebiza R5 800 ukuhlala izimpelasonto ezihlukene, okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi kodwa wonke uzungeza amazwe ngamazwe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ilunga aliboshelelwe kwimpelasonto ethile kodwa lingajabulela ukushintshashintsha ngokuthanda kwalo. Kulabo abafisa ukujabulela injabulo yaseSun City isikhathi eside, ezikhathini ezifana nezibalulekile njengamaholide ePhasika noma ngoJulayi, ungazikhethela okukodwa kokungu-11 okumiselwe, isikhathi sokuqala sezinhlelo zobulunga. Inani lubulunga leminyaka engu 12 ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala ngezikhathi zesonto elikhulu eSun City Vacation Club lisukela ku R15 000 luya ku R40 000 lesonto leNedbank Million Dollar. Kulabo abancamela ukngakhokhi ukheshi ngokushesha kukhona inzalo ongayikhona ukuzikhethela kuyona. Inani elikhokhelwa izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili lisukela ku R733 ezimpelasontweni ezikhululekile kanye no R1 612 empelasontweni enotho. UKUBEKISA INDAWO YAKHO ESUN INTERNTAIONAL VACATION CLUB SHAYELA KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7000.




Zitholele imivuzo yeTimeshare
ISun International Vacation  Club eseSun City iyiphikankani lokwakhiwa kabusha kokwabela ngesikhathi kwemivuzo.

Umvuzo obizayo owutholayo, ukubuyiselwa ingxenye yemali oyikhokha kokuqala yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012,  Omunye umvuzo uknganqunyelwa esontweni elithile onyakeni. Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngako konke izakhamizi ezingakuthola njengezivakashi zeSun City Resort.

Umqondo omusha womvuzo okungabhekwa kuwo - iTripple Ripple, yengezela ubungako bamalunga. Ubulunga buyatholakala ngenani elincane nje elingango R3 900 kanye nomvuzo womqondo omusha okungabhekwa kuwo kuyanezezela ebungakweni  bobulunga. Ubulunga  bungenziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumgomo weTripple Ripple. Amalunga ahlonyeliswa ngo R300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga naglinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonela ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise mamathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Abahambi bamaholide sebesheshe babona konke okutholakalayo eVacation Club kanti onyakeni wokuqala besemakethe, amaphesenti angu 65 ama-module adayiswa ngokushesha. Lokhu kwaba yinkomba yempumelelo enkulu embonini yokwabelana ngesikhathi. Ubulunga beVacation Club bukungukuzikhethela eyodwa emiselwe kwangu 11, ama-module obulunga bezikhathi ezinkulu  noma elilodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (kubalwa ubusuku bangoMsombuluko kuya koLwesine) noma elilodwa kangu 41 amasonto (uLwesihlanu kuya eSontweno nobusuku bakhona) ama-module obulunga noma kokubili, okukunikeza ubulunga obuvikelekile iminyaka engu 16, Inani lobulunga liya ngokwenyuka kusukela ku R3 900 emasontweni akhululekile obulunga ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.





 ISouth African Timeshare isibe bukhali umhlaba wonke
Imboni ephethwe ngezandla ezinobuciko inikeza okuphephile, okubiza kancane kubafaki zimali bamaholide, bathi abahambi maholide bazitholele ithuba lokuzijabulisa ngendlela abangayikhona unyaka wonke eNingizimu Afrika nangokwengezwa kwamathuba okukwazi ukushintsha izindawo zangaphakathi ngezangaphandle uhamba, ebebengeke bakwazi ukukwenza nanganoma iyiphi indlela abebengayizama. Lokhu ngumbono kaLoraine Rimmer, uMpathi wemakethe nokudayisa kwayo wezindawo ezinkulu zokulala zokwabelana ngesikhathi zeSun International, iVacation Club eseSun City. Izindlu ezinobukhazikhazi ongaziphekela kuzo zathuthukiswa iSun International ukunikeza imindeni ithuba lokujabulela zonke izininto ezidumile ezitholakala endaweni yokuvakasha - kusukela kwesinye izinto zemvelo ezibukwayo eNingizimu Afrika kweseduze iPilanesberg National Park kuya kwemangalisayo  nedumile iValley of Waves.

UNkosikazi Rimmer uthi abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika banamasonto abomvu endaweni yokuvakasho iGold Crown njengeVacation Club ingakwenza, ngokwe RCT, banokufanayo okuphakeme okulinganiswa nokomhlaba wonke okuzindawo zokulala. IRCT inezindawo ezingaphansi kwayo ezingu 3 500 zokuvakasha. Abahlali baseNingizimu Afrka banokukwabelana ngesikhathi ezweni labo bese bethola noba namahlolide aphesheya kwezilwandle, njengoba bekhokhela amanani abo ngamarandi, eNingizimu Afrika, ukuqhathanisa izindawo zokulala zaphesheya kwezilwandle, kusho yena. "Amanani akhokhwa ngamadola noma ngopondwe akazovunyelwa."

Ukwabelana ngesikhathi eNingizimu Afrika sekube kudala kakhulu, kusho uNkosikazi Rimmer, kanti futhi abathengi baqinisekiswa ukuphepha kokuthenga kwabo ngokusebenza nezinhlangano ezinamalekhodi ahloliwe, kanye nalabo abasebenzela iTimeshare Institute yeNingizimu Afrika (TISA) - inhlangano enamazinyo, enokusebenza kwayo okunomthetho oqinile okutholakala kubasebenzi bayo. Ukwengeza, imboni yazisaukukalwa okubalwa kuko isikhathi esipholile emva kokuthenga. Uyakugcizelela lokhu, ukuthi ukwabelana ngesikhathi ngaso sonke isikhathi kumele ibukwe ngengokutshal izimali emaholidini nasekuzijabuliseni, ayi njengokutshala izimali ukuqala ibhizinisi. "Iqinisekisa ukuthi umndeni, njalo ngesikhathi esizayo, uzoqhubeka ukukwazi ukuba namaholide ngenani ongakwazi ukulikhokha - yikho ukubuyiselwa lokhu babathengi abangathembela kukho".

IVacation Club, kusho yena, isinikeze ukuthengwa kokwabelana ngesikhathi esikhathini esinqunyiwe onyakeni ka 2012, ngalesosikhathi uhhafu onamaphesenti angu 50 othenge ngawo uyobuyiselwa kuwe. " Kuncike ezinhlelweni eyakhikhiwe ngazo, isikhathi esiphelele sokwabelana ngesikhathi sibalelwa eminyakeni engu 15. Ngokunikeza isikhathi esinqunyiwe sobulunga, sicabangenla isikhathi esingukuthi abanikazi bazofuna ukwehlisa izidingo zabo, bese sibanikeza okunye ukuzikhethela okulula. Lokhu kusebenza kakhulukazi ezinhlanganweni ezithatha ukwabelana ngesikhathi ukukusebenzisa njemivuzo yokusebenza kwabasebenzi babo. IVacation Club, kusho yena, inikeza izinto ezinkulu ngezigaba eziningana. Njengokwengqalasizinda seSun International esibe sendaweni vele, izinto zevaction Club zidayiswa ngokwenani elincane ngango R15 000 ngezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala esikahthini sokuqala sesingu 11 esinqunyiwe, ama-module onulunga esikhathi esikhulu (iPhasika kanye namaholide ezikole kaJulayi). Noma kunjalo, kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ukheshi ngesikahthi kukhona inzalo ongakwazi ukuyikhokha ukuzikhethela kuyona. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7000.




ISun City Vacation Club - Impendulo ekungcebelekeni kwamaholide asebusika

Njengoba ulele uzibhabhalele phakathi negceke ne G & T eceleni kwakho kanye nenoveli esanda kukhiswa kaJohn Grisham inamathele ezandleni zakho, njengoba ujusi wamathamo otshwala besilungu ijini yehla ngomphimbo kanye nephunga lezoso sokwamasika ase-Afrika lithusa amakkala akho, uyacabanga - kumnandi ukuba sekubaleleni kwelanga laseNingizimu Afrika. Ukuphi? ESun City Vaction Club.

ISun City Vaction Club ikunikeza  njalo njalo, indawo yokulala ongayikhona yomndeni wakho wonke emsebenzini wokuqala wontuthuko yezokwabelana ngesikhathi. Kuhlanganisa ubulunga bekilabhu obungcono futhi obaqanjwa ngomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ngazo zonke izinto ezinhle zokuba isakahmuzi semangalisayo ngobuhle indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City.

ISun City ikunikeza injabulo engapheliyo! Njengoba ibhola lakho lindizela phansi kwavulekile amabala ekhosi yegalofu yaseNingizimu Afrika enothile - ikhaya leMillion Dolla Golf Challenge, umndni wakho nawo uyajabula uhamba ushona phansi ngeBig 5 kweseduzane iPilanesberg National Park.  Abaqhaphi bendawo yokucgina kwemvelo batholakala ehotela eSun City abanikeza abahlali ukuzikhethela okuningi okushisekisa indawo. ISun City inikeza ngisho amalunga amancane omndeni wakho  - iKamp Kwena, isizinda zokuzithokozisa esihlelwe ngendlela ehlukile ukudlala izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Ukubonakala kalufifi kokushona kwelanga, umndeni wakho uqoqene uzungeze indawo yokosa. Sekuyisikhathi sokuvumelana. Usuthole indawo enhle ngokumangalisayo elungele zonke izidingo zomuntu. Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomkakho ningazibhudukeza ngokukhululeka ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka ukuthi ukyengeka komshini wamaphupho noma okuvusa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma ubusuku obunothando kakhudlwana ngaphandle lapho onokuzikhethla kwezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba zeHarlequins kuya kwethe cosololo i-Ochird. Ngesikhathi ujabulela impilo ephakeme, umgadi wengane uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zakho ziphephile.

Unokuzikhethela pahakathi kwezindlu zokulala ezinamakamelo amathathu noma amabili. Iyinye inesilungiso moya kanye negumbi lukuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi elivulekile langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Ubulunga beVacation Club butheswa ngokukhetha eyodwa kwezingu 11 ezinqunyiwe. Ama-module esikhathi esikhulu, noma eyodwa yezimpelasonto ezingu 41 ezikhululekile (ubusuku boLwesihlanu kuya kobeSonto bubaliwe), okugcina ubulunga bube obeminyaka angu 15, kuze kube unyaka ka 2012. UKUTHOLA ULWAZO OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.







Isun International yakha ihotela elisha
ISun Internationa yakha ihotela elisha ikuthuthulisa indawo yokuvakasha osebeni lomfula iZambezi, iVictoria Falls, neZambia. Intuthuko yeSun International eseZambia yamahotela amabili aseMosi -Oa-Tunya National Wildlife park ithath indawo engangamahectare angu 46 bese iphetha emfuleni iZambezi ebhekene nemagalisayo iVictoria Falls - "intuthu edumayo".

IVictoria Falls yaziwa njengenye yezindawo zenvelo ezimangalisayo kweziyisikhombisa zomhlaba, kanti futhi isibizwe ngeWorld Heritage Site ngu UNESCO, lokho okuqinisekisa ukubaluleka kwayo kwezemvelo okube okunye kwezinto ezinkulu ezibukwayo. Isiko lokunakelela kanye nenhlonipho yendawo kungena endaweni yonke ngayo yonke into kwezentuthuko. Umphakathi wendawo uzibaliwe kuzo zonke izigaba, kusukela ekufakeni isandla ekuqedweni kweyemvelo esezingeni lomhlaba , ukusebenzela amahotela uma eseqediwe. Amathuba okuzidalela amabhizinisi azoqalwa ngengxa yokuxhaswa okuningi kwemisebenzi okuzodingeka, kanjaloke kunikwa amandla izakhamizi zaseZambia kanye nokunikwa amandla oxhaso emnothweni wendawo ovele ukhona. Amahotela amabili ohlobo oluphambili akha isizinda sawo sokuhlelwa kwawo okukhulu. Kukhona ihotela lohlobo lwe-four-star lemihlangano emikhulu kanye neliqukethe izinto zolwazo lomhlaba lohlobo lwe-five-star ihotela, azongezelwa uxhaxha lohla lwama-villas azimele anobukhazikhazi obungefaniswe, ohlobo lwe-five-star entuthukweni ezayo. Ihotela ngalinye lihlelwe ukuba lihlabe umxhwele emikhakheni eyehlukene yezimakethe zezokuvakasha, kanye nentuthuko, esewonke azokwakha isiqongo sikanxantathu omangalisayo wezindawo zokuvakasha e-Afrika. Amanye amaphuzu amabili kanxantathu kozuba iSun City eseduze neGoli kanye nehotela iTable Bay eliseKapa, okusho ukuthi anikeza inhanganisela yokuhehayo okuzoqinisekisa ukuhuha okungafaniswa kwabavashi ngasengxenyeni eseningizimu yezwe. ISun International ikholelwa ukuthi indawo yokuvakasha eseVictoria Falls yakha umgwaqo wokuxhumana phakathi neNingizimu ne-Afrika kanye nzwe lonke lase-Afrika. Amahotela amasha aseZambia  azinenezelwa isizinda sabavashi bosuku, indawo ethengisa ngokusha enesigqi esimangalisayo kanye nedawo ethengisa ngotshwala, nesizinda semicimbi yendabuko, ikhasino encane kanye nesizinda semihlangano emikhulu esishitshekayo futhi esinezinto zomhlaba esizonikeza zonke izinto kusukela kwenesigqi imicimbi, kuya emihlanganweni emikhulu yosaziwayo bezazi ezihlangene ezakho konke okudingeyako okuyimpahla yezobuchwepheshe yohlobo oluphambili ngokumangalisayo. Ngengxa yohla lwezinto ezikhona, imisenezi kanye nokwenziwayo ngaphakathi, intuthuko yeSun International izonikeza izinhlobonhlobo zezidingo ezishintshekayo zibe yilokhu umuntu akufunayo, futhi kuzodonsa izivakashi kusukela kubahambi abasebancane nemindeni kuya emaqenjini edinga okuningi kanye nabavakashi bamazwe ngamzwe, abakhetha kuphela okunobukhazikhazi bodwa. Ukubekisa indawo kuzokwenziwa umhlaba wonke ngokwe "Fidelio", ukuxhumana ngezamakhompuyutha  ezikushumanisa nendlela eyona yona yokubekisa indawo yeSun International. Ezokwakha nezokuhlobisa zizothatha isiko namafa kwabantu baseZambezi Valley, ukwazisa izimpande ezikudonsela emumva emlandweni wakudala. ETHANDWAYO I-FOUR STAR elinye lamahotela lizoba uhlobo lwe-three-star, ihotela elinamgumbi angu 216 lihlaba umxhwele kakhulu ezithunyweni zemihlangano emikhulu.

Indawo elikuyo enhle ngokumangalisayo, ongajikijela itshe lisuka kwemangalisayo iVictoria Falls, sekushisekele abakhi ukuthi bachaze okungafaniswa nkushintshashintshayo okutholwa izivakashi. Umphumela ulinganisa ibala elivundileyo phakathi kogwadule kukonke okuhambisanayo nendawo evulekile yase-Afrika. Ukushanela kwezindlu ezinezitezi ezimbili ezinzkho konke zamukela ilanga ngezindawo zazo ezigaphandle zangasese zezoso. Ngaphandle, imibala yomhlaba iyamangalisa futhi ithmabile. Ngaphakathi, izindlu ezivulekile ezinomya ziyaphila ngemibala yazo egqamile yesizwe ebomvu, eluhlaza kanye nesawolintshi. Ezinye izindingo ezinenezelwe zibandakanya isilungiso moya esizimele, umabonakude onemibala wesatellite, usofa ogoqekayo, isisefo esincane kanye nocingo. Imishini yokuthenga iyatholakala yonke indawo lapho abantu bengathenga khona eduze kwezindlu zabo iziphuzo ezibandayo, kanye nokudlana okulula. Indawo yokwamukela ephakathi nendawo izokunika indawo ethengisa ngokudla esezingeni eliphezulu nenobungane nomdneni, enomculo, enendawo ethengisa ngotswala, enezoso ezoselwa ngaphandle kanye nendawo yokuzithokozisa echithekele ngaphezu kwezingadi vemvelo. Isizinda sokunakekelwa kwezingane phakathi kosuku, engumcabango oyizulu wezingane zonke wamaholide, naso sizotholakala eduze kwehotela, sinika abazali isikhathi esiningi senkululeko ukuzitholelela bonke ubuhle bendawo obuhehayo. I-FIVE STAR SOPHISTICATION, ihotela lesibili kuzoba i5 star, ihotela elinamagumbi anobukhazikhazi angu 173 ulwazi lwalo lwezinto zomhlaba oluzonconywa abavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe kanye nosomabhizinisi. Amagumbi okulala awuhlobo lwezitezi ezimbili, athatha umsuka wesitayela seVictoria esinothileyo, okusafanele sibonwe ezindlini ezinomusa zaseLivingstone. Uhla lulunye lunezindlu ezingu 10 ezinesilungiso moya esakhelwe phakathi, ezinikeza izindawo ezivulekile ezihlelwe kahle phezu kodonda nezezoso, bese ujabulela ukubukeka okumangalisayo kokubhekana neZambezi River kanye nokubukeka kanye kanye okumangalisayo kwentuthu edumayo. Okugqugquzelwe izinhlu ezinhle zesikhathi sikaVictoria, ulwazi namakhono ezokwakha athatha umoya ongafaniswa nalutho olunye woverandi amabakhulu kanye nokushuba kwakho, izindawo zokuziphumulela ezingaphakathi zipholiswe ngamafeni ezwingayo kanye nokukhaya kwephansi nophahla ukukhiphela ngaphandle ilanga lasemini. Zonke izndlu zizoba nomabonakude onesatellite, umsakazo kanye nevideo, ibar encane, isisefo esincane kanye nocingo olunemishini yokushiya nokwamukela umlayezo futhi olunesicupho sokukuvusa. Ukubukeka okumangalisayo komfula kuzojatshulelwa kusukela endaweni ephakathi enkulu yokwamukela, bese kuthi ukubukeka kanye kanye kwezwe kuzotholakala kwezinye izindawo zomphakathi. Indawo ethingisa ngotshwala neyokuphumula ngaphansi kophahla lotshani oluvulekile kuzopholiswa ukuzwinga okuthulile kwe-punkahs, bese kuhlotshiswe okuluhlaza okuhambisana nakho, okusakhilimu, kanye ne-ebony. Ngezihlalo zayo ezintofontofo ongabeka kuzo izingalo zakho emaceleni neziphansi zenze efana neyaseTheki iLounge ezobekwa ukujabulela itiye eliphambili elingenasici noma ulinge ngaphezu kwewayini noma usigazi. I-a la carte Restaurant izothatha izinga elifanayo eliphezulu lomsebenzi bese ivulwa koVeranda abavulekile abanezihlalo ezakhiwe ngokuphuma kwamanye amazwe, izihlalo ezibunjwe ngensimbi kanye namatafula akhona, izitshalo eziwubukhazikhazi zegonothi. "Ihotela leFive Star, kanye nokumangalisayo ukubukeka kwemehlelo, ekunika okunye okumangalisayo kwase-Afrika kulabo abafuna ubuhle obedlulele kanye nezinga eliphezulu labakuthola enjabulweni yabo. Sihlose ukunikeza izivakashi zethu ngehotela elicolekile eliseVictoria Falls. Sesikutholile okusezingeni eliphezulu ePalace, ehotela iTable Bay kanye naseZimbali Lodge kanti futhi kwakungeyena umaqondana nje ukuthi iPalace ivotelwe ukuba ehamba phambili e-Afrika kanye neyesithupha emhlabeni," kusho uPhillip Georger, uDivisional Director: wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International. Okunye okuthintekayo izindawo zezibukeli zangasese ezingu 5 eziseduze kwechibi lokubhukuda, esithekile endaweni engaphandle ngezindwangu ezithambile, iyinye inezihlalo okwazi ukubeka izingalo emaceleni kanye namatafula ezinceku angamathileyi bese zimbozwe phezulu ngezibani ezinokukhanya okuningi. Lezizindawo zezibukeli zingaqashwa ngosuku .

ICONVENTION CENTRE, iConvention Centre, ihlangene nendawo yokuphumula yehotela leFour-star, izoba indawo enezinto zomhlaba kanye neshisekileyo ekwazi ukungenisa izinhlobonhlobo zemicimbi yamazwe ngamazwe eminingi kanye namadili athize okubalulekile. Indawo yayo enkulu yomdanso ingangenisa abantu abayela ku 550 behleli ngesitayela sasetheatre, nabangu 450 behleli ngesitayela sendlu yesikole bese kuba abangu 350 behlezi ngesitayela sedili. Ukunakekelwa okuzimisele nokomuntu ngamunye ngabasebenzi beqembu le-convention bazoqinisekisa futhi ukuthi yonke imicimbi ingekhumbulekayo, engenankinga futhi ukuzitholela ulwazi oluthile ngenjabulo. I-BOMA, iBoma yoqobo, ehlotshiswe ngemisebenzi yezandla yohlobo lomdabu lwaseZambia, izongenisa abantu abayela ku 350 yobusuku obungasoze bakhohleka ngaphansi kwezinkanyezi. Lendawo ingabekiselwa imicimbi yangasese yamaqembu noma abahlukniseke emihlanganweni emikhulu. ISIZINDA SEZIVAKASHI ZOSUKU, izivakashi eziningi zosuku ezitheleka ukuzoncoma iVictoria Falls yezimanga zizoncoma ukunakekelwa kweDay Visitor Centre okuzoba ingxenye yezentuthuko yeSun International, futhi ezogqugquzela kahle kakhulu ukwenyuak kwenani labavakashi ukuvakashela lelicala lasezambia lweFalls. Uhla olubanzi lokusetshenziselwa ukubekisa luzoba khona kubavakashi abasuka ekuzikhetheleni kwe "one-stop" yomsebenzi wezokuxhumanisa ezokuvakasha.

Zonke izinto ezenziwayo ezihlanganyele neVictoria Falls, iZambezi River kanye nedolobha laseLivingstone zizophathwa kusukela lapha ngabaxhumanisi abahloliwe abakwaziyo ukuhlangabezana nezinhlelo zokuba ngochwepheshe kanye nokuphepha. Izinto zokuzithokozisa ezitholakalayo zizobandakanya ukuhlenga emanzini emhlophe, ukujubela emanzini, ukungcebeleka ngokushona kwelanga, ukushayela ubuka indawo, ukubuka izinyoni kanye nokugibela amabhayisikili. Izivakashi zizokwazi futhi ukuthola ulwazi lwezinto ezikwamanye amapaki ezwe laseZambia. I-ADVENTURE BAR, iDay Visitor Centre's Adventure Bar kanye nedawo yokudla kuzoba lapho kukhona, indawo yokuhlangana kanye nezinto zokuzehlukanisa kubavakashi abasebancane kwezokuvakasha kanye nalabo abalambele konke ukuzijabulisa, buka ama-video omuntu ngamunye ezinto abezenza emfuleni, jabulela ama-video emidlalo yamazwe ngamazwe, xoxa futhi wabelane ngokutholile kosuku. IKHASINO, inxanxathela yekhasino encane izokunikeza izivakashi zendawo kanye nezivakashi zosuku. Izoba nemishini yokudlala engu 77, kanye nemangalisayo indawo ethengisa ngotshwala ezothengiza ngeziphuzo, itiye nekhofi. UPhillip Couvaras - uMphathi jikelele
UPhillip Couvaras - uMphathi jikelele wezindawo zokuvakasha eziseSun International Zambia. NgokukaPhillip Couvaras owazalelwa eZambia, aphinde ekhethwe njengomphathi jikelele wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International eZambia eseduze kweVictoria Falls isibe njengokufika ekhaya.Yize noma yena qobo lwakhe azalelwa eLusaka, ubaba wakhe wazalelwa eLivingstone, kanti iZambia ihlale iyindawo yekhethelo enhliziyweni yakhe.

Waqala umsebenzi wakhe embonini yezokunakekela ngokuqeda amakhozi ezifundo zakhe zeminyaka emithathu zokuba ngumphathi neHoliday Inn, eNingizimu Afrika. Wabe esejoyina ihotela iWild Coast, I-Casino & Country Club ngoyaka ka 1982, wabe esesebenza umsebenzi wakhe njalo eminyangweni eyehlukene. Ngonyaka ka 1984 waqeda amakhozi ezifundo zasehotela angu 8 eCornel University eseUSA. Ngo 1986 washintshelwa eMabatho Sun njengomphathi wengxenye yezamagumbi. Umva konyaka wabuyela eWild Coast Sun ukuyosiza ukuqalwa kohlelo lokunwetshwa olwathatha izigidi ezingu 800 zamarandi, kwase kuthi ngo 1994 wakhushulelwa esikhundleni sokuba ngumphathi wehotela jikelele.

Inkolelo yakhe yangempela igxile ezingeni lokusebenza eliqinisekisa wonke umsebenzi wokunakekela otholwa izivakashi kuholela ekunikezeni abasebenzi bakhe amadla kuwo wonke amazinga. Futhi uyindoda esebenza ngeqembu, ekholelwa kakhulu sekutheni "thina" ekuhleni izinto kunokuthi athi "mina" okungukuphatha komuntu yedwana. Ekuqaleni konyaka ka 1997 waqeda i-Executive Management Development Programme eNyuvesi yaseKapa esikoleni sabaneziqu sezamabhizinisi, kanti futhi unyaka usuphela waqeda uhlelo olufanayo e-International Institute for Managemant Development eSwitzerland. Lokhu kwalandelwa izinyanga ezungeza umhlaba ukuthola ulwazi kwamanye amahotela acolekileyo amazwe ngamazwe ngaphambi abuyele e-Afrika ukuzobhekana nentuthuko yendawo yokuvakasha eseSun International eZambia.

I-ZPA imemezela ukudayisa kweMosi-Ao-Tunya kwisun International


I-Zambian Privatiosation Agency (ZPA) imemezela ukudayiswa kwe Mosi-Ao-Tunya  Inter-Continental Hotela kanye neRainbow Lodge kwiSun International (Zambia) Limited.

I-Zambian Privatiosation Agency (ZPA) imemezela ngenjabulo ukuthi ungqongqoshe wezezimali, uHon Katela Kalumba, ungqongqoshe wezokuvakasha, uHon Anoshi Chipawa, sebesayinde i-Asset Vesting and Development Agreement esiqedela ukudayiswa kweLivingstone's Mosi-Ao-Tunya Inter-Continental Hotel neRainbow Lodge kwiSun International (Zambia) Limited.


Lokhu kulandela ukuphetha kwezingxoxo ezibe yimpumelelo kanye nokucaciseleka okutholakale kummeli jikelele. Kwaphumelela emva kokuhlangana kanye nohlelo lokuhlehlisa elibandakanya ongqongqoshe abangu 10 bakahulumnei kanye nabeminyango nabaphathi amahlukene bezimboni.

Ukudayiswa kuzophumelelisa enye yezinhloso zeZPA enkulu yokukhuphula izinga lokutshalwa kwezimali ezweni, kanti futhi lizovumela iLivingstone ukuzitholela ukubaluleka kwayo okusemqoka ekugcineni kwezokuvakasha. 
Isivumelwano saxoxiswana ngoMnumzane Hakainde Hichilema, iChief Executive yeGrant Thornton nosihlalo weqembu lokuxoxisana. Wayesizwa nguMnumzane Willie Mubanga wePermanent Chambers kanye noMnumzane Enzilo Rossi, umcaningi wemboni yamahotela, njengommeli nomxhumanisi kakhulukazi weqembu lokuxoxisana.

I-ZPA Board yanika isichibiyelo sezingxoxo eqenjini elalixoxa ihlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukudayiswa kwehotela kanye nesivumelwano seRainbow Lodge kuzoxhasa intuthuko yengxenye yezokuvakasha kakhulukazi eLivingstone jikelele.



ISun International (Zambia) Limited yaphumelela ezicelweni zayo zokuthenga lezindawo zozimbili, okwakubekwe ngapahnsi kwamathenda ahlukene ngoMashi ka 1998.

ISun International yabophezeleka ngomthetho ukuhola i-Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA), okwathatha kusukela ngoMashi ka 1998 kuay kuDesemba ka 1998. Le EIA yanikezelwa kwi-Environmental Council yaseZambia yase iyaphunyeleliswa yibo futhi ngoDesemba ka 1998. Okwalandela lokukuphunyeleliswa, iSun International kanye nohulumeni bakwazi ukuqhubeka esiphethweni sezinqumo ezibalulekile nezivumelwano.

Igama leMosi-Ao-Tunya Inter-Continenatl Hotel kanye nesivumelwano seRainbow Lodge kwashintshelwa ekuthathweni kwemadola aseUS u$5 650 000. Intuthuko ngabakwaSun International izodlondlobalisa imboni yezokuvakasha kanti futhi izogqugquzela izimboni ezixhasayo: abafakeli bokudla kanye neziphuzo, umnyango wezokuthutha, umsebenzi wezigijimi kanye nabazokwenza umsebenzi ofana nokuhlanza izingubo, ukuhlanza komiswe ngesikhathi kwezingubo, ukulahlwa kukadoti, njalo njalo.

Imivuzo ebhekiwe yezomnotho kulentuthuko yaseSun International ikhonjiswe yiGrant Thornton Kessel Feistein njengokulandelayo:-

1. Imisebenzi eqondile nengaqondile ewu 6 500 izoqhamuka esikhathini esingangeminyaka emibili sokwakha ngonyaka ka 2000.


2. Ngoyaka ka 2005 (iminyaka emihlanu yokusebenza), amathuba emisebenzi eqondile nengaqondile izoba senanini lika 8 400 labantu baseZambia, kubalwa imikhakha ye "ripple effect" kanye nowe "knock-on effect". (amathuba okuqashawa okuqondile aqhamuka emsebenzini wokufakelwa kwempahla eqondile, izimpahla kanye nokwenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zendawo ngokomsebenzi wayo. Amathuba emisebenzi engaqondile ahlobene nokuphindaphindwa ngomsebenzi aqhamuka ezimbonini ezifakela imisebenzi kanye nempahla).

3. Ukuqonda nokungaqondi kanye nokuchithwa kwezimali okwehlisiwe ngesikhathi sokwakha kwamadollar ayizigindi ezingu 92 aseUS kanye nayizigidi ezingu 19 intela ngesikhathi seminyaka emibili sentuthuko kuyalinganiswa.

4. Uma umsebenzi wokuqala ukusebenza indawo yokuvakasha okuqondile, okungaqondile, kanye nokuheheyo ukufakelwa kwi GDP yaseZambia ngonyaka ka 2001 (unyaka wokuqala wokusebenza) kulinganiselwa ezigidini zamadollar ezingu 50 zenyuka ziya kwezingu 90 ngonyaka ka 2003, bese kuba ezingu 104 ngonyaka ka 2005.

5. Ngasohlangothini lwezentela nokukhokhwayo, umklamo uzofaka izigidi zmadollar ezilinganiselwa ku 15 enteleni engenayo kuhulumeni onyakeni wesibili wokhwakha ( u2000), yenyuka iya ezigidini ezingu 20 zamadollar ekwakhiweni konyaka wesibili wenxanxathela yendawo bese kuba ezingu 27 onyakeni wesihlanu wokwakha.

6. Iminyaka emithathu emva kokwakhiwa (ngo 2003), ukunyuka kweGDP yaseZambia izoba ngelinganiselwa ezigidini zamadollar ase-US ezingu 17.

7. Ngonyaka ka 2003, abavakashi abengeziwe abazodonswa iZambia kanye nedawo yaseSun International yokuvakasha izoba nenani elilinganiselwa ku 85 000 ukulingana nenani lonyaka labavakashi abaphuma ngaphandle bonyaka okungaphezu kwamaphesenti angu 16 ngonyaka kusukela kulomklamo wodwa.



8. Ukwabela okubanzi kobunikazi kuzoholela ekusabalaleni kweLusaka Stock Exchange kanye nasekubandakanyeni kwemikhakha yaseZambia.

Umvuzo obalulekile owahlonyuliswa iSun International ukusebenza okukhululekile kokulanda ezokwakha zakwamanye amazwe kanye nempahla ebza izigidi zamadollar aseUS angu 33 - lapho abakhiqizi baseZambia bengeke bakwazi ukukhiqiza ngemali efanayo, nezinga elifanayo, nenani kanye nokufika kwempahla ngesikhathi okulinganayo. ISun International neChilinga Cement bayaxoxisana ukuthenga usemende ngenxa yalesimo.

ISun International futhi isincenge uhulumeni, futhi yakuthola ekufunayo, ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo izokwazisa bese idlulisa ushintsho olwehlukene ekuhleni kwezimali kwaseZambia okuzoba nomphumela omuhle embonini yezokuavakasha iziyonke.

I-ZPA iyajabula ngezinga lokuzithemba elikhonjiswe iSun International ekusaseni leZambia, futhi iyethemba ukuthi  kuzohamba indlela ende ukuthuthukisa ukukhula komnotho waseZambia. I-ZPA futhi iyathemba ukuthi lomsebenzi uzoheha abatshli zimali abaningi ukutshala izimali zabo eZambia.

Isimemezelo sokusakaza esihlangene
Isimemezelo sokusakaza esihlangene phakathi kweZambia Privatization Agency neSun International kwiSun International Development eseVictoria Falls, eLivingstone, eZambia. Intuthuko yeSun Interantiona yamahotela amabili aseMosi-Oa-Tunya National Wildlife Park, eseduze kweVictoria Falls, ezungezwe uhla olubanzi lwezinto kusukela kwi-Environmnet Impact Assessment, izonikeza uhlazo olubonakalayo kwezokuvakasha zaseZambia okuzokwenzenga ngonyaka ka 2001, unyaka wokuqala wokusebenza kwendawo yokuvakasha.

Esikhathini sokwakhiwa ngonyaka ka 2000, izigidi zamadollar aseUs ezingu 69 zizongena ngokuqondile nangokungaqondile kwiZambia Gross Domestic Product (GDP). Emva kokuthi ivulelwe umphakathi, ezinye izngidi zamdollar aseUS ezingu 50 zizokwenabela emnothweni wesizwe ngonyaka ka 2001 (unyaka wokuqala wokusebenza kwendawo), yenyukela ezigidini ezingu 90 zamadollar ngonyaka ka 2003 (unyaka wesithathu wokusebenza kwendawo) bese kuba ezingu 104 izigidi zamadollar ngonyaka ka 2005 (unyaka wesihlanu wokusebenza). Lomklamo uzobe uzukhuphule iGDP ngamaphesenti angu 2,5 ngonyaka ka 2002 kanye nangu 3.3 ngonyaka ka 2005. Esikhathi sokwakhiwa, lomklamo izoveza imisebenzi engu 6 500 eqondile nengaqondile. (Amathuba okuqashawa okuqondile aqhamuka emsebenzini wokufakelwa kwempahla eqondile, izimpahla kanye nokwenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zendawo ngokomsebenzi wayo. Amathuba emisebenzi engaqondile ahlobene nokuphindaphindwa ngomsebenzi aqhamuka ezimbonini ezifakela imisebenzi kanye nempahla). Ngonyaka wokuqala wokusebenza ka 2001, indawo yezokuvakasha izoqamba imisebenzi ebalelwa kwengu 4 500 eqondile nengaqondile eZambia. Lelinani linganyuka lize lifike kwengu 8 400 ngonyaka ka 2005 (unyaka wesihlanu wokusebenza). Lamanani asuka ocwaningeni lwakamumva lukaGrabt Thornton Kessel Feinstein. Likhombisa ukubaluleka kwemivuzo yezomnotho yezentuthuko ngemibona yamahotela ngeSun International, okukhombisa ukuthi okunye ukwengezwa kwabavashi abangu 85 000 bangaheheka ngasecaleni laseZambia leVictoria Falls ngonyaka ka 2003, kanti futhi lokho kunganyuka kuye kwabangu 89 000 ngonyaka ka 2005. "ISun International ingumnikazi futhi iphethe ezinye izindawo zokuvakasha emhlabeni wonke. Leliqembu selikhombise impumelelo yamazwe ngamazwe. Lokhu kubala nendawo yezokuvakasha i-Atlantic eseBahamas, indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City kanye namahotela ayo aseMauritius naseComores. Sebevele bakukhombisile ukuthi inkampani ingaxhasa kanjani ezokuvakasha zezwe ngenxa yolwazi lwayo eluthola umhlaba wonke emsebenzini wobungcweti wezokuvakasha kanye nokudayisa," kuchaza uPhillip Georges, iDivisional Director wezindawo zokuvakasha zaseSun International. " Manje sesilinga ukunikeza uxhaso olulinganayo ngokumangalisayo emnothweni waseZambia ngokuqamba unxantathu wezindawo zokuvakasha ezinkulu e-Afrika. Lokhu kuzobandakanya kwengafaniswa nalutho iSun City eseduze kweGoli, ihotela iTable Bay eliseKapa kanye nesiqongo sayo, enye indawo engafiniswa nalutho yezokuvakasha ngaphandle kwenye yezimangalisao zezimanga zemvelo ezisemhlabeni - iVictoria Falls.    " Sihlangene nezinye izindawo ezimnaglisayo esitebeleni saseSun International - iRoyal Swazi Sun, iZimbali Lodge, iWild Coast Sun kanye neFish River Sun - sizokunikeza inhlanganisela engafaniswa yokuhehayo bese sikulethela izivakashi eziningi ngasenxenyeni yaseNingizimu yezwekazi," kusho yena.

IHOTELA I-FOUR STAR  Lakhiwe endaweni yehotela elidala eliseMosi-Oa-Tunya kanti kungangokujikijela itshe lisuka kwemangalisayo iVictoria Falls, yindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo yehotela lemihlangano emikhulu lohlobo lwe three-star, olugubha okwendabuko kwase-Afrika. Ezokwakha, okugqugquzelwe ezilula izitayela zokwakha kwendabuko kwezindlu zodaka, sekuchaze eyehlukile ulwazi olwehlukile nolushintshashintshayo oluzotholwa izivakashi bese kwadala indlela ehambisana nokuhlela izinto ngendlela yase-Afrika. Iphonsiwe phansi futhi kowombuso umhlaba, isakhiwo iyisikhumbuziso sezindonga zedolobha lakudala, ezimakwe ngemibhoshongo noshemula. Ihotela liphendula esimweni sezulu esishisayo ilanga lase-Afrika ngokuba likhula ngokuvulekela ngaphandle. Amagumbi ezivakashi avulekele ngaphandle ngasendaweni yejalidi lebhilidi ngesikhathi izindawo zokudla zonanezotshwala zichithekele ngasendaweni yechibi. Umuzwa nomphefumulo walesakhiwo esimangalisayo, wakhiwe yisixuku sezakhiwo zehotela kalula nje , ngokuba semaphandleni, ukudonsana kwalo nokwamukela kwalo.

I-FIVE STAR LUXURY HOTEL. Ihotela lesibili lizokwakhiwa lapho iRainbow Lodge kade ikhona ngaphambilini. Lendawo iseduze kwehotela lemihlangano emikhulu lohlobo lwe-three-star kanti futhi uhlobo lobukhazikhazi lwe-five-star. Ukwakhiwa kwalo okwahlukile kugqugquzelwe izindlu ezinhle nezohlobo lwesitayela esidala sendawo, izibonelo zalezo zindlu zingabonakala edolobheni eliseduzane iLivingstone. Ukwakhiwa kugcine umoya wesikhathi sovernada abakhulu nabashone phakathi abambozekile, izindawo ezingaphakathi zokuphumula ezipholiswe amafeni azwinga phezulu. Kukhona futhi nomsindo ophindaphindayo wohlobo lwendabuko lokufulela ngotshani, okuzungeze amagceke apholile bese enxhumeka ngoveranda abakhulu nabamboziwe. Lendlela iholela izivakashi ngaphansi kokulula, okubiza kancane kwe porte cochere endaweni evulekile, indawo yokwamukela engaphakathi kokumboziwe, lapho bemukelwa khona kulububuhle besimangaliso sendalo. Kanti futhi nokubukeka kwndawo evulekile okungenwa ngakuyo kuyisimangaliso, kuvulekele ngaphesheya kwamagceke amangilisayo nawo kuya emfuleni omkhulu iZambezi kanyo nokuwuzungezile kwezinkungu ezimhlophe kanye nemangalisayo iVictoria Falls. Lelihotela lizogxila isakhiweni salo esihle ngokunikeza indawo yokulala enobukhazikhazi. "Ihotela le-five-star, lizoveza kahle ukubukeka kwefalls, okukunika okumangalisayo ukubukeka kwe-Afrika kulabo abafuna okungcono nokusezingeni esikhathini senjabulo yabo. Sihlose ukunikezela izivakashi zethu ngehotela elicolekile eliseVictoria Falls. Uhlobo lwamahotela asemazingeni omhlaba afana nePalace,iCascades, iZimbali Lodge kanye nehotela iTable Bay kuzophindwaphindwa. Akukona nje ukuthi kwenzeka ngengozi iPalace ibalwe njengeyesithupha emhlabeni bese iba ngephuma phambili e-Afrika," kusho uGeorgas. Eduze neLivingstone kukhona abasebenzi njengamanje ababalelwa ku 4 000, abaningi babo abaqashwe izimboni eziwayo njengamanje. Amathuba okuziqambela amabhizinisi adalwa ukusebenza kwalamahotela amabili nakho kuzoba nempumelelo. UGeorgas uyangezelela: "Silindele intuthuko ukube ibe ngumnyango wokukhula kwezomnotho kanye nokuvuleka kwamathuba emsebenzi kulendawo". ISun International iyayazi kahle indlela yesimo sehotela iMosi-Oa-Tunya ekade ikhona, engasebenzi njengamanje. Ukuvikela ubunzima phakathi kwabasebenzi ekade besebenza phambilini balelihotela, iSun International ihlele okuzobangenela njalo ngenyanga, okusho ukuthi izobanika amathuba okuziqhubezela nokubangenisela imali. Kungokokuqala kwalenkampani kunoma yimuphi umsebenzi wayo kanti ukuvotelwa kwayo okukhulu ngokuzithemba ekuletheni indawo yokuzithokozisa. Abasebenzi ekade besebenza phambilini bazoba futhi phakathi bokuqala abazonikwa ithuba lokuthola imali ethe xaxa ngokusebenza kwezokwakhiwa kwebhilidi. Womabili amahotela amasha azokwakhiwa aphakathi kweMosi-Oa-Tunya National Wildlife Park, eyabekwa ukuba yiWorld Heritage Site nguUNESCO ngo a989. I-Environment Impact Assessment yomhlaba (EIA) ukungena ekuzibandakanyeni kwezentuthuko epaki sekuphothuliwe kwaze kwaphunyeleliswa ngabe Envinment Council yaseZambia. Okubaluleki abakufakile kulokhu kwakuvela kwiCouncil for Scientific and Industrial Research esePitoli, okwaba umsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu ekuholeni i-EIAs yololuhlobo ezindaweni ezinedumela zase-Afrika. I-EIA isihlanganise ukukhushulwa kwezinga lwendawo ngesikhathi inokungena okuncane ngengenza ngakho ebuhleni bayo bemvelo, lokho kusho ukugqugquzela ukugqama kwentuthuko ngeSun International. I-EIA ingeyokuqala futhi ohlotsheni lwayo eZambia kusukela ekunanyekweni okwenziwa yi-Environment Act ekuqaleni kuka 1997. Ukwakhiwa kuhlelwe ukuqala ngoNovember ka 1999 kanti umklamo kumele uphelile ngo-Epreli ka 2001. ISun International eseZambia isibeke eceleni u$500 000 ngokwase-US wesikhwama esizosetshenziswa ngaphakathi ukukhokhela ezenhlalakahle ezifana nemitholamphilo kanye nezinkulisa, kanye nokukhulisa izinga lwezokuvakasha eLivingstone. " Amahotela amasha azoba sezingeni eliphezulu ukuthatha umsebenzi weSun International oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Azoba futhi ingxenye yenhliziyo nomphefumulo yeLivingstone bese eba umkhulisi wezomnotho ngokumangalisayo kuyo yonke iZambia," kusho uPhillip Couvaras, uMphathi jikelele wendawo entsha yesinxanxathela sezokuvakasha zeSun International. UMnumzane Hakinde Hichilema oyiChief Executive yeGrant Thornton eZambia kanye nongusihlalo weqembu elixoxayo uthi: "Lomklamo ongobalulekile kwezamabhiznisi, ezomnotho kanye nezenhlalo yomphakathi waseLivingstone kanye nayo yonke iZambia. Izinzuzo eziningi nezahlukene ezizotholakala okubalwa kuzo ukutholakala kwemisebenzi emisha, ukungenisa emcebweni wezwe ngokwezintela kanye nokqaleka kwezimakethe ezisemazingeni aphezulu ezimpahla zaseZambia kanye neminye imisebenzi eyenziwa khona ngesikhathi sokwakhiwa bese kuthi nangesikhathi amahotela esevulwa. Akukho nokuncane ukngabaza ukuthi lomklamo ukhombisa isinyathelo sokushintsha entuthukweni yezokuvakasha eZambia, ukwengeza ekugqugquzeleni ukuqhudelana kwezifunda zezwe kanye nokuhambisana nomsebenzi kulomkhakha. "Ngokuba khona kwesizinda okususelwa kuso esinemikhakha eyehlukene okudinga ukuthi sibekwe phambili ezingxoxweni, kuyenelisa ukubona ukuthi iqembu elibonisanayo lisahlezi ekwakhiweni, ekucoliseni kanye nasekufikeni nalesivumelwano. Manje uma isivumelwano sesenziwe, ngiyazethemba ukuthi iculo lempumelelo lizoculwa ngabaningi abantu - kakhulukazi labo abazozuza ngokuqondile nangokungaqondile emsebenzini walomklamo."

ISun City - Amaqiniso Indlela eya kwenye yezindawo ezinkulu zokuvakasha emhlabeni. ISun City, engefaniswe emhlabeni wezindawo zokuvakasha, ngengxubevange yezinto ezingafaniswa nalutho olunye noma kuphi, idonsa izinkulungwane zabavakashi unyaka nonyaka emahoteleni ayo awu-4 asezingeni eliphezulu anezemidlalo ezimangalisayo kanye nezinto zokuzithokozisa kanye neyemilingo iLost City. Ingamakhilomitha angu 187 kuphela ukusuka eGoli, indawo yokuvakasha isehlathini laseNingizimu Afrika elisesifundazweni saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, isosebeni lwechibi elithule elithe cwaka yase izungezwa emangalisayo iPilanesberg.

Ihotela iSun City lingeliholayo kunawo wonke, iPalace yeLost City konke kuthatha uhlobo lwezokwakhiwa kwayo kanye nesigqi sangaphakathi emaphusheni esizwe sase-Afrika esalahlekayo sachitheka. Iyihotela eliholayo lomhlaba bese liba ngelinye elikhulu kakhulu emhlabeni. Igumbi ngalinye lifakwe okubukhazikhazi lase lafakwa impahla yendlu eyenziwe ngezandla yegumbi ngegumbi. Amazinga ezokunakekela angaqhathaniswa futhi adlule okucolekile komhlaba kanye nezindawo zayo zokudla okumangalisayo, iCrystal Court kanye neVilla Del Palazzo kuvuselelwe. Lapho likhona phakathi neLost City, iPalace ibekwe kahle phakathi kubukhazikhazi bokutshaliwe benhle ngokumangalisayo indawo le esanda kuwina ukugqama kwezingadi zeBotanic eNingizimu Afrika. Ihotela libhekene nekhozi yegalofu yemiqhudelwano emikhulu enemigodi engu 18 yaseSun City kanye nelimangalisayo ibhishi elingaphakathi, iValley of Waves. Ipaki lamanzi elithuthukiswe ngokwedlulele emhlabeni, likhombisa okumangalisayo ukuma kwamanzi kanye nelingakaze libe khona ichibi elinamagagasi lapho ukuphakama kwawo kungangemitha elilodwa nokungu 8 kungadlalwa ngalo imidlalo yasemanzini. Imibhoshongo yehotela iCascades elinobukhazikhazi linezindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala ezimbili kanye nezimbili ezithengisa ngokudla. Ihotela iSun City, ebelingeliqavile esizindeni ngaphambilini, libekwe ezingadini ezinhle kakhulu libhekene neGary Player Golf Course, ikhasino yaseSun City kanye nekundla yemidlalo yeshashalazi yaseSun City kutholakala ehotela, phakathi kuchungechunge lwezindawo zokudla ezinikeza kokubili ukudla okucolekile nokwejwayelekile. Okubekwe khona ezingadini ezifanayo, okuseduze ngokukahle osebeni lwechibi kanye nenkundla yokudlala izingane, iSun City Cabanas, ihotela elilungele ukwamukela imindeni. Izinto ezitholakala kulo zibala nechibi lokubhukuda, izindawo ezimbili ezithengisa ngokudla kanye nezimbalwa zotshwala. Izivakashi lapha futhi zikwazi ukungena noma kuphi endaweni yokuvakasha lahp kunezinto khona zokudlala futhi zidlala imidlalo eyehlukene. Ngaphambilini indawo yezemidlalo yaseNingizimu Afrika, iSun City eyayikugcizelela, manje lowo msebenzi wemidlalo usuklonyeliswe ngamakhasino angaphakathi edolobheni, sekungatholakala e-Afrika okubandakanya ukungena eBig Five kweseduze indawo engenawo umalaleveva iPilanesberg national Park. Noma kunjalo, iSun City inamakhasino amabili ezindawo zemishini, iJungle Casino ese-Entertainment Centre kanye nenye esehotela iSun City. I-Entertainment Centre futhi iqukethe iSuperbowl enezihlalo ezingu 600, lapho uchungechunge losaziwayo bamazwe ngamazwe kubalwa kubo noFrank Sinatra wasemandulo, uSting, uBryan Adams noBill Cosby sebake babonakala. Ngaphansi kwalo uphahla olufanayo kunezindawo zokuphumula zebhingo, izindawo zokubuka izithombe, izindawo zotshwala, izitolo, ezokudla, izinto eziningi zokuzithokozisa, imishini yemidlalo yevideo, ezemidlalo kanye nozokubhejela amahhashi kanye nendawo yotshwala eshisayo. IPalace eseLost City. Indawo yokulala. IPalace inamagumbi angu 338 ahlotshiswe kahle kakhulu futhi anakho konke. Yonke inpahla ephakathi yenziwe ngesandla, imibhede emikhulu. Indlu enkulu kunazo zonke, okufinyeziwe okufaniswa nokobukhosi okuhlotshiswe ngakho ngakunye okungu 800 okwenziwe ngezandla. Iyinye yezintathu futhi izindlu zakhona ezinobukhazikhazi inamakamelo amabili okulala kanye nezindlu zokudeza ezimbili, iJacuzzi neSauna, bese kuthi ezilandelayo ngokhulu nezinkulu kunalezo ezinakho konke futhi zibe nosofa abashintshekayo, indlu yokuphumula nezindlu zokugeza. Amagumbi zivakashi, angu 91 anemibhede emikhulukazi, angu 125 anemibhede emincane, bese kuthi amagumbi angu 51 abe nemibhede emikhulukazi kanye nosofa ashintshekayo. Kukhona amagumbi amathathue-paraplegic, wonke anempahla ukungenisa imindeni kanti futhi kukhona amagumbi angu 52 obukhazikhazi anosofa. Igumbi lilinye lifakelwe umsakazo one-remote control kanye nomabonakude onemibala onemigudu eshintsheshintshekayo, indawo yotshwala encane, kanye nesisefo. IGuestlink Interactive TV nayo isifakiwe kuwo wonke amagumbi asePalace okuvumela izivakashi ukuthi zikwazi ukungena kwi-Internet, zithole ulwazi futhi zibuke izikweletu zazo ngokusebenza kukamabonakude kanye nezithombe ezivinjiwe ezithengwayo ezinamakhebula okubukwa ngaphakathi egunjini. Wonke amagumbi anesilungiso moya, kanye nokushisa nezomiso zinwele kanye nezinto zokushefa.
