IVALLEY O WAVES, okuphakathi nendawo okukhonjiswayo kweLost City yiValley of waves, iWaterpark esezingnei eliphezulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni. Izungezwe iRoaring Lagoon, ingama-square metres angu 6 500 (amayadi angu 7 560 square) ichibi lamagagasi eliphela ebhishi lama-palm. Imishini esetshenziswa ngamandla amanzi angenza igagasi lokutshuza elingangamamitha amabili njalo ngemizuzwana engu 90. Uma ukutshuza emanzini kungadingeki, imishini yokwenza amagagasi ihlelwa ngendlela yedayimane. IWaterpark inezindela ezinhlanu ezenamisayo. Kusukela kweqanjwe ngokufanele iTemple of Courage, ababhukudi babamba ukushay kwenhliziyo ngangamamitha angu 17 ukushona phansi kanye nangu 70 ukucija, bengena ngaphansi kwebhuloho bese beshaya amagagasi echibini elincane ngasekupheleni kwendawo. Ukwengeza, kukhona izindlela ezimbili zokutshuza lapho ababhukudi betshuzela emashubhini amakhulu. Ilazy River iyishubhu elihle ukuhamba ngalo elingenela kongapheli umzungenzo wesiqhingi esimise okwenso. Esiqhigini kukhona umuzana lapho kutholakala khona ukudla nezingubo, kanye nechibi lokubhukda elinenkundla yokudlala izingane. IRoyal Bath iyichibi lokubhukuda elivulelwe abavakashi. Elikhulu, eliyindilinga eliseduze kwendawo yokubukela imidlalo engangenisa abantu abangu 800. Eduze kwechibi kukhon iObservatory Bar, eyakhiwe ngaphansi kwendlu yasemandulo. Izinto zokudlala zasevalley of Waves zibandakanya, izindlu ezinkulu zokushitshela, izindawo zokudla okusheshayo kanye nendawo yotshwala enemvume yokudayisa ngokugcwele. Kukhona nendawo lapho ungagcina khona impahla yakho uyikhiyele kanye nehhovisi losizo lokuqala ukwelapha izingozi eziphuthumayo ezincane. Ngaphandle kokuthatha umoya kwemvelo ngokuthatha ezinye izinkambo, okuphephile onogada abaningi abasebenza ukugada ipaki usuku lonke. IValley of Waves ivulwa nsuku zonke kusukela ngo 10h00 kuze kube ngu17h00 ebusika ngo 09h00 kuze kube ngu 18h00 ehlobo. Noma kunjalo, ipaki iyavalwa ukulungisa indawo ngoJuni. Ukungena epaki kubiza uR40 abadala bese izingane kube nguR25 ezineminyaka engaphansi kuka 12. Bonke abahlali bendawo yokuvakasha, okubalwa nalabo baseVacation Club, bangena mahhala eWaterpark. UKUNAKEKELWA KWEZIVAKSHI, idesika likamlindisivalo kwihotela ngehotela linikeza uhla olubanzi lokunakekelwa kwezivakashi, amahora angu 24. Usizo oluqhamuka kwabaqeqeshiwe luyatholakala ukulungiselela okokuzithokozisa kokubili ngaphakathi nangaphandle kwendawo yokuvakasha. Okunye ukunakekelwa kwezivakashi kubalwa ukupaka kwezimoto okunjengokwezinceku, ukuhlanzwa kwezingubo ngozuku, ukuhlanzwa nokomisa izingubo ngosuku kanye nabasiza abakhuluma izilimi zangaphandle bayatholakala. Ukunakekelwa kwezingane ngesikhathi sokuzithokozisa kungalungiselelwa uma uxhumana nedesika likamlindi sivalo. Ehhovisini le-five-star linkeza okwakamumva komsebenzi wobubhalane kwezokuxhumana kanye nomsebenzi weDesk-Top Publishing esizindeni sezamabhizinisi esitholakala endaweni ekahle enkundleni ephansi ye-Entertainment Centre. Ukuxhumana okuqondile kungenziwa ngokushayela kulenombolo 041-557-1911. UMark Boyd - uMphati wezentuthuko
Umark Royd - uMphathi wezentuthuko entuthukweni yamahotela aseSun International. Emosi-Oa-Tunya Nationa Park amandla amakhulu, ukumisela okukhulu kanye nomuzwa ophilayo wentshisekelo yomsebenzi: yikho lokhu umark Royd uMphathu wezentuthuko wesun International, akulethayo emklamweni wehotela iMosi-Oa-Tunya.


 















ISun International Vaction Club - Elinye lamakhefana amancane empilo 
ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City ingumqondo omusha womqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi osewuthathwe njengonempumelelo kakhulu entuthukweni yokwabelana ngesikhathi - ngokudayisa okungaphezulu kwamaphesenti angu 90 kwokudayisiwe (okumele ukwabelana ngesikhathi kwamasonto angaphezulu kuka 11 000) esikhathini esingaphezulu kweminyaka emibili nohhafu.

Yini eseyenze umklamo weSun City ube ongafaniswa neminye nonempumelelo? Kukhona amaqiniso amaningana, angakhethi ukuhambisana. Ukubala ambalwa: indawo; uhlangothi olulodwa oluphakeme lweSun International; inani; ukwakhiwa komkhiqizo, okubalwa kuwo izindlu zokuhlala ongaziphekela kuzona ezisezingeni eliphakeme. Umuntu akumele akholwe ukuphakama kwezinga leqembu eliwufundele umsebenzi walo elaqanjwa ukwakha nokumaketha lentuthuko. ISun International yawenza umsebenzi wayo kanti ihlanganyele neqembu layo eloqeqeshwe ngokusengeni eliphezulu labathuthukisi nabadayisi abaqoqenene ebantwini abayizingcweti embonini yokwabelala ngesikhathi ababa nempumelelo ephezulu ekuziphatheni kwabo okubalulekile. Ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club bushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, nako konke ongakuthola njengesakhamuzi endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City yezivakashi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi banayo indlela yokungena kunoma iyiphi into eyenziwayo okubalwa kuyo igalofu emakhozini emiqhudelwano emikhulu emibili - iGary Player Country Club kanye neLost City Golf Course, ibhola lomphebezo, ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nokugijima emigudwini. 

ISun City inikeza ngisho namalunga amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi eyakhiwe ngendlela ehlukile yemidlalo kanye nokunye okwenziywayo eKwena's Castle, khona kanye emgcekeni eCabanas: inkundla yokudlala emangalisayo, ikhaya lezilwane kanye nendawo yokudlala enako konke okudingakalayo. Ukuzihambela okufishane ungcebeleka unqamula amagceke aluhlaza eCabanas kukulethela umhlaba wenajbulo eSun - Waterworld. Ukundiza emoyeni, ukuhamba emoyeni, ukusheleleza emanzini kanye nalabo abafuna ukungcebela emanzini, kukhona isikebehe esikuthatha sikuzungezise ichibi ngesikhathi sokushona kwelanga. ISun City isishintshwe iminyaka eminingi yaba indawo yokuphumula yomndeni. Ngentuthuko yenxanxathela yeLost City manje isikunikeza izinto ezininginingi ezenza ikhasino ibe okunye okuhehayo.

ISun City iphela kwenye indawo yokugcina imvelo enothile eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park enezinto eziningi zemvelo ngokwedlulele. Akukona nje ukuthi kune "Big 5" uma ungena ngasemnyango wayo, kodwa indawi ayinangozi kamalaleveva. Abemikhondo yepaki, batholakala ehotela iSun City, manje sebenikeza okuningi  ukuzikhethela kukho kubahlali. Uma uthanda ukufuna I"Big 5" njalo I-Exclusive Sfari izokuqhamuka (Kanti okungakuthatha ebusuku nakho kuyatholakala). IRhino Hiking Trail emangalisayo nenamandla amakhulu uzoyithanda. Kulabo abafuna injabulo, zama iHot Air Baloon Safari kanti kulabo abathanda kakhulu ezamasiko. Thatha uhambo lwendawo yasekhaya ubuke ezamasiko.

IVacation Club eseSun City iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza bese ujabulela ubuntofontofo bokuzizwa usekhaya elikude nekhaya okuyindawo yokulala. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala ezinesilungiso moya. Iyinye inendlu yokugeza enkulu enesisefo kanye nosofa wokulala ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Lezi zindlu ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo umshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezo kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izindlu ezinhle nezinakho konke zikunikeza indawo yokulala ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala kusukela enanini lika R5 800 nezimpelasonto ezikhululekile okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi, kodwa wonke unyaka uzungeza izwe. Izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zmasonto anokuthile zisukela kuR15 000 ngamaholide ezikole kaJulayi kuya kuR40 000 esontweni leNedbank Million Dollar. Inani lezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zisukela kuR733 ngempelasonto ekhululekile kanye noR1 612 ngempelasonto enokuthile. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.

 

Ikhozi yegalofu ecoleke kakhulu kunawo wonke eNingizimu nezwe



IGalofu lezingcweti eSun City


Amakhozi amabili epar-72 agalofu lezingcweti aseSun City, ahlelwe ngokuphikisana nengemumva lePilanesberg ngasesifundeni esiseNyakto Ntshonalanga enikeza izivakashi indawo yokuvakasha enkulu kunazo zonke eziseNingizimu Afrika injabulu kanye nenselelo emdlalweni wegalofu.



Kokubili iGary Palyer Country Club neLost City Golf Course kwahlelwa ngowaziwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika emlandweni wegalofu, uGary Player.

IGary Player Country Club yaziwa njengenzima negqilazayo. Kusukela ngo 1979 isibe yikhaya leNedbank Golf Challenge. Ikhozi idinga ukukkeca kanye nokushay okuqondile kwabadlali. Ikhozi egcwele amamitha angu 6 938 akungabazisi ukuthi engebukhuni engxenyeni yezwe lonkana. IGolf Digest SA kamumva nje isiyivotele yaba ephuma phambili ikhozi eNingizimu Afrika ngo 1999. lekhozi enhle ngokumangalisayo yakhungwa yiGary Player Country Club iminyaka emibili.

Ukwendlaleka kwemvelo okuqhathanisekayo kweGary Player Country Club kuyalahlisana - amaxhaphozi amanzi, izindunduma ezivele kahle ngokubukekayo kanye namagquma okushaya acashe kude ngakokuluhlza okumise okwenso kwenza kube bukhuni ukuthola ongenza ngakho.

Indawo enamanzi yokuqala esimgodini wesibili, ipar 5, odinga ukushaya kokuqala kuthathe isinxele somgwaqo ovulekile ukwenza kube lula ubude, okushaya kwesibili phezu kwamanzi.

Umgodi wesishiyagalombili ongobukhuni kakhulu. I-dog-leg ecijili, ipar 4 engamamitha angu 431 idinga ngempoqo ukucophelela namandla. Kukhona ixhaphozi lamanzi agijima enqamula indawo yokushaya ngokushaya kweibili kweliphakeme igquma lokushayela elikokuluhlaza okuzezindunduma.

Emgodini eshumi nantathu, abadlali abasha kwiGary Player Country Club bathola ukuthi lekhozi ayixoleli nakancane ngokushay kwakhona. Izingqinamba ezikuvimba emgwaqeni omkhulu zingakuvimbela ngobunani, bese zikuyisa kude kunazo kakhulu okungamisa ibhola kokuhhahlazekile okungakwesokudla.

Abaningi abadlali abakwaziyo ukudlala bayzabalaza emgodini weshumi nesishiyagalombili, ipar 4 engamamitha angu 422. iyindawo embi kakhulu enamanziazungeze indawo akulindele esigabeni sesibili. Ukunakekela okukhulu kumele kuthathwe ngokushaya egqumeni ngoba uma kukude kakhulu, ibhola lizongena emanzini. Uma kukufishane kakhulu, ukushaya kwesibili ukya kokuluhlaza kuzokunika ukwesaba bese kuba khona izindunduma emacaleni womabili ukwengeza isimo esibukhuni.

ILost City Golf Course iyasgitshashintsha: ukudlalela ugquma elingapahmbili ubude bekhozi bamamitha angu 5 953, kuqhubekela emamitheni angu 6 983 engqumeni lokushayela elingemumva. Ikhozi inikeza ukubukeka okuhle kwendawo. Kusuka egqumeni lokushayela lomgodi weshumi nanye, abadlali bangabona imigodi eyishumi nanhlanu, okubalwa kuyo nowesithupha, ngamamitha angu 58 ngaphansi.

Indawo eyingozi kakhulu yeLost City Golf Course umgodi weshumi nantathu. Okukwakhele amaxhaphozi amanzi izingwenya eingu 38, ezinye zazo zingangamamitha amabili ubude. Abadlali begalofu bayakhinyabezeka ukuthola amabhola abo aphume eceleni angena edamini lezingwenya. Lamaxhaphi amazni angejwayelekile yikho okunye okwenza iLost City Golf Course ibe ngejabulelekayo nokumnandi ukudla kuyo. Ayikho imizamo eyachithwa ukwenza lekhozi ibe nku kangaka.

Ukulandelana, ubude kanye nokuma kwemigodi yeLost City Golf Course kuhlukene kakhulu. Kwengasemumva engu 9 kukhona ama-par 4 amabili nje kuphela. Umgodi wesishiyagalombili uyi-par 3 emfishane kakhulu kanti umgodi weshumi nanhlanunawo uyi-par 3 kodwa ethe ukuba yinde. Umgodi ngamunye unokuzimela ngokwawo, kungabalwa ubude. I-par 5 yomgodi wesgumi nesishiyagalombili ongukufikekayo kuwona ngamashodi amabili kodwa ubunzima buqala kokuseduze nokuluhlaza.

Ukubukeka okuhle kakhulu kweLost City Golf Course kanye nemvelo yobungcweti beggary Player Country Club buvivinya ukuzazi babadlali abaningi begalofu abazaziyo. UGary Player uchaza iLsot City Golf Course njengenye kwawathandayo.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.

Kukhona okuningi ongazitholela khona ekudleni, kusukela kokumnandi okosiwe kanye nokhari base a la carte Planters Restaurant kuya kokuthandekjayo pkungapheliyo; isiyoliso sase-Afrika somdambi - okusevwa ngokubukeka kwePhumalanga Terrace. Ezokuzithokozisa  
Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye zezemidlalo ezibanjwelwa khona.

Izingane ezeneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngokho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishinini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.



Gembula ngekhanda lakho, ayi ngenhliziyo yakho

Isexwayiso! Okungaphakathi ngale kwalelikasi kuqukethe ulwazi ngezokugembula, futhi kuqondiswe kubantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka 18.



IGalofu
Lekhozi ebukekayo ngokumangalisayo esesihoxweni secala lentaba, kwethandekayo I-Ezulwini Valley, engangamakhilomitha angu 15 ukusuka edolobheni elikhulu lezwe iMbabane. Engangamamitha angu 6 150 ubude iPar 72 isakhiwo sayo edinga ukwazi njengokuthinta okuthambile kwasebumnkantshubomvu ngabayizimfundamakhwela. Ngempela okuningi kwezokuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika kubhale phansi ukuthi izinga lokuwina elalitholwa kulendawo laliphansi eminyakeni engaphambilini.

Ngaphandle kwalokhu noma mhlawumbe ngenxa yakho, ikhozi isibe ngedumile ngabo bonke abadlali begalofu. Uma ubuka ohleni lwabahlonishwa beRoyal Swazi Classic (enye yemidlalo ephilayo omude ohambweni lonyaka lasebemnkantshubomvu) luveza amagama abaningi abadlali bangampela. UJohn Bland obonakala ephethe wonke umdlalo ngasemaphethelweni okuphela kweminyaka yawo 70 kanye nokuqala kweyawo 80. uMark McNulty owabeka amarekhodi okushaya khona kanye nezikhathi ezimbili lapho aba khona ngophumelela phambili kakhulu kunabo bonke uJohn Daly wabeka irekhodi lakhe lokuba ngowokuqala ukunqoba esigabeni sabaziwayo asebemkantshubomvu lapha kulendawo. Kanye no-Ernie Els we "big easy" yegalofu walenza labukeka lilula ngesikhathi ewina ngo 1992. Uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwekhozi labekwa ukuthi lusebenze ngokuqala kweminyaka yawo 90. Ubutshani bekukuyu baqala ukutshalwa emigwaqeni evulekile, okuluhlaza kwabekwa kabusha kwaze kwathi izindawo zamanzi ezimbalwa zengezwa. Umgodi wesishiyagalolunye, othathwa njengolula wepar 4, lapho imishudo emide ingahamba khona, namhlanje ikhombisa amachibi amaningana enziwe ngabantu ngakwesokunxele somgwaqo omkhulu okungaphambi kokuluhlaza, okungezele okungaba yingozi noma inzuzo. 

Umgodi weshumi nesikhombisa mhlawumbe ungumgodi ogqamile. Lepar 5 imfishane ngokwanele ukulinga abadlali ukuthi bhambe kokuluhlaza kabili kodwa okuyiqhamukela okuhlangene kumele kube khona ukudlula amanzi amaningi abheke ingaphambili lokuluhlaza okuncane. Ukwengeza, noma ngumuphi umshudo ogeja kwesobunxele noma kwesokudla kushiya umuntu ezabalazela iPar. Ngokuthuthukiswa kwekhozi manje kuphelelisa iRoyal Swazi Sun kunikeza inselelo ethe ukuthi xaxa ngaphandle kokuhoxisa ukuhlaba kwayo umxhwele - lokhu okunikeza injabulo kanye nokokujabulela ukudala kulabo abadlalayo futhi,yebo, mhlawumbe kuthi ukubaduda kancane.



IStokesaver, iCourse Graphics


Umbuso wezintaba waseSwaziland unikeza abavakashi bayo izinhlobonhlobo zokuhehayo kanye nokwenziwayo - kusukela kwebukekayo imifanekiso, kuya ebucikweni obudlidlizelayo kanye nemboni yemisebenzi yezandla, kuya kokukhulu ukuzitholela ulwazi ngezemvelo, okufana nokuhlenga emanzini amhlophe, ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo kanye nokushayela ubuka indawo yasendle.

Sizothanda ukukwamukela ezweni lethu eluluhlaza nelinentokozo, bese sabelana nawe enye yezimfihlo ezimangalisayo zase-Afrika ezigciniwe! IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley ikukhombisa amahotela amathathu ahlukene, lilinye lihlaba umxhwele ngokwalo. Ukubukeka kweNhlangano Sun engasengxenyeni eseningizimu yezwe endaweni enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuziphumulela kanye nokushaywa ngumoya. Bahambi bamaholide, izithunywa zemihlangano emikhulu, kanye nabavakashi bomhlaba nabafana nabo bakhetha ukubuyela futhi kwesinye isikhathi kulobubumnandi bokuphathwa kahle okukunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo ehamba phambili, ezokuzithokozisa kanye nezinto nje zokuziphumulela. Zonke izivakashi zase-Ezulwini Sun naseLugogo Sun ziyamenywa ekubeni amalungu okufakela kweseduze iRoyal Swazi Golf Club.

Indlu yokudlala yasekamp Kwena itholakala eRoyal Swazi Sun kanti futhi inikeza imidlalo yosuku lonke, okubalwa kuyo imidlalo ethile, ukugibela amahhashi kanye kanye neminye imidlalo ongazikhombisa kuyo ukuhlakanipha yabavakashi banoma yiliphi ihotela abaneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12.

IFactory yeCarnival itholakala endaweni yokungena enkulu yasekhasino, iCarnival Factory ikhombisa uhlelo olumangalisayo lwevideo entsha kanye nemidlalo yezingane zindawonye.

Isikhumulo sezindiza iMatsapha International Airport, esetshenziswa izindiza eziqondayo ezisuka emadolobheni amakhulu aseNingizimu Afrika, okubalwa kuwo neGoli, eliyindawo emfishane engangamakhilomitha angu 28 ushayela. Imidlalo yangaphandle
Uma usukhathele amathuba onke asendaweni yokuvakasha, ungathanda ukuzama ngaphandle usuku olulandelayo kanye nokuzikhethela kukahhafu wosuku.

IMdzimba Trail, uhambo lukahhafu wosuku lokuzitholela ulwazi lwangaphandle - uvakashele amakhaya aseSwazini, izindawo zemilando, isangoma sendawo, izimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla bese ujabulela amakhilomitha amabili uhamba phezu kwemangalisayo intaba ubuka. ILobamba Trail igxile emlandweni wesizwe nowezwe, uhambo olunguhhafu wosuku lukaLobamba luhlanganisa ukuya eNational Museum, iKing Sobhuza Memorial Park, iLobamba Royal Village, iSwazi Village yezamasiko, kanye neMatenga Falls nezimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla. Ubumnandi beSwaziland, uhambo olumangalisayo lweqembu lakusihlwa olugxile esitayeleni sempilo nezamasiko. Okubalwa ukungena eRoyal uMphakatsi (ikhaya lenkosi yamaSwazi) okulandelwa ukungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary ukulungiselela nokunambitha ukudla kwendabuko, kanye nomdanso wamandla weSibhaca.

ISwazi Arts neCrafs, chitha uhhafu wosuku uvakashela izindawo ezimangalisayo zezimakethe zokwakhiwa ngobuciko nemisebenzi yezandla e-Ezulwini, eMantenga, eMlilwane, naseMakerns, kubandakanya nengafaniswa nalutho olunye ifemu yamakhandlela. Enye futhi indlela engathathwa edlula e-Ezulwini Valley iya phezulu eMbabane, eMotshana kanye nedumile ifemu yengilazi iNgwenya, ukubona abakhi bengilazi bamaSwazi besemsebenzini. IWildlife Trails, iMlilwane Hogs kanye neHippo Trails, uhhafu wosuku ubuka okumangalisayo, ubuka ihhipo kanye nezinyoni eziningi kanye nokubuka nje okwasendle okuningi. Okubaliwe isitobhi sesizinda semisebenzi yezandla kanye nendawo lapho kuphunyulwa khona okutholwa kuyo okokuqabula umzimba. IHlane Big Cats, usuku lonke uluchitha ulandela amabhubesi, ingulube yehlathi, kanye nengwe eHlane Royal national Park, okunokuzikhethela ukuhamba ngezinyawo okugadiwe. Ukudla kwasemini nokokuqabula umzimba kubaliwe.

IMkhaya Endagered Species, chitha usuku lonke ubukela ngokuvulekile konke okukhona usemotweni ubukela inyathi , indlulamithi, ubhejane omnyama, indlovu, utsessebe, kanye nokunye okuningi. Jabulela isitobhi sokuziqabula somgodi wamanzi kanye nokudla kwasemini okulula kwenhle ikambo esehlathini. Izinto ezibukwayo ezingaphandle, iwhite Water Rafting, umfula omkhulu Usuthu River, okunikeza ulwazi ongasophinde ulukhohlwe uma ufuna ukuzitholela ubuhle. Usuku olugcwele noma olunguhhafu, yonke impahla ibaliwe, kanye nokugadwa, ezokuthutha nokudla kwasemini. Ukubekisa indawo yesikhathi samanzi aphansi kubalwa kuko ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo ukuhlamba emanzini ngesikebhe. Okunye okuhle kungahlelwa njengokukhwela intaba ngamabhayisikili akhona, iparagliding kanye nokuhamba nge 4 x 4.




Ezemidlalo nezokuzithokozisa 
Izivakashi zinezinto zayo yonke iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley Resort kusukela ekuzikhetheleni nangesikhathi sekuza kwezokudlala ngaphandle. Ungabhukuda, udlale igalofu, ibhola lomphebezo kanye nelidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, zitholele izindlela zemvelo, uhla lungolungapheli ...

IRoyal Swazi Country Club, ikhozi ebukekayo yemiqhudelwano emikhulu yemigodi engu 18 eseSwazi Royal Sun Country Club ingenye okunokuthola kuyo umvuzo ongatholwa noma kuphi emhlabeni, ngezindawo zayo ezinezintaba ezingajatshulelwa kuzona zonke izindunduma nkuluhlaza. Ipar 72 yekhozi eshanelayo eyavulwa ngo 1966 ilele phansi emimangweni yezintaba zeLubombo, ngezindawo zayo ezilinganayo ezingaqhathaniswa ezingu 9 zokuqala kanye nezisemumva ezingu 9 ezinenezela ngokugcwele ukubukeka nokundlaleka kwentaba. Okuluhlaza kanye nemigwaqo emikhulu evulekile kusezindaweni eziphezulu ekugcineni futhi zimema izindawo ezifana namachibi, izindonga ezicinaniswe okumilile, ngaphandle kwezindawo eziyizimbondela ezigijima eduze kwemigwaqo evulekile, kubonakala izindunduma ( enye yazo ebheke phezulu kakhulu eyenza ukuthi izitebhizi zikalayini kaloliwe zakhiwa ukuze zikwazi ukukhanda indlela), kuvunguza umoya nokunyakaza kwezihlahla okuhle ngokumangalisayo kanye nezitshalo zemvelo zendawo. Sekukonke, kungukuzitholela umvuzo wokuba kulendawo ngokuphelele kubo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane bawo wonke amazinga.

Ukubeka okuluhlaza, kukhona indawo yokuluhlaza eseduze neClub House, eyenzelwe abadlali. Indlu yesinukha, kukhona itafula eligcwele ngokuphelele lokudlala isinukha eliseCountry Club. AmaDarts, Kukhona amabhodi amabili abekiwe ukuhlukanisa amadoda ebafaneni! Umdlalo wokugibela amahhashi, izitebele zase-Ezulwini zitholakala ngaphansi kwe-Ezulwini Sun. Abafundisi abakufundele ukugibela amahhashi kanye nokunakekelwa kokugibela kuyatholakala zonke izinsuku. Amagceke okugingqa ibhola, kukhona amagceke okudlala ibhola eligingqwayo aluhlaza amabili nawo atholakala ngaphansi kwendawo evulekile yaseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nenobuntofontofo ukungenisa abadlali abangu 7 iyinye. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagceke aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakala Ezulwini Sun.



Imidlalo yangaphandle

Indawo yokulala 
IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley inikeza inani lezindlu ezingu 411 kanye nezinakho konke emahoteleni ayo amathathu: ihotela elihle kakhulu nelinobukhazikhazi iRoyal Swazi Sun, ikhasino, iCountry Club neSpa, ubungani, isitayela saseCaribean sase-Ezulwini Sun kanye neyejwayelekile engenakugcina umthetho iLugogo Sun.

Ezemidlalo nezokuzithokozisa
Izivakashi zinezinto  zayo yonke iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley Resort kusukela ekuzikhetheleni nangesikhathi sekuza kwezokudlala ngaphandle. Ungabhukuda, udlale igalofu, ibhola lomphebezo kanye nelidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, zitholele izindlela zemvelo, uhla lungolungapheli ...

IRoyal Swazi Country Club, ikhozi ebukekayo yemiqhudelwano emikhulu yemigodi engu 18 eseSwazi Royal Sun Country Club ingenye okunokuthola kuyo umvuzo ongatholwa noma kuphi emhlabeni, ngezindawo zayo ezinezintaba ezingajatshulelwa kuzona zonke izindunduma eziluhlaza. Ipar 72 yekhozi eshanelayo eyavulwa ngo 1966 ilele phansi emimangweni yezintaba zeLubombo, ngezindawo zayo ezilinganayo ezingaqhathaniswa ezingu 9 zokuqala kanye nezisemumva ezingu 9 ezinenezela ngokugcwele ukubukeka nokundlaleka kwentaba. Okuluhlaza kanye nemigwaqo emikhulu evulekile kusezindaweni eziphezulu ekugcineni futhi zimema izindawo ezifana namachibi, izindonga ezicinaniswe okumilile, ngaphandle kwezindawo eziyizimbondela ezigijima eduze kwemigwaqo evulekile, kubonakala izindunduma ( enye yazo ebheke phezulu kakhulu eyenza ukuthi izitebhizi zikalayini kaloliwe zakhiwa ukuze zikwazi ukukhanda indlela), kuvunguza umoya nokunyakaza kwezihlahla okuhle ngokumangalisayo kanye nezitshalo zemvelo zendawo. Sekukonke, kungukuzitholela umvuzo wokuba kulendawo ngokuphelele kubo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane bawo wonke amazinga.

Ukubeka okuluhlaza, kukhona indawo yokuluhlaza eseduze neClub House, eyenzelwe abadlali. Indlu yesinukha, kukhona itafula eligcwele ngokuphelele lokudlala isinukha eliseCountry Club. AmaDarts, Kukhona amabhodi amabili abekiwe ukuhlukanisa amadoda ebafaneni! Umdlalo wokugibela amahhashi, izitebele zase-Ezulwini zitholakala ngaphansi kwe-Ezulwini Sun. Abafundisi abakufundele ukugibela amahhashi kanye nokunakekelwa kokugibela kuyatholakala zonke izinsuku. Amagceke okugingqa ibhola, kukhona amagceke okudlala ibhola eligingqwayo aluhlaza amabili nawo atholakala ngaphansi kwendawo evulekile yaseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nenobuntofontofo ukungenisa abadlali abangu 7 iyinye. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagcene aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakala Ezulwini Sun.

Amachibi okubhukuda neJacuzzi, ihotela ngalinye linechibi lalo lokubhukuda elizezambulela zalo kanye nezindawo zokuphumula. Okudayisa endaweni ethengisa ngotshwala kanye nohla lokudla okulula nakho kuyatholakala. Womabili I-Ezulwini Sun kanye neLogogo Sun zinamachibi okubhukuda ezingane. Bese kuba khona ijacuzzi enkulu engaphandle ehlanganisa ichibi lokubhukuda neRoyal Swazi Sun. IVolleyball, izinkundla zokudlala iValleyball zingatholakala uma ziceliwe kumahotela iRoyal Swazi Sun, iLugogo Sun nase-Ezulwini Sun.




Imidlalo yangaphandle



Ukudla kwase-Ezulwini
IValley Blues Restaurant, itafula eliconsisa amathe lokudla kwasekuseni kanye nemangazayo ukudla kwasemini kwe a la carte kanye nohla lokudla kwakusihla kuyatholakala kulendawo ethengisa ngokudla enobungane.

IPhumalanga Terrace, lendawo efulelwe ngotshani enhle ngokumangalisayo inikeza isithombe sangempela sokudla konke kohlobo lwe al-fresco kanti futhi iyindawo enhle kakhulu yemicimbi yangasese. IValley Blues Bar, iValley Blues bar inikeza okumangalisayo ukubukeka okuphakathi kwamagceke ecala lechibi nezintaba ezimangalisayo ngasemumva. Jabulela ukuqabula kwengxubevange yotshwala kanye nokudlana okula ngaphakathi endaweni yotshwala noma ngaphandle ePhumalanga Terrace.




 
 Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye nezemidlalo ezibanjwelwa khona.

Izingane ezineminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngokho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma imishini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.




Okulele ngaphansi kwezimangalisayo izintaba zelobamba neMdzimba yiwo umhosha ofanayo oyikhaya kwiRoyal Swazi Sun kanye neLugogo Sun  ihotela i-Ezulwini Sun. Okubonakala ukuze zonke izindlu abukekayo okuhle kakhulu, phesheya namagceke enziwe kahle echibi, izingadi kanti kuyona iValley eziphinda futhi zibe indawo yasebukhosini yeLobamba. I-Ezulwini Sun ingumzuzu nje kuphela ukusuka eRoyal Swazi Sun neLugogo Sun enxanxatheleleni yemisebenzi yamahotela.




Imininingwane yokuxhumana
	Okuhehayo kwendawo
Izitolo

E)
Imidlalo yangaphandle  
Uma usukhathele amathuba onke asendaweni yokuvakasha, ungathanda ukuzama ngaphandle usuku olulandelayo kanye nokuzikhethela kukahhafu wosuku.

IMdzimba Trail, uhambo lukahhafu wosuku lukuzitholela ulwazi lwangaphandle - uvakashele amakhaya aseSwazini, izindawo zemilando, isangoma sendawo, izimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla bese ujabulela amakhilomitha amabili uhamba phezu kwemangalisayo intaba ubuka. ILobamba Trail igxile emlandweni wesizwe nowezwe, uhambo olunguhhafu wosuku lukaLobamba luhlanganisa ukuya eNational Museum, iKing Sobhuza Memorial Park, iLobamba Royal Village, iSwazi Village yezamasiko, kanye neMatenga Falls nezimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla. Ubumnandi beSwaziland, uhambo olumangalisayo lweqembu lakusihlwa olugxile esitayeleni sempilo nezamasiko. Okubalwa ukungena eRoyal uMphakatsi (ikhaya lenkosi yamaSwazi) okulandelwa ukungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary ukulungiselela nokunambitha ukudla kwendabuko, kanye nomdanso wamandla weSibhaca.

ISwazi Arts neCrafs, chitha uhhafu wosuku uvakashela izindawo ezimangalisayo zezimakethe zokwakhiwa ngobuciko nemisebenzi yezandla e-Ezulwini, eMantenga, eMlilwane, naseMakerns, kubandakanya nengafaniswa nalutho olunye ifemu yamakhandlela. Enye futhi indlela engathathwa edlula e-Ezulwini Valley iya phezulu eMbabane, eMotshana kanye nedumile ifemu yengilazi iNgwenya, ukubona amakhi bengilazi bamaSwazi besemsebenzini. IWildlife Trails, iMlilwane Hogs kanye neHippo Trails, uhhafu wosuku ubuka okumangalisayo, ubuka ihhipo kanye nezinyoni eziningi kanye nokubuka nje okwasendle okuningi. Okubaliwe isitobhi sesizinda semisebenzi yezandla kanye nendawo lapho kuphunyulwa khona okutholwa kuyo okokuqabula umzimba. IHlane Big Cats, usuku lonke uluchitha ulandela amabhubesi, ingulube yehlathi, kanye nengwe eHlane Royal national Park, okunokuzikhethela ukuhamba ngezinyawo okugadiwe. Ukudla kwasemini nokokuqabula umzimba kubaliwe.

IMkhaya Endagered Species, chitha usuku lonke ubukela ngokuvulekile konke okukhona usemotweni ubukela inyathi , indlulamithi, ubhejane omnyama, indlovu, utsessebe, kanye nokunye okuningi. Jabulela isitobhi sokuziqabula somgodi wamanzi kanye nokudla kwasemini okulula kwenhle ikambo esehlathini. Izinto ezibukwayo ezingaphandle, iwhite Water Rafting, umfula omkhulu Usuthu River, okunikeza ulwazi ongasophinde ulukhohlwe uma ufuna ukuzitholela ubuhle. Usuku olugcwele noma olunguhhafu, yonke impahla ibaliwe, kanye nokugadwa, ezokuthutha nokudla kwasemini. Ukubekisa indawo yesikhathi samanzi aphansi kubalwa kuko ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo ukuhlamba emanzini ngesikebhe. Okunye okuhle kungahlelwa njengokukwela intaba ngamabhayisikili akhona, iparagliding kanye nokuhamba nge 4 x 4.




Indawo yokulala
Umhlobiso owemibala eqabulayo yokuluhlaza okusasibhakabhaka nokumhlophe, okugqanyiswe yitshe eliluhlaza eliyigugu kanye nekholali ethambile okukhona kulo lonke ihotela. Inani lezindlu: zingu 60. I-Ezulwini inamagumbi angu 60 ahlothsiswe ngokuhehayo futhi amakhulu, anemibhede emibili emikhulu, isilungiso moya, okuletha ukushisa, ibhavu wokugeza, isisefo sokugeza, umabonakude, umsakazo, ucingo  nesomiso zinwele, kanye nezinto zokwenza itiye nekhofi.




Imidlalo yamatafula
Imidlalo ekhona ibandakanya: amatafula angu 8 e-American Roulette, anokuncane okunqunyiwe okusuka ku E5.00 kuya kokukhulu u-E1000 kanye nokuncane futhi okusuka ku-E10.00 kuya kokukhulu u-E4 000 ngezimpelasonto, noma uma kuceliwe.

Amatafula angu 8 aBlackjack ayatholakala kanye netafula elilodwa le-Raise Em' Poker. Ukufakelwa kusukela ku-E50 kuya ku-E1 000 kanye nokusukela ku-E200 kuya ku-E2 000 kanye nokusukeka ku-E400 kuya kuE4 000. I-American Roulette iyamangalisa, ingumdlalo ogcwele injabulo wasekhasino onokukhuzikhethela okubanzi kokubheja kanti udlalwa ngezingcezu eziyizipesheli ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. Inhloso yeBlackjack ukudonsa isandla samakhadi angangenani eliseduze kuka 21 ngaphezu kwawomphathi, ngaphandle kokuqhuma (okungukudonsa angaphezu kuka 21). Isandla esiphethe amakhadi amabili u-Ace kanye nanoma imuphi u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing sibizwa ngeBlackjack bese sikhokha u-3:2. Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi kudlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo okhona emakhasino ethu, singakujabulela ukukufundisa. Sicela uthintane nomphathi wekhasino ngolwazo oluthe xaxa.



Imidlalo yamatafula


Izikhathi zokusebenza
Ingxenye yamatafula asekhasino ivulwa izinsuku ezingu 7 ngesonto. Kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesiHlanu kusukela ngo-19:00, ngeMigqibelo kusukela ngo-16:00 bese ngamaSonto kusukela ngo-13:00.

Ingxenye yemishini ivulwa noMsombuluo kuya kuLwesine kusukela ngo-09:00 kuze kuvalwe, kanti ngezimpelasonto ivulwa amahora angu 24. SinaneBingo ngamaSonto ngo-17:30 kanti ngeMisombuluko kuya koLwezine ngo-21:00.

Imishini
Ikhasino eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley inemishini engu 164.

Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zemiklomelo emikhulu eqhubekayo: I-Iron Horse (edlalwa ngezinhlamvu ze-E5), iPenny Farthing (edlalwa ngezinhlamvu ze-E10), iJoker Wild Poker (edlalwa ngezinhlamvu ze-E1) kanye neminye. IDouble Whammy, iMillinnium Mania, iDream Machine kanye nePoker Magic yemiklomelo emikhulu leyo. Ngezinhlamvu nje ezinhlanu zo-50c ungaba kumnikazi wesigidi ngokushesha ngokuwina iMilleniuam Mania Jackpot (umklomelo oqhubekayo oxhumene namanye amakhasino ase-Sun International). Ngezinhlamvu ezinhlanu ze-E1 ungathola izinsimbi zikhala kuwo wonke amakhasino ase-Sun International ngokuwina iPoker magic (umklomelo oqhubekayo ohlanganisa namanye amakhasino aseSun International) onikeza umklomelo omncane ka-E100 000!

Okudlulile


ISun International Umhlaba ovusa amadlingozi ngokuphindwe kankulungwane

ISun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni nangaphandle, ngamaqembu eSun International agqame kwangu 20 emahoteleni aphezulu umhlaba wonke jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamakhono, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlangano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi ,noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyathembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!


Ezokukweleta
Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa ngamanani anqunyiwe esikhathini esingangezinsuku ezingu 14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangempela. Amakhadi e-American Express, aweDiners, kanye naweGold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku R2 000. I-Ameriacan Express isivumela ukuthi samukela amakhadi aqala ngenombolo ethi 3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe uR500. Ukukweleta, sicela uthintane nomshayi sisefo osedesikini ngolwazi oluthe xaxa. Amasheke, amasheke abantu nje awavunyelwe ngaphandle kokuvunyelwa yibhange uma kwenzeka angavunyelwa futhi nawo uma ehambisana nomazisi wangempela kanye nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta. Qaphela ukuthi amabhange evumela inani elithile lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha usuku ngalunye. Uyacelwa ukuthinta umshayi sisefo ngemininingwane ethinetne nohlobo lwesheke ofuna ukulisebenzisa.

Imishini yokukhipha imali, Kukhona umshini wokukhipha imali ozisebenza wona otholakala ezinkundleni zemishini, ohlumene nama-account aseNingizimu Afrika. IStandard Bank nalo litholakala ngaphakathi ehotela, lisebenza ngeMisombuluko, ngoLwezithathu, kanye nangoLwezihlanu kusukela ngo-10:00 kuya ku-12:00. Amasheke ezihambi, wonke amasheke ezihambi ayamukelwa. Imali yakwamanye amazwe, yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe iyamukelwa ukuthola izingcezu edesikini lasekhasino. Ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthi ibe ngamaRandi aseNingizimu Afrika, sicela uthintane nebhange elisehotela noma edesikini lomgcini sivalo. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe kanye nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka kukho konke ukushintshwa kwemali yakwamanye amazwe.




Umgodi wesishiyagalolunye
IPar 4, Stroke 18, 340m lomgodi ujikisa ikhanda libheke phansi ngasohlangothini lwegalofu lweroyal Swazi Sun, kanti ufuna ukushaya okucacile ukugcina ibhola lisesandleni sokudla ecaleni lamadamu amathathu abheke umgwaqo ovulekile nokuluhlaza.

Emva kokushaya okufishane okudlula lamadamu amabili, ibhola lifikela kokuluhlaza okungangama-square metre angu 700, okukhulu kunakho konke ekhozini. Okukubeka, noma kunjalo, engozini enkulu, ngokungathuka sekukubeke edamini lesithathu elinomchachazo walo ohehayo omcane, esikhundleni sokukubeka lapho kufanele khona.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo



Umgodi wokuqala
IPar 4, Stroke 16,356m ukuhamba ngakwesokunxele komgwaqo ovulekile kuvula ukushaya kwesibili okukubeka kokuluhlaza okunezindunduma ezisicaba. Okunye ongakwenza ukushayela kokuqala kokuluhlaza, okufanele kudlule izihlahlana ezimbalwa bese kweqa indawo engangamamitha angu 300.

Ukushaya udlule okuluhlaza, okuzungezwe izihlahla ezintathu ezithandekayo zemopane, kukubizela ekushayeni emumva egqunyaneni eliphakeme.
Umgodi olandelayo



Umgodi weshumi
IPar 4, Stroke 5,287 ukuma egqunyaneni lokushayela  ibhola kukunika ukubukeka okusabisayo phesheya komhosha omncane obheke kokuluhlaza okuzungezwe izihlahla ze-aloe ngemumva, okuphinde futhi kwavikelwa udonga oluncane ngaphambili olucinaniswe okumilile okwenza kungaqhubekeki.

Ukushaya okufishane kwepar 4, okukunikeza ukungaphambuki ekushayeni egqumeni lokushayela. Ukushaya kwesibili okuya kokuluhlaza kubukhuni ngokulingana ukuthi ungakujaja, kodwa abadlali abacacisayo bayathola umvuzo ngokushaya kwabo.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumi nanye
IPar 4, Stroke 9, 408m umgodi weshumi nanye noweshumi nane yenza lisebenziseke kalula icala lentaba ngokugijimela ukushaya ongakwenza uhamba ngonqenqemba lwemigwaqo evulekile elukeke. Umgodi weshumi nanye uyi-stroke I ekhozini, ofingqwe izintaba zeThrombosis ukungakwazi, futhi waziwa ngabadlali bonke ukuthi ungobukhuni kunayo yonke.

Ukushayela egqumeni kokuqala kuyayicacisa inkinga. Uma ukwenze kwaba ngakwesokudla, kuzohlala endaweni ehhahlazekile. Uma ukwenze kwahamba kwaqonda kuzohlala elukekeni lomgwaqo ovulekile kwesokudla kuya kwesokunxele, egcwele amaqoqwana ezihlahla ezihehhayo ze-aloe.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo



Umgodi weshumi nambili 
IPar 5, Stroke 17,466m, Yilapho lapho isithunzi somgodi odlule singasulwa khona ngokushaya umshudo wakamumva wokushayela ipar 5 eshona phansi nentaba. Okuluhlaza akubonakali uma ubuka egqumeni lokushayela, kodwa ukushaya okuqondile kushiya umdlali galofu ngokushaya okufishane kokuluhlaza okunezindunduma ezikahle ukusuka emumva kua phambili.

Lapho ekushoneni kwendunduma ngakwesokudla, lapho izintatshana ezine zemigwaqo evulekile zingahleleka khona ngasecaleni ukulungiselela ukukwehlikela phansi, kanti inezihlahla ezicinene ngemumva kawayo. Kanti ngakwesokudla kukhona enye indunduma, ebukeka njengesincane isigaxa sensimbi esidilika phezulu. Ukushaya okucacile, noma kunjalo, kukubeka kalula engozini.
Umgodi odlule 		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumi nantathu
IPar 4, Stroke I,358m, lomgodi njalo uphinde ujike ube ukuhlaba ikhefu emzuliswaneni. Yipar 4 yokukhuphuka intaba edinga umshudo wokushaya omuhle, oqondile wesibili ongokuphakathi nendawo ukushayela okuluhlaza. Ngasemumva kwayo uzungezwe amaqabunga amade ezihlahla esifana nobhanana bese kuthi ngaphambili igadwe izindunduma ezimbalwa. Lokhu kukonke kwehlisa ukulinga kokushaya bese kukwenza kubaluleke ukushaya kwesibili.

Izindunduma ezincane nazo zinzima ngoba umdlali kufanele ame ehlosheni, eliphakame kunalapho kumi khona ibhola.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumi nane
IPar 3, Stroke 15, 157m, lomgodi ohehayo ongukushaya kwepar 3 kusukela kweliphakeme igqunyana lokushayela kuya kokuseduze okugadile okuluhlaza, kodwa sewudale inani elimangalisayo lomgodi kokukodwa. Okuluhlaza kuvikelwe ngakwesokunxele indunduma, ngakwesokudla ihlathi elicinene kanti ngaphambili idamu elinomchachazo, elijwayelwe izinyoni eziningana.


Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumi nesihlanu
IPar 4, Stroke 7,375m, yipar 4 lapho ukushaya kokuqala kufanele kuthole umgwaqo ovulekile ukuze ukwazi ukuhlela ukushaya kwesibili okuqondile. Lokhu kungokokuvikela izindunduma ezibekwe kahle ezimbili eziqhamuka ngakwesokunxele nakwesokudla ezihlelwe kahle, okuluhlaza okuzigaba ezimbili, okunokuzikhethela ukuthi ufuna ukulibeka kuphi. Ukubonakala okuthandekayo okuphakathi kwezintaba eziphakeme kungasiza  ukuthambisa ukushwiliza kwesithinza kulendawo.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumni nesithupha
IPar 4, Stroke 3,385m, ukwenza ipar 4 kulomgodi omude kungukuhlabana. Umgwaqo ovulekile ocijile uhambisana nezihlahla zendabuko ezinhle. Ukushaya kwesibili akumele kube yilutho okungaphansi kokushuda kasithupha ukuya kokuluhlaza okuphindwe kabili okuvinjwe kamnandi izindunduma ezinkulu, ngakwesokunxele nakwesokudla.

Ngasemumva kokuluhlaza kukhona umgwaqo lapho imisebenzi yezandla yamaSwazi idayiswa khona esitebeleni esifulelwe ngotshani, kanti ukushaya okunentshisekelo kungcinisa umdlali ezitholela phakathi kobhasikidi abalukiwe ngesikhathi ezama ukuthola ibhola. Noma kunjalo, ukuthola indawo engcono kokuluhlaza ngokushayo kwesibili kuhlale kuletha ipar evele idengeka.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo.




Umgodi weshumi nesikhombisa
IPar 5, Stroke 13,519m, amagqunyana okushayela ibhola akulomgodi enza ukuzikhethela okuningana. Ukudlalela okungaphambili, ukushuda okude kudala ithuba lokuya kokuluhlaza kabili ngokushaya kwesibili kwamamitha angu 200, lapho usuke uzihlelela okunye okungenzeka. Okunye ongakwenza ukushayela kokuluhlaza okugadwe ichibi elincane elinomchachazo lokhu okungaqinisekisa okungenani ibhadi.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili
IPar 3, Stroke 11,153m, lena yipar enhle yokuqeda ngayo ngoba ineqguma lokushayela ibhola nokuluhlaza ... okukushaya kungekho lutho oludlalekayo phakathi nendawo. Okungakukhipha izindunduma eziyisithupha ezizungeze okuluhlaza.

Ukushaya okuqondile kuzokuphumelelisa kwipar enkulu noma okungenani ebhadini, kodwa umdlali kuyathandeka ukuthi adinge elinye ikilabhu okufana nokwesihlanu esikhundleni sokwesithupha. Uma okuluhlaza nezindunduma kugejekile kwesokudla, ukushaya kwesibili kumele kwenziwe kokuluhlaza okuphakeme okulele cishe amamitha angu 40 ngaphezu kwalapho kumi khona umdlali.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesibili
IPar 4, Stroke 6, 392m, lepar 4 ingedinga umfutho ukwehla intaba. Ukushayela ngakwesokunxele komgwaqo ovulekile wendunduma kuzokuhlelela ukushaya kwamamitha angu 160 kokuluhlaza okugadwe kuwo wonke amacala isihlabathi nezindunduma zotshani. Ukunakekela kumele kube khona ukuvikela ukushaya okunesigqi njengoba lokhu kungakuholela ekudlaleni umshudo wesithathu unyuka intaba, kokuluhlaza okulukeke.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesithathu
IPar 3, Stroke 8, 181m, lomgodi wepar 3 ungamamitha angu 181 ukusuka egqumeni lokushaya kuya phakathi nendawo kokuluhlaza. Okuluhlaza okwakhiwe emaleveleni amabili kukhulu kanti futhi kunezithiyo amacala womabili. Umshudo ocacile egqumeni kubalulekila ukuthola amaphuzu amahle.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesine
IPar 4, Stroke 2, 364m, lona mhlawumbe ngumgodi odinga umfutho kakhudlwana kokungaphambili kuka 9. Unezindunduma kodwa ungukunyuka intaba okude kwepar okunomgwaqo ocijile okudinga ukushaya okuhle okuqondile. Ukushaya okucacile okuya kokuluhlaza okundlalekile kubalulekile ukuthola amaphuzu epar noma angcono.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesihlanu
IPar 5, Stroke 12, 500m, lona kumgodi wokuqala wepar5 kwemihlanu. Ukushaya okuqondile ngakwesokunxele somgwaqo ovulekile kuzodala amathuba okuya kokuluhlaza. Izihlahlana ezingasemgceleni wesokudla uphelisa umgwaqo, kanjalo labo abashaya ngamandla bazama inhlanhla kumele bafike ekupheleni kanye. Abashaya kafushane bahlose ukuthola indawo enhle ngaphambi kokufika kokuluhlaza, okuvumela ukushaya okulula emva kwalokho kanti nebhadi elingenzeka.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesithupha
IPar 5, Stroke 12, 500m, lepar 3 ingenye yanzima ekhozini kunawo wonke, kanti futhi ayixoleli kwangampela nganoma ikuphi ukushaya. Ukushaya egqumeni kumele kudlalwe kuqonde ngoba ngakwesokudla  imikhawulo kanti enye into ngakwesokunxele, okugcwele khona izihlahla ezinkuluze-acacia ezinamagatsha evulekile ngokumangalisayo, kwenza ibhola lilahleke.

Izindunduma ezimbili ngakwesokunxele nakwesokudla zibamba ukushaya okusala kuphela ngaphandle kwendlela, ngesikhathi ngale kokuluhlaza kukhona ukungadlaleki kwangempela. Kodwa eqgumeni okuhle kungakutholela amaphuzu.

Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesikhombisa
IPar 3, Stroke 14, 163m, lepar enyukisa intaba ijabulela ukubukeka kanye kanye okuvulekile okunokulandelana kwezintaba ngasemaphethelweni. Kudinga ukushaya okuhle ngakwesokunxele komgwaqo ovulekile kanye nokunye okulinganayo kwesibili ukuvimba ukuzama okude kwesokudla lapho ulayini wama-gums aluhlaza sasibhabhaka eqeda khona ukuphela.

Okuluhlaza okundlalekile okungumakhelwane, okugadwe amaqabunga ebhanana, kugadwe futhi izindunduma, eyodwa yazo ngakwesokudla, evulela umgwaqo ovulekile bese uzungeza okuluhlaza ngamamitha angu 94. Ngasekundleni enkulukazi, amamitha angu 37 ngaphesheya.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi wesishiyagalolumbili
Ipar 5, Stroke 10, 454m, lepar 4 emfishane idinga ukushaya okuqondile okukuyisa emgwaqeni ovulekile kwesokudla nakwesokunxele. Lokhu kuholela ekushayeni okuphakathi nendawo, okumele kushayelwe kokuluhlaza okunezindunduma okuvuleke ngamamitha angu 35 kusuka phambili kuya emumva.

Uma usukokuluhlaza, okundlalekile, ukubeka akuyona inkinga, kodwa umuthi okhulayo ngasemumva kokuluhlaza ukhombisa ukuphakama kwendawo ukuya, ngaleyondlela ukushaya okungaphezulu kungaba inkinga futhi.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo




IStokesaver, iCourse Graphics
Umbuso wezintaba waseSwaziland unikeza abavakashi bayo izinhlobonhlobo zokuhehayo kanye nokwenziwayo - kusukela kwebukekayo imifanekiso, kuya ebucikweni obudlidlizelayo kanye nemboni yemisebenzi yezandla, kuya kokukhulu ukuzitholela ulwazi ngezemvelo, okufana nokuhlenga emanzini amhlophe, ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo kanye nokushayela ubuka indawo yasendle.

Sizothanda ukukwamukela ezweni lethu eluluhlaza nelinentokozo, bese sabelana nawe enye yezimfihlo ezimangalisayo zase-Afrika ezigciniwe! IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley ikukhombisa amahotela amathathu ahlukene, lilinye lihlaba umxhwele ngokwalo. Ukubukeka kweNhlangano Sun engasengxenyeni eseningizimu yezwe endaweni enhle ngokumanagalisayo ukuziphumulela kanye nokushaywa ngumoya. Bahambi bamaholide, izithunywa zemihlangano emikhulu, kanye nabavakashi bomhlaba nabafana nabo bakhetha ukubuyela futhi kwesinye isikhathi kulobubumnandi bokuphathwa kahle okukunikeza izinhlonhlobo zemidlalo ehamba phambili, ezokuzithokozisa kanye nezinto nje zokuziphumulela.Zonke izivakashi zase-Ezulwini Sun naseLugogo Sun ziyamenywa sekubeni amalungu okufakela kweseduze iRoyal Swazi Golf Club.

Ukubuka ompetha bezabalaza izingqinamba eziningi zalemigodi engu 18 kungubuka umdlalo omuhle kanti labo abazihambelayo nje ekhozini bangazijabulisa ngokubuka lokhu kubonakala kanye kanye kwezintaba nemihosha. Kubadlali ukudlala igalofu kumnandi kakhulu konomdlalo owehlukile, iRoyal Swazi Sun inikeza okujabulisayo okulinganayo kodwa ukucelwa inselelo kuzothile kokwaziwa kakhulu njengenye yamakhozi acolisekile emhlabeni. Lamakhasi alandelayo akunikeza imininingwane yokuchazwa ngomgodi ngamunye oseRoyal Swazi Sun ekhozini yegalofu. Siyathemba uyakujabulela ukudlala lemigodi. Okunye okumnandi kulendawo kuzokunika ulwazi lwangaphakathi kwabavakashi ababhalisa njengabadlali begalofu laseSun International.

Indawo yokulala
Wonke amagumbi amakhulu angu 199 kanye namakhulukazi angu 3 akunikeza ubukhazikhazi ongabukhona, kanti anemibhede yamadabuli emibili, kanye nendlu yokugeza engaphakathi enesisefo, ucingo ongashayela ngaphandle ngayo, umabonakude wemibala, umsakazo, ipulagi yereyiza kagesi (110/220V), isomiso zinwele, kanye nezinto zokwenza itiye nekhofi. Ukudlela ngaphakathi egunjini akutholakali, noma kunjalo, siyakwazi ukugcina izicelo ezithile. Ihotela iLugogo Sun inenani elikhulu lamagumbi asehotela endaweni yoMbuso. Inani lamagumbi esewonke angu: 202 ahamba ngamabili ajwayelekile angu: 199 amancane angu:3




Okuhehayo kwendawo
Kuhlale kukhona inhlokomo esheshayo ekhasini kanye nokugubha okukhalayo kwemishini yemiklomelo emikhulu ehotela eRoyal Swazi Sun.

Kukhona izindawo eziningi ezikhumbulekayo ngemizuzu nje zeRoyal Swazi Sun ukuphinda uzivakashele kanye nezitolo ezimangalisayo zemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla ukuzibukela nje. Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezilwane eziningi, izinyoni, izihlahla nezimbali ezingabukwa kumapaki ahlukene emvelo kanye nasendaweni lapho kugcinwe khona ezemvelo. Imakethe iMbabane, imakethe iMbabane yakha isizinda sobubenyebenye bemibala yedolobha elikhulu, kanti futhi kuyimpoqo kuwona wonke umuntu kusukela kubathwebuli bezithombe kuya kulabo abafuna ukuzizwela ukunambitheka (okungezindlela eziningi kuneyodwa) zempilo yangempela yaseSwazi. Ubuhlalu baseSwazi, izingubo zendabuko kanye zezinhlobonhlobo zemikhonzo kungathengwa. Imakethe yase-Ezulwini yokwenziwe ngezandla, inezinto eziningi zemikhonzo ongazikhethela kuzona. IMantenga  Cultural Village, iMantenga Cultural Village iqukethe inxuluma elinezindlu zasekhaya ezingu 16 kanye nemihlobiso yezandla yendabuko ebukwayo, ikhombisa ubuso obuningi obuveza impilo yamaSwazi yakudala, yombili yokuhlala komphakathi, ezomnotho kanye nezenkolo. Isizinda semisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla saseMantenga sinezitolo ezingu 11 ezidayisa okuhlukene kwezandla, ama-Workshop kanye namaDemo's, kanye nehhovisi lukuthola ulwazi lwezivakashi. Indawo ekugcinwa khona izilwane ezomisiwe yesizwe yaseSwaziland, itholakala eduze kwezindlu zasePhalamende, iNational Museuma iqukethe isidlidli kanye nokukunika ulwazi oluningi lohla lwezinto ezibukwayo ezikukhombisa imvelaphi yamaSwazi, ezendabuko, izingubo kanye nempilo jikelele. Izithombe ezindlala zikhombisa imilando yamaSwazi kanye nokuthelelwa okwangaphandle okukhanda ingxenye yamasiko amaSwazi kuzokuvezela ngokucacile abavakashi ngezemilando yombuso wamaSwazi. IMlilwane Game Reserve, akukho ukuvakasha kwase-Ezulwini Valley okugcwele ngaphandle kokungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary. Jabulela ubuhle bezinto ezibonwayo ezigciniwe lapho uzobona indlulamithi, izebra, inkonkoni, impala, inyala kanye nephilayo indlovudawana. Ifemu yamakhandlela yaseSwazi ayifani nalutho lwase-Afrika, amakhandlela enziwe ngezandla, enziwa ngamakhosikazi namadoda endawo enza imisebenzi yezandla. Isivakashi singabuka ukwakhiwa kwawo konke kusukela ekuthanjisweni okungajahile kwemovu emibili, kuya ekwakhiweni kokugcina komhlobiso. Izindlu zasePhalamende, izindlu zasePhalamende ziyavulelwa abavakashi abangangena ngamunye ekamelweni elilodwa ephelekezelwa ogadile osebenzayo bese futhi ehlanganyela ekulaleni ukuphikisana ePhalamende.



Ukudla kwaseLugogo Sun
ILanga Restaurant, ukudla okumnandi ngokumangalisayo kwasekuseni kanye netafula lokudla kwakusihlwa kusevwa nsukuzonke, kanye nesigqi sansuku zonke sakusihlwa esikunika okuhehayo okudumile. Itafula lokudla kwasemini okumangalisayo kusevwa ngamaSonto kanye nenjabulo ebukwayo eyenzeka khona bukhoma. ISportman's Bar, umoya ofudumele muhle ngokumangalisayo ukulindele eSportman's Bar, etholakala enkundleni engasekungeneni kwehotela iLugogo Sun. Lendawo yotshwala enesigqi sezemidlalo iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela imidlalo emikhulu idlalwa kumabonakude obekwe kahle ukuthi wonke umuntu abuke futhi ajabule. Ukudla lwasemini okululana nje kusevwa kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuMgqibelo.



Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye zezemidlalo ezibanjwelwa khona.

Izingane ezineminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngakho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishinini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.




IValley yaseSwaziland enhle kunazo zonke ngokubukeka kwayo iphethe futhi enye imfihlo, ihotela iLugogo Sun.

Ingxenye esazulu yendawo yokuvakasha iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley itholakala e-Ezulwini Valley kanti kuyimizuzu embalwa ushayela usuka kweyobukhazikhazi iRoyal Swazi Sun. Ihotela libhekene nendawo ebukeka kahle ngokumangalisayo yezingadi zetropicana kanye nekhozi yagalofu. ILugogo Sun ingenkulu kunawo wonke amahotela endawo yokuvakasha kanti futhi yakhiwe ukuthwala amaqembu amakhulu abantu.



Indlu yokudlala yasekamp Kwena itholakala eRoyal Swazi Sun kanti futhi inikeza imidlalo yosuku lonke, okubalwa kuyo imidlalo ethile, ukugibela amahhashi kanye kanye neminye imidlalo ongazikhombisa kuyo ukuhlakanipha yabavakashi banoma yiliphi ihotela abaneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12.

IFactory yeCarnival itholakala endaweni yokungena enkulu yasekhasino, iCarnival Factory ikhombisa uhlelo olumangalisayo lwevideo entsha kanye nemidlalo yezingane zindawonye.



Imidlalo yangaphandle
Uma usukhathele amathuba onke asendaweni yokuvakasha, ungathanda ukuzama ngaphandle usuku olulandelayo kanye nokuzikhethela kukahhafu wosuku.

IMdzimba Trail, uhambo lukahhafu wosuku lukuzitholela ulwazi lwangaphandle - uvakashele amakhaya aseSwazini, izindawo zemilando, isangoma sendawo, izimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla bese ujabulela amakhilomitha amabili uhamba phezu kwemangalisayo intaba ubuka. ILobamba Trail igxile emlandweni wesizwe nowezwe, uhambo olunguhhafu wosuku lukaLobamba luhlanganisa ukuya eNational Museum, iKing Sobhuza Memorial Park, iLobamba Royal Village, iSwazi Village yezamasiko, kanye neMatenga Falls nezimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla. Ubumnandi beSwaziland, uhambo olumangalisayo lweqembu lakusihlwa olugxile esitayeleni sempilo nezamasiko. Okubalwa ukungena eRoyal uMphakatsi (ikhaya lenkosi yamaSwazi) okulandelwa ukungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary ukulungiselela nokunambitha ukudla kwendabuko, kanye nomdanso wamandla weSibhaca.

ISwazi Arts neCrafs, chitha uhhafu wosuku uvakashela izindawo ezimangalisayo zezimakethe zokwakhiwa ngobuciko nemisebenzi yezandla e-Ezulwini, eMantenga, eMlilwane, naseMakerns, kubandakanya nengafaniswa nalutho olunye ifemu yamakhandlela. Enye futhi indlela engathathwa edlula e-Ezulwini Valley iya phezulu eMbabane, eMotshana kanye nedumile ifemu yengilazi iNgwenya, ukubona abakhi bengilazi bamaSwazi besemsebenzini. IWildlife Trails, iMlilwane Hogs kanye neHippo Trails, uhhafu wosuku ubuka okumangalisayo, ubuka ihhipo kanye nezinyoni eziningi kanye nokubuka nje okwasendle okuningi. Okubaliwe isitobhi sesizinda semisebenzi yezandla kanye nendawo lapho kuphunyulwa khona okutholwa kuyo okokuqabula umzimba. IHlane Big Cats, usuku lonke uluchitha ulandela amabhubesi, ingulube yehlathi, kanye nengwe eHlane Royal national Park, okunokuzikhethela ukuhamba ngezinyawo okugadiwe. Ukudla kwasemini nokokuqabula umzimba kubaliwe.

IMkhaya Endagered Species, chitha usuku lonke ubukela ngokuvulekile konke okukhona usemotweni ubukela inyathi , indlulamithi, ubhejane omnyama, indlovu, utsessebe, kanye nokunye okuningi. Jabulela isitobhi sokuziqabula somgodi wamanzi kanye nokudla kwasemini okulula kwenhle ikambo esehlathini. Izinto ezibukwayo ezingaphandle, iwhite Water Rafting, umfula omkhulu Usuthu River, okunikeza ulwazi ongasophinde ulukhohlwe uma ufuna ukuzitholela ubuhle. Usuku olugcwele noma olunguhhafu, yonke impahla ibaliwe, kanye nokugadwa, ezokuthutha nokudla kwasemini. Ukubekisa indawo yesikhathi samanzi aphansi kubalwa kuko ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo ukuhlamba emanzini ngesikebhe. Okunye okuhle kungahlelwa njengokukhwela intaba ngamabhayisikili akhona, iparagliding kanye nokuhamba nge 4 x 4.




Ezemidlalo  nezokuzithokozisa
Izivakashi zinezinto  zayo yonke iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley Resort kusukela ekuzikhetheleni nangesikhathi sekuza kwezokudlala ngaphandle. Ungabhukuda, udlale igalofu, ibhola lomphebezo kanye nelidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, zitholele izindlela zemvelo, uhla lungolungapheli ...

IRoyal Swazi Country Club, ikhozi ebukekayo yemiqhudelwano emikhulu yemigodi engu 18 eseSwazi Royal Sun Country Club ingenye okunokuthola kuyo umvuzo ongatholwa noma kuphi emhlabnei, ngezindawo zayo ezinezintaba ezingajatshulelwa kuzona zonke izindunduma nkuluhlaza. Ipar 72 yekhozi eshanelayo eyavulwa ngo 1966 ilele phansi emimangweni yezintaba zeLubombo, ngezindawo zayo ezilinganayo ezingaqhathaniswa ezingu 9 zokuqala kanye nezisemumva ezingu 9 ezinenezela ngokugcwele ukubukeka nokundlaleka kwentaba. Okuluhlaza kanye nimigwaqo emikhulu evulekile kusezindaweni eziphezulu ekugcineni futhi zimema izindawo ezifana namachibi, izindonga ezicinaniswe okumilile, ngaphandle kwezindawo eziyizimbondela ezigijima eduze kwemigwaqo evulekile, kubonakal izindunduma ( enye yazo ebheke phezulu kakhulu eyenza ukuthi izitebhizi zikalayini kaloliwe zakhiwe ukuze zikwazi ukukhanda indlela), kuvunguza umoya nokunyakaza kwezihlahla okuhle ngokumangalisayo kanye nezitshalo zemvelo zendawo. Sekukonke, kungukuzitholela umvuzo wokuba kulendawo ngokuphelele kubo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane bawo wonke amazinga.

Ukubeka okuluhlaza, kukhona indawo yokuluhlaza eseduze neClub House, eyenzelwe abadlali. Indlu yesinukha, kukhona itafula eligcwele ngokuphelele lokudlala isinukha eliseCountry Club. AmaDarts, Kukhona amabhodi amabili abekiwe ukuhlukanisa amadoda ebafaneni! Umdlalo wokugibela amahhashi, izitebele zase-Ezulwini zitholakala ngaphansi kwe-Ezulwini Sun. Abafundisi abakufundele ukugibela amahhashi kanye nokunakekelwa kokugibela kuyatholakala zonke izinsuku. Amagceke okugingqa ibhola, kukhona amagceke okudlala ibhola eligingqwayo aluhlaza amabili nawo atholakala ngaphansi kwendawo evulekile yaseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nenobuntofontofo ukungenisa abadlali abangu 7 iyinye. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagceke aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakal Ezulwini Sun.

Amachibi okubhukuda neJacuzzi, ihotela ngalinye linechibi lalo lokubhukuda elizezambulela zalo kanye nezindawo zokuphumula. Okudayisa endaweni ethengisa ngotshwala kanye nohla lokudla okulula nakho kuyatholakala. Womabili I-Ezulwini Sun kanye neLogogo Sun zinamachibi okubhukuda ezingane. Bese kuba khona ijacuzzi enkulu engaphandle ehlanganisa ichibi lokubhukuda neRoyal Swazi Sun. IVolleyball, izinkundla zokudlala iValleyball zingatholakala uma ziceliwe kumahotela iRoyal Swazi Sun, iLugogo Sun nase-Ezulwini Sun.




Imidlalo yangaphandle


Izitolo
I-African Queen, izinhlobonhlobo zezingubo eziningi kanye nemvunula yamaSwazi yesikhumbuzo. IKatinka Boutique edayisa ngemfashini yezingubo zabesifazane zekhethelo zodwa. Isitolo seGolf Pro, kukhona izinto eziningi zekhethelo zokudlala igalofu. IPapaya, izimpahla zidayiswa kusukela kwezelogo kuya kwezibalulekile, amabhuku, kanye nezinto zokugeza nokugcoba. Indawo yokungena ezitolo eziseRoyal Swazi nayo iyatholakala.




Izitolo
I-African Queen, izinhlobonhlobo zezingubo eziningi kanye nemvunula yamaSwazi yesikhumbuzo. IKatinka Boutique edayisa ngemfashini yezingubo zabesifazane zekhethelo zodwa. Isitolo seGolf Pro, kukhona izinto eziningi zekhethelo zokudlala igalofu. IPapaya, izimpahla sidayiswa kusukela kwezelogo kuya kwezibalulekile, amabhuku, kanye nezinto zokugeza nokugcoba. Amaphephandaba endawo eBenson kanye nawaseNingizimu Afrika, amaswidi, isikibha, isikibha ezinemiqala kanye namakhadi emikhonzo okunye kwezinto ezimbalwa ezidayisa eBenson's.




Okuhehayo kwendawo
Kuhlale kukhona inhlokomo esheshayo ekhasini kanye nokugubha okukhalayo kwemishini yemiklomelo emikhulu ehotela eRoyal Swazi Sun.

Kukhona izindawo eziningi ezikhumbulekayo ngemizuzu nje zeRoyal Swazi Sun ukuphinda uzivakashele kanye nezitolo ezimangalisayo zemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla ukuzibukela nje. Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezilwane eziningi, izinyoni, izihlahla nezimbali ezingabukwa kumapaki ahlukene emvelo kanye nasendaweni lapho kugcinwe khona ezemvelo. Imakethe iMbabane, imakethe iMbabane yakha isizinda sobubenyebenye bemibala yedolobha elikhulu, kanti futhi kuyimpoqo kuwona wonke umuntu kusukela kubathwebuli bezithombe kuya kulabo abafuna ukuzizwela ukunambitheka (okungezindlela eziningi kuneyodwa) zempilo yangempela yaseSwazi. Ubuhlalu baseSwazini, izingubo zendabuko kanye zezinhlonhlobo zemikhonzo kungathengwa. Imakethe yase-Ezulwini yokwenziwe ngezandla, inezinti eziningi zemikhonzo ongazikhethela kuzona. IMantenga  Cultural Village, iMantenga Cultural Village iqukethe inxuluma elinezindlu zasekhaya ezingu 16 kanye nemihlobiso yezandla yendabuko ebukwayo, ikhombisa ubuso obuningi obuveza impilo yamaSwazi yakudala, yombili yokuhlala komphakathi, ezomnotho kanye nezenkolo. Isizinda semisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla saseMantenga sinezitolo ezingu 11 ezidayisa okuhlukene kwezandla, ama-Workshop kanye namaDemo's, kanye nehhovisi lukuthola ulwazi lwezivakashi. Indawo ekugcinwa khona izilwane ezomisiwe yesizwe yaseSwaziland, itholakala eduze kwezindlu zasePhalamende, iNational Museuma iqukethe isidlidli kanye nokukunika ulwazo oluningi lohla lwezinto ezibukwayo ezikukhombisa imvelaphi yamaSwazi, ezendabuko, izingubo kanye nempilo jikelele. Izithombe ezindlala zikhombisa imilando yamaSwazi kanye nokuthelelwa okwangaphandle okukhanda ingxenye yamasiko amaSwazi kuzokuvezela ngokucacile abavakashi ngezemilando yombuso wamaSwazi. IMlilwane Game Reserve, akukho ukuvakasha kwase-Ezulwini Valley okugcwele ngaphandle kokungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary. Jabulela ubuhle bezinto ezibonwayo ezingciniwe lapho uzobona indlulamithi, izebra, inkonkoni, impala, inyala kanye nephilayo indlovudawana. Ifemu yamakhandlela yaseSwazi ayifani nalutho lwase-Afrika, amakhandlela enziwe ngezandla, enziwa ngamakhosikazi namadoda endawo enza imisebenzi yezandla. Isivakashi singabuka ukwakhiwa kwawo konke kusukela ekuthanjisweni okungajahile kwemovu emibili, kuya ekwakhiweni kokugcina komhlobiso. Izindlu zasePahalmende, izindlu zasePhalamende ziyavulelwa abavakashi abangangena ngamunye ekamelweni elilodwa ephelekezelwa ogadile osebenzayo bese futhi ehlanganyela ekulalaleni ukuphikisana ePhalamende.



Ukudla kwasehotela iRoyal Swazi Sun 
Indawo ethengisa ngokudla endlaleke kahle odongeni ebhekene nechibi lokubhukuda leRoyal Swazi Sun, likunika ukudla kwasekuseni, okwasemini kanye nokwakusihlwa okutholakala zonke izinsuku, okugcizelela ezindishini ezilungiswe ngokumsulwa oku-odwe etafuleni.

IPlanters Restaurant, lendawo ethengisa ngokudla kwe a la carte emangalisayo igxile kakhulukazi kokosiwe okusajusi, okhari abanamakha amnandi kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zezindishi zomdambi. Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala yasekhasino itholakala phakathi ekhasino, kukhona injabulo yasebusuku kulendawo ethengisa ngotshwala ehlala inokunama.

IPlanters Bar, umsebenzi uqhubeka kuze kube isikhathi sasebusuku kulendawo etholakala ngaphakathi endaweni ethengisa ngokudla yasePlanters. Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala esechibini, iqeda ukoma komphimbo etholakala eceleni kwechibi. ICountry Club Bar, ikubukeka okungcono kunakho konke kulendawo yokuvakasha kungajatshulelwa lapha eCountry Club Bar ebhekene nekhozi yemiqhudelwano emikhulu kanye ngale kwayo ezimangalisayo izintaba.




Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye nezemidlalo ezibanjelwa khona.

Izingane ezeneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngakho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.



IKhasi lasekhaya
IRoyal Swazi Sun, yaziwa kakhulu njengekhaya lombuso waseSwaziland, futhi seliwine ukwaziwa okuphindaphindiwe kwamazwe ngamazwe eminyakeni eminingi, kanti namhlanje ihlela isibonelo esicolekile sobukhazikhazi kanye nokunakekelwa okusezingeni eliphezulu okunconywa amakhosi kanye nabanye abafana nawo.

Ihotela ligubezelwe intaba yse-Ezulwini Valley, enemihosha yayo ecinaniswe amahlonzi ezihlahla kanye namadwala anokumpunga.  Kuhlale kukhona inhlokomo esheshayo ekhasini kanye nokugubha okukhalayo kwemishini yemiklomelo emikhulu ehotela eRoyal Swazi Sun.Kukhona izindawo eziningi ezikhumbulekayo ngemizuzu nje zeRoyal Swazi Sun ukuphinda uzivakashele kanye nezitolo ezimangalisayo zemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla ukuzibukela nje. Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezilwane eziningi, izinyoni, izihlahla nezimbali ezingabukwa kumapaki ahlukene emvelo kanye nasendaweni lapho kugcinwe khona ezemvelo.
Ulwazi lokuxhumana
	Okuhehayo kwasekhaya


Izitolo

IKamp Kwena
Indlu yokudlala yasekamp Kwena itholakala eRoyal Swazi Sun kanti futhi inikeza imidlalo yosuku lonke, okubalwa kuyo imidlalo ethile, ukugibela amahhashi kanye kanye neminye imidlalo ongazikhombisa kuyo ukuhlakanipha yabavakashi banoma yiliphi ihotela abaneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12.

Ivolley ball, izinkundla zokudlala iValleyball zingatholakala uma ziceliwe kumahotela iRoyal Swazi Sun, iLugogo Sun nase-Ezulwini Sun.

Indawo yokulala
IRoyal Swazi Sun, eyaqala ukwakhiwa ngo 1965, seyizuze indawo yayo ngokwangempela njengelinye lamahotela aphezulu obukhosi.

Ubuhle obumangalisayo bubonakala ngokushesha, njengoba ungena nje endaweni yokuvakasha bese ulandela izindlela ezinomoya ezikuyisa kwezimangalisayo izingadi uye kwi porte cochere, lapho ufike wamukelwe khona ngezandla ezifudumele ngumgcini sivalo obanakalo nogqamile. Isitayela seRoyal Swazi Sun singesihlukile kakhulu kanti okunye okusanda kwengezwa kweSpa sekuwine lonke uhla olusha lokukhuthala kwalendawo yokuvakasha engafaniswa nalutho olunye. Amagumbi ajwayelekile ahamba ngamabili angu 112, anobukhazikhazi angu 18, emindeni angu 14, anakho konke angu 5 iRoyal suite iyodwa, amagumbi asewonke angu 149 Zonke izindlu zinezindlu zokugezela ezakhelwe ngaphakathi ezinezisefo, isilungiso moya, izinto zokwenza itiye nekhofi, umabonakude onemibala, umsakazo, ucingo, isomiso zinwele kanye nepulaki yereyiza kagesi (100/220V). ukunakekelwa kwendlu kuyatholakala amahora angu 24 ngosuku.
Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala zeValley of Waves

ISun City inikeza izinto eziningi eziningi futhi ezingasetshenziselwa okuningi okuseNingizimu yezwe. Ngokuvaleka kwezithombe kwenza ukuthi kusheshe isikhathi sokuvuleka kwekhasi. Ungazivula izithombe noma uzivale noma ngasiphi isikhathi. Manje, uma ukuxhumeka kukalayini wakho wocingo kuhamba kancane, ungazivala izithombe uze uthole ikhasi olifunayo bese uzibuyisela izithombe emuva futhi ukubuka isithombe esiphelele sokufunayo.
