Imidlalo yangaphandle
Indlu yokufuyela izinyoni, Izindlu zokufuyela izinyoni ongahamba phakathi kwazo ezinezinyoni eziyizinhlobo ezingu 887 zaseNingizimu Afrika, itholakala ezingadini zaseCascades.

Izingadi zeBotanic, izinkulungwane zezivamile, ezomdabu kanye neziphuma kwamanye amazwe izihlahla kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zokutshaliweyo kugcwele eSun City okuqala izikhungo eziningi ezahlukene, okubalwa kuzo izidawo ezomile, amahlathi acinene, izindawo eziswakeme kanye nokutshaliweyo okusezweni. Izingadi zeBotanic eziseSun City zibandakanya izindlela ezinhanu ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo iBaobab Tour, iCascades Gaedens tour, iBeach Tour, iSpiderweb Trail kanye neLost City Croc Pit Tour. Zezizindela zilungele abancane nabadala.

Izingadi zaseKwena zepulazi lezingwenya, izingadi zaseKwena ziyikhaya lezingwenya ezingaphezu kuka 300 zeNile kanti zitholakala nje endaweni yokungena enkulu engena eSun City. IPilanesberg National Park, ngaseceleni leSun City kukhona iPilanesberg National Park, lapho izivakashi zingathola khona okokuvusa amadlingozi kweBig Five; ingwe, ibhubesi, indlovu, inyathi kanye nobhejane.

Ukuhamba ngamabhalune ngokushona kwelanga, ukuzula kwezikhathi zasemini kanye nezoso zakusihlwa noma amabraai ehlathini kukunikeza umlingo wakudala wase-Afrika yangempela. Abaqaphi bendawo bakunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zohambo olukhulu kanye nokubukwa kwePilanesberg National Park. Zikhethela ukuhamba emini noma ebusuku ugibele, ukulandela umkhondo, ukuhamba uvakashela ezamasiko noa uhambe ngebhaluni. Idesika labaqaphi bendawo litholakala ehotela eSun City ukubekisa kanye nolwazi.




Ezemidlalo kanye nezokuzithokozisa
Izivakashi zinezinto zonke zendawo yokuvakasha esun City lapho zingazikhethela khona uma sekuza ngakwezemidlalo zangaphandle. Kukhona emangalisayo iValley of Waves, enye yamapaki amanzi amangalisa umhlaba wonke lapho kukhona ukundiza emoyeni emanzini, ukudlala emanzini, ukushushuluza emanzini, kanye neminye imidlalo eminigi yamanzi, ungadlala ibhola lomphebezo kanye nebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, uzitholele ukuhamda ubuka imvelo, uhla olungapheliyo ...




IValley of Waves
	Ezemidlalo
Imidlalo yangaphandle

Izindlela ezinconyawo
Izindlela eziqhamuka ngaphandle, uma uhamba ngasenyakatho uhambela ngeseWilliam Nicole Drive uya ngasezindleleni ezine eziphambanayo eWitkoppen Road. Jikela ngakwesobunxele ungene eWitkoppen Road idlula iFourways Mall ngakwesokudla sakho. Uma ufika ezibanini zokuqala jikela ngakwesokudla ungene kwiCeder Avenue. Qhubekela emgwaqeni ongu-T ngangamakilomitha angu 8.5. iLion Bridge Supermakert ingakwesokudla. Jikela ngakwesukunxele bese uthatha omgwaqo ojikela ngakwesokudla sakho wokuqala. Qhubekela phambili emgwaqeni ongu-T ngangamakhilomitha amabili, udlula ngaphezulu umgwaqo omkhulu angu R28. Ipulazi lezinkukhu lingakwesokunxele. Jikela ngakwesokudla emgwaqeni ongu-T ungene ku R512. Qhubeka njalo uze ufike komunye umgwaqo ongu-T uR27 udlule umgwaqo ojikela eLanseria Airport. Jikela kwesokunxele ngomgwaqo uR512 uye eMabaliesburg. Hamba amakhilomitha angu 9.4 futhi, ujikele ngaseBrits ngomgwaqo ongu-R512. Nqamula ulayini kaloliwe ngebhuloho elinqamula idamu iHartbeespoort. Emgwaqeni ongu-T jikela kwesokudla uye eBrits ngo-R512. Hamba uye esitobhini esikhulu esinezindlela ezine. Jikela kwesokunxele uye ngaseBrits neRustenburg. Dlula umgwaqo wokuqala ojikayo oya eBrits. Hamba njalo ungajiki, dlula iTropical Gardens ngakwesokudla. Dlula umgwaqo u-R27 ngakwesokudla kanye nebhodi elikhombisayo ukuthi: Sun City 89km. Hamba uqonde ngqo ngangamakhilomitha angu 10 uze ufike ebhodini elikhombisayo ukuthi: Sun City 27 km. Jikela kwesokunxele bese unqamula ngaphezulu umgwaqo omkhulu, uzobe ususemgwaqeni okuholela ngqo eSun City.

Izindlela ezihamba ngaphakathi, uma ushiya isinxanxathela seSun City ujikela kwesokudla bese uhamba uqonde endleleni engu-R79. Emgwaqeni ongu-T jikela kwesokunxele bese uhamba uqonde edamini iHartbeespoort ngangamakhilomitha angu 15 bese ujikela kwesokunxele ku-R512 oya eRandburg unqamula ibhuloho elihamba phezu kwedamu iHartbeespoort. Emgwaqeni ongu-T jikela kwesokunxele ku-R27 oya ePitoli, u-R512 oya eRandburg. Hamba amakhilomitha angu 9.6 bese ujikela kwesokudla ngomgwaqo u-R512 oya eLanseria Airport. Dlula umgwaqo ojikela esikhumulweni sezindiza bese uhamba amakhilomitha angu 3 bese kuthi ezimpambanweni zemigwaqo ujikele ngakwesobunxele. Qhubekela phambili udlule ipulazi lezinkukhu ngakwesokudla sakho. Nqamula phezu komgwaqo omkhulu okhululekile u-R28 emgwaqeni ongu T. Jikela ngakwesokunxele bese uthatha esokudla sokuqala bese uqhubekela kwiFourways Mall. Izindlela eziqhamuka ePitoli. Khetha u-N4 u-R27, u-R514 noma u-R513 esitobhini sezindlela ezine semigwaqo ephambanayo ngale kwethanela yedamu iHartbeespoot. Landela indlela kusukela kulezimpabano mgwaqo njengoba zibekiwe kwimap yendlela.




Izitolo
Ungathenga izinto eziningi eSun City kusukela eziqedaphungeni, izincwadi kanye nokuthandekayo okusemgangathweni okokugqokela injabulo kanye nobucwebe.

Izitolo zezingubo. ISun City Collection. Izingubo zeSouvenir kanye nezipho njengesikhumbuzo sokuvakashela kwakho eSun City. Buka izingubo zase-Afrika zokuzigqokela nje okungenamcimbi kanye nezimfashini ezisemgangathweni zePlace of Adorment Beachwear ezitholakala eValley of Waves. Izingubo zemicimbi nezokuzigqokela nje ezikhululekile zeCatherine Moore Ladies. ISun City Trading. Izingubo zonke zabesilisa bonke abangazidinga.IKookai yemfashini yabesimame yakamumva.

Buka izicathulo. Ukuzikhethela okuningi nokukhulu kwezicathulo zangaphakathi nezangaphandle - ezilungele noma yimuphi umcimbi! Ubucwebe. ICharles Greig Jewellers igama elaziwayo eNingizimu Afrika engcwetini  yamatshe ayigugu kanye nasebucwebeni. Ivulwa nsuku zonke ePalace iSwazthwart Jewellers esesizindeni sezokuzithokozisa esiseLost City yeCoriors and Gifts.

IPalace Collection. Emihle imisebenzi enithwe ngesandla kanye nezikibha ezahlukile nezikibha jezi ezikhombisa imihlobiso egqugquzelwe ezobuciko bokwakha zasePalace. ITigers Eye, inezipho zase-Afrika kanye nemikhonzo. ISun Shop, isitolo esejwayelekile esidayisa amaphephandaba, amabhuku, oswidi, ugwayi kanye nezinye izidingo ezejwayelekile zomphakathi. Endaweni evulekile yokungena ehotela. ICabanas Collection, isitolo sokudlana okulula esitholakala ehotela iCabanas. Amabhuku kanye nezincwadi eCNA ( iCentral News Agency) ukuzikhethela okukhulu emabhukwini angaphakathi nawamazwe ngamazwe kuyatholakala eCNA.

ISun City Pharmacy, iSun City Pharmacy itholakala eLost City Entertainment Centre. Ukudla kwamakhekhe nokunye, zonke izinto ezimnandi zitholakala eLost City Entertainment Centre, kulabo abathanda okumnanjana. ISweet Discovery itholakala eValley of waves, iSweet Discovert iphethe izinhlobonhlobo zokusamakhekhe nokunye okuhambisana nako. Okujwayelekile, umthwebuli zithombe waseStudio Jano Resindent kanye nofakela amafilimu ezithombeni. Ucingo lwakhe: (014) 5574888. i-email jano@icon.co.za Isaluni elungisa izinwele, iRoyal Salon International elungisa izinwele ngabenzi bezinwele abaqeqeshiwe ukwenza izitayela. Itholakala ePalace. IManicures, abalungisi bobuso nabo bakhona. ISun Hair and Beauty, iSun hair and Beauty yona itholakala enkundleni yesibili ngasohlangothini lwangaseMpumalanga lwehotela iSun City. Igxile ekugundeni nasekwenzeni izitayela zase-Europe zezizwe zakhona. Uhlelo olugcwele lokulungiswa kwezinwele nokucwalwa kobuso luyatholakala, okubalwa kulo nezokuzinciphisa kanye nokunakekelwa ulele embhedni elangeni kanye nokuphathwaphathwa ngasemumva emhlane kweShiatsu.




Ezemidlalo
IGalofu, iLost City Golf Course kanye neGolf Club Gary player seyenze ikhozi yegalofu elicolekile nelikhumbulekayo eLost City, kanti kukhona umgodi okhumbuleka kakhulu kune-par 3 weshumi nantathu. Okuluhlaza - okumise okwezwekazi lase-Afrika - kuvikelwe izindunduma ezintathu ezinkulu ngakwesokudla kanye nezingwenya ezingaphezu kuka-40 eziphilayo ngakwesokunxele. Ikhozi ayiyinde ngokungafanele kanti umgodi ngamunye unezihlahla ezimbalwa, ezikunikeza ukuzikhethela okuzovumelana nanke amazinga olwazi. Umqambi wekhozi ungum-Afrika kakhulu, ngemigodi eminingi inqamula ngaseceleni lentaba. Ukubukeka okutholakala ezihlahleni eziphakeme kuyamangalisa kanti futhi buze bunconyelwe ukuthi umuntu uvumela isikhathi eside ukudla lekhozi emangalisayo ukuze ancome lokukubukeka okumangalisayo, imisindo kanye namaphunga ase-Afrika.

IGary Player Country Club ibingelela amakhozi ukuwasombulula kanti sekube iminyaka engu-20 iGary Player Country Club ihlala idlala imiqhudelwano esemazingeni aphezulu, ukwakha idumela lekhozi eliklomelisa ngomdlalo omuhle futhi lijezise omubi, ikhozi edinga ukuyiqala ngesilinganiso esingadlulisiyo ngezikhathi lapho ibe ikhokhela ngobuhle bayo, ikhozi enothe ngokudlalelwa kuyo imidlalo emikhulu nenedumela yaseNingizimu Afrika - umdlalo odlalwa kanye ngonyaka weMillion Dollar Challenge. Kukhona into encomekayo ngokudlala kulekhozi okungukuthi imidlalo emikhulu seyadlalelwa kona, ukukwazi ukuqhathanisa umdlalo wakho nowabo. Konke kuyingxenye yalesimangaliso esiyisipesheli sokudala iGary Player Country Club. ITitleist Golf Academy eseSun City, iTitleist Golf Academy yakhe endaweni yayo yodwa yeLost City Clubhouse kanti iphethwe nguTeddy Webber. UWebber , owayeqeqeshelwe ezokuvakasha kanti iqembu lakhe labaqeqeshi abakufundele abazimisele abakulungele ukufundisa ukudlalwa kwegalofu, banamakhono abalulekile kanye nobuciko kubavakashi kanye nabafundi abazibandakanya emidlalweni eminingi nebanzi ye-Academy. I-Academy inikeza kokubili kwangasese kanye nokwamaqembu ukufundiswa ngemali yabo ngezinsuku ezintathu ezikhethekile zokufundiswa ezibekwa phezulu. Lezizinsuku ezintahthu zokuqeqeshwa zilwela ekutheni ukwazi ukuhlangabezana nezimfuno zomdlalo:

Ukuthuthukisa umdlalo wakho wegalofu ngokufunda ukushuda okufanele ngokomthetho. Ukuthwala ukuzithemba ngokwengezela amakhono okwakha amashodi kanye nokwandisa ulwazi lwakho olujwayelekile nokudlala igalofu. Ukuthuthukisa ukukwazi kwakho ukulungisa amashodi aphambukayo ekhozini. Imininingwane yokubekisa: Ukuthola imininingwane ethe xaxa ekhona noma ukubeka indawo yakho, sicela ushayele uTitleist Golf Academy oseSun City kulenombolo yocingo: (014) 557-1555 noma ku: (014) 557-3711. Amanani: Isifundo sokufundela igalofu nomuntu nayedwa - imizuzu engu 45: ngu R140.00. Isifundo sokufundela igalofu seqembu - kusuka ebantwini abangu 3 kuya kwabangu 8 - imizuzu engu 90: ngu-R80.00 umuntu eyedwa. Isifundo somuntu ngamunye esethwetshulwayo ngeVideo - imizuzu engu 60: ngu R200.00. Izinsuku zeCorparate Golf - iGolf Clinic ngabakufundile izingcweti kuphela - imizuzu engu 30: ngu R500.00.

IWaterworld, ichibi elikhulu elisewaterworld yilapho injabulo ihamba khona emoyeni. Dlala ipara-sail, ijetski, ukuhamba ngesikebhe kanye nokushushuluza emanzini noma vele nje uthathe elula ipedalo. Abaqeqeshi abanolwazi olunzulu bayatholakala ukwazisa izivakashi ngemininingwane ecolekileyo ngezemidlalo. Ukugibela amahhashi, izifundo ezifundiswa ngumhlali oqeqeshayo, izindlela ezihanjwayo ezilandela imikhondo ethile kanye nokuhola uhambo, ukuzitholela ulwazi kanye nokuba ngumqali wokugibela ibhayisikili. Ibhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla ezingu 11 zebhola lomphebezo ezitholakalayo kuzona khona ezingu 5 ezinophahla olumboze phezulu. Ukufundiswa nakho kuyatholakala kumqeqeshi oyingcweti kwezebhola lomphebezo ongumhlali wendawo. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla zalo ezimbili ezitholakala eGary Player Country Club. Ukukhwela intaba, kukhona izindlela ezimbili eziqanjiwe zokuzungeza ngamabhayisikili ezise-Sun City kanye namabhayisikili abaneminyaka yonke ayatholakala ngokuwaqasha endlini yekilabhu lebhola lomphebezo. Izindlela okuhanjwa ngazo ukugibela amabhayisikili nezokugijima, Kukhona izindlela ezingamakhilomitha amathathu namahlanu ezizungeze kokubili iGary Player neLost City Golf Course. Izindlela zonke zinhle ngokumangalisayo ukubukwa kanti zimakwe ngokwebanga nendawo eziya kuyo. IHealth Spa kanye neGym, isizinda sezempilo sitholakala egary Player Country Club lapho kukhona indawo yokuzilolonga, ijaccuzi kanye nokugeza ngesitimi kanye futhi nohlelo nokwelashwa nge-therapeutic.




IValley of Waves
Kude le nolwandle - yebo kukhona iparadesi yebhishi! Hlamba egagasini eliphakeme ngango 1.8 metre eValley of Waves. Gxambuzeka emanzini ushone phansi noma ugwilize uzungeze iLazy River Ride. Shintsha bese uphumula amabhishi asagolide ngesikhathi unambitha ezibandayo iziphuzo ngaphansi kwelanga lase-Afrika.

IValley of Waves ivulwa nsuku zonke kusukela ngo 09:00 kuya ku 18:00 ehlobo kanti ngo 10:00 kuze kube ngu 17:00 ebusika bese ikunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zobuhle bezinto ezikulindele ukuthi ukuzitholele zona futhi uzijabulise ngazo. Zihambele unqamule ibhuloho elihle nalo ngokwalo iBridge of Time elihlanganisa iLost City Entertainment Centre neValley of Waves. Eligadwe ezimangalisayo izindlovu ezivikela umnotho ongafaniswa ocashe phakathi ehholo labaphathi zikhwama, ukulingisa okunobuhlakani bokuqhuma kwentaba yomlilo ehlaza yenza, okudala intuthu kanye namatshe akhona ancibilikayo abhovumulukela phambili ephuma phakathi eTemple of Creation. Dlula iMonkey Spring Plaza - amisa isikhumbuzo somhlambi wezinkawu ezasindisa isizwe sasemandulo endlaleni eyayikhona ngesikhathi sesomiso esikhulu - bese ungena eValley of Waves phakathi kweKong Gates emangalisayo. Okundlaleke ngaphambi kwakho iRoaring Lagoon, lapho amagagasi aphakeme ngangamamitha amabili egingqika kancane eza ngasenhlabathini emhlophe yasebhishi ethambile. ISacred River Ride izokuthatha ngohambo olunokuthula ikuse emfuleni ongaphansi, omncane nomdala kufane kungalandela isikhathi sakho sokuwina indlela. Ezinye izinto ezinhle zingazama zingakweyisa ngobumpi ngokunyakaza kwamanzi - iTemple of Courage - igwilizisa phansi ubuso becala lentaba echibini elihlwabusayo ngaphansi.

Emva kokuzamazama komhlaba kudicilele phansi impucuko yasemandulo, idayimane elidala kanye nezimayini zegolide zakhukhuleza izingxenye zazo kanti namhlanje zinikeza evusa amadlingozi indawo ebusheshelezi amanzi njengoba zijikela phansi ngaseceleni lentaba. Kukhona amahlathi ambalwa ahlukene evalley, okubalwa kuwo iRain Forest, iBaobab Forest, iJacaranda Forest kanye neTropical Forest, aqukethe ezingandile izihlahla ezinhlobonhlobo. Qhubeka nokuhlola bese uzozithola usuphezu kweSway Bridge - elaklanywa iNkosi ukucupha labo ababefisela okubi umndeni wasebukhosini - liyanyakaza futhi liyazwinga njengoba ligxamalazele izihobhozi ezizamulayo phezu kwamanzi achachazayo ngaphansi. Zitholele iHidden Cave Falls ngokulandela iHippo Gorge Trail, kusukela ezinyaweni zerayal Staircase noma thatha indlela emangalisayo ehlanganisa iRain Foresta enqamula iRoyal Staircase. Abahloli abanesibindi abangesabi lutho bazothola futhi iGong yeSun Lion. LeGong enhle ngokumangalisayo isiza abantu basemandulo ngokubathumela kwephephile iRoyal Arena kafushane nje ngaphambi kokuthi ukuzamazama komhlaba kudicilele phansi amakhaya abo. Uma udlula ngaseRoyal Arena, inkundla enhle yokudlalela imidlalo ezungezwe izihlalo ezakhelwe khona kanye neRoyal baths, lapho amanzi ayo antukuntuku ayaziwa njengamanzi anamandla okuphilisa kanti futhi yayakhiwe ekuqaleni ngaphezu komchachazo wemvelo. Thatha ikhefu lokuzitholela okusamzana kwangempela e-Observatory Bar ebhekene neLake of Peace kanye neRoaring Lagoon noma uvakashele iFood Court lapho ukudla okunambitheka ngokwedlulele kutholakala khona.




Indawo yokulala
ISun City iyakwazi ukukunikeza amagumbi amahle ngokumangalisayo angu 13 01 anakho konke kwawo ekuzikhetheleni kwamahhotela ahlukene, kusukela kweyomlando iPalace yeLost City kuya kweyejwayelekile nalapho ungaziphumulela khona iCabanas yeSun City.

Amahotela eSun City: iSun City Cabanas, iPalace yeLost City , I-Sun City Vacation Club, iSun City hotel, iSun City Cascades.



Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala eCabanas
ISun City Cabanas ikunikeza ukuzikhethela ekudleni okuthathu amatafula anesigqi asePalm Terrace, okosiwe okusajusi eMorula Restaurant kanye nokulula okusevwa emini eMotula Café.

Ukudla kwasekuseni okumangalisayo kwasePalm Terrace noma indawo yetafula lokudla kwakusihlwa, kuhleleke kwezinhle ngokumangalisayo izingadi eziluhlaza. IMorula Restaurant , iziteki ezinhlobonhlobo kanye nokosiwe okusevwa emoyeni okumemayo ngamanani aphansi.

Imorula Café isevwa okulula kwasemini. IPool Bar itholakala endaweni elungiswe kahle ephezu kodonga ebhekene nechibi lokubhukuda, iCabanas Pool Bar inikeza ukuzikhethela kwengxubevange yotshwala lokuziqabula kanye nejusi yezithelo yamaqabuli bemizimba. Ezinye izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala.



Indawo yokulala
Ubumsulwa bemibalabala exubile basetshenzisiwe ekuhlobiseni iCabanas yona kanye ekunikeza amanani emali angefaniswe. Isivakashi saseCabanas zingazikhethela phakathi kweyejwayelekile nenobukhazikhazi iCabanas. ICabanas eyejwayelekile ikunikeza isisefo sokugeza esingaphakathi bese kuthi iCabanas enobukhazikhazi yona ikunikeze indlu yokugeza ephelele enakho konke okudingekayo.

Izidingo ezejwayelekile zibandakanya ucingo olusebenzisa ushayela ngqo laphu ufuna ukushayela khona; isilungiso moya; umabonakude onemibala; umsakazo; isomiso zinwele;ipulaki kagesi yereyiza (100/220V); isitsha esinetiye nekhofi kanye nomshini wokukwazi ukuthola umlayezo kuwo. Isimo sezindlu zaseCabanas sime kanje:

Ezihamba ngazimbili ezibhekene nechibi zingu	 24
Ezejwayelekile zemindeni zingu 	201
Ezemindeni ezibhekene nechibi zingu	32
Ezinobukhazikhazi zingu 	3
Inani lazo sezizonke zingu 	380




Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala zaseCascades
Izivakashi zaseCascades zidla zikhanyiswe ngamakhandlela esitayeleni esimangalisayo ePeninsula Restaurant nasebar, ukudla okulula kuyatholakala eFishmonger Restaurant.

IPeninsula Restaurant, izindishi ezimangalisayo zokudla ezikhethwe ekudleni kwamazwe ngamazwe, lapho ubumsulwa bezithako buhlanganisa indalo elinga ulwazi lokudla okuhle ngokwedlulele. IFishmonger Restaurant, uhla lokudla kwasolwandle okumnandi kuseva kwenhle indawo ngokumangalisayo. IVistas Bar inikeza ukubukeka okuhle ngokumangalisayo kwezingadi kanye nemihosha yamanzi.

IPenisula Bar, indawo enqunyiweyo yokuhlangana enhle yokuhlambululayo noma okuxutshiwe, iPeninsula Bar ihlanganisa indawo ethengisa ngokudla ngegama elilodwa. IVista bar, lendawo ethengisa ngotshwala esendaweni ephezu kodonga ehlelwe kahle, ivulwa izinsuku ezingu 7 ngesonto, ngokubukeka okumangalisayo kwezingadi kanye nimhosha yamanzi nako kunikeza injabula ephilayo ngoLwesihlanu ngangoMgqibelo ebusuku. Ezinye izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala.




ICascades inamagumbi angu 243 lapho amazwi emvelo afudumele nanothile ezokwamukela khona. Magumbi ahlotshiswe ngesitayela kanye nokuthinteka okuzothile.

Ubukhazikhazi obungafaniswa yikho okufunwa nsuku zonke, kanti igumbi ngalinye laseCascades libhekene nezingadi ezinhle ngokumangalisayo kanye namachibi okubhukuda. Iningi lalezizindlu ezinobukhazikhazi zinezindlu zokugeza ezithe khwace kanye nempahla yakhon ewubukhazikhazi . Izidingo ezejwayelekile zibandakanya izindlu zokugeza ezakhelwe ngaphakathi, ucingo okwazi ukushayela ngqo lapho ufuna ukushayela khona, isilungiso moya, umabonakude onemibala, umsakazo, isomiso zinwele, ipulaki yereyiza kagesi (100/220V); indawo encane yotswala, ukunakekelwa kwegumbi amahora angu 24 kanye nokukwazi ukuthola umlayezo. Isimo samagumbi aseCascades ami kanje:
Ezihamba kazimbili ezejwayelekile zingu	120
Ezihamba ngazimbili ezinendawo evulekile yezoso zingu 	12
Ezihmaba ngazimbili ezinobukhazikhazi zingu 	41
Ezejwayelekile zemindeni zingu	60
Ezejwayelekile ezinakho konke zingu 	6
Eyejwayelekile enakho konke enkulu iyi	1
Enobukhazikhazi bodwa bonke zingu 	2
Enkulu kunazo zonke enobukhazikhazi iy	1
Inani lazo sezizonke zingu		243.

I-Superbowl
Ikhombisa  abadlali abadumile, kanye nemidlalo emikhulu yamazwe ngamazwe eyenzekayo, imibukiso, imibuthano kanye namadli. Kungahlala abantu abangu-6000 endaweni enobuntofontofo ukubuka kanye nabangu-1500 besidlo.

I-Superbowl iyinkundla emise okubuso obuyisishiyagalombili eneshashalazi eliphathekayo elakhiwe ngamapali okhuni bese yakhiwa ngezigaba ezikaleka ngo-2m x 1m x 1.5m ukuphakama. Ikhethenisi lendlu libubende obusindayo kanti futhi livulwa noma livalwe ngogesi wakhona olihambisa kwenye indawo. Ukungena esiteji nasendlini yokushintshela kungasendlini engemuva. Isizinda sokuzithokozisa
Isizinda sokuzithokozisa sinikeza okumnandi kwawo wonke umuntu ngemiklomelo engawinwa emidlalweni ye-video nakweminye imidlalo ye-video ejabulisayo ehehayo.

Kukhona futhi nama-cinema amaningana, enhle nenesitayela esidala I-call bingo kanye nezindawo ezinigi ezidayisa ngokudla ongazikhethela kuzona nezidayisa ngokudla okusheshayo. Imidlalo inikeza amadlingozi angapheliyo ngemishini engamakhulukhulu ebuphithiphithini bekhasino kanye nokokuzithokozisa okwedlulele eSuperbowl.  Ikhasino ecinene; imishini engamakhulu yokudlala ihlelwe phakathi kokucinana - dlala owodwa wemiklomelo eqhubekayo; iDream Machine, iMillion Mania, iMillennium Mania noma iPoker Magic  bese ungahamba usungumnini zigidi.

Joyina enye yamaphromoshini ethu bese ugoduka uya ekhaya nemiklomelo eminingi. I-Bongo Lounge; Zitholele amadada amabili, ukhiye womnyango, izinyawo ezimbili zenhlanhla kanye nezinyoka eziphilayo zingakwenza ube owinayo! I-bingo lingo ka-22, 21, 11 kanye no-55 okuwokukodwa  kwezinhlanganisela  zangempela ezingakwenza ube owinayo eSun City kwi-Bingo Lounge. Ivulwa ngoLwesithathu, oLwesihlanu, amaSonto nangamaholide omphakathi.

I-Showscan; Lecinema eyedlulele ikhombisa ukuxegaxega okusheshayo kanye  ne-simulator anyakaza ngokushintshashintsha. I-Ster Kinekor Theatres; Konama-cinema awu-4 akhombisa lezizanda zokukhishwa. Okubukwa abadala nsuku zonke. I-Trade Horns Action bar; Indawo etshengisa ezemidlalo zodwa izikhombisa emphemeni kamabonakude kanye nokukhona kokuzithokozisa. Imidlalo ye-Novelty ne-Arcade; Ukujabula kwawo wonke umuntu kanye nemiklomelo engawinwa emidlalweni ye-video yakho konke okukhishiwe. I-Superbowl; Lendawo enhle ngendlela emangalisayo isilethela abadlali abadumile kanye nemibukiso.




Ukuzithokozisa
I-Sun City isixhophe imiphakathi yakwamanye amazwe ngamakhasino ayo akhangayo, izindawo ezidayisa ngokudla kubachizi bako, ezemidlalo ngokwedlulele kanye nababukeli abakhethiweyo.

Okokuzithokozisa okugcwela ngezinhlobo zakho okukhona kusukela emishinini yokudlala kuya kuma-safaris; imidlalo yezingane emangalisayo; ukugibela amahhashi uya egalofini; imisele yamagelengele yaseLost City... noma ngabe ufunani olwakho ozoluthola eSun City.



Isizinda sezokuzijabulisa
	Ihotela iSun City
Imidlalo yamatafula
Ikhasino itholakala ehotela iSun City kanti ivulwa nsuku zonke. Indawo yokungena ekhasino ihamba endaweni ekhanyayo ngokwemibala yezingcezu ezinkulu zasekhasino, etholakala ngemumva komthombo wezinhlamvu zegolide.

I-American Roulette ( enkundleni enkulu); ukudlala kusuka ku-R5 okuncane kuya kokukhulu uR200. I-Americna Roulette umdlalo omnandi, ogcwele intokozo ngokubheja okwehlukene okuningi kanti futhi udlalwa ngezingcezu zekhethelo ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. I-Blackjack;  idlalwa kusuka ku-R50 okuncane kuya kokukhulu u-R2000. Inhloso yeBlackjack ukudonsa isandla samakhadi esinenani eliseduze kuka-21 kunesomphathi, ngaphandle kokuqhuma (okuwokungaphezu kuka-21). Isandla  esiphethe amakhadi amabili okuno-Ace nanoma u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing sibizwa ngeBlackjack bese sikhokha u-3 : 2.
I-Sun City Stud Poker; okuncane uR20 kuya kokukhulu uR200. I-Craps (i-DICE) Ivulelwa izikhathi ezibalulekile nangeMigqibelo. Ukudlala kusuka ku-R10 okuncane kuya kokukhulu u-R1000.
I-Mini Punto Banco; Ukudlala kusuka ku-R100 okuncane kuya ku-R10 000 okukhulu. I-Punto Banco umdlalo odumile wekhadi ovumela abadlali ukuthi babhejele ibhanki noma baphikisane nalo. Abadlali abangu-14 bangahlala etafuleni, emunye nendawo yakhe yokubheja ngaphambi kwabo. Ukwengeza kubadlali abamile, iPunto Banco ingangenisa futhi inani labadlali abamile. Uma udinga usizo ekufundeni ukuthi imidlalo idlalwa kanjani emakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa, ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika lePRO ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa kulenombolo eqhutshwayo u-1068.



Imidlalo yamatafula 

Ezokukweleta
Amakhadi okukweleta; Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangampela. I-American Express, i-Diners, namakhadi e-Gold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. I-Amercan Express isivumela kuphela ukwamukela amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500.

Mayelana nokukweleta thintana nomphathi wekhasino osemsebenzini noma umphathi wemishini emsebenzini ngolwazi oluthe xaxa. Amasheke. Amasheke abantu nje kanye namakhadi okukweleta ahambisana nawo agarantiwe isheke azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esingangezinsuku eziwu-7, ehambisana nomazisi wangampela. Amasheke agarantiwe yibhange angamukelwa uma ehamba nomazisi wangempela nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta, yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha ngosuku. Uyacelwa ukuthi uthintane nomshayi sisefo ngemininingwane emayelana nohlobo lwesheke ongalusebenzisa.

 Wonke ama-Travellers' Cheques ayamukelwa. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe edumile uma ufuna izingcezu edesikini likakheshi ekhasino. Ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthola amarandi aseNingizimu Afrika, sicela uthintane nomnyango wezezimali. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe kanye nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka uma ushintsha imali. 




I-Sun International - Umhlaba we-Thousand Thrills

I-Sun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika - lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni - nangaphandle, ngamaqembu e-Sun International agqame kwangu-20 amahotela aphezulu emhlabeni jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamathalente, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo - noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlangano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile.

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi, noma noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyethembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!

Izikhathi zokusebenza
Imishini yasehotela iSun City kanye nemishini yeJungle khasino ivulwa amahora angu-24 zinsuku zonke onyakeni.

I-Bingo Lounge isebenza ngoLwesithathu nangeSonto kusuka ngo-12:00 kuya ku-20:00, nangoLwesihlanu nemigqibelo kusuka ngo-12:00 kuya ku-24:00. Iyavulwa futhi nangamaholide omphakathi. Ukulungiselelwa okubalulekile kwamaphromoshini kuyenziwa kweBingo. Izikhathi zokusebenza zekhasino kanye neSalon Prive zisuka ngo-13:00 kuze kube nini, izinsuku eziwu-7 ngesonto. I-International Room ivulwa uma kulungiselwa kuphela.




Isikole semidlalo saseSun City
Ngezikhathi ezithize onyakeni, kukhona izifundo zamahhala ekhasino yaseSun City zokufundisa umdlalo weBlackjack, i-American Roulette, iPunto Banco kanye neCrabs. Sicela ubheke kumpathi wemidlalo.




Imishini
Ikhasino lasehotela laseSun City linemishini yokudlala ewu-379. Ikhasino iJungle yaseSun City yona esesizindeni sokuzijabulisa kunemishini ewu-456.

I-Sun City inikeza umklomelo oqhubekayo omkhulukazi eNingizimu Afrika, ukuyibala nje, iDreama Machine neMillenium Mania, umklomelo wakhona omncane omangalisayo owu-R2 000 000. I-Dream Machine yona okhokha okuncane okungango-R1 000 000 nganoma yisiphi isikhathi emklomelweni omkhulu. Kukhona amabhange eDream Machine ehotela laseSun City kanye nasenkundleni yekhasino iJungle esizindeni sokuzithokozisa. I-Dream Machine umshini ofakelwa u-R1, ukuze uwine umklomelo, ungafaka kuze kube kube u-R3 (izinhlamvu eziwu-3). Kufanele uthole izimpawu zeDream Machine eziwu-3 ohleni kunoba ibaphi olayini abakhokhelayo.

I-Millenium Mania yiwo wodwa umshini  wokudlala eNingizimu Afrika okhokhela okuncane okungangezigidi ezimbili zamarandi- kodwa uma udlale zonke izinhlamvu zakho zika-50c eziwu-5. Kanti uma ukhetha ukudlala izinhlamvu eziwu-4 kuphela?  Umklomelo omncane kusayizo izigidi eziwu-2  zamarandi! Ngo-April umgumbuli onenhlanhla eCarnical City wawina umklomelo omkhulu wezigidi eziwu-3 nezinkulungwa ezingamakhulu ayisikhombisa zamarandi kwi-Millinniuma Mania ... Yebo, uma ufuna ukuba ngumnini zigidi ngokuphidwe kabili, usuyazi ukuthi kumele uye kuphi!

Ukuze uwine noma omuphi umklomelo oqhubekayo, kufanele udlale ngezingcezu eziningi. Izivakashi ziyacelwa ukuthi ziqale zibheke  izindawo zokubheja njengoba yonke imishini ikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi zingakhi izinhlamvu ezidingekayo ukuwina umklomelo omkhulu. Kodwa-ke, kungumsebenzi womdlali ukubheka ukuthi umshini uzimukelile yini zonke izinhlamvu ezifakiwe emishinini, njengoba kukhona izikhathi lapho izinhlamvu zingangeni zonke emshinini bese zidinga ukubuye zifakwe futhi. I-Sun City inokufakelwa kwemishini okusukela ku-50c kuya ku-R100 okubalwa kuyo isindo, imidlalo yevideo kanye nimishini yePoker.

I-Gary Player Golf Course ne-Nedbank Golf Challenge
Yaziwa umhlaba wonke njengendawo ye-Nedbank Golf Challenge wonyaka leGary Player elungiswe kahle futhi yaziwa iNingizimu Afrika yonke. Iyenye futhi engcono kakhulu.
Futhi okushiwoyo ngayo njengebekwa kinombolo -2 ezweni yibhuku iComplete Golfer bese iba unombolo -1 ngabe iGolf Digest (eNingizimu Afrika). Abaningi abadlali abadumile bayayincoma indawo evulekile esendaweni enhle kakhulu eyihlathi bese lokho kunezezela kokushiwoyo ngayo. Ukuze ukwazi ukuqhathanisa umdlalo wakho nowabo, ukuthi, "Ngishaya umgodi njengoba kwenza uSteve," noma, "Ngadlula indawo lapho u-Ernie noma u-Nick bama khona", kuyiyo ingxenye yokudlala iGary Player Country Club. 

Ukuyimaka nje ikhozi isiyonke ingaphezu kwamamitha awu-7 000 okwenza ibe enye yamade kunawo wonke emhlabeni. Kodwa ukushaya okwehlukene ikona okwenza kube bushane ukufinyeza ikhozi futhi bese iyadlaleka kubo bonke abadlali begalofu. Okuyenza ibe nomehluko kunawo wonke izindawo zayo eziluhlaza, ezinamagqunyana ahlelwe ngendlela ekahle, nezindunduma zayo ezivikela ubuluhlaza buhlale busesimeni. Nemigwaqo emikhulu enotshani iKikuyu obuhle kanye namabhenti aluhlaza okotshani uluhlazisa ikhozi ibe sesemeni esihle ngaso sonke isikhathi.

U-David Frost, uSeve Ballesteros noBernard Langer bonke sebayiwina iNedBank Golf Challenge ngaphezu kokukodwa kodwa umdlalo owahlaba umxhwele kuyo yonke lemidlalo owango-1993 ngesikhathi uNick Price ewina ngo-264 - kumashumi amabili nane ngaphansi kwe-Par nama-Stroke awu-8 ngaphezu komdlalo odlule ongcono kakhulu. Umgodi ogqamile? Kona mihle yonke eGary Player Country Club, kodwa ukuzilinga nomvuza omisayo owesishiyagalolunye. Ukudlala le-par kusuka ekushayeni okungaphambili bese uba nokuhamba ukuya esiqhingini sokuluhlaza ngomjikijelo wesibili enselelweni yokungafaniswa nalutho ukuvivinya kwegalofu.

Kunonengozana yamanzi ngakwesokudla ebizwa ngeThomson lagoon, engenayo nayo emdlalweni ngokushaya kwakho. Amagqunyana okushaya akude ngokubomvu. Okuluhlaza ngaphambili kubonakala ngokumnyama . Zonke izindawo zikhonjiswe ngamamitha.

I-Titleist Golf Academy
I-Titleist Academy yaseLost City Golf Course inikeza imali yokufunda kuwo wonke amazinga abadlali begalofu. I-Academy iphethwe inhloko yokufundisa ewufundele umsebenzi uTeddy Webber. U-Teddy ebenikezela ngemali eminyakeni engamashumi amabili eyedlule ebalelwa ngokwezifundo ezihamba ngazodwa kuya ezifundweni zamaqembu kuncike ezidingweni zomfundi.
Ukufunda kwezinsuku ezimbili noma ezintathu  yizo ezigcizelelwa iAcademy yeTitleist Academy, zonke izinto zomdlalo ezimele zifundiwe ziyenziwa ngaso lesisikhathi. Ukucutshungulwa kweVideo nako kuyatholakala kwabadlali abaqedayo, kanye nabo bonke ubunyoninco buyacutshungulwa ngesigaba ngesigaba. Konke kweAcademy okutholakalayo kubalwa kuko lokhu kufundiswa okunobuciko. U-Teddy Webber angatholakala kulenombolo yocingo (01455) 71555 ngokuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa oluphathelene ngokufunda komuntu noma ukufunda kweqembu.

Isifundo seqembu noma i-Academy kudume kakhulu ngemivuzo yokuhlanganyela.




Ikilabhu yamalunga
Ikilabhu yamalunga eKamp Kwena eyisipesheli iklomelisa izingane ngokuvakasha njalo. Izincwadi zezindaba amakhadi ezinsuku zokuzalwa kuyathunyelelwa amalunga, kanti futhi sonke isikhathi lapho abancane bebuyela eKamp Kwena, izincwadi zabo zemvume yokuya kwelinye izwe ziyagxivizwa.

Emva kokuvakasha kane bathola izipho zamahhala kanti futhi emva kokuthola izigxivizo eziyishiyagalombili ezincwadini zabo zemvume, bangawina ukuhlala kwamahhala kwelinye lamahotela aseSun City.




Imidlalo yamaholide
Ngamaholide ezikole, yebo, izinto zishisa ngempela eKamp Kwena ngoba iKwena ithanda ukuveza izinto eziningi  zokudlala kubangani babo abancane, kubalwa kuko ukuvakashela njalo eValley of Waves kanye nemicimbi njalo ebusuku.




I-Kamp Kwena
I-Kamp Kwena indawo yazo zonke izingane yokuvakasha ngoba zithola konke kokuvakasha kwazo endaweni yokuvakasha yaseSun City ngoba futhi izinhlelo zayo zokuzithokozisa zezingane ezineminyaka esuka ku-4 kuya ku-12 ziphezulu ngalendlela abayifunayo nokunyakaza kwabo abancane abakuthandayo.

I-Kwena, indawo enobungani bengwenya eluhlaza, ehlala endaweni abayichaza nge-"super-special Western wilderness fort" eyakhiwe yonke ngokhuni. Yakhiwe emagcekeni eCabanas ngaphandle kweWaterwolrd kanti futhi wonke umuntu uyazi ukuthi imicimbi emikhulu eshukumisayo ihlale yenzelwa kulendawo. Kukhona amaqenbu eCubs ezingane ezineminyaka esuka ku-2 kuya ku-3 ubudala, iqembu lasebekhulakhulile leminyaka esuka ku-4 kuya ku-8 ubudala neqembu leKooldudes labeminyaka eqala ku-8 kuya ku-12 ubudala. Manje kungaba imidlalo ezungeze ichibi lokubhukuda, imidlalo yokusukelana, ukudweba amapheshana, ukudlala ivolleyball, ukupenda ubuso, ukulwa bechelana ngamanzi noma bebukela imibukiso emincane omunye emva komunye, kuhlale kukhona okuthile okugcina abancane bejabulile njalo.

I-Sun InternationalI-Sun International Umhlaba ovusa amadlingozi  ngokuphindwe kankulungwane

I-Sun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni nangaphandle, ngamaqembu e-Sun International agqame kwangu-20 amahotela aphezulu emhlabeni jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamathalente, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlangano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile.

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi, noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyethembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!



Isicelo sokubekelwa indawo e-Sun International. Uma udinga ukubhukha ithikithi lendiza noma ukwenza noma imaphi amalungiselelo okuhamba sizothanda ukuphakamisa ukuthi ubekise indawo usebenzise i-Travel Agent noma i-Tour Operator.

			Isinyathelo sokuqala
Ngcafaza lapha ukuze ubuke uhla olunakho konke lwe-Tour Operators.



Uhlobo lwekhasimende:
Uhlobo lokubekisa indawo:


Inombolo yakho eyimfihlo yekhasimende le-Sun International (Sun Pin): (Uma ikhona)

Uma ungayazi inombolo yakho eyimfihlo yekhasimende le-Sun International (SunPin), ungangenela okukodwa okulandelayo iTrade: IATA, ASATA, Individual: MVG noma inombolo yobulunga bekilabhu yesikhathi samaholide.


Ishisekelwe izakhiwo eziningi zase-Victoria ezinhle eKimberley, nokusondelana kwedolobha nendawo enomlando wesitimela samalahle, I-Flamongo Resort ne-Entertainment World kuzodonsa lobobuhle obunjengenganekwane nesitayela sezinqola zesitimela nesiteshi kwakuqala kwase-Victoria. I-Flamingo Resort ne-Entertainment World izoba nalezi zinto ezilandelayo: Ikhasino enamatafula awu-7 okudlala nemishini yokudlala ewu-200. I-Salon Prive enamatafula awu-3 okudlala nemishini ewu-50 yokubiza. Indawo yokuthengisa utshwala yasekhasino (i-Junction Bar), neyokuthengisa ukudla yasekhasino futhi ( i- Puffing Billy's Restaurant) okuqondene kuphela nabantu abeze ekhasino. Indawo lapho kuthengiswa khona ukudla okusheshayo, edayisa izingubo nendawo yokuzijabulisa ezungeze indawo yemidlalo yalabo abeze ekhasino uma ufuna okusha okudayisayo nokokuzijabulisa. Indawo yokudayisa utshwala  nokudla kwamazwe ngamazwe ngenkululeko enemikhanya yomabonakude esakaza ezemidlalo ezibalulekile ezenzeka umhlaba wonke. Indawo lapho imindeni ingazijabulisa yodwana enezinto eziningi ukuzikhethela uma befuna ukuzijabulisa, Umpheme wokubuka izithombe, indawo lapho kunakekelwa izingane zidlale zigadiwe nendawo yomdeni engaphandle yokuzithokozisa. Ihotela elinamagumbi awu-48 anakho konke (i-Flamingo Hotel) nendawo yokuqasha amakamelo enamagumbi awu-68 anokungaphelele nokho (i-Flamingo Lodge), Kokubili kwakhiwele ukunakekela abavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe nabakuleli, izivakashi zasekhasino, izihambi nezithunywa ezize emhlanganweni. Indawo lapho kugcinwe khona ezobuciko enamagumbi aphumele ngaphandle amathathu angangena abantu abawu-200.

I-Selibi Pikwe
Itholakala edolobheni elinezimayini elilingeneyo i-Selibi Phikwe ngasempumalanga yekhona leBotswana.
Indawo ethandekayo ukuhlaba ikhefu kuyo, engenela kwizisithekelo ezidumile zomhlaba wonke zeTuli ne-Okovango Delta.




Ezokukweleta 
Amakhadi okukweleta angamukeleka emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangempela. Amakhadi e-Gold, amakhadi e-American Express namakhadi e-Diners anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500. ( Sicela nazi ukuthi i-American Express izovumela kuphela ukuthatha amakhadi aqala ngenombolo u-3768). Mayelana nokukweleta sicela uthintane nomshayi sisefo osedesikini ukuthola olunye ulwazi. Amasheke; amasheke abantu azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziyi-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangempela. Amasheke agarantwe ibhange angamukelwa uma ehambisana nomazisi kanye nekhadi lokukweleta elihambisana nalo, Yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe okuvumeleke ukuthi siwamukele usuku ngalunye. Uyacelwa ukuthi uthintane nomshayi sisefo ngemininingwane ephathelene nohlobo lwesheke okungenzeka ukuthi ulusebenzise. Imishini yokukhipha imali iyatholakala kuyo yonke indawo yasekhasino, isebenza amahora ungu-24 ngosuku. Amasheke ezihambi (Travellers' Cheques); wonke amasheke ezihambi ayamukelwa kuphela uma ezosayinwa phambi kukamshayi sisefo, kanye nomazisi uveziwe. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe (Canadian Dollar, Ditch Guilder, French Franc, German Mark, Swiss Franc, British Sterling kanye ne United States Dollar) iyamukelwa uma ufuna izingcezu edesikini lasekhasino. Uma ufuna ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthola i-Moloti, sicela uthintane nedesika elingasemnyango. Incwadi yemvume yokungena kwelinye ilizwe nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka uma kushintshwa noma yini yakwelinye izwe.




Ikhosi yegalofu yase-Lost City
Abadlali begalofu bakhexa imilomo ngobuhle bendawo yekhozi yegalofu uma ushaywa umoya i-par-72 Lost City Golf Course. Ubukhona bezinto eziqanjiweyo zase-Afrika zikhona yonke indawo futhi zicacile, kakhulukazi kwengakholeki indlu yekilabhu eyakhiwe ngesitayela sase-Zimbabwe.

Isitayela sokuhlelwa kogwadule lwekhozi yegalofu sinokuheha kwamanye amazwe ngakho konke okukhona nangomhleli wayo, uGary Player oseyibuke njengenye yamakhozi awathandayo. Ekubeni ukuhlelwa kwayo okuhle kuvimbekile, ikakhulukazi ebusika lapho utshani bugundeka khona eBayview. Yize noma iBayview yenza ibhola ligingqike kahle, yayingahlelelwe ukudundubala nemimango enzima lokho okwenzela ekuvuseni amadlingozi enselelo yelost City Golf Course. Ngo-May 1998, isu elikhulu lokulungisa indawo lathathwa eLost City Golf Course ukubuyisela indawo engenatshani yaseBayview ngeKikuyu, utshani obunikeza i-Gary Player Country Club isimo esihle ngendlela emangalisayo uphela noma uqala unyaka. Kukho konke, inani eliyi-330000 square metres lezidindi lendlalwa, ngokulingana no-5000 square metres ngosuku awokugcina endlalwe ngo-September uqalwa ka-1998. Ngakwabaka Evergreen Gardens, inkampani eyayinikwe inkontileka, kwakuwumsebenzi omkhulu kunayo yonke wokwendlala izidindi eNingizimu Afrika owake waba khona. Umklamo wezigidi ezewu-4 zamarandi waqala ngohlelo lokuchelela olwaluhlelelwe ukubulala lokho okwabe kukhona, emva kwalokho kwalandela ukususwa kotshani obabungaphezulu, ukuvundiswa komhlabathi, ukwendlalwa kwezidindi kanye nokulungiswa ngaphezulu, kwenziwa konke.Njengoba ukugcwaliswa okunomqondo endaweni entsha yokudlalela,ukulungiswa kahle kwendawo ebeyinganatshani sekwenziwe, kubalwa kuko ukuhlelwa kahle kwezindunduma, ukuthalaliswa kwemimango, ukususwa kokunye okumilile, kanye nokwandiswa kwezinye izindawo zokushayela. Indawo enotshani obugundiwe beKikuyu entsha eseLost City Golf Course izoqinisekisa unyaka wonke usesimeni esihle unikeza obumangalisayo nobusha ubuhle: indawo enotshani obugundiwe obuhle obuluhlaza inikeza ukwahlukanisa phakathi kwezihlahla zasendle nendawo engenamsebenzi enezindunduma zikadoti okunye kwezinto ezenza lekhozi ihlabe umxhwele. Ukushintshwa kwesimo sendawo nokuphakama akuyithinti inselelo nokuqungela isibindi umdlalo, njengoba isakhiwo sokuqala esifake phakathi izimbobo ezicashile nemibhoshongo kusasobala. Izinga le-Lost City Golf Course nesiqhingi sayo esisha esenebe ngotshani baso iKikuyu iqinisekisa abadlali begalofu ukuthi bazojabulela umdlalo okhumbulekayo ovuselelayo nonokubukeka okuhle.UMA UFUNA OLUNYE ULWAZI THINTANA NO-LARA ROSS E- SUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (0110 780 7684




I-Sun City imisa indawo yezamabhizinisi enakho konke



Ihhovisi elinobungcweti ngenhlalo okuphilwa phakathi kwayo elisezingeni lamazwe ngamazwe.

Indawo yezamabhizinisi enolwazi lwezemisebenzi oluningi ngendlela engenakulinganiswa olutholakala khona, ukusukela ekwenzeni amagama okubhala namaletha ngendlela efinyeziwe kuya ekukhiqizeni amaphepha abhalwe ngemibala egcwele nokuvezwa kwezinto ezibonakalayo nezizwakalayo, sekukhona e-Sun City.


"Njengenye yezindawo okuyiwa kuzo uma kubanjwe imihlangano emikhulu eNingizimu Africa, I-Sun City iyaziqhenya ngezinto ezinikezelayo kulomkhakha wamakhasimende, nakosomabhizinisi ngamunye ngamunye. Ngoba sibuqamama kwezinye zezinto ezijwayelwe ukutholakala ezindaweni ezinkulu, kumele sihlangabezane nalezo zidingo kwi-site endaweni okuvakashelwa kuyo," kusho uHerliane Portenschlager, i-Guest Relations Manager e-Sun City. 

"Kuze kube manje, izivakashi ezidinga usizo kwezamabhizinisi bezisizwa umnyango wethu onamandla we-Desktop Publishing (DTP) kubalindi sivalo emahotela okuvakashelwa kuwo. Izinto ezifana nezinhlelo zemihlangano noma amapheshana azo bekuyingxenye yomsebenzi wethu, ukufeksa, ukukopisha nezinye izidingo bekwenziwa."

"Manje, nokho, sesenyuse umsebenzi waze wafinyelela ezingeni lamazwe ngamazwe, ngokwenza indawo yamabhizinisi eseyimile izimpande ngokugcwele, egcwele futhi ngemisebenzi yokubhala, iziteshi zama-cumputer zabantu ngabodwana ngasese, ukufeksa, uku-email nokutholakala kwi-intenet."

Indawo yezamabhizinisi endaweni ephansi yokuzijabulisa e-Sun City, iphethwe umphathi we-DTP uSonia Jansen. Umabhalane oqeqeshwe ngokugcwele futhi osebenza ngokugcwele uzonakekela izidingo zabavakashi anikeze ukuhlangana phakathi kwabo nomnyago we-DTP lapho bekudinga. " Inikeza isitobhi sesitolo esisodwa ngokupheleleyo." Kusho uHerliane.


Isebenza phakathi kuka-7 ekuseni no-7 ebusuku phakathi nezinsuku naphakathi kuka-8 ekuseni kuya ku-1 emini ngoMgqibelo nangeSonto. Indawo yamabhizinisi izonikeza abavakashi izinto okubalwa kuzo okulotshwe kube kuthathelwe emshinini wokubamba inkulumo ubuye uyikhiphe, ukwenziwa kwamagama, ukuhlela nokubhala. Imisebenzi ejwayelekile yehhovisi izoba nokukopishwa ngemibala nangokumnyama nokumhlophe, Ukutholakala kwezinto zokubhala ezilintwentwe nokubhala nge-PowerPoint. Izivakashi zizokwazi ukuthenga izinto zokubhala bese imibhalo yabo ihlanganiswe futhi iboshwe.

Abasebenzi bazobekisela izivakashi banikezele ngezinto zokuxhumana ezifano ne-email, ukufeksa nezigijimi.


Umnyango we-DTP uhlangabezana nohla olubanzi lwezidingo ezibalulekile ekuhlanganeni okunempumelelo, kubalwa amaphepha ezaziso, amabhukwana nezincwajana, amakhadi alengiswayo anamagama, amakhadi endawo namaphepha okulotshwe kuwo ukudla komuntu ngamunye kanye namakhadi abantu omsebenzi.

Umsebenzi wokubhala ungenziwa amakhasi futhi indawo inenhlanganisela yamabhuku egcwele umbala wePantone okubalwa kuyo owegolide nowesiliva. Amaphepha okwazisa anganikezelwa ngezimo ezinkulu ezinjengo-A2, A1 no-A0. Iyavulwa kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuMgqibelo kusukela ngo-8 ekuseni kuya ku-5 ntambama bese ivalwa ngeSonto.

"I-Sun City njengendawo lapho kubanjelwa khona imihlangano yezamabhizinisi manje ayilinganiswa nalutho ngokwempela, "kusho uHerliane.

	Izindlela ezinconywayo
Kusuka eGoli, eGauteng landela umgwaqo uN1 eNyakatho. Thatha uN4 ujike uye ngase-Witbank. Dlula eWitbank naseMiddelburg. Jikela ngakwesokudla emgwaqeni uR33 uye eCarolina. Qhubekela phambili udlule idolobha iCarolina. Jikela ngakwesokudla emva kokudlula ulayini wesitimela emgwaqeni uR33 kuN17 eMbabane Amsterdam. Lomgwaqo ukuholela ngqo eposini lomngcele i- Oshoek. Qhubeka kusuka emngceleni uye edolobheni iMbabane. Jikela ngakwesokudla ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo ezikhomba i-"Manzini" kuMR3. Landela umgwaqo omkhulu uMR3 uya eManzini. Jikela kwesokunxele kuMR103 ngase-"Ezulwini - Malkens". Jikela kwesokudla kohamba phezulu. Landela uMR103 "Ezulwini" ngangamakhilomitha amathathu uze uqhamukele eRoyal Swazi Sun ngakwesokudla. Kuno - Lugogo Sun ngakwesokudla sakho ne-Ezulwini Sun/Vacation Club ngakwesokunxele. Kusuka eThekwini, eNatali thatha umgwaqo uN2 eNyakatho oya oPongola. Emakhilomitheni angu-20 ngaphambi kokuthi ufike oPongola, jikela ekudleni uye ngaseposini lomngcele iGolela. Landela umgwaqo ongena eSwaziland uye eBog Bud, Kusukela lapho uye emanzini. Kusuka eManzini landela umgwaqo oya eMbabane ongalinganiselwa emakhilomitheni angu-30 ubukude uya e-Ezulwini Valley. Kusuka eNelspruit, eMpumalanga, landela uN4 uye ngaseMpumalanga. Thatha umgwaqo ojikela esinxeleni oya eKaapmuiden. Lomgwaqo ukuholela ngqo eposini lomngcele iJepps Reef. Landela umgwaqo oya ePigg's Peak uhambe njalo uye uyoshona phansi emgwaqeni ongu T lapho ujikele esinxeleni uye eMbabane. Ibhodi elikhombisayo iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley ukuya ngasekudleni.




I-Sibaya Resort ne-Entertainment World (Sibaya) izokhombisa ukutshalwa kwezimali okusha okudle izigidi zamarandi ezewu-890 kwingqalasizinda eKwaZulu- Natal

Indikimba enkulu yeSibaya Resort ne-Entertainment Worlds iphakamisa ugqozi lwamaZulu iqoqele ndawonye ubuhle bokwehlukana kwamasiko, namafa, imilando, futhi ibonise konke okwenza iKwaZulu - Natal ibe isiFundazwe esingafani nezinye nesishintshashintshayo. Isibaya ihlanganisa ubuciko bamasiko emvelo kaZulu, ubuciko bokwakhiwa kwezindlu, izindaba zasendulo ezinobuciko bezesayensi yemisebenzi ethile, nendlela yesimanje. Ukuqamba umqondo owumlingo neqiniso empilweni, ukuhlala kokuphithana kuyisikhashana kuzobonakala ngobungcweti, kuzohalalisela. Kunokuthi halalisa ubuhle bemvelo bendawo ezungezileyo. I-Afrisun KZN izindawo eziwu-2000 ezibukwayo manje ukulungiselwa ukupaka ezihlelelwe ukwamukela izidingo zokupaka okuphithizayo. Indawo ihlelelwe futhi nezinqola, amabhasi namathekisi.

Indawo: Indawo itholakala phakathi kuka-N2 no-M4, ngaseNingizimu nje ka-M27 (Umdloti Beach Interchange). Indawo ingangamamitha awu-20 ngaphezu kolwandle futhi iyindawo ephakeme kunazo zonke izindawo ezizungezile, ujabulele ukubona kanye kanye ugu kusuka eThekwini kuya e-Umdloti Beach nezindawo ezizungezile ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo. Ukuzijabulisa; Izivakashi zizozijabulisa ngezinhlobonhlobo zezokujabula nokuhehayo. ISibaya izonikeza izivakashi indawo yokuphumula, yokudla, yokuphuza nokuhlanganyela lapho ingekho imidlalo yasekhasino nezinto zakhona, konke kungenise ngobuhlakani ekujabuleni okuphelele. ISibaya ayiyona indawo yempilo yasekhasino kuphela nje. Iyindawo lapho kugujwa khona ubuhle besiko likaZulu. I-Zulu Encounter, indlu yokulalela enezihlalo eziwu-1000, izokhombisa izinto zasebusuku nalapho kudlalwa khona imidlalo. Umkhiqizo obalulekile okhombisa ngempilo nezikhathi zeNkosi uCetshwayo izovula inkundla. I-Zulu Encounter izoletha KwaZulu - Natal umbukiso we-Afrika ophilayo

ISibaya futhi izonikeza isivakashi ubungcweti bonke boqobo kwi-Zulu Village, egcwele izindawo zokudla, imakethe edayisa ezamasiko omdabu, ihholo lemicimbi, umdanso wokushaywa kwezigubhu, abaculi nezimbongi, ukulwa ngezinduku nabaxoxi zindaba. Izinyanga ezilapha ngokwesintu nabaprofethi bazosho ngempilo nangekusasa lesivakashi esinesibindi ngokwanele ukungena emgedeni wesangoma. Kwenziwani lapho: Isakhiwo esikhulu esinesiqongo sezimu, esakhiwe ukukhombisa ukufanekisa ubungcweti bokwakhiwa kwezindlu zakaZulu, esinezinhlangothi ezingamaphiko esinxeleni nasekudleni, anezidlu zehotela zezivakashi eziwu-200. Lezizimpondo zikhombisa izimpondo zenyathi enkulu yaseKapa nendlela iNkosi uShaka eyayihlela ngayo amabutho uma kuliwa impi eminyakeni yamakhulu ayi-19. ISibaya sizohlanganisa izingxenye ezintathu: Ikhasino, iSibaya nendawo yokuzithokozisa, kubalwa nekhasino enemishini yokugembula ewu-800 namatafula awu-26,indawo yokulungisa izinwele kanye nezimbitshana zePrive ezinendlu yokuphumula yangasese, indlu yokuphumula yabanamakhadi eMVG, ihotela elinohlobo lwezindlu zenkanyezi enamakhona awu-4 eziwu-200, izindawo zokuthengisa ukudla notshwala ezinhlobonhlobo, izinto zemindeni zokuzithokozisa, inkundla eyindlwana yemidlalo enhlobonhlobo enezihlalo eziyi-2500 engangenisa abeze edilini abawu 0-500. IZulu umgubho obalulekile wesiko likaZulu, unikwa indawo futhi ubukiswe ezindaweni zokuzithokozisa. IZulu lizonika abavakashela eSibaya imibukiso ejabulisa ezindabeni zasendulo. Okuqanjiweyo, izinganekwane kanye namasiko abantu abadumile bendabuko base-Afrika. Amagumbi awu-200 akusasa e-Tropical Lodge, nendawo yeKwaZulu - Natal Tourist Information. Umklamo we-Afrisun KZN uzoveza okunye ukutshalwa kwezimali okuhlobaneni kwengqalasizinda ngengxenye yohlelo olukhulu lwezindawo ezizungezile.

Ukudla kwaseSun International
Akukaze kube khona esikhathi esilufifi eCarnival City! Uyamenywa ukuzoziphumulela kwenye yezindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala noma ujabulele uhlobo lokudla oluyi-five star kwenye yezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla eziphambili kakhulu.

Ukudla; izindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala nezitolo zekhofi. Ukudla; iLotta Foods indawo ethengisa ngokudla engafaniswa nezinye nenobungcweti obugabiselayo, iLotta Foods ukudla kwasekhishini okumangalisayo nokubabazekayo ezinhlotsheni zokudla okutholakala kunoma iyiphi indawo ethengisa ngokudla engxenyeni eseNingizimu yezwe, ngamanani aphansi ngendlela emangalisayo. Itafula eligcwele ukudla linikeza i-boboetjie, okhari, i-carvery, inkukhu yethandori kanye nezitshalo ezigcwele sengathi ingadi, ezisitimiwe. Kulandelwa ukudlana okungatheni okungamakhekhana athelwe ukhasitadi, okunye okumuncwana noma okubabayo nokudlana okumnandi kakhulu okugcinwa ngakho edineni kwazo zonke izinhlobo. Uma ufuna ukuvula inhliziyo, iLotta Foods indawo okumele ube kuyo - kuyinani elilodwa, yidla ngendlela oyithandayo, ukuziphonsa ekudleni nje. I- Matssuya Pacific Restaurant; uma ukunambitha kwakho kushintshela kokushisayo kakhudlwana, iMatsuya Pacific Restaurant izosuthisa ngisho nolokokunambitha osekukhathele. Ikhishi lamasiko aseMpumalanga linohla kusuka ezifubeni zenkukhu eziyolisiwe kuya ekudleni okuwuswidi nokumuncu okwenza umzuzu wokunambitha ungakhohleki. I-Squires Legendary Grills; Okwabo okuhamba phambili isiteki - inyama yesinqe ethanjisiwe nejuzayo i-T-bone isidlo sosuku. Ichachambiswe ngokuyikonakona noma ibekwe etsheni elishisayo. I-Squires Loft yaziwa ngenyama yabo yenkomo ewuhlobo oluphambili, elungiswe kahle yasikelwa okuhle kodwa. I-Giovanni; Ukudla okuqamba izinga elisha eNingizimu Afrika lekhishi lase_Ithali, eligcizelela ubuhle obubukekayo nobunobuhlakani ngendlela obuvezwa ngayo, ubumsulwa nokunambitheka. Izinto ezifana namasaladi ahlwabusayo eMozzarella, ophasta batamatisi nabakakhilimu, namaphiza enziwe ngogqozi awokunambitheka ongakulindela e-Ithali. I-Ocean Basket; Ikhishi lamazwe ngamazwe futhi abadli bedina bangajabulela ukwahlulwa kwi-Hors D' Oerve imbaza yaseKapa ebhakiwe eyenziwe ngososi webhotela likagalige. Ngokwesigaba esikhulu, ama-langoustine aphakeme kakhulu, njengezinhlobonhlobo zokudla kwasolwandle - ulwandle lwezibiliboco ezivezwa ngokwehlukana futhi okujatshulelwa kakhulu izingcweti ezithengisa ngokudla okusheshayo eziholayo, uma udinga ukudla ujahile. I-Londo Pie, Sausage Sloon, Maharani Curry, Milky Lane, Juicy Lucy, KFC, Little Leonard's, Giovanni Express. Lezi izindawo zingasetshenziswa futhi nayizivakashi ezize ePocket Park.

Ama-Showbar. I-SuperSport Arena Sportbar yokuvuselela amandla, amagangangozi, ngena ngokungangabazi eSuperSport Arena Sports'Bar lapho ungabuka khona imidlalo idlalwa bukhoma isakazwa kumabonakude uvezwa emphemeni omkhulu nasezindongeni ze-video. Umoya uwugesi futhi kukhona ngisho nemidlalo ye-video yabadala yalabo abazizwa bedinga okuyikonakona kwempela. Yizwa isigqi sase-Afrika ubuka amabhendi edlala. Izandla zenza into yazo okungakaze kubonwe. Ithuba leSuperbet layo yonke inhlobo yomdlalo wakho liyatholakala. I-Magic Bar; Thatha isikhashana uzikhiphe ngokuphuza uziphumulele e-Magic Bar. Ukudla nokuzithokozisa
Hlala uncike ubuke umbukiso endaweni esandlu enompheme enezihlalo eziwu-5000. Kunanezinto eziningi zokudlala zezingane nezokuzithokozisa kusuka kwesanda kukhishwa i-Ster -Kinekor ukupenda ubuso nemidlalo ye-video.

Icinnema tropolis - Iqoqo lamabhayisikobho awu-6 nezihlalo eziwu-900, abukisa izithombe ezisanda kukhishwa ngu-Ster-Kinekor - odume kakhulu esifundeni okwamanje ongenayo neyodwa ibhayisikobho. I-Big Top; I-Big Top, umpheme onezihlalo eziwu-5000 wemidlalo enhlobonhlobo waseCarnival City owavulwa ngoDesemba ka-1999, ekuqubuleni lomculo ongafaniswa nalutho nezinto ezibukwayo "Cirque du Carnival" Selokhu yavulwa iBig Top seyiveze izinto ezingefaniswe ngabantu abadumile bamazwe ngamazwe abafana noHelmut Lotti, uBryan Ferry noSmokie. Isingenise futhi ububenyebenye besibhakela esiqhwiza umentshisi, "Night of Legends". I-Night of Legends isisikhombise abadlali besibhakela okubalwa kubo nodumile wakuleli u-"Baby" Jake Matlala, nomdlali sibhakela futhi wase-Eastern Cape uHawk Makebula. Ngo-March 2000, uHelmut Lotti wabonisa i-"Out of Africa" ne "Best of Classics" emakhonsathini akhe, okwabonakala kweyenkulu impumelelo yaphinda futhi, iCarnival City yakhombisa ngokwesithembiso ukutshengisa ukuthokoza okuyisimangaliso endaweni eyisimangaliso. Ababukeli bakuthanda ukubuyisela kwakhe amaculo adumile aseNingizimu Afrika nokwengeza ekwenyukeni kwezinga lemali nasekujabuleleni kwazo zonke izinto zikaHelmut Lotti, ingxenye yesibili yombukiso yagqamisa uMichael Junior, owajabulisa ababukeli ngobukhona bakhe eshashalazini obelekwe ubuhle nezwi lakhe elihle ngokumangalisayo. UBryan Ferry isihlabani sePop, owokuqala neRoxy Music owazamazisa iCarnival City ngo-April. UFerry, omunye wesithunzi esingapheliyo somculo, wagaleleka esakhiweni esisha sekhasino yaseBrakpan. IBig Top isiziveze ukuba enhle indawo kusuka ekuzwakaleni endlini nasekubukeleni uhlezi, njengoba iziphephezelo zisendaweni ekahle kakhulu. I-Big Top, ibhukula ngokushesha ukuqala ukuba nkulu kwezomculo eGauteng. Izincwajana zokukhona okulingana nezidingo ezibalulekile nokuzihlelela ziyatholakala  ngaphakathi, njengoba izidingo zingafani kwikhasimende ngekhasimende. Okwalapho kuthengiswa khona ngotshwala kutholakala ngokukweleta ngamakhadi noma ngokuthenga ngokheshi okwejwayelekile. Ngokutholakala kwayo endaweni enhle kakhulu, ingqalasizinda emangalisayo nalo lonke uhla lokudla nokokuphuza. Inhlalakahle yaseCarnival City inikeza indawo esezingeni lomhlaba. Inkudla; Yenza ubusuku ngayo: Inkundla yethu enezihlalo eziwu-350 izokwenza uhlale esihlalweni sakho ube ubuka imidlalo yethu elangazelekayo yenkundla.

Ukujabula kwezingane ngeMagic Company. Ina-Three Ring Circus; U-Ring One iyiMagic Jungle okungena onemvume - indawo enezinto zokudlala ezithambile zezingane ezineminyaka ewu-4 kuya ku-10. Abadala abavunyelwe ngaphandle uma ehamba nengane! Lelitende elinemibala yonke yesekisi line-Barbie Wolrd, iPlay Station World, nendlu yokuzipenda ngopende bemibala, amabhayisikili amancane kanye neKids Karaoke, ingabalwa indawo ethambile yokudlala egqame ngemibala yezingane, ukuthi zikhwele ezintunjeni ezinkulu, amanethi okukhwela nebhola lesiziba. U-Ring Two indawo enhle ngendlela emangalisayo yokuzithokozisa yemindeni yeminyaka yonke enolayini abawu-12 beCosmic Ten-Pin Bowling, amatafula endawo yokubhukuda esitayela saseMelika, indawo yebhodi lokushesheleza namatafula okudlala ibhola lomoya. U-Ring Three, Okusha ukuxhumana kwe-Computer nemidlalo yokulingisa kuyatholakala. Ku-Ring Three kubalwa izimoto eziwu-8 zohlobo lweDaytona zomjaho nesimbuluzo esisha se-Star Wars. Yini ungazami inhlanhla yakho emidlalweni yokuhlengwa kokudlala ngeqiniso lapho amathikithi angawinwa khona bese eshintshwa ePize Shop ukuthola uhlelo lwemiklomelo emangalisayo.



Lapho ikhona 
Indawo engangamahekthari awu-44 eBrakpan ekhawuliswe umgwaqo omkhulu okhokhelwayo u-N17 oya eNyakatho, uR-23 (Heidelberg Road) oya eMpumalanga, u-R554 (Elsburg Road) oya eNingizimu ne Century Road oya eNtshonalanga.

Indawo yokuhlala ehotela. Isivakashi sehotela laseCarnival Club sizothokozela konke iCarnival City enakho. ICarnival Club de'cor iyisitayela futhi ilungele labo abafisa ukuziphumulela bekude nesixhokoxhoko sezakhiwo. ICarnical Club inokuthembela kwezivakashi kwangasese nokomuntu ngayedwana, kusukela kwamahle nahlotshiswe kahle amagumbi nezindawo lapho kwamukelwa khona kuya kwemangalisayo indawo yokuhambahamba. Isimo esithule sithe cwaka nokunakekelwa okwedlulele kunika abavakashi igunya lokujabulela isikhathi ngaphandle nje nangaphambi kokuthi baze bangene ekhasino nokusebenzisa izinto zokuzijabulisa ezingaphakathi. I-Road Lodge, Igugu lemali elimangalisayo kwezinhle nezihlotshiswe ngokumangalisayo izindlu eziwu-94 zaseRoad Lodge, etholakala kahle eduze kweCarnival City, eduze nomgwaqo. Ivulwa amahora angu-24 ngosuku, iRoad Lodge incike ekubalulekeni kwemali nokutholakala ngayo. Ukubiza kwezindlu ezikahle zibiza ngokwehlukana ngokoyedwa, ababili noma abathathu abantu abahlala kuyo ngokuhlanganyela, ezinhle nezihlotshiswe kahle izindlu.


Ukuthenga. Zitike noma utike othandiweyo wakho kakhudlwana ngokuthenga eCarnival City. I-Carnival city inesikhathi sentokozo kuzo zonke izitolo! Khetha phakathi kweziqeda phunga noma okuhambisana nakho. Thatha uhambo endaweni evulekile eWaners noma impilo emhlabeni wemifanekiso ehlekisayo eCarnival Studio Store. Gcina izinyo lakho liwuswidi liphilile noma zitholele iCD oyithandayo!

Imishini yokudlala njengokungabonwa ihlo, izindawo ezidayisa ngokudla okuphambili, ezithengisa ngotshwala ezishisayo khona, imibukiso, izitolo namabhayisikobho. Kukhona okuthile kwawo wonke umuntu, uyazikhethela ukuthi ufuna ukuba ubani. Ikhasino yaseCarnival City inogqozi olushayisa ngovalo. Izinsimbi. iminsenenezo, ukukhanya nohleko okutholayo ebusuku. (njenge-Dream Machine, iSuper Slam nePoker Magic) kanye neMillenium Mania ngomklomelo omncane nje olingene izigidi ezimbili zamarandi. Imidlalo yamatafula
Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli noma kumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukubekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.

Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino owithandayo!

Imibuzo? Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi udlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo esinawo kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa - ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Ezokukweleta 
Amakhadi okukweleta; Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangampela. I-American Express, i-Diners, namakhadi e-Gold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. I-Amercan Express isivumela kuphela ukwamukela amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500.

Mayelana nokukweleta thintana nomphathi wekhasino osemsebenzini noma umphathi wemishini osemsebenzini ngolwazo oluthe xaxa. Amasheke. Amasheke abantu nje kanye namakhadi okukweleta ahambisana nawo agaranta isheke azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esingangezinsuku eziwu-14, ehambisana nomazisi wangampela. Amasheke agarantiwe yibhange angamukelwa uma ehamba nomazisi wangampela nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta, yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha ngosuku. Uyacelwa ukuthi uthintane nomshayi sisefo ngemininingwane emayelana nohlobo lwesheke ongalusebenzisa.

Imishini yokukhipha imali (ATM's) ingatholakala eduze kwedesika lomshayi sisefo elikhulu enkundleni yasekhasino (amatafula), eduze kwe-Kingsbar emishinini esenkundleni, eduze neJoker Bar enkundleni yemishini naseduze kwedesika leMVG enkundleni yemishini. Ama-ATM's ayatholakala amahora awu-24 ngosuku. Ama-Travellers' Cheques; Wonke ama-Travellers' Cheques ayamukelwa kanye nencwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe noma umazisi waseNingizimu Afrika. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe edumile uma ufuna izingcezu edesikini likakheshi ekhasino. Ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthola amarandi aseNingizimu Afrika, sicela uthintane nomnyango wezezimali. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe iyadingeka uma ushintsha imali. Bonke abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika abahleli okwesikhashana nabahleli unomphela benencwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe abavunyelwe ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe.

Amakhadi eMaestro. Amakhadi eMaetro angasetshenziswa nomazisi odingekayo noma inombolo eyimfihlo.


Imidlalo yamatafula
Uma ujabulela ukudlala amatafula, kukhona uhla lokuzikhethela lwe-American Roulette, Poker, Blackjack nekhethekile i-Diamond Rush Progressive Blackajck. ICarousel inamatafula awu-37 esewonke, wonke anabaphathi abaqeqeshwe kahle nokukhokhelwa njalo.

Umbhoshongo ophakeme onezitezi ezine wendawo enkulu yamatafula unikeza ukukhanya nendawo enomoya nethuba lokudlala i-American Roulette, Blackjack nePoker ukwengenza kwi-Diamond Rush. Ungathola ithuba lokuwina umklomelo osukela ku-R50000 ematafuleni e-Diamond Rush BlackJack ngokuvele nje ubeke omunye u-R5 kalula wokubheja. Ukuhlanganiswa kokuwina 0-7 abathathu bamadayimane - isikhokhele ngesikhathi isidlule u-R1000 000.

Uhla kwi-American Roulette lusuka ku-R5 kuya ku-R100 kwinombolo, kodwa ukugcina okuphakeme kuyatholakala ngesicelo. Isigcino seBlackjack neDiamond Rush siqala ku-R50, sigcine ku-R1000. I-Poker Ibiza kusuka ku-R25 kuya ku-R250. Uma ufuna usizo ukufunda ukudlala imidlalo etholakala kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa, ngasese uma uthanda. IGiovannis inikeza ukunakekelwa kwangempela kwase-Ithali nanjengendlela ehlotshiswe ngayo, ngetshe elihashazelayo elingaphakathi nesiketekete esilengayo kanye nendawo elungiswe kahle ngaphandle engaphezu kodonga kulabo abajabulela umuzwa nokudla I-Pizza

ISquire Loft Exporers Club, iphupho labathandi besiteki, inikeza uhla lwenyama ethambileyo enhle ngendlela emangalisayo, kanye nokuningi abathandi benyama abangazitika ngako. I-Curry Tarven, Lokhu akukona kwalabo abasheshe baphathwe isinxi senhliziyo. Woza uzojabulela ikhishi langempela laseMpumalanga uzuzwele ubungcweti nobumnandi obumangalisayo bengxenye yezwe. Udumo luka-Breyani wabo, iCurry Tarven inikeza ukunambitheka kwase-India ongasoze wakukhohlwa. Dansa ubusuku bonke nabangani, ngomgqumo wamabhendi aziwayo noma ujabulele umbukiso womdlalo ohlekisa ngokuhlabeza! Izindawo nasezindaweni zokudlala imishini.

Ezokuzithokozisa.
I-Cheyenne Saloon: I-Cheyenne Saloon isibe enye yezindawo ezinkulu yezokuzithokozisa isikhathi eside, ye-Pitoli ne-Goli, ingenisa izihambeli ezithanda uSmokie, uBarry Hilton, uKevin "Bloody" Wilson uGarry kanye nama-Peacemaker, iBallyhoo, iBalrney Brothers, i-Abbot kanye ne Grabb kanye namaculo amnandi nemidanso emangalisayo efana ne- "Rocket neSpies", ne-"Take This", i-"Inferno" kanye ne-"Magic Moments". I-Cheyenne Saloon ivuliwe njalo ngoLwesihlanu neMigqibelo ebusuku kusuka ku-19hoo, ngesikhathi esijwayelekile semibukiso sika-21hoo. Amathikithi ayo yonke imibukiso yase-Cheyenne ayatholakala lapho kudayiswa khona amathikithi noma eminyango ngamanani ajwayelekile okungena emibukisweni u-R20 umuntu. ULwesihlanu  neMigqibelo ebusuku. 

IKamp Kwena - IKamp Kwena manje isine - Tumble Town bese inikeza izingane ukujabula okunakekelwe, ukudla nokuzithokozisa ngabasebenza khona abazimisele kuzo zonke izimpelasonto nangawo wonke amaholide ezikole ngemibukiso yangempela yemilingo. IKamp Kwena ikhona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wena nezingane zakho niyakujabulela ukuphumula nizithokozele eCarousel noma ngabe kuthiwa ulapho ihora elilodwa noma usuku. IMagic Company inohlelo olude lwemidlalo yomhume, yabancane nabadala, noma ngabe uthanda iPac-man noma ushayela imoto yomjaho yohlobo lwe-formula 1, konke kukhona, kubalwa nomdlalo wesitimela esihle ukuhamba ngaso kwabancane. Amadili ezingane angahlelwa ngokubhuka.




IGalofu
ICarousel ingumxhasi omkhulu weyokuqala nowokuphela kwayo iSenior Amateur Golf Tour South Africa. Isenzeko sokuqala senzeka ngo-1997 no 1999 wabona thina sixhasa uhambo onyakeni wabo wesithathu.

IGauteng Central Series yohambo iqala ngomhlaka-16 ku-August 1999. Ukungenela kukunye uR200.00 futhi umdlalo uwodwa udlala ngaphezu kwezinsuku eziwu-3 kanye nezimbobo eziwu-54 nesigcino sezithiyo sika-18.
Ngomhlaka-5 kuya ku-7 ku-October 1999 umdlalo useModderfontein G. C.
Ngomhlaka-19 kuya ku-21 ku-October 1999 eBenoni C. C.
Ngomhlaka-2 kuya ku-4 ku-November eRoodepoort C. C.

ICarousel yavulwa ngo-1991 futhi seyibe enye yamakhasino anempumelelo ase-Sun International. Ithuthukiswa izivakashi zasemini emqondweni, indlela eyiyo nesebenza ngayo ibhukulele izivakashi zosuku.

Ukuhamba uza eCarousel usuka kwenkulu indawo yethu yokupaka, uhlangana ngokushesha nendadi yethu yamarose ebukeka kahle kakhulu egqamisa iCarousel Horses nokugqama kwamanzi asabekayo nendawo enesiqongo sebhilidi egcwele ukukhanya kwemvelo. Indawo enkulu evulekile isiza ukuvela kwamagilasi amawindi nophahla ngamathayela afakwe kahle phansi nezinsila ezinhle zikamabula. Sixhasa indawo enkulu ewumbhoshongo yokubuka I-Video senzela izingane, kanye nendawo lapho kunakekelwa  abantwana egadwe ngendlela enokucophelela, kanye nendawo enkulu yokudlala abadala egqamise kokubili imishini yokudlala namatafula.

Ingqikithi yengilazi enombala ibuyekezwe ekhasino ngengilazi enombala eyisiqongo emboze indawo yamatafula. Esigabeni sokuqala iCarousel yayiyikhasino enkulu kunawo wonke engxenyeni eseNingizimu. ICarousel idumile futhi ngendawo yayo enkulukazi yokuzithokozisa. ICheyenne Saloon esifakela umculo esiwaziyo nemidanso emihle kakhulu. Siyindawo edume umhlaba wonke ngomdlalo wesibhakela odlalwa lapha futhi sekuke kwadlalwa ezinkulu ezinjengo-Roberto Duran, Corrie Sanders, Baby Jake Matlala, Vuyani Bhungu nomunye omusha kakhulu uLehlohonono Ledwaba. Sinikeza okuthile kuwo wonke umuntu futhi selokhu yavulwa seyibe isikhonkwane ku-N1 eNyakatho nePitoli. Ngabanikazi bezigidi ngokushesha abawu-90 kumele sibe abangcono kakhulu ukubheja kubo.



Ulwazi lokuxhumana


Isun International - Umhlaba ovusa amadlingozi ngokuphindwe kankulungwane

 I-Sun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika - lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni - nangaphandle, ngamaqembu e-Sun International agqame kwangu-20 amahotela aphezulu emhlabeni jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamathalente, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo - noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlangano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile.

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi, noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyethembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!

Ikhasino
Ikhadi elikhulu lokuwina eGaborone Sun kufanele kube ikhasino. Ngamatafula awu-11, iProgressive neMillion Mania imishini yokudlala, ungashaya umklomelo omkhulu ngale kwesikhathi! Ngomdlalo ongami ndawo, kusuka ngo-13:00 kuze kube nini, abasebenzi bethu abaqeqeshiwe, abanele nabawaziyo umsebenzi bakhona la ukukusiza kuzo zonke izidingo zakho.

Indawo yethu enedumela yokudlala izokudlulisela komunye umhlaba. Ngokuba nobungcweti nobuchwepheshe ezandleni zakho, eGaborone Sun uyisivakashi sethu esiqavile nesiyigugu.

Imihlangano
IGaborone Sun iyindawo enhle kakhulu ukubambela imihlangano, kusomabhizinisi ofuna ukuphuma ngaphandle emsindweni wedolobha elikhulu.

Akukhona kodwa okukhona ukuba nayo yonke into edingekayo ngaphakathi, indawo yemihlangano, namagumbi ebhodi, kodwa kukhona nezindawo zokuthengisa ngotshwala nezokuzithokozisa ezinhle kakhulu kwimihlangano nje. Impahla nomsebenzi, umata osodongeni nodonga, isilungiso moya, ugesi ongagadwe muntu onezinkinobho zokwenza kube luvivi, ama-PA systems, izinto ze-Black-out, ucingo, izinto ezidingeka emihlanganweni, imipheme ephathekayo - I- 1x Da-lite, iPicture King Overhead projector, imibhobho ezimelayo kanye nama-Portable PA system azimelayo, inkundla yokudansa ephathekayo, ama-lectens aphathekayo, umshini wokudlala amakhasethi, izinto zesiteji eziphathekayo noma ama-Fashion ramps TV, imishini ye-VHS video, iPiped music, i-3 Phase power, ucingo, amabhodi amhlophe evideo projector, iprojector ewu-35mm yemifanekiso, imilenze yokudebela I-Flipchart.

Ukwengeza, indawo ifakwe izingcingo ukuhumusha kanye kanye nedokodo lokuhumusha lesikhathi eside elibheka yonke indawo yomhlangano. Indawo yezitolo (itholakala phakathi nehotela), ezemibiko, ezokukopisha, ezobubhalane, ezezimbali, ezokuhumusha, ukuxhumana ngocingo, imifanekiso nezingcingo.

Igumbi lokuhlangana, Igumbi elikhulu lokuhlangana: Lingahlukaniswa amagumbi amathathu. Ukwengeza kukhona amanye amagumbi okuxoxisana awu-5 angasetshenziselwa ukuhlangana. Indawo inakho konke ngaphakathi nendawo engumhume eyindlela yokuhlanganisa ezinye nendawo yokuhlangana okokuqala enendawana ethengisa ngotshwala.

Ukudla 
Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla; iGoombays, indawo ethengisa ngokudla kwe -a la carte inikeza ukudla kwamazwe ngamazwe nentokozo. ISavuti, indawo ethengisa ngokudla esheshayo enikeza ukudla kusematafuleni akhona kwasemini nokwasebusuku. Lena indawo yokudla kwasekuseni kwe-English noma kwe-Continental. Indlu yokugcina izimbali nendawo elungisiwe kahle ngasendaweni yokubhukuda. Indawo yokudla okulula nokunye okungatheni. NgeSonto: Ukudla kwasemini okulungiswe kahle.

Izindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala, Imishini yokudlala, Ingxubevange yotshwala obuxutshiwe, indlu yokuphumula. Izikhathi: u-10hoo kuze kuvalwe indawo ethengisa ngotshwala yasekhasino yokuzithokozisa (ngaphandle kwabadlali bamatafula). Izikhathi: u-13hoo kuze kuvalwe iPool Bar. Ezingadini zalapho kubhukudwa khona, izingxubevange zotshwala  noma okwakho okuthandayo okubandayo.




IFrancistown
Ikhasino iMarang itholakala ehotela iMarang eFrancistown, eBotswana.

Uphahla lotshani, isakhiwo samatshe nemihlobiso yamasiko esintu ase-Afrika kwasekhasino iMarang kudonsa ubu-Afrika bese iboleka umoya ofudumele nonenjabulo. Ukukhanya kukagesi, imisindo nezinsimbi zokuwina imiklomelo emikhulu zenza ikhasino ibe indawo okunesiqiniseko ukuyivakashela.

ISun International eGaborone Sun ilungele izinga elonobuntofontofo nenjabulo ngesikhathi futhi isendaweni enhle kwezamabhizinisi.

Amagumbi akunika ukuzizwa usekhaya ube ungekho ekhaya lapho ungaphumula noma uzizwele amahora athile usuphumile emsebenzini. Indawo enayo yonke impahla yokubambela imihlangano namagumbi ebhodi anikeza osomabhizinisi intokozo. Kukhona futhi izindawo zokuthengisa utshwala nezokuzithokozisa ezinhle kakhulu ekubambeni imihlanganywana nje. Zitholele kokudliwayo nokokuzithokozisa ezindaweni ezahlukene ezithengisa ngokudla. Ikhasino nemidlalo ejwayelekile yamatafula nemishini edumile yokudla yase Sun International yanza amaphupho aphumelele.

Ukuthenga: Izitolo phakathi ehotela, isitolo seCurio, indawo yokulungisa izinwele, indawo yobuhle, inkampani yezokuthutha, u-opharetha wezohambo, isikhungo samabhizinisi. Abadayisa ngezindlu kanye namabhange.

Indawo
IGaborone Sun itholakala eGaborone, inhlokodolobha yaseBotswana. Kuyimizuzwana nje embalwa kuphela ukusuka edolobheni nasesikhungweni samabhizinisi, ezakhiweni zikaHulumeni, naseNyuvesi yaseBotswana.

Isikhumulo sezindiza; Ukusebenza kwansukuzonke kwesikhumulo sezindiza okuqondile kuyatholakala eGaborone ukuya esikhumulweni sezindiza eGoli. INingizimu Afrika idlula ngaseBotswana no Comair ne SAA Express. Ezomoya zaseBotswana zisebenzisa uhlelo lwangaphakathi. Ukuxhumana kwaphesheya kwezilwandle kuyatholakala usebenzisa ezinye izindiza zakwamanye amazwe. Ulwazi lohambo lwamazwe ngamazwe. Ukulungiswa kwezimali zibe ukheshi, amasheke ezihambi, noma ngamakhadi okukweleta (I-American Express, iDinners Club Card, iMastercard, ne Visa). Imali iPula. Kuncono ukuqala ubheke ukuthi kushintsheka ngamanani anjani ngaphambi kokuvakasha. Amaposi omngcele waseGaborone noma ama-Visa.

IGaborone (eTlokweng) kusuka ku-07:00 kuya ku-22:00
ILobatse (ePionner Gate) kusuka ku-)7:00 kuya ku-20:00
IMmabatho (eRamatlabama) kusuka ku-07:00 kuya ku-20:00
Ngaphandle kwabaseNingizimu Afrika, zonke ezinye izivakashi kumele zithole kwezixhumana nabo ngezokuvakasha ukuthi iVisa iyadingeka noma cha. Yize noma kunjalo, kuyadingeka ukuthi uphathe incwadi yakho yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe nencwadi yokushayela ngazo zonke izikhathi. Uhambo lokuzijabulisa (luyalungiselwa) AmaSafari eya e-Okavango Swamps, eChobe nase Mermi Game Reserves, nakwezinye izindawo ongazithokozela.

Amagumbi ezitatanyiswa awu-38
Amasethi awu-3
Amagumbi a-Peraplegic awu-3
Isethi yokhethiweyo eyi-1

Inhlalakahle nokutholakalayo, zonke izindlu zinesilungiso moya nokufudumala okulungiselwe umuntu ngayedwa, umabona kude onemibala onemigudu ene-Satellite, ucingo, indawo yokugeza, isisefo, i-plug kagesi (engena i-220 volts AC, 50 cycles) nezomiso zinwele.




Imidlalo yamatafula
Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli noma kumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukubekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.
 
Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino oyithandayo!

Imibuzo? Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi udlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo esinawo kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa - ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.
