I-Black Jack
Umgomo womdlalo. Umgomo womdlalo ukudonsa isandla samakhadi angangenani elisondele ku-21 kunalawa aphethwe umdayisi, ngaphandle kokuqhuma okuwukudonsa angaphezu kuka-21. Isandla esiphethe amakhadi awu-2 ano-Ace nanoma imuphi u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing kubizwa ngeBlackjack bese kukhokha u-3 kuya ku-2.

Kudlalwa kanjani; Ukudlala, umdlali ngamunye kufanele abheje (okungenani okuncane okusetafuleni) ebhokisini lokubheja eliphambi kwakhe. Umphathi wetafula wabela umdlali ngamunye ikhadi elilodwa, bese ephinda futhi enika umdlali ngamunye elesibili yena azishiye nelilodwa. Wonke amakhadi abiwe abheke phezulu. Kuqala umdlali ongakwesokunxele somphathi, umdlali ngamunye kumele enze isinqumo esisodwa kwezinhlanu (buka ngezansi) esiqondene namakhadi amabili lawa abelwe wona, naleli khadi eliphethwe umphathi. Umphathi unikeza umdlali ngamunye ushintsho: Okokuqala, yima, ungathathi amanye amakhadi, Okwesibili, Donsa, Thatha elinye ikhadi noma amakhadi ukuze azinike amathuba okuthola okusondelene no-21, Okwesithathu, Wahlukanise, Uma umdlali abelwe amakhadi amabili, umdlali unikwe ithuba lokuzikhethela ukwahlukanisa amakhadi awadlale njengezandla ezimbili ezahlukene. Ngesikhathi umdlali ehlukanisa amakhadi, kufanele abheje, okulingana nenani abheje ngalo ekuqaleni, ekhidini lesibili ngaphambi kokuthi umphathi amabele elinye ikhadi. Uma lamakhadi amabili achithiwe kungamakhadi o-Ace, umdlali angathola elinye ikhadi lesandla ngasinye, kodwa uma omunye u-Ace abiwe, kungahlakazwa futhi. Inani, uma u-Ace kulezi zandla ngasinye ethathwa njengo-11. Okwesine, Ukuphinda kabili, umdlali angaphinda kabili isiteki sakhe kunoma yimaphi amakhadi amabili okungewona iBlackjack. Okwesihlanu, Ukudela, uma umdlali ebona ukuthi amakhadi akhe okuqala amabili akasona isandla esiqinile ukuthi angawina, angadela ukubheja kwakhe okuchaza ukuthi ulahlekelwa ingxenye yesiteki sakhe futhi amakhadi akhe ayasuswa. Angakwenza lokhu kuphela emva kokwabiwa kwamakhadi okuqala nangaphambi kokwabiwa kwamanye amakhadi. Akadeli ngo-Ace womphathi.

Isandla somphathi, uma isandla somphathi sinenani lika-16 noma ngaphansi, umphathi kufanele adonse elinye ikhadi. Uma isandla somphathi sinenani lika-17 noma ngaphezulu, umphathi kufanele ame. Ukulungisela ingozi ngemali, Uma ikhadi lokuqala likamphathi liwu-Ace, abadlali bangavikela ingozi ekubhejeni kwabo bavikele ukuthola kukamphathi iBlackjack. Lokho kusho ukuthi umdlali angabheja, kungabi ngaphezu kwengxenye yokubheja kokuqala, ngaphambi kwebhokisi lokubheja engxenyeni ebhaliwe ukulungisela ingozi. Uma umphathi ethola iBlackjack, ukubhejela ingozo kuyakhokhelwa kusuka ku-2 kuya ku-1 (lokho okulingana nokubheja kokuqala). Uma umphathi engayitholi iBlackjack, imali yokulungisela ingozi iyalahleka futhi umdlalo uyaqhubeka njengokujwayelekile. Ubani owinayo futhi ubani olahlekelwayo? Uma inani lesandla somdlali sisondela ku-21 kunaleso somphathi, umdlali uwina yonke imali (lokho akubhejele). Uma inani lesandla somphathi sisondela ku-21 kunaleso somdlali, umdlali uyalahlekelwa imali abheje ngayo. Uma inani lesandla somphathi lilingana nelomdlali, umdlali ugcina imali yakhe abheje ngayo (kuyamiwa). Uma umphathi nomdlali bobabili bethola iBlackjack, kuyamiwa. Uma umphathi eqhuma, bonke abadlali bayawushiya umdlalo bewine ngishi nemali. Uma umdlali enoBlackjack (okuwu-Ace kanye nelinye ikhadi elinesithombe noma u-10) umphathi engawutholi, umdlali ozokhokhelwa kusuka ku-3 kuya ku-2 emalini abheje ngayo. Uma umphathi enoBlackjack, umdlali engenawo, kodwa ebe enamakhadi awu-21, umdlali uzolahlekelwa imali yakhe.





Ezokukweleta
Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangampela. I-American Express, iDiners namakhadi eGold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000 (I-American Express isivumela kuphela ukuthatha amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768). Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500. Ukukweleta, sicela uthintane nomphathi wekhasino osebenzayo ngaleso sikhathi ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.
Amasheke, amasheke abantu nje awavunyelwe eBotswana.
Imishini yokukhipha imali emibili ephethwe ibhange iBarclays (eBotswana) nebhange iFirst National (eBotswana) iyatholakala ngaphakathi ekhasino. Amasheke ezihambi; amasheke ezihambi ayemukelwa. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; Yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe ukushintshwa ibe iPula - sicela uthintane nebhange elisehotela noma idesika lomlindisivalo. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka uma ushintsha imali yakwelinye izwe.




Ukudla nokokuzithokozisa
Imidlalo yokuphumula; Ubulunga beGolf Course Complimentary kweseceleni iGaborone Country Club. Ichibi lokubhukuda; amathawula echibi lokubhukuda ayatholakala. Izinkundla ezimbili zebhola lomphebezo lesimo sezulu lonke. Amarakhethi namabhola akhona. Izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalwa lishayelwa engosini yezindonga ezimbili ezinesilungiso moya. Amarakhethi namabhola akhona. Okuhehayo kwangaphakathi. IGaborone yakhethwa njengenhlokodolobha yeBotswana ngo-1965. INyuvesi iBotswana, iNational Museum ne-Art Gallery nenkundla yezemidlalo yesizwe konke kuyatholakala edolobheni. Umculo nemidlalo yeshashalazi kuyalungiselwa eMatisong Cultural Centre. Eduze nedolobha kukhona iGaborone neMokolodi Game Reserves. Uhambo lokuzijabulisa luyalungiselwa ukuya kwezinye izindawo abantu abazithandayo ngaphandle kweGaborone; ezifana no-Okavango Swamps, iChobe neMoremi Game Reserves.




Imidlalo yamatafula
Uma ubutatata bemishini bungakwenelisi thatha inselelo kwi-Roulette, iBlackjak noma iPoker

Sinikeza amatafula angu-6 eAmerican Roulette, ngalokukubheja okulandelayo kusuka kokuncane kuya kokukhulu: 1@ P2 - P50; 4@ P5 - P100; 1@ P10 - P200. amatafula angu-4 eBlackjack  nawo akhona ngalokukubheja okulandelayo kusuka kokuncane kuya kokukhulu: 2@ P20 - P500; 2@ p50 -P1000. Itafula leRaise Em Poker elinikeza ukubheja okuncane kuka-P21 okukhulu kuka-P200. Uma udinga usizo ekufundeni ukuthi idlalwa kanjani imidlalo edlalwa kumakhasino ethu. Singajabula ukukufundisa. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Izikhathi zokusebenza
Ingxenye yamatafula ekhasino ivulelwa umphakathi kusuka ngo-13;00 nsukuzonke.

Amatafula azohlala evuliwe kuze kube izintathakusa ekuseni, kuncike ezingeni lokusebenza. Ingxenye yemishini ivuliwe nsukuzonke kusuka ngo-10:00 kuze kube nini kodwa ivaliwe ngePhasika. I-Salon Prive isebenza kusuka ngo-20:00 kuze kube nini.




IMagic Poker
IMagic Poker umdlalo omusha ojabulisayo osuka eSun International okuvumela ukuba udlale iStud Poker ngokubheja kwe Progressive. Sesazise manje iMagic Poker Joker eyikhafi elikhulu, nebhokisi lokubheja leBluff elikhokhela amathuba ka-3 kuya ku-2 uma umdayisi engavuli.

Kudlalwa kanjani; Ukuba semdlalweni nokwabelwa amakhadi akho awu-5 kufanele ubheje kwi-Ante loc. Uma ufisa ukudlala ukubheja okuqhubekayo, kufanele ubeke kanye kanye. Lokhu kubheja kuhlale kuwu-R25 futhi kuzimele kokunye ukubheja. Umabi uzokwaba amakhadi awu-5 ewabhekise phansi kumdlali ngamunye emdlalweni nawu-5 kuyena nelingaphezulu libheke phezulu. Khumbula ukuthi iMagic Poker Joker ikhadi elikhulu. Kufanele manje unqume ukuthu ufisa ukuqhubeka nomdlalo ngokubheja ebhokisini lokubheja, okulingana nalokho kwe-Ante, noma uyasonga okuchaza ukuthi uzolahlekelwa ukubheja kwakho kokuqala kwe-Ante. Ngesikhathi konke ukubheja sekubekiwe umdayisi uzoveza amakhadi akhe. Uma unesandla esingcono kunesikamdayisi, uzokhokhelwa njengokwamathuba owathole etafuleni. Kodwa-ke uma umdayisi enesandla esingcono kunesenu, uzolahlekelwa yikho kokubili i-Ante yakho nokubheja kwasebhokisini lokubheja. Esikhathini lapho umdayisi engavuli kanti wena isandla sakho sikhona, ukubheja kwakho kuzokumela (awuwini futhi awulahlekelwa) futhi uzokhokhelwa ngisho imali yokubheja kwakho kwe-Ante. Uma isandla sakho singaveli futhi nomdayisi engavuli, kokubili ukubheja kwakho kwebhokisi nokwe-Ante kuzobuyela ngaphandle.

Ukubheja okuqhubekayo. Ukubheja okuqhubekayo kuzokukhokhela uma unesandla esilingana noma esingcono kene-apir yoJack. Ukubheja kufanele kubekwe kanye kanye ukubheja kwe-Ante, ngaphambi kokwabiwa kwamakhadi. Lokhu kubheja kukhokhela noma ngabe umdayisi uyavula noma akavuli. Umklomelo oqhubekayo obekiwe ukhokhelwa eRoyal Flush ngaphandle kweMagic Poker Joker. Ukubheja kwe Bluff; Ukubheja kweBluff kungaphandle kanti kungadlalwa uma ukholelwa ukuthi umdayisi uzovula. Ukudlala lokhukubheja kufanele  ubeke ukubheja ebhokisini lokubheja okulingana nokubheja kwakho kokuqala kwe-Ante bese ubheja kwiBluff emakiwe> Ukubheja kweBluff kufanele kube okuncane kuka-R25, bese kungaba ukuphindaphindwa ng-R25 kuze kube inani lokubheja kwe-Ante. Uma umdayisi eveza isandla sakhe, uma engenawo u-Ace/King noma okungcono, uzokhokhelwa u-3 kuya ku-2 ekubhejeni kwakho kweBluff. Kodwa-ke, uma evula uzolahlekelwa yilohkokubheja.

IPunto Banco
IPunto Banco umdlalo wekhadi wasekhasino odumile ovumela abadlali babhejele udonga noma baphikise udonga
Ukuthenga izingcezu. IPunto Bunco idlalwa ngezingcezu ezitholakala etafuleni kumphathi noma edesikini likamphathi. Isimo setafula. Itafula lePunto Banco ngezingxenye eziwu-3 zokubheja ngasecaleni ngalinye letafula. Indawo yePunto (umdlali). Inawo -yeBanco (udonga), kanye nengxenye yokubheja eseceleni ebizwa ngokuthi i-Tie, iDraw noma indawo i-Egalite. Abadlali abangu-14 bangahlala etafuleni, ngamunye nendawo yakhe yokubheja ngaphambi kwakhe. Ukwengeza kubadlali abahlezi, iPunto Banco ingangenisa inani labadlali abamile.

Kudlalwa kanjani. Umdlali ngamunye uyazikhethela ukubheja eceleni lePunto (umdlali) noma leBanco (ibhenka). Umdlali enesicathulo uwudonga. Inhloso yomdlalo ukuthola okusondelene nonombolo u-9 ngokungenzeka. Umdlali ohlezi ubheja ezindaweni zePunto, ukubheja kwePunto kusetshenziswa yiwo wonke umuntu. Ingxenye yePunto kanye nokubheja kweBunco kubekwa kwinombolo yokuvimba yeBunco ehambisana nenombolo ebekiwe ngaphambi komdlali. IPunto neBanco kwabelwa amakhadi amabili emunye ngamunye wabadlali. Ikhadi lesithathu lingabekwa esandleni ngasinye, kunvike emphumelweni wamakhadi okuqala amabili. Isandla esiwinayo yileso esithola amakhadi alinganiselwa enanini elisondle ku-9. Uma inani elihlanganisiwe lamakhadi lidlula ku-10, u-10 awunakwa (isibonelo. U-8 no-4 okulingana no-12, u-10 awunakwa, bese inani seliphelele kube u-2). U-10 noma ikhadi lesithombe kubalwa njengokungekho. Inani lamakhadi awu-2 lika-8 noma lika-9 libizwa nge-Natural. Ukwengeza ekubhejeni okukodwa iPunto noma iBanco, abadlali bangabheja futhi kwi-Tie okuwukuthi isamba senani lamakhadi esandleni sePunto sizofana nesamba senani lamakhadi asesandleni seBanco. Konke ukubheja kweTie kufanele kunikwe umphathi ukuze kubekwe. Esenzekweni seTie, ukubheja kwePunco neBanco kuyedluliselwa emdlalweni olandelayo, bese ukubheja kweTie kuyakhokhelwa ku-8 kuya ku-1. Abadlali kufanele babheje kokukodwa iPunto noma iBanco ukudonsa amakhadi.

ISalon Prive		
ISalon Prive yethu ingaphandle kwenkundla enkulu yekhasino, yenzelwe abadlali abaqavile. Sinikeza amatafula awu-2 e-America Roulette (i-P5 neP10) netafula leBlackJack (iP50). Lendawo ibekelwe kuphela abadlali.

Ukujabulela ukudlala kukhona imidlalo eminingi ongakhetha kuyona exhumene yonke nemiklomelo eqhubekayo okutholakala kuyo iMillion Mania.

Okungakusiza izitodlwana ezinompheme eziwu-3, zonke ziyadayisa futhi ziyahlenga, zitholakala ngasecaleni langakwesokudla lapho kungenwa ngakhona ekhasino. Imali iyadingeke ukudlala kuyo yonke imishini. Ukufaka kuqala ku-50t (ithebe) kuya ku-P5 (iPula)

I-American Roulette
I-American Roulette; I-American Roulette iyathokozisa, umdlalo wasekhasino ogcwele intokozo nonezinhlobo eziningi zokubheja. I-Roulette idlalwa ngezingcezu ezingajwayelekile ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. Lezi zingcezu zahlukaniswa ngemibala okwenzeka ukuthi izingcezu zomdlali ngamunye zihlukaniseke kwezabanye abadlali etafuleni. Lezi zingcezu zemibala azinanani noma kuphi ekhasino, futhi kufanele zishintshelwe kukheshi etafuleni uma umdlali eseqedile ukudlala. Abadlali bangathenga lezizingcezu zemibala ngokheshi kumphathi, noma basebenzise ikhadi lokukweleta ukuthenga izingcezu zenani edesikini likakheshi, ezingasetshenzisiwe etafuleni ukuthenga izingcezu zemibala

Isondo le-American Roulette. Isondo le-American Roulette linezimbobo eziwu-37; ezimnyama eziwu-18; ezibomvu eziwu-18 neyodwa eluhlaza ewu-zero. Indlela youkbheja; Indlela yokubheja ivumela abadlali ukuthi babheje ngezindlela ezahlukene eziningi. (Buka indlela yethu yokwenza ekhombisayo ngenhla kwaloluhla noqwembe lokukhokhela ngaphezulu). Khumbula iRoulette umdlalo odlalelwa ukuzithokozisa. Izinombolo zonke zinoshintsho olulingana nanoma iyiphi inombolo ephumayo emjijweni ngamunye. Lokho okuyinombolo ewinayo kunoma imuphi umjijo ayinabuthi emphumelweni womjijo olandelayo.

Kudlalwa kanjani. Beka ucezu lwakho lombala noma lwenani enkundleni. Umphathi uzojija ibhola. Ungabheja emva kokuba umphathi esememezele "Akusekho ukubheja" - ibhola selizowela phansi kwinombolo ewinayo. Inombolo ewinayo izokhonjiswa ngokubekwa kukamaka kuyona. Umdayisi uzosusa konke ukubheja okungawinanga enkundleni bese ekhokhela ukubheja okuwinile. Noma ikuphi ukubheja okubekwe enkundleni emva kokuthi umphathi esevalile isikhathi sokubheja, kuzobizwa ngokuthi "akukho ukubheja" bese kubuyiselwa emumva kumdlali.

Ukubheja kwangaphakathi

Imidlalo yamatafula
Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli noma kumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukubekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.
 
Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino oyithandayo!

Imibuzo? Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi udlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo esinawo kumakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa - ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika leMVG ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.

Ukudla nokokuzithokozisa
Okuhehayo kwasendaweni
I-Windhoek, I-Windhoek inhlokodolobha yaseNamibia, yilapho kuhlezi khona abaphetheyo, abashayi bomthetho namajaji kahulumeni waseNamibia nalapho kutholakala khona isizinda sezamabhizinisi ezwe, ezamasiko nezemfundo. Nokuba nodumo lokuba elinye lamadolobha ahlanzekile ase-Afrika, lonomoya wokujabula nowokuba nezizwe eziningi. Ukuhambela ukuzijabulisa ngokubona ezamasiko. Ikolishi lomculo nobuciko, umdanso webhaledi nomdanso wezimanje. Imidlalo yeshashalazi enobungcweti e-National Theatre, Umdanso webhale nomculo. I-Warehouse Theatre itholakala ebhilidini elidala labavubeli. Itheatre ekhululekile, enikeza umculo nemibukiso yomuntu ngamunye. I-Franco Namibia Cultural Centre ibukisa izithombe ezinsukwini zesonto, ezesiNgisi nezesiFrench. Iphinde futhi igqugquzele ubuciko baseNamibia. Imakethe yasemgwaqeni yangeMigqibelo yaseWindhoek inikeza izinhlobonhlobo zobuciko baseNamibia nemisebenzi yezandla endaweni evulekile.

I-Museum. Izinto zemilando yamasiko ye-Alte Feste nobuzimele geqe buyaboniswa. Izikhathi: UMsombuluko kuya kulweSihlanu ngo-09:00 kuya ku-18:00 UMgqibelo kuye eSontweni ngo-10:00 kuya ku-13:00, ngo-15:00 kuya ku-18:00. Ivaliwe ngamaholide omphakathi. Ukungena mahhala - I-Owel Museum National History, iDioramas yempilo yedolobha lesintu ne-"Touch Room" yemidlalo yezingane. Izikhathi: UMsombuluko kuya kulweSihlanu ngo-09:00 kuya ku-18:00 UMgqibelo kuya ku-eSontweni ngo-10:00 kuya ku-13:00, 15:00 kuya ku-18:00 Ivaliwe ngamaholide omphakathi.Ukungena - Mahhala.I-TransNamib Museum History yezokuthutha eNamibia. Izikhathi: UMsombuluko kuya kolweSihlanu ngo-09:00 kuya ku-12:00, 14:00 kuya ku-16:00 Ivaliwe ngamaholide omphakathi. Ukungena u-N$ 2.00 abadala, u-50c izingane

I-Windhoek okungaphandle. I-Hofmeyr Walk Scenic yokuzihambela ubuka idolobha. I-Avis Dam emngceleni weWindhoek, ukubuka izinyoni nokuzihambela. I-Gareangab Dam eNyakatho - Ntshonalanga nogu lweWindhoek ukuzihambela ngesikebhe uvakashile emini, ukubuka izinyoni nokuzihambela nje. I-Daan Viljoen Game Reserve engangamakhilomitha awu-26 eNtshonalanga neWindhoek, ukuzivakashela emini nokubuka izinyoni. Inkambo yokuziphumulela enechibi lokubhukuda,, indawo yokuthenga yokudla, nepaki yama-Caravan. Ubuciko; Izinhlobonhlobo zezindawo zalapho kugcinwa khona ubuciko nemibukiso zitholakala eWindhoek. Indawo yezithombe; I-Maerua Park Kunenye enezinhlobo ezintathu zezindawo zezithombe okukhishwa khona okusha.




Ukudla 
Enkabeni yenkundla yezamabhizinisi lapho kuphithizela khona eWindhoek, kunehotela iKalahari Sands elezinhlangano ezahlukene eliphinde lavuswa nekhasino. Lelihotela elinobukhazikhazi linokungaphezulu elingakunikeza izihambeli kunokubonakala linakho ngokwendawo, namabhange, izindawo ezithengisa ukudla izitolo zazo zonke izinhlobo enkundleni yezitolo ezinhlobonhlobo.




Ulwazi lwezokuxhumana

Indawo
Indawo yokulala; Inani lezindlu: izindlu eziwu-173. eziwu-151 ezihamba ngazimbili eziwu-16 zesigungu eziwu-5 ezinakho konke neyodwa enkulu kunazo zonke enakho konke. Inhlalakahle nokutholakalayo; Zonke izindlu zinesilungisomoya nokushisa, umabonakude wemibala, umgudu wevideo, iradiop, ucingo, ubhavu, isisefo, iplug yagesi (ye220 volts AC, 50 cycles), isomiso zinwele, ifiriji, nezinto zokwenza ikhofi. Ukunakekelwa kwezindlu kuyatholakala amahora angu-24 ngosuku. Ukunakekelwa* Ikhasino* Amakhothi  nezihlalo eziphakeme* udokotela, udokotela wamazinyo uma ebizwa, izomiso zinwele, indlu yemigudu yevideo, ukuthenga, izingubo, okokugcoba, izigijimi, izipho, ubucwebecwebe, amabhuku ichibi lokubhukuda* ukunakekelwa onjengenceku * izindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala eziwu-2, umabonakude onemibala* ezokukweleta ngamakhadi* ezokuhlamba izingubo ngesikhathi* imicamelo* amabhokisi okugcina okuphephile* ukuzilolonga* ezokuvuka* ukunakekelwa kwendlu amahora angu-24* amaphephandaba ansukuzonke* umbhede ogoqwayo* ukuwasha izingubo ngosuku* iSanna* indawo eyodwa ethengisa ngokudla* iCocessionaire Services* idesika lokukhokhela izimoto ze-Avis. Indawo; I-Kalahari Sands Hotel nekhasino kutholakala enkabeni ngasekuphetheni kweWindhoek, inhlokodolobha yeNamibia. Isikhumulo sezindiza: Izindiza zamazwe ngamazwe eziqondayo zifikela futhi zisuke eWindhoek ukuya -eKapa. Egoli, eFrankfurt naseLondon ngezomoya zaseNamibia, ezomoya zaseNingizimu Afrika, iLufthansa neComair. I-Air Namibia isebenza kakhulu ngaphakathi, nezindiza zamasonto onke eziya phesheya kwezilwandle ziyatholakala kusetshenziswa izindiza zamazwe ngamazwe. Qaphela: Izindiza zamazwe ngamazwe zifika futhi sisukele esikhumulweni sezindiza eWindhoek, ezinye ngamakhilomitha angu-45 ngaphandle kwedolobha. "I-Cape Liner" isebenza ngezinqola ezijwayelekile ezinakekela zonke izindiza. Amathekisi nawo akhona. Ulwazi lwezohambo lwamazwe ngamazwe. Ama-accounts ayalungiswa ngokheshi, amasheke ezihambi, noma ngamakhadi okukweleta, (i-American Express, Diners Club Card, iMasterCard, neVisa) Ukukhokha ngesheke lakho kuyalungiselelwa kuqala. Imali; Okwamanje idola laseNamibia nerandi laseNingizimu Afrika. Kuyancomeka ukuqale ubheke ukushintshiselana ngaphambi kokuvakasha. Ulimi; isiNgisi ulimi lomthetho. i-German, i-Afrikaans, i-Ovambo neHerero nazo ziyakhulunywa kakhulu.

Imicikilisho yezemingcele ne-Visas Travellers ukuya eNamibia kudinga izincwadi zemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe neVisa yezivakashi. Abahlali bakulamazwe alandelayo ayaxolelwa ezidingweni zeVisa.

Imidlalo yamatafula
Ikhasino inikeza i-American Roulette edumile kanye neziteki ezimbili eziphansi neziphezulu emdlalweni yeBlackjack.

Ukubeka ematafuleni kuzongafani umdlalo nomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizobeka ibhodi likamaka elikhombisa ukuthi kubhejwa ngamalini. I-American Roulette umdlalo omnandi onentokozo okubhejwa ngezinhlobonhlobo eziningi futhi udlalwa ngezingcezu zekhethelo ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. Okuncane: M5 	Okukhulu: M100

Isandla samakhadi amabili ano-Ace nanoma imuphi u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing sibizwa ngeBlackjack futhi sikhokha u3:2. Sinamatafula awu-4  eBlackjack ngalokukubheja okulandelayo:
Okuncane: M20		Okukhulu: M200
Okuncane: M50		Okukhulu: M1000

Amasheke agarantiwe yibhange angamukelwa uma ehamba nomazisi wangampela nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta, yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha ngosuku. Indawo yokuthengisa ngokudla iMorula. Lendlu ihlotshiswe ngesitayela esinzulu esintshontsha izimpande zase-Afrika - ngemibala emihle nokugcizelela okunzulu bobuntofontofo nokubukeka

Amafasitela ayizithombe abheke edamini kanye nesidlo sokuqala sasebusuku sidliwa kubhekwe ubuhle nobumsulwa bokushona kwelanga. Amatafula okudla okubandayo nokushisayo akunikeza konke  okwethembile ukukuthola noma okulindele ngempela nalokho obungakulindele. Ophayana ababhakwe ngalesosikhathi ukuvula inhliziyo yakho noshizi, izinyama ezibandayo nokudla kwasolwandle. Amatafula okudla kwasemini amabili ayatholakala lapha kusukela ngMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ibha yamasaladi inyama eyosiwe eqotshiwe netafula loswidi kuwukudla kosuku. Ngezimpelasonto ubona ezihlwabusayo zangempela izindishi ziphuma. Ukwengeza kubalwa edumile iMogolian Stir Fry nokukhethiweyo kokumanzisa umlomo. Elifanayo itafula liyatholakala njalo kusihlwa kanye ne-a la carte menu iyatholakala ngelantshi nangedina. Uhla olugcwele lwewayini likunikeza okungcono kwensimu yamagilebhisi aseNingizimu Afrika futhi kuhlale kwenezelwa ikhethelo lamabhodlela aphuma kwisela.

I-Bodiba Bar. Okuhlangene nendawo ethengisa ngokudla iMorula indawo ethengisa ngengxubevange yotshwala iBodiba.Indawo enhlekakhulu ukucima ilanga noma ukuziphuzela nje. Inabantu abaningi futhi indawo epholile kulabo abafuna ukuthatha ikhefu besuka ezinkundleni lapho zisha khona bgemidlalo. I-Bugattis itholakala ngaphandle nje kwekhasino enkulu nezinkundla zemishini. Lendawana inaka izidingo zabadlali abasandleleni kanye nemindeni efuna okulula nje. Yize noma isendaweni lapho kudlalwa khona, imindeni kanye nezingane ingangena idlule umnyango ovulekelangasepaki, yezimoto. Uhla lokudla ikhombisa izinhlobo zamabhega amnandi,amasemishi nophaya konke ngamanani alingene iphakethe lakho.

Ukuzithokozisa Umnyombo wenjabulo eMorula Sun imidlaloyona uqobo, kodwa ngani lezozinto zihlale zidlalelwa phakathi kwangaphandle endaweni engaphandle enhle yasehotela noma eClub 7 Arena - indlwana encane eyenza okuningi iyodwa esetshenziselwa ukudonsa umculo namadili. Okunye okuhle ongakuthola kulendawo amakhonsathi e-jazz, ama-disco, imidanso kanye nomculo we-cabaret. Okokuzithokozisa kwezingane. I-Morula iyindawo enhle yemidlalo yabadala, kodwa nezingane zinakho okwazo futhi. Inkulisa. Abasebenzi abawaziyo umsebenzi nabanakekelayo enkulisa engaphansi komhume wehotela ebhekela izingane ezisandakuzalwanesezikhulakhulile. Ivulwa nsuku zonke kusuka ngo-09:00 kuya phakathi kobusuku. Kungenwa mahhala. I-Jungle Gym. Umhlaba omuhle kakhulu weJungle Gym onokujabula, ulutsheku lwakhona khona la.Yonke impahla yeJungle Gym yakhiwe ngamapali eSeligna aqinile nezindophi ezenziwe ngokwemvelo. Izingane zijabulela izinsuku ezinde ezishisayo ukuqeda ukushisa lapho. Okutholakala echiubini lokubhukuda, indingilizi, ichibi elicwebile lezinsuku ezivilaphisayo nezishisayo.

I-Video Arcade. I-Magic Company inemidlalo eminingi yesimanje edumile yezingane eyzinhlobo ze-Video nezinhlobo zemidlaloyokuxhumanisa izingane. Izinhlelo. Ngamaholide ezikole uhlelo lwezingane lokuzithokozisa luqhutshwa umxhumanisi oqeqeshiwe nowaziyo umsebenzi. Ehlobo ichibi lokubhukuda liyisizinda lapho zenzeka khona.Ukuhlala kwezingane Izihlalo zokuhlala izingane kuyalungiselelwa kumamukeli wasehotela. Ezemidlalo nokuziphumulela Izivakashi eMorula Sun zingajabulela lezi ezemidlalo ezilandelayo: Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo eziwu-2,inkundla eyodwa evalekile phezulu yeVlleyball, igalofu,umdlalo wamanziwokudoba, ukushebeleza eqhweni, ukudubula, ukuthutha ngengqukumbanyana, ibhola le-splat liyalungiselelwa - konke kunendlela elula ukuya kuyo ushayela.




Imidlalo yamatafula    
Ukusebenza; Amatafula asendaweni yamatafula ekhasino aphethwe abathengisi (Croupiers), Umhloli nomphathi wabaqhathi.

Amatafula; Imibuzo eqondene nemidlalo edlalwayo ingaqondiswa kumuntu ophethe amatafula okugembula, nakuba imibuzo ijwayelekile idinga ukuqondiswa kumhloli nomakumphathi wabaqhathi lokho kwenzelwa ukungaphazamisi ukuqhubeka komdlalo. Abathengi abavunyelwe ukungena endaweni engekho ohleni emuva kwamatafula, ngoba lendawo ibekelwe abasebenzayo. Imiklomelo; Uma umdlali esewine umklomelo, bangazikhethela indlela abayithandayo yokukhokhelwa. Lokho kungaba izingcezu, ukheshe noma isheke, azolithola etafuleni noma edesikini likakheshe lasekhasino. Izinhla; Amatafula ezinhla azohluka kumdlalo ngomdlalo. Itafula ngalinye lizokhombisa ngebhodi likamaka ukukhombisa imali yokubheja etafuleni ekhona. I-Salon Prive indawo ephambili yababheji abaphezulu yamatafula emidlalo ibekwe eceleni yalabo badlali abafuna ukusebenzisa indawo ebizayo yokudlala. Lendawo ibekelwe ngokwempela abadlali kuphela. Indlu yangasese; Amanye amakhasino anendlu yangasese ekhona elungiswa ngaphambi kokufika. Ukbekisa kufanele kwenziwe kubaphathi bamatafula.
 
Uhlelo lwe MVG; Njengomnikazi wekhadi leMVG uyakwazi manje ukuthola imivuzo yeMVG uma udlala umdlalo owuthandayo wamatafula. Sicela unikeze ikhadi lakho leMVG kosebenzayo etafuleni uma uhlala phansi udlala. Bazoloba imininingwana yekhadi lakho leMVG phansi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umdlalo wakho uqoshiwe. Ungaveza ikhadi lakho leMVG kunoma liphi itafula odlala kulo. Ama-Smart Card ematafuleni; Kuyenzeka emakhasino akhethekile - ukuthenga usebenzisa I-Smart card. Sicela ubuze edesikini likakheshe ekhasino. Vikela ikhadi lakho leMVG ngokucela inombolo eyimfihlo (iPersonal Identity Number) edesikini leMVG. I-Sun International inalemidlalo elandelayo; Imidlalo I-American Roulette, i-Blackjack, i-Diamond Rush Blackjack Magic Poker Raise 'em Poker Punto Banco Dice engafani kwikhasino nekhasino - sicela ubuze ukuthi yimuphi okhona ekhasino oyithandayo!

Ikhasino 
Ukudlala sekube okunye kwezinto ezihehayo eMorula Sun. Indawo yemishini yokudlala ikhombisa uhla lweSun International lwemiklomelo eqhubekayo ethandwayo, okubalwa;

Kukhona izindawo zamatafula ezihlukene ukuzibala nje, iMain Pit neSalo Prive. IMain Pit inikeza izinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo yamatafula ngengxubevange yokuphansi nokuphakathi ukudlala. I-Salon Prive eyabadlali abadlalimidlalo abaphezulu - ababukeli abavunyelwe ukuba bangene. Indlu yangasese yokudlala iyatholakala uma icelwe kumphathi wekhasino.

Ukukweleta


Okusha kokuthutha okuqondile ngomoya phakathi neSun.
I-Sun City nehotela iTable Bay kuxhunyaniswe amabhanoyi iSA Express ahlelwe ngezikhathi. Ihotela iTable Bay nePalace eSun City, amahotela amabili kwaholayo emhlabeni ekugxileni kweSun International, azoxhunyaniswa amabhanoyi aqondayo ahamba ngezikhathi ngezinsuku ezintathu esontweni ekuhlelweni okusha okuzoqalwa iSouth African Express Airways ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 24 ka1998.

Ukusebenza kuzonikeza amabhanoyi aqondayo ahamba ngesikhathi asuka eKapa kuya esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilnesberg, anikeza uhambo lwezindizamshini olulodwa nolubumbene.

"Lokhu kuyinyuthuko ephezulu nebalulekile, exhumanisayo njengoba yenza, izindawo ezinhle ezimbili ezinkulu zeAfrka, zozimbili phakathi kohlu lwmahotela aholayo omhlaba," kwasho uTobin Prior, uDirector weDivisional wezindawo zokuvakasha weSun International. "Amabhanoyi aletha izivakashi ngqo kusuka esangweni kuza e-Afrika kuze enkabeni yayo bese enika izivakashi ithuba lokuba sezindaweni zethu zokuvakasha eziphambili, okuwuhambo nje olungaphezu kwamahora amabili uhamba ngendiza". Kokubili ihotela iTable Bay, eyavulwa ngoJune ngonyaka odlule, nePalace yeLost City anikwa izinga lokuba amahotela aholayo uqala lonyaka, futhi iPalace isamenyezelwa njengendawo yokuvakasha ephambili e-Afrika kulandela ukubalwa okwenziwa iConde Nast Traveller.

Ukusebenza kweSouth African Express Airways kuzosuka eKapa ngoLwesithathu nangoLwesihlanu ngo-11:00 kufike esikhumulweni sezindiza iPilanesberg ngo-13:05, ngazo futhi lezozinsuku isuke ePilanesberg ngo-14;00 ukufika eKapa ngo-16:25. NgamaSonto, indiza izosuka eKapa ngo-11:30,ifike esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilanesberg ngo-13:45 bese elibuyayo lizoba ngo-14:30, lifike eKapa ngo-16:55. Amanani okugibela kulezizindlela azoqala ngomhlaka 25 ku-Oktoba ka 1998 kuya ku-31 ku-Oktoba ka 1999 azoba uR1 050 uhambo olulodwa (kungabalwa iVAT namathekisi asesikhumulweni sezindiza).

Abagibeli  bazondiziswa kwi SA Express enezihlalo eziwu-50 iCoadiar Regional Jet 200 BER (i-Express Jet). Inkampani eyaqala ukwenza umsebenzi ngo-April 1994, inezindizamshini ezintsha nezisezingeni eliphezulu e-Afrika, futhi ethwala abagibeli abawu-60 000 ngenyanga phakathi kwezindawo eziwu-14. NGOLWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 NE-FAX (011) 780 7535.




Ukumemezela abangeneli baka-Miss South Africa 2000
"Ubuhle ngaphansi kwesibhakabhaka sase-Afrika" imemezela uphawu olusha.

Ukufuna uMiss South Afrika 2000 yikho okukhulunywa ngakho ngamafomu okungenela okungubukhangukhangu bobuhle bezwe, umqhudelwano wokugcina ozobanjelwa eSun City Superbowl ngomhlaka-9 December. Ukufuna ukukhomba abangenele kuqala kulenyanga. Okunye koshintsho okubalulekile kobukhangukhangu kulonyaka isiqubulo esisha nesisho esithi,"Beauty Under African Skies", okubonakala efomini yokungenela atholakala kwaSpar nasezazisweni zakwaKwikspar, ezinkampanini zePR, isemahhovisi e-ETV, ihhovisi elikhulu lika-Miss South Africa. Usuku lokuvala  ukungenela umhlaka-8 September. Kuzobe kukhona uhlelo olusha lokuya konobuhle nendlela izimo ezizobe zihlelwe ngayo esiteji zizobe zizintsha eSuperbowl. Ukufuna uMiss SA obalulekile ongenele kuzokwenzeka kulo lonke izwe ngalenyanga kanti nalo lonke ulwazi oludingekayo luzonikezwa kubaxhumanisi ngalesi sikhathi. Uhlu lokwahlulela kokuqala kuzobe kusezithombeni ezilethwe kanye namafomu okungenela bese lokhu kulandelwa ukubonana kuxoxwe nabangeneli abafaneleyo, okungenzeka babe ngaphezu kuka-40 ngedolobha.

Amafomu okungenela kulonyaka anohlu lwemibuzo ngabangeneli, okubalwa izinhloso zakhe, imfundo ephakeme asake wakuwina, ezokumodela kanye nakwenzayo, kuhambisana nolwazi nje olojwayelekile lwezokubala neminyaka yobudala. Uma ukubonana sekuphelile kuzomenyezelwa abangu-24 abaphumele okokuqala, emva kwalokho umphakathi uzokwazi ukuvotela labo abathandayo emasontweni amabili. Abawu-8 abangeneli bazokhishwa ngaleyondlela bese kusala abawu-16 abazongenela okokugcina. Bazobe sebengena kunoBuhle ngomhlaka-8 December. Abesifazane abahlulelayo babheka njengabagqoki ababalulekile bomqhele kaMiss SA ukuthi basesimweni yini, ubuholi nezinto abazithandayo, ukuxhumana nolwazi nje oluhle oludingekayo lwaseSouth Africa nolusha lwezindaba zomhlaba. Ozowina kunobuhle uzongenela obunye ubukhangukhangu uMiss World no Miss Univers.

Ngolwazi olubalulekile sicela ushayele kulayini wolwazi waka Miss SA: 083 910 7876 noma u-email: misssa@sunint.co.za Uma ufuna ukubuza mayelana nezindaba xhumana noLara Ross ku- 011 780 7684 noma e-mail : 1ross@sunint.co.za




I-ACSA ithatha iPilanesberg International Airport



Inkampani yezikhumulo zezindiza iSouth Africa (ACSA) isingenele esivumelwaneni seminyaka ewu-25 nohulumeni wasesifundazweni eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ukuthi ithathe iPilanesberg International Airport (PIA) esizoqala ukusebenza kusuka ngoLwesine, mhlaka 1 April 1999.



Isivumelwano - esibe imiphumela yezingxoxo eziphumelele ngezindlela ezintathu zokuxoxisana phakathi kwabaphathi besikhumulo, uhulumeni wesifunda kanye nomkhakha wangaphandle ulayini onendlela yokusebenza yeACSA ukweseka ohulumeni bezifunda kanye nabaphathi besikhumulo.

Kusho uDick Ackerman, umqondisi omkhulu weACSA, "Sikholelwe ukuthi iPilanesberg inokubaluleka okukhulu njengomxhumanisi ukwenyusa izinga lezokuvakasha eReplublic yaseNingizimu Afrika."

"IPilalensberg izoba ngaphansi kwendlela yokuphatha yeJohannesburg International Airport futhi izosivulela ithuba lokuqambaimisuka yendlela enhle yokuthi izikhumulo zezokuvakasha zizophathwa kanjani," kusho uRoy Mackey, umphathi weJohannesburg International Airport (JIA).

"Sizokwazisa izindlela nobuciko bokusebenza nokuphatha okuzoqinisekisa ukuthi akukho ukudlala ngomsebenzi. Ukuphumelelisa lokhu sicabanga ukweseka abasebenzi basePilannesberg izikhathi zonke ukwazisa izindlela ezintsha nokuthi baqeqeshwe."

Abasebenzi abaveli bekhona ePIA, bazothola ithuba lokusebenzelaiACSA, lokho okubanika ithuba lokuqeqesheka okwengeziwe kanye namathuba entuthuko yomkhakha wezokusebenza kulaba basebenzi.

"Isandulelo sethu sokuqala ukwenza inyuthuko kwingqalasizinda edingekayo ezoheha ezomoya inyuse izinga lezokuvakasha ezindaweni ezakhele. Ukutshalwa kwemali engango-R20 million kuzokwenziwa kulentuthuko  okubalwa kowo nokulungiswa komgwaqo, indawo yamathekisi, nezindawo zokupaka izindiza ukuze izindiza ezinkulu nezithwele abantu abaningi zikwazi ukupaka, ezifana ne-MD80's DC9's ne Boeing 737's," kusho uMackey.

Izingxoxo ngezinkontileka ezifanayo nezinye izikhumulo zezindiza e-Afrika yonkana, kakhulukazi emazweni emiphakathi ethuthukayo aseNingizimu ne-Afrika zilindeleke ukuthi ziphothulwe maduzane.

Isivumelwano sithanda ukuba sibe nomthelelana wezokuvakasha endaweni, njengoba izindiza ezingami ezisuka ekapa, eThekwini, nasePort Elizabeth ziya ePilannesberg zizoba nabagibeli abavakashayo abaningana.

Izindiza ezixhumayo e-Kruger National Park zizoba khona, ezizobe zixhumanisa kakhulukazi izindawo zokuvakasha zaseNingizimu Afrika.

Ukwengeza,ukushintsha kwebukekayo iVictoria Falls eZimbabwe kuzokwenzeka uma nje I-ACSA isiphumelel ukubuyisa ukugqama kwe-Pilannesberg emazweni ngamazwe.

Isifundazwe saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, iSun International neACSA sebevumelene ukusebenza ndawonye ngepulani enobunyoninco ekuhwebeni, ezonyusa ezokuvakasha esifundazweni.

"Sesithole ukuxhaswa okukhulu kakhulu emkhakheni wezamabhizinisi, uhulumeni kanye namakhosi akhele indawo esifundazweni ngesivumelwano sepia ngalokho-ke sikholelwa ekutheni kuzoba umsebenzi wenhlanganisela ozoba nemphumuelelo ozokwenza futhi wonke umuntu azuze kubo bonke abahlanganyele." Kusho u-Ackerman.

Ngonyaka odlule isikhumulo sikwaze ukuqukatha abagibeli abangu-44 000 futhi iCASA iceba ukunyusa lelinani ngangaphezu kwamaphesenti awu-35 ngonyaka.

I-ACSA ithembisa iSun International esimeme i-PIA  ngayo leyomigudu enakekelayo nenokuwazisa umsebenza eseyilethe amathuba ezokuvakasha, ukuthi ibuyekeze futhi iphumelele kumakhasino nezindawo zokuvakasha ezingmakhelwane neSun City kanye nePalace yeLost City eSun City.

NGOLWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS E-SUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO: (011) 780 7684 NOMA I-FAX: (011) 780 7535.


I-Pilanesberg African Wild Dogs eDarung Debut Hunt
I-Zebra, iBuffalo, zitholele okuningi ngaphezu kokuqhathanisa kokukhona

Zingaphandle laphaya zingcwele ukuzimisela. Into yokuqala  esanda kuba khona ePilanesberg ekudonsela ukudla kwakusihlwa amva kokukhululeka kuma-hectare awu-55 000 e-National Park ezungeze iSun City, umhlambi wama-zebra, ngokungesabi, badlulele phambili ukuthola ibaffalo. Ngempumelelo ekugcineni bathatha idlela ye-impala.


Ngokucophelela ilandelwa iField Ecologist Gus Van Dyk yesifunda saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, kuzo lezozindlela izilwane ezesabekayo kakhulu sezingenisiwe epaki, ipaki iyindawo engangama-hectare awu-1,5 lapho ihlanganiselwe khona. Amasonto ngaphambi kokuthi izinja zidedelwe, izinja ezintathu zesilisa ezindala, ezazalelwa ekuthunjweni, sezifakiwe otshanini obendlalelwe izilwane bemidlwane enezinyanga eziwu-8 ubudala, onina bayo, kanye neyesifazane endala enkulu.

Ukungeniswa kwalezinja ezintathu zesilisa keleliqoqo kwaba ukucacamela okukhulu komsebenzi wokuqala, njengoba inja yokuqala yesilisa idingakala ukusebenza okukahle kwepaki, nokuvimbela imidlane ukuthi iye konina. Ezesilisa ezindala, ezihlala e-Outdshoorn, ngokushesha zangena phakathi, manje ezesifazane zombili sezimithi, kusho uMnumnzana van Dyk. Impi yokubanga ubukhulu isaliwa namanje phakathi kwalezi ezintathu zesilisa, kusho yena.

Lomklamo wokuxhasa kweSun International ka-R150 000 ungowamanje ezinhlelweni eziphumelelayo ezifakelwe ukungenisa izihlelo zempilo yezilwane, okubalwa kuzo ibhubesi kanye nengulube. Izinja kanye nobhejane omusha ezifakiwe esigabeni esedlule yizo izilwane eziyingozi ezilwaneni ezingatholakala epaki.

UGus waloba phansi isinsuku eziwu-10 zokuqala ezilandla ukukhululwa kwezinja endaweni yezilwane, kanti umbiko ufundeka njengombhalo wefilimu wempilo yezilwane eNational Geographic. Zakhululeka, kwase kwaqala ngokushesha ukuhlola izindawo ezizungezile, ngokuqaphela kwashanelwa i-arc angamamitha awu-500.Zase zithamela ilanga lokukhululeka kwazo okusha, zihlangana nabavakashi abambalwa epaki, zigibela izintaba. Ubusuku bazo bokuqala zabuchitha osebeni lomfula ongangamakhilomitha amabili ukusuka esizindeni sazo.

Ngosuku olulandelayo zakhwela izintaba, emva kwamahora awu-80 enkululeko yazo, zaphiwa intiwane umphathi wendawo. Sezinomfutho, zakhuphukela esicongweni sePilanesberg, zase zibukela ukuzama ukubulala kwazo kokuqala. Njengoba izebra ingeyona inyama yezinja zasendle, ukuzama ukuthola eyodwa akuphumelelanga. Emva kokuhamba ngamandla endaweni evulekile, ukuxhumana kwalahleka nezinja amahora angu-36, njengoba nemisakazo yase imemezela ukuthi izilwane ezintathu azisatholakali.


Ngesikhathi seziqhamuka futhi emakhilomitheni angu-10 enyakatho yendawo yazo emgwaqeni iBakgatla, zaphiwa ukudla futhi, ezinsukwini eziyisithupha emva kokukhululwa kwazo, nguGus nethimba lakhe.

Ukonye okubalulekile ngezinja ukuthi zihlale ngaphakathi emingceleni yepaki, ukuthi ukuhlangana kwazo kokuqala lofenisi obiyele kagesi kwakuwukukhululeka, njengoba zazingeke zilinge ukuphuma ngawo. Izingxoxo zokuqala phakathi kwamaphathi bepaki kanye namakhosi ezindawo zabangela ukuthi amakhosi azonswinya abafiki abasha bese bazisa amaphathi ngokulimala kwempahla noma ukweduka.

Ukugcwala ukushisekeleka, izinja zazama ukbamba ibaffalo, lokho kwadala ukuthi uvalo emhlambini owaweluswe ukuphipha ukuthukuthela bokubhodla njengoba izinja zazizincinza emadolweni, kodwa kwakungekho okufana nokubulala.

Kwaba I-impala encane yesilisa eyagcina isithole ukuthi ibulawe kouqala epaki, futhi zabonakal ziyidla ngokuphanga. Eyodwa inja eyabonakala ilimele kulokhukuzingela, kodwa yatholakala iba ngcono.

" Ukugoqa, umhlambi uza kahle, " kusho uGus. " Umama uqala konke okwenzekayo, bese edlendletheka amamitha angamakulu ambwalwa kusuka emhlanjini, kanti eyesifazane yokuqala, "u-Antie", uhlala exabana njalo. Zozimbili zibonakala zimithi kanti izinkomba zalokhu zizoqhamuka ngokushesha.

"Ukuthuthuka kokuzingela zezinye izindlela zokuphila zibonakala ziqhubeka kahle. Njengoba umhlambi uthola ulwazi lwezilwane kanye nezindawo zamanzi, impumelelo yokuzingela kwazo kufanele ithuthuke ngokushesha. Kuze kube yilesosikhathi, umhlambi uzoqhubeka ukuthola ukudla amaqabuqabu kubekiwe ukuzigcina zinamandla futhi zinomfutho. Amabhubesi akakakhombisi ukuba yinkinka ezinjeni okwamanje, kanti ukuhlangana phakathi kwezinja namabhubesi akukaze kubikwe.

"Kuyabonakala ukuthi Umama Wemvelo nokungaphakathi kuzona kuyaqinisekisa ukuthi izinja ziphila usuku nosuku empini ukuzihlelela zona ekhaya lazo elisha. Zidinga isikhathi nendawo. Ngethemba umhlambi uzokuthola kokubili ePilanesberg."

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NORALA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Entsha iSun City Extravaganza Resonates Kumgqumo wokushaya okunjengokwenhliziyo kwe-Africa

Umgqumo! Umshini onezingilazi oveza imibalabala wezinto zasePan African Umgqumo we-Afrika unikeza impilo kwentsha iSun City Extravaganza. Ebizwa ngoMgqumo! Iveza izinto ezintsha, ezidlula endleleni enempumelelo yokudlule, bese ihlanganisa lokhu nalokhu umqambi akubiza kokuthi "ububenyebenye bezinto zasePan Africa."

Manje izilungiselele ukugqanyiswa ezindabeni ngomhlaka-19 ku-January ku-2000 kanti ngokubonakala kokuqala ku-November, Umgqumo! Ungumhumuzo wokuqala eSun City ukukhiqizwa endlini isiyonke. Ecatshangwe umqondisi womnyango weTheatre wezokujabula weSun City, onesiphiwo uNico Brits kwase futhi kwaqanjwa futhi kwahlukaniswa iqembu le-Artistic lika-Ivor Jones, uNico Brits kanye noKaren Cutts, ukukhonjiswa komkhiqizo kugqugquzelwe amasiko ase-Afrika yonkana, osentshezwe abantu abangu-6, emunye eletha ubungcweti nobunyoninco emkhiqizweni. Kungokokuqala emlandweni, umbukiso uzokhonjiswa ngaphandle kokungenela nokubamba iqhaza kwabantu bangaphandle, ukusebenza kwayo okumangalisayo okwenziwe ulwazi leqembu lezokuzithokozisa.

Izihlelo zilungiswe nguPieter du Toit, yahlotshiswa nguNico Brits, ukukhanya nguKaren Cutts, kanye nokuqondisa ngu-Ivor Jones. Umculo waqanjwa futhi walungiswa nguMarc Mitchel kanye no-Alssandro Batazzi. Kusukela ekuvezweni kombala endaweni evulekile, ekuqhakazeni kokugcina kobuhle be-"Foot Tapping", izibukeli zizothatheka yilobukhazikhazi benjabulo egcwele ukwehlukana kwe-Afrika. Ukugqugquma komgqumo kuzothatha izibukeli kuzibeke ezweni elingekho kude kunokukhona ngempela. Ilungiselwe ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule, iqembu labangu-26 lizobe linamantombazana akhonjiswayo athakathayo kanye nomculi oholayo, uStella Magabe. Bazojabulisa izibukeli ngezinto ezehlukene kusuka ekugqugqumeni kwamadilamu abukekayo, e-Eeirie Legends yomlilo ekhombisa umndondoshiya wesithwabathwaba nomlilo wangempela, kwayengayo amaphupho kaSharan.

Ukukhonjiswa kwemibukiso egqugquzelayo yomgqumo emasikweni ahlukene amahle, kuhlanganisa umdanso wamaNdiya kanye nomculo onomdanso womdabu wase-Afrika kanye nomculo, kubonakala endaweni enhle efulathelene nempophoma. Izibukeli zizobe sezisekugcineni kwezihlalo zazo ngesikhathi umbukiso usufika kwi-'Foot Tappin' Fun Finale. Umgqumo! wenzelwe okumuntu ngayedwana ngabasebenzi abangakusebenzisa ukukhombisa imicimbi  yokunikezela imivuza yokuphumelela kanye nemicimbi eyizipesheli. Umbukisa uhlelwe ngalendlela yokuthi izinto ezahlukene zingakhonjiswa ngokwahlukana kwazo ukushiya indawo yokwenziwayo kanye neyezikhulumi. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 KANYE NE-FAX KU: (011) 780 7535.

I-Sun City igubha ukudla enyangeni yesithupha eF & B Festival



Kusukela ekudleni komphefumulo luya kokwasolwandle endaweni evulekile okuvakashelwa kuyo.

I-Sun City igubha ukudla izinyanga eziyisithupha kulonyaka enyangeni ngayinye kuze kube u-December, ingqikithi eyehlukene izokhonjiswa endaweni yokuvakasha ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla eziphakeme.


Izinto ezizobe zikhona kubalwa kuzo ukwehlukana kokukhonjiswa kokudla komphefumulo ngoSeptenber, kanye ne-Oysters ukuvala isenzeko, ukuhlanganisa nedumile iKnysna Oyste Festival.

"Umshikashika wonke wezinyanga eziwu-6 eF&B uqondise ukukhombisa amakhishi ethu kubavakashi kanye nokungezelela ulwazi lwabo ngeSun City, ngaso lesosikhathi bekhombisa amakhono abapheki,"kusho uJohn Airey, umqondisi wendawo eF&B.

Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezizobe zihlanganyele lomkhankaso kubalwa iVilla Del Palzzo naCrystal Court esePalace yeLost City, iPeninsula esehotel iCascades, iHarlequin esehotela iSun  City, kanye neMarula eseCabanas.

Ngo-August, indawo yokuvakasha izobe igubha ubungcono obudlulele benyama yenkomo koxhunyaniswa kokukhonjiswa yiJakie Daniels - ezobe ikhombisa iBourboun marinades kanye neFlambe Creations, ngabapheki nendawo ngayinye bekhombisa ubunyoninco babo.

U-September usilethela okuhle kakhulu okungejwayelekile eVilla del Palazzo, lapho abathaki ababili bamawayini ase-Itali bezobe benjengo "sommeliers" endaweni yokudla, bekhombisa amawayi angcona kakhulu ase-Itali ekujabuleni kwezivakashi. "Futhi enyangeni sizokhombisa ngokwethu imibukiso yengqephu ikhombisa umsebenzi wabathungi base-Itali izinto zabo ezitholakalayo eNingizimu Afrika, kanye nohla olumangalisayo lobucwebecwebe olusuka eTuscany" kusho uJohn. 


Kanye kanye nalokhu, iVilla nayo izokhombisa iSoiree Culinaires' ngemiculo eyehlukene okubalwa kuyo, "A Night at the Movies", "An Evening with Andrew Lloyd Webber" kanye nobusuku "From Beethoven to the Beatles", konke kukhombisa kukhombisa ngokulandelana abaculi abahamba ngabane abazobe besinikeza umculo wokudansa odonsa igqikithi.

Mhlawumbe okuzobe kubukeka kakhulu kulezizinto kulomgubho kuzobe kungamatafula abapheki - "Ubusuku ngaphansi kwezinkanyezi"okungukuthi abavakashi bazobe behlezi ematafuleni azobe entanta osebeni olungaphambi kwendawo yokudla iCrystal Court ePalace yeLost City. Ukudla kwakusihlwa,okuzobe kwethanyelwe izintatheli eziphezulu kanye nabacwaningi,kuzokhombisa uKhisimusi ozobe usevwa kuyo yonke indawo yokuvakasha futhi uzobe uhambisana nomculo esiwunikezwa abaculi abacula ngabane.

"Ukusuka kwalomcimbi kuzoba indlela okuzobe kusevwa ngayo,"kusho uJohn. Kwisigaba ngesigaba, sizokhombisa ezivakashini ibhokisi leJapanese Bento kulona okuzobe kukhona isampula esincane nje ukukhombisa okusaswidi kukaKhisimusi okuzobe kusevwa ezindaweni zokudla eziphambili zendawo yokuvakasha. Lokhu kuzobe kubalwa kukho nokudlana okulula okumnandi kakhulu.Ngalendlela,abathandi bokudla bazokwazi ukuthola umqondo wokudla kuko konke uma bezikhethela endaweni yokuvakasha ngalesisikhathi sokujabula samaholide."

U-September uletha ukudla komphefumulo eSun City,kanti futhi nezindawo zokudla zizobe ziseva "Kusuka ekhaya kuya eKhaya" izindishi ezinokudla okuhlukahlukene kwamakhishi. Izindishi zizobe zineSeared Tuna edliwa newasabi Mashed Potato - "okuhle komphefumulo njengoba kukuhle nasemzimbeni,futhi,"kusho uJohn.

Kodwa ngo-October yonke imicabango yokuzibamba ekudleni kufanele ibekwe eceleni njengoba indawo yokuvakasha yonke izobe igubha i-"Disirable Dessert" kuzo zonke izindawo zokudla eziphambili. Mhlawumbe okumbi kunako konke kuzobe kuyisinkwa esinebhotela wePudding Palette, ukukhombisa lezizindlela eziyisimangaliso zezinhlobo zokudla. 


U-November uletha uCrayfish Creations,okungukuthi izivakashi zingasuka kulendawo ziye kwenye kulenyanga, kukhonjiswa izindlela ezicokeme ezisetshenziswa abapheki abahlukene ukulungiselela lokukudla kwasolwandle.

Bese kuthi ngoDecember, njengoba ukuduma kwezulu kuqoqanela ePilanseberg,kuzobe kungamaRaining Prawns eSun City kulabo abanokunambitha kokudla kwasolwandle,kuzobe kusevwa ngamabhakede agcwele kanti futhi izivakashi ziyamenywa ukuthi zidle nangendlela ezingathanda ngayo.

"Siyakujabulele ukukhombise okuhle kakhulku esinakho ukukunikeza kanti ezinyangeni ezimbalwa,izivakashi zizobe ziphethwe abapheki abaqeqeshiwe,"kusho uJohn Airey.
