I-Bumber Spring Break
Izindawo zokuzilolonga zaseNingizimu Afrika, i-Ocean Warriors, ikhombisa ngoSeptember 22 isenzeko esikhulu samakhalenda ezinkulungwaneni zabenzi bamaholide baseNingizimu Afrika, ngesikhathi sebeqoqa sebengcwele eSun City's Valley of Waves ngesiSpring Break - izinsuku eziyishumi ukunama okungakholakali, kusukela emncintiswanweni omkhulu omuhle ngokumangalisayo wabakhi bemizimba baseNingizimu Afrika.

"Minyaka yonke kuso lesisikhathi, sikhombisa umgubho omangalisayo wokujabula nokuzithokozisa eValley kanti futhi yonke iminyaka siyaphumelela ukunikeza okuthile okuhambisana nanoma ikuphi ukunambitha -okwezingane,okungakaze kubonwe,"kusho uDean Pitt, umphathi weValley. "I-Springbok into elindelwe yiwo wonke umuntu. Abantu abaningi basenza isenzeko sabo samaholide esigqamile esifishane. Ezinsukwini eziyishumi silindele izivakashi ezisenanini lika 40 000 abajabulela indawo evulekile nezinhlobonhlobo zemiqhudelwano nemibukiso."

Into ezenzekayo zisukela emidlalweni yasesiteji ekhonjiswa usuku lonke, enokubukeka okunzulu, ebusukwini obuhle bokubhukuda nasemcimbini wasebhishi omkhulu. Iningi lemiqhudelwano ihleliwe ngosizo lwabaxhasi, kanti lokhu kubalwa kukho ukuhlolwa kwamakhono kweSAB Golf Chip ngabaqhudelani abasebenzisa izinto zabo zokudlala igalofu ukufaka amabhola ezimbobeni ezincane ukuwina imiklomelo emikhulu. Umxhasi omkhulu kulonyaka uRed Bull, ozokhombisa izenzeko eziyisithupha, okubalwa kuzo umbukiso wokudlala esiteji kanye nokuzilolonga komzimba. Imidlalo yasolwandle izobe ikhonjiswa ebhishi ukuthi iyinto enjani ngongcweti bayo baseNingizimu Afrika bawo lomdlalo abadumile kanye neStreet Skate naso sizobe sikhonjiswa. I-Red Bull izokwenza umcimbi omkhulu wasolwandle, ongomunye wokukhombisa okusekhalendeni iSpringbreak.

I-Vodacom's Ocean Warriors izovusa amadlingozi ezihlwele ngamakhono ukudlala olwandle kanye nabanqobi bezinhlobo ezahlukene bazobe bekhulula izinyama zabo kwi-South African Body Building Expo. Umqhudelwano wezimfundamakhwela, lapho abavakashi bengakhombisa khona amakhono abo ukuwina imiklomelo, usemakhadini abo futhi, njengaku-Miss Bikini Pageant wamantombazana onke konke okudingayo.  Abaphathi beSun City bakwazile futhi ukuthi banikeze indawo yokubonakala kweqembu labadansi abadumile, iPylse of Africa, eseyidlale ukuheha ababukeli cishe ezweni lonke. I-Dairymaid ixhase umbukiso wasesiteji ngemidlalo yabo yansuku zonke ehlukene. Akokho ngisho umzuzu wokuchithwa eValley ngaleSpringbreak. Izivakashi zizobe zijatshuliswa futhi zivinjezelwe izinto ezifana neHooch Volley Ball Tournament, iYou/Huisgenooit Weekend Stage Events, iStrongman kanye neLifeguard Demonstrations, iTug of War Treasure Hunt, iKamp Kwena Entertainment kanye nezokuzilolonga kanye nokusha kulonyaka okubukeka ngendlela emangalisayo. Njengesaziso semigubho, i-Yfm izobe isakaza bukhoma eValley nesikhathi seSpringbreak.

I-Valley of Waves indawo eyisizinda seLost City. Lomhlaba wase-Afrika wamaphupho uhehela abavakashi emoyeni wokwakudala kanye nempucuko engakaze ibonwe. Kulesisizinda, iValley of Waves,  kwasemandulo iwumsuka we "The Valley of the Sun" iyiWater Park enkulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni yezokujabula - umbuso wenjabulo wabafuni bamadlingozi. Kukhona okuthile kwawo wonke umuntu eValley of the Waves - ukuzizwa uthola amandla amasha endaweni enokugqugquzela.Amathikithi ayatholakala endaweni ewathengisayo noma eValley of the Waves.Abadala uR40 abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-13 Izingane nabahola impesheni uR25 Izikhathi u-10h00 kuya ku-17h30 nsukuzonke. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa sicela uthintane noLara Ross kulenombolo yocingo: 011 780 7684 nom kwi-email lross@sunint.co.za



I-Botanical Walking Tours Inaugurated eSun City
Izingadi eLost City manje zinokubukeka kweBotanic Garden  Ukuzihambela nje ezingadini ezinhle ngendlela emangalisyao futhi ezitshalwe kahle ezinkulu zaseSun City sezivuliwe kulandele ukukhishwa kwenhle I-map ekhombisayo, ekhombisa izindawo ezinhlanu ezinkulu ongazithanda, kanye nokukhonjiswa kwezihlahla, ezinezinombolo namagama.

Ngesikhathi iLost City isungulwa ngo- 1989, omunye wemiklamo emikhulu kwaba ukusungulwa kwendawo yezihlahla ukutshala izihlahla engangama-hectare angamakhulu ububanzi endaweni yayo. Ngo-1992 ngesikhathi iLost City ivulwa, izitshalo ezingaphezu kuka-23 700 zahlanyelwa kwathi eziwu-244 000 zagodlwa. Namhlanje ingadi inezitshalo ezibalelwa ku-3 000 ezehlukene ngezinhlobo, kanye nokuqoqwa okunobuchwepheshe kwama-palms awu-400 ahlukene. Ohlelweni lokutshala okwaqala ngo-1991, izihlahla ezingaphezulu kuka-22 esezivuthiwe nesezikhule ngokwanele zatshalwa. Ingadi ihlukaniswe amahlathi awu-22 ahlukene, okungukuthi kuwona awu-80% awokuzimilela bese kuthi amanye atshalwa. U-Gordon Kershaw, umphathi omkhulu kwezokuphathwa kwezingadi, ukuzimisela kwenkampani ngomklamo weminyaka ewu-7 usuphumelelise ukuvela kwalezizingadi ezigqugquzelayo, usho nokuthi uhambo lwaba imiphumela yamaqembu ezezingadi ngokukhethwa kwezihlahla zaseLost City.Zonke izihlahla manje zinezinombolo zazo  kanye namagama azo ngokwebotanic. Ukukhonjiswa kwezihlahla kuzokwenziwa kube khona kubavakashi ukuze bakwazi ukuthola imvelo ehlukene. Ukugqama kweBotanic Garden kwenza ukukhonjiswa nokuthola umlando nemvelaphi yazo zonke izitshalo.

Abavakashi baseLost City Botanical Gardens bazokwazi ukubukela izinhlobonhlobo zamakhulukhulu ezinyoni kanye nokunye okudonswe izitshalo kanye nezinhlelo zokudla okutholakala ezingadini. Ukuhamba okuwu-5, okuningi kwako kuyisikhathi esiyimizuzu ewu-90: yiBaobab Tour, ethatha abavakashi ibayise kwenhle nebukekayo ikhozi kusuka eLost City Golf Course Club House, udlula ezindaweni ezomile zemvelo zezitshalo kuya eBaoba Forest enezihlahla eziwu-300 esezikhulile. Lelihlathi litshalwe ngezihlahla ezisuka eVenda, esikhulu esingangama-tons awu-40 futhi singangeminyaka ewu-300 ubudala.I-Beach Tour,yabaneminyaka noma emingaki noma ubukhulu,eqala eMonkey Spring Plazza, idlule eCrocodile Valley,ishone phansi eRoyal Staircase, iValley of Waves, kanye nemumva. Abavakashi bazobona izitshalo ezososebeni emasebeni ahlukene endawo, okubalw akuwo neWild Coast. Uhambo lukuthatha eGong yeSun Lion kanye neCrocodile Valley Forest, etshalwe izihlahla ezinkulu ukudonsa amajuba aluhlaza.

I-Spider Web Trail, enezehlakalo ezithile, izothatha indlela kusuka eMonkey Spring Plazza idlule eSlide Hill, ukuya eSpider Web Bridge kudlule eHippo Gorge nasebhishi. Indlela ihamba kwezinhle izitshalo zemvelo ezihehayo, iTropical rain Forest kanye neJacarandas. I-Flamingo nenkukhu yamanzi kweyezinye zezilwane ezibonwa kulendlela.ILost City Crock Pit Tour iqala eBaobabs,idlule ehlathini i-Euphorbia, idlule eLost City Golf Course.Izinto ozibona endleleni izitshalo ezomile ezimelwe i-Euphorbia kanye nezinhlobo ze-Aloe, endleleni uma udlula indawo yezingwenya.I-Cascade Gardens ukuya eWater World Tour ithatha ukushisekeleka phezu kwebholoho elizwinga lisuka eWelcome Garden Centre, ukuya eCascade Pool Deck.Bazobona ihlathi elivuthiwe loqalo, imikhiwane, iShefflera kanye nezinhlobo zeChorisa. Ekugcineni kwehlathi, izivakashi zizodonselwa ngeCascades Aviary, zidlala iGary Player Country Club neWaterworld kuya emumva eSun City Hotel pool deck.

Izinhloso zalokhu kuhamba ukuthi abavakashi bazokwazi bephelezelwa noma bezihambela, begadwe I-map bese bezisungulela olwabo uhambo." Ukutshalwa eSun City kuwukubaluleka kwezesayensi kanti inhloso yethu ukuthu siyenze ibe edumile neyaziwayo njengenkulu iBotanical Gardens eNingizimu yonkana nje,"kucacisa uKurt Peter, umqondisi wezemisebenzi, eSun City Resirt. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NORALA ROSS KULENOMBOLO YASESUN INTERNATIONAL U: (011) 780 7684.


Hamba kokuluhlaza eSun City
I-Sun International kusemqondweni wayo ngokugcwele emsebenzini wayo ekuvikeleni imvelo kanye nokusebenzisa imvelo ndlela.
Amanzi yiwo mhlawumbe ayinto ebalulekile ezweni lase-Afrika neLost City eSun City yenzelwe ukuthi iconsi neconsi lamanzi lenze umsebenzi omude. Ngesikhathi uGary Player ecelwa ukuyisayina iLost City Golf Course entsha wacelwa ukuqamba ikhozi ezoba engonyile yamanzi. Umphumela ikhozi eyisitayela sogwadule ngokomnotho. UGary neqembu lakhe bayaziqhenya eqinisweni lokuthi ama-hectare awu-30 kwangu-55 ekhozi ayachelewa amapayipi, kanye nezihlahla, umgwaqo omkhulu kanye nobuluhlaza kuluhlaza konke. Imihosha, imichachazo kanye nezimpophoma zekhozi zisebenzisa amanzi asebenzile asuka ekulungisweni kwezitshalo eSun City. " Asinawpo amanzi esizowamosa," kusho uGary, "ngokunjalo ikhozi kufanele ibe nomnotho, njengokwezitshalo."

I-Sun City isiyonke isebenzisa amanzi angangama-cubic meters awu-9 000 ngosuku uklingene ukufakela izidingo zedolobha elincane. Amanzi adonswa edamini iVaalkop okuyingxenye yokusebenza kwedamu iHartebeestpoort. I-Sun City inikezwe amanzi angangama-cubic meters awu-12 000 ukuwasebenzisa ngosuku, okwamanje, indawo isasebenza ngaphansi kwamanzi ayo.

Unginiyela othintwayo uPhilip Pybus weStewart, Scott Ltd, iyona ndoda eqondene nokusetshenziswa kwamanzi yiSun City nokukhucululwa kukadoti. Usimisele ngempela ukusebenzisa izikalo ezinikezwe iSun International endaweni yokuvakasha. " Ukugobhoza kwendawo yokuvakasha kusetshenzwa ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu ehlanzekile kanye nokubuye isetshenziswe ekhozini yegalofu.

"Amanzi ahlanzekile asetshenziselwa izidingo zeLost City Jungle. Uma kuikhona labo abathi lamanzi angasetshenziswa kangcono kwenye indawo, impendulo yami ingaba ethi uma inani lalamanzi elifanayo lalisetshenziswa ifemu, ekekho owayephakamisa iso. Futhi, iLost City inikeza imivuzo yomnotho engebalwe kubantu basendaweni, ngaphezu kokuba amafemu amaningi ayengenza." Njengengxenye yomgomo kahulumeni wesekhaya, imizi eminingi esondelene neSun City inikezwa izidingo ezingcono zamanzi, kanti futhi abaphathi bendawo bahlale befuna izindlela zokonga amanzi nokuxhasa imiphakathi eyakhele.

Lapho kunesidingo iSun City iyaxhasa kwezokubuyiselwa komkhiqizo. Inyanga ngayinye imithwalo egcwele yamagilasi, amathini, ama-plastic kanye namaphepha kuyabuyiselwa emumva, ngesikhathi izindimbane zamahenga epulasitiki ebuyiselwa kubawashi nasemalondolo ukusetshenziswa futhi. Esikhathini esifushane esedlule izinto zezeiqandisi zibuyiselwa ngegesi engenabuthi. Indawo isizinikele emklameni wokubuyisela ngkugcwele lapho wonke amathini namabhodlela asuka ezindaweni zokuphuza emahotela ziyahlungwa bese zidayiselwa izinkampani zokubuyisela. Ukwengeza kulokhu, Izibi zasemakhishini kanye nodoti nje zisetshenziselwa ukufundisa izingadi zimifino zasePalace. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO U; (011) 780 7684


Izindlu zaseSun City  Hamba ngendlela nge Guestlink Global
Umabonakude wokuxhumanisa onikeza ukuxhuma usendlini nge-cumputer, ukuxhumana kwezivakashi iSun City isibe ngumholi embonini yezokunakekela eNingizimu Afrika ngokuveza kwayo kokuqala ukufakelwa kweGuestlink Global, umabonakude wokuxhumanisa osetshenziswa izivakashi ezindlini zazo.

Lendlela inikeza izivakashi ukungena kwi-internet, I-email, indlela yokuthola izikweletu zazo, ukubuka ivideo kanye , okokuqala, nokusetha ucingo olungenakuduka oludlula kwiGuestlink TV. Akufani nezindlela zakuqala lapho i-internet yayingasetshenziswa ngabasebenzisi abambalwa ngesikhathi esisodwa, iGuestlink Global Interactive Television inikeza inombolo engagcini yabavakashi ukungena entweni eyodwa. Imilayezo itholakal ngokwethembeka, icacile futhi ngokushesha, kanti futhi lendlela iyayigcina imilayezo yezivakashi eziyithola  ngesikhathi zihlezi. Lendlela yeGuestlink Global Interactive Television inikezwa abakwa-TTS Telcall Television Systems, umnikezi ezifundeni esiseNingizimu Afrika. U-Riku Karlsson, usekela Mongameli we-Operations yeGuestlink eFinland, wathi iTTS yakhonjwa njengomnikezeli wesifunda ngoba enedlela yakhe ende ukuzikhethela okuthandayo embonini yokunakekela umhlaba wonke. "I-TTS ihlanganyele nathi esikweni lethu bese ithatha inikeza izinga eliphezulu lomsebenzi ofundelwe odingwa yilemboni," kusho yena.

Umqondisi wezemisebenzi weSun City uSteven Bagg wathi ukufakelwa kwalendlela ezindlini zasePalace yeLost City, ihotela iSun City, ihotela iCascade kanye neCabans, kwayingxenye yonke yohlelo olwegcina indawo yokuvakasha ibe ephezulu kwintuthuko yezesayensi umhlaba wonke - noma ngaphezulu kwayo ngezinye izindlela. "Izivakashi zethu  abantu abolwazi lwezinto ngokwedlulele abajwayele izinto ezingcono kakhulu umhlaba ongazinikeza. Izinto ezifana nalezi ziqinisekisa ukuphinde zibuye futhi."

"I-TTS iyazihlangabeza izidingo ezintweni eziningi," kusho uGraham Wood, iChief Financial Officer yeSun City. " Kwakubalulekile kithina ukuthi umfakeli wamabonakude wezokuxhumana esamkhetha kufanele afakele zonke izinto ezidingekayo. I-TTS inikeza umabonakude bese ixhuma amakhebula , ifakele izithombe, I-software ne-hardware, bese beganda umsebenzi uma usuxhunyiwe. Konke lokhu kukhokhelwa kancane kanca eminyakeni ewu-5. Inkampani nayo isithuthuke kakhulu ngalomsebenzi wayo omuhle, isisebense lomsebenzi iminyaka engu-27." 

Ngokomphathi wezinto zokusebenza we-IT emnyangweni we-computer eSun City, uFeddie Siebert, lendlela isetshenziswa nge-remote control esetshenziswa ngobungane noma ibhodi lokhiye elixhunyiwe, ukuvimbela isidingo sokuxhuma ibhodi yokhiye nomabonakude. Kusho ukuthi lendlela ingasetshenziswa noma kuliphi ikhona lendlu. Manje izinga lazo zonke izivakashi ezihlala ePalace yeLost City naseSun City ehotela elikhulu, lendlela yohlobo lokuqala izofakelwa ngokushesha nakuwo wonke amanye amahotela ezokuvakasha. " I-internet yasendlini manje isisezingeni eliphezulu kubavakashi bamazwe nagmazwe kanye neTTS iyaqhubeka nokucelwa amanye amahotela aholayo ukufakela loluhlelo. Entsha iGuestlink Gobal ingeyokuqala yohlobo lwayo kanti futhi izogcwalisa konke okufunwa abavakashi", kusho uSm Danon, uMD weTTS. Okwamanje kwangaphezu kuka-1 300 amahotela kanye nasezindlini ezingaphezu kuka-250 000, iGuestlink ingumholi kwezobuchwepheshe kwezokuxhumana emahotela. Ngoba yiwo umgomo wabo kulomsebenzi, iGuestlink iyakwazi ukuthuthukisa nolungisa lomsebenzi njalonjalo. Esivumelwaneni phakathi kweTTS namahotela, yonke imali engenayo ngenxa yalendlela, iyahlukaniswa ngokulingana. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa sicela uthintane noLara Ross kulenombolo yocingo u: 011 780 7684 noma uRonel eTTS ku; 011 466 1803.



Ukuhlangana nemvelo eSun City
I-Sun City izihlanganise nobuhle obukhangayo, imidlalo kanye nezokuzithokozisa. Kodwa indawo iphinde inikeze futhi amathuba amahle ukuhlangana nemvelo ekuqaleni nje. Indawo inobobo lwayo kanye nakwesokudla sayo iGame Reserve engangama-hectare awu-55 000 (136 000 - acre).

I-Sun Iternational ifakela ngkwezimali ekuthuthukeni kwe-reserve, ebizwa ngokuthi iPilanesberg National Park, Futhi isiyisize ukuba enye yezinhle kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika. Ipaki iyindawo yemvelo ye"Big Five"; ngaphandle kwamabhubesi, kukhona izindlovu eziwu-55 kanye nezinyathi eziwu-80 kanye nomphakathi ophilile wobhejane nengwe. Ingulube, ihippo kanye nengwenya nakho kukhona ngezinombolo ezimbalwa. Idlelo ligcwele imihlambi yezinyamazane. Kulula ukumaka inkolongwane, itsessebe, insephe, igemsbok,  ired hartebeest, iwildebeest, indlulamithi kanye nezinye izilwane ezinkulu eziwu-17 ezidla okuluhlaza. I-pilanesberg indawo enhle ukufunda ukuthi imvelo isebenza kanjani ihlangene ngaphambi kokuthi umuntu abe khona, kanti futhi kukhona nezinye izinto ezinhle  nabavakashi abafundayo ezisepaki. Kukhona indawo yokungena epaki eyimizuzu embalwa ushayela kusuka emahotela Sun City, ngaleyondlela kulula ukuhlala endaweni ewuhlobo lwe-five-star esezingeni eliphezulu futhi ube uchitha izinsuku zakho endaweni evulekile enezinto eziningi. Abavakashi futhi bangahlala epaki. IManyane Complex iyindawo engangama-hectare awu-10 engaphakathi kothango lukagesi; kukhona inkambi yetende, izindlu zohlobo lamaswisi, indawo yamacaravans awu-100, amachibi amabili okubhukuda, indawo ethengisa ngokudla kanye nendawo yokukhempa. IComplex inesizinda sokufunda lapho kukhona izifundo zempilo yasendle ezinikezwa abasebenzi basepaki.

EManyane kukhona izindlela eziphephile ezihanjwa abavakashi uma behamba ngabodwana lapho behalangana khona nezilwane ezingenalaka ezifana nempofu, ikudu, iphiva, impala kanye neindlovudawana. Kukhona izihlobo zezinyoni eziwu-250 epaki; eManyane eziningi zazo zingafundeka ngokwezinhlobo ezimbili . Ezinye izinkambi ezibiyelwa iBosele, enekamelo elilala abantu abaningi kanye nezinto zokupheka zamaqembu amakhulu; iMakwe, enamatende awu-10 kanye nezindlu ezifana nezamaSwizi eziwu-10; iMetswedi, enamatende awu-6; iKololo eyinkambi encane kunawo wonke, enamatende awu-4 acokanyiswe entabeni. Isivakashi singashayela imoto yaso epaki emigwaqeni engangamakhilomitha awu-160 emihle, ame endaweni yepicnic evikelekile ngokubiyelwa. Kodwa izindawo zokushayela ubuka indawo, izindawo zokuhamba kanye nokundiza ngamabhaluni kungabhukhwa ngenkampani yesivumelwano - iPilanesberg Safaris, enehhovisi ehotela iSun City. Izinhlobo zemithi emilayo yemvelo zePilanesberg ziyaheha ngobuhle, kodwa iJungle yaseLost City iyahlula. Ihlathi eladla izigidi ezingu-21 zamarandi, elingangamahectare awu-25 (62 acres), limilwe izitshalo eziyizigidi eziwu-1,5 kanye nezihlahla eziqhamuka ezindaweni ezehlukene zezwe; uhhafu wezitshalo eziwu-4 000 azikaze zitshalo ngaphambili.

Ijungle inezindawo eziwu-22 ezehlukene ezimele isikhathi esomile esiswakeme sezulu.  Ehlathini lemvula, izihlahla ezifana ne-ebony, nezingqangu zokhuni lobisi kanye nebhishi ebomvu, ende enkungwini. Hhayi kude kakhulu, kungxenye eile izihlahla zohlobo lwe-baobab kakhulu enyanyathekile ngamagatsha ayo. I-Aloe Suzannae yase Madagascar inezimbali ezinde ngangamamitha awu-5. Ezinikeza iphunga elihle ngokuqandula ikhanda ebusuku kanye namalili angaphezu kuka-60 000 amile kakhulu kwenye ingxenye yehlathi. Kunezitshalo zepalm lapho ezingaphezu kuka-300 okubalwa kuzo eziphuma eUSA, ePanama, e-Ecuador kanye naseFiliphi. Emaphethelweni ehlathi kukhona ama-euphorbias aphuma eSaudi Arabia kanye nomunga kwekameli osuka eKallahari Desert, ohlangene nehlathi lemvelo lazeNyakatho Ntshonalanga. Kulendawo, iReebok  nnoNkonka abaphuma ePilanesberg National Park beza ngokubonakala okukhulu; kanye neKudu isiyabonakal ngamawindi ePalace. Omoya opholile nomnandi wejungle usudonse isibalo esikhulu sezinyoni nezilwane. Umhleli wendawo uPatrick Watson watshala izihlahla zefig kuzo zonke izingxenye, ngoba zidonsa izinyoni; kude le, izilwane ezingaphezu kuka 190 izinhlobo zazo sezenze ihlathi laba ikhaya lazo. Abavakashi bangancoma indawo eyingcwele, amahansi aseGibhithe amadada. Ingxenye ye-boababa isidonse izintaka zendawo, amantiyane, kanye nokudla okundizayo kwangaphakathi. Ipredators enjengokhozi lweWalburg kanye neqhawekazi elinomqala omnyama kucekela phansi umphakathi wezilwane ezihuquzela ngesisu. Izimfudu ezinobungani kanye nemhlwathi, azinangozi kumuntu, kuyenzeka zibonakale.

Izindawo ezinamanzi kwijungle zigcwele kakhulu izinhlanzi ezingaphezu kuka-9 000, okubalwa kubo nebhavula, itilapia kanye nolunye uhlobo lwenhlanzi olungandile. Kukhona izihlelo zokwazisa imvelo yendabuko. Uma usexhaphozini lamanzi emgodini weshumu nantathu waseLost City Golf Course kukhona izingwenya zaseNile eziwu-36, ezinye zazo zicishe zibe amamitha amabili ubude. Zakhuliswa ezingadini zaseKwena eSun City, lapho izingwenya ziyinanto eheha abavakashi kuleyandawo. Uhamba ukhululeke endaweni eyakhiwe ngokhuni, abavakashi kwesinye isikhathi baba novalo lokuthi bazokuwela phansi eduze kweFootloose, ende ngangamamith awu-4,7 yesilisa. Eduze kwehotela iCascades, ineti esongeleke phakathi kwezihlahla ezinkulu yakha indawo enkulu yokuhamba ngaphansi lapho abavakashi bebuka khona amakhulukhulu ezinyoni zihamba phezu komhlaba.  Kukhona amagwinsi aphuma empumalanga ye-Afrika nase-India, nezinyoni ezinezifuba ezibomvu eziphuma eChina kanye nopholi abaphuma kude nempumalanga. Izilwanyana zendabuko  zisukela  kwmancane amantiyane nema-wydahs kuya  kumandwa amkhulu. Indlu yokufuyela izinyoni inikeza amathuba ambalwa ukubona izinyoni nokuthatha izithombe kalula kunokuzibuka nje ngaphandle. Ubuhle obukhangayo kanye nolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba ksengxenyeni eyodwa yeSun City. Kubavakasheli bemvelo, Indawo yokuvakasha enkulu kunazo zonke eNingizimu ne-Afrika inikeza ukujula, edlile kakhulu  emvelweni yomhlaba. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Osaziwayo kanye nabadlali abadumile be-Major Lost City Cycling Challenge

I-Jacaranda 94.7fm, esakaza ngomoya ukuzuzela umdlavuza. U-Miss South Afrika uSonya Raciti uzobe ekhona ephakathi kwabavakashi bethu abaphezulu kwi-Cansa Lost City Cycle Challenge yesibili ezoba khona eSun City nasezindaweni ezizungezile ngoSeptember 4 ngokosizo lweCancer Association of South Africa (cansa).

Uzobe ehola uhla okubalwa kulo noMiss Gauteng Heidi van Zyl kanye nabagibeli bamabhayisikili abaphezulu uGary Beneke noRobbie McIntosh  noJacques Fullard ( owawina i1999 Argus). Lomdlao wamabhayisikili, oqala kubagibeli bamabhayisikili abaqalayo kuya kompetha, futhi onomklomelo wokuqala wenkulungwane eyodwa yamarandi, uzoba ngaphezu kwamakhilomitha awu-103, awu-69 kanye nawu-19, uhlaswe iSun International, iJacaranda 94.2fm, I-Old Mutual, iReebok, iPowerade kanye ne-Amino Research, kanye nabanye abaxhasi abazibandakanyile. Abagqugquzeli babiza abazibandakanyile kulomdlalo owadonsa abadlali abawu-1 800 ngonyaka odlule. Umdlalo weqembu nawo uyalungiselelwa. Izindlela ezintathu zizovumela noma ubani kusuka kwizimfundamakhwela kuya ezinganeni ukuzijwayeza ukubamba iqhaza kanti futhi abaqedayo bazothola amamedali. Abaqedayo kumjaho wamakhilomitha awu-103 bazothola amamedali esiliva angango-60mm.

Imali yokungenela, ezodluliselwa esikhwameni se-CANSA, iwu-R40 kumdlali mgamunye, uma ikhokhwa ngaphambi kuka-14/08/99, kanti izoba uR60 uma ikhokhwa eSun City ngobusuku buka-September 3. Amafomu okungenela angatholakala ezitudiyo zeJacaranda 94.2fm  eSamrand, ezitolo zomdlalo, ebhukwini iRide noma kwi-website, www.trigon.co.za/lostcity.Indawo yokulala yabazibandakanyile kanye nabalandeli babo ilungisiwe eCabanas eSun City. Inani ledlu eyidabuli, kubalwa nokudla kwasekuseni kwababili behlanganisele uR578,00 umuntu emunye ubusuku obubili, kanti inani ledlu yoyedwa uR1 048 ubusuku obubili. Izindlu zemindeni zizobiza uR692 umuntu emunye ehlanganisele ubusuku obubili kubalwa nokudla kwasekuseni, kanti ezabodwana zizoba uR1276 iyodwa.Imali yendlu yezingane uR120 ubusuku bubodwa. Ukubekisa, sicela ushayele uEvril noma uBonnie kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780 7586/7482. Imibuzo ingaqondiswa ngokushayela lenombolo: (012) 379 4616 noma (012) 664 2498 emva kwesikhathi somsebenzi.



I-Lost City
Umcabango ohahayo weminye yemiqondo ekhaliphe kakhulu yaseNingizimu Afrika, uSol Kerzner, wadonsa isizwe ngesikhathi iLost City ivulwa ngoDecember ka-1992.

Ukuqanjwa kabusha kwempucuko endala eyinsumansumane okukhona kuyo umhlaba omkhulu wamanzi, ihlathi elicinene kanye nejungle enePalace njengoba indawo engemumva kwaba isenzeko esibalulekile seSun City. Ukuzijabulisa ngeSpearheading eNingizimu Afrika, iSun City ilethe ukukholeka kweLost City kubantu. Indaba yasendulo inakho lokho.... "Amakhulu eminyaka ngaphambi kokuba imikhumbi emide kuphushwe ngayo, kude ngaphambi kokuqala kwempucuko yasentshonalanga. Isizwe samaNomadi eNyakatho ne-Afrika saqala ukufuna umhlaba omusha, izwe loxolo nokuningi. Isizwe sasifuna iminyaka eminingi sifuna lendawo yemilingo, kwathi ekugcineni isicelo sabo sabuyiselwa. Indawo abayithola ngaseNingizimu yaba indaba yasemandulo iValley of Sun, eyaziwa namhlanje ngeValley of the Waves. Akukona ukuthi baletha ubunyoninco bamasiko kuphela, kodwa bafika nolwazi lokwakha olwaluseceleni okunanamhlanje ngokwezinga. Kukhona okuthile okuyigugu okwaqanjwa: kusukela ekuqhakazeni kwesiningolo idolobha elimangalisayo elinePalace enhle ngendlela emangalisayo". Umlando weLost City ushiwo izizwe zase-Afrika zesifunda saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, ungokutholakala kwempucuko eyayilahlekile ekucinaneni kweValley of Waves. I-Valley of Waves ungumnikazi wokuqanjwa kabusha kwamapaki amanzi emhlabeni - Umbuso wokuzijabulisa wabafuni bokuvusa amadlingozi. Lapho abavakashi bekwazi ukujabulela uhambo lwe-spine-chilling kuya phansi ezindaweni ezingaphansi komhlaba kanye nohambo oluqonde ebhishi engakholeki.

Ukujabulela iValley of Waves kuqala njengoba usuke ubeka unyawo ngaphandle emhlabeni wamaphupho weGrand Pavilion, uya eBridge of Time. Ingwe enkulu eqube edwaleni igade iTemple of Creation. Maqabuqabu,  ukudonseka kwentambo eqaqekayo kushona phansi emhlabeni ophumela ngaphandle kwe-Temple, amehlo engwe ayashintsha abe bomvu, intuthu nesitimu esiphuma emiseleni yedwala. Imisindo yamatshe ancibilikayo ehlihliza  ebhadla amagwebu kungezwakala njengoba egobhoza  ngaphansi kweBridge of Time, okuvevezela  ngokuqhumuka okunamandla. IBridege of Time ingukwahlukana ngokwebanga kusuka eValley of Waves kuya eHall of Treasures. I-Hall of Treasures umhume onobungcweti obumangalisayo, obonakala uvezwe ngaphandle kwedwala kodwa  okunjengomucu obonakala ngamehlo - Indawo yombukiso ongajwayelekile nongakhohleki nemicimbi. Ukuthola inselela yedolobha lakudala njengoba uzobuza kulamahectare angu-25 esinyokotho esizungeze iValley of Waves. Umklamo owenziwe umuntu wendawo oqukethe okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-1.6 zezihlahla, izitshalo kanye zokwedlaleke phansi. I-Palace, okungubucwebe beLost City ihotela eligidlabezayo lamaphupho elihlelwe laba okuphikisana nesifunda sePilanesberg. I-Palace izungezwe izintaba kanye namadlelo amangalisayo ase-Afrika. I-Lost City - izwe lombono nokufanekisa.


Izingane nazo zingadlala umjaho wamabhayisikili e-Cansa Lost City Cycle Challenge

I-CANSA Lost City Cycle Race engomhlaka-4 ngoMgqibelo kuSeptember  ka-1999, ithembisa ukuba injabulo kumndeni wonke ngokwengezwa ngemidlalo yamabhayisikili akwaChappies anamasondo amathathu ezingane ezincane ezineminyaka esukela kwemibili kuya kweyisithupha. Lomdlalo wokuzijabulisa olula oyindlela yekhilomitha elilodwa ivulelwe kuzo zonke izingane ezineminyaka ephakathi kwemibili neyisithupha amabhayisikili aba anamasondo amathathu, iBMX, iskuta noma noma anamasondo amabili noma amathathu. Umhleli uWerner Theron uthi akomdlalo walutho." Kungumdlalo wokuzijabulisa ozodinga ukugewuka okuningi kunokuthilaza." Futhi ayikho imiklomelo kwabawinile, kodwa umngeneli ngamunye uzothola ikapisi lakaChappies, ibheji eliyinkinobho kanye nemedali ngokuqeda umjaho. Ukwengeza, bonke abangeneli bangena mahhala eSun City's Valley of the Waves ngosuku lokunikezelwa  ibheji eyinkinobho yakwaChappies. Imali yokungenela uR20 ingane iyinye kanye nenani lomndeni eliyisipesheli likhona lwezingane ezimbili noma ngaphezulu eziqhamuka emndenini owodwa. Imali izodluliselwa kwaCANSA. Umphathi wamaka wakwaChappies uTshihulwane Tshivhase uthi inhloso yeChappies National Tricycle Series ukugqugquzela abangeneli ezintweni ezenziwayo ngomzimba kusuka umuntu esemncane."Ukungenela kwezemidlalo kuyingxenye ebalulekile empilweni engcono yomzimba, ukubhalansisa impilo njengomuntu omdala," uthi, "Futhi isikhathi esihle sokuqala ukugqugquzela lesitayela sempilo yiso lesisikhathi saleminyaka." I-Chappies Tricycle Ride eSun City ngomhlaka-4 kuSeptember iqala ngo-09:00. I-Chapiie Chipmunk kanye nabanye abadlali abathandwayo bazobe bekhona ukujabulisa izingane emva komdlalo. Abangeneli bayamenywa ukuvakashela iKamp Kwena, ikilabhu yezingane yosuku yaseSun City. Ikilabhu inikeza imidlalo eyisipesheli, okubalwa kuyo ukujomba izindlwana, imibukiso yasesiteji, imidlalo yomculo nemidanso, ukudla u-ice -cream, ukupenda ubuso kanye nokunye kokuzijabulisa. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa noma ukungena, thintana noLara Biesot-Thoron kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 477-3399 noma nge-email mitten@mweb.co.za. Ukungenela kuzobe kwamukelwa nangoLwesiHlanu, ngomhlaka-3 kuSeptember phakathi kuka-17:00 no-20:00 kanye nango-07:00 ngalo usuku.




I-Valley of Waves
I-Valley of Waves indawo emaphakathi yeLost City. Lomhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika ucwilisa abavakashi emoyeni wasemandulo kanye nasempucuko yakwamanye amazwe.

I-Valley of Waves, emandulo eyayiyi-"Valley of the Sun", ungumpetha wezokuzithokozisa ngamapaki amanzi emhlabeni - umbuso wokujabula wabafuni bezokuvusa amadlingozi. Umfula iLazy ongagcini ngamazombezombe azungeza isiqhingi seValley of the Waves ngamamitha angu-500, uthwele amanzi ayizigidi ezimbili zamalitha kanye nezingane ezizijabulele, ezile zilunguza kancane emabhamuzeni amanzi emashubhini okubhukuda anemibala. Isiqhingi sinomuzi wasemandulo okunesitolo sezinto zokubhukuda, isitolo soswidi kanye nendawo yokudla. Kukhona amakhapheshana kanye nezindlu ezinesikhathi kanye nempahla yokuqashwa. I-Roaring Lagoon ingokwedlulele okugcwalisa injabulo.Njalo emizuzwaneni engu-90, insimbi iyakhala ukuvusa izinzwa zakho. Igagasi elingango-1,8m ukuphakama nomshudo ongango-35kms ngehora lishaya isihlabathi sasebhishi sisidonsa kanye nalo odongeni. Okulingana neRoaring Lagoon iTemple of Courage. Izinhliziyo zabanesibindi ziwela phansi ngamamitha angu-17 uwolokohlo lwamanzi, agijima ngaphansi kwebhuloho bese engenela echibini lokubhukuda ekugcineni komshushuluzo - akukona kwabanezinhliziyo ezingaphilile.

Ukwengeza kwiTemple of Courage imishushuluzo ewu-4 yamanzi. Ngakwesonkunxele seTemple of Courage kukhona imayini yeDayimane, okuyindawo yokusuka yomjaho omazombezombe. Ichibi lokubhukuda elincane  elinikeza ukugeza okuncane nje emva kokuvuka kwamadlingozi ngomjaho ngasendaweni eshelelayo iScorpio. I-Tarantula engaphansi komhlaba ivusa amadlingozi nayo - ezungezwe ubumnyama, engahlome ngalutho kodwa ngeshubhu, uhamba emihosheni engaphansi ezintabeni uthatha ikhefu ngesipiti. Olalela umsindo obangwa uwena udududuma umuntu okujaha ngemumva naye ohamba emaceleni entaba. Njengoba usuphumela elangeni awulindi ukukhwela intaba futhi uzisabise wena futhi ngokunganteli. Abathameli belanga bangathamela ilanga endaweni ezungeze izindawo zeRoyal Baths ngesikhathi bezijabulisa ngotshwala obuyingxubevange okumnandi okutholakala endaweni eseceleni kwechibi lokubhukuda iObservatory Bar  ebukela ngaphesheya iRoaring Lagoon.  I-Amphitheatre evulekile eseduzane - I-Royal Arena ikhona ngokokuzithokozisa okudlalwayo futhi ingahlala ababukeli abangu-800. Kukhona okuthile komuntu ngomuntu eValley of Waves - impilo enika amandla amasha endaweni emangalisayo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



I-Palace yeLost City engcono kunawo wonke e-Afrika.
I-Palace yeLost City engcono kunawo wonke e-Afrika ngokukwe US Conde Nast Traveller. I-Palace yeLost City eseSun City indawo yokuvakasha ephambili e-Afrika - futhi lokho kusemthethweni. Ngokomthetho weUS Conde Nast Traveller, ibhayibheli lezokuhamba undiza amazwe ngamazwe, lelihotela eliyindawo yokuvakasha egidlabeza ngako konke nenenjabulo yaseNingizimu Afrika lathatha umqhele wokubusa ngokubalwa okuphakeme kweReaders' Choice, equkethe abafundi bayo abangaphezu kuka-30 000.

Umhleli ophethe weConde Nast Traveller, uThomas J Wallace, unikeze umklomelo kwiPalace yeLost City ebukhazikhazini bomgidi eMalibu, eLos Angeles kulolesonto. Okokuqala ngqa izwekazi lase-Afrika liveze okwalo ekubaleni  kweConde Nast Traveller, okwenziwa minyaka yonke eseyize yaba ngu-11. Ngaphambilini, izindawo zokuvakasha zase-Afrika bezihlanganiswa nalezo zase-Asia, kanti iUS kanye nezindawo zase-Europe bezizimela zona ngokwazo. Abafundi bavota benikwe imibuzo ukuthi balinganise phakathi kwezindawo ezihlaba umxhwela nalezo ezibhedayo asebake bazivakashela, emikhakheni yezindlu, ukunakekelwa, ukudla/izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla, indawo, kanye nemidlalo nokwenziwa khona. I-Palace yathola amaphoyinti amaningi, kulandela iMount Kenya Safari Club eyaphuma isibili, iLittle Govenors Camp eseKenya eyaphuma isithathu kanye neMala Mala eseNingizimu Afrika eyaphuma isine.

NgokweConde Nast Traveller - kanye nabafundi bayo abagxekayo - Ukugqama kwePalace yeLost City njengendawo ephezulu yezokuvakasha e-Afrika kusho ukuthi ukuyenga nalomgqumo wokuba engafani naluthu nakho kwenza indawo ibe ngephezulu ezindaweni eziwu-100 eziphezulu emhlabeni. I-Palace yeLost City ibekwa  kunombolo 38 emhlabeni ngokweConde Nast Travellers engcono kwezingcono ngo-1998 - Kumahotela nasezindaweni zokuvakasha, uPhilip Georgas, Umdondisi wezingxenye zezindawo zokuvakasha zaseSun International usethole ukuhloniswa okuphakeme. "Kubalulekile ukuthi umklomelo akuwona nje kuphela wokubukeka kwehotela  nokuhlelwa kwalo nokubaluleka kwesakhiwo, kodwa ngokusebenza kwalo okusezingeni eliphezulu nendawo yokulala ewubucwazicwazi," kusho uGeorgas.


Okungatholakali njalo kweLost City Kind 
Indawo yokuvakasha eSun City isiza ekwethulweni kwenja enkulu enhlalweni yemvelo into enkulu, Ngicabanga ukuthi ngiyanithanda... uReg Presley enza sengathi usho lamazwi - izinja ezinkulu zijabulela  lokhu kumemezela okumagange. Ukubukeka kwazo okungafani  nokwezinye, kwenza imvelo igqame nakho konke okwayo okwenza zibukeke.

Inja yasendle ingenye yezilwane ezisabekayo emhlabeni kanye nanokudela kwayo ngokugqama kwayo ngobungozi, kunesidingo esikhulu ukwakha nokuvikela umphakathi wezinja zasendle ezindaweni ezizifanele. Kuyisimo esiyingozi ukwakha iziqhingi zemiphakathi yezinja ezihlala ngazodwana kusuka esimweni ebezihlala kuso ukuze kuvikeleke umphakathi ekuhlaselweni izifo ezinkulu  nokuba uhlupho kwazo, ngalokho futhi kube kwengezwa inani nokwehlukana ngokofuzo. Ngokubhekwa kwazo okunokucophelela, Izinja zasendle zingahlaliswa futhi zigadwe endaweni ezilungele, engacobelela ngokubaluleka ukwanda kwazo ngendlela youkuphila kwezilwane. Indawo engamahectare angu-55 000, iPilanesberg National Park engenaso isifo samalaleveva ezungeze indawo yokuvakasha iSun City ikwazile ukuqamba ngokuphumelela ukwethulwa kwezinhlelo zezilwane zasendle, khona maduzane nje kubalwa nebhubesi nengulube yehlathi. Isibe indawo ekulungele ukulinga ukufaka nezinja zasendle. " Sinesibopho ezilwaneni ukuzinikeza indawo enjengezulu eliphephile", kusho uGus Van Dyk - oyiField Ecologist, ePilanesberg National Park". Ulwazi olotholakele ngokulinga lesisenzo luzoba ukufaka isandla okukhulu echibini lomhlaba wonke lolwazi oludingekayo ukulondoloza nokugcina izinja zasendle".

Amapaki aseNyakatho Ntshonalanga kanye nebhidi yezokuvakasha iqonde iSun International ukuthi ixhase ukufakwa kwezinye izinja futhi zasendle epaki. Ipaki ingumphetho wendawo yokuvakasha iSun City futhi idlala indawo ebalulekile kwezokuvakasha eziqondene nolwazi lwezemvelo. "Sasijabulela kuphela ukuzibophezela"kusho uPhilip Georges, umphathi wengxenye yezokuvakasha, eSun International."Kungumklamo ongakholeki nokho kanye nezinkulungwane zabavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe nabendawo abeze eSun City bazozuza ngokukwazi ukubuka lezizilwane ezingejwayelekile endaweni abahlala kuzo"Okwamanje kukhona ezimbili zesifazane ezindala kanye nabandlwane abahlanu (okukhona kubo ababili besifazane kanye nabathathu besilisa) endaweni ehlelwe kahle abahlala kuyo ePilanesberg National Park. Imindlwane ingangezinyanga eziwu-7 ubudala. Izinja zasendle zatholwa epulazini eAll Days District esifundazweni saseNyakatho. Iqembu okubalwa kulo umbambi wangasese kanye nomzingeli oqeqeshiwe babamba iqhaza ukubamba lezizinja ngaphambi kokuthi umnikazi pulazi udicilele phansi lomhlambi, ngoba zazibamba imfuyo yakhe. Ngebhadi babengenalo ulwazi lokuthi iPilenesberg National Park yayiwufuna lomhlambi ngalokho abalisebenzisanga lelithuba ngaphambi kokuba baqala ukuzibamba base bethola ingxenye yomhlambi eyabanjwa.

U-alpha enye yezinja yesifazane kanye nemidlwane yakhe ewu-9 bambiwa ngaphansi komhume. Imidlwane yakhe yathunyelwa eWildcare (Animal Rehabilitation Centre) ukuthola ukunakekelwa okunobunyoninco nokondliwa kanti unina wathunyelwa eDe Wildt. Enye futhi yesifazane yabanjwa ekhejini elalicushiwe emhumeni. Ngalesisikhathi, isiFundazwe saseNyakatho sazibandakanya sakomondela izinja. Izinja zanikezelwa esifundazweni saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga ePaki yakhona kanye nakuTourism Board esimweni sokuthi izinja kwakufanele ukuthi zikhululwe. Eyesifazane esancane,  eyesifazane eyi-alpha kanye nemidlwane emihlanu yizona zilwane okwamanje sezisePilanesberg endaweni yazo. Eminye imidlwane izosetshenziswa ezinhlelweni zokugcina inzalo. Isikhathi sokugcinwa kwazo siyingozi njengoba sivumela izilwane ukuhlala endaweni yomsebenzi. Ukungeniswa kwezinja zesilisa akuthembakali kahle njengoba amathuba akhona awukuthi izinja zesilisa kanye nemidlwane zingevumelane zodwa hleze zixabane. Isikhathi sokuhlala kwazo sizonikeza izilwane ithuba lokubonakala kanye nokuqeqeshwa kufenisi wogesi, okubalulekile ukuthi izilwane kufanele zihlale ngaphakathi endaweni yazo. Kuzozinika isikhathi futhi sokuzifundisa zona uqobo ukuthi zingawathola kanjani amanzi, ukudla kanye nokwenziwa ibhubesi endaweni eseduze ezungeze indawo yazo. Lolulwazi luzosiza izilwane emasontweni okuqala zilandela ukukhululwa kwazo. Izinja ezinkulu zasendle eziphuma endaweni eyipulazi zijwayele ukuba ingozi, zibe namahloni futhi ziyaphunyuka ngenxa yokuhlupha kwazo okuqhubekayo. Kulandela isikhathi sokujwayela, izilwane kufanele zikhululeke bese zivumela abavakashi abahlakaniphile ukuthi bazibuke nokuthi kube lula ukuba kuzona. Imidlwane isiphinde yahlanganiswa nezinja ezindala zesifazane kanti manje imizamo ukuthi kutholakale ezinye zesilisa ezimbili noma ezintathu ukuze umhlambi uphelele. Imizamo yokuthi kutholakale ezesilisa ezimbili eZimbabwe noma eBotswana okwamanje iyazanywa. Uma nje ezesilisa sezingenisiwe emhlambini umhlambi ungakhululwa. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Iphepha elinamaqiniso ngePalace yeLost City
UMLANDO: "Eminyakeni engamakhulukhulu ngaphambi kokuthi imikhumbi kuphushwe ngayo, kudala ngaphambi kwempucuko yasentshonalanga, isizwe namaNomadi siqhamuka enyakatho ne-Afrika sabekisa sifuna umhlaba omusha, umhlaba woxolo kanye nokuningi."Isizwe safuna iminyaka eminingi sifuna okufana nendawo yemilingo, kwathi ekugcineni isicelo sabo saphendulwa. Izwe abalithola laliseningizimu laba umlando weValley of the Sun, eyaziwa namhlanje ngeValley of Waves. Akukona nje ukuthi baletha nabo isiko elinothile, kodwa baletha namakhono okwakha okwakuyinto eseceleni nje okunanamhlanje ngokwezinga.Kukhona okuthile okwaqanjwa: Kusuka ekuqhakazeni kobobo idolobha elimangalisayo nePalace enhle ngendlela emangalisayo,umhlaba onothe ngaphezu ngokwedlulele  ababengakaze bawubone ... Njalo ukuqhekezeka komhlaba kwayiveza indawo enhle kangaka, abasindayo babaleka, ababuye besabuyela emumva base beyishiya yatholwa futhi yabuyiselwa abacwaningi bemvelo emakhulwini eminyaka  emva kwalokho. Namhlanje sesiyibuyisele esimweni sayo sodumo"Zitholele ihotela elimangalisayo ngokwedlulele emhlabeni"... INDAWO iPalace itholakala ekucinaneni kokwena  kwesifunda sePilanesberg sezwe laseNingizimu Afrika. Izungezwe izintaba kanye namahlathi amangalisayo ase-Afrika kanti okubuqamama nje iPilanesberg National Park lapho izindlovu, obhejane, amabhubesi kanye nezilwanyazane ezincane ziziphilela ngokukhululeka endaweni yazo yemvelo. UKUFUNYANISEKA  eGauteng, indawo enkulu yezamabhizinisi ingangamakhilomitha awu-187 ubukude. Isikhumulo sezindiza iJohannesburg International Airport iyatholakala khona lapho, okutholakala kuso izindiza zangaphakathi nezamazwe aphesheya. I-Pilanesberg Airport iyimizuzu eyishumi nje kuphela ukusuka eSun City kanti futhi inikeza izindiza iSA Express Airways ukuya  nokubuya eGoli naseKapa kanye nezindiza zangasese.
