IZITHUTHO ZASESIKHUMULWENI SEZINDIZA iSun City inikeza ukunakekela okumnene ukuya noma ukubuya ePilanesberg Airport AMAKHADI OKUKWELETA Wonke amakhadi okukweleta asetshenziswayo ayamukelwa UKUGQOKA Ngosuku:Okuzothile Ebusuku: Izinhlobonhlobo zengqephu yezokuvakasha iVilla del Palazzo: Ukubukeka kakhulu OKWANGAPHANDLE NOKWANGAPHAKATHI iPalace yeLost City eSun City ingenye yezindawo ezidonsa abavakashi ngobuhle amhlabeni, ukwethula umcabango womuntu nendawo yekhaya kwezobuciko nokwakha kusuka eminyakeni yamakhulukhulu eyadlula e-Afrika. Okuzungeze ihotela indawo engangamahectare awu-25 yobobo lwezimbali enezitshalo ezingaphezulu kuka-600 000, izihlahla kanye nemishana engatheni. Ihlathi elihle lohlobo lwezihlahla i-palms kanye nezihlahla zezithelo ezingekholeke, ihlathi eliswakeme letrophiki, ihlathi lezihlahla zomdabu ezomile, ihlathi lepalm yobukhosi elinepalm ezungeze ichibi lokubhukuda. Kunezihlahla esezikhule ngokwanele ezingaphezu kuka-4 000, okubalwa nezingamamitha angu-40 ubude, kusukela enkabeni yamahlathi ahlukene, kukhona nezinye izihlahla eziwu-240 000, ezinye zazo zinhle ngendlela emangalisayo - zikhula zisuke embewini. Ihlathi elicinene likhombisa imvelo ngezingxenye zayo ezintathu: ikhanophi eneqabunga elide ngangamamitha awu-40, ezilandela yona zinde ngokuyingxenye yazo, kanye nezitshalo emhlabathini ophansi. Kukhona nezitshalo eziyimvelakancane  kanye nezihlahla ezifana nohlobo lweDracaena ephuma eSeychelles, iAloe Suzannae ephuma eMadagascar, iEuphorbias ephuma eSaudi Arabia kanye nezinye izinhlobo eziningi ezingaphezu kuka-40 zepalm ezitholakala kubaqoqi bazo base-USA, ePanama, eEcuador kanye naseFilidi, ukubala nje ezimbalwa, Zakhuliswa endaweni yokutshala izitshalo ngaphambi kokuba zitshalwe ngaphandle. Izinyoni nazo ziyatholakala ngomnotho wempilo yenzinyoni ukujabula. Lendawo ecinene inezindlela zokuzihambele kanye nezimpophoma amaxhaphozi kanye namachibi kanye nezindawo eziningi okuqhamuka ngazo amanzi ezahlukene nezokuhamba. Isakhiwo sangaphandle sePalace sibuyekezwe impilo yezinto zasendle. Izinyoni ezinkulu ezinezimpiko ezivulekile zibonakala zindiza zisuka ezindongeni eziphakeme, ziya emibokweni yezindlovu phansi naphezulu kanye nasemabhulohweni kanye kanye nensimbi enkulu ebhulonze engenye yokudumile kwase-Afrika ibonakala ekugcineni kokungenela kweElephant Atrium yehotela, iShawu, indlovu ethandwa kakhulu engenye yezimpilo eziwu-7 zeKruger Park ...Indoba eyayibuyisela empilweni umqophi waseNingizimu Afrika uDanie de Jager,ngokwakhe umsebenzi wokubuyisela lendlovu ngensimbi bekungumsebenzi wothando. Kubonakala kufana nokunempilo ngoba kuthathelwe empilweni, kuwo wonke amakhona, kusuka ecosheni lendlebe ubude okungu-4,5 amamitha kusuka emhlabathini, kuya ekugcineni emazwaneni. U-Shawu ubuhle bodwa noma esefile.

Ukungena ePalace bumemezela ubuhle bayo. Umgwaqo wokushayela udlula ehlathini elomile lemaqabunga nezibi zezimpande zezihlahla ngaphambi kokuba ufike ebhulohweni elimangalisayo elihamba ngaphezu kwamanzi ayimpophoma namabhamuza bese ufika ebaleni elikhulu elinezihlahla ezimbili zePalm yaseWashington kanye nempophoma emangalisayo yengulube yehlathi, ngaphambi kwePorte Cochere. Ngaphambi kwezinyoni kukhona izinhla ezimangalisayo, kanye nezinyawo zendlovu ekuqaleni kwazo. Lokhu kuxhasa iPorte Cochere kanye nezingwe ezigadile emakhoneni ayo amane. Ngaphesheya kweyadi kuqhamuka umnyango omude ngangamamitha awu-8 ubude, onezicabha zawo eziyindilinga phezulu zokhuni ezimile zivuliwe zilindele ukwamukela abavakashi ePalace. Lendawo yokuhlaba ikhefu ikhombisa futhi ingaphakathi lePalace. Lelikamelo elingumhume lide ngangamamitha angu-25 ukuphakama nangu-16 ukuvuleka lihlelwe ngezinhla ezingu-6. Uphahla lwalo lunu-aculus maphakathi ludidiyelwe ngopende izinhla eziyisithupha zikhombisa ukucinana okungefaniswe. Okuzungeze lelikamelo izinhla eziyizingxenye, ezibekwe ukuphikisana nodonga, ngokudabula okwesikati nokuhlotshiswa ngokwetshe, kanye nokubunjwe ngesandla kugubha imvelo yomhlaba. Engxenyeni engaphesheya yekamelo kukhona umamukeli kanye nedesika lokwamukela, eliyindilinga  ngokwesandla kwesapele bomele ngaphezulu ngokwerosa verona nomabula we-quagga. Kwimaphakathi lekamelo, kumi itafula eliziphumulele emakhanda amabhubesi amane nengaphezulu lalo lendlalwe ngezinkuni ezizinhlobo eziwu-8 ezahlukene. Iphansi lalo liyamangalisa ngokwalo, linezinhlobo ezingu-38 zokuma komabula kanye negranite.Ngamunye undlalwe ngesandla wapholishwa ngesandla ngendlela enamaqabunga enhliziyweni izungezwe izilwane eziyizinhlobo eziyisithupha, yase imbozwa isiyingi esingaphakathi nesingaphandle ngokwemicu yezebhra. Ngale kwekamelo kukhona izitebhiso ezehlela eCrystal Court. Ukwakhiwa kwezitebhiso zakho kungubungcweti ngokwakho, ukuhlanganiswa kwebhulonze nezinhlayiya zetshe, zagqokiswa omabula. Isibani esinamagatshagatsha okukhanyisa esihle ngendlela emangalisayo esiseCrystal Court sikhombisa ubumsulwa bamaqabunga epalm, ngezibambo zawo ezenziwe ngebhulonze kanye namaqabunga uqobo lwawo ambozwe izinhlayiya zamatshe, kungangamamitha amahlanu ububanzi. Izinhlayiya, zingamamitha awu-15 ukuphakama, okubonakala kwenziwe ngepalm zeziqu zoqalo, kuboshwe kwakinayitelwa ngentambo, kwaphumelela ezinyaweni zendlovu echaza indawo yonke. Konke ukubonakala kwendlomvu kubuyangaze indawo yonke yeCrstal Court. Iminyango yengilasi, ihlelwe ngamamitha angu-7 ukuphakama, evulekela ngemumva bese inikeza ukubonakala okugingqikayo kweValley of Waves ... Yonke indawo umuntu uyabuka, umuntu ubona kuphela okwehlukile. AMAGUMBI EZIVAKASHI KANYE NOKUPHAKATHI   iPalace inamagumbi ayinani elingu-338 esewonke, okubalwa kuwo ajwayelekile angamabili, ajwayelekile amakhulu, awemindeni,awohlobo lwe-paraplegic, kanye nanobucwebecwebe.Kukhona izinhlobo eziyishumi nantathu zokuma kwezindlu ezehlukene, okuyizinhlobo ezitholakala ngeziyisithupha ezincane, eziyisithupha ezohlobo oluphambili, ezintathu ezobucwebecwebe kanye nenkulu kakhulu. Lena enkulu kunazo zonke ingukufinyeza ukukhombisa okuphathelene nobukhosi, nezindonga zayo ezihlotshiswe ngesandla ngokhuni lwe-mable kanti futhi akukho okungaphansi kuka-800 komuntu ngamunye, kuhlelwe ngokwesiko futhu kwenziwa ngesandla. Iyinye yalezindlu inombhede omkhulu, nendawo yokuhlala, indawo yedesika, i-armoire, izingcingo ezimbili ezinezintambo zangaphandle, indlwana yokugeza engaphakathi kanye nesigcini zincwadi. Kukhona futhi nedlu yesivakashi kapowder, i-sauna kanye nethala lenceku. Zonke izindlu ezijwayelekile zifana nesethi ngendlela ezihlotshiswe ngayo, nendawo yazo yokungena ehlotshiswe ngokomlenze wenkawu. Zonke nenesisefo sokugeza esihlukene ngendlu yokugeza engaphakathi. Indlu ngayinye ihlukene kwenye, esinye isitayela sinendawo yokuhlala enetafula nezihlalo eziphakeme ezimbili, izihlalo zokuphumula, itafula elakhiwe okwempala phezulu kanye ne-arnoire enomabonakude, isisefo kanye nesiteshi senceku. Ezinye zithanda ukuba zinkulu kanti zinosofa, isihlalo sokuphumula, iclover leaf ottoman, itafula lekhofi, idesika nesihlalo. Ukunakekelwa okuthile kuyanikezwa esivakashini ngasinye uma sifika ePalace. Izimoto ziyagadwa;yize noma ukupaka ngokwakho kuwukuzikhethela. Zonke izivakashi ziyaphelezelwa ukuya emagunjini azo ngabaphathelene neGuest Relations emva kokubhalisa, bese zaziswa ngokutholakalayo okuhlukene ePalace. Ukunakekelwa okukhulu kuyatholakala ezindlini zezivakashi, kusukela emathawuleni okusula ecaleni  ngalinye lombhede kuya kwawokugeza nobhasikidi oqukethe iziqedaphunga ezahlukene. UKUDLA iCrystal Court - ehlala abantu abangu-342 Ukuhlaba ikhefu, indawo ethengisa ngokudla ezungezwe umfula, othelelwa izimpophoma. Izinhla zamatshe amahle eziphumelela ezinyaweni zendlovu,  kanti impophoma emaphakathi iphophoma ngemumva kwezindlovu ezinamazinyo, lapho imiboko yazo ithululela amanzi ezitsheni sebhulonze. Indawo enkulu yekamelo inezihlalo eziwu-180 nenye indawo yokuhlala engahlala abantu abawu-100, kanye nabangu-62 endaweni nje engatheni. Indawo ethengisa ngokudla iseva ukudla kwasekuseni, okwasemini nokwasebusuku. Ukudla kukhombisa amatafula amazwe ngamazwe kodwa anomthelela wase-Afrika ngokunambitheka okunjengokwamachops esiklabhu iKaroo, imibengo yenkomo kanye nesifuba senkukhu ekhuliswe ngombila esisevwa nemifino kanye nokhali othelwe ngaphezulu, okuqalelwa mhlambe utamatisi onongiwe no-anyanisi oyisaladi onoshizi wepicorino onongwe ngogalige, upelepele kanye ne-antshovi. Okunye okuhehayo kulendawo ethengisa ngokudla itiye lantambama, elinikezwa ngezinhla ezintathu: amasamishi anokhukhumba, isalmoni, inkukhu kanye nenyama kuphelekezelwa amakokombane kanye nezithelo ezintsha  ezimbozwe ngokhilimu, ilamula kanye nezithelo ezilondolozwe ngoshukela zokuzenzela. Ukuzikhethela kokuningi ematiyeni ahlukene kanye nokuvutshelwe okusha. Umculo mkhoma uyanezezela emoyeni wokungcebeleka uziphumulele. I-Crystal Court ivula amahora angu-16 ngosuku, izinsuku eziwu-7 ngesonto. I-Villa del Palozza - ehlala abantu abangu-202 Ibonakala sengathi ibhokisana elincane lobucwebe elinombala livele emabhamuzeni amanzi, iVilla del Palazzo ibhekene neGrand Pool. Ukudla kudala izinga elisha eMzansi Afrika emakhishini aseNyakatho neNtaliyane, agcizelela ubuhle ngokukhonjiswa, kobumsulwa nokunambitheka. Izinto ezifana, neMozzarella esanda kwenziwa, upasta weSemolina, iBraseolla kanye nemnandi iTartuffos, iGelatos kanye nePatselles kwenziwa futhi kusevwe ngabapheki bokudla kwaseNtaliyane abakhethiweyo nabapheki beRanges, abathole ukuqeqeshwa okusezingeni eliphezulu ukubhekela amakhishi kanye nomsebenzi weVilla del Palazzo.

I-Palm Court Lounge - ehlala abantu abangu-23. Isondelene neVilla del Palazzo, iPalm Court Lounge iyindawo enhle kakhulu ukuhlangana khona kanti futhi yenziwe yaba yinhle ukuphuza iziphuzo ngaphambi kokudla kwakusihlwa nangemumva kwakho futhi ezisevwa izinceku ezinobungani,abakusiza ukuqambela indawo yokuphumula nefudumele. I-Pool Restaurant / iSnack Bar iPool Restaurant inikeza ukudla okugcizelela ebululeni bokungenela kusuka kumasamishi kuya kwawokungenela amasaladi kuya esitekini sefajitas. Ukuzikhethela ezihlotsheni zika-ice cream wokuzenzela, kanye nezinye izinhlobo zokudlana okumnandi ezihlukene, nazo ziyathoalakala. Itafula leziyoliso lidumile kanye neSnack Bar, kutholakala eduze kweGrand Pool okutholakala khona ingxubevange yomdabu ngaphansi komthunzi opholile wepavilion. Ukudlela endlini Ukudlela endlini nokudla ngasese endlini yakho noma endaweni yakho. Ukunakekelwa amahora angu-24. I-Tusk Lounge / Bar Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala esezingeni eliphezulu itholakala eTusk Lounge lapho idecor igubha khona indlovu enamazinyo emangalisayo eseyidonse imicabango yempilo yasendle yezithandani noma kuphi. Lezizindlovu eziyisithupha, ezime ngazimbili ngaphezu kweTusk Lounge zingamamitha awu-5,6 ukuphakama, isisindo singamathani amabili iyinye futhi zenziwe ngokhuni lwe-Indonesia Aquara, olusinda ngaphezu kwe-ebony,zase zihlanganiswa ngensimbi ezungezile. I-Tusk Lounge nendawo yayo yothswala nendawo elungiswe kahle ngaphezulu yokuhlala, zibhekene neValley of Waves kanye nechibi elimaphakathi. Ukwengeza ebar egcwele okokuthengisa, kukhona uhla lwamawayini kanye nokunakekelwa kwekilabhu, ihora lengxubevange kanye nokuhamba phambili okukhethwe kwi-hors d' oevres kuyasevwa ngokuhambisa nomculo onikezwa ipiano. ITAFULA / IZIDINGO ZOKUHLANGANA Ngaphakathi kwiPalace kukhona izindlu ezintathu zokuhlangana ezivulekela endaweni enendlovu ewumhume ebuyekezwe insimbi enkulu ekwakhiwe ngayo uShawu. I-Royal Chamber Enye yezindlu enobukhazikhazi eneminyango yayo eyakhiwe ngaphansi kwamafasitela ebhekene nezingadi. Lendawo enkulu ngokuphindwe kabili ingangenisa abantu abangu-90 bedili kanti abangu-120 abeze amhlanganweni. Itafula letshe elimangalisayo elihlotshisiwe lama emhumeni ngasekungeneni kweRoyal Chamber, lingasetshenziselwa ukubhalisa. Ngaphakathi eRoyal Chamber; uhlobo lomuthi oluthile oluhle lufinyelela phezulu luthinta uphahla oluhlotshisiwe kahle lapho amakhanda ezindlovu esebenza njengama-corbels. Kusukela ophahleni kulenga izibani ezine ezingazintathu ngohlobo lwebhulonze kanye nezimpondo zefaoux. Ekugcineni kude le egunjini kukhona itafula leconsole liziphumulele ezinyaweni zendlovu. I-Orchid Room / iProtea Room Ekugcinenei kude le emhumeni wendlovu, ngemumva kukaShawu, kukhona amagumbi amabili okubambela imihlangano, iyinye ingamamitha awu-7 ephindwe kawu-6,5, ingenisa abantu abangu-60 abahlangene. Indawo ithwele okuthile okunomsoco, izihlobo ezimangalisayo zezingadi. Izindonga zimbozwe okusandwangu ethambileyo okwe-aqua marine nezinyo le-palest. Ukugcizelela kwamaqabunga apendwe ophahleni, kanye nezibani zesitha samatshe kanye nezindonga ezihlotshiswe ngobhulonze zase zilengiswa amatshe. Amagumbi futhi amatshe enziwe ngesandla, amatafula econsole ocingo kanye nezihlalo ezinhle ezintofontofo. Yonke impahla enhle iyatholakala, yebo, futhi ihlala isesandleni amahora angu-24 ngosuku. Abasebenzi abaqeqeshiwe ukusiza abemihlangano. Amadili ePalace ayinto ehlale ikhumbuleka njalo ngenxa yokudla kwakhona okungefaniswe nangendlela okuhlelwa ngayo izinto ebukhazikhazini obuzungezile. EZOKUZITHOKOZISA / UKUNAKEKELA IZIVAKASHI Igalofu iGary Player Country Club iLost City Golf Course kanye neCountry Club Swimming Wonke amahotela anamachibi awo okubhukuda iSquash Sun City Complex: Izinkundla ezintathu zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili zitholakala eGary Player Country Club Waterworld Anikeza noma imuphi umcabango ngomdlalo wamanzi echibini lethu langasese elikhulu, okunjenge-jet -skiing, water-skiing kanye ne-parasailing. IWindsurfing iWavepool, iWavepool kanye neLazy River Ride kutholakala eValley of Waves iSafaris iSchedule Game Drives, iHot Air Balloon Flight, iPrivate Game-Drives kanye neRhino Trails ePilanesberg Game Reserves iHorse Riding Itholakala nje emva kweCabanas Hotel iTennis Eduze kweGary Player Country Club kunezinkundla eziyishumi nambili zethenisi, ezinompheme eziwu-5 Umdlalo wamabhayisikili nawo ayaqashisa eGary Player Country Club iJogging Izindlela zokugijima zihlelwe khona la ezinkundleni zegalofu.

I-Bowling Green Gym, iSauna, iJacuzzi, iMassage umbukiso waseTheatre Ibhayisikobho kukhona amabhayisikobho amane kanye kanye namaShowscan Cinema iDiscotheque imishini yokudlala imidlalo yasekhasino iGrand Pool Kusuka eGrotto Loggia, izitebhisi zikudonsela endaweni elungiswe kahle yeGrand Pool lapho kunendawo yokuhlala yabangu-200 ezihlalweni zokuphumula kanye nokubuka kanye kanye iValley of Waves. Indawo yokuhlala futhi yabangu-200 iyatholakala endaweni esasiqhingi. Izivakashi ziyaphelezelwa ukuya ezihlalweni zazo bese siyanakekelwa ngokufanela ukuthi zikuthole ngabasebenza endaweni yokubhukuda. Ukusevwa kotshwala obuyingxubevange kuyatholakala. Ichibi lokubhukuda lezingane litholakala endaweni ekujana neGrand pool, lapho izingwenya emaceleni, izinyoni kanye namaxoxo kukhala emanzini, kukhalela abancane kuya kubo. Indawana ethengisayo yePool itholakala eGrand Pool, Lendawana inikeza izinhlobonhlobo zamafutha ezokuzishukumisa, izinto zokugcoba, izibuko, okokuvikela ilanga, amabhuku kanye namaphephandaba. I-Lost City Golf Club Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili, ipar 72  ikhozi yegalofu ePalace, iyisitayela sekhozi ewugwadule eyahlelwa iGary Player Design Company. Ikhozi isiyonke isebenzisa isimo samahlathi emvelo ukuba yilobucosololo eyibo, nokukhombisa amadwala kanye nezindonga ezigugulekile ezibonakala ziyingozi, kanye nechibi lengwenya ephilayo emgodini weshumi nantathu. Indlu yekilabhu, emamitheni angamakhulu ambalwa ukusuka iPalace inikeza izinti ezijwayelekile, okubalwa kuzo izinduku zokushaya igalofu, izindlu zokushintsha, amakhabethe okugcina impahla, indawo ethengisa ngotshwala nokudla. IZITOLO ZEPALACE Iqoqo lePalace linikeza uhlobo oluhle lwezinto zelogo kusukela ezingubeni kuya eziphweni.Ingubo zendawo yokuvakasha. ITigers Eye inikeza izihlobonhlobo ukuzikhethela emsebenzini wezandla wase-Afrika.Imisebenzi yezandla kanye nokwesifunda okwenziwe ngezandla. IChales Greig Jewellers, Ubucwebe obuphambili baseNingizimu Afrika, inikeza izihlobonhlobo zokwakhiwa kobucwebe nokuhambisana nako. IRoyal Salon Ukuthola ukwenziwa izinwele ngabaqeqeshiwe, imanicures nepedicures. UKUNAKEKELWA KWEZIVAKASHI Idesika lokwamukela Umamukeli wethu unikeza usizo olophambili ekukuhleleleni nokukulungisela okokuzithokozisa kokubili ngaphakathi kwendawo nangaphandle. Umamukeli wethu angakusiza : ukukulungiselela uhambo lwakho - okokuhlala ingane yakho - izindawo ongazithanda - ezemidlalo - ukuthola ukuhamba ngelimozini ephambili - okokuthenga kanye nokwenziwayo okubalulekile - izinto zokubhala Umamukeli angakulungiselela izicelo zezivakashi zethu ukuthola ulwazi noma ukunakekelwa ezilimini ezahlukene zakwamanye amazwe kanti futhi lolusizo lutholakala amahora angu-24 ngosuku. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOMNYANGO, ISUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684


Ihotela eliholayo lomhlaba
I-Palace yeLost City - ukwethula umcabango kumuntu kanye nekhaya lobungcweti nezokwakha. Imibhoshongo ekuyiyona ebonakalayo ejubalele yePalace iyakuqhweba uma nje ungena eSun City Resort. Impilo yasendle emangalisayo ebaziwe kanye nemiboko yezindlovu okuveza ubukhosi bendawo kuyisethulo sokuqala emasikweni ase-Afrika kanye nendabuko. Uma ushayela udlula ihlathi elomile lekholali nezihlahla ze-camel-foot kanti phesheya kwebhuloho eligxamalazele ichibi lamanzi usungenile-ke  ebukhazikhazini bePalace. Ekufikeni kwakho ekungeneni kumlindisivalo, wamukelwa umlindisivalo wePalace ogqoke izingubo zendabuko zaseNyakatho ne-Afrika. Iminyango emangalisayo ubude bayo obungamamitha ungu-8 esandilinga yePalace evulekela kwenhle indawo le eqheliswe ngokupendwe ngesandla endaweni engamamitha angu-16 ububanzi. Iphansi elimangalisayo nalo elihlotshiswe ngesandla, indawo yokwamukela ehlotshiswe ngomabula phezulu kanye nedesika lomlindisivalo kunezela ubuhle bendawo.

Ngaphambili nje kwendawo kukhona iGrand Staircase eholela kwiCrystal Court Restaurant, enophahla olophakeme namamitha angu-30. Ukukhanya kubonakala ngezibani ezilenga phezulu ezibenyezela okwezinhlayiya zamatshe ezihamba ngazinhlanu. Ngaphansi kwezibani kukhona okusasitsha okuthwelwe izindlovu zebhulonze. Okuncikene nodonga lweCrystal Court izinhla ezingamamitha angu-15 ezilingisa ubunjalo bezinto zemvelo; amaqabunga epalm, izinyawo zendlovu, uqalo kanye ne-cordage. Amafasitela ayingobela, angamamitha angu-7 ubude, akubukisa ngaphandle ukucinana kwendawo kwezingadi zeLost City.

Okubonakala ezingadini zeLost City ukuphakama kwengaphambili lePalace okubuyekezwe ubudondoshiya kwezinhla ngaphandle kweCrystal Court kanye nephansi elihle elifanelana  ngaphezu kwalo. Indlu ezinamakamelo amahlanu yeVilla del Pal ngaphandle.



I-Sun City ikhulisa imakethe ngesiko - ngokungeko esikweni


Uma ubheka okuholayo emsebenzini, izinto kanye nempoqo kuveza umsebenzi wesiko ngokusobala weSun City, ukuzithokozisa kanye nokokuzijabulisa okuphambili kanye kanye nezinga elingafaniswa nalutho e-Afrika sekuholele ekukhuleni kwamazwe ngamazwe ekuhwebelaneni kwezindawo zokuzijabulisa, kusho umqondisi wengxenye, izindawo zokuvakasha, weSun International, uPhilip George.


"Okuvamile akukhombisi umgomo wethu wokuthi thuthu ngegxathi elilodwa lokho okudlula okulindelwe amaklilayente ethu kuwo wonke amazinga.Amaqembu abaphathi azinikele emaqenjini angawodwana kanye namakhulu, izinhlelo ezicatshangwayo zemigomo yesiko okuyikona okusebenza ngempela futhi osekusize ukwethusa amakilayente ethu amadala kanye namasha umhlaba wonke,"kusho yena.

Kwengeza uGeorgas:"Ngaphandle kwalendawo yemihlangano engaphakathi kanye nokwakhiwa kwayo, indawo eyakhiwe kuyo nje iyodwa eyisipesheli iSun City isivele yayenza yaba indawo yomhlaba ongayikhetha."

Kwimaphakathi lehlathi lase-Afrika, indawo itholakala endaweni engamakhilomitha angu-180 kusuka edolobheni elihle kakhulu lezwe, okufinyeleleka kuyo ngomgwaqo kanye nezomoya, lapho umuntu efikela esikhumulweni sezindiza esisezingeni eliphezulu ngokugqama kwamazwe ngamazwe. Ekulungele ukungenisa izithunywa ezingu- 1 300 kumahotela angu-4 asezingeni eliphezulu, iSun City iyindawo ephephile, indawo enamasango kanti ukwengeza inikeza izinto okungezokuphumula.

Inamakhosi ompetha amabili egalofu, enye yazo okuhlala kuba khona umdlalo wegalofu ongefaniswe e-Afrika njalo ngonyaka kanti futhi uba ngophezulu ohleni ekuvezweni kowamazwe ngamazwe, iNedbank Million Dollar Golf Challenge.

Okumangalisayo okumaphakathi nolwandle, iValley of Waves, kanye nokuphakama kwayo okubenyezelisa ibhishi, kwakha  ingemumva kwingqalasizinda yonke okubalwa kuyo neWater World kanye nohambo olunendawo yokuphumula.

"Okuphezulu ohleni okungawona amathuba agqamile ukukhombisa ukubaluleka kokuvezwa kwamasiko ezingeni lomhlaba,ukukwazi ukudayisa umbukiso omuhla kakhulu ngokubhensayo okudingwa kakhulu nabantu ngabodwana,ukuwenza kube ngokudayisekayo noma ithuluzi lokuzuza elihlala lingahambisani nalutho," kusho uGeorgas. Uyakuveza lokhu ukuthi Umgqumo!,konke okusha,abadlali,umculo wangaphakathi kanye nomdanso okuhle eSun City Theatre,kwenziwe ngendlela yokuthi kungasetshenziswa njengedawo yokuziphumulela ekuvezeni isiko ngokwedlulele.

"Kodwa ukuze uhlale wazi njengoba indawo yokuzikhethela e-Afrika kubavezi bamasiko,sibe nesiqiniseko eminyakeni eminingi ukuthi asithembeli ethubeni elilodwa elihle ngesikhathi.Ukukhula kwesidingo samazwe ngamazwe ukuhlangabezana nempilo yasendle yase-Afrika kungaphezu kokuba kuhlangatsheziwe eSun City,"

Ukuvezwa kwamasiko kungabandakanya nohla lwempilo ngamahectare angu-55 000 endawo yePilanesberg National Park ekungeneni nje endaweni yokuvakasha, ngokokuzijabulisa kanye nezamabhizinisi - noma ukwenza idili ube ubuka iBig Five ezintweni zase-Afrika - amahlathi athe ntshi empilweni yokwasendle. Izingadi ezimangalisayo zeSun City kulonyaka zibe nokugqama okufaniswa nokwezingadi zeBotanic,futhi zakha umsuka wezinkambo ezihlukene eziyisithupha zemvelo ezithatha izivakashi zisifake phakathi kwenhle indawo yemvelo ye-Afrika. Okuhle kakhulu kulabo abakujabulelayo ukuba kwibhothani, ukubonakala okumangalisayo kwezitshalo ezinhle ngokumangalisayo.

Kuchaza uGeorgas:"Kungukubonakala okunjengalokhu, kanye nobungcweti kanye nokuqamba okumangalisayo kweqembu lokungaphakathi kwamasiko okungekona nje kuphela ukuthi bakhulile ngokwosomabhizinisi, kodwa okuqinisekisa ubukhulu bebhizinisi ngokuphindiwe.

"kukodwa okukhulu kwezinto eziphikisana nebhizinisi eliphindiwe kunoma iyiphi indawo eveza amasiko, i 'been-there-and-done-that', lapho kungekho okushintshayo ukulinga abaqambi ukubuyisela izithunywa zabo emumva. ESun City ziyakhukhombisa lokhu futhi kuhlale kukhona njalo okuthile okuqanjiwe kanye nokusha ukunikeza amakilayente ethu, sibe futhi siqinisekisa ukuthi kukhona ukuvumelana ekusebenziseni izinto ezidingekayo, ezifana nomsebenzi wokunakekela, ukubhekelela ngokudla, usizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kanye nokudingekayo nje.Singanikeza noma yimuphi umgomo kanye nanoma yikuphi okungefaniswe - futhi ngokwanela okulingene."

UGeorgas uthi enye I-drawcard ubukhona beSun City ezingeni lamazwe ngamazwe. "ngesikhathi kusungulwa ukuvezwa kwamasiko aseNingizimu Afrika, igama eliqhamuka emqondweni ekuzungezeni kwamazwe ngamazwe iSun City. Iyindawo yokuphelela yokuzikhethela ngokwayo iyodwa. Ngalokho iyindawo enkulu futhi, isizinda sokuvezwa kwamasiko esisezingeni lomhlaba kungumklomelo omkhulu kumakilayente ethu amaningi, athola ukuthi iqiniso lokuvezwa kwamasiko kubanjelwe eSun City kunganikeza isiqiniseko sokuza kwabantu abaningi." Ibhuku elinesigqi elingaphambili ezincwadini eziza eminyakeni eyishumi ezayo lingukukhombisa okubalulekile kokudonsa kweSun City ebusweni bokuqhudelana okusha, kusho yena.

ISun City futhi iyisimo uqobo lwaso "sesitobhi esisodwa sesitolo samasiko", esinikeza ingqalasizinda yonke endaweni eyodwa - indawo yokulala, okokuzithokozisa, amadili, ezemidlalo kanye nokuchitha isizungu. Futhi eyanele futhi enayo yonke ingqalasizinda samabhizinisi okokuqala nje, ukuthi indawo yonke yokuveza amasiko ingahlelwa futhi ukudwetshwa kwayo kanye nokuyikhombisa kungakhiqizwa kuyona indawo. Inazo zonke izinto engakaze zivezwe zobuchwepheshe obuphambili bomsebenzi, kusuka ekwakhiweni kwamagama kanye ne-stenography ekukhiqizweni kombhalo obhalwa ngemibala kanye nokukhonjiswa kwe-audio-visual.

"ISun City ingangenisa izithunywa ngesitayela esiphezulu, benikwa konke abakudingayo, bebekwa ezosweni zasebhishi, ubathathe ubabeke kwi-safari, ubajabulise kwi-Superbowl noma ngaphandle ehlathini, bese ubanikeza impahla yohlobo lwe -state-of-the-art ngobuchwepheshe kanye nokuxhumana kongcweti bezemihlangano. Amaqembu amancane abantu abangu-20, kuya ku-1 300 izithunywa, iSun City izokwenza umhlangano ube okhumbulekayo,"kusho uGeorgas. Amahotele awu-4 anobucwebecwebe aseSun City awuhla olusuka kwiCabanas engase caleni lechibi kuya kwihotela leSun City elivusa izinzwa kanye nolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba lweCascades enhle kakhulu. Ewungqo shishilizi phakathi kwazo iPalce yeLost City .

Ihholo labaphathi zikhwama eSun City's Entertainment Centre indawo yaseNingizimu Afrika enezinhlobonhlobo zezinto neshintshashintshayo, elungele nom eyini kusukela emadilini kuya emibukisweni kuya emgqumeni wobusuku obungefaniswe. Inenkundla engasetshenziselwa izinti eziningi iyodwa ewu-1 250 square metre ububanzi. Inezindawo ezimbili ezihlukene enye kwenye ngezitebhisi ezintathu kanye nengadi yedwala engathi umlingo ubuyengezwe izindlulamithi ezilinganayo ezintathu ezakhiwe ngebhulonze eziqoshwa nguDanie de Jager. Indawo emaphansi ingu-740 square metres kanti emaphezulu ingu-510 square metres. Ihholo labanikazi zikhwama libonakala liyindilingana ngaphandle kobuso bedwala nophahla lukafayibe, olodala ukubukeka okungumdlalo.

Izindlu zemihlangano e-Entertainment Centre kanye naseLost City zinikeza abaphathi ukukhululeka, impahla esezingeni eliphezulu kanye nenye impahla engadingeka. Ukwengeza, ngaphakathi eSun city kuneminyango esezingeni eliphakeme yezemidlalo yeshashalazi ezokusiza ekuqambeni kanye nasekuhleleni okushintshashintshayo. Indawo enkulukazi yemihlangano iSun City Superbowl enendawo yokuhlala izithunywa ezingu-6 000. Lendawo evulekile ngaphakathi esandlu inezibani ezicolekile kanye nempahla yemisindo e-Afrika. Amadili aphakeme abantu abangu-1 300 bezokudla behlezi phansi ematafuleni angurawondi bangangeniswa.

IRoyal Ballroom etholakala eLost City ingahlala izithunywa ezingu-1 200 behlezi ngesitayela somhlangano noma behlezi ematafuleni angurawondi angahlala abantu abangu-1 000. Umnyango wezamadili uzokuhlobisela ngobuciko amatafula ngesitayela sesiko lendwangu kanye nokuhlelwa kwezimbali ngesitayela, kuncike emgomeni womuntu ngomuntu. IRoyal Ballroom ingaphinda futhi ihlukaniswe.

Indlu iPilanesberg  iyindlu engashintsheka ezindaweni zonke zemihlangano kanti futhi ingangenisa izithunywa ezisuka ku-1 400 zamadili engxubevange kuya ku-750 kwabeze esidlweni okuhlalwa phansi kuso. Indlu ihlukaniseke kabili kanye nezingxenye ezikwazi ukungenisa izithunywa ezingu-850 edilini lengxubevange noma izithunywa ezingu-220 ezihlezi ngesitayela somhlangano, noma izithunywa ezingu-420 ezize edilini.

Ezinye izindlu zemihlangano e-Entertainment Centre kubalwa kuzo i-Eagle, iHawk, i-Owl, iKestrel, iLynx, iCivet, iLeopard, iCheetah, iLion, i-Eland, iSable, i-Impala kanye neKudu. Lezi zindlu zingangenisa izithunywa eziphakathi kuka-16 kuya ku-64 kuncike emcimbini.

Ihotela iSun city inezindlu ezintathu zemihlangano ukuzikhethela kuzona. IBaobab ingahlukaniseka  futhi engangenisa izithunywa eziya ku-600 zomcimbi wengxubevange noma ezingu-350 ngesitayela somhlangano. Izindlu zeAcacia neJacaranda iyinye ihlala izithunywa ezingu-30 ngesitayela sase-theatre noma ngesitayela sesidlo sakusihlwa esisezingeni. Izindlu zingahlanganiswa ukwakha indlu eyodwa yomhlangano engahlala izithunywa eziya ku-60.

IPalace yeLost City, enye yamahotela aholayo emhlabeni inezindlu ezine zokuhlangana. ICouncil Chamber eyakhiwe ngokhuni ehlala abangu-16 ntofontofo ezihlalweni okwazi ukukhululekisa izandla emaceleni etafulaneni elincane, ngaphansi kwesibani esilengayo esiyibhulonze. Izindlu zokuhlangana zeProtea kanye ne-Orchid iyinye ekala u-7m x 6.5m, Futhi engangenisa abeze esidlweni sakusihlwa abangu-30. Sezihlanganisiwe, lezi zindlu ezimbili ezinobucwebecwebe zinikeza indawo ewu-92 square metres.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI LOKUXHUMANA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 KANYE NE-FAX: (0110 780 7535.



IPalace yeLost City yavotelwa phakathi kwangcono emhlabeni amakhulu.

IMagazine Poll
IPalace yeLost City eSun city ivotelwe yaba ihotela lesithathu e-Afrika elingcono kunawo wonke futhi lesithupha emhlabeni, ekukhetheni obekuphethwe phakathi kwezinkulungwane zabafundi bokushicilelwa kwesemthethweni iDiner's Club iTravel & Leisure.

"Kuhlale njalo kuqinisa ukuthola ukwaziswa kwaloluhlobo, ikakhulukazi ekushicilelweni kwamazwe ngamazwe kanye futhi nalapho ukuncoma kwabafundi kungangcengwa," kusho umqondisi wezemisebenzi wesun City, uKurt Peter. "iPalace ihlale ibekwa phezulu ekuhlolweni kwezindawo zemihlaba, kanye nobulunga bayo bamahotela aholayo omhlaba kulibeka ezingeni elehlukile - indawo esiyilela kanzima ukuyithola."Futhu okubalwayo emiphumeleni yokuvota kwe-Afrika kanye neMaphakathi leMpumalanga amahotela iCascade eseSun City eyavotelwa yaba eyeshumi nanhlanu kanye nehotela iSun City yaba eyamashumi amabili nanye.

Imibuzo eyenziwa abaqondisi beTravel & Leisure, ngokuhlanganyela neYankelovich Partners, yathunyelwa koteni lokuqala lonyaka u-1999 ezinkulungwaneni zabafundi, kucelwa imibono yabo ngamahotela, amahotela amakhulu namancane, amadolobha, iziqhingi, ezokuthutha ngomoya, ezokuvakasha ushaywa umoya, izinkampani eziqashisa ngezimoto, kanye nabahleli bezokuvakasha. Zonke izimpendulo zaqoqwa ngokufihlekile ngabahleli beYankelovich Parteners.

Imiphumela yabekwa ngokwamazinga ezimpendulo kuthinta kakhulu izinto ezidingekayo. Abafundi babeka amahotela ngokwezinhla eziwu-5: izindlu noma indawo yokulala, ukunakekelwa, izinto ezitholakala khona noma okwenziwayo, indawo atholakala kuyo, kanye nokubiza kwawo. Lokhukubalwa kwabe sekuhlelwa, kudala imiphumela epheleleyo. Inombolo encane yezimpendulo yaba ebalulekile ukwenzelwa ukuthi ibalwe. Unyaka wesine manje selokhu kwenziwa loluphenyo kanti iPalace yabakhona kulolo luhla eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI LOKUXHUMANA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684




Umlando weLost City ngo-Gerald Allison
I-FAIA Wimberley Allison Tong & Goo "Kudala ngaphambi kokuqala kwempucuko yasentshonalanga, isizwe esasisuka eNyakatho ne-Afrika sasifuna iNingizimu saze sathola lesisihohoba esasifihlekile ekwakhekekeni okwadalwa ukuqhuma komlilo kwakudala, isihohoba esibusiseke ngomhlabathi ovundile, umndlalo oxhaphakile kanye nezimpophomana zamanzi. Inyamazane kanye neMpala zazigalobha ngaphansi kwalezo zibhakabhaka, kanye nasemithunzini yamachibi, amahipho ayithe nje qaphu qaphu.

Laba bantu bakudala bakha umuzi wezindlu nje ezilula esihohobeni, base behlala ngesigqi kanye nezikhathi. Ngokuzwana kanye nezitshalo kanye nezilwane. Kwase kuba khona isomiso esikhulu, esasizobhubhisa abantu bakudala ukube izinkawu ezinobungani zazingaphonsi izithelo kanye namabheri ezihlahleni eziphakeme. Isizwe saphila futhi sanda. Amaplathinamu namadayimane atholakala esihohobeni, aletha ubugwili obukhulu. Emgedeni omangalisayo owaziwa ngehholo labaphathi zikhwama, yilapho abantu babegcina khona umcebo wabo ongaziwa futhi omningi. Ekugcineni, abantu besihohobe baba nomcebo owanele kanye nolwazi lokwakha idolobha elihle, elinomqhele wepalace yendlu yobukhosi.

Ipalace yakhiwa esiqhingini echibini ngasenhloko yesihohobe. Ubungcweti bokwakha obungefaniswe badonsa izindlela ezikhumbulekayo zemibhoshongo, izindlu kanye nezingobela ngezindle eziyizinkulungwane kusukela ezindaweni ezizungezile zomhlaba wemvelo wase-Afrika. Izingwe ezingamaqhawe zaba abalindi abaqoshiwe, zinwebela emakhoneni ompheme ngaphezu kweminyango yepalace. Impophoma, iShrine yeSacred Monkey, zaba isethulo ekunwebeleni kwezinkawu ezasiza isizwe ukuthi siphile. Abadwebi abawaziyo umsebenzi wabo bahlobisa ipalace. Imivini ezungelezayo, amaqabunga esihlahla sepalm, izimbali zeprotea kanye nezepalm enkulu zazihlaliswa njalo etsheni. Izidalwa ezifana nendlovu, ibhubesi, ikudu, izinkawu, izinyoka kanye nezinyoni zazifanekiswa ngamatshana amibalabala, ezindongeni kanye nakokubaziweyo. Lemifanekiso yayitholakala ophahleni, ezinsikeni kanye nasezibambelelweni zokuzivikela endlini; kanye nasembhoshongweni phezulu, ophakeme ngamamitha angu-70 ubude iKings Tower, owaphakama ngaphezu kwepalace, njengemalangabi okuhlaba umkhosi.

Iminyaka eminingi, labantu bahlala ngokuthula futhi bezijabulele edolobheni labo lobukhosi. Kwase kwathi ngelinye ilanga isibhakabhaka saba mnyama kwathi ukucinana kwathatha ubumnyama kwasonga  lokho kubukeka. Amandla agcwele ukuzamazama komhlaba kwavuthuza isihohoba. Umhlaba ongaphansi kwedolobha wafukula ngamandla amakhulu. Amandla amakhulu afana nesandla sezimu elidiniwe kwabhidliza izakhiwo njengoba abantu babebheke ngengebhe ekuqhumeni kwetshe. Zazingekho izinkubela, ngoba abahlali babexwayisiwe yiGongo leSun Lion ukuthi bahlangane eRoyal Arena, eyayi ngathinta ukuzamazama komhlaba. Abanye abantu balibalekela idolobha, abaphindanga babuya. Kwabuya iNkosi nomndeni wayo kuphela abathola ukuthi uma bebuya amathumbu omhlaba ayeseshintshile ama ngezinye izindlela.  Iziphethu zabhoboka ngasemaceleni entaba,  kanye nangaphansi kwaqhamuka amanzi ngemisele emikhulu ngaphezulu okwaba amachibi lapho abantu babebhukuda khona uma bethanda. Ukuzamazama komhlaba kwadala uxhaxha lwezimpophomanyana kanye nezindlela zamanzi. Ipalace, ngemisuka yayo eyayithe ntshi ematsheni, yasinda nakho konke okwayo kodumo. Iminyaka, umndeni wasebukhosini  wakha izindlu zayo zobukhosi, kodwa emva kokufa kwelunga lokugcina ipalace yakhula ngokushesha yaphinda futhi yacasha ekucinaneni kobucwebe.

Idolobha lalahleka, kwaze kwasala umlando oxoxwayo wakudala ogabiselayo ngobuhle balo elaliyibo. Sekucishe kube iminyaka eyizinkulungwane ezintathu kwazamazama umhlaba, eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlula  ezinkulungwanei ezimbili zeminyaka, umkhawulezo wabacwaningi bezinto zasendulo bayelamela lencithakalo. Isihohoba sasemandulo kanye neLost City kwaba amagama umholi wabacwaningi alinika izinto azithola ekucwaningeni kwabo. Amagama angampela ePalace kanye nehholo labaphathi zikhwama ayacaca manje uma sekucwaningwa izinto, aqanjwa nge-Annals of the City,  akuficwanga ngesikhathi sokumbululwa kwezinto, njengoba iqembu labacwaningi bezinto zasendulo behlela imisebenzi yokubuyisela izinto ababezitholile esimweni sazo njengoba zazinjalo. Namhlanje, iPalace iyacwebezela futhi ekhanda lesihohoba, iyakhazimula futhi inhle ngendlela emanganlisayo ngaphezu kwesibuko esidalwa amanzi. Iphinde futhi, njengoba ibuyekezwe imimoya yasemandulo eyigadile ukubonakala kwayo okubheke phansi - ingwe, indlovu kanye nekudu - injabulo iyoba yilokho emiselwe khona yawo wonke umuntu obeka unyawo lwakhe ngaphezu komlingo wesihohoba, noma ohlamba emanzini aso. Injabulo iyoba nkulu kulabo abakhwela ekucwazimuleni kwePalace, noma abafuna umcebo ungashiwo ekushoneni kwemihume yeHall of Treasure".



Ukuvezwa kwamaqiniso ahehayo kanye nezibalo ezithusayo ngeLost City

ILost City eseSun City ingenye yezindawo ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo futhi  engumkhuba wokuheha abavakashi emhlabeni.

Indawo yokuvakasha, yavulwa ngo-December ka-1992, idala kabusha imfihlakalo kanye nezimanagaliso zakudala, impucuko yakudala yendawo engangamahectare angu-25 enokucinana kwezinto ngokwedlulele, echusha ngendawo enhle ngokumangalisayo enezindawana zamanzi kanye nezindawo eziyingozi kwiValley of Waves, okungenkulu kunawo wonke futhi enokuziqambela kwayo yodwa okungakaze kube khona. ILost City ibiza izigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi ( ngokwase-US ibiza izigidi ezingu-280 zamadola noma izigidi ezingu-170 zamaphawundi) ukuyakha. Umklamo waqedwa ezinyangeni ezingu-28 nje kuphela, okuyisikhathi esincane kakhulu salebinza elibukhuni kangaka. UKWAKHIWA KWELOST CITY Umhlaba owasuswa endaweni ulingana nama-cubic metres angu-1 750 000 Idwala elaqhunyiswa lilingana nama-cubic meteres angu-85 000 Inani lezitini ezasetshenziswa zilingana nezigi ezingu-30 Inani lendawo isiyonke enomata ilingana nama-square metres angu-50 000 Indawo isiyonke enomabula ilingana nama-square metres angu-5 650 Indawo isiyonke ependiwe ilingana nama-square metres angu-425 000 Indawo isiyonke eno-murals ilingana nama-square metres angu-3 400 Indawo engaphandle yamachibi namachitshana lilingana nama-square metres angu-70 500 Ubude bamapayipi afakwa alingana namamitha angu-150 000 UKWAKHIWA KWEPALACE KANYE NEVALLEY OF WAVES Ngesikhathi esimaphakathi nokwakhiwa, cishe abantu abangu-5 000 babesebenza kulomklamo. Ngonyaka wokuqala wokwakha, isibalo cishe saba yizitini  eziyisigidi esisodwa sasindlalwa phansi ababeki besitini abangu-200 inyanga iyodwa. Cishe izingcezu ezingu-15 000 ezazenziwa ngamabomu zazisetshenziselwa.
 
Ukwakha ubuphandle bobuso bangaphambili bePalace. Kukhona amamitha angu-75 000 emibhobho kagesi ePalace kanye cishe nokukhanya kwezibani okungu-6 500. Ikamelo lokungena ebukhosini linophahla oluphakeme ngamamith angu-25 ngaphezu kwephansi kanye namamitha angu-16 ububanzi. Ukwakhiwa kwayo kwaba yinselela enkulukazi, okufana nophahla lweCrystal Court engamamith angu-29 ukuphakama, okufanele luxhase izinkundla ezingu-5 zendlu ngaphezu kwayo. Umbhoshongo omude kunayo yonke imibhoshongo eyishumi yePalace ungamamitha angu-70. Yonke iminyango ewu-338 yezindlu zokulala yethimba isalucezu lwendilinga. Iminyango emide kunayo yonke epalace iphakeme ngamamitha angu-8. UKUHLELWA KWEPALACE NGAPHAKATHI Izinhlelo zangaphakathi zepalace zaqanjwa uTrisha Wilson weWilson & Associates, iDallas, iTexas. Eduze kwezinto zonke zePalace zazenziwa ngokwesiko. Ngamaphesenti angu-85 azo zonke izinto zangaphakathi zasuselwa khona eNingizimu Afrika.

EPalace, okokuqala eNingizimu Afrika, impahla eyenziwe ngezandla yasetshenziswa kuzo zonke izindawo zomphakathi kanye nasezindlini zezivakashi zehotela. Akukho neyodwa indwangu noma omata oyosesthenziswa futhi, noma kuphi. Zonke lezinto zazakhiwela  futhi zahlotshiselwa iPalace yona yodwa kuphela. Ukupendwa kophahla lwegumbi lokungena ebukhosini kwakhiwa kwafana nendlela okopendwe ngayo iMichelangelo epende iSistine Chapel eseRome. Ukuvezwa kwendawo yase-Afrika, iphila nezilwane kanye nezinyoni, kwathatha cishe amahora angu-5 000 ukuthi iphele. Isibani esikhanyisa seCrystal Court singaphezu kwamamitha angu-5 ububanzi, ngokufola okunamamith angu-4,2. Imiboko eyisithupha yezindlovu, eme ngamibili ngaphezu kweTusk Lounge Bar, ingamamith angu-5,6 ukuphakama, isisindo singama-tons angu-2, kanti futhi yakhiwa ngezingcezu ezine zokhuni lohlobo lweIndonesian Square, olusinda ngaphezu kwe-ivory. ISIZINDA SOKUZITHOKOZISA  Isizinda sokuzithokozisa siphindaphindiwe ngosayizi kanti futhi siphinde sahlelwa ngu-Henry Conversano & Associates, esizwa ngu-Paul Steelman. IBridge of Time, ekuholela esizindeni sokuzithokozisa kuya eValley of Waves, sinyakaza ngangamamilimitha angu-2 uma intaba yomlilo iqhuma ngaphansi kwebhuloho. Ikhompuyutha enezinhlelo ezihlelwe ukuhlela nokubhekela okungenziwa ukubonakala komsindo nokuzwakala kwawo lokho okudala ukuqhuma okulingisayo. Ingwe engamamitha angu-7,6 ukuphakama, amakhanda amabili angamamitha angu-9 namamitha angu-6, kanye nengwe  egogobele engamamitha angu-5,4 ubude kanye nenkawu engamamitha angu-4 kufanekisiwe ebusweni bedwala lesizinda sokuzithokozisa esibhekene neValley of Waves. Kukhona izihlahla zepalm ezingu-168 ngaphakathi esizindeni sokuzithokozisa. Iziqu zazo zakhiwe ngamashubhu engilazi kafayibe asongwe ngamagxolo futhi zihluma ngempela, amaqabunga alondoloziwe. Indlela esabisi edalwa ufayibha umboza uphahla lwehholo lamaphathi zikhwama. Lesisibhakabhaka sasebusuku singesikhulu kunazo zonke esilungisiwe eNingizimu Afrika.

ILOST CITY JUNGLE Ukucinana kweLost City kwakhiwa umhleli wezindawo uPatrick Watson kanye noDave Kirby weTop Turf Gardens. Ukucinana kuthatha amahectare angu-25 kanti futhi kubiza izigidi ezingu-25 zamarandi (ezingu-8 zamadola noma ezingu-5 zamaphawondi). Izitshalo ezingaphezu kuka-1 600 000, izihlahla, imishana emincane kanye nokumboze phansi kutshaliwe. Kukhona izinhlobo zezinto ezitshaliwe ezingu-3 200. Amaphesenti angu-75 ezitshalo awezendabuko zaseNingizimu Afrika. Kukhona izihlahla ezingaphezulu kuka-4 00 esezikhule ngokwanele ezatshalwa. Ihlathi elicinene lilinganisa imvelo, ngesihlahla sohlobo lwekhanophi eside ngamamitha angu-40, ezilandela sona zinguhhafu walobobude kanye nezitshalo eziphansi emhlabathini. Ibaobabs enkulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni ukutshala isizitholele ikhaya layo elisha eLost City. Izitshalo ezinkulu kunazo zonke ezinesisindo esingamathani ayela ku-75 kanti futhi ezineziqu ezibanzi okuya emamitheni angu-6. Ihlathi lebaobab lakhiwe ngezihlahla ezingu-380 esezivuthiwe, ezinye zazo sezineminyaka engamakhulu ambalwa ubudala. Imbewu kanye nezitshalo okuqhamuka e-Australia, eZimbabwe, eComores, eMozambique kanye naseMadagascar. IKHOZI YEGALOFU YASELOST CITY Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili, par 72 ILost City yakhiwa ngokubiza okuyizigidi ezingu-15 zamarandi (ezingu-5 zamadola noma ezingu-3 zamaphawondi). Ikhozi ithatha indawo engangamahectare angaphezulu kuka-100 kanti futhi inezindawo zamanzi ezithatha ama-square metres angu-28 000. Ikhozi idinga ukuchelelwa ngamanzi angama-cubic metres angu-2 300 ngosuku, Imbobo iyodwa ikhombisa iphakathi lezihlahla ezintathu nezihlahla ezine, okunikeza ukukhululeka okukhulu komdlali. Okuluhlaza kweshiyagalolunye nokweshumi nesishiyagalombili kuphela ngaphambi kwendle yekilabhu. Zibalelwa ezinkulungwaneni ezingu-12 izibukeli ezingahlala zizungeze lobuluhlaza obubili. Imigodi wesishiyagalombili, weshumi nanye, weshumi nantathu kanye noweshumi nane yonke ikhombisa izihlahla ezikhulile ekuphakameni okuphakathi kwamamitha angu-15 nangu-25 ngaphezu kwendawo ephansi. Umgodi weshumi nantathu uyi-par 3 namanzi akhombisa ukuvikeleka kwesokunxele ngaphambili kobuluhlaza. Izingwenya eziphilayo zeNile zihlala lapho.

IVALLEY OF WAVES Lokhu ukuhlangana okukhulukazi kwamanzi kanye nepaki yamanzi okwake kwakhiwa endaweni eyodwa, noma akuphi emhlabeni. ILazy River ugonciza ngamamitha angu-500, uthwele amalitha ayizigidi ezimbili zamanzi. Ichibi iRoaling Lagoon lithwele amalitha ayizigidi eziyishiyagalombili zamanzi kanye nendawo enhle yokubhukuda engamamitha angu-1,8 isidaliwe, ihamba amakhilomitha angu-35 ngehora kusuka odongeni lwedamu kuya endaweni eyakhiwe kahle eyibhishi elinesihlabathi elingamamitha angu-120 ubukude. Kukhona imichachazi engu-13 emikhulu, izimpophoma ezingu-20, imifula yezintaba engu-2 kanye nendawo azingu-5 ezimanzi eLost City ezingadini ezicinene. Amanzi athwelwe izindawo zokuzithokozisa, izindawo ezihlotshisiwe kanye namachibi okubhukuda angamalitha ayizigidi ezingu-23. Umchachazo omkhulukazi owenziwe kweseyake yakhiwa, ekuhlanganisweni kwesisindo samanzi nokuphakama, umchachazo iGrotto, oseduze kwemachibi okubhukuda eRoyal Baths. Ungamamitha angu-11,5 ukuphakama nangu-12 ububanzi, futhi aphophoma komfutho ongangama-cubic metres angu-1 200 ngehora. Ukwengeza ngedamu elingama-megalitre angu-10 elakhiwelwa ukunikeza amanzi ekwakhiweni kanye nasekufakeleni kwamanzi ezingadini. Olayini bokufakela ababili abasha bafakiwe uhulumeni kusuka edamini iVaal kuya eSun City. Lokhu kunikeza isiqiniseko sokungena kwamanzi ukuhlangabezana nezigidi ezilishumi zamalitha ngosuku adingwa yiLost City. Iqembu le-Aquatic Design, elizinze eCalifornia, e-USA. Eliholwa urandy Mendioroz. IGraphic Designer uDavid Carter, ophuma eDallas.  Owaziwa umhlaba wonkana, abaxhumi bokuhlela ngaphakathi, uWilsin & Associates, beholwa uTrisha Wilson. Abaphuma eDallas oCraig Roberts & associates be-USA, bahlela ukukhanya kwangaphakathi. Abahleli abadumile nabangcono kakhulu bemiklamo yamanzi emhlabeni wonke, uRock & Waterscapes Systems bahlela iValley of Waves. Abakhi abaphezulu futhi abahlonishwayo baseNingizimu Afrika abangoBurg, uDoherty, uBryant & Partners, kanye noMoolman, uVan der Walt, uVlok kanye noVan der Westhuizen we-MV3. Umhleli wendawo uPatrick watson kanye neTop Turf Gardens ngaphansi komqondisi ophethe uDave Kirkby, iqembu eliphathelene nezingadi ezimangalisayo ezizungeze iPalace. THINTANA NE: SUN INTERNATIONAl PUBLIC RELATIONS KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO; (011) 780 7684.



Abahlangana nohlobo lweLost City
Izivakashi zeSun City zingajabulela ukubuka umdlalo okwenziwe kwaba okomuntu ePilanesberg National Park eseduze angamahetare angu-55 000.

IGametrackers, etholakala ehotela eSun City, manje inikeza izinto eziningana ukuzikhetela kubavakashi kanye nasekuthandeni izinto zasendle. Uma ukujabula kwakho kulele ekufuneni "iBig 5" kusho ukuthi iSafari izokuthinta (ukushayela kwasebusuku nakho kuyatholakala). Ngokwezigigaba nangokucophelela iRhino Hiking Trail izokujabulisa. Kulabo abafuna injabulo, zama iBalloon Safari kanti kulabo ababambelele emasikweni, thatha uhambo lomuzi wendawo wamasiko. Ukugcizelela kweSafari ukubeka iBig 5. Abagadi abaqeqeshiwe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zithola I-African Safari yangempela ekhwelwa abantu abangu-6 iLandvruiser. Izivakashi zingabuka ubhejane ubhavumula odakeni ezibhuquza kulo olupholile kanye nezindlovu eziyizinkunzi zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaleni kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ufakazi ozithulele ubukela ibhubesi libulala, njengoba nokuncanyana kuzidlela kungasoli ngozi endaweni yokuqhuma lomlilo. Khwela izintaba, kude kusuka kwiKadding Crowd, ungabuka umhlambi wezinyathi njengoba zisaxakekile nje ukuphila zingagadiwe zikhululekile. AmaLandcruisers enziwe aba nezimfulanela ezifudumele nezingubo zokulala kulabo abagodolayo, okuvunguza ohambweni lwasebusuku. Zizwele ukuhamba ebusuku kwempilo yasendle lapho izingwe zibonakala ngaphansi kokukhanya kwenyanga yendawo eyomile.

Uma ufisa ukubuka umdlalo othize, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izokuthinta kulezozigigaba zezivakashi. Funa iNyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo ngaphakathi eLatsatsing Game Park. Umgadi uzokhombisa ulwazi lwakhe lwalezizidalwa - zizwele kanye ngalendalo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ekuseni kakhulu, ukuqhuma kwemibala kuqhamuka ngale kokuphuma kwelanga. Abagibeli bakhwela iHot Air Balloon, jabulela iwayini elizoyizayo laseNingizimu Afrika ngaphambi kokubuka ubungako obugcwele bepilanesberg National Park. Uma uhlala phansi ufikela endaweni yokuphumula lapho kusevwa khona ukudla kwasekuseni. ISun City izungezwe imishini yamasiko ahlukene. Jabulela izindaba zendabuko zesizwe, ohambweni lwamasiko lomuzi iLedig. Uhambo luvakashisa kwi-"shanti" yendawo, isikole sezokutshala, amahhovisi esizwe kanye nokokugcina ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele eshibhini lakhona. Lokhu nje ubumnandi bezinto ongazithola. Kukhona namanye amasafari atholakalayo okubalwa kuwo nokudla kwasekuseni kwasehlathini kanye nohambo lokushona kwelanga. Shayela isizinda sethu esiphakathi ukubekisa kulenombolo yocingo (011) 780 7800 ngohambo lwasendle. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Amaqiniso ayishumi nanhlanu anqobayo ngobuhle ngeLost City
ILost city ibiza izigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi. Umsebenzi waqala ngo-August ka-1990, wathatha nje kuphela izinyanga ezingu-28. ILost City yavulwa ngoDecember ka-1992. Ihostela elibiza izigidi ezingu-4 zamarandi lakhiwa ukuhla abasebenzi endaweni yesakhiwo. Kwimaphakathi nomsebenzi wokwakha, kwakukhona abantu abalinganiselwa ku-5 000 emsebenzini, kubalwa nabasebenzi abasuka ezinkontilekeni ezingu-100. Inani likakhonkolo elinama-cubic metres angu-4 000 lalibekwa zinyanga zonke. Ukwakha ipalace kwadinga amathani angu-3 300 ezinsimbi ukuqinisa izinti, ezingamakhilomitha angu-2 900 ubude. Izitini ezingu-2 000 zazibekwa ababeki bezitini. Okhileni abawu-9 bemibhoshongo babesetshenziswa kanye kanye. IPalace inemibhobho engangamakhilomitha angu-12 yezilungiso moya, amakhilomitha angu-500 owaya bakagesi kanye nezikhanyiso ezingu-6 500. Endlwananeni yeNkosi yePalace kukhona izinto ezakhiwe ngezandla zamasiko ezingu-800, kubalwa kuzo izindwangu nomata. Ipalace yadinga omata ongamasquare metres angu-15 000 bendlalwa. Ehholo labaphathi zikhwama kukhona izimbali ezisezitsheni zokhuni ezalandwa eBali. Kukhona izihlahla zepalm ezingu-168 ehholo labaphathi zikhwama. Indawo ecinene yaseLost City ineziteshi zokuchelela ezingu-300, ezinganyelwe ngaphezulu izinhlokwana ezingu-9 000, izinhlokwana ezichelelayo ezingu-2 500, kanye nezilungiso moya ezingu-10 ezishukumisa umoya. Kukhona ipayipi lokuchelela elingamakhilomitha angu-30 endaweni yeLost City.



Okungokwakho wedwa nje okuhle kakhulu
Ihotela elihle ngokumangalisayo iPalace, elinokomlando, lakhiwelwa iNkosi ngokwempucuko yasemandulo lokho okwenza lesihosho esihle kube ikhaya labo kuze kube badicilelwa phansi ukuzamazama komhlaba. Manje "sekubuyiselwe" endaweni yakho endala yodumo, iPalace inikeza izivakashi ukunakekelwa kobukhosi. 

IPalace ingukubukeka okudonsayo kokuningi. Kusukela ekubeni khona kwemiboko yendlovu kuya ekubukekeni kwenhle ibhulonze kanye nezinhlayiya zamatshe ezikubeka emhlabeni wamaphupho ocinene ubuhle okuchaphakela ebuhleni bephansi elinamathayela kanye nophahla olwenziwe. Bonke lobu buhle bufanelene nobeNkosi.

Indlu ngayinye kulezi ezingu-338 ezinobucwebecwebe kanye nokuphakathi kunikeza ukunakakelwa kwasebukhosini nokubukeka kwezinto ngaphandle okumangalisayo ngaphezu kwamanzi kanye nokucinana. Okungaphakathi ifenisha eyenziwe ngezandla ekhombisa izinhlobo zonke zemithi emilayo yase-Afrika. Ukuthintwa ngesandla kukhonjiswa kuyona yonke ifenisha.

Izivakashi zasehotela iPalace zingahlamba echibini elikhulu noma zizihambele phansi emachibini lobukhosi aseValley of Waves. Zijabulele ingxubevange emaceleni echibi noma eTas Bar emangalisayo. Ukudla kwehla esiphundu endaweni yakho enobunyoninco ngokupheka iCrystal Court noma Villa Del Pallazzo lapho ikhishi elicolekile kuyilo lobuciko.

IPalace yeLost City - Ihotela eliholayo emhlabeni.



Umlando weSun City kanye neLost City
ISun City indawo yokuvakasha eseNingizimu neAfrika edume kakhulu futhi enobucwebecwebe; nangempela igama layo selibe elifaniswa nenhlalo enhle, injabulo kanye nokuzithokozisa okumtoti. Itholakala kumakhilomitha angu-187 entshonalanga ayeGoli, iSun City inamahotela amane amahle kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo, ezokuzithokozisa, okwangempela kokuzithokozisa kanye nemiqhudelwano. Ingenye yezindawo zokuvakasha ezimbalwa emhlabeni enomqhudelwano wemigodi emibili yeshumi nesishiyagalombili yekhozi yegalofu. Indawo futhi ixhasa nezinye izindawo zaseningizimu ne-Afrika ezinezinto ezinhle zokuzithokozisa. ILost City neSun City kuyizigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi zomhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika  okhombisa amahlathi amahle kanye namachibi amangalisayo. IPalace yeLost City ingenye yamahotela amahle ngendlela emangalisayo emhlabeni. ISun City yatholwa umthandi wezenjabulo  waseNingizimu Afrika uSol Kerzner. Maphakathi nonyaka ka-1970 waba nomqondo wokwakha indawo yokuvakasha eyikhasino ewubucwebecwebe maphakathi nehlathi lase-Afrika. Umsebenzi waqala ngoJulayi mhlaka-15, ngo-1978 kanti indawo yavulwa ngomhlaka-7 kuDecember ngo-1979. Ngalesosikhathi indawo eyayibonakala igqamile kwakuyizindlu ezingu-340 zehotela iSun City kanye nekhozi yegalofu yemiqhudelwano emikhulu iGary Player. Ikhozi yegalofu manje iyona edumile - futhi esebenza kakhulu - e-Afrika. Ezinye izinto kwakuyichibi lokubhukuda elingamamitha angu-55, ichibi elakhiwe ngumuntu lemidlalo yamanzi, inkundla yebhola lomphebezo kanye nekhasino enamakhulu emishini yokudlala kanye namatafula okugembula angu-50. Indawo yokuqala yabiza ngaphezu kuka-R1.18 billion, izigidi ezingu-830 zamarandi zachithwa kwakhiwa iLost City. Okuxhuma iLost City iPilanesberg National Park, indawo engangamahectare angu-55 000 eyavulwa ngosuku olongemva kokuba indawo yamukele izivakashi zayo zokuqala. Emva nje kwesonto ikhethini lavuleka eExtravaganza Theatre kanti iNingizimu Afrika yaziswa ngokwakwenzeka kuleyondawo. Umculi wokuqala owadlala kulenkudla kwaba nguCliff Richard. ISun City yaba indawo enempumelelo ngangokuthi yanwetshwa ngokushesha. Emva konyaka ngqo iSun City ivuliwe, amagumbi angu-284 eSun City Cabanas ayesenikeza indawo yokulala imindeni. Selokhu iSun City yavulwa, imidlalo emikhulu idlalwa njalo khona. Mhlambe omukhulu nodume kunayo yonke iNedbank Million Dollar Challenge eyatholakala ngo-1980. Kungumdlalo unemali futhi uhluke kunayo yonke. Ngangoba umema abadlali abaphezulu ukuthi baqhudelane kumklomelo wokuqala oyisigidi samadola (ase-US). USteve Ballesteros, uDavid Frost, uNick Price kanye noBernard Langer bangabanye babadlali begalofu asebake bawuwina lomdlalo weMillion Dolla Challenge.

Phakathi no-1981 iSun City yathola inkundla yokuzithokozisa ebiza izigidi azingu-30 zamarandi. Kulolophahla olulodwa kwakukhona izindawo zokuthengisa ngokudla, amabhayisikobho, izinkundla zemidlalo, amagumbi emihlangano kanye neSuperbowl engahlala abantu abangu-6 000 enohlobo lomsindo lwe-state-of-the-art. UFrank Sinatra wavula iSuperbowl ngoJulayi mhlaka-24 ka-1981. AmaSuperstar afana noRoad Stewart, Elton John, Wet Wet Wet kanye noJoe Cocker sebeka badlala lapho kanye neminye imidlalo eminingana yesibhakela yomhlaba seyawinwa eSuperbowl. Ngo-1992 inkundla yokuqala yokuzithokozisa yaphindaphindwa ngobukhulu ngokunezezelwa kweholo labaphathi zikhwama, okuyinxenye yeLost City. Ingaphandle libonakala sengathi lakhiwe ngaphandle kwetshe eliphilayo, lambozwa ngemifanekiso yezilwane zase-Afrika. Okubonakala kakhulu kwingaphandle lesakhiwo umfanekiso omkhulu wengwe. Ihholo labaphathi bezikhwama likhombisa imisindo imishini ye state-of-the-art yokudlala kanye nemidlalo yevideo yesimanje kanye nokilingisayo, okuhambisana nemibukiso ekhonjiswa emaceleni ngamanani asezingeni eliphezulu. Kukhona futhi namabhayisikobho amaningana, izindawo zokuthengisa ukudla kanye nezitolo, kuzona zozimbili lezizindawo ihholo labaphathi bezikhwama kanye nenkundla yezokuzithokozisa, manje sezihlelwe kabusha futhi zaqanjwa nge-The Jungle Casino. UDecember ka-1984 wabona ukuvulwa kwezindlu ezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo ezingu-242 zehotela iCascades. ICascades, eyabiza izigidi ezingu-50 zamarandi ukwakhiwa, ithatha indawo engangamahectare amane ezingadi zethrophikhani. Kukhona izindawo zamanzi ezingama-square metres angu-7 740, okubalwa kuwona imichachazo  engu-12 kanye nezimpophoma. Ubuningi bempilo yezinyoni ezingadini sekwenze kwaba okunye kwezinto ezihehayo eSun City. NgoJanuwari ka-1986, imonorail yokuqala yaseNingizimu Afrika - iSkytrain - yaqala ukusebenza. Izinqola zayo ezintathu iyodwa ethwala abagibeli abangu-100 futhi ihamba phakathi kwepaki yezimoto yeSun City kanye nenkundla yokuzithokozisa.

ISun City idume ngemiklomelo yayo emikhulu ekhokhwa imishini yayo yokudlala. Umklomelo othandwa kakhulu kulendawo iDream Machine yabunjwa ngo-1987 futhi exhumana nezinye izindawo eziningana. Umklomelo unenani lokuqala eliyizigidi ezimbili zamarandi kodwa yaphindwa yabunjwa ngo-1995 futhi manje isinenani eliqala esigidini esisodwa samarandi futhi elikhuphukayo ngocezo olulodwa olufakiwe ebange lemishini exhunyiwe. IMillion Mnia futhi nayo ingomunye umklomelo oqhubekayo  uxhunyiwe ongakaze ukhokhe ngaphansi kwesigidi samarandi. IGumbi lemazwe ngamazwe elidumileliyindlu enhle kakhulu lamakilabhu adlalayo elinekhasino yangasese nenhle ngokwedlulele eSun City. Ubulunga bunqunyelwe labo kuphela abadlali bamatafula abaphezulu abathanda ukudlalela iziteki ezinkulu. Ngo-1990 ukwakhiwa kwaqala ngomzamo omkhulu kakhulu emlandweni weSun City - iLost City. Lomhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika uncike esigqini sempucuko eyalahleka eseyitholakele ekucinaneni kweValley of Waves. Njengoba izivakashi zididekile ekucinaneni zithola inselela yokwasalayo kwedolobha lakudala kanye nomcebo wezinto zokuzijabulisa. Lendawo ecinene ingenkulu kunazo zonke esezake zenziwa umuntu, enezihlahla ezingaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa nengxenye kanye nezitshalo. Maphakathi lalendawo kukhona ihlathi elicinene. Imisele yamanzi iguduza phakathi kwalokhu kucinana, isukela ezimpophomeni ezincanyana kuya kwezinkulu. IValley of Waves iyipaki yamanzi enkulu kakhulu emhlabeni kwezisezingeni eliphezulu, enezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, amachibi okubhukuda, izinkambo ezipholile kanye neRoaring Lagoon, lapho abadlali bamanzi bedlala imikhakha engamamitha amabili.

Inhliziyo yeLost City iPalace, ihotela elinamagumbi angu-338 eyabiza izigidi ezingu-400 ukuyakha. Ubuciko obungathi amaphupho bokwakhiwa kwezakhiwo kwahlotshiswa ngemifanekiso yezilwane zasendle. Igumbi ngalinye linendawo eyanele futhi linempahla yalo lodwa esezingeni eliphezulu. Ukunakekelwa nezinto ezitholakala khone zihambisana nezinga lesakhiwo.

Ngo-1993 iLost City Golf Course yavulwa eSun City. Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili, par 72 usebenzisa ubuhle bemvelo bePilanesberg Mountains ezizungeze iSun City. Izingwenya zibukela abadlali zisemachibini emgodini weshumi nantathu. UGary Player owahlela lekhozi wathi,"Ayikho eminye imigodi yeshumi nesishiyagalombili emhlabeni engadlula eyekhozi yaseLost City ngakho konke onakho".Selokhu iLost City yavulwa ngoDecember ka-1992, izivakashi zilokho zilangazelela ukuza eSun city ngamanani acishe abe izigidi ezintathu ngonyaka. Uhlelo lwezentuthuko lweSun international belubheke ekwakhiweni kabusha kwamahotela aseSun City. Ihotela iSun City selakhiwe kabusha ngenani eliyizigidi ezingu-132 zamarandi futhi elikunikeze ukubukeka ukusha nobulona obusha. Ezinye futhi izigidi ezingu-16 nengxenye zamarandi zichithelwe kwezinye izindawo zehotela iCascades, kanti ukunwetshwa nokwakhiwa kabusha kwaqedwa eCabanas ekwanza ikhuphuke ngenani lezindlu zibe ngu-380. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



Uzamcolo wesitayela kanye Nobuhle obubukekayo - iCascades
Ukuphophoma kwamanzi agijima ehlathini lethrophikana kungumsuka weCascades - elinye lamahotele ahlelwe kahle emva kwamanye amahotela ase-Africa's Kingdom of Pleasure - iSun City.

ICascades inendawo yezivakashi yangasese neyomuntu ngayedwana, kusukela emagunjini ahlelwe kahle kanye nezindawo zokwamukela ukuya ezingadini ezihlelwe ngethrophikana ngobuhle. IPeninsula Restaurant kanye neLounge, nephansi lazo lomabula weVerona kanye nomata we-woven kanye nokubukeka kwemibala yezinyoni zindiza phezu kwezihlahla zethrophikana. Izindonga zihlotshiswe ngokwegolide, izihlalo zintifontofo nangokwombala osakhilimu kanye nokuxhophayo okulenga emawindini. Imaphakathi legumbi linganyelwe itafula lokhuni elakhiwe ngesandla ngendlela enhle ngokumangalisayo elinembali engenazimpande etshaliwe kulo phakathi nendawo. Izimbali nazo zinikeza ukuheha kweLounge, lapho izindonga zilenga imidwebo yamanzi emihle. Ugqozi ngemumva komhlobiso olukaTrisha Wilson wenkampani yaseMelika yabadwebi bangaphakathi, iWilson & Associates, owahlobisa futhi iPalace yeLost City. Wabuye futhi wathatha lokukumangalisa kwezingadi wakungenisa emagunjini nasemakamelweni, ngokhuni nombala woju oludala, izindonga nemithunzana yegolide nomai=buttercup, i-buutercup eningana kanye nerusset komata kanye nokokumboza izihlalo kanye nokokumboza imibhede okunezimbali zethriphikanakanye nezamakhasi. Ezindlini ezinobucwebe, izindonga zona zinikezwe upende ophambili wokufudumele okusagolide, kuthi ezindlini ezincane umhlobiso ugcizelela emvelweni yokuluhlaza noku-ivories, kwabonakala kokuluhlaza okusasibhakabhaka. Izindlu zehotela ezingu-243 zinikeza ukuzikhethela ezindlini eziningi kanye nokuhambisana nazo. Okungenzejka kube okungajwayelekilenokwangasese, isibonelo, ngaphezu kokwengadi? Okwaqala kwenzelwa ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu ngayedwana kukaSol Kerzner, kunechibi lakho lokubhukuda kanye nejacuzzi endaweni yakho kodwa.Noma, kwalowomuzwa ophezulu womhlaba, kukhona indlu evaliwe. Kukhona ikheshi elikuthatha likubeke lapho ufuna ukuya khona. Izipho zokwamukela kubalwa kuzo amasiliphazi akhe, izimbali, ishampeni kanye nobhasikidi ogcwele izithelo (ithuba elingcono kakhulu ukuzama isithelo sekiwi esimnandi ngendlela emangalisayo kanye nogilayindeni, futhu owaziwa njengesithelo i-passion!).

Ezinye izinto ehotela iCascades kubalwa kuzo iVistas Bar ebhekene nezingadi, indawo ethengisa ngokudla engajwayelekile iGrotto ngaphansi kwezimpophoma kanye nesitolo sekhofi iBrazillian esiseduze kwendawo evulekile. Ngasecaleni elingaseMpumalanga, kukhona indawo evulekile evumela izivakashi ukuthi zizihlalele ngaphandle kwezindlu zazo engadini iPeacock, zibuka izinyoni ezinhle njengoba zizipha ukudla ngesikhathi zilalele amanzi njengoba zizidansela ngaphezu kwamanzi aseduzane. Ikhishi elimangalisayo liyatholakala khona eCascades. Izivakashi zaseCascades zidla ngokukhanyiselwa ikhandlela ePeninsula Resataurant lapho izithako ezintsha zihalalisela ulinga kokudala okulungiswe ngokuziqhenya iqembu labapheki lase-International.Amanani angangakanani ayatholakala khona phakathi kwendawo ehlelwe kahle yeGrotto Restaurant - indawo esezimpophomeni zamanzi.

Ubumnandi obuzwa uma ungena ezingadini zeCascades ube ulalele umculo wezinyoni ezitholakala uma uhambahamba phakathi. Ngokungavunjelwa, uzohamba phakathi kwamakhulukhulu ezinyoni eziqhamuka emhlabeni wonke - amakhwezi aqhamuka eMpumalanga ne-Afrika, Izinyoni ezinezifuba ezibomvu eziqhamuka eChin kanye nezipelo eziqhamuka kude neMpumalanga. Izinyoni zendawo zisukela kumaCranes aluhlaza okwezulu licwathile kuya kwamancane amaWaxbills. Ihotela iCascades linikeza izivakashi ithuba lokuphumula emoyeni ongcono kunovunguzayo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOMNYANGO WEZOKUXHUMANA NOMPHAKATHI, ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




IHoneymoon Heaven eseCascades
Umuzwa wothando uhlala usemoyeni eCascades, ihotela lobukhosi enkabeni yeSun City lapho ubuhle obubukekayo buhlangene nenjabulo kanye nokugcizelela kusoxolweni nasekuzijwayezeni okumnandi.

Ihotela laziwa ngezingadi zalo zethrophikana, lapho izithandani zingahamba zimbambene ngezandla zidlula izindonga zamadamu zidansa kanye namabhamuza ezimpophoma, zivilapha enethini eliwumbhede ophanyekiweyo endaweni esithekile yangasese ezungezwe imibala emangalisayo, egqame nokuluhlaza kwesibhakabhaka kanye nomsindo ocwebile womculo wezinyoni, bese zidla ePeninsula Restaurant lapho ichibi libathinta ezinyaweni. Kulabo abazochitha uthando lwabo, kanye nezithandani ezigubha imigubho yeminyaka ewu-25, ewu-40 noma ewu-50 zashada, iCascades iyakwazi ukwenza lolosuku lube olukhumbulekayo. Ukwamukeleka komuntu abakutholayo uma bengena enkundleni okungenwa kuyo, kulandelwa ukubhalisela kwezindlu, ngokushesha kwenza bazizwe bengababalulekile. Ukumamatheka kulula futhi kulula ukuba nakho, Futhi lokho kuyindlela ihotela eliqala ngako ukunakekela.

Izindlu zehotela ezingu-243 zinikeza ukuzikhethela ezindlini eziningi kanye nokuhambisana nazo. Okungenzejka kube okungajwayelekile
nokwangasese, isibonelo, ngaphezu kokwengadi? Okwaqala kwenzelwa ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu ngayedwana kukaSol Kerzner, kunechibi lakho lokubhukuda kanye nejacuzzi endaweni yakho kodwa. 

Noma,ukuthola umuzwa ophezulu womhlaba, kukhona indlu evaliwe. Ungena njengokugwinya kwelinye lamakheshi asezingeni eliphezulu liye liyokubeka enkundleni yeshumi nanhlanu. Akekho omunye onelungelo lokungena kuleyondlu ngoba idinga ukhiye oyisipesheli wokulivula. Kuleyondlu ababili bathola izipho zokubamukela ezifana namasiliphazi akhe, izimbali, ishampeni kanye nobhasikidi ogcwele izithelo (ithuba elingcono kakhulu ukuzama isithelo sekiwi esimnandi ngendlela emangalisayo kanye nogilayindeni, futhu owaziwa njengesithelo i-passion!).

Abathandanayo futhi bathola ibhuku lokugcina izithombe lapho bengabeka izithombe zabo zomshado. Kodwa izithombe zokukhunjulwa zingathathwa nganoma isiphi isikhathi, ngalokho-ke umthwebuli zithombe waseSun City uzokujabulela ukuthatha lokokuhlangana kwababili kwabathandanayo noma komgubho womshado ngendlela abazovumelana ngayo bona bodwa. Kanti futhi ukudla kwababili kwenziwe kwaba mnandi kakhulu ngesikhathi kujatshulelwa njengengokuphuzwa ngokushona kwelanga noma ngasiphi esinye isikhathi sengxubevange emacaleni echibi lokubhukuda noma eVistas Bar ebhekene nengadi. Ubukhazikhazi bekhasino elisehotela iSun City
Ubukhazikhazi bekhasino elakhiwe kabusha ngokwesigqi seHarlequin ehotela iSun City buthumela ukuzungezisa emgqumeni omusha wokujabulo okuthokozisayo enkabeni yendawo.

Ukwakhiwa kabusha kwekhasino kube ingxenye yemali eyizigidi ezingu-170 zamarandi yokulungisa ihotela iSun City, lona lilodwa elibize izigidi ezingu-200 zamarandi ukulithuthukisa okwaqalwa endaweni isiyonke ngo-1995. IKhasino laseSun City lavulwa okokuqala ngoDecember ka-1979, kwaziswa abaseNingizimu Afrika okokuqala, isitayela seLas Vegas sokuba nolwazo lomhlaba kwezemidlalo. Ukuba nodumo lwalo ngokushesha okwaholela okufakweni kwamatafula amaningana kanye nezinye izinto zangasese zokudlala. Lokhu kwandiswa kwaseduzane sekuthathe ithuba lemibono yamazwe ngamazwe ekuhlelweni kanye nasekuhlotshisweni ukudala indawo enomuzwa wokujabula. Ngaphezu kwendawo yokungena ekhasino, kusukela enkundleni yehotela leSun City, impophonyana yezinhlavu ziphophoma echibini elimbozwe okusandwangwana ukunikeza umuzwa sengathi seliyashona ilanga kudonsekela emanzini, kumemezela injabulo nenhlanhla okumelwe kujatshulelwe lapho.

Kusukela ekungeneni, izingcezu ezinkulu ngangemitha ezicwebezela okupholishiwe ngebhulazo zibekiwe kumata ukudala umgwaqo wamaphupho ophuzi ngokombala. Lendlela iholela abaphanti ukuthi badlule izindodla zezingcezu esisagolide ezibonakala ukuxhasa uphahla kanye nezinye futhi izindodla zezingcezu ezixube umbala ezibonakala zebhajwe ezindongeni ukuya eHarlequins Bar naseLounge okubhekene namatafula asekhasino. Ngamumva kweBar kukhona elikhulu, isondo elihlale lizungeza lenhlanhla, elishwibeka lime liphinde lishwibeke futhi ngesitayela esithusayo, ngesikhati isondo le-roulette lizungeza amahora ematafuleni abukeka saluhlaza eduzane. Inkundla enkulu ingenisa izikhoxe ezimbili ezinkulu. Kukhona amatafula angu-16 e-America Roulette, awu-20 eBlackjack, awu-2 ePoker, elilodwa leDice noma iCraps, amathathu ePunto Banco kanye nelilodwa lemidi Punto Banco.

ISalon Prive yethu kanye International Room yethu yangasese kunamatafula awu-16 okubalwa kuwo aweRoulette,aweBlacjack, awePunto Banco kanye naweBaccarat. Ukubheja okuncane nokukhulu kusuka ku-R5 kuya ku-R500. Amatafula emali enkulu ayatholakala kuphela eSalon Prive kanye nase-International Room. Zombili lezi zimukela labo abadlali abaphezulu abafuna ukudlalela iziteki ezinkulu ngasese, kanye nabadlali baphesheya kwezilwandle abangaxoxisana ngokudlalela iziteki ezinkulu, ngokubalwa kwemali yabo abayifakile yakwamanye amazwe. Kukhona futhi imishini yeSalon Prive eduze kwamatafula enkundla, lawo anemishini ewu-74 engangenisa abaphanti abancamela ukudlalela iziteki ezinkulu zo-R5, R10, R25 kanye noR100. Umgodi omaphakathi ufake ngaphansi igumbi elihle elimboziwe elihlotshiswe ngeHarlequin. Lokukukhonjiswa ngohlobo lwase-Italy leminyaka yamakhulu angu-16 sekufaniswe nokuhlakanipha kanye nomoya ophezulu wephunga ngezwa, manje yini enye engakhonjiswa ukuba ibe khona? Amadayimane emibala kanye nonxantathu abasuka ekugqokeni kwendabuko sekugujelwe ezintweni eziningi ukuhlobisa ikhasino.

Umgomo wokuhlobisa ikhasino uthelelwe indawo ethengisa ngokudla eseduzane, ebizwa nje ngokuthi iHarlequins, etholakala phakathi nekhasino Bar kanye neDisco Night Club. Emhumeni weSun City, yebo, kukhona umhlaba wobukhencekhence bemishini yekhasino yokudlala. Imishini engu-429 okubalwa kuyo emihlanu yeSuper Jackpots - iMillion Mania, iDream Machine, iSuperslam kanye neFruits of the Forest. Manje , ekungqwaphazeni kwezingcezu zasekhasino, ungajabulela izinhlobo eziningi zemidlalo, sijoyine bese ushayela kude izinkinga zakho njengoba usuphezulu ebukhwishikhwishini kanye nasenjabulweni yalokokuwina. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




USteven umqondisi wezemisebenzi ophethe eSun City



Abasebenzi abanobuchwepheshe ngokokusebenza futhi abanamakhono ahlukene kulomsebenzi walemboni yokunakekela kungumgomo woMqondisi wezemisebenzi weSun City uSteven Bagg, oneminyaka engu-34.


USteven, osechithe isikhathi eside emsebenzini wakhe iminyaka ewu-14 ephethe iSun international, ethola amatomu okusebenza ngokweqembu lapho imiphumela yoshintsho isikhombisile futhi indawo yokuvakasha isebenza ngokuthi ngxi ngobumnyama.

"Ngiyakwazi ukuthatha isitokwe sabanikazi besiteki nokubona ukuthi emunye angasevwa kanjani." kusho uSteven. "Bangabathengi, abasebenzi kanye nabanikazi beziteki. Kufanele ngiqiniseke ukuthi abanikazi beziteki bathola okulinganayo kanti futhi ngabathengi ngifuna ukuqhuba ukukweneliseka okukhonjwe uhlelo lwezivakashi zethu eziqavile, okwamanje okusabalwa njengokungu-9 kokungu-10. Okwabasebenzi, ngifuna ukubona ukusebenzisa kwabo amakhono ngokuphindaphindiwe njengendlela ejwayelekile, kokubili kwempumelelo eqhubekayo kwendawo yokuvakasha, kanye nokuhlomula kwabasebenzi.

"Ekuzungezweni okujwayelekile kokusebenza kwamahotela, ngithanda ukubona abasebenzi abakhona benza umsebenzi wabo ngokugcwele bese futhi ngokunikezwa imihlomulo eyengeziwe - bethatha izindawo zalabo abajwayele ukuqashwa ngezikhathi ezidinga umsebenzi. Amarekhodi ethu kwiNatinal Qualification akhombisa ukuthi lokhu kungumsebenzi ophumelelayo. Imivuzo wokuba namakhono ahlukahlukene kubasebenzi ngaphakathi endleleni okusetshezwa ngayo - ekusebenzeni noma kuphi embonini yokunakekela - kuyimikhakha eminingi lapho umuntu ngamunye ebekwe khona, kuncike elwazini lakhe lokukwazi emikhakheni eminingi. Ngihlose ukwandisa umoya wokusebenza phakathi kwabasebenzi."Ubuchwepheshe yenye yezinto uSteven azithandayo, futhi uzogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa ngokwanele kwezinto zobuchwepheshe ngazo zonke izindlela zokuphatha kanye nokusebenza kwendawo yokuvakasha, okubalwa kuzo ukushesha kwezinto zokuxhumana kanye nokuphendula kokudingekayo. Uhlola ukusebenza kwekhadi lobuchwepheshe ukuthi lisebenze endaweni yokuvakasha.

Njengamanje uqedela iziqu zakhe zeMasters in Business Administration, uSteven waqala umsebenzi wakhe wasehotela ngo-1986 ehotela eHeerengracht eCape Town futhi waqeqeshwa neqembu lehotela laseProtea. Wangena eSun International ngo-1989 eFish River Sun, kwathi ekuhambeni kwesikhathi waba umphathi wabahlali, kwase kuthi futhi eMpikweni Sun Marine, waba umphathi jikele.

Selokhu aba iGM yehotela iSun City, esehlanganise indawo yokuvakasha ngoJuni ka-1997, kanye  futhi nomphathi wezokusebenza kweCascades, ihotela iSun City. ICanabas, iVacation Club, I-Entertainment Centre kanye nokwahlukana kwamagumbi endawo.

Njengomphathi wezokusebenza kwendawo, uthatha umsebenzi wendawo yonke indawo lapho ukusebenza kwakhe kuzoba banzi kakhulu ngokufaka bonke abasebenzi bendawo yokuvakasha ekuthuthukiseni isiko lokusebenza kweqembu.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 KANYE NE-FAX: (011) 780 7535.




Umgqumo! Umkhiqizo wekhono elicolekile ngokuhambisana
Ichireographer ngayinye iletha umehluko ongapheliyo Umsebenzi omuhle ngndlela emangalisayo ngamunye yiwo owenza uMgqumo! Engefaniswe I"Afriganza" ezobekwa e-Extravaganza Theatre ehotela iSun City kusukela ngoNovember inguphisi ocolekile owenziwe ngabangadwana abayisikhombisa ama-choreographers.

Yize noma ngakunye kunguMgqumo! Kakhulukazi ngumsebenzi womuntu ngamunye, inkaba yako itholakala emtheleleni weAfrika - kanti futhi lomcana udala ukuhambisana lokho okwenza lombukiso ube ngojabulisayo. Imikhiqizo enikhulu, iqembu likaTarnia Norman kanye noClarence Swartland, bobabili ngokudlala kwabo okudumile kanye nomsebenzi wokuba ama-choreographers ezinhlotsheni ezahlukene zomdanso, yibo abaqondene nombukiso ozovezwa kokuqala, owesibili kanye nowesithupha - iAfriganza, okuyiyona ehlela umuzwa, iBronze Seduction kanye neSaharan Dreams. Kowesine nowesihlanu, kuzobe kdlala iWaterfall Adagio kanye neFire Procession. uTArnia noClarence yibona abenza umkhiqizo omkhulu ngo-1989 kanti futhi selokhu kwaqanjwa izinhlobo eziningi zokuvezwa kwamakhono ahlukene. Basaziwa kakhulu ngokwabo, okwehlukile futhi okusezingeni eliphezulu lokudlala.

I-CV kaBheki Ndlovu eneminyaka emithathu ikhombisa umibukiso nemidanso engcono kunayo yonke yaseNingizimu Afrika, kanti futhi umsebenzi wakhe usudunyiswe kakhulu kwiSarafina, emidlalweni yabo yebhayisikobho kanye nemibukiso. Ikhono lakhe lokudansa lasetshenziswa futhi kwiShowboat, kwiWizard of Oz, kwiJesus Christ Superstar kanye nakwiBaletsatsai yakamumva yeSun City. Kwi African Beat, umdlao wesithathu emibukisweni, ungumgqugquzel nomaluleki kanye nomdansi. Umthelela kaJayesperi Moopen utholakala kakhulu ebucikweni baseNingizimu Afrika. Inyuvesi yaseMadras eIndia emkhakheni wezeFine Arts, usebhodini yabaphathi beCivic Threatre bese ehlala futhi esihlalweni esiphateh iDance Alliance. Kusemkhakheni womdanso lapho aziwa khona kakhulu, kakhulukazi emsebenzini wakhe lapho ethuthukisa khona umdanso waseNdiya kanye nezegqi zakwamanye amasiko. Emdlalweni wesine woMgqumo, udansa iVision of Rhythm, kanti ngempela, useqambe nomculo ngalenkundla. Lona ngumdlalo ophelelisela ubuhle beWaterfall Adagio.

ILegends of Fire, ingumdlalo wesihlanu, iyizinkundla ezintathu, inkundla iyodwa iyadanselwa. Ipuppeteer eyaziwayo, uAdrian Kohler wayeqondene nokuvulwa kwalomdlalo, lapho isithombe sezimu esidlaliswayo sihlela inkundla. Lokhu kulandelwa iFire procession ngemikhiqizo emikhulu kanye nokuphakama komdlalo ngomdanso weMask odanswa iAdele Blank - eyagcina iqeqeshwe iJohannesburg City Ballet Company, kwase futhi kuba iPACT, kwi-opera nasemkhiqizweni womculo. Uqeqeshiwe futhi nakwi-Contemporary nasemdansweni wejazz, imithelelela ayilethayo engungezeleleni eMgqumeni! UyiNhloko yeFree Flight Dance Company ayiqamba ng-1987, ungumdansi wechoreographer nomqeqeshi wayo.

U-Owen Lonzer uselokhu adansa kusukela eneminyaka eyishumi wase ethatha umsebenzi wakhe wokuqala eneminyaka ewu-14. Usedansele ukuphelelisa umbukiso, iFoot Tappin' Fun. Umsebenzi wakhe emdansweni walandelwa iminyaka ekuthuthukeni embonini wokwazisa nakweyokuzithokozisa kanti maduzane nje usejoyine uhla lwaseNingizimu Afrika lwabadansi abaphezulu bohlobo lomdanso wechoreographer. Ubengoqondene nomdanso wechoreography emibukisweni enjengoDooWah Boys II, iNunsense 3, iLa Cage aux Folles kanye neJohannesburg Follies 2000.



IHarlequin's Reastaurant kanye neDisco Nightclub esehotela iSun City

UHarlequin wayengoshayela phezulu, umdlali onomoya ophezulu neminyaka yenkulungwane namakhulu ayisithupha; oshintshashintshayo okanye nathi othandayo ukubona kanye nokubonwa futhi owaziyo ukuthi impilo yangempela ukuze igcwaliswe ifunani.

Manje yikuphi okungaba okwemvelo ngokwedlulele ngolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba nanobuhle bendawo ethengisa ngokudla kanye nekilabhu yasebusuku yomdanso ukudonsa leyongqikithi efanayo? IHarlequin's kanye nendawo yomdanso exhopha amehlo eseduze kwayo ingenye phakathi kwezihehayo izindawo zekahsino esanda kuvuselelwa esehotela iSun City. OkwakuyiRaffles endala, sekushintshwe  ngezigidi ezinhlanu zamarandi ukuthuthukiswa okwakuyingxenye yezigidi zonke ezingamakhulu amabili zamarandi ukuthuthukisa okusanda kuqedwa endaweni yokuvakasha. IHarlequin's ingengafaniswa, egcwele ulwazi oluningi kanti futhi iyindawo enobungani, lapho ukupheleliswa kwenjabulo kutholakala ewayinini elicolekile kanye nokudla sekucoleke ezingeni lobucwepheshe.

Ingangenisa abadli besidlo ababalelwa ku-74, kanti futhi indlela okuhlalwa ngayo iqinisekisa lokokuhoba, njengezindawo ezimbili eziyizingxenye zangasese azengenisa imicimbi yangasese yabantu ababalelwa kwabangu-10, noma lowomuzwa wekhanda wokuba ingxenye yesixuku kokwenzeka ekhasino. Itafula elide lomcimbi elendlalwe indwangu esagolide nesikhumba leluleke ngaphansi kweHarlequin, eligcwala lonke udonga, lapho yonke indawo yokuhlala ingezihlalo ezimnyama ezihlotshiswe ngokusagolide, kwase kumbozwa ngomhlobiso wemibala yedayimane leHarlequin.

Inkolo yokuzithokozisa into enkulu eHarlequin's, kusukela ekuhlanganeni namatafula kuya emakhishini amangalisalo kanye nohla oluhehayo lwewayini. Okwengezelayo kobumsulwa be-ivory endwangini egqize ngavelivethi ebubende kundlalwe ngokucoliseka kwendwangu kasilika obubende, amathuluzo okudla esiliva aqhamuka eGermany, ezinhle ngokumangalisayo ezibonakala ngezinhlayiya ezinezelelwe izingilazi zamanzi eziqhamuka eMiami eHarlequin eluhlaza, kanye nezibazimula ngokumhlophe eziqhamuka eChina. Umhlobiso osemdansweni uyamangalisa, inhlanganisela yegwadle, insimbi ye-crome kanye nengilazi kudala ukuzivoca okuholela ekutheni wonke umuntu enze okuthile. O-DJ bathola umgqumo usuka ebhuthini enefulemu elinamatshana amibalabala, ngezibani ezihlelwe esibukweni esisandilinga emsukeni waso.

Amatafula, ame ngokuthandelwa insimbi, abekwe kuyo yonke indawo ngaphandle kwalena ecwebezelayo, inkundla lapho kudanswa khona. Ngaphezulu, izibani ezishintshashintshayo ezisophahleni zisuka ngaphesheya ensimbini yekhromu ehlelwe ngokubhekene nensimbi eluhlaza okusasibhakabhaka, kanye nezibani ezinde ezivunguza okwesihlabathi, ezizingeze ngokwensimbi yekhromu kanye nengilasi enemibalabala eminingi. Indawo ethengisa ngokudla iHarlequin's kanye neDisco Nightclub okwbantu abakhaliphile, abantu ababonakalayo abazihleyao izinto zabo futhi abaziyo ukuthi impilo ijatshulelwa kanjani. Yebo, uHerlequin yena uqobo lwakhe wayevumelana nalokhu. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (0110 780 7684.



I-Orchid Restaurant
Ikhishi lase-Asia lesiminya, elilungiswe lasevwa ngendlela yasempumalnga osekube umkhuma wokuziqhenya eminyakeni engamakhulu eminingi, isihlele amaqoqo abadli bokudla kwentsha i-Orchard Restaurant yasehotela laseSun City.

Kusukela eqenjini lasekhishini, eliphethwe umpheki uBeng Haut Chew, kuya kumaphathi be-restaurant abangoBokmun Chan noLiu (uLouis) Yi, nabasebenzi okungathi abasempumalanga njengelanga liphuma. Ngesekudleni, umrco polo usekhuphukele kwelinye izinga ukukuthola. I-Orchid ayifaniswa nalutho olunye ngenxa yendlela yayo yokuhlanganisa ubuciko ngendlela elula, kanye nokuthonya okulula ngezivakashi eziqhamuka emasikweni ahlukene ziyaziswa kulendlela yokudla. Amatafula ababazekayo, amnyama, isibonelo, andlalwe ngako kokubili izipuni zokudla etafuleni zaseNtshonalanga kanye nezindukwana  zakhona zokudla. Imicwana egqamile enokubeneyzela okumhlophe yaseChina inebhodlela likasosi elinamakhona enziwe ngomsebenzi wezandla. Okulinganayo ngeqiniso obahsikidi bokustima ugonothi, izitofu ezigcwele amatafula, izindishi zenonja, amabhodwe obumba kanye nemisebenzi emincane.

Indishi encane yengilazi etafuleni ngalinye, iqukethe ezimbalwa zangempela izimbali ze-orchid, zilingisa imibala emihle ngokumangalisayo yeorchard edwetshwe ezidongeni. Ukulungiswa okubanzi kokhuni olusongene lwemvelo kanye nobunye ubuhle beorchard kwamukela izivakashi njengoba ziphelekezelwa ukuya ematafuleni azo ngabaphelekezeli bakhona abagqoke okwakhona komsebenzi. Ukhuni olumdaka ngokunothileyo ludala umhlobiso wesihonqa esakhiwe ngokuphanjanisiwe esizungeze wonke amakhona okudala umuzwa wokuhlukana kwamagumbi ngendlela efanisiwe ndawonye. Umcimbi omncanyana wabantu abangu-11 bangeniswa egunjini leTampani, elihlukanisiwe nendawo enkulu yokudla ngezibuko ezivulekela emaceleni, kanye nezinye izndawo zangasese ezakhiwe  ngendlela yokuhlala ngokwemicimbo ye-alcove uma uhamba ngezindonga.

Yize noma yonke into ilungiswe ngobumsulwa endaweni engahlala abantu abangu-118 yokudla, udumo lwayo nokushesha komsebenzi ngaphakathi zekwenze ikwazi ukungenisa abantu abangu-250 kusihlwa; kodwa kukhona ukulingeka okungenakwehlulwa ukuhlola ukudala abanako okumangalisayo.
