Umpheki waseSingapore ophethe uBeng Huat Chwe wafika eOrchird eminyakeni eminingana eyedlule njengomphathi  wbapheki baseChina eRoyal Abjar Hotel eDubai, elandela ukufika kwakhe eSwiss Grand hotel eSeoul, eKorea. Umsizi wakhe ongomChina uSong Chang usesebenze iminyaka engu-10 emakhishini aphezulu asezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla emadolobheni aseChina eXian, eGuilin naseShanghai. Iqembu lakhe lasekhishini liqeqeshiwe emakhishini aseIndonesia, eKorea, eTaiwan, eThailand, eCombodia, eLaos, eMalaya, ePhiliphi naseChina; konke okukhonjiswa ekudleni. Noma kunjalo, izivakashi ziphumule okwangampela ngenxa yokunakekelwa okunobungani okusezandleni zomphathi wendawo, uBokmun Chan kanye nomsizi wakhe, uLouis.

UMnumzane uChan wafika e-Orchid ephuma eDragon Court i-Restaurant yaseChina esehotela laseSheraton naseTowers eKuwait, futhi uLouis wachitha iminyaka eminingana eeqenjini eliseHoliday Inn China ngaphambi kokuba athuthele eNingizimu Africa. Ukwazoswa okuhle ekudleni ukuzikhethela okukhethekile kwaDim Sum. Igama lalamaqebelengwana amancanyana amnanadi lichaza ukuthi "Thinta inhliziyo", futhi amangalisayo, isibonelo, ingxubevange yenyama yengulube egayiwe kanye namakhowe aseChina asongwe azungeza umdambi, okufika etafuleni kukubhasikidi wokukubilisa kushisa. Manje sekuyidada elinongiwe ngephunga elimnandi, okufakwe phakathi nekhekhe lepani eliwucezu eliqale landlalelwa ngososi osaswidi kabhontshini. Ukulandela, zama okumnandi okusaswidi kanye nokumuncwana okuwumdambi ongakaze ukunambithe, okulandelwa iAyam Pandan (amathanga enkukhu angenamathambo anongwe ngokwaseMalesia) kanye nesikabhu esinongwe ngokumangalisayo, izithelo ezithosiwe zagovuzwa ndawonye (ezibizwa ngeLuohan emva kweChinese Buddhist monk) - kungumuzwa okude omnandi wabadli bezithelo ukuzigcina beyibo. Indlela engcono ukulinga ukudla ukuthatha ithuba lokuncanyana okunikezwa kuqala kunokuba uthathe indishi enkulu, kanye okubiza njalo njalo. Kodwa akekho ozoncamela ukwehlukanisa uqweqwe lwekhekhe olubizwa ngePanda lapis, noma uKa Ti ice cream oqhamuka eThailand. I-Orchid esehotela iSun City ivulwa kusukela ngo 18h00 kuya ku 23h00 nsuku zonke phakathi nesonto bese kuze kube u 24h00 ngezimpelasonto. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.



I-Calabash Restaurant
Khohlwa ukukhanywa, "ukumamatheka ebusweni bengwenya". Ebudididini behotela iSun City, entsha iCalabash Restaurant, ifana nokungaphezulu ngokwedlulele ukuzanelisa kokuqhesha. 

Insimbi ebunjiwe yakhe izibambo zeminyango kanye nezibambelelo zokusiza ngasekungeneni, izinhlobonhlobo zemibala zesitensela ewulayini odongeni kanye nokufekethiswe ngezinhlamvana zamatshe amibalabala ocwesheni lwensimbi lwendlaleke ngaleya kwetafula. Umhlobiso, okuseqinisweni, ungudumo lwase-Afrika kanye namatafula abubulayo nako kgubha ukunakekela kwase-Afrika, ngayo yonke into kanoma ubani.

I-Calabash isibe indawo enkulu nedumile iminyaka eminingi, kodwa manje isilungiswe kabusha njengenxenye yokulungiswa okukhulu kwango 1995 yokulungiswa kwehotela lilonke laseSun City. Umphumela ungophilayo, onobungani, indawo yokudla yemindeni lapho kugxilwe ekudleni okungcono ngendlela emangalisayo, okusevwa zonke izinsuku zesonto kusukela ngo 17h30 kuya ku 23h00. Ukudla kwe a' la carte kukhombisa ukuzikhethela okukhulu kwezindishi ezigqugquzelayo kusukela ezweni lase-Afrika okulungiswe kahle kakhulu ngezinongo ezimsulwa ngokwedlulele. Ukuhamba uye eNyakatho ne-Afrika ukuqala ukudla okunesaladi leWhite Nile, noma uhlole ilebanese Delights kweMiddle Eastern mezzel okufana ne-hummus, tabouleh, baba channouj, muthabal kanye ne-labenah, noma mhlawumbe ulinge okuthuile okulula okufana namakhowe amanyama osiwe athelwe ngaphezulu usosi kashizi weChedda omnandi kakhulu.

Kukhona ubobotie wangemapela owenziwe ngokuphakathi nendawo, isiklabhu esigayiwe esikhari, izinhlobo zesosatie nenyama yenkomo enongiwe, inkukhu kanye nama-apricot omisiwe avuvuzelwe ngokokunandisa, kanye nemendlela yentshe okunososi wewolintshi kanye newolintshi salamula okuqhamuka ngqo eKapa. Bese kuba khonaimihlobiso ebukwayo emihle ngokumangalisayo yokosiwe kanye nokhari, okuhambisana nepasta, okugriliwe kanye namadombolo, kanye nokhumbulekayo uphaya we-Etosha venison. Okukhethekile kwezingane kukhombisa okululana okufana namaqebelengwana, obhontshisi kanye nemeshi, kanye neminywana yamadombolo egriliwe, kanti futhi akekho umthandi kashokoledi okufanele aphuthelwe u-ice cream kashokoledi. Akukona nje ukuthi ucwiliswe kushokoledi kuphela kodwa futhi usevwa kanye namaqebelengwana kashokoledi. Khohlwa isilinganiso. Vele nje uzitike! Okunamathekela phansi ezindongeni amaqoqo emifanekiso yakudala yase-Afrika, okuhambisala nocelemba wase-Ningizimu neMelika kanye namabheshu ahlotshiswe ngobuhlalu. Kunqamula imikhonto yezandla ezinsikeni, isibani esimangalisayo sikhombisa izinkawu ezine zijubela endlini ekhanyisela ngokukhaya kwamagilobhu ezidladleni zazo, kanti uphahla luhlotshiswe ngamaqabunga epalm.

Ezinhlangothini, amakhawunta amatafula awokubaziweyo kwendlove, inyathi kanye nendlovudawana, okunye kuzimele kona ngokwakho okunye kunamathele emihonqeni yamagatsha esihlahla. Okubaziweyo kungokunye okuhlobise amatafula, kusukela ezitsheni zokunongisa ukudla kuya ekuhlelweni kwezigujana ezincanayana kanye notshani olomisiweyo ezitsheni zokhuni, I-Calabash iyi-restaurant engamaqabuqabu lapho umuzwa wokunambitheka kusukela kokubili inyakatho neningizimu ye-Afrika kuhlanganela khona kokufanayo. Akumangalisi ukuthi ingani idume kangaka ngezingwenya. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NORALA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KUNELOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684




Inkaba yeSun City - ihotela iSun City
Ihotela iSun City ingukuzithokozisa ngendlela ebalulekile empilweni endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City. Okubalulekile ngehotela okunye kobuhle obukhangayo kanye nolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba.

Kusukela esikhathini ungena endaweni evulekile izinzwa zakho zibhudukezwa imihlobiso yobugagu bobuciko kanye nokuhlelwa kweziwici ezimangalisayo. Indawo emaphakathi isishintshelwe ukuba ukucinana kwmaqabi othsni bemfunda, amanzi achachazayo kanye nezimbokodo, okuzungeze imishini yokugembula eshehsayo ewu-400, ekhenceza kude ngaphansi kweLobby Lounge. Ukufika eLobby Lounge izivakashi zenyuka ngentambo enqamula kahle elekelelwa ngezinyathelo zetshe kanye nokhuni lwakudala. Egcwaliswe ngokwedlulele ngokwaseTheki kanye nendwangu ebomvu klebhu eyemboze izihlalo ngobuhle obumangalisayo obuhlobise iLobby Lounge ebhekene nezingadi zaseparadesi. Kuyindawo yokuziphumulela ubuke umbukiso odlulayo njengoba ungafisa ukunambitha isamishi le-Atrium Club elilandelwa onothile upastri waseFransi kanye necappuccino. Izihlahla ezinde zepalm nezimbali zetripicana zihlobise izingadi zeparadesi ngaphansi. Opholi abanemibala egqamile bavunulisa uhlobo lwembadlana emhlophe ekhanyise kanye nokuhlotshiswa kukamata kuyizimbali ezingi ezisagolide kanye nezibomvu tebhu.

Ingaphakathi elihle ngokumangalisayo lehotela iSun City lacatshangwa nguTrisha Milson we Wilson & Associate, iqembu lamazwe ngamazwe lokuhlobisa elaqamba ingapakathi elihle ngokumangalisayo lePalace yeLost City. Njengesivakashi sehotela iSun City uzomangala ngokujabula ukuthola ukuthi igumbi lakho lingelinomya opholile ongafaniswa. Amagumbi ayamangalisa bese akhanyiswe phezulu ukukhanya kwelanga okumangalisayo. Imibala ebusayo onsundu ngokubomvu okufudumele kanye nokushisiwe kwewolintshi okuhlotshiswe ngokusagolide. Imaphla yasendlini eyenziwe ngezandla yaseNingizimu Afrika isinindwe ngesimo sombala woju yaqedelwa ngomhlobiso othinta umuthi omnyama opendwe ngopende owenzaukhazimule. Izindonga ezihlotshiswe ngezimbali ezincane ezinombala ophuzi, kanye nezinhlobonhlobo ezinhle zezindwangu ezilekelela imihlobiso efudumele yokwempahla yasendlini. Amakhethi anemigqa eyisikotshi kanye nokusagolide okukhombisa ukubukeka kwangaphandle okumangalisayo kwe Gary Player Golf Course. Izindwangu zokundlala imibhede zimbozwe imibalabala kanye notshani ngokuma kwezithelo ezifana nethungulo, okusawolintshi nokuluhlaza. Ubuzoyizoyi bekhasino bugujwa ubukhona bephunga-ngezwa neHarlequin enomoya ophezulu. Ukugqama komhlobiso kanye ne joie de vivre umlingiswa weHarlequin kugcizelela umumo wekhasino. Kusukela ekukleklebukeni kwenjabulo kwabadlali becrap kuya kwabamsulwa bejamile bepoker - nawe futhi uzokwahlulwa kuloludumo olohehayo.

Ingqikithi yomhlobiso ithwelwe kuze kufike kwemangalisayo engumakhelwane iRestaurant iHarlequins. Matafula andlalwe ngendlela enhle ngokumangalisayo ase ahlotshiswa ngezindwangwana ze-ivory nebubende evelivethi, andlalwe izipuni zokudla ezisasiliva kanye nezithengwe eChina izitsha zobumba ezilula kakhulu. Kungangena abadli besidlo abayela ku 74. Indlela okuhlalwa ngayo iqinisekisa ihoba, kukhona izindawo ezingohhafu zangasese ezingangenisa imicimbi yangasese enabantu abayela ku 10. Ingilazi eluhlaza yaseHarlequin Restaurant yengezela izingilazi ezinhle ezinezinhlayiya. I-Harlequins Restaurant kanye nekilabhu yasebusuku okokukhalipha, abantu ababonakalayo abahlela ukuqonda kwabo nabaziyo ukuthi ijatshulelwa kanjani impilo. Itafula elamazwe ngamazwe kanti abadli besidlo bangazibandakanya ngenjabulo kwi Hors D' Oerve yembasa ebhakiwe yaseKapa eyenziwe ngebhotela likasosi kagalige kanye nopelepele osaswidi kanye nezimvuthu zesinkwa noma isampula yeSpringbok pistacho terrine okunokwma-apricot. Okwesidlo esikhulu, ama-langoustines aphakeme kakhulu, njengakwinyama yenyamazane ebilisiwe.. Uma ukunambitha kwakho kujikela kokuhlwabusayo kakhudlwana, njalo iOrchid retaurant izokwanelisa ngisho nalokho kunambitha kwakho okusekukhathele. Ikhishi lomdabu lase-Asia lihlele kusukela edadeni leJasmine elifusiwe elisezwa lisemeqebelengwaneni epani kanye nososi osaswidi kabhontshisi kuya ezifubeni zenkukhu enongiwe yaseMalesia. I-Thai, iKa Ti ice cream umuzwa wokunambitheka njengoba kundlalwe ekhekheni iPanda Lapis.

Ngokwamakhishi omdabu aseNingizimu Afrika, iCalabash Restaurnat izokwamukela ngesitayela sangempela sase-Afrka. Itafula elibubulayo likunikeza iboboetjie, okhari, icarvery kanye nezitshalo zemifino okubilisiwe, kulandelwe ukudla okunamakhekhe okuthelwe ukhasitede okuzokona kanye nesibiliboco sepestri esinoshukela esidakiwe. I-Calabash ilapho imizwa yokunambitha evuselelayo kusukela eNyakatho kanye neNingizimu kuhlangana khona. Kwimaphakathi lehotela iSun City kukhona iTheatre. LeTheatre eyaziwa kakhulu yaziwa ngemikhiqizo egidlazayo kanye nokuhlelwa kwayo okumangalisayo. I-Baletsatsi njengamanje ekhonjiswa etheatre akubuzwa ukuthi yiyona ehamba phambili kuamtheatre akudala eyake yakhiqizwa eNingizimu Afrika. Ibophela isayensi eliphathelene nezinganekwane lase-Afrika, ihlanganisa umhlaba wamaphupho kanye nimicabango yamaphupho. Indaba kaBaletsatsi ixoxwa ngokulinganisa, umdanso, imigilingwane kanye nongomkhuba wesekisi. Umculo wangempela usuhlangene kanye nomdasno wechorography ongafaniswa nalutho kuthatha ababukeli kubayise emhlabeni wmaphupho nomlingo. "Umhlaba wamaphupho nomlingo ikona ihotela laseSun City eliyikho", kusho Umpahthi jikelele, uSteven Bagg. "Injabulo engafaniswa nalutho olunye kanye nokuzitika yikho ukushaya komgqumo wehotela".


!Funk! Ngena phakathi ugcwalise isikhala
I-Cabaret eCabanas njengoba iSun city ilalelela i-Extravaganza entsha. Njengoba ukulalela kwezwe lonke kufuna makhono aphezulu aseNingizimu Afrika okudlala ukudlalela iExtravaganza entsha yeSun City ekupheleni konyaka, yonke icabrethi eculayo , edansayo yenyuselwa iPalm Terrace ehotela iCabanas kusukela ngoOktoba mhlaka 5.

Umbukiso, !Funk!, izoqhubeka amasonto ayisithupah njengoba iExtravaganza ise "dark" bese amalungiselelo enziwelwe iExtravaganza ukungena esikhaleni sombukiso okhona manje, iBaletsatsi ngoNovemba. I-Baletsatsi eseyinezinyanga eziwu-18 izogcina ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 3. "Sibuze uPaul Warwick Griffin ukuthi asikhuphulele imikhiqizo ye-!Funk!. Umsebenzi wakhe uyancomeka, Futhi waziwa kakhulu ukudlaleni kwakhe kwiJesus Christ Superstar kanti futhi njengoRocky emkhiqizweni weRocky Horror Picture Show," kusho uKaren Cutts, Umpahthi wezokuzijabulisa, endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City. "Ungumculi futhi ungumdansi futhi unenkampani yakhe yokukhiqiza esesiyinike amandla eshashalazini lombukiso we!Funk!."

Inkampani kaPaul isidlale eshashalazini isikhathi esingangamasonto ayisithupa ngempumelelo enkulu idlala iBest of Broadway eCabanas ngonyaka odlule. I!Funk! ichazwa njengedlala imizuzu engu-60 ingami ukujabulisa ngomdanso wayo oqhubekayo owuzungezunge, ikhombisa sonke isikhathi umculo othandwayo kusukela kowawo 1970 no 80. "Umkhuba womdanso oqinile usuwaziswe embukisweni nguDavid Gouldie umdansi wecorography owawina umklomelo weVita," kusho uPaul. Okwahlukanisa ngongulinganayo okwamanje futhi okusaboniswana ngako ngabesifazane ababili abaphezulu eNingizimu Afrika abahlabelelayo. "sizobe sikhombisa abanyakazi besikhathi - uGloris Gaynor, uDian Ross iPointer Sisters kanye noDonna Summer phakathi kwabo. Umbukiso uzobe unomuzwa wokubuyisa okudala ngesiphetho senkulungwane minyaka, ababukekayo, nababukeka beheha - uhlobo loAbba luhlangan noPriscilla Queen weDesert," kusho uPaul.

UPual maduzane nje uqede umsebenzi weRocky Horror Picture Show eNico Cape townkanti impumelelo yakhe enkulu edlule bekunguQueen kwiOpera ne Jesus Christ Superstar. I-!Funk! izothola ukubenyenzela ngokokuqala emoyeni ngesikhathi iqala ukudalala eSun City, kodwa umqambi wayo ngeke abe pakakathi kwabadlali. UPaul uzobe eseqenjini lomdlalo weJesus Christ Superstar ePitoli ngalesosikhathi.

"Imibukiso esiyikhombisayo eSun Cit yithanda ukuba ingxenye yoshintsho lwendlela eyaqalwa esikhathini esithize esedlule, okungukuthi siyenze yaba inhloso yethu ukukhona amakhono amaningana aseNingizimu Afrika kwiSuperbowl kanye nasekwezinye izindawo zethu. Imibukiso yethu yokuqalela emifishanyana - iSunday matinees ngo 3 ntambama - ibizonikeza injabulo ngokwenhlalayneza, futhi ifake abaseNingizimu Afrika abaphezulu abafana noPieter Dirk Uys, uSteve Hofmeyr kanye noNataniel. I-Trader Horns, iyaqala yaba indawo yabaculi asebemkantshubomvu, isiphenduke inkundla yokuzikholisa yamakhono mamasha aseNingizimu Afrika okushaya izinsimbi. "I-Extravaganza entsha izobe nayo ikuwo lowomoya. Njengoba silalela ezindawenmi ezinkulu, kanjalo sibheka abaculi abaqeqeshwe kakhudlwana abasebancane - abadansi abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka 18, asebeqeqeshwe  ngendlela egqamile, futhi abanamakhono okwenza izinto ngezindlela ezahlukeneyo ukudlala izinhlobonhlobo zemidanso eyahlukene," kusho uKaren. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Isitayela sokuhlala seCabana - iCabanas eSun City
Ukuziqabula umzimba, injabulo esemfihlakalweni yeCabanas esesun City ingumuzwa osheshayo umuntu awutholayo ngesikhathi emukelwa. Ihotela lokuziphumulela elimaqabuqabu kunawo wonke amahotela aseSun City, iCabanas inikeza indawo yokulala ejwayelekile ibe inobuntofontofo.

Indawo yokwamukela ivulekile bese iba nendawo yesoso evulekile ebhekene neplam Terrace. Okutshaliweyo okuhehayo kubekwe kwazungeza iphansi elinamathayela, kanye nezindonga ezithe ukuhwaqazela yase iba nophahla oluqoqe utshani bemfunda betropiacana kanye nezimbali, konke kunikezela emuzweni ngokushesha wokuba sekhefini. Ngasemumva kwedesika lendawo yokwamukela kukhona izithombe ezenziwe odongeni njengamathayela ezinhle kakhulu, igcwele opholi, onongozolo, izinyoni ezinkulu eziqhelile, izimpangele, ozekamanzi kanye nezimabli. Olunye uchungechunge lwezihlahla zepalm kanye negqondo yezemidwebo okunsundu ngokubomvu, umabala obhuluwu kanye namaqabunga aluhlaza agijima ezindongeni esihwabuzela isihlabathi zeplam Terrace. ICabanas ibhekene necala lechibi elibukekayo ngendlela engena ngqo ezingadini ezinhle zetropicna, okukunikeza ingemumva eliklabusayo ngenxa yezinyoli ezakhele khona. Mapikoko amahle kakhulu ayabonakala ngamaqabuqabu ngaphambi komynago wengilazi okuholela endaweni yakho yokulala.

Izivakashi zingazikhethela phakathi kweyejwayelekile kanye nakwecokeme iCabanas, zonke zibe zinesilungiso-moya kanye nazo zonke izinto zikagesi zesimanje. ICabanas eyejwayelekile inikeza isisefo esingaphakathi egunjini lokulala, kuthi ezihambisana nazo ezicokeme zona zikhombia indlu yokugezela egcwele. Ingxubevange emsulwa yopende bemihle imibala bugqugquzela ubumsulwa kanye nomoya wokuphumula waseCabanas. ICabanas yaseSun City inikeza ukuzikhethela kokudla okuthathu - abapheki bakhipha unyawo ekuqambeni isigqi sesitayela samatafula ongasibona ngamehlo engqondo ePalm Terrace. Okugriliwe okuthanjisiweyo nokusajusi kuyatholakala e a la carte Morula Restaurant naseBar. Inani elilula lokwasemini kuyatholakala eMorula Café. ISun City ibinikezela ngisho nasemalungeni amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, okubalulekile iparadesi yokuzithokozisa ehlelelwe kahle izingane zayo yonke iminyaka. Izinhlelo ezibhekwe ngokuphelele zemidlalo kanye nezinto zokudlala eKwena's Castle, khona emagcekeni eCabanas: inkundla yemidlalo enhle ngokumangalisayo, indawo yezilwane kanye nenkundla yokudlala enakho konke kokudlala. Ukuzihambela ungcebeleke kafushane nje unqamula amagceke aluhlaza amahle ngokumangalisayo eCabanas kukulethela umhlaba wenjabulo nentokozo eSun - Waterwolrd. Kukhona nemidlalo yokushebeleza emoyeni, ukuzwinga emoyeni, ukushushuluza emanzini kanye neyalabo abafuna ukuhambahamba emanzini uziqhafela ngenjabulo, kukhona isikebhe esikuthatha sikuzungezise ichibi ngesikhathi sokushona kwelanga. ICabanas yaseSun City - ukuziphumulela okungekhona kokugcina umthetho nje yiko okungcono kunakho konke. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA SICELA UTHINTANE NOMNYANGO WE PR, ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




Okuphuphekayo eTable Bay
Ngesikhathi kugujwa umjikelozo wamahotela uJean Mestriner ukhuluma ngokusetshenzwa kwehotela iTable Bay yiSun International ngenani lezigidi zamarandi ezingu 250 ngokwemithetho elishumi, ungaxolelwa ngokungaboni kahle.

Izivakashi ezivakashela ukuphathwa kwenxanxathela yehotela kungenzeka zithole ukumangala okwedlulele ngezinkomba zabasebenzi abancengisisayo ukukhumbula ukuthi kukhona "Abasifazane nabesilisa abaseva abanye besifazane nabesilisa." Kodwa uma konke lokhu kwenza lelihotela elisendaweni enamanzi kube sengathi indawo yokuthengisela impahla iVictoria engathi sina engenanjabulo, cabanga kabili. Kulendawo, kusho uMestriner, imithetho yendlu ayinakwenza lutho ngezimpoqo nezinkolo noma iphutha ekulinganiseni isikhathi sokwenzeka kwesehlo esithile, kanye nakho konke okuhambisana nokuphakama kwezinga lomsebenzi. Umthetho wokufakaza wesithupha: "Asisoze saphendula ezivakashini noma kwabanye abahlanganyeli, 'lokho akuwona umsebenzi wami'. Siyohlala sisiza futhi senza okungaphezu kokulindelekile". Kuchaza uMestriner: "Inhloso yethu enkulu ukunakekela izivakashi zethu - yingakho sikhokhelwa nje". Lomgomo usukhokhe imivuzo emikhulu eminyakeni eminingi. UMestriner wayeyindoda eyashintsha ihotela le-five star iJerusalema laba ihotela lokuqala ledolobha iGlat Kosher, wagcina futhi nehotela iKwala Lumpur's Regent laba eliphezulu ezingeni, wavulela iWashington Regent ekwaziweni amazwe ngamazwe, wavuselela ihotela iWindsor Court eliseNew Orleans ...ekugcineni wathatha umsebenzi wokuvula iPalce yaseLost City.

Impumelelo yakhe lapho yaba kafushane okubukeka kahle kakhulu kanti namhlanje ihotela liyaphindaphinda ngokuzuza isizinda ngokwedlulele emaphesentini ako 90. Ukuthi nje qabu qabu noMestriner qobo lwakhe wayephethe umcimbi kaMongameli Mandela eqala ukuphatha wabantu abangu 1 200 abahlonishwa kanye nabaphathi bezifundazwe. Ubufakazi bokucophelela kwakhe ngemininingwane kutholakala ngokushesha lapho ungeke uthembe khona "kulayini ophambili" - konogada kanye nakubaxhumanisi bolayini bokuxhumana. Ukushaya icingo ulushayela ehotela kukhombisa ukuphendulwa okunobungani: "Sawubona, ihotela iTable Bay. Ngingakusiza kanjani ngocingo lwakho?" uMestriner ukubiza lokhu ngokuthi "ukumamatheka okuyamba ngezingcingo" echaza ukuthi wonke umehluko omncane nje usiza ekudaleni ukunakekela kweqiniso okwamukelekile. Njengengxenye uthina wakhe kulendlela yokuhlangenyela,abasebenzi babizwa "ngabahlnganyeli". Ukuxhumana nehotela ngolayini oxhumene ngendlela abasebenza bexhumene ngayo bese ungena kwenkulu iPorte cochere, ekungenisa emakhelekheleni, indawo enamathayela enziwengamabula. Uphahla olulula ngapahakathi kusukela emawindini aphakeme futhi kukhona izindawo zamaziko ezinkulu ezakhiwe ngomabula ezenzelwe umoya obandayo wasebusika waseKapa. Uma ufuka etable Bay, uzothola umuzwa ushaya khona kanye nokuthanda umsebenzi okubonkalayo. Lapho kungekho ongabazayo ukuthi ubani ophethe, abasebenzi basebenza ngokuxhumana noMestriner ngendlela engagcini nje umthetho kodwa enobungani. Uyajbula ngalencazelo ayinikezayo: "Uma ingemumva lendlu liphilile, uma ukushaya kwenhliziyo kuhamba kahle, lapho ususengxenyeni yakhona ngaphakathi." Akukho lapho uthola khona ukusebenza ngendlela yokuphatha ebonakala kakhudlwana kwase-Atlantic Bistro, indlu yokudlela yabasebenzi seyasuswa endleleni yenkantini yakudala njenge foie gras kusuka kuma slap chips. Ukudla kuphanyekwa kusasele isonto (omunye useyasola ukuthi abasebenzi abanikwa ukudla okusalile) kanye namathuluzi okudla nawokufaka ukudla ahlotshiswe ngokwesiko. Kuza njengokungesona isimangaliso ukufunda ukuthi uMestriner udlani lapho yena qobo lwakhe. Uyachaza: "Asinawo amazinga aphindwe kabili". Umhotela owazalelwa ukuba nguhotela ongumDutch uyena ophethe lobubumnandi baloluhlobo, osebenza kalula nje kodwa nemiphumela ephakeme osekumenze wabo ngomunye womhotela emhlabeni: "Uma kungekona okusezingeni, akusetshenziswa. Yikho konke okwenza ihotela libe elingafaniswa namanye". UMestriner ukhombisa ibhuku lokuqeqesha elinikeza incazelo entsha ngemininingwane ngayinye: "Lichaza konke ngokubaluleka kwakho kusukela ebudeni kwamsedeburns kwabahlanganyeli besilisa kuya ekwakhiweni kwamacici abahlanganyeli besifazane. Asikusebenzisi okokulayitha kwacwazi okushibhile ukulayitha ugwayi wezivakashi, kanjalo namatekisi athutha izivakashi zethu kufanele bahlangabezane nezinga esikulo lomsebenzi wethu ophezulu". Uthini ngobubenyebenye obungenakuvinjelwa? "Kuzoba khona ama-goofs, kodwa yindlela esiwaphatha ngayo eyenza umehluko. Abahlanganyeli bethu (ulisebenzisa leli temu ngokucikilisha) bazizwa besekhaya kanti lowo muzwa uze uphumele nakubavakashi bethu". Uthi uyazibona nje yena qobo lwakhe njengongoti omusha kwezamahotela? "Yebo, kuyangijabulisa impela njengoba ngetha uhlobo lomkhiqizo wami uqobo. Ngingungcweti ekuqambeni amahotela aphezulu kodwa kufanele ngibe nesandla esikhululekile cishe kukho konke. Kuyacaca ngeke ngikwazi ukwenza konke ngingedwa. Ngisebenza neqembu elincane, elizizwayo, nelisebenza ngokuzimisela eTable Bay, futhi sisonke sesilenze leli  hotela laba eligqamile ngempela". Ecelwa ukuba achaze ngesitayela sehotela, uqhamuka nezinto eziningi zobuhle beVictoria, kodwa futhi nengxubevange enmandi  ewuntanga neyasekhaya ngobuhle kanye nokuthinta iNewport Beach. "Sengathi ukugcizelela okukhulu kukwiVictoria, ingozi eyenza ihotela libe elifuthelene," kuchaza uMestriner, kanti futhi akukona eliyikho. "Angisoze ngakwenza okwenziwe ngaphambilini, ngincamela abanye abantu bakopelel kumina". Uvuma ngokuthokoza ukuba ngumchithi mali omkhulu, kodwa ugcizelela uyawuthola umvuzo kuyo yonke leyomali. "Engingasoze ngakwenza ukunqamula umsebenzi nezinga lawo ngenxa yokunqunyelwa - yingakho umsebenzi wasekhaya ubalulekile".

Uyayibeka nje iTable Bay njengengcono edolobheni? UMestriner unesiqiniseko ngolombuzo: "Ayi okwamanje. Kufanela kuqala siziveze thini. Kukhona ingozi yangempela ekuqhosheni noma ekuzethembeni ngokwedlulele". Ukholelwa sekutheni iKapa linokuningi okubalulekile njengendawo yezokuvakasha kanye neyemihlangano emikhulu. "Singethe silazise esikahthini esingangeminyaka emihlanu. Ezokuvakasha zizoba okuhamba phambili ekusingeniseleni imali - kodwa uma senza kahle umsebenzi. ITable Bay ingelinye igxathu emkhondweni oyiwona wona". Phakathi kwezinto eziphilayo zehotela: Uhla lwalo lamawayini oludluelel luzokhombisa amalebula aseNingizimu Afrika (ngezizathu ezicacile, iChampagne izobe yiyo kuphela ezokwehluka). Kusho uMestriner ngalesizathu esikhaliphile: "Nginezikhathi zokuvuthwa kweMeerlust iyodwa. Yingani kumele ngibheke phesheya kwezilwandle?"Zonke izimoto zipake njengezezinceku lazipaka khona uma zifika futhi zilungislelwa njengokwezidingo zazo. Ukulungisa yonke into ehotela elisha nakho akukho esikweni. Esikhundleni sokuthi izivakashi zethu zilinde edesikini eliphambili ukunakekelwa, ziyaphelekezelwa futhi ukuya ezindlini zazo bese zilungisa yonke into ngesikhathi ziphuza itiye lamaChina. Isikebhe sohlobo oluphambili kanye nesikebhe futhi esinamandla kuboshelwe khona ehotela okwezivakashi uma zifuna ukuzithokozisa. Wonke amagumbi akhombisa ama-bar amancane asebenza ngekhompuyutha, akala ubungako bokukhona bese futhi esho nokuthi kubiza malini ezivakashini ngokwawo engasetshenzwa muntu ezivakashini ukuthi ziphuze okungakanani kwamalini. Igumbi ngalinye linomshini wefax, ongaxhunyaniswa nokusebenza kwesatallite ukuthola imilayezo noma kuphi emhlabeni. Emyalezweni ukwengenza ukuthinta elinye izinga esimweni esinakekelayo noma kanjani, indawo yokushobinga yabesilisa izogcwaliswa omabula abambalabala (umsebenzi wokuqala kaMestriner wayesebenzisa amagaqa esiqandisi emsebenzini ofanayo). Ama-Aficionados azozikhathela iCuban kanye nezinye izinhlobo ezicolekile zikasigazi esukela enanini lika R10 kuya ku R250 ukubiza kwawo.




ICuban Coup e-Atlantic Grill
Ngaphandle kokungacatshangwa abaseNingizimu Afrka noma abaseMelika, ikhulu minyaka lamashumi amabili libe nomusa kubabhemi ngaphezu kwanoma esiphi esinye isikhathi emlandweni. Ukusho nje, eminyakeni ewu 400 emhlabeni abaphefuzi balahlekelwa ukukhomba kwabo kanye namakhala emthethweni wokubhema.

Njalo kusho indoda eseyibeke ababhemi besigazi baseNingizimu Afrika yabathi ngxi embusweni obukekayo, uTheo Rudman, yena ekanye noJean Mestriner weSun International, benze iTable Bay yasekapa yaba izulu lalabo abathanda kakhulu iHavana. Usigazi weCuba, ophakathi kwababiza kakhulu emhlabeni, wenza amaphesenti awu-50 amarandi angu-30 000, izinhlobo ezingu 24 zikasigazi zigcinwe endaweni efanelekile - ezinye zigcinwe lapho kunomoya khona oshisayo ebhekekile lapho kufabelwe zigcinwe khona - endlini yahotela yamawayini. Abanye bayatholakala okubalwa kubo labo abaphuma eHonduras, eDominicin Republic, eNicaragua, eJamaica'a Macanudo, odayiswa kakhulu kunayo yonke mehlabeni, kanti futhi, nezinkulu izingcezu zeDitch. "Osigazi bafana newayini, izinhlobo zobuwona zingaqhathaniswa nezamawayini abomvu namhlophe. NjengoBurgundy yewani, kanjalo neCuba eyesigazi. Inani elihle lingatholakalakunoma yiliphi izinga etable Bay eqoqweni likasigazi, uqala kuR4,50.

Kodwa, kusho umbhali wencwajana enquma imithetho yababheni iRudman'sComplete Pocket Guide wesigazi (osesikhwameni sephepha, into enone uJohn Platter), akubalulekile noma akuncomeki ukusukela iChurchill yemizuzu engu 90 kube iRobusta yemizuzu engo 30 (noma iRothschild) ingakwenza lokho. Konke kuncike ekushubeni, ukudingeka komoya oswakeme noma ukudingeka kokungabikhona kwayo. Ubude buyize nje, ngesikhathi ekuyisona esishodayo. Ukushuba,uzodonsa ngomhaha ngentshisekelo, amafu anuka kamnandi, umsebenzi omkhulu kanye nomcabango omiyo. Awuzisoli ngeisgazi kusho uMnumzane uRodman, futhi okuhle kodwa okunikwa ukuzinikela kwakho okungehlukaniswe. Okulula, uzogwinya intuthu.

Ake sithole lendaba yemiplo kuwo wona lomsebenzi: usigazi akuwona nje wokuthi uchaza ukuhogela umoya omubi. Cha, eqinisweni, ilenjimbilili ephuma epipini likagwayi yonke. Ukunambitheka okubalwayo, futhi uMnumzane Rodman uyafunga ukuthi ikhla lakhe elicolekile kanye nokunambitheka kwewayini kuthuthukiswe ukubhema usigazi. Kungukuzilolonga, usho ngokuncoma. Ubhema cihse abayela kwabahlanu ngelanga, echza ukuthi lenjimbilili ephuma epipini likagwayi kanye nekolitayi kwehlile, i-ammonia ayisekho kusigazi ocolekile. Kungumkhiqizo wonke kagwayi, ngokokusonga okuluntwentwe okutshalwe ngokuqinisekisa ngaphansi kwezimo ezishukashukayo ematendeni ama-muslim  abiza ngokwedlulele. Ukukhanyisa nje kulendaba yomoya oswakeme, ukuthi njengoba usigazi weCuban uzwela kangaka ukuthi ungoma ukuqeda umsebenzi wawo ezinsukwini ezimbalwa uma ungabekiwe endaweni ewulungele, usigazi ongcono kunayo yonke wedutch wona eqinisweni womile futhi ungonakal ngokungafaniswa uma ungase umswakanyiswe. Iqabuka elide elingaphuki likasigazi weCuban, unakekelwe futhi walungiswa ngokungalinganiswa, kufanele ugcinwe emswakameni. Usigazi kagwayi waseDutch, uqotshwefuthi wasongwa, awunakulimazeka, futhi unikeza intuthu encanyan. "OweDutch ufana newayini elimhlophe kwelibomvu leCuban," kusho uMnumzane Rudman. Ukuvuka kokuthanda usigazi, uqhubezele ayi kancane ngokugqugquzela komlingisi omkhulu u-Arnold Schwarznegger kanye nabanye, usuzalele kaninginingi okusha, noma eqinisweni, okudala, into emisiweyo,ikilabhu. Yaqanjwa Ngesikhathi sikaVictoria lapho abantu babevunyelwe ukubhema bakhululeke emphakathini lapho umkhuba wawuhwaqabalisiwe, ikilabhu labantu selaphenduka laba okungasetshenziswa, kuze kube manje, ezinsukwini zokufa kwempilo zeminyakeni yenkulungwane "ubuciko obumsulwa" bokubhema sebuvukile. E-United States ngonyaka odlule, amakilabhu angu 500 ababhemi asunguliwe. Kulabo babaleki abasuka ezindaweni lapho kungavunyelwe ukubhema khona eKapa, iTable Bay inikeza isikhoselo. Buka lendawo ngezindaba ekilabhini labo lesigazi! Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela ithintane noHeather Munetsi: Umphathi wepublic Relations kulenombolo yocingo: (0110 780-7572 iFax: (011) 780-7535.




Isizathu sezothando ukujaha ezokuqala
Igumbi elisha lemisebenzi letable Bay. Isitayela saseVictoria sePavilion sengilazi nensimbi ebiza izigidi zamarandi angu 1.6 sengeze kokuphezulu ehotela laseKapa. Ukuthinat kokokuqala kuyasethsenziswa ekuzameni ukukhombisa okusha kwenhle ngokumangalisayo ihotela iTable Bay eKapa, ukuhlangabezana nosuku lokugcina lwangemplea lukaSeptemba mhlka 21. Ihotela selengeze ungxande omuhle wesitayela sePavilion seVictoria ezindaweni zalo zemisebenzi, kanti futhi umcimbi wokuvula kuzoba umshado wababili absebancane basedolobhenmi.

"Siyajabula ngenqubekela phambili esesibe nayo futhi sinesiqiniseko sosuku lokuqeda kahle ngesikhathi ukwenzela umsahdo", kosho uLuigi Marrai ophethe umklamo womsebenzi iSIP, okade futhi eyingxenye yeqembu lokwakha, elihlanganise uhlelo lokwakha lwehotela olobumbene.

Amarandi ayizigidi ezingu 1.6 ukwengeza ehotela, elivulwe onyakeni owodwa odlule, lingasempumalanga ye porte cohere kanti lixhumene nendawo yokuhamba eya kumabula, wendawo ebuso busishiyagalombili. IPavilion ibekwe nje ebaleni elikhulu elisedolobheni nje ngaphandle kwendlu yeTable Bay ezensa eyomdanso. Kanye nezikhoselo ngemumvakwezindonga zomlando zamanzi, ekhombisa ubuphandle bobuso bengaphambili lehotela elinhasenyakatho. IPavilion engama squere metres angu 195 izongenisa abantu abangu 120 emcimbini wengxubevange yotshwala kanye nabangu 60 um behlezi ematafuleni azimele omsebenzi omileyo. Ihlanganiswa nehotela ngendlela yokuhamba emboziwe, ine-bar yangasese kanye nendawo yokunakekelwa futhi izosevelwa kusuka emakhishini asehotela.

" Izinto zehotela ezikhona njengamanje zibe sekucindezelekeni okunzima zikweleta udumo lwetable Bay. Ukwengezwa komsebenzi ofana nalo wawudingeka ngempela kanti futhi uzozihlonza ngokushesha njengokudumile njengazo zonke zindawo zethu," kusho umqondisi jikelele weSun International eKapa uJean V Mestriner. Ihotela selibe nemicimbi emikhulu ephakeme yangaphakathi kanye neyamazwe ngamazwe eminyakeni eyedlule, kubalwa kuyo umhlangano omkhulu wezabavakashi abaphezulu be British International be IT&T - umcimbi wokuziqhenya, ayi kuphela kwehotela, kodwa kweNingizimu Afrika, manje eseyiyindawo yokuma kwimap yomhlaba kwezokuvakasha. Okunye okubalulekile ukuba namadoda ohulumeni bomhlaba, okubalwa kuwo uMongameli waseFrance uJacques Chirac kanye neqembu labaphelezeli bakhe njengesivakashi sehotela.

UMnumzane uMarrai uchaza ukuthi ingqalasizinda yangempela yendawo enthsa ebivele ikhona kulendawo ngaphandle kwendawo yokudansa futhi isidinge ukubuyekezwa kanye nophahla, okwenziwayo njengamanje. Lokhu kukhombisa umhlobiso ngensimbi, ingilazi kanye nohlobo lokwenziwa kophahla lweVictoria.




ISun City, iphupho lase-Afrika
Indawo yokuvakasha ebalwa kweziphakeme kunazo zonke emhlabeni - ephezulu e-Afrika, Njalo ngonyaka, abavakashi baya khona abayizigidi bakhangwa isiqiniseko esiphilayo somlando wesizwe owalahleka, ePalace enhle ngendlela emangalisayo ngemibhoshongo yayao ejubalele kanye nesimangazayo isiqongo kanye nebhishi elingaphakathi elinjengomlingo eliwashwa amakhulu amagagasi. ISun City iphupho langempela lase-Afrika, eliphakathi enkabeni yehlathi elendlalekile.

Uma ibukwa usemoyeni phezulu, indawo iyabonakala, ngezindawo eziyizungezile ezingayivunulisi, njengeparadesi enkulukazi eluhlaza, ivele njengobucwebe obuphikisana nezintaba ezimangelengele ngasemumnva ngasesifundazweni saseNyakatho-ntshonalanga seNingizimu Africa, ngangamakhilomitha awu-182 ukusuka eGoli. Kwezizathu ezinye ezenza uze eSun City. Kuqala kwakuyi Mecca yokudlala, isishunduziwe ngezikhathi, kanti kanjalo njengoba ikasino iseyiyo into eheha kakhulu kanye nezixuku zabadlali bemishini bebheke ithuba lenhlanhla, izihambi zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nabachithi bamaholide basekhaya beza eSun City ukuzozitholela okwase-Afrika ngokugcwele. IPilannesberg National Park eseduze inikeza ukuhamba ushayela ubukela indawo noma uzihambela ngezinyawo ngendlela ehleleke ngokwedlulele, ngayo yonke iBig Five imelwe. ISun International isizibandakanyile ekwazisweni kwezilwane zendawo ePaki -okusanda kwenzeka nje, isize ngezimali ekwakhiweni kwepaki yezinja ezinkulu zase-Afrika okube yimpumelelo enkulu ekhulule amahectare angu 55 000 epaki. Ipaki yasuselwa kusukela kumahectare angu 1.5 eBom lapho ibihlanganise khona izinja ezintathu ezindala zesilisa ezazalelwa ekuthunjweni kanye nemidlwane enezinyanga ezingu-8 ubudala emikhulu nayo, onina bayo, kanye neyesibili injakazi enkulu endala.

ISun City manje isingukugxila komsebenzi omusha nokusebenza kwezindiza, kusukela ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 31 kuwo lonyaka, ngabakwa SA Express Airways, baxhumanisa izizinda ezinkulu zokuvakasha ePilannesberg, eSkukuza naseHoedspruit, kanye nendiza eqonde eKapa. Lomsebenzi unikeza ukundiza uya noma ubuya nsuku zonke esikhumulweni sezindiza esesanda kulungiswa iPilannesberg eseSun City, uye eSkukuza, eHoedspruit naseKapa. Inhloso ukuvumela abavakashi ukuzikhethela amathuba angcono okuvakashela lezizindawo ezinkulu zozintathu ebuntofontofweni bezokuthutha ngomoya ndezindizamshini ezincane. Amakhozi aseSun City okudlalela imiqhudelwano emikhulu igalofu ahlelwe ngendlela kaGary Player, imidlalo yayao yamanzi kanye neminye imidalao eminingi ekhona, yonek iyaziwa. Ukudlalela umqhudelwano omkhulu weNedbank Golf Challenge usubeke iSun City ezingeni eliphezulu lomdlalo wegalofu wamazwe ngamzwe. Injabulo yakhona ingumlando, kanti futhi abaculi abaphezulu bomhlaba badlala eSuperbowl enezihlalo ezingu 6 000, kanye nase theatre yaseSun City, imidanso emihle kakhulu kanye nezibukeli kuyadlalwa.

Okugqamile phakathi kwezinto zaseSun City iValley of Waves emangalisayo ngobuhle bayo, lapho ukukhukhumala okuhla kakhulu okucishe kube ngamamith amabili ubude kudaleka bese injabulo yolwandle ilethwa ngokugcwele pahakthi nezwe. Inkudla yokudala yaseWaterpark ibala imidlalo ejabulisayo ejulukisayo yamakhayisiliki. Okutshaliwe okumangalisayo okuzungeze iSun City, kanti izingadi zayo zenziwe zathatha ukugqama kweNational Botanic Gardens, ezehleken kusukela ehlathini elicinene kuya endaweni yemvelo yomdabu. Indawo eyakhiwe ngobuciko emanzi idala ukugcwla kwamanzi okudingekile kwemvelo. Kukhona amahotela amane amakhulu eSun City kanti elihamba phambili elihle iPalce yeLost city, kanye nezinga lokwalo eliphakeme ngokumangalisayo. Ubuciko bezokwakha ongakucabanga kanye neziqeshana ezidlaliselayo ziyavuselela kanti indawo yokulala ikugcina ngesigqi sasebukhosini. Izilwane eziqoshiwe, kanye nalezo ezisetshenziswa ekufekethiseni ngezinhlamvana zamatshe kanye nokukhulukela kwezakhiwo, sisodwa sakha ingxenye yendaba yedolobha elalahleka, kanti esihla kusazo zonke iShawu ibhulonze eyindlovu yenkunzi elithatha libuse yonke indawo lapho libekwe khona. Amagumbi asezingeni eliphezulu ngobucwebe kanye nokwawoepalce kuhlotshiswe ngokunothileyo kakhulu. Ihotela ngalinye eSun City linendawo ethinsa kokudla esezingeni eliphezulu, okumele amakhishi amadolobha anolwazi lokudla okuhle kakhulu. AneVilla del Palazzo, enye futhi indawo ethengisa ngokudla yasePalace, iCrystal Court, yona yenza ukudla okulula kosuku, bese kuba okukhudlwana okuhlukahlukene kwakusihlwa. Okukhona kukho nokwasolwandle, ingulube igame nenkomo.

Ihotela elihle elinesigqi samanzi iCascades iyikhaya kweyaziwayo iPeninsula Restaurant, egcine isiko elicolekile legumbi lokugrila, lapho ehotela eSun City, ukudla kutholakala e-Orchid, lapho kokne ukudla okuqhamuka emazweni asepacific Rim kukhonjiswa khona. Fithi ehotela iSun City kukhon iCalabash Restaurant egxile kakhulu ezinhlotsheni ezahlukene ezimnandi zokhari kanye nokugriliwe kanye neHarlequins nokudala kwayo okukhethiweyo, okubalwa kuko izindishi ezimangalisayo zaseNingizimu Afrika. ECabanas, iMorula Restaurant yaziwo ngesitayela sayo esimaqabuqabu kanye nokungafaniswa okosiwe ngamalahle, kokubili inyama nokudla kwasolwandle, kanti lePalm Terrace yehotela iyindawo ethengisa ngokudla encike ematafuleni abandayo nashisayo ahlukene ahlwabusayo. Isun City inothile ngomgwaqo osuka eGoli kanye noqonde ngqo ngendizamshini encane esuka eKapa. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE OLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684 KANYE NEFAX: (011) 780 7535.



Indawo yamawayini engcono kunazo zonke eNingizimu Afrika eTable Bay
Kukhona amabhodlela ewayini aphakathi kuka 3 000 no 4 000 endlini yamawayini ehotela iSun International Table Bay ebhekene namanzi eKapa. Futhi, ngaphandle kweChampagne, wonke aqhamuka eNingizimu Afrika.

Umhotela ophezulu uJean Mestriner uthi iTable Bay iseva abavakashi basekhaya kanye nabaphesheya kwezilwandle, kanti ngokubona kwakhe, amawayini aseKapa anikeza phakathi kokungcono okukhona emhlabeni. "siqinisekisa emawayinini aseKapa futhi ayaziwa kubadayis mawayini ethu. Akukho okungafani esikunikezayo - kangangoba kukhona ngisho elika R35 ibhodlela," kusho yena. Uyathinta, njengesibonelo ezinhlelweni zeMeerlust. "Kokhona izinhlobo ezintathu ezitholakalayo, kanye nokunyukayo kuphinda emumva ko 1976, iMeerlust Cabernet Sauvignon 'yawo 80 kuya ku 86', iRubicon yawo '82 kuya ku94', kubalwa kuwo neMagnums kanye neRehoboams.

Amawayini amhlophe aphuma eConstania abala asemazingeni afana neBuitenverwachtig Buiten Blanc, iGroot Constania Gewurtztraminer, iDrbanville enikeza iBloemendal Savignon Blanc, ngesikhathi ibellingham Chardonnay Haute Cabriece, iChardonnya/ Pinot Noir, iL' Ormarins Pinot Gris kanye ne ngenakhuni iChardonnya yeMont Rochelles ikhombisa iFranschhoek, iHerderberg emhlophe ibala iVergelegen Chardonnay kanye neSouvignon Balnc. IPaarl yona inikezwa iFairview, iGlen Carlou neNederburg ngezinhlobo zeChrdonnay, iBukettrambe kanye neChenin Blanc. IDe Wetshof, iSpringfield neSandvliet indizisa ifulegi ngezifunda zeRobertson/Klein Karoo, ngenkathi iStellnbosch iletha eyayo iWeisser Riesling ephuma eKaapzicht, iCherdonnay ephum eSxonburg, iChardonnay ephuma eTalana Hill ne Zonnebloem's Savignon Blanc.

ISwart neTheuniskraal baletha ngokuzethemab eyabo iChardonnay ne Senillon Chardonnay ephuma kuabdayisi bamawayini eTulbagh/ Swartland ngesikhathi iwalker Ban ne-Overberg zinikezwa yiPaul Cluver's Auction Zelection Chardonnay yango 1993, iBouchard Finlayson Chrdonnay ne Hamilton Russel Chardonnay. Abomvu wona aqukethe okujabulisayo nokumangalisayo okuphuma eConstania, eDurbanville, eFranschhoek, eHelderberg (ngo ngqo shishilizi weMeerlust), ePaarl, eRobertson, eStellenbosch - ngesiqephu sika 46 - seTulbagh ne -Overberg. Bafaka iRustenberg Dry Red yango 1974, iMagnum yeBertram Shiraz yango 1985, eyango 1987 i-Alto Cebernet Sauvignon, iKanonkop Pinotage yango 1987 ne-Uitkyk Cabernet/ Shiraz yango 1994. Amawayini asogwadule athuthwa bese ekhonjiswa endlini yamawayini eTable Bay anjengesithunzi njengese KWV Tanige kusukela ngo 1929 kanye nokumbalwa okwavel ngo 1948 kubadayisi abafanayo, phakathi kwabangu 18 abanye futhi. Kanti iChampagne iqhamuka emagameni anahlanganyeli bomahlaba nokucolisekile: iKrug (iGrand Cuvee yango 1985, no'87), iBolliger, iLaurent Perrier, iLouis Roeder iMoet et Chandon, iBeuve Clicquot, iBeanmount neTaittinger. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa sicela uthintane: noHeather Munetsi: kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780 75 72.




Ihhovisi lezendawo lamazinga amazwe ngamazwe
Ngesikahthi ihotela iSun International Table Bay iyikhaya usuka ekhaya, kubahambi basekhaya nabamazwe ngamazwe kanye nabachithi bamaholide, labo abaseKapa ngomsebenzi bazothola ihhovisi ehotela elilingana nanoma iliphi abangalenza kakhulukazi bezenzela bona.

Isizinda samabhizinisi ehotela sinikeza ihhovisi lendawo lohlobo lwe-five star nakho konke okusha empahleni yamahhovisi. Okuthathe indawo yama-squire metres angu 125, isizinda samabhizinisi sisenkabeni yokubalulekile okwenziwao ehotela, eduze kwendawo yokudayisa enkundleni yokuqala ofika ngezitebhisi ezihambayo enkundleni ephansi, izitolo namahhovisi eWaterfront V no A eseduze. Imizuzwana nje ushayela usuka eCBD, isiszinda samabhzinisi sitholakala kahle kakhulu njengendawo yokuhlangana okubalulekile kakhulu.

Abaphathi bendawo baqeqeshiwe kanye nawo wonke amalungiselelo enokunakekelwa kwangaphandle kanye nabafakeli bempahla basezingeni eliphezulu bahlelwe ihotela. Ukuseva umuntu ngamunye kosomabhizinisi kanye nalabo abeze emihlanganweni emikhulu, imisebenzi yobubhalane kubalwa nokushicilela komsebenzi okade uqoshwa wenziwa amagama alotshwiwe kanye nokusetshenzwa kokukotshishiwe osekuvele kukhona, kubalwa nokukhishwa kokushicilelwe okubekwa ematafuleni, ukugaywa kwemisebenzi ibhalwa kanye nokukopishwa kweminye imisebenzi, kumele izigqebhezana zamagama abo zenziwe kanye namakhadi endawo eqoshiwe.

Ukunqunyelwana kwesikhathi kungenziwa, kanye nezithunywa nezigijimi zihlelwe ukuyisa imisebenzi edolobheni, ngaphakathi ezweni kanye nangaphandle. Ukusebenza kwefax kusebenza ngaphakathi ezweni lonke kanye naphesheya kwezilwandle ukwamukela noma ukukhipha ngaphandle, kanti futhi imisebenzi ingahunyushwa uma kuceliwe. Ukuqasha ukusebenza kwempahla yehhovisi kusebenza kulabo abafisa ukuba nemihlangano noma benikeza izinkulumo bekhombisa okuthile. Kulokho kubalwa nama-overhead projector, ama-slide projector, omabonakude, kanye nokokuthwebula izithombe kwevideo, njengoba amafax, omakhalekhukhwini, amakhompuyutha amancane, okokukhipha amagama kanye nokokuqopha umsindo nako kutholakala. Amahhovisi amathathu angsese nawo ayatholakala, kukhona kuwo idesika, iredenza, umabonakude, iPC ene-Mocrosoft Software yakamumva kanye nesikhiphi magama alothsiwe. Kukhona ucingo ehhovisi ngalinye kanye nokungena kwi-email, kwi-Internet kanye neFax. Kukhona igumbi lebhodi elingangenisa abantu abangu-10, ibhekene netheku kanye neTable Maountain, inomabonakude owu-72 cm, iVCR, i-overhead ne-slide projector, ivideo yokuthwebula umhlnano nakho konke okwenzekayo, ukungena kwi-email, i-Internet, kanye nebar encane. Ukuthola ulwazo oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noHeather Munetsi: uMphathi wePublic Relations kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780-7572 iFax: (011) 780-7535.




ICamelot International ithatha indawo yeSpa.
ICamelot International ithatha indawo yeSpa ehotela iTable Bay, Isizinda sezempilo sokuqala saseNingizimu Afrika edolobheni, ehotela iSun International Table Bay, seyithathwe iqembu lezempilo kanye nokunakekelwa kwesikhumba iCamelot International.

ICamelot eyasungulwa ngo 1985, futhi ephethe iziznda zezempilo kwezinye izindawo zokuvakasha ezimbili zeSun International, iGary Player Health Spa eseSun City kanye neHealth and Beauty Spa eseZimbali Lodge KwaZulu-Natal. Ingumnikazi futhi wezinto ezimbili endaweni yaseGoli lapho inezizinda zayo. Inhloko yaCamelot International, uDebbie Meddjan umelaphi owaqeqeshwa eStellenbosch, wathi ukuthola kwakhe isizinda sezempilo kwakungukuhlanganyela nesun International.

Ukunakekela nokwelapha eTable Bay Spa ngaphambi kokuphatha kwabasebenzi abakhethwe iCamelot kugcwalisa ubuhle bengqalasizinda yokutholakala khona. Isizinda sezempilo sakhelwa ihotela ezingeni eliphezulu lamazwe ngamzwe ngesikhathini seminyakeni engaphezulu kwemibili eyedlule, futhi sesibe indawo yekhefu edumile yezivakashi ezisehotela, kanye nakubahlali baseKapa. Ngamagumbi okulaphela odlondlobele, izingubo zokujima kanye nempahla yakhona okubalwa kuyona ezokwelapha zase-Europe nezaseMelika, isizinda sezempilo sibekwe kahle ngobunyoninco eduze kwechibi lokubhukuda elimbozwe ngophahla elihle ngokumangalisayo leTable Bay.

UNkosikazi Merdjan wathi iqembu lakhe ligxile empilweni esezingeni nasekunakekeleni isikhumba futhi ubehlela ukwazisa ngozobuchwepheshe zakamumva nje, kanti ukugcizelela kuhleleka ngokwelashwa okwehlukene eTable Bay Spa. Izinhlelo zemikhiqizo yama-thalassotherapy azimisele yokwelapha okuphathelene nezasolwandle sekukhona, kuhlanene nokuphambili kakhulu ukwelashwa okwehlukene iphytotherapy ephathele nezitshalo, iHydrotherapy kakhulukazi ezindlini ezinempahla nayo ingebalulekile kakhulu ukwelapha, kusho yena.

ICamelot igxile ezinhlelweni zabantu ngabodwnan ezivakashini, noma ngabe izivakashi zehotela noam abahlali bendawo, inhloso lapho isekwelashweni kwezophuzo olodakayo. Okokuzinakekela kosuku kuyatholakala, knaye ngisho nokokuzelapha emaceleni amachibi okufana ne-reflexology kanye nokuphathwa phathwa ngasemumva emhlane kuyatholakala kwabavakashi. Amaphakethe okuzinakekela kosuku anomvuzo anikezelwa ezinkampanini ezibheke ukunikeza abasebenzi imivuzo. "Sigxile futhi nasekunakekeleni ezokuhlinzelwa ukufakwa isikhumba sikacwazi ezigulini, futhi sibheke phambili ukunikeza loku kunakekela kubo bobabili abavakashi bangaphakathi nabaphesheya kwezilwandle," kusho uNkosikazi Merdjan.




Ihotela iTable bay - Engenye kwaholayo
Ihotela iTable Bay yabizwa njengenya kwaholayo amahotela omhlaba esikhathini esingangezinyanga eziyisithupha ivulile. Ihotela iTable Bay eseVictoria ne-Alfred Waterfront eKapa isibekwe yaba ephezulu kwahloniswahyo emhlabeni ngokungenisa kwayo emahoteleni aholayo aphezulu ngezinga emhlabeni, ijoyina indawo yamahotela aphezulu awu0308 nje kuphela emazweni angu 68.

"Sekube futhi enye indaba ka-Oscar ngeTable bay," kusho uJean V Mestriner, umqondisi wesifunda weSun International eNtshonalanga Kapa eqondise entweni eletha inhlanhla ehotela, u-Oscar, isithombe saseKapa sebhulonze epholishwe kahle ngokumangalisayo esime phakathi nendawo ebukekayo ngasekungeneni okungaseningizimu. U-Oscar ukhombisa ngokwehlukan ngezithombe ukumaka umlando omfishane owenziwe ngamatshe ngobuhle obumangalisayo behotela, okubalwa kuzo ezifaka omongameli kanye namakhosana, abaculi abadumile, onobuhle kanye nezinkinsela kwezamabhizinisi. "Ukuqinisekisa lokukubekwa phezulu kosaziwayo emhlabeni kuqheliswe ukungena kwethu emahoteleni aholayo omhlaba, enye yezinhloso zethu kusukela ngesikhathi ihotela lisungulwa." Kosho uJean V Mestriner.

Isitayela sikaMnumzane Mestriner sokuphatha eseingafaniswa nesamuntu samahotela asewavulile amazwe nagmazwe, sekuholele ekungagejini ekubekweni kwabo ohleni lwamahotela aholayo umhlaba wonke. Banhlnagnyeli bethu emahotela baphendule ngokuncoma ekucelweni inselelo yokuphumelela esoqongweni sempumelelo ngamahotela ethu,"kusho yena. Amahotela adlule asephathe kuwona wawabeka ezingeni laholayo, ngesitayela sakhe sokuqeqeshwa okungafaniswa, noma amahotela aholayo abe ehlanganyele kuwo, kubalwa kuwo ihotela iWindsor Court eseNew Oeleans, iBel Air eseLos Angeles, iRegent eseKuala Lumpur kanye neRegent eseWashington DC.

IPalace yeLsot city aseSun City, eyavulwa nguMnumzane Mestriner, nayo isithathwe yabekwa kwaholayo amahotela omhlaba. Okwamanje nje usethathe ukulungiswa kabusha kweBlue Train: "nayo engikholelwa ukuthi uzokulungela ukungena emahotelelni aholayo omhlaba, uma yayingekho emasondweni," kusho uMnumzane Mestriner. Uhla lwamahotela aholayo omhlaba aseqoqweni langempela lobuhle obuyisimanga bobucwebe bendawo yokulala kanye nokunakekelwa okwedlelele okutholakala kuwona. Inhlangano, ebunjwe ngabaphathi abaphezulu bamahotela adumile, ikhombisa ubuhlakani obungakaze bubonwe nokuqina komsebenzi okubophene, kanti ukuwavakashela kwenziwe ukuqinisekisa amahotela angamalunga asaligcinile izinga lomsebenzi okuwuwuon akhethelwa wona.

Inhlangano imelwe izindlu zezivakashi ezingaphezu kuka 92 000, futhi igcina amahhovisi okusebenza nawezifunda ezindaweni ezingu-15 emhlabeni. Amagama adume kakhulu ahlanganyele nalomsebenzi kubalwa kuwo, iPeninsula eseHong Kong, iRaffles eseSingapore, iRitz eseParis, iPlaza eseNew York, iKing David eseJerusalem, iWindsor Court esenwe Orlearns, iBel Air aeseLos Angeles, iRegent Beverly Wilshire eseBeverly Hills kanye neLondon's Claridges, isavoy, iDorchester kanye neHyde park.



Iphepha eliqukethe amaqiniso ngehotela iTable Bay
IKapa, yidolobha elidala eNingizimu Afrika elasungulwa ngo 1952 njengendawo yokuphumula ngasogwini lwaseNingizimu Afrika . Lendawo yayenzelwe imikhumbi yaseDutch East Indian Company. Endaweni enobuhle obumanaglisayo, okumanje kuyindawo ethandwa abavakashi.

Indawo ethandwa kakhulu abavakashi yiVictoria ne-Alfred Waterfront, egcinwe nesathandwa njengechweba elisebenzayo indawo yayo enegmumva yiTable Mountain. Ihamab iyoshaya etable Mountain, okunamagagasi ashaya umoya onamandla ngaseNyakatho owenzela udumo lwePeninsula igama elithi "IKapa leziphepho" iagama eliphikisana kakhulu nezibongo zeFrances Drage ezithi eziphakeme ezithi"IKapa elizothile kuzozonke ezindawo ezigudala umhlaba." IKapa elinokuphikisana empeleni. KwiWaterfront yomlando, ihotela elakhiwe elingayona ingqayizivele kwindawo elikuyo kodwa eliyingqayizivele kumhlaba wonke ngendlela yokudla kwalo nokungcebeleka okutholakala khona. Ihotela iTable Bay iyamangalisa, igxamalazele udonga olwakhiwe ngesidala esihambisana nesitayela esihambislena nendawo ekuyo. Iyindawo eyisakhiwo esiyigugu, indlela eyakhiwe ngayo nangendlela esebenza ngayo namazwe ngamazwe. Izindlu zibhekene nechweba, noma iRobben Island, ijele elikhulu laseNingizimu Afrika elalihlala uMongameli omdala uNelson Mandela iminyaka engu 27 eboshiwe, noma ibhekene nedolobha kanye neTable Maountain. Ihotela lavulwa nguMunumzane Mandela ngomculo wezimfiloji ngoMay 1997 okwalandela umgubho omkhulu owawuhanjelwe izikhulu zizobona ubukhazikhazi bedolobha.

Indlela yokungena. Ihotela ligqagqe ngemizuzu ewu-20 kusukela esekhumulweni sezindiza saseKapa kanye nemizuzu emihlanu kusukela enkabeni yedolobha. Kanti ngakwesokudla somnyango kukhona izitolo ezinkulu, ezinezimpahla ezinhlobonhlobo nezinika amathuba amakhulu okuhamba ubuka. Okujwayelekile lapaha izivakashi eziyizigidi ezingu 16 ezifika lapah njalo ngonyaka. Isimo sezulu. IKapa linesimo saseMediterranean esinobusika obubandayo nelanga elishisayo nomoya owomile. NgoDesemba kuya kuMashi, izulu liyashisa, liphole kusukela ngo-Epreli kuya kuJuni, Ubusika, ngoJulayi kuya kuSeptemba, bupholile bunezimvula nentwasahlobo yaseKapa enezimbali nokubalela kusukela ngo-Oktoba kuya kuNovemba. Intela, iVAT ikhokhelwa 14% ephinde ikhokhelwe emapahleni ezidayisayo zidayiswa izihambeli zangaphandle.

Ugesi ungu 220 volts. Ezokuhamba, imoto eshayelwayo iyatholakala ukuya nokubuya ehotela nasesikhumulweni sezindiza. Nemoto engakuhambisa uma uyidinga iyatholakala. Indlela ongagqoka ngayo. Uma kukusihlwa ungagqoka -casual. Umpahthi, iTable Bay ingaphansi kweSun International iphethwe ngumdondisi wesifunda  saseNtshonalanga Kapa, uJean Mestriner.  Abakhi balo, iCalifornia USA Architectural Design, iLouis Karol Architects , iCape Town Interior Design, iTrish Wilson and Associates, iDallas Texas USA . Ukungena, lapha kunendawo yokungena izimoto esuka esangweni elikhulu ize ifinyelele endaweni yokungenela ehotela. Endaweni yokupaka izimoto, izimoto zipaka abantu abaqashelwe ukupaka izimoto, zihamba ziphumele ngale konqenqema lodonga zihamba emgudwini oyibhodlela owagcothswa noma owavulwa ngumntwana uAlfred ngo 1869 ozalwa yiNdlovukazi uVictoria. Endaweni ophumela kuyo uphumela endaweni eyakhiwe ngamapulangwe phansi, eqhamuka kwindawo yokwamukela izivakashi, nalapho kuxhumana khona izivakashi. IDining Atlantic Grill, lena yindawo eyi-restaurant enkulu yehotela , enkulu ngangama-square metres angu 400, ehlala abantu abangu 166 ngaphakathi, nabangu 108 ngaphandle onqenqemeni. Ehlotshiswe ngemura nangokhaphethi, ibhekene netheku kanye neTable Mountain.

I-Atlantic Grill idayisa ukudla kwasekuseni kwe a la carte, ukudla kwasemini nokwakusihlwa kwe a la carte. Inanebhodlela stolo elidayisa amawayini angu 600 kanye namaChampagn. ITable Bay yikhaya labantu abadla isigazu kanti utshwala obudayisayo bunhlonhlobo obomhlaba. Indawo yokuphumula enosilinga ovele obala, newindi elikhulu, eliphinde lenza ifremu ye-Oscar. Izitebhisi ezimbalwa ezisuka phansi kwindawo yokungena, Indawo yokudla, iseduzane kakhulu nolwandle, enemibhalo nemidwebo etshengisa imikhumbi ehamba pahakathi kolwandle. Izivakashi ezingu 60 zingamukelwa kosofa abantofontofo nasezihlalweni ezithungwe zambozwa ngendwangu ezezingeni eliphezulu. Yilapah lapho itiye laseTable Bay elidume kakhulu liphuzelwa khona ntambama yasebusuku, noma laph izihmabeli zingahambela khona zizophuza emva kokudla noma ziphuze itiye noma ikhofi lasekuseni. Ubusika, izindawo ezimbili zokotha umlilo zikufudumeza endlini entofontofo ehlotshiswe ngezimbali ezigqamile zakulelihotela. Kunomculo odlala e-gallery ephezulu, umculo we-Violina ne-harp ngezikhathi zetiye. I-Atlantic Bar yindawo yokuhlanganela nje ukuze abantu bathokoze. Lendawo ethengisa ngotshwala iyindawo engama-square metres angu 356, iyindawo enokudla kwe a la carte ngasosonke isikhathi, ikhofi namasaladi. Izindawo zokuhlangana, indlu yokudansela iyindawo enhle kakhulu ehlukene kabili - iyinye ingama-square metres angu 150. Ihlanganise indawo yokudansela engahlala abantu abangu 300. Kunendawo lapho kungahlalwa khona ngaphambi komcimbi ethatha abantu abangu-400 kuthi uma iminyango ivaliwe ingathatha abantu abangu 800. Igumbi lebhodi lincikene nendlu yokudansela ihlala abantu abangu 24 ifakwe konke okufanele imihlangano. Indlela enhle ophathwa ngayo iyayifanela indlela eyiyo lendlu yebhodi. Kukhona amakamelo ezivakashi. Ihotela iTable Bay inamakamelo angu 330 anezilungiso moya aqukethe izindlu ezihamba ngazimbili, izindlu ezinkulu, izindlu zemindeni, amakamelo okusiza izivakashi ezikhubazeke esingezansi, namakamelo awubukhazikhazi akanokusho. Kunamakamelo angu 26 amakhulu e-deluxe suites kanye nangu 3 egrand suite. Kunamakamelo ahlotshisiwe anamakhabethe awubukhazikhazi kanokusho. Ahlotshiswe ngomabula, yimure kanye namadesika okubhala futhi lilinye ikamelo line-bar encane kanye nokudla okungena izikhathi zonke amahora angu 24 ngosuku. Izindlu azamukeli muntu ebusuku kanti zilungiswa kabili ngosuku. Omabonakude abanama satellite. Izindlu zokudeza zinamashawa ahlukene apholisa amanzi, kanye kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezinamashawa ezandla. Kunezomisi zinwele ongazisebenzisa kanye nemithi yokuziphophotha evelele umhlaba wonke bese kuthi izinto izinsipho nokunye kuyanikezelwa kubavakashi. Kunezibuko. Nezingubo zokubhinca uma uya eshaweni kanye nama-slippers akhona. Izingcingo zikhona ngisho ezindaweni zokugeza, ezindaweni zokulala nakumadesika okubhala ngalinye. Ucingo lulunye lunesiqophi mazwi nento yokubamba ucingo olungenayo. ITable Mounatin Suite esenkundleni yesi 8 esehotela iTable Bay iyizulu elincane engakhohleki nakancane, kusukela emapulangweni kasilingi yakhona evele obala kamnandi kuya kukhaphethi, yimabula ehlobisile kanye nephansi lamapulangwe. Zonke Izingilazi zakhona ziyacwebezela kanti lonke isiliva lakhona liqinile. Izindlu zakhona zibheke ichweba, idolobha kanye neTable Mountain ngale. Ngale kobuhle bempahla, ipulangwe lakhona namakhava, iTable Mountain Suite inezinto eziwubukhazikhazi bodwa ngokwedlulele. Indlu yokulala, kanye namakamelo okubandakanya kuwo izindlu zokugqoka, yokugeza izinhlobo ezimbili ezihlotshisiwe ngemabula phezulu kanye nobukhazikhazi bamapayipi amanzi, kanye nendlu yokugeza enkulu enamashawa amabili ahlukene, konke okuhlobise lona kuyimabula. Izindlu zokugeza zibhekene netheku, nedolobha neTable Mountain. Idina labangu 8 lingahlaliswa etafuleni lokudla kanti ikhishi lakhona lingalungiselwa umcimbi. Abaculi bakhona lapho umdlali wopiyano egadla inguzanguza yopiyano yakwa Stein. Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala ikala amakani awabizi kakhulu kanti neziphuzo zifakwa ezingilazini eziwubucwebe. Izitulo nosofa basendaweni yokuhlala bazothile futhi bantofontofo, bambozwe ngendwangu yekhethelo. ITable Mountain Suite iyona enkulu kunawo wonke lawa awu 3 kwamakhulu amasuite ehotela lilonke. Lawa amanye, iSignal Hill kanye neLion's Head womabili ahlobe ngokuhlukile, njengendlu yokugeza yaseVictoria kanye nompheme ongakwazi ukubona indawo engaphezu kuka 180 degrees ukubukeka. Isizinda samabhizinisi amazwe ngamazwe, lendawo engangama square metres angu 125 iseduze nendawo yokuthenga enkundleni yokuqala ehanjwa ngezitebhisi ezihambayo. Lendawo inendlu yebhodi engena abantu abangu 10 enalokhu okulandelayo; imisebenzi yobubhalane, umsebensi wezokuhamba, kanye nendawo yokuboleka izimoto. Indlu yebhodi ibhekene netheku neTable neMountain. Kunomabonakude iVCR ivideo ucingo kanye nama bar amancane. Kanye nokudla okulula kuyatholakala. Kunamahhovisi angu 3 anakho konke ongakudinga lapho osomabhizinisi bengasebenzela khona noma basizwe abasebenzi zalapho. Nomsebenzi wamaphepha nawo ungatholakala lapha njengokubhala, ukukopisha, kanye nokuningi okwenziwa khona ukusiza abemihlangano okubanadakanye ukuhambisa amaphepha, uku-email noma uku fax. Kunedesika  leRennie Travel esiza ekushintsheni imali yakwamanye amazwe, imoto ebolekisayo kanye nemininingwane mayelana nezindiza, ukuhamba ngebhasi nokuvakasha kanye nokubekisa indawo kulezindawo esezibalwe ngenhla. Isizinda sezamabhizinisi siseduze nomnyango wehotela ophezulu ohlangana ngqo nezitebhisi ezihambayo okuphumela endaweni evulekile engangama square metres angu 4 000. IPhansi leHealth Club ne Spa kuya ophahleni lwengilazi okuhlanginisa lekilabhu yezempilo neSpa engangama square metres angu 300 ophumela ngqo endaweni yokucwala ubuso nendawo yechibi. Ubuka ngqo iRobben Island. ISpa inendlu yeistimu kanye nezinye izindlu zokwelapha. Abalaphi banikeza uluhla olubanzi lokwelaph okubalwa kulo ithassotherapy, ukuphathwa phathwa emumva emhlane, iShiatsu kanye ne-arometherapy. Abaqeqeshi abakufundele bayatholakala ejimini. Indawo yechibi, Lelichibi lingangama square metres angu 500 libhekene nelanga usuku lonke. Ubuntofontofo besivakashi, kukhona izihlalo ezintofontofo zelanga ezingu-60 eziseziqwini zokhuni ezizungeze lelichibi elihehayo. Ngakwelinye icala kuneBar eseva okuphuzwayo, ukudla okulula kanye nokudla okunempilo. Ukuzijabulisa, iV $ A Waterfront inikeza uhlobo olubanzi lwezinto ongazenza nongazibona, Endaweni yePierhead, izindawo ezimbili ezivulekile ezingenela olwandle I-Atlantic eseNingizimu kanye nezinye izinto zasolwandle eziphilayo ngezinhlobo zazo ezihlukene okubalwa kuzo umthili omkhulu, ovulekele olwandle. Okuseduze kwakho, kukhona okuningi okumangalisayo ongakubona. Inothile ezintweni zakudala ezasalayo, iSouth African Maritime Museum kwenza ukuphumela ngaphandle kube into ejabulisayo. Kukhona izimakethe, izinkundla zezitolo ezixubile kanye nezitebele, nama-cabarets kanye namaqembu adlala umculo bukhoma. Okokuhamba okuqashwayo izikhathi zonke okukunikeza yonke inhlobo yohambo  ngendlela ongayicabanga, kubandakanya uhambo olufishane ngasogwini, ukungcebeleke ogwini uya eBhishi iClifton kanye nokuzungeza iRobben Island, bese kuba khona i-Afga Amphitheatre, iV & A Arcade, i-Old Wharf, iFish Quay kanye neWaterfront Café. Uma ungabujabuleli ubuhle nezinhlobo ze V & A Waterfront, okunye ngaphandle kwalokho okukake iTable Bay, lapho ulindwe khona imidlalo engapheli kanye nenjabulo yokubuka ubuhle bezwe. Izifunda zaseKapa ezidumile zewayini zilindele ukuthi abavakashi kusukela emabhishi asagolide ngasemnyango, ukubhudukeza uhambo olungenakukhohleka lwezindawo zewayini zaseKapa. Ukuvakashela kwezinhle ngendlela emangalisayo izingadi zeKirstenbosch kuyimpoqo nokubuka izwe ushayela ugudla ugu akukaze kuhluleke ukushiya umuntu eshiselekile. Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla zisukela kwezinolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba, kuya kwezasesifundazweni saseKapa kanye namakhishi angaphandle kwezwe ahlangene kuso sonke isifunda. Ukuvakashela kwemangalisayo iCape Point, noma uzingcebelekele uzungenze iGreen Market Squire egandaywe ngamatshe anezinhlobo zezimpahla eziluchungechunge. IKapa futhi inikeza izinhlobo zokuhamba ngezinyawo indawo ende kanye nokuhamba unqamula ihlathi kanye nokukhwela intaba kanye nokuhamba uya phezulu eTable Mountain ngendlela yekhebula eyakhiwe kabusha. Ukuhamba ngamahhashi, nemicrilight, ukugibela amabhayisikili - eqinisweni ezemidlalo kanye nemidlalo yamanzi kwezinhlobo zonke kudonsa abavakashi banagapahakathi nabangaphandle abashisekileyo unyaka wonke futhi bengendba nesimo sezulu, amabhishi aseKapa amahle kakhulu adonsa ababoni bokubukekeyo, anadumisi belanga kanye nababhukudi unyaka wonke.




Ukunqoba kokusebenza ngokuhlanganyela namazwe anagphandle
Ihotela iSun International Table Bay - ukunqoba kokusebenza ngokuhlanganyela namazwe omhlaba "Ingxubevange ehambisanayo nemangalisayo ykwakhiwa kwamazwe ngamazwe kanye nobungcweti". Yiyona ndlela umakhi womklamo  uRick Brown achaza ngayo ihotela elihamba phambili iSun International table Bay eseKapa eV & A Waterfront.

Ihotela elingubucwebe lohlobo lwe five star elibiza izigidi zamarandi ezingu 250 selibe ngukunqoba ngemepla kokuhlanganyela. Indawo yalo ebukwayo enhle kakhulu engasenyakatho, idonsa ukuthelelwa yiVictoria ngsesiqeshini sokwakhiwa, umhlobiso, umsebenzi wensimbi kanye nenkulu yesitayela se-gazebo iPorte cochere, ihmabisana kahle kakhulu nengemumva leTable Mounatain, itheku elisebenzayo lomlando kanye nokwakhiwa kwalo kwekhuluminyaka lawo 19. Ngokuzwelana kwalo nolayini abalidlaliselayo bezakhiwo ezikhona esezenze usuku lokuqala lokuthuthuka kweQuay Six eseWaterfront, ihotela iTable Bay lifanekisa ngakunye ngakunye elikumele ngemithelela okunayo.

Futhi imithele ayayihlukene. URick Brown umele ezokwakha zaseNingizimu Afrka ukuqopha ezokwakha zikaLouis karol, oqondene cishe nazo zonke izakhiwo eziseKapa eCBD ngesikhathi iqembu lezokuzithokozisa iLos Angeles based Landmark, babanye balabakhi basebenza ePalace yeLost City, babeqondenen nokusungulwa nomsuka. Ukwengeza, inkampani yeV & A Waterfront yathintwa ekwakhiweni ngokwesayensi evele ikhona ngapahakathi endaweni. Okwangapahakathi kwasekuhlelwe nguWilson and Associates, inkampani yokwakha kwangaphakathi yaseMelika eyayiqondene nezinto ezimangalisayo ezisePalace yeLost City. Ezibandakanya nokugxila esimweni saseNingizimu Afrika wase ehlangabezane nezinkingana ezimbalwa, kusho uBrown, njengoba izindlela zokwakha, izinto zokwakha nokokuqeda kujwayelekile emazweni amaningi nokuthi ezimweni ezimbalwa lapho izinto zokwakha zasemazweni angaphandle kanye nezindlela ezokotshelwayo - kakhulukazi kanye neziphathelene nokufaka umabula phansi. Isakhiwo, kusho yena siyaheha okwangempela.

"isidingo samaphupho, njengoba sikhonjiswe ePalce, asigcinekanga. Ihotela liphendulela okulizungezile, kanye nokudonsa umkhondo, konke kuyatholakala eWaterfront, kwanetshelwa lona. " okuthandwa kakhulu abangaphandle, ukubolekwa kwalo izimpawu njengopahwu emhlobisweni, okunye kwezinto eziningi zezimboni kanye nokuxhashazwa kwezindawo ezibukwayo konke kwaba izimpendulo zokuphilayo ngezikhathi ezifaneleyo." "Iqiniso lokutho zonke izindlu nokwazo zonolwandle noma ukubukeka kwezintaba, kwakungokokuqala okwadingeka kubathuthukisi beSun International, ngesikhathi ukulondoloza kodonga olunqamula amanzi lomlando oluchusha ezindleleni zokuhamba zehotela zaziwumthetho wenational Momments Council." Ingaphakathi lehotela likhombisa izinyathelo esiveza izinto ezahlukene, eziningi zazo zingaphandle kwesakhiwo. Ukuhamba unqamula imifekethiso eyenziwe ngezinhlamvwana zikamabula wase-Europe ezinqanyulwe ngobuchwepheshe ngasekungeneni enkundleni enohlobo lokhuni oluhle kakhulu oluqhamuka ngaphandle kwezwe nesapulangwe elingangama square metres angu 200, isivakashi sibhekene namawindi abhekene neningizimu adlaliselayo, aveza cishe yonke iTable Mountain, kanye nokusebenza kwetheku khona ngapansi. Ngaphansi kwalendawo yokungena ngaseningizimu, kukhona indawo yokuphumula enkulu enophahla lwayo olusandlu yesonto kanye namaziko amabili. Ngasentshonalanga kukhona iConservatory nebar kanye namakheshi akuthatha akuse enkundleni ephezulu enezitolo kanye neSpa. Umfanekiso odwetshiwe ngobuciko ensimbini nofaxaziwe ngamakhono aqukethwe eKapa - ubonakala ezitebhisini zikamabula eziya endaweni yokuziphumulela kanye nasezindongeni zengilazi ezisecelenmi ezitebhisini ezihambayo. IKapa ikhunkula ukhonkolo ngemibala enobuhlakani okudala izitsha eziqukethe amapalms enziwe ekhaya kanye nemichachazo.

Endaweni yokungena evulekile, amadesika aqaphiela okhuni olucolekila emaka isiteshi sokufikela ehotela, umlindisivalo, indawo yokwamukela, indawo lapho kutholakala khona ulwazi nalapho abavakashi bexhuma khona izinto. Uma ubheka ngasentshonalanga, ubheke ngasendaweni enekheshi, indawo evulekile enomhlobiso wakudala ukunikeza ukungenela osebeni lwekheshi, ngeminyango yawo ecwebezela okwedlulele efufuzelwe ngesitensela, evulwa ngamakhadi. Umphathi wezentuthuko weSun International eNtshonalanmga Kapa, uBrian Read uyakuthinta ukuthi inkinga, umsbenzi ophezulu wokupenda ngokufusa wathathwa umkhandi we dockside umsebenzi wakhe owatholakala ungenasici. Umhleli weWilson and Associates uGeorge Aldridge ukhombisa izinkinga zokubeka izitebhisi zendlu egcin amabhuku endlini yamawayini e-Atlantic Grill, indawo yehotela eqavile ethengisa ngokudla. Indlu yamawayini igcina amabhodlela angu 4 000 kanye neqoqo losigazi abakhethekile kuphela esimweni esihle. Indawo ethengisa ngokudla, ngezindawo zayo ezinkulu ezimbili, enomaka ngokuhlonisa ngokwesiko okukhombisa amagilebhisi kanye nezithelo zaseKapa, kanye negumbi lokudla langasese elisesihosheni, kungasempumalanga yendawo yokuphumula futhi kubhekene neningizimu kuya kwamangalisayo amagilazi amawindi abhekene nentaba netheku. Isibaya semikhumbi esiseduze, esikulungele ukungenisa umkhumbi omkhulu othwala abantu ohamba olwandle, sikhombisa ingungu yomkhumbi khona embundwini wendawo ethengsa ngokudla. "Izindaba ezimangalisayo" kusho u-Aldridge. Okulingana nokumangalisayo imidwebo edwetshwe odongeni kulo lonke ihotela, ngezingqikithi zeKapa ezithathe indawo enkulu yodonga, kuya ophahleni oluhlotshiswe ngesitensela ezinezinhlobo zezithelo. Inani likakhonkolo ongangama-cubic metres angu 10 000 wathelwa ukuqeda lesisakhiwo samagumbi angu 330 eSun International Cape Flagship, ngonkintileka ehlangene eyabona umsebenzi wenkontileka nokwenza uqedwa ezinyangeni ezingu 18.




Izinto eziqhubekezayo nezimihlangano emikhulu
Izindawo zethu ezimbili zemihlangano zinempahla yolwazi lwezinto zomhlaba ezenziwe ngobuchwepheshe bonyaka, impahla yokusebenza eseqophelweni eliphezulu.

Itafula lokufundela elinempahla yokusebenzela lizosebenza: iOverhead video projector, umshini iVCR, ukukhanya, iSatellite yemigudu kamabonabakude, ikhompuyutha exhunyiwe, enye impahla ekhona kubalwa kuyo: iCorousel slide projector, i-overhead projector, ilaser pointer, iPA system, ibhodi elimhlophe lama-slide, ishadi leFlip, elinokokubhala namapeni, iEasels, iPodium, isiqophi samakhasethi, umshini weFax, olayini bocingo. I-International Bussiness Cetre ifakel izinhlobonhlobo zempahla uma befuna ukuziqasha kanye nomsebenzi wezobubhalane ngokugcwele okubalwa kuwo nokuhunyushwa kolimi, umsebenzi wezigijimi nezithunywa.

Amadesika amabili okunakekela ayatholakala endlini elungiselela umsebenzi. Lapha amaqembu angajabulela ukubhalisa kwangasese bebe beziphuzela iziphuzo zokuzijabulisa zokubamukela ngesikahthi izimpahla zabo zisayobekwa ezindlini. Ukugqugquzela ukubamukela, injabulo ephila ingalungiselelwa kanye nohla olubanzi ukuzikhathela lwezipho kuyatholakala. Kukhona ukuthuthwa kwempahla kanye nemali ekhokhelwa ukudilivwa kwempahla endlini. Indawo yokuhlanganela ngaphambi komcimbi ingasetshenziselwa imibukiso emincane. Izindwangu nokokunameka kungasetshenziswa ngapahakathi kwalezindlu zozimbili zokuhalanganyela kodwa zizimele futhi zingananyekiwe, zisetephuliwe noma zishayelelwe ngezipikili odongeni noma eminyango.

Uma kungunguthi iqembu lifuna ukundizisa ifulegi  lomhalangano, ipali lamafilegi libekwe ngapandle kwePorte Cochere. Azikho izindwangu zemibuso ezivunyelwe ekungeneni ehotela. Ukuhlolwa okuqondene nakho kuzokwenziwa kuwo wonke amaqembu.




UJean V Mestriner - Umqondisi wesifunda saseKapa
UJean V Mestriner - Umqondisi wesifunda saseKapa, iSun International uJean V Mestriner, uMqondisi wesifunda saseKapa weSun International, ungumcwaningi openda ngamabhulashi amakhulu okuhlokoza. Njengoba eselicungbungule kangaka izinga, inani kanye nobungako banoma ikuphi okuncanyana komklamo wakhe wehotela iTable Bay eseKapa eWaterfront, indaba isele esiqeshini sesilwanekazi asesikhandile. Isinqumo sesithathiwe, umsebenzi sewenziwe, uyaqhubeka.

Umsebenzi omkhulu yilokhu anamandla kokho. Akukona nje kuphela ukuthi iPalace ngaphansi kokubhekwa nguye yahlangabezana nokubizwa njnegenye kwahamba phambili emhlabeni wonke jikelele eSun International, kodwa umsebenzi wakhe wangaphambilini nawo waba nempumelelo eafanayo. Ebuka umsebenzi ongaka asewenzile ukukhand akabusha ihotela iWindsor Court eseNew Orleans, wayibona ikhuphuka ngezinga njengawesibili kwawaseMelika amahotela, kanye nesine ubungcono emhlabeni, njengoba yavotelwa yi Conde Nast Traveller, kanye nephezulu ohleni lwabahlaziyi abasemthethweni okubalwa kuko isitayela sempilo ngokunotha nangodumo, kanye neZagat Survey njehotyela eliholayo nelincanyelwayo - elin-e lezakhjiwo ezingu 21 zaseMalika ze "Five Diamond". Ngampambilini, ihotela iRegent eseWashington DC, yavulwa nguye ngo 1982, yaba nayo ihotela eliholayo emhlabeni, esevule ihotela iCresent Court Club neSpa okuseDallas ngo mnikazi wezigidigidi eziphindwe kabili zemali uCaline Hunt, waba nokwaneliswa ukuphumelela ukuba owesibili kwi Conde Traveller, kanye nowesine kwi US ngokwabe Lifestyles.

Impumelelo yakhe ephezulu uyibuka ngomcimbi wokuvula kaMongameli Nelson Mandela ethatha izintambo zombuso, umkhosi owawuhanjelwe abantu abangu 1 200, abahlonishwa kanye nabaphathi bezifundazwe, okunye kwezinto azenzaezaba yimpumelelo aziqhenyayo ngazo, Kanye kanye nokukhandwa kabusha kweRegent Kuala Lumpur ukuba ibe sezingeni ekulo manje njengephuma phambili eMalaysia kanye nokushintsha kwakhe i-five star iJerusalem Plaza ukuba ibe ihotela ledolobha iGlat Kosher. Kamumva kuwo lonyaka, iBlue Train edumile yaseNingizimu Afrika, yakhandwa ukuba ibe esezingeni eliphezulu ngokuhlanganyela kuka Jean Mestriner nomhlobisi wangaphakathi iTrisha Wilson, owayeqashwe iSpoornet njengomxhumanisi womsebenzi omkhulu, ukuthatha umsebenzi wokuvula noMaonameli wezwe osephumile uNelson mandela kanye nahamabisana naye uGraca Machel njengezivakashi eziqavile. Kodwa manje, usethathe umsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi ugcinwe usesimweni esiphezulu ehotela iTable Bay. Izitsha zomlotha kagwayi ezinhle ngokumangilisayo zaseChina ezindlini, okwengilazi ongakufisa - ngisho nezipopolo ezimbalwa zasemandulo zamawindi abheke ngasolwandle ezindlu ezinkulu nezinobucwebe kokne kwakhethwa nguye njengezinto zamasiko.

Amaphepha asezindlini zangasese awuhlobo olubhangqene ngamathathu enziwelwe ihotela, futhi ukugcina indawo yehotela yasemandulo, kulotshiwe ngemibhalo emincane, okumele abahlali abanamahlala bendawo yase V & A Waterfront. Amapheshana alula okusula ubuso wona ahamba ngawodwana esandleni, ayi ngemfuma nje engadingakali. Ezindlini zangasese zomphakathi azikho izomisa zezandla ezinomoya oshisayo, kodwa kukhona amathawula ahamba ngawodwana kakotini. Okokulala, izitsha zokudlela ezakhiwe ngobumba, ezinye izinhlobo zezitsha zobumba, izikhathi ezingu 24 zokuvuthwa kwamagilebhisikanye nokubalulekile ikhethelo langempela lisigazi eligcinwe ezindaweni ezifanele endlini yamawayini ye-Atlantic Grill enothileyo lenjabulo yabavakashi, konke kuhlolwe futhi kwasungulwa nguye. Ubona yonke into. Yebo, isitayela sakhe sokuphatha sesichazwe njengessiyinqwaba, akakwazi ukulinda. Usebizwe njengomuntu oqholoshayo. Kodwa cha, kusho yena, ukuqholosha kunomsuka wako ekungazini. Ungumphikeleli. Imibono yakhe incike emsebenzini aseke wawenza, ukhuluma ulimi lwezimboni aseke wazibona njengezihamab phambili ngomsebenzi emhlabeni, futhi, kusho yena, ukugxekwa kwakhe kuyahlonishwa.

UMnumzane Mestriner ubhala umbono wemiklamo yakhe ngaphambi kokuthi aqale umsebenzi, kanti futhi umbono wakhe udinga ukuthi uqale ufundwe yibo bonke abasebenza naye. Ukujiya kwebhotela okungumsebenzi wakhe ngempela kutholakala emakhasini encwadi yemibono. Abasebenzi abanayo inkantini. Esikhundleni senkantini, balethelwa ukudla kwabo ngezitsha zebumba zabo kanye nokokudala, izipuni, ezindaweni zabo ngabodwa zokudlela eziphethwe ngasese, e-Atlantic Bistro, lapho ukudla okuhlelelwe bona nje kujikeleza ngokwesinsuku zesonto. Bonke babizwa ngabahlanganyeli. Izindlu zabo zokugcina izimpahla zabo ziphethwe abamele ukuzigada. Baba nemihlangano nomqondisi wabo wesifunda futhi badle njalo naye noma nezinye izikhulu eziphethe etafuleni linye eBistro's Captain's Table. "Ihotela lihlukile kwawaseKapa, okubandakanya kulo izindlu zalo ezihlukile, isizinda sezempilo sokuqala esisedolobheni eNingizimu Afrika," kusho yena. "Senza umaka wethu edolobheningezinga lomsebenzi wethu esiwenzayo kanye nokuphakama kwalo. Inhloso kumele kube ekuphumelela phambili ekwakheni imali. Siphinda emumva lapho ukuba ngumhotela kuyikho ngempela. Ukunakekelwa komunu, uhla lwamawayini agcono kunawo wonke emawayinini aseNingizimu Afrka, awekho amatafula agcwele ukudla, kukhona amabhodwe awu-1400 ekhofi netiye ukuthi umuntu azithelele yena ngayedwa, ikhishi lekhofi elizimisele ngempela ngomsebenzi walo kanye nendawo yokupaka izimoto sengathi ezezinceku." Abavakashi baqhamuka lapho ngukabuswa khona - abasekhaya, abangaphakathi kwezwe lonkekanye nabasemazweni omhlaba. Indlela yokugqoka nje ejwayelekile e-casual. Okuncane nje ongakukhona okubiza uR1 500 ubusuku obubodwa, okukhulu, okuyela kuR10 000 endlini enobukhazikhazi obumangalisayo, kodwa ngeke uwabale amabhodlela ebar encane, ukusebenzisa icomputer, ngesikhathi ifax yendlu yakho ikuthumelela imisebenzi yakho lapho ufuna ukuthi iye khona, ikuqoqela imilayezo yakho futhi ikuvumela nokuthi uvule obesekudlulile, kanye neziteshi zezinceku endlini yakhe zikulethela itiye nekhofi elingezinhlobo zekhethelo. Ibize nje kuphela izigidi zamarandi ezingu 250, cishe esibiza kunazo zonke izakhiwo zamabhizinisi ezisedolobheni.




Umsebenzi omusha wezokuthutha ngomoya phakathi kwezindawo ezinkulu zokuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika zeSun International.

ISun City neTabla Bay zixhunyaniswe izindiza ezisebenzayo ze SA Express. Ihotela iTable Bay kanye nePalace eseSun City, amabili kwaholayo amahotela omhlaba emsebenzini weSun International, azoxhunyaniswa izindiza ezisebenza siqonde ngoq ngezinsuku ezintathu esontweni emsebenzini omusha ozovulwa iSouth African Axpress Airways ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 24 ku 1998.

Umsebenzi onikezela izindiza zokuqala ukusebenza eziqondayo ezisuka eKapa ziya esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilannesberg, esisebenzelana nokuhamba kwezindizamshini zangasese neziyinhlanganisela. "Lokhu kungumsebenzi wentuthuko obaluleke kakhulu, oxhumanisa njengoba wenza, iziteshi ezinkulu zase-Afrika, zozimbili ziphakathi kwamahotela aholayo omhlaba," kusho uPhillip Georgas, uMqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International. "Izindiza ziletha abavakashi ngqo kusukela ekungeneleni i-Afrika enkabeni yayo bese zinikeza abavakashi ithuba lokuthola ukwazi ngezindawo ezinkulu zokuvakasha, okungamahora ngaphezulu kancane kwamabili uhamba ngendizamshini encane." Womabili amahotela iTable Bay, eyavulwa ngoJuni ngonyaka odlule, kanye nepalce yeLost City ebekwa njengamahotela aholayo omhlaba ekuqaleni kwalonyaka, kanti futhi iPalace isimenyezelwe ukuba indawo yokuvakasha yeAfrika ehamba phambili kulandela ukuhlolwa ngabafundi belekelelwa abakhipha isigqugquzeli iConde Nast Traveller.

Umsebenzi weSouth African Express Airways uzosuka eKapa ngoLwezithathu kanyenoLwezihlanu ngo 11h00 zifike eseikhumulweni ePilanesberg ngo 13h15, kanti futhi ngazo izinsuku ezifanayo zizosuka ePilanesberg ngo 14h00 ukufika eKapa ngo 16h25. NgamaSonto, indiza izosuka eKapa ngo 11h30, ifike esikhumulweni ePilanesberg ngo 13h45 kanti indiza ephinda emumva izosuka ngo 14h30, ifike eKapa ngo16h56. Inani lokubiza lalezinkambo kusukela ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 25 ku 1998 kuya ku kumhlaka 31 Oktoba ku 1999 kuzoba ngu R1 050 uhambo lulunye (ingabalwa iVAT kanye namatekisi akuthutha esikhumulweni). Abagibeli bazondiziswa kwi SA Express enezihlalo ezingu 50 icanadair Regional Jet 200 BER (iExpress Jet). Inkampani, eyaqale ukusebenza ngo-Apreli ka 1994, isinezindiza ezintsha ceke futhi zohlobo olophambili e-Afrika, kanti zithwala abagibeli abangu 60 000 ngenyanga phakathi kwesindawo ezingu-14. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 76 84.




Ukushintsha kukanogada
Okulandelayo iqubo yamathenda ezinyangeni eziyisithupha. Isun City isiqashe onogada benhlangano yamazwe iFderla Guarding ukuqapha izivakashi. Njengamanje isigaba seASC Holdings, eyinhalangano yamazwe yonogada isiyaziwa kakhulu ngemisebenzi yayo emkhakheni wokunakekela eKapa. Lenkamapni izoqasha abasebenzi abangu 220, sekuhlangene nabaphathi kanye nezimenenja emsebenzini oseSun City. Inkampani esebenzayo ebizwa ngokuthi iFederal Northwest nayo futhi isiqanjiwe. "Abaphathi baseSun City bahlale benokuziqhenya ngobuciko bonogada ezindaweni zokuvakasha - ukuqapha kungokunye kwezinto ezisezingeni eliphezulu emhlabeni," kusho uMike Wentworth, uMphathi wonogada bezindawo zokuvakasha eSun City. "Ijika eliqale eminyakeni emine eyedlule yokusebenzisana nokusondelana nonogada esemgqeni wezinkambo yomhlaba, kanti lokhu kulandela ucwaningo ezindaweni ezinjenge-Universal Studio kanye neDisney. Kodwa ukuphepha kwezivakashi zethu kubalulekile, kanti sizobe sengeza izimpahla zokugada zikagesi ezindaweni zomphakathi ukuqinisekisa lokhu."

U-Andre Dumas, uMqondisi jikelele esigabeni sonogada ezinhlanganweni zomhlaba enkampanini yeASC Holdings uthe abasebenzi bakhe bazothola uqeqesho olunzulu ukusiza ukubanikeza imininingwane ngezokusiza nezokusebenza eSun City. Umphathi osebenza ngokuzimisela wezokuxhumanisa izivakashi uzokhethwa inkampani yakheukuqondana nezindaba ezijulile bese esebenza njengomxhumanisi phakathi kweFederal Guarding kanye nabavakashi uma kukhona isidingo. UDumas uqale ukuzenzela igama ophikweni lwengalo yomthetho ePitoli ngonyaka ka 1988 wabuye wakha uhlobo lweASC eGauteng, waphetha ngokuba sophikweni lokuvikela lonogada. Inzuzo yezinhlangano zomhlaba eNtshonalanga Kapa isinikeze inkampani yakhe ithuba lokuzozibonakalisa ophikweno lonogada  okuyiwona mkhakha omelelwe yilenhlangano yamazwe omhlaba. " Siyaqhubeka nokuphucula lomkhakha kanye nocwaningo lwethu lwaphesheya kwezilwandle, ikakhulukazi engqikithini yamapaki anjengo Bush Gaderns i-Universal Stdios kanye nempahla yakwaDisney, isisnikeze umbono omkhulu eqhazeni nasekuziphatheni kweqembu lonogada lokubaluleka nenjabulo yezemvelo."
