Ngaphezu kophiko lwengalo yezokuvikela inkampani yakhe ebheke eSun City, uthi wazi kahla kamhlophe ukuthi impumelelo yokuphathwa komsebenzi oyingcuphe kubalulekile emsebenzini onempilo.

Okokugcina, Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noLara Ross eSun International kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780 7684 noma kwi-email lross@sunint.co.za.
                           



Inkampani engumzali weTable Bay iSunWest, imboni yezimoto iKapa elincike kuyo ngenjabulo, eyaqanjwa nehloso ethile yokudala amathuba ezokuvakasha kulabo batshali bezimali ababenganikwanga amathuba ngaphambilini emlandweni, kakhulukazi labo abaqhamuka kuso lesi sifundazwe.

ISunWest inganyelwe amalunga amathathu amakhulu ayiphethe: iSun International eseNingizimu Afrika, ngamaphesenti angu 49, iGranda Parade Investments, ngamaphesenti angu 34, kanye ne-AfriLeisure namaphesenti angu 17, Okungaphezu kwengxenye komnotho weSunWest kunganyelwe ababengenawo amathuba phambilini, njengoba amaphesenti angu 53 esitokwe ephethwe ngamalunga aseNtshonalanga Kapa. ISunWest iphethwe ibhodi labaqondisi elimele labo ananezingxeney ezinkulu. KwiGrand parade Investments kuphuma usihlalo weSunWest, uPeter Swartz, kanye nosekela sihlalo, uHassen Adams. UPeter Bacon kanye no-Ian Douglas bangabaqondisi abakhethwe iSun International.

Umbono weSunWest ukuba yi-catalyst esebenzayo ngokuzimisela kwemboni yezokuvaksha ehlumelele eNtshonalanga Kapa, yona kanye echazwa ngokuzimisela kwabatshali zimali, ububanzi kanye nokubandakanya abanikazi zimali abanabo, kanye nokuzimisela okusha okuqhudelaneni nezinga lokuphakama kwamazwe ngamazwe. Lombono uyabonakaliswa ehotela iTable Bay, ukutshalwa kwezimali kokuqala okukhulu nokwamanje kweSunWest. Ekuphatheni inkampani iSun International ngamaphesenti angu 49, iSunWest futhi inhlangene namaqembu ezinkampani ezinkulu zeSafren.

ISafren inkampani yomphakathi, esohleni lweJSE, kanti futhi iseqenjni lezimboni elikhulu eliseNtshonalanga Kapa. Imisebenzi yalo emikhulu iholwa ukuxhaswa iSafmarine, iRennies Group, kanye neKersaf Investments kanti futhi ibandakanya umsebenzi wozokuthutha ngemikhumbi nezomoya, imisebenzi yezokuthutha abavakashi, izindawo zokuvakasha zamahotela kanye nemidlalo yasemakhasino, okumblawa kwemisebenzi yamahotela kanye nokokuzijabulisa. IKersfa yona ithanda kakhulu imboni yokuzithokozisa eseningizimu ne-Afrika, kanye naphesheya kwezilwandle, kanti igxile kakhulu emidlalweni kanye nakumahotela. Yona iphethe mamaphesenti angu 80 eSun International kanye namaphesenti angu 43 eCity Lodge Hotels Ltd.

IsunWest isikhethe abaphathi beSun International ukubaphathela ihotela iTable Bay. Ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa, sicela uthintane noHeather Munetsi kulenombolo yocingo: (011) 780-7572.




Ukuzikhethela iholide ongakwazi ukulikhona - iSun City Vacation Club


IVacation Club eseSun City iyindlela yokuguqula isimo yeTimeshare, okuhlanganise amalunga angcono kakhulu kanye nemiqondo ecatshangiwe yolucobelelana ngolwazi kanye nakho konke okuhle kokuba isivakashi zendawo zeSun City.


Ake siphindisele ukuhlihliza emumva empilweni yakho. ISun City ikunikeza injabulo engapheliyo! Umnyeni wakho angakujabulela ukuchitha izinsuku zakhe ekhozini yaGalofu langempela laseNingizimu Afrika - iGary Player Golf Course, ikhaya leMillion Dollar Golf Challenge ngesikhathi wena nezingane nijabulela ukushona phansi eBig 5 eseduze nePilanesberg National Park.


ISun City futhi inikezazela ngisho emalungeni amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi elihlelwe kahle ngokubaluleki kwezingane zeminyaka yonke. Ngamaholide esikole kaJulayi, iKamp Kwena isihlanganise ndawonye izinhlelo ezimangalisayo ukugcina izingane senza okuthile futhi zizijabulisa. Imidlalo ihlelwe kusukela ekuvkasheleni ikhaya lezilwane, imicimbi yemidlalo efana nebhola lombhoxo. Imidlalo yanagphakathi nayo futhi isihlelwe kwaba khona efana nokulhobisa amabhisikidi, ukupenda amadwala kanye nemisebenzi yezandla nezobuciko. Kukhona imicimbi yezingqikithi ezithile kusihlwa - izingane zingazizwela ukunambitheka kwe-marshamallow braai noma ukukhetha owinile embukisweni wokukhetha ibhokisi. Izingane ezindadlana zingajabulela uhambo lokuya emdansweni zizungeze iWaterworld.


Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomyeni wakho ningazikhululekela  enjabulweni ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka kube ukuyengwa umshini wamaphupho noma ukuvuswa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma uma nifuna ubusuku bangaphandle bothando lwenu ninokuzikhethela izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba kweHarlequins kuya kokuthe cosololo kwe-Ochird. Ngesikhathi ujabulela impilo ecokeme, umgado wengane uzoqinisekisa ukuphema kwezingane zakho.


Unokuzikhethela kwendlu yokuhlala enakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala. Iyinye inesilungiso moya endlini yokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa wokulala oyidabuli ovumela kulale abantu ababili. Lezizindlu zokuhlala ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo nomshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezi kudla. Ukwengenza, ungazikhethela ukwenza indlu yokho inakekelwe.

SHAYA UCINGO ULUSHAYELE ESUN INTERNATIONAL VACATION CLUB KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7800 UKUTHOLA EMINYE IMINININGWANE.





Umqondo oqanjwe kabusha ongabheka kuwo wesingeniso
IVacation Club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha. Ingumholi wamazwe ngamzwe wokwabelanga ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqama kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

Ubulunga buyatholakala ngenani elincane nje elingango R3 900 kanye nomvuzo womqondo omusha okungabhekwa kuwo kuyanezezela ebungakweni bobulunga. Ubulunga benginziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumqondo weTriple Ripple. Amalunga ehlonyeliswa ngoR300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga nglinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonelo ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise amanye amathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Enkomfeni enkulu yamazwe ngamzwe yango 1997 yeRCI eyayibanjelwe iBerlin, ivaction Club yaseSun City yakhexisa imilomo yezithunywa ezingu 650 ngomsebenzi wayo ophezulu wokudayisa ophumelele ezinyangeni ezingu 12 zokuqala. Kuma-modules angu 24 336 atholakalayo, angamaphesenti angu 53 adayiswa onyakeni wokuqala. Leliphesenti lijwayele ukufinyelela kulo esikhathini esingangeminyaka emithathu. "Into engezelele empumelelweni yokuthola leliphesenti lokudayiswa esikhathini esifishane knagaka, ingatholakala kulomjikelezo wokujoyinisa abathathu nabo beze nabathathu njalo njalo bezothola umhlomulo," kuchaza uPhilip Georges, umqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha, eSun International.

Lomqondo womhlomulo oqanjwe kabusha wokwabelana ngesikhathi usube impumelelo enkulu, njengoba abanye abathuthuki bokwabelana ngesikhathi emhalbeni wonke jikelele sebeqala yona lendlela yokusebenza ngomhlomulo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.




Umsebenzi wokuqala wentuthuke yokwabelana ngesikhathi.
Umsebenzi wokuqala wokwabelana ngesikhathi nangakho konke okuhle okutholakala ekubeni isakhamuzi seSun City Resort.

Ivacation Club yaseSun City inikeza indawo yokulala engakhoneka emindenini eza njalo emaholidini, kuwo lomjikelezo wokuqala wezentuthuko. Ihlanganise amalunga agcono kakhulu kanye nemiqondo ecatshangiwe yolucobelelana ngolwazi kanye nakho konke okuhle kokuba isivakashi zendawo zeSun City. IVacation Club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha. Ingumholi wamazwe ngamzwe wokwabelanga ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqama kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

IVaction Club eseSun City isiqale ngemivizo yoomqondo omusha ukwabelana ngesikhathi okubalwa kuyo ukubuyiselwa kwengxenye yemali oyifakayo yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012 (kuncike sekuthini wathenga nini ubulunga). Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSunnCity Vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngayo yonke into etholwa isakahamuzi. Isun City inikeza injabulu engafaniswa! Abahalela igalofu bangazikhombisa ekhozini yegalofu ayi eyodwa kodwa amabili emiqhudelwano emikhulu. Imindeni ingajabulele ukubukeka kweValley of Waves kanye nokushisekelela imidlalo yebhola lomphebezo, elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nemigudi yokugijima. EWaterworld umuntu anagzijabulisa ekundizeni emoyeni knaye nokudlala emanzini kanti iSun City isinikezela ngisho amalunga amancane emindeni - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi ehlelwe kahle ihlelewa izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomyeni wakho ningazikhululekela  enjabulweni ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka kube ukuyengwa umshini wamaphupho noma ukuvuswa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma uma nifuna ubusuku bangaphandle bothando lwenu ninokuzikhethela izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba kweHarlequins kuya kokuthe cosololo kwe-Ochird. ISun City iphela ngasendaweni yokubuka imvelo ehamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park elikucinana okukhulu kwezinto zokubukwa. Akukona nje ukuthi kukhon i"Big 5" ekungeneni, kodwa indawo ayinangozi yamalaleveva. Kukhona ukuzikhethela okuningi ukubuka izimpilo zasendle ezehlukene ukubukwa amalunga eVacation Club ezingazikhethela kuwo. Ukugcizelela kwi-Exclusive Safari ukubeka iBig 5. Ukugadwa ngobuciko kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zizokubuka iSafari yase-Afrika yangempela bekhwele bonke kwi-Landcruiser eyenziwe yaba nezihlalo ezingu-6. Izivakashi zingazibukela ubhejane uzibhuquza odakeni olubandayo kanye nezindlovu eziyizinkunzi zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaleni kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ngufakazi othulile ebhubesini libulala, njengoba izilwanyana ezincane zizidlela zinganakile ubungozo ezikubona ehlane elinokuqhuma kwengozi. Phakathi kwezintaba ezikude neMaddened Crowd, ungabuka ubushazishazi benyathi njengoba zixakekile ukunganakwa nokukhululeka ezinako. Izimoto zokuhamba endle zinempahla yazo okuzingubo ezifudumele ukwembatha kulabo abagodolayo, ukuvunguza kokushayela ebusuku. Zitholele ubuhle bobusuku bezilwane zasendle zizihambela ebusuku ngesikhathi izingwe zikhanyiswe ngaphansi kokukhanya kwenyanga ekhanyise lendawo esehlane.

Uma uhlose ukubuka okuthile kwakho wedwa, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izohlaba umxhwele ezivakashini ezizijabulisayo. Landela inyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo ngaphakathi kweLetsatsing Game Park. Unogada uzokhombisa ulwazi lwakhe olunzulu lokubheka lemvelo - zizwele komunye ngalendalo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ekuseni ngovivi, ukuphuma kwemibala kuzovela kuphikisana nokungenasici ukushona kwelanga ngemumva. Abagibeli bazogibela bonke kwiHot Air Balloon, bese bebuka yonke indawo yePilanesberg National park. Uma seniyoma phansi nisuka emoyeni niyozithela kweziqeda konke ebenikubuka ehlane lapho ukudla kwasekuseni okushaya khona kusevwa khona. ISun City izungezwe izinto eziveza amasiko ahlukene njengokwemibalabala. Jabulele amasiko ezinganekwane zesizwe, ngeCultural Tour ukuya eLedig Village. Uhambo lukuvakashisa kwi-"shanti" yendawo, inkulisa, amahhovisi ezizwe bese kuthi ekugcineni ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele eshibhini elinentshisekelo. IVacation Club yaseSun City iyindawo yangempela ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza ube ujabulela ukuba sekhaya elikude nekhaya ngendawo yokulala kanye nezinye izinhlelo zokwenziwayo. Unokuzikhethela kwendlu yokuhlala enakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala. Iyinye inesilungiso moya endlini yokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa wokulala oyidabuli ovumela kulale abantu ababili. Lezizindlu zokuhlala ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo nomshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezi kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukwenza indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izindlu lapho ungaziphekela khona ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zinikeza indawo yokulala ebiza uR5 800 ukuhlala izimpelasonto ezihlukene, okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi kodwa wonke uzungeza amazwe ngamazwe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ilunga eliboshelelwe kwimpelasonto ethile kodwa lingajabulela ukushintshashintsha kunguthanda kwalo. Kulabo abafisa ukujabulela injabulo yaseSun City isikhathi eside, ezikhathini ezifana nezibalulekile njangamaholide ephasika noma ngoJulayi, ungazikhethela okukodwa kokungu 11 okumiselwe, isikhathi sokuqala sezinhlelo zobulunga. Inani lobulunga leminyaka engu 12 ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala ngezikhathi zesonto elikhulu eSun City Vacation Club lisukela ku R15 000 kuya ku R40 000 lesonto leNedbank Million Dollar. Kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ikheshi ngokushesha kukhona inzalo ongayikhona ukuzikhethela kuyona. Inani elikhokhelwa izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili lisukela ku R733 ezimpelasontweni ekhululekile kanye no R1 612 empelasontweni enotho. UKUBEKISA INDAWO YAKHO ESUN INTERNATIONAL VACATION CLUB SHAYELA KULENOMBOLO: (011) 780-7000.




Zitholele imivuzo yeTimeshare
ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City iyiphikankani lokwakhiwa kabusha kokwabelana ngesikhathi semivuzo.

Umvuzo obizayo owutholayo, ukubuyiselwa ingxenye yemali oyikhokha kokuqala yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012, Omunye umvuzo ukunganqunyelwa esontweni elithile onyakeni. Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngako konke izakhamuzi ezingakuthola njengezivakashi zeSun City Resort.

Umqondo omusha womvuzo okungabhekwa kuwo - iTriple Ripple, yengezela ubungako bamalunga. Ubulunga bungenziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumqondo weTriple Ripple. Amalunga ehlonyeliswa ngo R300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonelo ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise amanye amathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Abahambi bamaholide sebesheshe babona konke okutholakalayo eVacation Club kanti onyankeni wokuqala besemakethe, ama-modules obulunga noma elilodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (kubalwa ubusuku bangoMsobuluko kuya koLwezine) noma elilodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (uLwesihlanu kuya eSontweni kubalwa nobusuku) ama-modules obulunga noma kokubili, okukunikeza ubulunga obuvikelekile iminyaka engu 16. Inani lobulunga liya ngokwenyuka kusukela kuR3 900 emasontweni akhululekile obulunga ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.



ISun International Vacation Club - okunye kwekhefana lempilo

ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City ingumqondo omusha womqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi osewuthathwe njengonempumelelo kakhulu entuthukweni yokwabelana ngesikhathi - ngokudayisa okungaphezulu kwamaphesenti angu 90 kwokudayisiwe (okumele ukwabelana ngesikhathi kwamasonto angaphezulu kuka 11 000) esikhathini esingaphezulu kweminyaka emibili nohhafu.

Yini eseyenze umklamo weSun City ube ongafaniswa neminye nonempumelelo? Kukhona amaqiniso amaningana, angakhethi ukuhambisana. Ukubala ambalwa: indawo; uhlangothi olulodwa oluphakeme lweSun International; inani; ukwakhiwa komkhiqizo, okubalwa kuwo izindlu zokuhlala ongaziphekela kuzona ezisezingeni eliphakeme. Umuntu akumele akholwe ukuphakama kwezinga leqembu eliwufundele umsebenzi walo elaqanjwa ukwakha nokumaketha lentuthuko. ISun International yawenza umsebenzi wayo kanti ihlanganyele neqembu layo eliqeqeshwe ngokusezingeni eliphezulu labathuthukisi nabadayisi abaqoqenene ebantwini abayizingcweti embonini yokwabelana ngesikhathi ababa nempumelelo ephezulu ekuziphatheni kwabo okubalulekile. Ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club bushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, nako konke ongakuthola njengesakhamuzi endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City yezivakashi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi banayo indlela yokungena kunoma iyiphi into eyenziwayo okubalwa kuyo igalofu emakhozini emiqhudelwano emikhulu emibili - iGary Player Country Club kanye neLost City Golf Course, ibhola lomphebezo, ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nokugijima emigudwini. 

ISun City inikeza ngisho namalunga amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi eyakhiwe ngendlela ehlukile yemidlalo kanye nokunye okwenziywayo eKwena's Castle, khona kanye egcekeni eCabanas: inkundla yokudlala emangalisayo, ikhaya lezilwane kanye nendawo yokudlala enako konke okudingakalayo. Ukuzihambela okufishane ungcebeleka unqamula amagceke aluhlaza eCabanas kukulethela umhlaba wenjabulo eSun - Waterworld. Ukundiza emoyeni, ukuhamba emoyeni, ukusheleleza emanzini kanye nalabo abafuna ukungcebeleka emanzini, kukhona isikebhe esikuthatha sikuzungezise ichibi ngesikhathi sokushona kwelanga. ISun City isishintshwe iminyaka eminingi yaba indawo yokuphumula yomndeni. Ngentuthuko yenxanxathela yeLost City manje isikunikeza izinto ezininginingi ezenza ikhasino ibe okunye okuhehayo.

ISun City iphela kwenye indawo yokugcina imvelo enothile eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park enezinto eziningi zemvelo ngokwedlulele. Akukona nje ukuthi kune "Big 5" uma ungena ngasemnyango wayo, kodwa indawo ayinangozi kamalaleveva. Abemikhondo yepaki, batholakala ehotela iSun City, manje sebenikeza okuningi  ukuzikhethela kukho kubahlali. Uma uthanda ukufuna I"Big 5" njalo I-Exclusive Safari izokuqhamuka (Kanti okungakuthatha ebusuku nakho kuyatholakala). IRhino Hiking Trail emangalisayo nenamandla amakhulu uzoyithanda. Kulabo abafuna injabulo, zama iHot Air Baloon Safari kanti kulabo abathanda kakhulu ezamasiko. Thatha uhambo lwendawo yasekhaya ubuke ezamasiko.

IVacation Club eseSun City iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza bese ujabulela ubuntofontofo bokuzizwa usekhaya elikude nekhaya okuyindawo yokulala. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala ezinesilungiso moya. Iyinye inendlu yokugeza enkulu enesisefo kanye nosofa wokulala ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Lezi zindlu ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo umshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezo kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izindlu ezinhle nezinakho konke zikunikeza indawo yokulala ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala kusukela enanini lika R5 800 nezimpelasonto ezikhululekile okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi, kodwa wonke unyaka uzungeza izwe. Izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zamasonto anokuthile zisukela kuR15 000 ngamaholide ezikole kaJulayi kuya kuR40 000 esontweni leNedbank Million Dollar. Inani lezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zisukela kuR733 ngempelasonto ekhululekile kanye noR1 612 ngempelasonto enokuthile. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




ISouth African Timeshare isibe bukhali umhlaba wonke
Imboni ephethwe ngezandla ezinobuciko inikeza okuphephile, okubiza kancane kubafaki zimali bamaholide, bathi abahambi maholide bazitholele ithuba lokuzijabulisa ngendlela abangayikhona unyaka wonke eNingizimu Afrika nangokwengezwa kwamathuba okukwazi ukushintsha izindawo zangaphakathi ngezangaphandle uhamba, ebebengeke bakwazi ukukwenza nanganoma iyiphi indlela abebengayizama. Lokhu ngumbono kaLoraine Rimmer, uMpathi wemakethe nokudayisa kwayo wezindawo ezinkulu zokulala zokwabelana ngesikhathi seSun International, iVacation Club eseSun City. Izindlu ezinobukhazikhazi ongaziphekela kuzo zathuthukiswa iSun International ukunikeza imindeni ithuba lokujabulela zonke izinto ezidumile ezitholakala endaweni yokuvakasha - kusukela kwezinye izinto zemvelo ezibukwayo eNingizimu Afrika kweseduze iPilanesberg National Park kuya kwemangalisayo  nedumile iValley of Waves.

UNkosikazi Rimmer uthi abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika banamasonto abomvu endaweni yokuvakasha iGold Crown njengeVacation Club ingakwenza, ngokwe RCT, banokufanayo okuphakeme okulinganiswa nokomhlaba wonke okuzindawo zokulala. IRCT inezindawo ezingaphansi kwayo ezingu 3 500 zokuvakasha. Abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika banokukwabelana ngesikhathi ezweni labo bese bethola noba namaholide aphesheya kwezilwandle, njengoba bekhokhela amanani abo ngamarandi, eNingizimu Afrika, ukuqhathanisa izindawo zokulala zaphesheya kwezilwandle, kusho yena. "Amanani akhokhwa ngamadola noma ngopondwe akazovunyelwa."

Ukwabelana ngesikhathi eNingizimu Afrika sekube kudala kakhulu, kusho uNkosikazi Rimmer, kanti futhi abathengi baqinisekiswa ukuphepha kokuthenga kwabo ngokusebenza nezinhlangano ezinamalekhodi ahloliwe, kanye nalabo abasebenzela iTimeshare Institute yeNingizimu Afrika (TISA) - inhlangano enamazinyo, enokusebenza kwayo okunomthetho oqinile okutholakala kubasebenzi bayo. Ukwengeza, imboni yazisaukukalwa okubalwa kuko isikhathi esipholile emva kokuthenga. Uyakugcizelela lokhu, ukuthi ukwabelana ngesikhathi ngaso sonke isikhathi kumele ibukwe ngengokutshal izimali emaholidini nasekuzijabuliseni, ayi njengokutshala izimali ukuqala ibhizinisi. "Iqinisekisa ukuthi umndeni, njalo ngesikhathi esizayo, uzoqhubeka ukukwazi ukuba namaholide ngenani ongakwazi ukulikhokha - yikho ukubuyiselwa lokhu babathengi abangathembela kukho".

Ivacation Club, kusho yena, isinikeze ukuthengwa kokwabelana ngesikhathi esikhathini esinqunyiwe onyakeni ka 2012, ngalesosikhathi uhhafu onamaphesenti angu 50 othenge ngawo uyobuyiselwa kuwe. " Kuncike ezinhlelweni eyakhiwe ngazo, isikhathi esiphelele sokwabelana ngesikhathi sibalelwa eminyakeni engu 15. Ngokunikeza isikhathi esinqunyiwe sobulunga, sicabangela isikhathi esingukuthi abanikazi bazofuna ukwehlisa izidingo zabo, bese sibanikeza okunye ukuzikhethela okulula. Lokhu kusebenza kakhulukazi ezinhlanganweni ezithatha ukwabelana ngesikhathi ukukusebenzisa ngemivuzo yokusebenza kwabasebenzi babo. IVacation Club, kusho yena, inikeza izinto ezinkulu ngezigaba eziningana. Njengokwengqalasizinda seSun International esibe sendaweni vele, izinto zevacation Club zidayiswa ngokwenani elincane ngango R15 000 ngezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala esikhathini sokuqala sesingu 11 esinqunyiwe, ama-module angalunga esikhathi esikhulu (iPhasika kanye namaholide ezikole kaJulayi). Nom kunjalo, kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ukheshi ngesikahthi kukhona inzalo ongakwazi ukuyikhokha ukuzikhethela kuyona. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7000.




ISun City Vacation Club - Impendulo ekungcebelekeni kwamaholide asebusika

Njengoba ulele uzibhabhalele phakathi negceke ne G & T eceleni kwakho kanye nenoveli esanda kukhiswa kaJohn Grisham inamathele ezandleni zakho, njengoba ujusi wamathamo otshwala besilungu ijini yehla ngomphimbo kanye nephunga lezoso nokwamasiko ase-Afrika lithusa amakhala akho, uyacabanga - kumnandi ukuba sekubaleleni kwelanga laseNingizimu Afrika. Ukuphi? ESun City Vacation Club.

ISun City Vacation Club ikunikeza  njalo njalo, indawo yokulala ongayithola yomndeni wakho wonke emsebenzini wokuqala wentuthuko yezokwabelana ngesikhathi. Kuhlanganisa ubulunga bekilabhu obungcono futhi obaqanjwa ngomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ngazo zonke izinto ezinhle zokuba isakhamuzi semangalisayo ngobuhle indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City.

ISun City ikunikeza injabulo engapheliyo! Njengoba ibhola lakho lindizela phansi kwavulekile amabala ekhosi yegalofu yaseNingizimu Afrika enothile - ikhaya leMillion Dolla Golf Challenge, umndeni wakho nawo uyajabula uhamba ushona phansi ngeBig 5 kweseduzane iPilanesberg National Park.  Abaqhaphi bendawo yokucgina kwemvelo batholakala ehotela eSun City abanikeza abahlali ukuzikhethela okuningi okushisekisa indawo. ISun City inikeza ngisho amalunga amancane omndnei wakho  - iKamp Kwena, isizinda zokuzithokozisa esihlelwe ngendlela ehlukile ukudlala izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Ukubonakala kalufifi kokushona kwelanga, umndeni wakho uqoqene uzungeze indawo yokosa. Sekuyisikhathi sokuvumelana. Usuthole indawo enhle ngokumangalisayo elungele zonke izidingo zomuntu. Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomkakho ningazibhudukeza ngokukhululeka ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka ukuthi ukuyengeka komshini wamaphupho noma okuvusa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma ubusuku obunothando kakhudlwana ngaphandle lapho onokuzikhethela kwezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba zeHarlequins kuya kwethe cosololo i-Ochird. Ngesikhathi ujabulela impilo ephakeme, umgadi wengane uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zakho ziphephile.

Unokuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu zokulala ezinamakamelo amathathu noma amabili. Iyinye inesilungiso moya kanye negumbi lukuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi elivulekile langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Ubulunga beVacation Club butheswa ngokukhetha eyodwa kwezingu 11 ezinqunyiwe. Ama-module esikhathi esikhulu, noma eyodwa yezimpelasonto ezingu 41 ezikhululekile (ubusuku boLwesihlanu kuya kobeSonto bubaliwe), okugcina ubulunga bube obeminyaka angu 15, kuze kube unyaka ka 2012. UKUTHOLA ULWAZO OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.




ISun City Vacation Club
ISun City Vaction Club ikunikeza  njalo njalo, indawo yokulala ongayikhona yomndeni wakho wonke emsebenzini wokuqala wentuthuko yezokwabelana ngesikhathi. Kuhlanganisa ubulunga bekilabhu obungcono futhi obaqanjwa ngomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ngazo zonke izinto ezinhle zokuba isakhamuzi semangalisayo ngobuhle indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City.

ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City ingukuzuza okumangalisayo kokuqanjwe kabusha ukwabelana ngesikhathi okubalwa kuko ukubuyiselwa kwengxenye yemali oyitshala okokuqala onyakeni ka2012. Omunye umvuzo ukunganqunyelwa impelasonto ethile unyaka ngamunye. Enye into enhle yokwengezela ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club obushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngako konke okungatholwa isivakashi sendawo yokuvakasha esesun City. Izakhamuzi zaseSun City zingajabulela ukubuka komuntu ngamunye kweseduzane  nengangamahectare angu 55 000 iPilanesberg National Park.

Abaqaphi, batholakala ehotela iSun City, manje abakunikeza ukuzikhethela okuningi kubahlali. Kokugcizelela kwe-Exclusive Safari ukubeka iBig 5. Onogada abaqeqeshwe ngobuciko bazoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zithola -I-African Safari yangempela zigibele zonke kwiLandcruiser enakho konke enezihlalo ezingu-6. Izivakashi zingabukela ubhejane ezibhuquza kolubandayo udaka izigeza kanye nezinkunzi zezindlovu zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaceni kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ufakazi othulile ubukela ibhubesi libulala, njengoba izilwanyana ezincane zizidlela zinganake lutho oluyingozi okungazibhudukeza ehlane lokuqhuma kwamadwala. Okubenyezelayo le kude ezintabeni kude neMaddened Crowd, ungabuka umhlambi wezinyathi zizichanasela zixakiwe nje ukuthi zangagadwa futhi zakhululeka kwenzenjani. ILandcruiser  inakho konke kokwephatha izingubo zokulala kulabo abezwa amakhaza, Kukhona nokokuhamba ebusuku. Zitholele ubuhle bobosuku bempilo yezilwane zasendle ngesikhathi izingwe zikhanyiswa inyanga ngaphansi kwesibhakabhaka salelihlanekazi.

Uma uhlose ukubuka okuthile owehlukile, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izokuthatha ikuse kokumangalisayo. Landela iNyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo phakathi kweLetsatsing Park. Unogada uzokukhombisa ulwazi lwakhe olunobuciko lokugada lendalo - zizwele komunye ngalendawo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ekuseni ngovivi, ukuphuma kwemibalabala okuphikisana nokungenasici ukushona kwelanga. Abagibeli bagibele bonke kwiHot Air Balloon, ujabulele ukunambitheka kwewayini elihlwabusayo laseNingizimu Afrika ngaphambi kokubuka evulekile iPilanesberg National Park. Uma senehla nithathwa kulenjabulo ekade nikuyona niyiswe egame Lodge lapho nifike nithole khona okumangalisayo nokuhlwabusayo ukudla kwasekuseni.

ISun City izungezwe igxubevange yezinhlobonhlobo zamasiko. Jabulela inganekwane yesizwe yamasiko, kwi-Cultural Tour ukuya eLedig Village. Uhambo lukuvakashisa kweyendawo "isanti", inkulisa, amahhovisi esizwe kanye nokokugcina ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele kweshisekelisayo ishibhini. IVacation Club eseSun City iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza bese ujabulela ubuntofontofo bokuzizwa usekhaya elikude nekhaya okuyindawo yokulala. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala ezinesilungiso moya. Iyinye inendlu yokugeza enkulu enesisefo kanye nosofa wokulala ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Lezi zindlu ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo umshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezo kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Ukhetha eyodwa kwangu 11 anqunyiwe, ama-module esikhathi esikhulu noma elilodwa iphakathi nesonto kwangu 41 akhululekile (kubalwa ubusuku bangoMsombuluko kuya kobangoLwesine), noma impelasonto ezikhululekile (ubusuku boLwesihlanu nobesonto bubaliwe) ama-module obulunga noma kokubili, okukufaka okukunika ubulunga beVacation Club, iminyaka engu-16. Inani lobulunga liya ngokunyuka kusukela kuR3 900 kuya kwekhululekile imodule yaphakathi nesonto ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili.  UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL LULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7000.




ISun City Vacation Club iyanda
Impahla enye entathu yeSun International izofakwa eSun City Vacation Club, umklamo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ophumelela ngempumelelo enkulu owavulwa iSun International ngo 1996 kanti manje amaphesenti angu 97 asekhona, izovulelwa kwezinye izimpahla zeqembu ukuba yiSun International Vacation Club.

Imemezela ukwandiswa kwayo, uMqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International, uPhilip George, uthi isinqumo sokukhushulwa izinto zokwabelana ngesikhathi e-Ezulwini Sun eseSwaziland, iWild Coast Sun, kanye neFish River Sun, kwagqugquzelwa ukuphendula okunomfutho ngokwedlulele komphakathi kwiVacation Club eseSun City, "Ikilabhu laqalwa ukusungulwa ukunikeza abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika ithuba lokwabelana ngezinto abanazo engangafani kanye nezinto zeSun City emananini ezindawo zokulala abangawakhona. Kusukela emlandweni wokudayisa okumangalisayo - inzuzo eyizigidi ezingu 130 zamarandi eminyakeni emithathu - kwavele ke kwacaca ukuthi kukhona isidingo esikhulu ngokwedlulele salomkhiqizo.

"Manje, izinto ezintsha zizokwandisela ukuzikhethela kwamalunga ekilabhu okungezonezela inani lokubiza, lapho ubulunga buzokwandiswa kubahlali baseNingizimu Afrika abahamba amaholide abadinga amakhefu abangawakhona ezindaweni zokuvakasha ezinhle ngokwedlulele." Ukuvulwa kweVacation Club, kunenezela uGeorgas, sekufakele kakhulukazi empumelelweni yokubekwa kabusha kanye nenzuzo kwezezimali yaseSun City. "Sihlose ukufaka lendlela yokuphumelela efanayo kwezinye izindawo zokuvakasha.

"Ikilabhu ibheke ukuthola abazophatha kulezizindawo ezintsha kusukela emalungeni avele akhona, amaphesenti angu 34 alabo asebevele besebenzisa lobulunga obuzishintshashintshayo be RC ukushintshisela kwezinye izindawo zokuvakasha. Akuzobizwa mali ngokushintsha phakathi kwiVacation Club, umphathi wokwabelana ngesikhathi uBrina Stocks, ethi ukwandiswa kwabiza kakhulu. Kweyodwa ngayodwa indawo kwezintsha izindawo zeVacation Club, izindlu zamahotela ezinobukhazikhazi zizoshintshelwa ukuba zibe izindlu zokwabelana ngesikhathi ngokwezinto zokukwazi ukuziphekala wena phakathi entuthukisweni yesibili ebiza izigidi zamarandi ezingu 7,5. Uthi ukushintshwa kwalezizindawo zokulala ezivele zikhona ukuba zibe izindlu ezinamakamelo okulala amabili ezingu 61 kuzomela okwengezwa kwama-module okwabelana ngesikhathi angu 6 500, okungaphezulu kwengxenye yesigamu kwekhona manje.

Umphathi wezokudayisa, uLoraine Rimmer, uthi okuhle ngobulunga beSun City Vaction Club kubala iRCI yako lokugqama kweGold Crown kwazo zonke izindawo zokuvakasha ezibandakanyenkayo, ukubalwa okuphezulu  kuvunyelwe yiRCI. Ukwengeza, wonke amasonto abomvu noma aphezulu ukushintshisa kwaphesheya kwezilwandle, okunika ababelani besikhathi okuhle kokushintshiselana nokwaphesheya kwezilwandle.

Amasonto okwabelana ngesikhathi eVacation Club ahlukaniswe ngezinsuku ezingu-4 eziphakathi nesonto, kanye nezingu 3 zempelasonto. Inani lokuvula emalungeni amasha aqala kusukela kokungaphansi kukaR4 500 kwaphakathi nesonto, kuya kuR7 00 kwempelasonto, kanyi amasonto amakhulu , okubalwa kuwo namaholide amakhulu kanye nesikhathi seMillion Dollar Golf Challenge, kusukela ananini lika-R15 000 kuya ku-R40 000. Inani liqinisekisiwe ukwenyuka ohleni olulandela iCPI, okungaphansi kohla lwezimakethe eziqhudelanayo. "Okunye ukwandiswa kweSun International vacation Club kuyathembisa," kusho uStocks. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA: THINTANA NOMYANGO WESUN INTERNATIONAL PUBLIC RELATIONS LULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684 NOMA: UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL VACATION CLUB KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7008.




Iminyaka  engu 21 yokwenza amaphupho aphumelele
ISun City eshintshela emlingweni ... futhi ibivele yenza njalo iminyaka engu 21. Yebo, kubukhuni ukukholwa, kodwa lendawo yokuvakasha emangazayo eyaqala ukuvulwa ngoDesemba mhlaka 7 ka 1979.

Isibe ingxenye engadedeli yezimpilo zethu selokhu kwathi nhlo, indawo yenjabulo, yezimanga, yemidlalo, yezokuzithokozisa kanye nokuthola ulwazi olusha. ISun City ayiqambanga kabusha imboni yokunakekela kuphela eNingizimu Afrika. Isiphenduke indawo eheha umhlaba wonke kanti futhi namhlanje isiyaziwa ngokumile iKruger National Park neTable Mountain eseKapa. Yebo iminyaka engu 22 eyedlule, kwakungekho lutho lapha kodwa ihlane nehlathi eliluhlaza elalihlukaniseke izigaba ezine zehlane lentaba yomlilo , amakhilomitha angu-150  ubude bebanga lendawo . Lokhu kukodwa kuyamangalisa, ukuba eyodwa kwezimbili izintaba zamadwala aqhuma umlilo emhlabeni okukhona kuzo amadwala amakhulu ngokumangalisayo, kodwa ngesikhathi umqambi mahotela aseSun eningizimu ohlakaniphile uSol Kerzner endizela phezu kwalendawo ngendizamshini enophephela emhlane, ebheka indawo lapho ayengabeka khona ihotela elisha, wayengabheki indawo enobuhle bomhlaba ngokushisekelayo. Akubona lapho kwakuyisitsha semvelo ezintabeni khona lapho okusanda kwenziwa iPilanesberg National Park, futhi ayefuna ukukuthola kwakuyindawo ebukekayo yokwakha ihotela elibukekayo. "Yiyo indawo le!" esho ngokukhululeka, ebuka ehleli endizeni enophephela emhlane ngewindo layo. Iqiniso lokuthi yayingenawo amanzi, kanti futhi nokuthi okufakela amandla kagezi kwakungamakhilomitha angu 25 ubukude, umgwaqo ongcolile owawuseduze wawungamakhilomitha angu 7 kanti idolobha elaliseduze okungenani lalingamakhilomitha angu 40, kwakungezona izingqinamba ngokwakhe ngalesosikhathi. Lelodolobha, iRistenberg, lalikude ngamahora amabili ngomgwaqo emadolobheni amakhulu asePitoli naseGoli kanye neReef iyonke, okwakungamadolobha izivakashi zansukuzonke ezazithutheleka khona. USol Kerzner uyindoda yombono ... kanti futhi wenza izinto zenzeke ... ngokushesha. Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezalandela, ngo-Julayi mhlaka 15 ku 1978, isoyi lokuqala laphendulwa. Ekujulukeni kophahla ngoMeyi  ka 1979, uMnumzane Kerzner wachaza ukuthi "ukuba nendawo enhle ngokumangalisayo eyabe ingathuthukisiwe nakancane, sikwazile ukuqamba lapho kade kungaphili lutho khona inxanxathela yendawo yokuvakasha engafaniswa nayinye emhlabeni".Waqhubeka nokuthi "ISun City inkundla yokuqala yenxanxathela ehlanganise amanye amahotela amaningi akhona, yingqikithi yamapaki, izindawo nezindlu zekhethela zezakhamuzi, nama-monorails njalo njalo." Kusukela nje ekuqaleni, waqala  ngamakhozi egalofu eligingqikayo, izindawo zamanzi, izinhlelo ezinkulu zezinto zokudlala imidlalo enhlobonhlobo, kanye nemidlalo nezokuzithokozisa ezigcwele umhlaba wonke ukuzilinganisa nawo. ISun City ihlela amazinga amasha okuqamba kabusha ezokwakha ngobuciko kanye nomlando wokwakhiwa ngokushesha kwayo okusha futhi. Maduzane nje emva ezinyangeni ezingu 7 emva kokumanta kophahla, amagumbi angu 340 ehotela iSun City ayeselungile ukuthi ayengavulwa okokuqala. Kodwa okukodwa nje. Ichibi lokubhukuda laselilungile seligcwaliswe ngamanzi ngesikhathi abapendi beqedela indawo ephezulu. Kanti futhi abasebenzi base beqoqa amathuluzi abo okusebenza kanye nokhaphethi obomvu ube wendlwalwa emva kwabo nemizuzu embalwa nje ngaphambi kwe VIP yokuqala kanye nabezindaba bangene eminyango. Bazithola besendaweni evulekile yokungena engaphezulu kwebala lebhola lombhoxo, kanye ne-Aquaries bar ephephezela njengenkanyezi yomkhumbi ngaphezu kwenqwaba yemishini yokudlala. Imichachazo kanye nezibani zeTivoli phakathi kwezitshalo zetropicana kanye nokunyakaza kokubenyezela kwekheshi lengilazi elihamba phakathi kwendawo evulekile yokungena kanye nezinkundla eziphezulu, konke kwakudale indlela ehambiselanayo okungafaniswa nokwedlulele nokukhanya okufuquzayo. Ngaphansi kwehotela kwakuphakama izihlahla zepalm eziphakeme okungangamitha angu 14 zohlobo lweWashingtonia, kakhulukazi zasungulwa futhi zathuthelwa ekhaya lazo elisha ngaphandle kwechibi lokubhukuda elingamamitha angu 55, lenziwa laba likhulu ngoba uMnumzane Kerzner wayelifuna libe elingcwalisa i-los engu 600.  Amapalms, kanye nohlobo lwezithombo lunezimbali ezithandelayo ngemibalabala engu 1 000 zazimboze icala lentaba ebhekene nehotela, lapho izigidigidi zezitshalo zaziqala khona ukuthola ikhaya lazo kanye nezihlahla lapho zazisekhaya lazo eliyingadi enhle ngokumangalisayo yaseSun City. Ukunikeza izingadi zeSun City okwazo okuzimpande ezinhle, inhlabathi engango 25 000 cubic metres yathelwa khona, kodwa lokho kufana nemitha eligcwele isandla uma kuqhathaniswa nezigidigidi zamacubic metres enhlabathi eyathelwa eCascades kanye naseLost City.

Akukho okufana nehotela iSun City okwakhe kwaba khona ngaphambilini kulelizwe. Ukubenyezela kwalo kanye nobunkentenkente kwakungukuphefumula kanye nokubiza kwalo, izigidi ezingu 250 zamarandi, kwakuyimali enkulu kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika ukuyichitha ngalezozikhathi zeminyaka yawo 1979. Uma kuqhathaniswa nenani lamanje, inani elatshalwa ekwakheni indawo yokuvakasha iSun City ligijima la ko R1,18 billion. Ngosuku olufanayo njengosuku lokuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwehotela iSun City, ompetha bebhola lomphebezo uBob Hewitt kanye no-Abe Segal baqala ukufundisa ezinkundleni zebhola lomphebezo ezingu 9. Ngosuku olulandelayo, uDesemba mhlaka 8, umakhelwane, ipilanesberg Game Reserve engamahectare angu 55 000 yavulelwa umphakathi, kanti ngomhlaka Desemba 12 uGary Player wawina umklomelo wakhe wokuqala uR100 000 emqhudelwaneni ophakeme owawubanjelwe ekhozini yena uqobo lwakhe ayiqamba. Emva kwezinsuku ezintathu, i-Extravaganza Theatre yavulwa ngombukiso wesitayela seLas Vega eyajabulisa ababukeli ngezintokazi zayo ezinhle ngokumangalisayo ezazigqoke izimpaphe zempangele kanye nokudlalwa kwayo okumangalisayo okungajwayelekile. Umculi wokuqala wamazwe ngamazwe ukuba khona kwaba ngu Cliff Richard. Ngempumelelo eyaba nayo iSun City ukuthi yamukela izivakashi eziyisigidi nengxenye ngonyaka wayo wokuqala. Babedlala ezinkundlei zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ezavulwa ngoJanuwari mhlaka 1 ngo 1980. Bahambela imihlangano emikhulu kanye nokuvulwa kwezimoto. Babuka imiqhudelwano yamanqamu yeSun City Raffles Disco ngo-Epreli - khumbula amaRaffles? NgoJuni, uLeo Sayer wadlala eSun City, kanti ngoJulayi mhlaka 30, uMnumzane Basil Nakos wawina umklomelo wokuqala wesun City owawungamarandi angu 37 000. Imidlalo yaseSun City yakhula kakhulu ngodumo kanti umklomelo wokuqala wamarandi angu 250 000 wavulwa umshini wamaphupho ngo Meyi mhlaka 8 ngo 1987, Ngo 1988, wanyukela emarandini angu 500 000 kanti ngo 1991 wanyukela futhi emarandini ayisigidi. Eminyakeni enyishumi nje kuphela indawo yokuvakasha yavulwa, imishini yokugembula yokuqala eyayingu 250 yanyuka yaba ngu 1000. Umshini wamaphupho waqhubeka nokukhokha umklomelo ka R4 048 353 ngo-Agasti ka 1993 ngesikhathi iGrand Slam ivulwa ngoDesemba ka 1993, eyayinikeza umklomelo omncane ngezigidi ezinhlanu zamarandi. NgoDesemba ka 1980, izinkundla eziluhlaza lokubhola zavulwa ngomqhudelwano kaBattle weSaxes ohlanganisa okungu 12. IComair yavula umsebenzi wezindiza eziya esikhumulweni sezindiza ePilanesberg eseduze neSun City, kanti ihhovisi lokuposa lazisa ukuba khona ngempumelelo kwendawo yokuvakasha ngokukhipha amakhava osuku lokuqala ngoDesemba mhlaka 6, usuku olwandulela usuku lokuzalwa kwayo lokuqala. Ngalo usuku uqobo lwalo, iSalon Prive entsha yavulwa ekhasino. Ngawo lowonyaka wokuqala, indawo yokuvakasha yathola okomvuzo wokushintsha imali yangaphandle okungaphezu kwezigidi ezine zamarandi. Eminye imisebenzi engu 2000 yaqanjwa (engaphezulu kwengxenye yayo yatholwa umphakathi owakhele indawo). Abantu angu 250 000 babezithokozisa ekhasino kanti abangu 300 000 babegcwala embukisweni we-Extravaganza kanye neTheatre. Eqinisweni, iSun City qobo lwayo yazidonsela izivakashi eziningi esikhathini esiyizinyanga ezingu 12 zokuqala ngaphezu kwezivakasha eNingizimu Afrika unyaka ngamunye. Yaqamba uSol Kernzer ngalesosikhathi ayekubiza "ngenkinga enkulu". "Ibizwa ngokuthi impumelelo," kusho yena, "futhi yaqala ngosuku esavula ngalo iminyango okokuqala onyakeni owedlule." Izixuku zabantu ezazigcwala endaweni yokuvakasha zaziphindwe kane ngaphezu kwenombolo eyayilindelekile, kanti lokho kwabeka ukucindezeleka kuzo zonke izinto ezazisetshenziswa. "Ekuqaleni sakubeka phansi ukuthi egugwini leSun City? Ukungafaniswa nalutho," kwengeza uMunumzane Kerzner, "kanti futhi sacabanga emva kwezinga lokubhalwe phansi ukufinyelela kwi-Easter ukuthi sekutholiwe, kodwa izixuku zaqhubeka nokukhula, ayi kancane. Kanti ngenxa yokudingeka, sazi ukuthi kwakumele sikhule futhi sikhule ngokubalulekile." Buka ukubhula kwalesisho ukuthi sinjani. Umbono ayenawo wawulokhu undizile ngaphezu kwehlane ngalesosikhathi wawusebenza. Usuku lokuqala lokuzalwa lwesun City futhi kwabe kungumgubho wokuvulwa kweCabanas yeSun City enamagumbi angu 284, indawo yokulala elungele imindeni eyavulwa emagcekeni ehlikela phansi echibini iwaterworld elimangalisayo elenziwa ngezandla. Yebo, iWaterworld. Lokho futhi okunye, ichibi elikhulu elingangamamitha angu 750 ubude, elinikeza ama-square metres angu 400 amanzi acacile ukudlala imidlalo efana nokushesheleza emanzini, ukugijima ngezikebhe kanye nokundiza ngezikebhe. Elinesisindo samanzi angama cubic metres angu 1 300 000, kwathatha izinyanga ukuligcwalisa futhi kwabiza uR 1 700 000. Imidlalo nayo ezicinalele nje ngokwedlulele, kanye nezindawo zokuyidlala, inkundla enkulu yakhiwa ukungenisa abashayi sibhakela besisindo esikhulu somhlaba impi eyayiphakathi kukaWeaver noCoatzee ngo-Oktoba mhlaka 25 ngo 1980, Leyompi kwakungeyokuqala kwezingu 50 izimpi zesibhakela kanye nesicoco somhlaba (khumbula impi enkulu eyayiphakathi yeWorld WBA Junior Lightweight yompetha phakathi kukaBrian Mitchell noAlfred Layne? UMitchel wawina) kanye nalenkundla - okuncane nje okuphathelene nangalesosikhathi, kwakunguqamba indawo eyaphenduka iSuperbowl manje enezihlalo ezingu 6 000 enkundleni yokuzithokozisa. Yavulwa ngoJulayi mhlaka 24 ku 1981, kuhamba phambili uFrank Sinatra. Wayenza ngendlela yakhe njengoba kwenza uSol Kernzer, kwaba imigubho emikhulu emibili okungukwengeza endaweni emangalisayo yokuvakasha.

Osaziwayo abadumile badlala kusukela ngalesosikahthi. Ngesikhathi uRod Stewart beno-Elton John benikeza umdlalo ohlangene oyohlale ukhumbuleka, ngaphandle kwasesiteji akukho okunye okungcono ngaphandle kokuzabalaza ezinkundleni zebhola eligingqwayo eziluhlaza. Ubusuku bansuku zonke bunemibukiso, uStewart wakhahleli amabhola ezinyawo kubabukeli, ababewagcina njengesikhumbuzo. Indlovukazi yafika nezimpahla eziningi lokho okwenza ukuthi zindiziswe zodwa ngezindizamshini zazo. UBarry Manilow wafuna ngenkani ukuthi ithanela ehamba ngaphansi yakhiwe phakathi kwezindlu zakhe agqokela kuzona kanye neshashalazi (ibanga elingangamamitha amane) ngoba wayekholelwa  ukuthi kumele abalekele ukuqondana kwamehlo akhe ngesikhathi engena. Kanti umbukiso womlingo kaSpellbound unendawo encane yezilwane ezinkulu eyakhiwe ngemumva kwehotela ukugcina izingwe zabo zezinye izilwane ezifana nezingwe ezinemithente kanye nezimnyama, ezazinikwa izinkukhu ezingama-kg angu 300 isonto ngalinye. Isizinda sezokuzithokozisa sona qobo lwaso sasingukuqanjwa kabusha, esassibiza okulingana nokwabiza ihotela iSun City kanti futhi sawina iStell Construction Award ka 1982 ngokuhamba phambili kwezokwakhiwa. Isigaba sokuqala nesesibili somklamo sasebenzisa amatani angu 3 900 ensimbi (onkungaphezulu kwengxenye eyasetshenziswa ekwakheni ulayini wabagibeli ofana ne ss Windsor Castle). Izinsika ezinkulu eziphuma phezulu zesihonqa, zingububanzi obunqamula iSuperbowl evulekile enezihlalo ezingu 6 000 obungangamamitha angu 52, enesisindo esingamathani angu 170 bese sichitha amamitha angu 300 odonga oluncane. Isigidi samarandi, umshini womsindo owenziwe ngendlela yesiko onomkhiqizo wama-watts angu 35 000 ezipikheni ezingu 215 ezinemibhobho engu 110. Indlela yayo yokukhanyisa ehlanganise okuningi kulula ukuyisebenzisa emicimbini eminingi, okubalwa kuyo imibukiso, imihlangano emikhulu, ukwaziswa kwemikhiqizo, kanye nokuvulwa kokusebenza kwemikhiqizo ethile. Kwabanjelwa kuyo umdanso wokushebeleza, ukushebeza eqhweni, ukushaywa kwamadilamu, umbukiso wokugxuma, iWheels of Fire eyashisa eSuperbowl ngawo wonke umsindo kanye nentokozo yomjaho weGrand Prix, futhi ngisho nokudayiswa kweSuperSun Brahman okwakungewona nakancane umsebenzi wenkunzendala. Kwakukhona okuningi kakhulu esizindeni sokuzithokozisa kunaseSuper-duper Bowl, noma kunjalo. Ngemishini yakho ebalulekile, umbukiso we-galaxy ishashalazi lakhona elingangamamitha angu 80 ububanzi kwakungesikhulu endaweni eseningizimu, umdanso, indawo enkulu kunazo zonke yebingo yohlobo lwayo emhlabeni, indawo yokubuka izithombe, izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla, amakilabhu ezemidlalo, kanye nezindawo zemidlalo yeClub Orleans kanye nezitolo, yangenisa abantu abangu 10 000 kalula. Ngokwezimpahla zemibuthano, lokhu kuhlela amazinga amasha ezobuchwepheshe, idecor kanye nokunakekela ngokomsebenzi wakhona. Ngo 1983, uSol Kerzner waqamba iSun International kanye nawo wonke amahotela anamakhasino ngaphambili okwakuphethwe iSouthern Sun wadonsela ekuphatheni kwenkampani entsha. NgoDesemba ka 1984 kwaqhamuka okunye futhi eSun City ngokuvulwa kwehotela elihle ngokumangalisayo nelinobukhazikhazi leCascade elinamagumbi angu 243. Indawo yalo yezingadi engamahectare amane yaphinda futhi yenza iSun City yaba ngundabuzekwayo edolobheni, ngemichachazo yazo emangalisayo neyenziwe ngobuciko ,izimpophoma, izimpophonyana, kanye nemitata egcwaliswe ngemibalabala yezinhlanzi, konke kuvele phakathi kokutshaliwe okuluhlaza. Izinyoni ezinkulu ezifana nedada elikhulu, omakholwase kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zemibala yezinyoni ezizindizela ngokukhululeka phakathi kwezihlahla zemvelo, izihlahlana kanye nama-cycads ambalwa okutshalwe phakathi kwedwala lendawo elisinda okungangamathani angu 4 000 ePilanesberg, okuvele ngokuhlakanipha phakathi kwedwala likakhonkolo elingangama-square metres angu 1 860 elibunjwe lisuselwa endalweni yemvelo, kanye nenxoza yengilazi engangama square metres angu 3 720 ukhonkolo owenziwe. Amadwala notshani bemfunda kudala ingemumva lamatshe adwetshiwe akhombisa ubuciko base-Afrika. Lokhukunwetshwa kwendawo yokuvakasha ngasemaphethelweni angaseceleni lentaba kwenza kubaluleke ngoJanuwari ka 1986 ukufaka iSkytrain Monorail, ehamba phakathi kwendawo yepaki yezimoto enwetshiwe esesangweni namahotela amathathu. Ngo 1989, abasebenzi bakhula baba ngu 3 200 kanti abangamaphesenti angu 90 babeqhamuka eBotswana abaqhamuka ezindaweni ezakhele. Emveni kweminyaka engu 10, iSun City yanikezela ngezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezingangaphansi kuka 14, futhi ezilandela inkolelo kanoma ubani yokunambitheka, lokhu kwakusevwa yonke into kusukela emashibisini kuya kwezinkulu izindishi. UFrank Sinata wayesegombekile ngaphezu kwezinga likapasta waseNtaliyane osevwa yiSilver Forest esehotela iSun City lokhu ayekuthenga zonke izinsuku ebusuku. OkwaShirley Bassey beno-Ann-Margret, akukho okunye ngaphandle kweDom Perignon neMoet at Chandon okungakwenza. UModern Talikni wayethenga amagaqa esiqandisi enziwe kuphela ngamanzi a-Vital. UKenny Rogers wayedla okukhulu kwe Mr & Ms (kwase US okufana nama-Smarties) okwakuthengelwe yena nje phesheya. NgoMashi ka 1991, kwakukhona uthosi omkhulukazi we"Cheers" ngesikhathi iCabanas Sunrise Cocktail, ixutshwe ngaphansi kocwaningo lwezikhulu ezaziqhamuka eGuiness Book of records, iba ingxubevange yotshwala enkulu kakhulu emhlabeni. Ingilazi enkulu, eyenzelwe kakhulukazi ukuthwala amalitha angu 1 500, yayigcwaliswa ngo-tequila, usulupa we-grenadine kanye nojusi wewolintshi nokaphayinaphu, kanti futhi ingilazi egcwele ejwayelekile yaphenduka yathengwa izixuku yakhuphula izinga elikhulu lenjabulo. Ngo 1992, isizinda sezokuzithokozisa saphindaphindwa ngokubukhulu ngokwengezelwa ngohholo labaphathizikhwama (Hall of Treasures), okwathi ngokuhamba kwesikahthi lahlanganiswa neLost City. Ngokubukeka kwalo kwangaphandle njengoba lidwetshwe edwaleni lakudala lase limbozwa ngemidwebo, ingaphakathi likhombisa ubuciko obumangalisayo ngokwedlulele bemishini yokudlala okukanye nemidlalo yevideo okuhambisana nakho kanye nesitayela sokuzijabulisa okulinganisiweyo kwemibukiso esemaceleni, okunenezelwe izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla kanye nezinto zemihlangano emikhulu. Isizinda sezokuzithokozisa esikhona sashintshelwa kwecinene ikhasino ngemishini yayo engu 350. Umsebenzi wase uqalwe ngezigidi zamarandi ezingu 830 yiLost City eminyakeni emibili yokwandulela, ngo 1990. lokho kwakungumklamo obalulekile nomkhulu ube wakhula futhi ngokumangalisayo ngokwendawo yezokuvakasha. ILost City ingumhlaba wamaphupho wase-Afrika ophakathi kwewubukhazikhazi iPalace ngemibhoshongo yayo eyenziwe ngemiboko yezindlovu okukhandiwe kwase kwadetshwa ngamaqabunga epalm. Yona iyodwa yabiza izigidi ezingu 400 zamarandi ukuyakha. Ichazwa njengenye yezindawo ezimangalisayo zomhlaba wesimanje, seyawina imiklomelo eminingi okubalwa kuyo nokuba ihotela eliholayo emhlabeni. Ngo 1998 iConde Nast Traveller Award yabeka indawo yayo ebukekayo nenobuciko bokwakha ngokumangalisayo ohleni lomsebenzi oncomekayo, amakhishi kanye nendawo yokulala.

Igubha ubuciko bokwakha nesiko lempucuko eyalahlekayo, kanti ukwamukela ngobukhosi kulindele isivakashi ngasinye. Ngemumva kokutholakala kwempuzi yebhulonze, kubanjwe amangqeshe aphakathi nendawo njengoba endizela ezidladleni ezivulekile zengulube yehlathi, njengendawo yokwamukela ejubalele enesandla esidwetshwe odongeni esiyiqongo, esinezitezi eziyisithupha ukuphakama. Ngaphezulu, imihlobisa yobuciko bokwakha nenothile ayifaniswa nalutho emhlabeni, ngokugidlabeza kwayo ngobuhle, ukupholiswa okwenziwe ngokwesiko kunezelelwa ukupendwa okungafaniswa nalutho, imidwebo kanye nemifekethiso eyenziwe ngezinhlamvwana zamatshe. Izinhla zetshe leFaux ziziphumulele ezinyaweni zendlovu, izingwe ezipendiwe ziqhamuka phakathi kotshani bemfunda ngaphezu kwezihlalo akhelwe khona kanye namatafula andlalwe kahle ngokumangalisayo eVilla del Palazzo, kanye nezitebhisi ezimfishane zezinhlayiya zamatshe kanye nomabula zehlela endaweni ethengisa ngokudla iCrystal Court. Eduze nayo, ekugcineni kwenye indawo evulekile, kume uShawu, enye yezindlovu zomlando ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zaseKruger National Park  eziyisikhombisa, ibonakala ngokubholonze. Ubheke phansi eValley of Waves, manje seyixhumene nehholo labaphathi zikhwama lesizinda sezokuzithokozisa nge bholoho iBridge of Time. Uma ingwe ibhonga, amalangabi aqhuma phambili ephuma ezihonqeni ezingaphansi komhlaba, bese ibhuloho linyakaze ngamandla akho. Kanti akukho okunye kokuzithokozisa noma kwemihlangano okufana nehholo labaphathi zikhwama okungatholakala eSouthern Hemisphere. IPalace enamagumbi angu 338,ngamachibi ayo okubhukuda, indawo yokudlala yakudala kanye neyokubuka, kuzungezwe ukucinana okwenziwe ngezandla emhlabeni okungenazo izigaba ezingaphansi kweziyishiyagalombili yokutshaliweyo okusukela kwezimangalisayo izimbali ezihlobise ekucinaneni kubathandi bogwadule okungabheki ngaphandle kwendawo enyangeni. Izitshalo ezingaphezu kwesigidi nengxenye nezihlahla okubalwa kuzo esezindala ngaphezu kweminyaka engamakhulu, zaqoqwa, zachelelwa zase zitshalwa kahle endaweni engangamahectare angu 25, okudla ihlathi elihlotshiswe imichachazo ehamba kahle kanye nezikhukhula ezigijimayo. Ngaphansi kundlaleke iValley of Waves, ipaki lamanzi lokuzijabulisa labancane nabadala okungadlalwa kulo emanzini kwiRaaring Lagoon kanye nezitobhi zamanzi eziphakathi nendawo eziphuma eTemple of courage. Izimanga seLost City zakhonjiswa kumabonakude emhlabeni wonke ngoNovemba ka 1992 ngesikhathi indawo yokuvakasha inoMiss World pageant - okwakungokokuqala ingakaze ibanjelwe e-Afrika. Ababukela ababebalelwa ezigidini ezingu 600 zazibukele ipageant bukhoma ngokusebenza kwesatellite emazweni angu 73, futhi baziswa ngazo zonke izinto iSun City ezinikeza abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle. Okwathathwa neSun City kwaba abalungiseleli baMisi World ukuthi iPageant ibuyiselwe endaweni yokuvakasha eminyakeni eminingi eminye. Ukuvulwa kweLost City nePalace wagujwa ngoDesemba ka 1992  ngenkanyezi ethe gqwa gqwa, isibhakabhaka sasebusuku umkhiqizo wesonet-lumierr ngoFrance's Jean Michel Jarre. Ukuqhumisa kwakhe izikwibhisi okukhulu kanye ne-laser beams, okubukwa ababukeli behleli ehlombe komunye ehlombe ebhishi lasevalley of Waves, bonke bajabulela ukushisekela kwabo bokukwazi ukuqamba izinto, Ngo 1993, iLost City Golf Course yavulwa. Izinto ezihlobise ubuhle bemvelo bePilanesberg Mountains ezizungeze iSun City ... kanye nezingwenya zibukela abadlali zisechibini emgodini weshumi nantathu. Mhlawumbe idumela elikhulu lomhlaba wonke, noma kunjalo, kujatshulelwa ikhozi yeGary Player Country Club, ikhaya leNedbank Golf Challenge. Umklomelo wokuqala weMillion Dollar wawinwa ngo 1980 nguJonny Miller wase-USA, eshaya uSteve Ballesteros. Kwaba yilapho, futhi yagcina, ukucutha kwegalofu okukhulu, ngendlela eyabe ishintshiwe emva kweminyaka embalwa ukuthi owinayo athathe yonke imincintiswano ewinayo. Kanti eseduze kwezindawo ezidayisa ngokudla eduze komgodi weshumi nesishiyagalolunye emangalisayo iGary Player Country Club Health Spa. Ngenombolo yezivakashi ezenyuka njalo ngonyaka eSun City, amanye amagumbi amakhulu anenezelwa eCabansa ngo 1995. Uhlelo olukhulu olwathatha izigidi zamarandi ezingu 236 ukulungiswa kabusha kwenziwe cishe kuyo yonke indawo yokuvakasha, okubalwa kuko ukuhlelwa kabusha ngokuphelele kwendawo evulekile ngasekungeneni kwehotela iSun City kanye nokungeniswa nokwaziswa kwezinye izitshalo ezimangalisayo ezingadini zeCascade. Enye yezintuthuko ezisanda kwenzeka kwaba iVacation Club, eyavulwa ngo 1996 ngoJuni. Lomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi oqanjwe kabusha usube impumelelo enkulu - kangangokuba yaze yaqanjwa ngokuthi iRCI's Marketer of the Year yango 1996, ngaphandle kokuvulwa isikhathi esingangezinyanga eziyisithupha onyakeni. Impumelelo yayo esheshayo ekwakheni inombolo ephezulu emikhiqizweni yokudayiswa kwalentuthuko - ngaphakathi noma emazweni omhlaba - esikhathini esingangezinyanga eziyisithupha, kwaziswa inhlangano yamazwe ngamazwe yokushintshiselana ngokwabelana ngesikhathi. I-RCI yaklonyeliswa ngomklomelo weVacation Club Gold Crown. Kuhlale kukhona okuthile okusha nokujabulisayo eKingdom of Pleasure. Kusingathwe kokwasemandulo, indawo eyihlathi lase-Afrika, kukhona inkazimulo, ulwazi lwezinto zomhlaba kanye nokuhlihliza amahora angu 24, Kanti, yebo, umlingo usakhona ukuthatha iSun City ayi kuphela eminyakeni engu 21, kodwa kude ukuyongena kwenye inkulungwane minyaka. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTYHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS EMNYANGWENI WEZEPUBLIC RELATIONS LULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.




Umqondo oqanjwe kabusha ongabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso
IVacation club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha. Ingumholi wamazwe ngamazwe wokwabelana ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugqama kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

Ubulunga buyatholakala ngenani elincane nje elingango R3 900 kanye nomvuzo womqondo omusha okungabhekwa kuwo kuyanezezela ebungakweni  bobulunga. Ubulunga  bungenziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumgomo weTripple Ripple. Amalunga ahlonyeliswa ngo R300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonela ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise namathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Enkomfeni enkulu yamazwe ngamazwe yango 1997 yeRCI eyayibanjelwe eberlin, iVacation Club yaseSun City yakhexisa imilomo yezithunywa ezingu 650 ngomsebenzi wayo ophezulu wokudayisa ophumelele ezinyangeni ezingu 12 zokuqala. Kuma-modules angu 24 336 atholakalayo, angamaphesenti angu 53 adayiswa onyakeni wokuqala. Leliphesenti lijwayele ukufinyelelwa kulo esikhathini esingangeminyaka emithathu. "Into engezelele empumelelweni yokuthola leliphesenti lokudayiswa esikhathini esifishane kangaka, ingatholakala kulomjikelezo wokujoyinisa abathathu nabo beze nabathathu njalo njalo bezothola umhlomulo," kuchaza uPhilip Georges, umqondisi wesifunda wezindawo zokuvakasha, eSun International.

Lomqondo womhlomulo oqanjwe kabusha wokwabelana ngesikhathi usube nempumelelo enkulu, njengoba abanye abathuthukisi bokwabelana ngesikhathi emhlabeni wonke jikelele sebeqala yona lendlela yokusebenza ngomhlomulo. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.




Umsebenzi wokuqala wentuthuko yokwabela ngesikhathi.
Umsebenzi wokuqala wentuthuko wokwabelana ngesikahthi nangakho konke okuhle okutholakala ekubeni isakhamuzi seSun City Resort.

IVacation Club yaseSun City inikeza indawo yokuhlala engakhoneka emindenini eza njalo emaholidini, kuwo lomjikelezo wokuqala wezentuthuko. Ihlanganise amalunga angcono kakhulu kanye nemiqondo ecatshangiwe yokucobelelelana ngolwazi kanye nakho konke okuhle kokuba isivakashi sezindawo zeSun City. IVacation Club yaseSun City iTime Share Resort eqanjwe kabusha.  Ingumholi wamazwe ngamazwe wokwabelana ngesikhathi, ehlela imilando yokudayisa, ecaphuna ukugquma kweGold Crown ibe imemezela ngomqondo oqanjwe kabusha okungabhekwa kuwo wesingeniso.

IVacation Club eseSun City isiqale ngemivuzo yomqondo omusha ukwabelana ngesikhathi okubalwa kuyo ukubuyiselwa kwengxenye yemali oyifakayo yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012 (kuncike ekutheni wathenga nini ubulunga). Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngayo yonke into etholwa isakhamuzi. ISun City inikeza injabulo engafaniswa! Abahalela igalofu bangazikhombisa ekhozini yegalofu ayi eyodwa kodwa amabili emiqhudelwano emikhulu. Imindeni ingajabulela ukubukeka kweValley of Waves kanye nokushisekela imidlalo yebhola lomphebezo, elidalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nemigudu yokugijima. EWaterworld umuntu angazijabulisa ekundizeni emoyeni kanye nokudlala emanzini kanti iSun City isinikeza ngisho amalunga amancane emindeni - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi ehlelwe kahle ihlelelwe izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomyeni wakho ningazikhululekela enjabulweni ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka kube ukuyengwa umshini wamaphupho noma ukuvuswa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma uma nifuna ubusuku bangaphandle bothando lwenu ninokuzikhethela izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba kweHarlequins kuya kokuthe cosololo kwe-Ochird. ISun City iphela ngasendaweni yokubuka imvelo ehamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park elinokucinana okukhulu kwezinto zokubukwa. Akukona nje ukuthi kukhona i- "Big 5" ekungeneni, kodwa indawo ayinangozi yamalaleveva. Kukhona ukuzikhethela okuningi ukubuka izimpilo zasendle ezehlukene ukubukwa amalunga eVacation Club ezingazikhethela kuwo. Ukugcizelela kwi-Exclusive Safari ukubeka iBig 5. Ukugadwa ngobuciko kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zizobuka iSafari yase-Afrika yangempela bekhwele bonke kwi-Landcruiser eyenziwe yaba nezihlalo ezingu-6. Izivakashi zingabukela ubhejane uzibhuquza odakeni olubandayo kanye nezindlovu eziyizinkunzi zilwa zibanga ukuphatha ekucaleni kokukhanya kwelanga. Iba ngufakazi othulile ebhubesini libulala, njengoba izilwanyana ezincanyana zizidlela zinganakile ubungozi ezikubona ehlane elinokuqhuma kwengozi. Phakathi nezintaba ezikude neMaddened Crowd, ungabuka ubushazishazi benyathi njengoba zixakekila ukunganakwa nokukhululeka ezinako. Izimoto zokuhamba endle zinempahla yazo okuzingubo ezifudumele ukwembatha kulabo abagodolayo, ukuvunguza kokushayela ebusuku. Zitholele ubuhle bobusuku bezilwane zasendle zizihambela ebusuku ngesikhathi izingwe zikhanyiswe ngaphansi kokukhanya kwenyanga ekhanyise lendawo esehlane.

Uma uhlose ukubuka okuthile kwakho wedwa, njalo iRhino Hiking Trail izokuhlaba umxwele ezivakashini ezizijabulisayo. Landela inyathi emhlophe ngezinyawo ngaphakati kweLetsatsing Game Park. Unogada uzokhombisa ulwazi lwakhe olunzulu lokubheka imvelo - zizwele komunye ngalendalo emangalisayo yase-Afrika. Ekuseni ngovivi, ukuphuma kwemibala kuzovela kuphikisana nokungenasici ukushona kwelanga ngemumva. Abagibeli bazogibela bonke kwiHot Air Balloon, bese bebuka yonke indawo yePilanesberg National park. Uma seniyoma phansi nisuka emoyeni niyozithela kwezoqeda ebenikubuka ehlane lapho ukudla kwasekuseni okushaya khona kusevwa khona. ISun City izungezwe izinto eziveza amasiko ahlukene njengokwemibalabala. Jabulela amasiko ezinganekwane zesizwe, ngeCultural Tour ukuya eLedig Village. Uhambo likuvakashisa kwi-"Shanti" yendawo, inkulisa, amahhovisi ezizwe bese kuthi ekugcineni ungazizwela ukunambitheka kotshwala bamabele eshibhini elinentshisekelo. IVacation Club yaseSun City iyindawo yangempela ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza ube ujabulela ukuba sekhaya elikude nekhaya ngendawo yokulala kanye nezinye izinhlelo zokwenziwayo. Unokuzikhethela phakathi kwendlu yokulala enamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala. Iyinye inesilungiso moya endlini yokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa wokulala oyidabuli ovumela kulale abantu ababili. Lezizindlu zokuhlala ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo nomshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifumdumezi kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukwenza indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izindlu lapho ungaziphekela khona ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zinikeza indawo yokulala ebiza R5 800 ukuhlala izimpelasonto ezihlukene, okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi kodwa wonke uzungeza amazwe ngamazwe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ilunga aliboshelelwe kwimpelasonto ethile kodwa lingajabulela ukushintshashintsha ngokuthanda kwalo. Kulabo abafisa ukujabulela injabulo yaseSun City isikhathi eside, ezikhathini ezifana nezibalulekile njengamaholide ePhasika noma ngoJulayi, ungazikhethela okukodwa kokungu-11 okumiselwe, isikhathi sokuqala sezinhlelo zobulunga. Inani lubulunga leminyaka engu 12 ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala ngezikhathi zesonto elikhulu eSun City Vacation Club lisukela ku R15 000 luya ku R40 000 lesonto leNedbank Million Dollar. Kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ukheshi ngokushesha kukhona inzalo ongayikhona ukuzikhethela kuyona. Inani elikhokhelwa izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili lisukela ku R733 ezimpelasontweni ezikhululekile kanye no R1 612 empelasontweni enotho. UKUBEKISA INDAWO YAKHO ESUN INTERNTAIONAL VACATION CLUB SHAYELA KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7000.




Zitholele imivuzo yeTimeshare
ISun International Vacation  Club eseSun City iyiphikankani lokwakhiwa kabusha kokwabela ngesikhathi kwemivuzo.

Umvuzo obizayo owutholayo, ukubuyiselwa ingxenye yemali oyikhokha kokuqala yobulunga ngonyaka ka 2012,  Omunye umvuzo ukunganqunyelwa esontweni elithile onyakeni. Okunye okuhle kokwengeza ukuthi ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club kushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, ngako konke izakhamizi ezingakuthola njengezivakashi zeSun City Resort.

Umqondo omusha womvuzo okungabhekwa kuwo - iTripple Ripple, yengezela ubungako bamalunga. Ubulunga buyatholakala ngenani elincane nje elingango R3 900 kanye nomvuzo womqondo omusha okungabhekwa kuwo kuyanezezela ebungakweni  bobulunga. Ubulunga  bungenziwa buzikhokhele bona. Kungumgomo weTripple Ripple. Amalunga ahlonyeliswa ngo R300 ngokujoyinisa ilunga ngalinye elisha bese futhi kuba omunye uR300 ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe ngalezizaziso bese futhi ngelunga ngalinye elisha elijoyiniswe esigabeni sesithathu somjikelezo. Uma, njengesibonela ilunga liletha amakhasimende amasha amathathu okuthi nawo futhi angenise namathathu, okuthi nalawo ajoyinise amanye amathathu, lokho kukonke kusuke kuzoba umklomelo wesheke lika R11 700.

Abahambi bamaholide sebesheshe babona konke okutholakalayo eVacation Club kanti onyakeni wokuqala besemakethe, amaphesenti angu 65 ama-module adayiswa ngokushesha. Lokhu kwaba yinkomba yempumelelo enkulu embonini yokwabelana ngesikhathi. Ubulunga beVacation Club bungukuzikhethela eyodwa emiselwe kwangu 11, ama-module obulunga bezikhathi ezinkulu  noma elilodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (kubalwa ubusuku bangoMsombuluko kuya koLwesine) noma elilodwa kwangu 41 amasonto (uLwesihlanu kuya eSontweni nobusuku bakhona) ama-module obulunga noma kokubili, okukunikeza ubulunga obuvikelekile iminyaka engu 16, Inani lobulunga liya ngokwenyuka kusukela ku R3 900 emasontweni akhululekile obulunga ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780-7684.




ISouth African Timeshare isibe bukhali umhlaba wonke
Imboni ephethwe ngezandla ezinobuciko inikeza okuphephile, okubiza kancane kubafaki zimali bamaholide, bathi abahambi maholide bazitholele ithuba lokuzijabulisa ngendlela abangayikhona unyaka wonke eNingizimu Afrika nangokwengezwa kwamathuba okukwazi ukushintsha izindawo zangaphakathi ngezangaphandle uhamba, ebebengeke bakwazi ukukwenza nanganoma iyiphi indlela abebengayizama. Lokhu ngumbono kaLoraine Rimmer, uMpathi wemakethe nokudayisa kwayo wezindawo ezinkulu zokulala zokwabelana ngesikhathi zeSun International, iVacation Club eseSun City. Izindlu ezinobukhazikhazi ongaziphekela kuzo zathuthukiswa iSun International ukunikeza imindeni ithuba lokujabulela zonke izinto ezidumile ezitholakala endaweni yokuvakasha - kusukela kwezinye izinto zemvelo ezibukwayo eNingizimu Afrika kweseduze iPilanesberg National Park kuya kwemangalisayo  nedumile iValley of Waves.

UNkosikazi Rimmer uthi abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika banamasonto abomvu endaweni yokuvakasha iGold Crown njengeVacation Club ingakwenza, ngokwe RCT, banokufanayo okuphakeme okulinganiswa nokomhlaba wonke okuzindawo zokulala. IRCT inezindawo ezingaphansi kwayo ezingu 3 500 zokuvakasha. Abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika banokukwabelana ngesikhathi ezweni labo bese bethola noba namaholide aphesheya kwezilwandle, njengoba bekhokhela amanani abo ngamarandi, eNingizimu Afrika, ukuqhathanisa izindawo zokulala zaphesheya kwezilwandle, kusho yena. "Amanani akhokhwa ngamadola noma ngopondwe akazovunyelwa."

Ukwabelana ngesikhathi eNingizimu Afrika sekube kudala kakhulu, kusho uNkosikazi Rimmer, kanti futhi abathengi baqinisekiswa ukuphepha kokuthenga kwabo ngokusebenza nezinhlangano ezinamalekhodi ahloliwe, kanye nalabo abasebenzela iTimeshare Institute yeNingizimu Afrika (TISA) - inhlangano enamazinyo, enokusebenza kwayo okunomthetho oqinile okutholakala kubasebenzi bayo. Ukwengeza, imboni yazisaukukalwa okubalwa kuko isikhathi esipholile emva kokuthenga. Uyakugcizelela lokhu, ukuthi ukwabelana ngesikhathi ngaso sonke isikhathi kumele ibukwe njengokutshala izimali emaholidini nasekuzijabuliseni, ayi njengokutshala izimali ukuqala ibhizinisi. "Iqinisekisa ukuthi umndeni, njalo ngesikhathi esizayo, uzoqhubeka ukukwazi ukuba namaholide ngenani ongakwazi ukulikhokha - yikho ukubuyiselwa lokhu kwabathengi abangathembela kukho".

IVacation Club, kusho yena, isinikeze ukuthengwa kokwabelana ngesikhathi esikhathini esinqunyiwe onyakeni ka 2012, ngalesosikhathi uhhafu onamaphesenti angu 50 othenge ngawo uyobuyiselwa kuwe. " Kuncike ezinhlelweni eyakhiwe ngazo, isikhathi esiphelele sokwabelana ngesikhathi sibalelwa eminyakeni engu 15. Ngokunikeza isikhathi esinqunyiwe sobulunga, sicabangela isikhathi esingukuthi abanikazi bazofuna ukwehlisa izidingo zabo, bese sibanikeza okunye ukuzikhethela okulula. Lokhu kusebenza kakhulukazi ezinhlanganweni ezithatha ukwabelana ngesikhathi ukusebenzisa ngemivuzo yokusebenza kwabasebenzi babo. IVacation Club, kusho yena, inikeza izinto ezinkulu ngezigaba eziningana. Njengokwengqalasizinda zeSun International esibe sendaweni vele, izinto zevacation Club zidayiswa ngokwenani elincane ngango R15 000 ngezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala esikhathini sokuqala esingu 11 esinqunyiwe, ama-module onokulunga esikhathi esikhulu (iPhasika kanye namaholide ezikole kaJulayi). Noma kunjalo, kulabo abancamela ukungakhokhi ukheshi ngesikhathi kukhona inzalo ongakwazi ukuyikhokha ukuzikhethela kuyona. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7000.




ISun City Vacation Club - Impendulo ekungcebelekeni kwamaholide asebusika

Njengoba ulele uzibhabhalele phakathi negceke ne G & T eceleni kwakho kanye nenoveli esanda kukhiswa kaJohn Grisham inamathele ezandleni zakho, njengoba ujusi wemithamo otshwala besilungu ijini yehla ngomphimbo kanye nephunga lezoso nokwamasika ase-Afrika lithusa amakhala akho, uyacabanga - kumnandi ukuba sekubaleleni kwelanga laseNingizimu Afrika. Ukuphi? ESun City Vaction Club.

ISun City Vacation Club ikunikeza  njalo njalo, indawo yokulala ongayikhona yomndeni wakho wonke emsebenzini wokuqala wentuthuko yezokwabelana ngesikhathi. Kuhlanganisa ubulunga bekilabhu obungcono futhi obaqanjwa ngomqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi ngazo zonke izinto ezinhle zokuba isakhamuzi semangalisayo ngobuhle indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City.

ISun City ikunikeza injabulo engapheliyo! Njengoba ibhola lakho lindizela phansi kwavulekile amabala ekhosi yegalofu yaseNingizimu Afrika enothile - ikhaya leMillion Dolla Golf Challenge, umndeni wakho nawo uyajabula uhamba ushona phansi nge-Big 5 kweseduzane iPilanesberg National Park.  Abaqhaphi bendawo yokugcina kwemvelo batholakala ehotela eSun City abanikeza abahlali ukuzikhethela okuningi okushisekisa indawo. ISun City inikeza ngisho amalunga amancane omndeni wakho  - iKamp Kwena, isizinda zokuzithokozisa esihlelwe ngendlela ehlukile ukudlala izingane zeminyaka yonke.

Ukubonakala kalufifi kokushona kwelanga, umndeni wakho uqoqene uzungeze indawo yokosa. Sekuyisikhathi sokuvumelana. Usuthole indawo enhle ngokumangalisayo elungele zonke izidingo zomuntu. Impilo yasebusuku yaseSun City iyankenketha kanti wena kanye nomkakho ningazibhudukeza ngokukhululeka ngayo yonke indlela, okungenzeka ukuthi ukuyengeka komshini wamaphupho noma okuvusa amadlingozi iRoulette Table, noma ubusuku obunothando kakhudlwana ngaphandle lapho onokuzikhethela kwezindawo ezithengisa ngokudla ezisukela kwezinokudla komhlaba zeHarlequins kuya kwethe cosololo i-Ochird. Ngesikhathi ujabulela impilo ephakeme, umgadi wengane uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zakho ziphephile.

Unokuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu zokulala ezinamakamelo amathathu noma amabili. Iyinye inesilungiso moya kanye negumbi lokuphumula, ijalidi elingaphakathi elivulekile langasese kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu ezinezisefo. Usofa ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Ubulunga beVacation Club butheswa ngokukhetha eyodwa kwezingu 11 ezinqunyiwe. Ama-module esikhathi esikhulu, noma eyodwa yezimpelasonto ezingu 41 ezikhululekile (ubusuku boLwesihlanu kuya kobeSonto bubaliwe), okugcina ubulunga bube obeminyaka engu 15, kuze kube unyaka ka 2012. UKUTHOLA ULWAZO OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.







Isun International yakha ihotela elisha
ISun International yakha ihotela elisha ukuthuthukisa indawo yokuvakasha osebeni lomfula iZambezi, iVictoria Falls, neZambia. Intuthuko yeSun International eseZambia yamahotela amabili aseMosi -Oa-Tunya National Wildlife park ithatha indawo engangamahectare angu 46 bese iphetha emfuleni iZambezi ebhekene nemagalisayo iVictoria Falls - "intuthu edumayo".

IVictoria Falls yaziwa njengenye yezindawo zemvelo ezimangalisayo kweziyisikhombisa zomhlaba, kanti futhi isibizwe ngeWorld Heritage Site ngu UNESCO, lokho okuqinisekisa ukubaluleka kwayo kwezemvelo okube okunye kwezinto ezinkulu ezibukwayo. Isiko lokunakelela kanye nenhlonipho yendawo kungena endaweni yonke ngayo yonke into kwezentuthuko. Umphakathi wendawo ezibaliwe kuzo zonke izigaba, kusukela ekufakeni isandla ekuqedweni kweyemvelo esezingeni lomhlaba , ukusebenzela amahotela uma eseqediwe. Amathuba okuzidalela amabhizinisi azoqalwa ngengxa yokuxhaswa okuningi kwemisebenzi okuzodingeka, kanjaloke kunikwa amandla izakhamuzi zaseZambia kanye nokunikwa amandla oxhaso emnothweni wendawo ovele ukhona. Amahotela amabili ohlobo oluphambili akha isizinda sawo sokuhlelwa kwawo okukhulu. Kukhona ihotela lohlobo lwe-four-star lemihlangano emikhulu kanye neliqukethe izinto zolwazi lomhlaba lohlobo lwe-five-star ihotela, azongezelwa uxhaxha lohla lwama-villas azimele anobukhazikhazi obungefaniswe, ohlobo lwe-five-star entuthukweni ezayo. Ihotela ngalinye lihlelwe ukuba lihlabe umxhwele emikhakheni eyehlukene yezimakethe zezokuvakasha, kanye nentuthuko, esewonke azokwakha isiqongo sikanxantathu omangalisayo wezindawo zokuvakasha e-Afrika. Amanye amaphuzu amabili kanxantathu kuzuba iSun City eseduze neGoli kanye nehotela iTable Bay eliseKapa, okusho ukuthi anikeza inhlanganisela yokuhehayo okuzoqinisekisa ukuhuha okungafaniswa kwabavakashi ngasengxenyeni eseningizimu yezwe. ISun International ikholelwa ukuthi indawo yokuvakasha eseVictoria Falls yakha umgwaqo wokuxhumana phakathi neNingizimu ne-Afrika kanye nezwe lonke lase-Afrika. Amahotela amasha aseZambia  azinenezelwa isizinda sabavashi bosuku, indawo ethengisa ngokusha enesigqi esimangalisayo kanye nedawo ethengisa ngotshwala, nesizinda semicimbi yendabuko, ikhasino encane kanye nesizinda semihlangano emikhulu esishitshekayo futhi esinezinto zomhlaba esizonikeza zonke izinto kusukela kwenesigqi imicimbi, kuya emihlanganweni emikhulu yosaziwayo bezazi ezihlangene ezakho konke okudingekayo okuyimpahla yezobuchwepheshe yohlobo oluphambili ngokumangalisayo. Ngengxa yohla lwezinto ezikhona, imisebenzi kanye nokwenziwayo ngaphakathi, intuthuko yeSun International izonikeza izinhlobonhlobo zezidingo ezishintshekayo zibe yilokhu umuntu akufunayo, futhi kuzodonsa izivakashi kusukela kubahambi abasebancane nemindeni kuya emaqenjini adinga okuningi kanye nabavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe, abakhetha kuphela okunobukhazikhazi bodwa. Ukubekisa indawo kuzokwenziwa umhlaba wonke ngokwe "Fidelio", ukuxhumana ngezamakhompuyutha  ezikuxhumanisa nendlela eyona yona yokubekisa indawo yeSun International. Ezokwakha nezokuhlobisa zizothatha isiko namafa kwabantu baseZambezi Valley, ukwazisa izimpande ezikudonsela emumva emlandweni wakudala. ETHANDWAYO I-FOUR STAR elinye lamahotela lizoba uhlobo lwe-three-star, ihotela elinamagumbi angu 216 lihlaba umxhwele kakhulu ezithunyweni zemihlangano emikhulu.

Indawo elikuyo enhle ngokumangalisayo, ongajikijela itshe lisuka kwemangalisayo iVictoria Falls, sekushisekele abakhi ukuthi bachaze okungafaniswa nokushintshashintshayo okutholwa izivakashi. Umphumela ulinganisa ibala elivundileyo phakathi kogwadule kukho konke okuhambisanayo nendawo evulekile yase-Afrika. Ukushanela kwezindlu ezinezitezi ezimbili ezinakho konke zamukela ilanga ngezindawo zazo ezingaphandle zangasese zezoso. Ngaphandle, imibala yomhlaba iyamangalisa futhi ithambile. Ngaphakathi, izindlu ezivulekile ezinomyango ziyaphila ngemibala yazo egqamile yesizwe ebomvu, eluhlaza kanye nesawolintshi. Ezinye izidingo ezinenezelwe zibandakanya isilungiso moya esizimele, umabonakude onemibala wesatellite, usofa ogoqekayo, isisefo esincane kanye nocingo. Imishini yokuthenga iyatholakala yonke indawo lapho abantu bengathenga khona eduze kwezindlu zabo iziphuzo ezibandayo, kanye nokudlana okulula. Indawo yokwamukela ephakathi nendawo izokunika indawo ethengisa ngokudla esezingeni eliphezulu nenobungane nomdneni, enomculo, enendawo ethengisa ngotshwala, enezoso ezoselwa ngaphandle kanye nendawo yokuzithokozisa echithekele ngaphezu kwezingadi zemvelo. Isizinda sokunakekelwa kwezingane phakathi kosuku, engumcabango oyizulu wezingane zonke wamaholide, naso sizotholakala eduze kwehotela, sinika abazali isikhathi esiningi senkululeko ukuzitholela bonke ubuhle bendawo obuhehayo. I-FIVE STAR SOPHISTICATION, ihotela lesibili kuzoba i5 star, ihotela elinamagumbi anobukhazikhazi angu 173 ulwazi lwalo lwezinto zomhlaba oluzonconywa abavakashi bamazwe ngamazwe kanye nosomabhizinisi. Amagumbi okulala awuhlobo lwezitezi ezimbili, athatha umsuka wesitayela seVictoria esinothileyo, okusafanele sibonwe ezindlini ezinomusa zaseLivingstone. Uhla lulunye lunezindlu ezingu 10 ezinesilungiso moya esakhelwe phakathi, ezinikeza izindawo ezivulekile ezihlelwe kahle phezu kodonga nezezoso, bese ujabulela ukubukeka okumangalisayo kokubhekana neZambezi River kanye nokubukeka kanye kanye okumangalisayo kwentuthu edumayo. Okugqugquzelwe izinhlu ezinhle zesikhathi sikaVictoria, ulwazi namakhono ezokwakha athatha umoya ongafaniswa nalutho olunye woverandi abakhulu kanye nokushuba kwakho, izindawo zokuziphumulela ezingaphakathi zipholiswe ngamafeni azwingayo kanye nokukhaya kwephansi nophahla ukukhiphela ngaphandle ilanga lasemini. Zonke izindlu zizoba nomabonakude onesatellite, umsakazo kanye nevideo, ibar encane, isisefo esincane kanye nocingo olunemishini yokushiya nokwamukela umlayezo futhi olunesicupho sokukuvusa. Ukubukeka okumangalisayo komfula kuzojatshulelwa kusukela endaweni ephakathi enkulu yokwamukela, bese kuthi ukubukeka kanye kanye kwezwe kuzotholakala kwezinye izindawo zomphakathi. Indawo ethingisa ngotshwala neyokuphumula ngaphansi kophahla lotshani oluvulekile kuzopholiswa ukuzwinga okuthulile kwe-punkahs, bese kuhlotshiswe okuluhlaza okuhambisana nakho, okusakhilimu, kanye ne-ebony. Ngezihlalo zayo ezintofontofo ongabeka kuzo izingalo zakho emaceleni neziphansi zenze efana neyaseTheki iLounge ezobekwa ukujabulela itiye eliphambili elingenasici noma ulinge ngaphezu kwewayini noma usigazi. I-a la carte Restaurant izothatha izinga elifanayo eliphezulu lomsebenzi bese ivulwa koVeranda abavulekile abanezihlalo ezakhiwe ngokuphuma kwamanye amazwe, izihlalo ezibunjwe ngensimbi kanye namatafula akhona, izitshalo eziwubukhazikhazi zegonothi.
