"Ihotela leFive Star, kanye nokumangalisayo ukubukeka kwemendlela, ekunika okunye okumangalisayo kwase-Afrika kulabo abafuna ubuhle obedlulele kanye nezinga eliphezulu labakuthola enjabulweni yabo. Sihlose ukunikeza izivakashi zethu ngehotela elicolekile eliseVictoria Falls. Sesikutholile okusezingeni eliphezulu ePalace, ehotela iTable Bay kanye naseZimbali Lodge kanti futhi kwakungeyena umaqondana nje ukuthi iPalace ivotelwe ukuba ehamba phambili e-Afrika kanye neyesithupha emhlabeni," kusho uPhillip Georger, uDivisional Director: wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International. Okunye okuthintekayo izindawo zezibukeli zangasese ezingu 5 eziseduze kwechibi lokubhukuda, esithekile endaweni engaphandle ngezindwangu ezithambile, iyinye inezihlalo okwazi ukubeka izingalo emaceleni kanye namatafula ezinceku angamathileyi bese zimbozwe phezulu ngezibani ezinokukhanya okuningi. Lezizindawo zezibukeli zingaqashwa ngosuku .

ICONVENTION CENTRE, iConvention Centre, ihlangene nendawo yokuphumula yehotela leFour-star, izoba indawo enezinto zomhlaba kanye neshisekileyo ekwazi ukungenisa izinhlobonhlobo zemicimbi yamazwe ngamazwe eminingi kanye namadili athize okubalulekile. Indawo yayo enkulu yomdanso ingangenisa abantu abayela ku 550 behleli ngesitayela sasetheatre, nabangu 450 behleli ngesitayela sendlu yesikole bese kuba abangu 350 behlezi ngesitayela sedili. Ukunakekelwa okuzimisele nokomuntu ngamunye ngabasebenzi beqembu le-convention bazoqinisekisa futhi ukuthi yonke imicimbi ingekhumbulekayo, engenankinga futhi ukuzitholela ulwazi oluthile ngenjabulo. I-BOMA, iBoma yoqobo, ehlotshiswe ngemisebenzi yezandla yohlobo lomdabu lwaseZambia, izongenisa abantu abayela ku 350 yobusuku obungasoze bakhohleka ngaphansi kwezinkanyezi. Lendawo ingabekiselwa imicimbi yangasese yamaqembu noma abahlukaniseke emihlanganweni emikhulu. ISIZINDA SEZIVAKASHI ZOSUKU, izivakashi eziningi zosuku ezitheleka ukuzoncoma iVictoria Falls yezimanga zizoncoma ukunakekelwa kweDay Visitor Centre okuzoba ingxenye yezentuthuko yeSun International, futhi ezogqugquzela kahle kakhulu ukwenyuka kwenani labavakashi ukuvakashela lelicala laseZambia lweFalls. Uhla olubanzi lokusetshenziselwa ukubekisa luzoba khona kubavakashi abasuka ekuzikhetheleni kwe "one-stop" yomsebenzi wezokuxhumanisa ezokuvakasha.

Zonke izinto ezenziwayo ezihlanganyele neVictoria Falls, iZambezi River kanye nedolobha laseLivingstone zizophathwa kusukela lapha ngabaxhumanisi abahloliwe abakwaziyo ukuhlangabezana nezinhlelo zokuba ngochwepheshe kanye nokuphepha. Izinto zokuzithokozisa ezitholakalayo zizobandakanya ukuhlenga emanzini emhlophe, ukujubela emanzini, ukungcebeleka ngokushona kwelanga, ukushayela ubuka indawo, ukubuka izinyoni kanye nokugibela amabhayisikili. Izivakashi zizokwazi futhi ukuthola ulwazi lwezinto ezikwamanye amapaki ezwe laseZambia. I-ADVENTURE BAR, iDay Visitor Centre's Adventure Bar kanye nendawo yokudla kuzoba lapho kukhona, indawo yokuhlangana kanye nezinto zokuzehlukanisa kubavakashi abasebancane kwezokuvakasha kanye nalabo abalambele konke ukuzijabulisa, buka ama-video omuntu ngamunye ezinto abezenza emfuleni, jabulela ama-video emidlalo yamazwe ngamazwe, xoxa futhi wabelane ngokutholile kosuku. IKHASINO, inxanxathela yekhasino encane izokunikeza izivakashi zendawo kanye nezivakashi zosuku. Izoba nemishini yokudlala engu 77, kanye nemangalisayo indawo ethengisa ngotshwala ezothengiza ngeziphuzo, itiye nekhofi. UPhillip Couvaras - uMphathi jikelele
UPhillip Couvaras - uMphathi jikelele wezindawo zokuvakasha eziseSun International Zambia. NgokukaPhillip Couvaras owazalelwa eZambia, aphinde akhethwe njengomphathi jikelele wezindawo zokuvakasha zeSun International eZambia eseduze kweVictoria Falls isibe njengokufika ekhaya.Yize noma yena qobo lwakhe azalelwa eLusaka, ubaba wakhe wazalelwa eLivingstone, kanti iZambia ihlale iyindawo yekhethelo enhliziyweni yakhe.

Waqala umsebenzi wakhe embonini yezokunakekela ngokuqeda amakhozi ezifundo zakhe zeminyaka emithathu zokuba ngumphathi neHoliday Inn, eNingizimu Afrika. Wabe esejoyina ihotela iWild Coast, I-Casino & Country Club ngoyaka ka 1982, wabe esesebenza umsebenzi wakhe njalo eminyangweni eyehlukene. Ngonyaka ka 1984 waqeda amakhozi ezifundo zasehotela angu 8 eCornel University eseUSA. Ngo 1986 washintshelwa eMabatho Sun njengomphathi wengxenye yezamagumbi. Emva konyaka wabuyela eWild Coast Sun ukuyosiza ukuqalwa kohlelo lokunwetshwa olwathatha izigidi ezingu 800 zamarandi, kwase kuthi ngo 1994 wakhushulelwa esikhundleni sokuba ngumphathi wehotela jikelele.

Inkolelo yakhe yangempela igxile ezingeni lokusebenza eliqinisekisa wonke umsebenzi wokunakekela otholwa izivakashi kuholela ekunikezeni abasebenzi bakhe amandla kuwo wonke amazinga. Futhi uyindoda esebenza ngeqembu, ekholelwa kakhulu ekutheni "thina" ekuhleni izinto kunokuthi athi "mina" okungukuphatha komuntu yedwana. Ekuqaleni konyaka ka 1997 waqeda i-Executive Management Development Programme eNyuvesi yaseKapa esikoleni sabaneziqu sezamabhizinisi, kanti futhi unyaka usuphela waqeda uhlelo olufanayo e-International Institute for Managemant Development eSwitzerland. Lokhu kwalandelwa izinyanga ezungeza umhlaba ukuthola ulwazi kwamanye amahotela acolekileyo amazwe ngamazwe ngaphambi abuyele e-Afrika ukuzobhekana nentuthuko yendawo yokuvakasha eseSun International eZambia.

I-ZPA imemezela ukudayisa kweMosi-Ao-Tunya kwisun International


I-Zambian Privatisation Agency (ZPA) imemezela ukudayiswa kwe Mosi-Ao-Tunya  Inter-Continental Hotela kanye neRainbow Lodge kwiSun International (Zambia) Limited.

I-Zambian Privatisation Agency (ZPA) imemezela ngenjabulo ukuthi ungqongqoshe wezezimali, uHon Katela Kalumba, ungqongqoshe wezokuvakasha, uHon Anoshi Chipawa, sebesayinde i-Asset Vesting and Development Agreement esiqedela ukudayiswa kweLivingstone's Mosi-Ao-Tunya Inter-Continental Hotel neRainbow Lodge kwiSun International (Zambia) Limited.


Lokhu kulandela ukuphetha kwezingxoxo ezibe yimpumelelo kanye nokucaciseleka okutholakale kummeli jikelele. Kwaphumelela emva kokuhlangana kanye nohlelo lokuhlehlisa elibandakanya ongqongqoshe abangu 10 bakahulumnei kanye nabeminyango nabaphathi abahlukene bezimboni.

Ukudayiswa kuzophumelelisa enye yezinhloso zeZPA enkulu yokukhuphula izinga lokutshalwa kwezimali ezweni, kanti futhi lizovumela iLivingstone ukuzitholela ukubaluleka kwayo okusemqoka ekugcineni kwezokuvakasha. 
Isivumelwano soxoxiswana ngoMnumzane Hakainde Hichilema, iChief Executive yeGrant Thornton nosihlalo weqembu lokuxoxisana. Wayesizwa nguMnumzane Willie Mubanga wePermanent Chambers kanye noMnumzane Enzilo Rossi, umcwaningi wemboni yamahotela, njengommeli nomxhumanisi kakhulukazi weqembu lokuxoxisana.

I-ZPA Board yanika isichibiyelo sezingxoxo eqenjini elalixoxa lihlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukudayiswa kwehotela kanye nesivumelwano seRainbow Lodge kuzoxhasa intuthuko yengxenye yezokuvakasha kakhulukazi eLivingstone jikelele.



ISun International (Zambia) Limited yaphumelela ezicelweni zayo zokuthenga lezindawo zozimbili, okwakubekwe ngapahnsi kwamathenda ahlukene ngoMashi ka 1998.

ISun International yabophezeleka ngomthetho ukuhola i-Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA), okwathatha kusukela ngoMashi ka 1998 kuay kuDesemba ka 1998. Le EIA yanikezelwa kwi-Environmental Council yaseZambia yase iyaphunyeleliswa yibo futhi ngoDesemba ka 1998. Okwalandela lokukuphunyeleliswa, iSun International kanye nohulumeni bakwazi ukuqhubeka esiphethweni sezinqumo ezibalulekile nezivumelwano.

Igama leMosi-Ao-Tunya Inter-Continenatl Hotel kanye nesivumelwano seRainbow Lodge kwashintshelwa ekuthathweni kwemadola aseUS u$5 650 000. Intuthuko ngabakwaSun International izodlondlobalisa imboni yezokuvakasha kanti futhi izogqugquzela izimboni ezixhasayo: abafakeli bokudla kanye neziphuzo, umnyango wezokuthutha, umsebenzi wezigijimi kanye nabazokwenza umsebenzi ofana nokuhlanza izingubo, ukuhlanza komiswe ngesikhathi kwezingubo, ukulahlwa kukadoti, njalo njalo.

Imivuzo ebhekiwe yezomnotho kulentuthuko yaseSun International ikhonjiswe yiGrant Thornton Kessel Feistein njengokulandelayo:-

1.Imisebenzi eqondile nengaqondile ewu 6 500 izoqhamuka esikhathini esingangeminyaka emibili sokwakha ngonyaka ka 2000.


2. Ngoyaka ka 2005 (iminyaka emihlanu yokusebenza), amathuba emisebenzi eqondile nengaqondile izoba senanini lika 8 400 labantu baseZambia, kubalwa imikhakha ye "ripple effect" kanye nowe "knock-on effect". (amathuba okuqashwa okuqondile aqhamuka emsebenzini wokufakelwa kwempahla eqondile, izimpahla kanye nokwenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zendawo ngokomsebenzi wayo. Amathuba emisebenzi engaqondile ahlobene nokuphindaphindwa ngomsebenzi aqhamuka ezimbonini ezifakela imisebenzi kanye nempahla).

3. Ukuqonda nokungaqondi kanye nokuchithwa kwezimali okwehlisiwe ngesikhathi sokwakha kwamadollar ayizigindi ezingu 92 ase-US kanye nayizigidi ezingu 19 intela ngesikhathi seminyaka emibili sentuthuko kuyalinganiswa.

4. Uma umsebenzi wokuqala ukusebenza indawo yokuvakasha okuqondile, okungaqondile, kanye nokuhehayo ukufakelwa kwi GDP yaseZambia ngonyaka ka 2001 (unyaka wokuqala wokusebenza) kulinganiselwa ezigidini zamadollar ezingu 50 zenyuka ziya kwezingu 90 ngonyaka ka 2003, bese kuba ezingu 104 ngonyaka ka 2005.

5. Ngasohlangothini lwezentela nokukhokhwayo, umklamo uzofaka izigidi zamadollar ezilinganiselwa ku 15 enteleni engenayo kuhulumeni onyakeni wesibili wokhwakha ( u2000), yenyuka iya ezigidini ezingu 20 zamadollar ekwakhiweni konyaka wesibili wenxanxathela yendawo bese kuba ezingu 27 onyakeni wesihlanu wokwakha.

6. Iminyaka emithathu emva kokwakhiwa (ngo 2003), ukunyuka kweGDP yaseZambia izoba ngelinganiselwa ezigidini zamadollar ase-US ezingu 17.

7. Ngonyaka ka 2003, abavakashi abengeziwe abazodonswa iZambia kanye nedawo yaseSun International yokuvakasha izoba nenani elilinganiselwa ku 85 000 ukulingana nenani lonyaka labavakashi abaphuma ngaphandle bonyaka okungaphezu kwamaphesenti angu 16 ngonyaka kusukela kulomklamo wodwa.



8. Ukwabela okubanzi kobunikazi kuzoholela ekusabalaleni kweLusaka Stock Exchange kanye nasekubandakanyeni kwemikhakha yaseZambia.

Umvuzo obalulekile owahlonyuliswa iSun International ukusebenza okukhululekile kokulanda ezokwakha zakwamanye amazwe kanye nempahla ebiza izigidi zamadollar ase-US angu 33 - lapho abakhiqizi baseZambia bengeke bakwazi ukukhiqiza ngemali efanayo, nezinga elifanayo, nenani kanye nokufika kwempahla ngesikhathi okulinganayo. ISun International neChilinga Cement bayaxoxisana ukuthenga usemende ngenxa yalesimo.

ISun International futhi isincenge uhulumeni, futhi yakuthola ekufunayo, ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo izokwazisa bese idlulisa ushintsho olwehlukene ekwehleni kwezimali kwaseZambia okuzoba nomphumela omuhle embonini yezokuvakasha isiyonke.

I-ZPA iyajabula ngezinga lokuzithemba elikhonjiswe iSun International ekusaseni leZambia, futhi iyethemba ukuthi  kuzohamba indlela ende ukuthuthukisa ukukhula komnotho waseZambia. I-ZPA futhi iyathemba ukuthi lomsebenzi uzoheha abatshali zimali abaningi ukutshala izimali zabo eZambia.

Isimemezelo sokusakaza esihlangene
Isimemezelo sokusakaza esihlangene phakathi kweZambia Privatization Agency neSun International kwiSun International Development eseVictoria Falls, eLivingstone, eZambia. Intuthuko yeSun Interntional yamahotela amabili aseMosi-Oa-Tunya National Wildlife Park, eseduze kweVictoria Falls, ezungezwe uhla olubanzi lwezinto kusukela kwi-Environmnet Impact Assessment, izonikeza uhlazo olubonakalayo kwezokuvakasha zaseZambia okuzokwenzeka ngonyaka ka 2001, unyaka wokuqala wokusebenza kwendawo yokuvakasha.

Esikhathini sokwakhiwa ngonyaka ka 2000, izigidi zamadollar ase-Us ezingu 69 zizongena ngokuqondile nangokungaqondile kwiZambia Gross Domestic Product (GDP). Emva kokuthi ivulelwe umphakathi, ezinye izingidi zamadollar ase-US ezingu 50 zizokwenabela emnothweni wesizwe ngonyaka ka 2001 (unyaka wokuqala wokusebenza kwendawo), yenyukela ezigidini ezingu 90 zamadollar ngonyaka ka 2003 (unyaka wesithathu wokusebenza kwendawo) bese kuba ezingu 104 izigidi zamadollar ngonyaka ka 2005 (unyaka wesihlanu wokusebenza). Lomklamo uzobe usukhuphule iGDP ngamaphesenti angu 2,5 ngonyaka ka 2002 kanye nangu 3.3 ngonyaka ka 2005. Esikhathi sokwakhiwa, lomklamo uzoveza imisebenzi engu 6 500 eqondile nengaqondile. (Amathuba okuqashwa okuqondile aqhamuka emsebenzini wokufakelwa kwempahla eqondile, izimpahla kanye nokwenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zendawo ngokomsebenzi wayo. Amathuba emisebenzi engaqondile ahlobene nokuphindaphindwa ngomsebenzi oqhamuka ezimbonini ezifakela imisebenzi kanye nempahla). Ngonyaka wokuqala wokusebenza ka 2001, indawo yezokuvakasha izoqamba imisebenzi ebalelwa kwengu 4 500 eqondile nengaqondile eZambia. Lelinani linganyuka lize lifike kwengu 8 400 ngonyaka ka 2005 (unyaka wesihlanu wokusebenza). Lamanani asuka ocwaningeni lwakamumva lukaGrabt Thornton Kessel Feinstein. Likhombisa ukubaluleka kwemivuzo yezomnotho yezentuthuko ngemibona yamahotela ngeSun International, okukhombisa ukuthi okunye ukwengezwa kwabavakashi abangu 85 000 bangaheheka ngasecaleni laseZambia leVictoria Falls ngonyaka ka 2003, kanti futhi lokho kunganyuka kuye kwabangu 89 000 ngonyaka ka 2005. "ISun International ingumnikazi futhi iphethe ezinye izindawo zokuvakasha emhlabeni wonke. Leliqembu selikhombise impumelelo yamazwe ngamazwe. Lokhu kubala nendawo yezokuvakasha i-Atlantic eseBahamas, indawo yokuvakasha eseSun City kanye namahotela ayo aseMauritius naseComores. Sebevele bakukhombisile ukuthi inkampani ingaxhasa kanjani ezokuvakasha zezwe ngenxa yolwazi lwayo eluthola umhlaba wonke emsebenzini wobungcweti wezokuvakasha kanye nokudayisa," kuchaza uPhillip Georges, iDivisional Director wezindawo zokuvakasha zaseSun International. " Manje sesilinga ukunikeza uxhaso olulinganayo ngokumangalisayo emnothweni waseZambia ngokuqamba unxantathu wezindawo zokuvakasha ezinkulu e-Afrika. Lokhu kuzobandakanya kwengafaniswa nalutho iSun City eseduze kweGoli, ihotela iTable Bay eliseKapa kanye nesiqongo sayo, enye indawo engafiniswa nalutho yezokuvakasha ngaphandle kwenye yezimangalisayo zezimanga zemvelo ezisemhlabeni - iVictoria Falls."Sihlangene nezinye izindawo ezimnagalisayo esitebeleni saseSun International - iRoyal Swazi Sun, iZimbali Lodge, iWild Coast Sun kanye neFish River Sun - sizokunikeza inhlanganisela engafaniswa yokuhehayo bese sikulethela izivakashi eziningi ngasenxenyeni yaseNingizimu yezwekazi," kusho yena.

IHOTELA I-FOUR STAR  Lakhiwe endaweni yehotela elidala eliseMosi-Oa-Tunya kanti kungangokujikijela itshe lisuka kwemangalisayo iVictoria Falls, yindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo yehotela lemihlangano emikhulu lohlobo lwe three-star, olugubha okwendabuko kwase-Afrika. Ezokwakha, okugqugquzelwe ezilula izitayela zokwakha kwendabuko kwezindlu zodaka, sekuchaze eyehlukile ulwazi olwehlukile nolushintshashintshayo oluzotholwa izivakashi bese ludala indlela ehambisana nokuhlela izinto ngendlela yase-Afrika. Iphonsiwe phansi futhi kowombuso umhlaba, isakhiwo iyisikhumbuziso sezindonga zedolobha lakudala, ezimakwe ngemibhoshongo noshemula. Ihotela liphendula esimweni sezulu esishisayo ilanga lase-Afrika ngokuba likhula ngokuvulekela ngaphandle. Amagumbi ezivakashi avulekele ngaphandle ngasendaweni yejalidi lebhilidi ngesikhathi izindawo zokudla zona nezotshwala zichithekele ngasendaweni yechibi. Umuzwa nomphefumulo walesakhiwo esimangalisayo, wakhiwe yisixuku sezakhiwo zehotela kalula nje , ngokuba semaphandleni, ukudonsana kwalo nokwamukela kwalo.

I-FIVE STAR LUXURY HOTEL. Ihotela lesibili lizokwakhiwa lapho iRainbow Lodge kade ikhona ngaphambilini. Lendawo iseduze kwehotela lemihlangano emikhulu lohlobo lwe-three-star kanti futhi uhlobo lobukhazikhazi lwe-five-star. Ukwakhiwa kwalo okwahlukile kugqugquzelwe izindlu ezinhle nezohlobo lwesitayela esidala sendawo, izibonelo zalezo zindlu zingabonakala edolobheni eliseduzane iLivingstone. Ukwakhiwa kugcine umoya wesikhathi soveranda abakhulu nabashone phakathi abambozekile, izindawo ezingaphakathi zokuphumula ezipholiswe amafeni azwinga phezulu. Kukhona futhi nomsindo ophindaphindayo wohlobo lwendabuko lokufulela ngotshani, okuzungeze amagceke apholile bese egxumekwa ngoveranda abakhulu nabamboziwe. Lendlela iholela izivakashi ngaphansi kokulula, okubiza kancane kwe porte cochere endaweni evulekile, indawo yokwamukela engaphakathi kokumboziwe, lapho bemukelwa khona kulobubuhle besimangaliso sendalo. Kanti futhi nokubukeka kwendawo evulekile okungenwa ngakuyo kuyisimangaliso, kuvulekele ngaphesheya kwamagceke amangalisayo nawo kuya emfuleni omkhulu iZambezi kanye nokuwuzungezile kwezinkungu ezimhlophe kanye nemangalisayo iVictoria Falls. Lelihotela lizogxila esakhiweni salo esihle ngokunikeza indawo yokulala enobukhazikhazi. "Ihotela le-five-star, lizoveza kahle ukubukeka kwefalls, okukunika okumangalisayo ukubukeka kwe-Afrika kulabo abafuna okungcono nokusezingeni esikhathini senjabulo yabo. Sihlose ukunikezela izivakashi zethu ngehotela elicolekile eliseVictoria Falls. Uhlobo lwamahotela asemazingeni omhlaba afana nePalace,iCascades, iZimbali Lodge kanye nehotela iTable Bay kuzophindwaphindwa. Akukona nje ukuthi kwenzeka ngengozi iPalace ibalwe njengeyesithupha emhlabeni bese iba ngephuma phambili e-Afrika," kusho uGeorgas. Eduze neLivingstone kukhona abasebenzi njengamanje ababalelwa ku 4 000, abaningi babo abaqashwe izimboni eziwayo njengamanje. Amathuba okuziqambela amabhizinisi adalwa ukusebenza kwalamahotela amabili nakho kuzoba nempumelelo. UGeorgas uyangezelela: "Silindele intuthuko ukube ibe ngumnyango wokukhula kwezomnotho kanye nokuvuleka kwamathuba emsebenzi kulendawo". ISun International iyayazi kahle indlela yesimo sehotela iMosi-Oa-Tunya ekade ikhona, engasebenzi njengamanje. Ukuvikela ubunzima phakathi kwabasebenzi ekade besebenza phambilini balelihotela, iSun International ihlele okuzobangenela njalo ngenyanga, okusho ukuthi izobanika amathuba okuziqhubezela nokubangenisela imali. Kungokokuqala kwalenkampani kunoma yimuphi umsebenzi wayo kanti ukuvotelwa kwayo okukhulu ngokuzithemba ekuletheni indawo yokuzithokozisa. Abasebenzi ekade besebenza phambilini bazoba futhi phakathi bokuqala abazonikwa ithuba lokuthola imali ethe xaxa ngokusebenza kwezokwakhiwa kwebhilidi. Womabili amahotela amasha azokwakhiwa phakathi kweMosi-Oa-Tunya National Wildlife Park, eyabekwa ukuba yiWorld Heritage Site nguUNESCO ngo 1989. I-Environment Impact Assessment yomhlaba (EIA) ukungena ekuzibandakanyeni kwezentuthuko epaki sekuphothuliwe kwaze kwaphunyeleliswa ngabe Envinment Council yaseZambia. Okubaluleki abakufakile kulokhu kwakuvela kwiCouncil for Scientific and Industrial Research esePitoli, okwaba umsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu ekuholeni i-EIAs yaloluhlobo ezindaweni ezinedumela zase-Afrika. I-EIA isihlanganise ukukhushulwa kwezinga lwendawo ngesikhathi inokungena okuncane nengeza ngakho ebuhleni bayo bemvelo, lokho kusho ukugqugquzela ukugqama kwentuthuko ngeSun International. I-EIA ingeyokuqala futhi ohlotsheni lwayo eZambia kusukela ekunanyekweni okwenziwa yi-Environment Act ekuqaleni kuka 1997. Ukwakhiwa kuhlelwe ukuqala ngoNovember ka 1999 kanti umklamo kumele uphelile ngo-Epreli ka 2001. ISun International eseZambia isibeke eceleni u$500 000 ngokwase-US wesikhwama esizosetshenziswa ngaphakathi ukukhokhela ezenhlalakahle ezifana nemitholamphilo kanye nezinkulisa, kanye nokukhulisa izinga lwezokuvakasha eLivingstone. "Amahotela amasha azoba sezingeni eliphezulu ukuthatha umsebenzi weSun International oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Azoba futhi ingxenye yenhliziyo nomphefumulo yeLivingstone bese eba umkhulisi wezomnotho ngokumangalisayo kuyo yonke iZambia," kusho uPhillip Couvaras, uMphathi jikelele wendawo entsha yesinxanxathela sezokuvakasha zeSun International. UMnumzane Hakinde Hichilema oyiChief Executive yeGrant Thornton eZambia kanye nongusihlalo weqembu elixoxayo uthi: "Lomklamo ongobalulekile kwezamabhiznisi, ezomnotho kanye nezenhlalo yomphakathi waseLivingstone kanye nayo yonke iZambia. Izinzuzo eziningi nezahlukene ezizotholakala okubalwa kuzo ukutholakala kwemisebenzi emisha, ukungenisa emcebweni wezwe ngokwezintela kanye nokqaleka kwezimakethe ezisemazingeni aphezulu ezimpahla zaseZambia kanye neminye imisebenzi eyenziwa khona ngesikhathi sokwakhiwa bese kuthi nangesikhathi amahotela esevulwa. Akukho nokuncane ukungabaza ukuthi lomklamo ukhombisa isinyathelo sokushintsha entuthukweni yezokuvakasha eZambia, ukwengeza ekugqugquzeleni ukuqhudelana kwezifunda zezwe kanye nokuhambisana nomsebenzi kulomkhakha. "Ngokuba khona kwesizinda okususelwa kuso esinemikhakha eyehlukene okudinga ukuthi sibekwe phambili ezingxoxweni, kuyenelisa ukubona ukuthi iqembu elibonisanayo lisahlezi ekwakhiweni, ekucoliseni kanye nasekufikeni nalesivumelwano. Manje uma isivumelwano sesenziwe, ngiyazethemba ukuthi iculo lempumelelo lizoculwa ngabaningi abantu - kakhulukazi labo abazozuza ngokuqondile nangokungaqondile emsebenzini walomklamo."

ISun City - Amaqiniso Indlela eya kwenye yezindawo ezinkulu zokuvakasha emhlabeni. ISun City, engefaniswe emhlabeni wezindawo zokuvakasha, ngengxubevange yezinto ezingafaniswa nalutho olunye noma kuphi, idonsa izinkulungwane zabavakashi unyaka nonyaka emahoteleni ayo awu-4 asezingeni eliphezulu anezemidlalo ezimangalisayo kanye nezinto zokuzithokozisa kanye neyemilingo iLost City. Ingamakhilomitha angu 187 kuphela ukusuka eGoli, indawo yokuvakasha isehlathini laseNingizimu Afrika elisesifundazweni saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga, isosebeni lwechibi elithule elithe cwaka yase izungezwa emangalisayo iPilanesberg.

Ihotela iSun City lingeliholayo kunawo wonke, iPalace yeLost City konke kuthatha uhlobo lwezokwakhiwa kwayo kanye nesigqi sangaphakathi emaphusheni esizwe sase-Afrika esalahlekayo sachitheka. Iyihotela eliholayo lomhlaba bese liba ngelinye elikhulu kakhulu emhlabeni. Igumbi ngalinye lifakwe okubukhazikhazi lase lifakwa impahla yendlu eyenziwe ngezandla yegumbi ngegumbi. Amazinga ezokunakekela angaqhathaniswa futhi adlule okucolekile komhlaba kanye nezindawo zayo zokudla okumangalisayo, iCrystal Court kanye neVilla Del Palazzo kuvuselelwe. Lapho likhona phakathi neLost City, iPalace ibekwe kahle phakathi kubukhazikhazi bokutshaliwe benhle ngokumangalisayo indawo le esanda kuwina ukugqama kwezingadi zeBotanic eNingizimu Afrika. Ihotela libhekene nekhozi yegalofu yemiqhudelwano emikhulu enemigodi engu 18 yaseSun City kanye nelimangalisayo ibhishi elingaphakathi, iValley of Waves. Ipaki lamanzi elithuthukiswe ngokwedlulele emhlabeni, likhombisa okumangalisayo ukuma kwamanzi kanye nelingakaze libe khona ichibi elinamagagasi lapho ukuphakama kwawo kungangemitha elilodwa nokungu 8 kungadlalwa ngalo imidlalo yasemanzini. Imibhoshongo yehotela iCascades elinobukhazikhazi linezindawo ezithengisa ngotshwala ezimbili kanye nezimbili ezithengisa ngokudla. Ihotela iSun City, ebelingeliqavile esizindeni ngaphambilini, libekwe ezingadini ezinhle kakhulu libhekene neGary Player Golf Course, ikhasino yaseSun City kanye nekundla yemidlalo yeshashalazi yaseSun City kutholakala ehotela, phakathi kuchungechunge lwezindawo zokudla ezinikeza kokubili ukudla okucolekile nokwejwayelekile. Okubekwe khona ezingadini ezifanayo, okuseduze ngokukahle osebeni lwechibi kanye nenkundla yokudlala izingane, iSun City Cabanas, ihotela elilungele ukwamukela imindeni. Izinto ezitholakala kulo zibala nechibi lokubhukuda, izindawo ezimbili ezithengisa ngokudla kanye nezimbalwa zotshwala. Izivakashi lapha futhi zikwazi ukungena noma kuphi endaweni yokuvakasha lapho kunezinto khona zokudlala futhi zidlala imidlalo eyehlukene. Ngaphambilini indawo yezemidlalo yaseNingizimu Afrika, iSun City eyayikugcizelela, manje lowo msebenzi wemidlalo usuklonyeliswe ngamakhasino angaphakathi edolobheni, sekungatholakala e-Afrika okubandakanya ukungena eBig Five kweseduze indawo engenawo umalaleveva iPilanesberg national Park. Noma kunjalo, iSun City inamakhasino amabili ezindawo zemishini, iJungle Casino ese-Entertainment Centre kanye nenye esehotela iSun City. I-Entertainment Centre futhi iqukethe iSuperbowl enezihlalo ezingu 600, lapho uchungechunge losaziwayo bamazwe ngamazwe kubalwa kubo noFrank Sinatra wasemandulo, uSting, uBryan Adams noBill Cosby sebake babonakala. Ngaphansi kwalo uphahla olufanayo kunezindawo zokuphumula zebhingo, izindawo zokubuka izithombe, izindawo zotshwala, izitolo, ezokudla, izinto eziningi zokuzithokozisa, imishini yemidlalo yevideo, ezemidlalo kanye nozokubhejela amahhashi kanye nendawo yotshwala eshisayo. Indlu enkulu kunazo zonke, okufinyeziwe okufaniswa nokobukhosi okuhlotshiswe ngakho ngakunye okungu 800 okwenziwe ngezandla. Ingenye yezintathu futhi izindlu zakhona ezinobukhazikhazi inamakamelo amabili okulala kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili, iJacuzzi neSauna, bese kuthi ezilandelayo ngokhulu nezinkulu kunalezo ezinakho konke futhi zibe nosofa abashintshekayo, indlu yokuphumula nezindlu zokugeza. Amagumbi ezivakashi, angu 91 anemibhede emikhulukazi, angu 125 anemibhede emincane, bese kuthi amagumbi angu 51 abe nemibhede emikhulukazi kanye nosofa ashintshekayo. Kukhona amagumbi amathathu eparaplegic, wonke anempahla ukungenisa imindeni kanti futhi kukhona amagumbi angu 52 obukhazikhazi anosofa. Igumbi lilinye lifakelwe umsakazo one-remote control kanye nomabonakude onemibala onemigudu eshintsheshintshekayo, indawo yotshwala encane, kanye nesisefo. IGuestlink Interactive TV nayo isifakiwe kuwo wonke amagumbi asePalace okuvumela izivakashi ukuthi zikwazi ukungena kwi-Internet, zithole ulwazi futhi zibuke izikweletu zazo ngokusebenza kukamabonakude kanye nezithombe ezivinjiwe ezithengwayo ezinamakhebula okubukwa ngaphakathi egunjini. Wonke amagumbi anesilungiso moya, kanye nokushisa nezomiso zinwele kanye nezinto zokushefa. Ubusuku nemini kukhona izinkambo zokuhamba ubuka indawo ezingabhukhelwa eSafari Desk ehotela eSun City. Ukundiza ngebhaluni leHot-Air ngaphezu kwepaki nakho kuyatholakala. IBruno Oppe Horseriding Stables, nje ngaphansi kwechibi laseSun City, likunikeza amahhashi alungele ukugitshelwa kuwo wonke amazinga abagibeli bamahhashi. Kukhona amakhozi amabili ezingcweti zegalofu anemigodi engu 18 aseSun City. IGary Player Country Club ewubukhazikhazi ebhekene nekhozi yegalofu eseSun City, isizinda somdlalo weNedbank Golf Challenge edlalwa minyaka yonke, umqhudelwano wegalofu onomklomelo wokuqala wamadollar aseMelika ayizigidi ezimbili. Lena ikhozi yokuhamba uye kwipar 72 yomgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili. Kukhona futhi nesitolo seGolf Pro esiseGary Player Country Club. ILost City Golf Course nayo yahlelwa ngusaziwayo eNingizimu Afrika emdlalweni wegalofu, uGary Player. Lekhozi ebukekayo yepar72 iyikhozi yengqukumbane, ephelele ngokuhlelwa okunobungcweti beyekilabhu, kungukuzihambela kancane ungcebeleka usuka ePalece. Ikhombisa amaxhaphozi amanzi agcwele izingwenya eziphilayo emgodini weshumi nantathu kanti inikeza izinto ezifana neDriving Range, iTitleist Golf Academy kanye neGolf Pro Shop. IKamp Kwena etholakala eduze neCabanas, iwuhlelo olubhekwe kahle lwemidlalo yezingane ngezinsuku zamaholide ezineminyaka ephakathi kuka 3 no 12 ubudala. Kukhona izinto zokudlala iGalofu zabancane , eziseduze kwenkundla yokudla yezingane enakho konke ngasemaphethelweni echibi okuseduze neCabanas. Indlu lapho kufuywe khona iznyoni equkethe izinhlobonhlobo zezinyoni zemvelo evumela izivakashi ukuthi zibuke izinyoni ziseduze kwazo. Noma ungazitholela umlingo wezinyoni zizindizela ngokukhululeka endaweni yazo yemvelo ngezinto zakhona zokuzisiza ukuthi zindize ngokukhululeka zingaphakathi. Umhlaba wezilwane wenza izingane zizakhele ubungane ezilwaneni ezincane ezifana nebhubesi elincane, ingulube yehlathi kanye nensingizi. Ziyaphiwa ukudla nsuku zonke kusukela ngo11h00 kuqhubekela isikhathi. Okunye okusha okwengeziwe ezintweni zokudlala zezingane eziseCabanas Activity Park, okuseduze kweKamp Kwena iFinder's Keepers lapho izivakashi ezincane zimba khona ukuthi ziwine endaweni enesihlabathi esiningi ukusimba. Kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo ezingu 11, ezingu 5 zazo ezimboziwe phezulu ngophahla lwakhona. Umhlali oqeqeshiwe onikeza izifundo. Izinkundla ezintathu zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili nazo ziyatholakala, ezinePro Shop edayisa ngempahla kanye nezingubo zemidlalo. Kukhona futhi LeLawn Bowling Green. Imidlalo yamanzi eseSun City Lake ibala i-para-sailing, i-water-skiing, i-jet skis, ukugwedla ngezikebhe, ukuhamba ngamabhayisikili kanye nokuhamba ngezikebhe. Kukhona amachibi ayisithupha okubhukuda aseSun City, lilinye elehotela ngalinye, kanye nelikhulu eliseCascades kanye nelezivakashi ezivakashela ngosuku eliseValley of Waves. Ihotela ngalinye linechibi lokubhukuda lezingane. EZOKUTHUTHA, iSkytrain ehamba ngomgudu owodwa ihlanganisa indawo enkulu yokupaka izimoto esekungeneni kwaseSun City neCascades. Izinqola zamabhasi asebenzayo njalo nawo ahamba indlela efanayo. Ukusebenza kwezinqola kuyatholakala amahora angu 24 nsuku zonke kuyo yonke indawo yokuvakasha kubahlali bayo. EZOMOYA, izindiza ezixhumanisayo zisebenza uhambo lokuya nokubuya eSun City kusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza zamazwe ngamazwe esiseGoli. Uhamba luthatha cishe imizuzu engu 40. Ukuthola ukuthi asebenza kanjani namanani akhona, sicela uthintane ne-Air Link, esePilanesberg Airport. Kulenombolo yocingo: (014) 552 1844. UKUQASHWA KWEZIMOTO, I-Avis Rent-a-Car isebenza ingxenye enkundleni enkulu eseSun City, Ucingo: (014) 557 1584. IZITOLO, iSun City inehhovisi leposi, isiteshi sokugcwalisa iphethroli kanye nesiteshi sezicimamlilo. Isizinda ezingangama-square metres angu 7 000 seSun Village sitholakala eduze kwendawo yokungena yokuvakasha. I-Abbe Segal Tennis Shop, neGolf Por Shop ekhozini ngekhozi kunikeza abadlali bemidlalo, ngesikhathi isitolo seWaterworld esiseCabanas sidayisa izingubu zasebhishi ePalace of Adormant eseValley of waves. EZENHLALAKAHLE,  izindawo zokulungisa izinwele zitholakala ePalace yehotela iSun City. IHealth Spa inikeza indawo yokuzilolonga, kanye neJacuzzi, i-sauna, kanye nokuphathwa phathwa ngemumva emhlane kanye nokunakekelwa kobuhle. Indawo yokuvakasha inendawo yayo yeComputicket ongayithola kulayini kwikhompuyutha ukubekisa indawo yenkudla yezeshashalazi, eyezithombe, kanye namakhonsathi eSun City kanye nazo zonke izindawo ezinkulu eningizimu ye-Afrika. Kukhona iqembu leTotaliser Board eliseSun City, lapho ababheji bemidlalo yamazwe ngamzwe kanye nemihlangano yezemijaho kulo lonke laseNingizmu Afrika kungathathwa khona. IZINTO ZEMICIMBI NEZE-CONVENTION, izinto zemicimbi neze-convention eSun City zingezingcono kunazo zonke eziseNingizimu Afrika. Uma zonke izindlu zemihlangano eseSun City naseLost City sezihlanganiswe umsebenzi we-video, indawo yokuvakasha izokwazi ukubamba umhlangano owodwa wabantu abangu-4 300. I-Hall of Treasures elise-Entertainment Centre linezindawo ezimbili ezehlukaniswe izitebhisi ezintathu kanye neMagical Rock Garden. Ingangenisa umcimbi wengxubevange yotshwala wabantu abayela kwabangu 700. Indlu yePilanesberg ese-Entertainment Centre ingangenisa abantu abangu 900 bomcimbi wengxubevange noma abangu 750 bomcimbi okuhlezi kuwo kuzungezwe amatafula. Indlu ingahlukaniswa kabili. Endaweni yokuhamba hamba ye-Entertainment Centre kukhona iRoyal Ballroom, engangenisa abantu abayela ku 1 200 nesitayela somhlangano behlezi, noma abangu 1 200 bomcimbi ematafuleni aworawongi. ISun City iyikhaya futhi leSuperbowl, indawo ecolelke kakhulu eseNingizimu Afrika yezemidlalo, ukuzithokozisa, kanye nokuvulwa kwemikhiqizo. Indawo engaphakathi, engahlala abantu abangu 6 000, inezikhanyiso zesimanje kanye nokonyakazisa umsindo okungakaze kubonwe e-Afrika. Izindlu zemihlangano yeBoabab neJacaranda ezisehotela iSun City ziyahlukaniseka bese zingangenisa izithunywa eziyela ku 600 emcimbini wengxubevange noma abangu 350 behlezi ngesitayela somhlangano. IBoardroom yona ingangenisa phakathi kwabangu 20 kuya kwabangu 50, kuncike emcimbini nome emsebenzini. IRoyal Chambers esePalace iyindawo ephindeke kabili, ingangenisa abantu abangu 90 bomcimbi kanye nabangu 120 behlezi ngesitayela somhlangano. ICouncil Room iyiBoardroom, engahlala abangu 16. Izindle ze-Orchid neProtea zemihlangano zingangenisa abantu abayela ku 100. IWind Chimes Wedding Chapel yethu okungukuphela kwayo itholakala eBaobab Trail, okuncikene nengemumva lezintaba ezimangelengele kanye nezokwakha ezimangalisayo kwePalace yeLost City. Umakoti angahamba kulayini oyimbulungana eya kwelibabazekayo iChapel lase-Afrika elisehlathini ukuyojoyina umkhwenyana wakhe bese babophe ifindo labo. ISUN CITY VACATION CLUB, eyavulwa ngo 1996, iSun City Vacation Club isiyaziwa manje ngangamaphesenti angu 100, kanti isiphinde yendlalekela kwezinye izindawo zeSun International zokuvakasha okubalwa kuzo iWild Coast Sun, iFish River Sun kanye neRoyal Swazi Sun. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amathathu noma amabili okulala, ezinechibi lokubhukuda kanye nedawo yokosa okubhekene nezintaba zePilanesberg. Iyinye indlu inesilungiso moya sayo ngaphakathi, negumbi lokuphumula, ijalidi langasese elingaphakathi kanye nezindlu zokugeza ezimbili ezinkulu. IVacation Club inesitolo sayo esincane nokudla enikudayisela izinto ongazidinga ekugcineni ukukwazi ukuziphekela. UMark Boyd - uMphati wezentuthuko
Umark Boyd - uMphathi wezentuthuko entuthukweni yamahotela aseSun International. EMosi-Oa-Tunya National Park amandla amakhulu, ukumisela okukhulu kanye nomuzwa ophilayo wentshisekelo yomsebenzi: yikho lokhu uMark Boyd umphathi wezentuthuko weSun International, akulethayo emklamweni wehotela iMosi-Oa-Tunya.

Ngalamandla akhe okuqhuba umsebenzi awafakayo okubandakanya uhlelo lokwakhiwa lulonke, ozowina nakanjani kuzoba ezokuvakasha zaseZambia. Emva kokuba uBoyd eseqede umatikuletsheni ekolishi eKearsney eNatal ngo 1993, wayenemiqondo yokuba ngumdlali wekhilikithi okufundele. Ubaba wakhe, noma kunjalo, wayenokwehlukile. Kanjalo ke wavuma ngokungathandi ukuyofundela ukwakha ngeNational Diploma (T3) kwezokwakha eWits. EseseTechnikon, yonke imicabango yakhe eyimfihlo yokushiya emva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha ukuyozama inhlanhla yakhe ukungena kwikhilikithi yesiNgisi. Owakufika kwamisa umqondo wakhe ekugcineni kwaba ngukuthi wayedinga umfundaze ukukhokhela izifundo zakhe. Kanjalo ke, wabambeka kwiGrinaker Building, wavaleleka kwikhozi yonke eyathatha iminyaka emithathu. Ngesikhathi esesebenza ngaphandle ngokwezifundo, noma kunjalo, wathola ukuthi uyakuthokozela ukusebenzela uGrinaker njengonjiniyela wendawo leyo kanye njengemenenja wenkonitileka ezinhlotsheni eziningi zemiklamo. Iminyaka emibili eyimpoqo yokusebenzela isizawe yahlangana, ngalesosikhathi wabe esengumphathi, kanti wabe futhi esekujabulela ukuba sembuthweni - ngaphandle ngokuchitha isikhathi sakhe e-Angola noma emngceleni. Ngesikhathi esebuya, iGrinaker yanikezela ngamanye futhi amathuba ezifundo kanti kusukela ngo 1989 kuya ku 1992 bazixhasa iziqu zakhe eNyuvesi yaseWitwatersrand, lapho athola khona iziqu ze B.Sc. kwisayensi yezokwakha.

Yize noma ayemdala kunabafundi abaningi okwakwenza abuyele emumva kwezinye izindlela, wanokuba mdala ukungangani ezintweni eziningi ezazenziwa ngabanye abafundi. Kodwa wayijoyina ikilabhu yeNyuvesi yokushushuluza eqhweni kanye neyokudlala ngaphansi kwamanzi (wakwazi ukuthola okufana ne-Open Water II), wayengakucabangi ukuthi ngabe malini eholwa abangani bakhe ayefunda nabo emisebenzini abase beyenza ngaphandle. Iminyaka emibili emva kokujoyina iGrinaker, wanikwa ithuba lokungena ekuphatheni umsebenzi neGrinaker Projects & Properties. Kusho ukuthi kusukela ngo 1995 kuya maphakathi no 1998 wasebenza futhi ezinhlelweni eziningi zokuphatha nokuphatha izinkontileka, ephethe yonke into kusukela ekuqaleni kokusungulwa komsebenzi kuya ekwakhiweni kwayo indawo, ehlela ukuxhumana komsebenzi, exhumana nababebasebenzela, ehlela konke futhi ebheka nokuthi umsebenzi usezingeni yini. Wase enquma ukuthi ufuna ukungenela umkhakha wezentuthuko yena, endaweni lapho umsebenzi wakhe wezokwakha uzoba sendaweni enikeza inzuzo, kanjalo ke wajoyina iSun International. "Kwaba yindawo entsha yokufunda futhi," uyavuma, "kakhulukazi ukuhlela kweSun International kanye nezindaba zomsebenzi wayo, kodwa okujabulisa kakhulu ngenxa yesimo somsebenzi engazithola sengikuwo ngokushesha. Ukwakhiwa kwehotela lekhasino kufakela ingxenye enkulukazi ekukhuleni komnotho kuyo yonke imboni eNingizimu Afrika okwamanje, kanti kuhle kakhulu ukusebenza endaweni efana nale."

Manje konke akwenzayo kume eZambia kanye nentuthuko yeMosi-Oa-Tunya eseVictoria Falls. "Lena indawo enhle ngokumangalisayo, " kusho uBoyd "kanti inselelo yangempela iwubunyoninco ngenxa yokuthola zonke izinto zokwakha endaweni ngesikhathi esifanele ngesikhathi ubheke izinga okuvunyelwane ngalo, inani nobungako, kusukela ezindaweni zethu ezisifakela  zeNingizimu Afrika neZambia." Ngenhlanhla uBoyd usethole ukuqonda okuhle kwezidingo zomsebenzi, unehlo lokucwaninga, unolwazi olunzulu nolwanele lokuxazulula izinkinga ezingase zivele. Uhlale ekujabulela ukusebenza ngokuxhumana nabasebenzelayo, abasebenzi, kanye nabafakeli, kanti kungenzeka kube iziqu zokuthatha ngendlela enokuzotha nengenamicikilisho. Uyakwazi futhi ukukala isimo ngokushesha, athathe izinqumo ngokushesha bese futhi athumele izidingo lapho kudingeka. Ngaphandle kokuzimisela kwakhe entuthukweni yaseMosi-Oa-Tunya, usasithola isikhathi sokwenza okwakhe ... i-fly-fishing. Irekhodi lakhe lingu 3. 45 kg lecock trout, elabuye laphindiselwa emanzini ngokwemidlalo yangempela. Uyakwazi futhi ukucitha amahora ambalwa eZambezi, ezama ukwenza umsebenzi ofanayo wokubamba izinhlazi. Okwamanje obengakaze ahluleke, kodwa ngamaSonto athulile eMosi-Oa-Tunya unezinhlelo zokukushintsha konke lokho. Ukubhukuda kweScuba sekumlethele ukuxhumana nabanye abazama ukubamba oshaka ngasogwini oluseNatal, "a real adrenalism rush', kanti ukudlala emanzini ngezinhlengethwa zaseNature's Valley. "kwakumnandi kakhulu," uyakhumbula. Ngesikhathi phansi eMpumalang Kapa, wake wagxuma ebhulohweni iBloukrans. Amamitha angu 211, liphakeme kunawo wonke emhlabeni. "Ukuxhuma kokuqala kuphakeme ngaphezulu kweVictoria Falls," kusho uBoyd, "okungamamitha angu 111. Okunye ukuzitholela ulwazi futhi!

Yebo, unezithombe ukukuqinisekisa lokhu ... kanye nevideo ... kanye nesikibha sakhona. Umdlalo wokusubatha, uyazethemba kanti uyaphuma aye ngaphandle, uMark Boyd uhlose ukwenza umsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha indawo yokuvakasha eMosi-Oa-Tunya, kanti uhlose futhi ukuzijabulisa kuwo umsebenzi. ISun International Vacation Club - Elinye lamakhefana amancane empilo 
ISun International Vacation Club eseSun City ingumqondo omusha womqondo wokwabelana ngesikhathi osewuthathwe njengonempumelelo kakhulu entuthukweni yokwabelana ngesikhathi - ngokudayisa okungaphezulu kwamaphesenti angu 90 kwokudayisiwe (okumele ukwabelana ngesikhathi kwamasonto angaphezulu kuka 11 000) esikhathini esingaphezulu kweminyaka emibili nohhafu.

Yini eseyenze umklamo weSun City ube ongafaniswa neminye nonempumelelo? Kukhona amaqiniso amaningana, angakhethi ukuhambisana. Ukubala ambalwa: indawo; uhlangothi olulodwa oluphakeme lweSun International; inani; ukwakhiwa komkhiqizo, okubalwa kuwo izindlu zokuhlala ongaziphekela kuzona ezisezingeni eliphakeme. Umuntu akumele akholwe ukuphakama kwezinga leqembu eliwufundele umsebenzi walo elaqanjwa ukwakha nokumaketha lentuthuko. ISun International yawenza umsebenzi wayo kanti ihlanganyele neqembu layo eloqeqeshwe ngokusezingeni eliphezulu labathuthukisi nabadayisi abaqoqene ebantwini abayizingcweti embonini yokwabelana ngesikhathi ababa nempumelelo ephezulu ekuziphatheni kwabo okubalulekile. Ubulunga bokwabelana ngesikhathi eSun City Vacation Club bushintsha ilunga libe isivakashi, nako konke ongakuthola njengesakhamuzi endaweni yokuvakasha eSun City yezivakashi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi banayo indlela yokungena kunoma iyiphi into eyenziwayo okubalwa kuyo igalofu emakhozini emiqhudelwano emikhulu emibili - iGary Player Country Club kanye neLost City Golf Course, ibhola lomphebezo, ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, ukujima, ukugibela amahhashi, ukugibela amabhayisikili kanye nokugijima emigudwini. 

ISun City inikeza ngisho namalunga amancane omndeni wakho - iKamp Kwena, iparadesi eyakhiwe ngendlela ehlukile yemidlalo kanye nokunye okwenziywayo eKwena's Castle, khona kanye emagcekeni eCabanas: inkundla yokudlala emangalisayo, ikhaya lezilwane kanye nendawo yokudlala enako konke okudingakalayo. Ukuzihambela okufishane ungcebeleka unqamula amagceke aluhlaza eCabanas kukulethela umhlaba wenjabulo eSun - Waterworld. Ukundiza emoyeni, ukuhamba emoyeni, ukusheleleza emanzini kanye nalabo abafuna ukungcebeleka emanzini, kukhona isikebhe esikuthatha sikuzungezise ichibi ngesikhathi sokushona kwelanga. ISun City isishintshwe iminyaka eminingi yaba indawo yokuphumula yomndeni. Ngentuthuko yenxanxathela yeLost City manje isikunikeza izinto ezininginingi ezenza ikhasino ibe okunye okuhehayo.

ISun City kuphela kwenye indawo yokugcina imvelo enothile eNingizimu Afrika, iPilanesberg National Park enezinto eziningi zemvelo ngokwedlulele. Akukona nje ukuthi kune "Big 5" uma ungena ngasemnyango wayo, kodwa indawo ayinangozi kamalaleveva. Abemikhondo yepaki, batholakala ehotela iSun City, manje sebenikeza okuningi  ukuzikhethela kukho kubahlali. Uma uthanda ukufuna I"Big 5" njalo I-Exclusive Safari izokuqhamuka (Kanti okungakuthatha ebusuku nakho kuyatholakala). IRhino Hiking Trail emangalisayo nenamandla amakhulu uzoyithanda. Kulabo abafuna injabulo, zama iHot Air Baloon Safari kanti kulabo abathanda kakhulu ezamasiko. Thatha uhambo lwendawo yasekhaya ubuke ezamasiko.

IVacation Club eseSun City iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela konke ihlathi elingakunikeza bese ujabulela ubuntofontofo bokuzizwa usekhaya elikude nekhaya okuyindawo yokulala. Kukhona ukuzikhethela phakathi kwezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili noma amathathu okulala ezinesilungiso moya. Iyinye inendlu yokugeza enkulu enesisefo kanye nosofa wokulala ongalala abantu ababili ovumela indawo yokulala eningi. Lezi zindlu ezinhle ngokumangalisayo zinayo yonke impahla yasekhishini okubalwa kuyo umshini wokuhlanza izitsha kanye nesifudumezo kudla. Ukwengeza, ungazikhethela ukuba indlu yakho inakekelwe. Izindlu ezinhle nezinakho konke zikunikeza indawo yokulala ezindlini ezinamakamelo amabili okulala kusukela enanini lika R5 800 nezimpelasonto ezikhululekile okungasetshenziswa izimpelasonto ezingu 41 zonyaka ngaphakathi, kodwa wonke unyaka uzungeza izwe. Izindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zamasonto anokuthile zisukela kuR15 000 ngamaholide ezikole kaJulayi kuya kuR40 000 esontweni leNedbank Million Dollar. Inani lezindlu ezinamakamelo amabili okulala zisukela kuR733 ngempelasonto ekhululekile kanye noR1 612 ngempelasonto enokuthile. UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.

 

Ikhozi yegalofu ecoleke kakhulu kunawo wonke eNingizimu nezwe



IGalofu lezingcweti eSun City


Amakhozi amabili epar-72 egalofu lezingcweti aseSun City, ahlelwe ngokuphikisana nangemumva lePilanesberg ngasesifundeni esiseNyakatho Ntshonalanga enikeza izivakashi indawo yokuvakasha enkulu kunazo zonke eziseNingizimu Afrika injabulu kanye nenselelo emdlalweni wegalofu.



Kokubili iGary Player Country Club neLost City Golf Course kwahlelwa ngokwaziwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika emlandweni wegalofu, uGary Player.

IGary Player Country Club yaziwa njengenzima negqilazayo. Kusukela ngo 1979 isibe yikhaya leNedbank Golf Challenge. Ikhozi idinga ukukheca kanye nokushaya okuqondile kwabadlali. Ikhozi egcwele amamitha angu 6 938 akungabazisi ukuthi engebukhuni engxenyeni yezwe lonkana. IGolf Digest SA kamumva nje isiyivotele yaba ephuma phambili ikhozi eNingizimu Afrika ngo 1999. lekhozi enhle ngokumangalisayo yakhungwa yiGary Player Country Club iminyaka emibili.

Ukwendlaleka kwemvelo okuqhathanisekayo kweGary Player Country Club kuyalahlisana - amaxhaphozi amanzi, izindunduma ezivele kahle ngokubukekayo kanye namagquma okushaya acashe kude ngakokuluhlza okumise okwenso kwenza kube bukhuni ukuthola ongenza ngakho.

Indawo enamanzi yokuqala esimgodini wesibili, ipar 5, odinga ukushaya kokuqala kuthathe isinxele somgwaqo ovulekile ukwenza kube lula ubude, okushaya kwesibili phezu kwamanzi.

Umgodi wesishiyagalombili ongobukhuni kakhulu. I-dog-leg ecijili, ipar 4 engamamitha angu 431 idinga ngempoqo ukucophelela namandla. Kukhona ixhaphozi lamanzi agijima enqamula indawo yokushaya ngokushaya kwesibili kweliphakeme igquma lokushayela elikokuluhlaza okuzezindunduma.

Emgodini elishumi nantathu, abadlali abasha kwiGary Player Country Club bathola ukuthi lekhozi ayixoleli nakancane ngokushaya kwakhona. Izingqinamba ezikuvimba emgwaqeni omkhulu zingakuvimbela ngobunani, bese zikuyisa kude kunazo kakhulu okungamisa ibhola kokukhahlazekile okungakwesokudla.

Abaningi abadlali abakwaziyo ukudlala bayazabalaza emgodini weshumi nesishiyagalombili, ipar 4 engamamitha angu 422. iyindawo embi kakhulu enamanzi azungeze indawo akulindele esigabeni sesibili. Ukunakekela okukhulu kumele kuthathwe ngokushaya egqumeni ngoba uma kukude kakhulu, ibhola lizongena emanzini. Uma kukufishane kakhulu, ukushaya kwesibili ukuya kokuluhlaza kuzokunika ukwesaba bese kuba khona izindunduma emacaleni womabili ukwengeza isimo esibukhuni.

ILost City Golf Course iyashitshashintsha: ukudlalela ugquma elingaphambili ubude bekhozi bamamitha angu 5 953, kuqhubekela emamitheni angu 6 983 enqumeni lokushayela elingemumva. Ikhozi inikeza ukubukeka okuhle kwendawo. Kusuka egqumeni lokushayela lomgodi weshumi nanye, abadlali bangabona imigodi eyishumi nanhlanu, okubalwa kuyo nowesithupha, ngamamitha angu 58 ngaphansi.

Indawo eyingozi kakhulu yeLost City Golf Course umgodi weshumi nantathu. Okukwakhele amaxhaphozi amanzi izingwenya ezingu 38, ezinye zazo zingangamamitha amabili ubude. Abadlali begalofu bayakhinyabezeka ukuthola amabhola abo aphume eceleni angena edamini lezingwenya. Labaxhaphi amanzi angejwayelekile yikho okunye okwenza iLost City Golf Course ibe ngejabulelekayo nokumnandi ukudla kuyo. Ayikho imizamo eyachithwa ukwenza lekhozi ibe nkulu kangaka.

Ukulandelana, ubude kanye nokuma kwemigodi yeLost City Golf Course kuhlukene kakhulu. Kwengasemumva engu 9 kukhona ama-par 4 amabili nje kuphela. Umgodi wesishiyagalombili uyi-par 3 emfishane kakhulu kanti umgodi weshumi nanhlanu nawo uyi-par 3 kodwa ethe ukuba yinde. Umgodi ngamunye unokuzimela ngokwawo, kungabalwa ubude. I-par 5 yomgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili ongukufikekayo kuwona ngamashodi amabili kodwa ubunzima buqala kokuseduze nokuluhlaza.

Ukubukeka okuhle kakhulu kweLost City Golf Course kanye nemvelo yobungcweti beggary Player Country Club buvivinya ukuzazi kwabadlali abaningi begalofu abazaziyo. UGary Player uchaza iLost City Golf Course njengenye kwawathandayo.

UKUTHOLA ULWAZI OLUTHE XAXA, SICELA UTHINTANE NOLARA ROSS ESUN INTERNATIONAL KULENOMBOLO YOCINGO: (011) 780 7684.

Ukudla
Zonke izivakashi zalamahotela amathathu aseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley zingadla kunoma iyiphi indawo yokudla esendaweni yokuvakasha.

Kukhona okuningi ongazitholela khona ekudleni, kusukela kokumnandi okosiwe kanye nokhari base a la carte Planters Restaurant kuya kokuthandekayo okungapheliyo; isiyoliso sase-Afrika somdambi - okusevwa ngokubukeka kwePhumalanga Terrace. Siyakukhuthaza ukuthi ubekise indawo kusasele isikhathi!

Ezokuzithokozisa  
Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye zezemidlalo ezibanjwelwa khona.

Izingane ezineminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngokho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane Game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.



Gembula ngekhanda lakho, ayi ngenhliziyo yakho

Isexwayiso! Okungaphakathi ngale kwalelikhasi kuqukethe ulwazi ngezokugembula, futhi kuqondiswe kubantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka 18.



IGalofu
Lekhozi ebukekayo ngokumangalisayo esesihoxweni secala lentaba, kwethandekayo I-Ezulwini Valley, engangamakhilomitha angu 15 ukusuka edolobheni elikhulu lezwe iMbabane. Engangamamitha angu 6 150 ubude iPar 72 isakhiwo sayo edinga ukwazi njengokuthinta okuthambile kwasebumnkantshubomvu ngabayizimfundamakhwela. Ngempela okuningi kwezokuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika kubhale phansi ukuthi izinga lokuwina elalitholwa kulendawo laliphansi eminyakeni engaphambilini.

Ngaphandle kwalokhu noma mhlawumbe ngenxa yakho, ikhozi isibe ngedumile ngabo bonke abadlali begalofu. Uma ubuka ohleni lwabahlonishwa beRoyal Swazi Classic (enye yemidlalo ephilayo omude ohambweni lonyaka lasebemnkantshubomvu) luveza amagama abaningi abadlali bangempela. UJohn Bland obonakala ephethe wonke umdlalo ngasemaphethelweni okuphela kweminyaka yawo 70 kanye nokuqala kweyawo 80. uMark McNulty owabeka amarekhodi ashaya khona kanye nezikhathi ezimbili lapho aba khona ngophumelela phambili kakhulu kunabo bonke uJohn Daly wabeka irekhodi lakhe lokuba ngowokuqala ukunqoba esigabeni sabaziwayo asebemknantshubomvu lapha kulendawo. Kanye no-Ernie Els we "big easy" yegalofu walenza labukeka lilula ngesikhathi ewina ngo 1992. Uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwekhozi labekwa ukuthi lusebenze ngokuqala kweminyaka yawo 90. Ubutshani bekukuyu baqala ukutshalwa emigwaqeni evulekile, okuluhlaza kwabekwa kabusha kwase kwathi izindawo zamanzi ezimbalwa zengezwa. Umgodi wesishiyagalolunye, othathwa njengolula wepar 4, lapho imishudo emide ingahamba khona, namhlanje ikhombisa amachibi amaningana enziwe ngabantu ngakwesokunxele somgwaqo omkhulu okungaphambi kokuluhlaza, okungezele okungaba yingozi noma inzuzo. 

Umgodi weshumi nesikhombisa mhlawumbe ungumgodi ogqamile. Lepar 5 imfishane ngokwanele ukulinga abadlali ukuthi bhambe kokuluhlaza kabili kodwa okuyiqhamukela okuhlangene kumele kube khona ukudlula amanzi amaningi abheke ingaphambili lokuluhlaza okuncane. Ukwengeza, noma ngumuphi umshudo ogeja kwesobunxele noma kwesokudla kushiya umuntu ezabalazela iPar. Ngokuthuthukiswa kwekhozi manje kuphelelisa iRoyal Swazi Sun kunikeza inselelo ethe ukuthi xaxa ngaphandle kokuhoxisa ukuhlaba kwayo umxhwele - lokhu okunikeza injabulo kanye nokukujabulela ukudlala kulabo abadlalayo ... futhi, yebo, mhlawumbe kuthi ukubaduda kancane.



IStokesaver, iCourse Graphics


Umbuso wezintaba weseSwaziland unikeza abavakashi bayo izinhlobonhlobo zokuhehayo kanye nokwenziwayo - kusukela kwebukekayo imifanekiso, kuya ebucikweni obudlidlizelayo kanye nemboni yemisebenzi yezandla, kuya kokukhulu ukuzitholela ulwazi ngezemvelo, okufana nokuhlenga emanzini amhlophe, ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo kanye nokushayela ubuka indawo yasendle.

Sizothanda ukukwamukela ezweni lethu eluluhlaza nelinentokozo, bese sabelana nawe enye yezimfihlo ezimangalisayo zase-Afrika ezigciniwe! IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley ikukhombisa amahotela amathathu ahlukene, lilinye lihlaba umxhwele ngokwalo. Ukubukeka kweNhlangano Sun engasengxenyeni eseningizimu yezwe endaweni enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuziphumulela kanye nokushaywa ngumoya. Bahambi bamaholide, izithunywa zemihlangano emikhulu, kanye nabavakashi bomhlaba nabafana nabo bakhetha ukubuyela futhi kwesinye isikhathi kulobubumnandi bokuphathwa kahle okukunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo ehamba phambili, ezokuzithokozisa kanye nezinto nje zokuziphumulela. Zonke izivakashi zase-Ezulwini Sun naseLugogo Sun ziyamenywa ekubeni amalungu okufakela kweseduze iRoyal Swazi Golf Club.

IKamp Kwena
Indlu yokudlala yasekamp Kwena itholakala eRoyal Swazi Sun kanti futhi inikeza imidlalo yosuku lonke, okubalwa kuyo imidlalo ethile, ukugibela amahhashi kanye kanye neminye imidlalo ongazikhombisa kuyo ukuhlakanipha yabavakashi banoma yiliphi ihotela abaneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12.

IFactory yeCarnival itholakala endaweni yokungena enkulu yasekhasino, iCarnival Factory ikhombisa uhlelo olumangalisayo lwevideo entsha kanye nemidlalo yezingane zindawonye.



Indawo etholakala kuyo
Indawo yokuvakasha iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley iqukethe iRoyal Swazi Sun, iEzulwini Sun kanye neLugogo, okutholakala kwethule ethe cosololo I-Ezulwini valley, imizuzu engu 15 ukusuka eMbabane ushayela, enhlokodolobha yezwe iSwaziland. Isikhumulo sezindiza iMatsapha International Airport, esetshenzwa izindiza eziqondayo ezisuka emadolobheni amakhulu aseNingizimu Afrika, okubalwa kuwo neGoli, eliyindawo emfishane engangamakhilomitha angu 28 ushayela. Indawo yokuvakasha ingangamahora angu 4 ngomgwaqo, bese buba imizuzu engu 45 emoyeni.

Imidlalo yangaphandle
Uma usukhathele amathuba akho asendaweni yokuvakasha, ungathanda ukuzama ngaphandle usuku olulandelayo kanye nokuzikhethela kukahhafu wosuku.

ILobamba Trail, uhambo lukahhafu wosuku lokuzitholela ulwazi lwangaphandle - uvakashele amakhaya aseSwazini, izindawo zemilando, isangoma sendawo, izimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla bese ujabulela amakhilomitha amabili uhamba phezu kwemangalisayo intaba ubuka. ILobamba Trail igxile emlandweni wesizwe nowezwe, uhambo olunguhhafu wosuku lukaLobamba luhlanganisa ukuya eNational Museum, iKing Sobhuza Memorial Park, iLobamba Royal Village, iSwazi Village yezamasiko, kanye neMatenga Falls nezimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla. Ubumnandi beSwaziland, uhambo olumangalisayo lweqembu lakusihlwa olugxile esitayeleni sempilo nezamasiko. Okubalwa ukungena eRoyal uMphakathi (ikhaya lenkosi yamaSwazi) okulandelwa ukungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary ukulungisela nokunambitha ukudla kwendabuko, kanye nomdanso wamandla weSibhaca.

ISwazi Arts neCrafs, chitha uhhafu wosuku uvakashela izindawo ezimangalisayo zezimakethe zokwakhiwa ngobuciko nemisebenzi yezandla e-Ezulwini, eMantenga, eMlilwane, naseMakerns, kubandakanya nengafaniswa nalutho olunye ifemu yamakhandlela. Enye futhi indlela engathathwa edlula e-Ezulwini Valley iya phezulu eMbabane, eMotshana kanye nedumile ifemu yezingilazi iNgwenya, ukubona abakhi bengilazi bamaSwazi basemsebenzini. IWildlife Trails, iMlilwane Hogs kanye neHippo Trails, uhhafu wosuku ubuka okumangalisayo, ubuka ihhipo kanye nezinyoni eziningi kanye nokubuka nje okwasendle okuningi. Okubaliwe isitobhi sesizinda semisebenzi yezandla kanye nendawo lapho kuphunyulwa khona okutholwa kuyo okokuqabula umzimba. IHlane Big Cats, usuku lonke uluchitha ulandela amabhubesi, ingulube yehlathi, kanye nengwe eHlane Royal National Park, okunokuzikhethela ukuhamba ngezinyawo okugadiwe. Ukudla kwasemini nokokuqabula umzimba kubaliwe.

IMkhaya Endagered Species, chitha usuku lonke ubukela ngokuvulekile konke okukhona usemotweni ubukela inyathi , indlulamithi, ubhejane omnyama, indlovu, utsessebe, kanye nokunye okuningi. Jabulela isitobhi sokuziqabula somgodi wamanzi kanye nokudla kwasemini okulula kwenhle ikambo esehlathini. Izinto ezibukwayo ezingaphandle, iWhite Water Rafting, umfula omkhulu Usuthu River, okunikeza ulwazi ongasophinde ulukhohlwe uma ufuna ukuzitholela ubuhle. Usuku olugcwele noma olunguhhafu, yonke impahla ibaliwe, kanye nokugadwa, ezokuthutha nokudla kwasemini. Ukubekisa indawo yesikhathi samanzi aphansi kubalwa kuko ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo ukuhlamba emanzini ngesikebhe. Okunye okuhle kungahlelwa njengokukhwela intaba ngamabhayisikili akhona, i-paragliding kanye nokuhamba nge 4 x 4.




Ezemidlalo nezokuzithokozisa 
Izivakashi zinezinto  zayo yonke iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley Resort kusukela ekuzikhetheleni nangesikhathi sekuza kwezokudlala ngaphandle. Ungabhukuda, udlale igalofu, ibhola lomphebezo kanye nelidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, zitholele izindlela zemvelo, uhla lungolungapheli ...

IRoyal Swazi Country Club, ikhozi ebukekayo yemiqhudelwano emikhulu yemigodi engu 18 eseSwazi Royal Sun Country Club ingenye okunokuthola kuyo umvuzo ongatholwa noma kuphi emhlabeni, ngezindawo zayo ezinezintaba ezingajatshulelwa kuzona zonke izindunduma kuluhlaza. Ipar 72 yekhozi eshanelayo eyavulwa ngo 1966 ilele phansi emimangweni yezintaba zeLubombo, ngezindawo zayo ezilinganayo ezingaqhathaniswa ezingu 9 zokuqala kanye nezisemumva ezingu 9 ezinenezela ngokugcwele ukubukeka nokundlaleka kwentaba. Okuluhlaza kanye nemigwaqo emikhulu evulekile kusezindaweni eziphezulu ekugcineni futhi zimema izindawo ezifana namachibi, izindonga ezicinaniswe okumilile, ngaphandle kwezindawo eziyizimbondela ezigijima eduze kwemigwaqo evulekile, kubonakala izindunduma ( enye yazo ebheke phezulu kakhulu eyenza ukuthi izitebhizi zikalayini kaloliwe zakhiwa ukuze zikwazi ukukhanda indlela), kuvunguza umoya nokunyakaza kwezihlahla okuhle ngokumangalisayo kanye nezitshalo zemvelo zendawo. Sekukonke, kungukuzitholela umvuzo wokuba kulendawo ngokuphelele kubo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane bawo wonke amazinga.

Ukubeka okuluhlaza, kukhona indawo yokuluhlaza eseduze neClub House, eyenzelwe abadlali. Indlu yesinukha, kukhona itafula eligcwele ngokuphelele lokudlala isinukha eliseCountry Club. AmaDarts, Kukhona amabhodi amabili abekiwe ukuhlukanisa amadoda ebafaneni! Umdlalo wokugibela amahhashi, izitebele zase-Ezulwini zitholakala ngaphansi kwe-Ezulwini Sun. Abafundisi abakufundele ukugibela amahhashi kanye nokunakekelwa kokugibela kuyatholakala zonke izinsuku. Amagceke okugingqa ibhola, kukhona amagceke okudlala ibhola eligingqwayo aluhlaza amabili nawo atholakala ngaphansi kwendawo evulekile yaseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nenobuntofontofo ukungenisa abadlali abangu 7 iyinye. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagceke aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakala e-Ezulwini Sun.



Imidlalo yangaphandle

Indawo yokulala

Ezemidlalo nezokuzithokozisa
Izivakashi zinezinto zayo yonke iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley Resort kusukela ekuzikhetheleni nangesikhathi sekuza kwezokudlala ngaphandle. Ungabhukuda, udlale igalofu, ibhola lomphebezo kanye nelidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, zitholele izindlela zemvelo, uhla lungolungapheli ...

IRoyal Swazi Country Club, ikhozi ebukekayo yemiqhudelwano emikhulu yemigodi engu 18 eseSwazi Royal Sun Country Club ingenye okunokuthola kuyo umvuzo ongatholwa noma kuphi emhlabeni, ngezindawo zayo ezinezintaba ezingajatshulelwa kuzona zonke izindunduma kuluhlaza. Ipar 72 yekhozi eshanelayo eyavulwa ngo 1966 ilele phansi emimangweni yezintaba zeLubombo, ngezindawo zayo ezilinganayo ezingaqhathaniswa ezingu 9 zokuqala kanye nezisemumva ezingu 9 ezinenezela ngokugcwele ukubukeka nokundlaleka kwentaba. Okuluhlaza kanye nimigwaqo emikhulu evulekile kusezindaweni eziphezulu ekugcineni futhi zimema izindawo ezifana namachibi, izindonga ezicinaniswe okumilile, ngaphandle kwezindawo eziyizimbondela ezigijima eduze kwemigwaqo evulekile, kubonakal izindunduma ( enye yazo ebheke phezulu kakhulu eyenza ukuthi izitebhizi zikalayini kaloliwe zakhiwa ukuze zikwazi ukukhanda indlela), kuvunguza umoya nokunyakaza kwezihlahla okuhle ngokumangalisayo kanye nezitshalo zemvelo zendawo. Sekukonke, kungukuzitholela umvuzo wokuba kulendawo ngokuphelele kubo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane bawo wonke amazinga.

Ukubeka okuluhlaza, kukhona indawo yokuluhlaza eseduze neClub House, eyenzelwe abadlali. Indlu yesinukha, kukhona itafula eligcwele ngokuphelele lokudlala isinukha eliseCountry Club. AmaDarts, Kukhona amabhodi amabili abekiwe ukuhlukanisa amadoda ebafaneni! Umdlalo wokugibela amahhashi, izitebele zase-Ezulwini zitholakala ngaphansi kwe-Ezulwini Sun. Abafundisi abakufundele ukugibela amahhashi kanye nokunakekelwa kokugibela kuyatholakala zonke izinsuku. Amagceke okugingqa ibhola, kukhona amagceke okudlala ibhola eligingqwayo aluhlaza amabili nawo atholakala ngaphansi kwendawo evulekile yaseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nenobuntofontofo ukungenisa abadlali abangu 7 iyinye. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagceke aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakala Ezulwini Sun.

Amachibi okubhukuda neJacuzzi, ihotela ngalinye linechibi lalo lokubhukuda elinezambulela zalo kanye nezindawo zokuphumula. Okudayisa endaweni ethengisa ngotshwala kanye nohla lokudla okulula nakho kuyatholakala. Womabili iEzulwini Sun kanye neLogogo Sun zinamachibi okubhukuda ezingane. Bese kuba khona ijacuzzi enkulu engaphandle ehlanganisa ichibi lokubhukuda neRoyal Swazi Sun. IVolleyball, izinkundla zokudlala iValleyball zingatholakala uma ziceliwe kumahotela iRoyal Swazi Sun, iLugogo Sun nase-Ezulwini Sun.




Imidlalo yangaphandle



Ukudla kwase-Ezulwini
IValley Blues Restaurant, itafula eliconsisa amathe lokudla kwasekuseni kanye nemangazayo ukudla kwasemini kwe a la carte kanye nohla lokudla kwakusihla kuyatholakala kulendawo ethengisa ngokudla enobungane.

IPhumalanga Terrace, lendawo efulelwe ngotshani enhle ngokumangalisayo inikeza isithombe sangempela sokudla konke kohlobo lwe al-fresco kanti futhi iyindawo enhle kakhulu yemicimbi yangasese. IValley Blues Bar, iValley Blues bar inikeza okumangalisayo ukubukeka okuphakathi kwamagceke ecala lechibi nezintaba ezimangalisayo ngasemumva. Jabulela ukuqabula kwengxubevange yotshwala kanye nokudlana okula ngaphakathi endaweni yotshwala noma ngaphandle ePhumalanga Terrace.




Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye nezemidlalo ezibanjwelwa khona.

Izingane ezineminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngakho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishinini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.




Okulele ngaphansi kwezimangalisayo izintaba zelobamba neMdzimba yiwo umhosha ofanayo oyikhaya kwiRoyal Swazi Sun kanye neLugogo Sun  ihotela i-Ezulwini Sun. Okubonakala ukuze zonke izindlu abukekayo okuhle kakhulu, phesheya namagceke enziwe kahle echibi, izingadi kanti kuyona iValley eziphinda futhi zibe indawo yasebukhosini yeLobamba. I-Ezulwini Sun ingumzuzu nje kuphela ukusuka eRoyal Swazi Sun neLugogo Sun enxanxatheleleni yemisebenzi yamahotela.




Imininingwane yokuxhumana
	Okuhehayo kwendawo
Izitolo


Imidlalo yangaphandle  
Uma usukhathele amathuba onke asendaweni yokuvakasha, ungathanda ukuzama ngaphandle usuku olulandelayo kanye nokuzikhethela kukahhafu wosuku.

IMdzimba Trail, uhambo lukahhafu wosuku lokuzitholela ulwazi lwangaphandle - uvakashele amakhaya aseSwazini, izindawo zemilando, isangoma sendawo, izimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla bese ujabulela amakhilomitha amabili uhamba phezu kwemangalisayo intaba ubuka. ILobamba Trail igxile emlandweni wesizwe nowezwe, uhambo olunguhhafu wosuku lukaLobamba luhlanganisa ukuya eNational Museum, iKing Sobhuza Memorial Park, iLobamba Royal Village, iSwazi Village yezamasiko, kanye neMatenga Falls nezimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla. Ubumnandi beSwaziland, uhambo olumangalisayo lweqembu lakusihlwa olugxile esitayeleni sempilo nezamasiko. Okubalwa ukungena eRoyal uMphakatsi (ikhaya lenkosi yamaSwazi) okulandelwa ukungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary ukulungisela nokunambitha ukudla kwendabuko, kanye nomdanso wamandla weSibhaca.

ISwazi Arts neCrafs, chitha uhhafu wosuku uvakashela izindawo ezimangalisayo zezimakethe zokwakhiwa ngobiciko nemisebenzi yezandla e-Ezulwini, eMantenga, eMlilwane, naseMakerns, kubandakanya nengafaniswa nalutho olunye ifemu yamakhandlela. Enye futhi indlela engathathwa edlula e-Ezulwini Valley iya phezulu eMbabane, eMotshana kanye nedumile ifemu yengilazi iNgwenya, ukubona abakhi bengilazi bamaSwazi besemsebenzini. IWildlife Trails, iMlilwane Hogs kanye neHippo Trails, uhhafu wosuku ubuka okumangalisayo, ubuka ihhipo kanye nezinyoni eziningi kanye nokubuka nje okwasendle okuningi. Okubaliwe isitobhi sesizinda semisebenzi yezandla kanye nendawo lapho kuphunyulwa khona okutholwa kuyo okokuqabula umzimba. IHlane Big Cats, usuku lonke uluchitha ulandela amabhubesi, ingulube yehlathi, kanye nengwe eHlane Royal National Park, okunokuzikhethela ukuhamba ngezinyawo okugadiwe. Ukudla kwasemini nokokuqabula umzimba kubaliwe.

IMkhaya Endagered Species, chitha usuku lonke ubukela ngokuvulekile konke okukhona usemotweni ubukela inyathi , indlulamithi, ubhejane omnyama, indlovu, utsessebe, kanye nokunye okuningi. Jabulela isitobhi sokuziqabula somgodi wamanzi kanye nokudla kwasemini okulula kwenhle ikambo esehlathini. Izinto ezibukwayo ezingaphandle, iWhite Water Rafting, umfula omkhulu Usuthu River, okunikeza ulwazi ongasophinde ulukhohlwe uma ufuna ukuzitholela ubuhle. Usuku olugcwele noma olunguhhafu, yonke impahla ibaliwe, kanye nokugadwa, ezokuthutha nokudla kwasemini. Ukubekisa indawo yesikhathi samanzi aphansi kubalwa kuko ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo ukuhlamba emanzini ngesikebhe. Okunye okuhle kungahlelwa njengokukhwela intaba ngamabhayisikili akhona, iparagliding kanye nokuhamba nge 4 x 4.




Indawo yokulala
Umhlobiso owemibala eqabulayo yokuluhlaza okusasibhakabhaka nokumhlophe, okugqanyiswe yitshe eliluhlaza eliyigugu kanye nekholali ethambile okukhona kulo lonke ihotela. Inani lezindlu: zingu 60. I-Ezulwini inamagumbi angu 60 ahlothsiswe ngokuhehayo futhi amakhulu, anemibhede emibili emikhulu, isilungiso moya, okuletha ukushisa, ibhavu wokugeza, isisefo sokugeza, umabonakude, umsakazo, ucingo  nesomiso zinwele, kanye nezinto zokwenza itiye nekhofi.




Imidlalo yamatafula
Imidlalo ekhona ibandakanya: amatafula angu 8 e-American Roulette, anokuncane okunqunyiwe okusuka ku E5.00 kuya kokukhulu u-E1000 kanye nokuncane futhi okusuka ku-E10.00 kuya kokukhulu u-E4 000 ngezimpelasonto, noma uma kuceliwe.

Amatafula angu 8 aBlackjack ayatholakala kanye netafula elilodwa le-Raise Em' Poker. Ukufakelwa kusukela ku-E50 kuya ku-E1 000 kanye nokusukela ku-E200 kuya ku-E2 000 kanye nokusukeka ku-E400 kuya kuE4 000. I-American Roulette iyamangalisa, ingumdlalo ogcwele injabulo wasekhasino onokokuzikhethela okubanzi kokubheja kanti udlalwa ngezingcezu eziyizipesheli ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. Inhloso yeBlackjack ukudonsa isandla samakhadi angangenani eliseduze kuka 21 ngaphezu kwawomphathi, ngaphandle kokuqhuma (okungukudonsa angaphezu kuka 21). Isandla esiphethe amakhadi amabili u-Ace kanye nanoma imuphi u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing sibizwa ngeBlackjack bese sikhokha u-3:2. Uma ufuna usizo ekufundeni ukuthi kudlalwa kanjani noma imuphi umdlalo okhona emakhasino ethu, singakujabulela ukukufundisa. Sicela uthintane nomphathi wekhasino ngolwazo oluthe xaxa.



Imidlalo yamatafula


Izikhathi zokusebenza
Ingxenye yamatafula asekhasino ivulwa izinsuku ezingu 7 ngesonto. Kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesiHlanu kusukela ngo-19:00, ngeMigqibelo kusukela ngo-16:00 bese ngamaSonto kusukela ngo-13:00.

Ingxenye yemishini ivulwa ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesine kusukela ngo-09:00 kuze kuvalwe, kanti ngezimpelasonto ivulwa amahora angu 24. SinaneBingo ngamaSonto ngo-17:30 kanti ngeMisombuluko kuya koLwezine ngo-21:00.

Imishini
Ikhasino eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley inemishini engu 164.

Kukhona izinhlonhlobo zemiklomelo emikhulu eqhubekayo: I-Iron Horse (edlalwa ngezinhlamvu ze-E5), iPenny Farthing (edlalwa ngezinhlamvu ze-E10), iJoker Wild Poker (edlalwa ngezinhlamvu ze-E1) kanye neminye. IDouble Whammy, iMillinnium Mania, iDream Machine kanye nePoker Magic yimiklomelo emikhulu leyo. Ngezinhlamvu nje ezinhlanu zo-50c ungaba ngumnikazi wesigidi ngokushesha ngokuwina iMilleniuam Mania Jackpot (umklomelo oqhubekayo oxhumene namanye amakhasino aseSun International). Ngezinhlamvu ezinhlanu ze-E1 ungathola izinsimbi zikhala kuwo wonke amakhasino aseSun International ngokuwina iPoker magic (umklomelo oqhubekayo ohlanganisa namanye amakhasino aseSun International) onikeza umklomelo omncane ka-E100 000!

Okudlulile


ISun International Umhlaba ovusa amadlingozi ngokuphindwe kankulungwane

ISun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni nangaphandle, ngamaqembu eSun International agqame kwangu 20 emahoteleni aphezulu umhlaba wonke jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamakhono, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlangano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi , noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyathembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!


Ezokukweleta
Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa ngamanani anqunyiwe esikhathini esingangezinsuku ezingu 14, kuhambisan nomazisi wangempela. Amakhadi e-American Express, aweDiners, kanye naweGold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku R2 000. I-Ameriacan Express isivumela ukuthi samukela amakhadi aqala ngenombolo ethi 3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe uR500. Ukukweleta, sicela uthintane nomshayi sisefo osedesikini ngolwazi oluthe xaxa. Amasheke, amasheke abantu nje awavunyelwe ngaphandle kokuvunyelwa yibhange uma kwenzeka angavunyelwa futhi nawo uma ehambisana nomazisi wangempela kanye nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta. Qaphela ukuthi amabhange avumela inani elithile lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha usuku ngalunye. Uyacelwa ukuthinta umshayi sisefo ngemininingwane ethintene nohlobo lwesheke ofuna ukulisebenzisa.

Imishini yokukhipha imali, Kukhona umshini wokukhipha imali ozisebenza wona otholakala ezinkundleni zemishini, ohlumene nama-account aseNingizimu Afrika. IStandard Bank nalo litholakala ngaphakathi ehotela, lisebenza ngeMisombuluko, ngoLwezithathu, kanye nangoLwezihlanu kusukela ngo-10:00 kuya ku-12:00. Amasheke ezihambi, wonke amasheke ezihambi ayamukelwa. Imali yakwamanye amazwe, yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe iyamukelwa ukuthola izingcezu edesikini lasekhasino. Ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthi ibe ngamaRandi aseNingizimu Afrika, sicela uthintane nebhange elisehotela noma edesikini lomgcini sivalo. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe kanye nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka kukho konke ukushintshwa kwemali yakwamanye amazwe.




Umgodi wesihiyagalolunye
IPar 4, Stroke 18, 340m lomgodi ujikisa ikhanda libheke phansi ngasohlangothini lwegalofu lweRoyal Swazi Sun, kanti ufuna ukushaya okucacile ukugcina ibhola lisesandleni sokudla ecaleni lamadamu amathathu abheke umgwaqo ovulekile nokuluhlza.

Emva kokushaya okufishane okudlula lamadamu amabili, ibhola lifikela kokuluhlaza okungangama-square metre angu 700, okukhulu kunakho konke ekhozini. Okukubeka, noma kunjalo, engozini enkulu, ngokungathuka sekukubeke edamini lesithathu elinomchachazo walo ohehayo omcane, esikhundleni sokukubeka lapho kufanele khona.
Umgodi odlule		Umgodi olandelayo



Umgodi wokuqala
IPar 4, Stroke 16,356m ukuhamba ngakwesokunxele komgwaqo ovulekile kuvula ukushaya kwesibili okukubeka kokuluhlaza okunezindunduma ezisicaba. Okunye ongakwenza ukushayela kokuqala kokuluhlaza, okufanele kudlule izihlahlana ezimbalwa bese kweqa indawo engangamamitha angu 300.

Ukushaya udlule okuluhlaza, okuzungezwe izihlahla ezintathu ezithandekayo zemopane, kukubizela ekushayeni emumva egqunyaneni eliphakeme.
Umgodi olandelayo



Umgodi weshumi
IPar 4, Stroke 5,287 ukuma egqunyaneni lokushayela  ibhola kukunika ukubukeka okusabisayo phesheya komhosha omncane obheke kokuluhlaza okuzungezwe izihlahla ze-aloe ngemumva, okuphinde futhi kwavikelwa udonga oluncane ngaphambili olucinaniswe okumilile okwenza kungaqhubekeki.

Ukushaya okufishane kwepar 4, okukunikeza ukungaphambuki ekushayeni egqumeni lokushayela. Ukushaya kwesibili okuya kokuluhlaza kubukhuni ngokulingana ukuthi ungakujaja, kodwa abadlali abacacisayo bayathola umvuzo ngokushaya kwabo.

Umgodi weshimi nanye
IPar 4, Stroke 9, 408m umgodi weshumi nanye noweshumi nane yenza lisebenziseke kalula icala lentaba ngokugijimela ukushaya ongakwenza uhamba ngonqenqemba lwemigwaqo evulekile elukeke. Umgodi weshumi nanye uyi-stroke I ekhozini, ofingqwe izintaba zeThrombosis ukungakwazi, futhi waziwa ngabadlali bonke ukuthi ungobukhuni kunayo yonke.

Ukushayela egqumeni kokuqala kuyayicacisa inkinga. Uma ukwenze kwaba ngakwesokudla, kuzohlala endaweni ehhahlazekile. Uma ukwenze kwahamba kwaqonda kuzohlala elukekeni lomgwaqo ovulekile kwesokudla kuya kwesokunxele, egcwele amaqoqwana ezihlahla ezihehhayo ze-aloe.

Umgodi weshumi nambili 
IPar 5, Stroke 17,466m, Yilapho lapho isithinzi somgodi odlule singasulwa khona ngokushaya umshudo wakamumva wokushayela ipar 5 eshona phansi nentaba. Okuluhlaza akubonakali uma ubuka egqumeni lokusahyela, kodwa ukushaya okuqondile kushiya umdlali galofu ngokushaya okufishane kokuluhlaza okunezindunduma ezikahle ukusuka emumva kua phambili.

Lapho ekushoneni kwendunduma ngakwesokudla, lapho izintatshana ezine zemigwaqo evulekile zingahleleka khona ngasecaleni ukulungiselela ukukwehlikela phansi, kanti inezihlahla ezicinene ngemumva kowayo. Kanti ngakwesokudla kukhona enye indunduma, ebukeka njengesincane isigaxa sensimbi esidilika phezulu. Ukushaya okucacile, noma kunjalo, kukubeka kalula engozini.
Umgodi odlule 		Umgodi olandelayo




Umgodi weshumi nantathu

Yipar 4 yokukhuphuka intaba edinga umshudo wokushaya omuhle, oqondile wesibili ongokuphakathi nendawo ukushayela okuluhlaza. Ngasemumva kwayo uzungezwe amaqabunga amade ezihlahla esifana nobhanana bese kuthi ngaphambili igadwe izindunduma ezimbalwa. Lokhu kukonke kwehlisa ukulinga kokushaya bese kukwenza kubaluleke ukushaya kwesibili.

Izindunduma ezincane nazo zinzima ngoba umdlali kufanele ame ehlosheni, eliphakame kunalapho kumi khona ibhola.

Okuluhlaza kuvikelwe ngakwesokunxele indunduma, ngakwesokudla ihlathi elicinene kanti ngaphambili idamu elinomchachazo, elijwayelwe izinyoni eziningana.

Lokhu kungokokuvikela izindunduma ezibekwe kahle ezimbili eziqhamuka ngakwesokunxele nakwesokudla ezihlelwe kahle, okuluhlaza okuzigaba ezimbili, okunokuzikhethela ukuthi ufuna ukulibeka kuphi. Umgodi weshumni nesithupha

Ukushaya kwesibili akumele kube yilutho okungaphansi kokushuda kasithupha ukuya kokuluhlaza okuphindwe kabili okuvinjwe kamnandi izindunduma ezinkulu, ngakwesokunxele nakwesokudla.

Ngasemumva kokuluhlaza kukhona umgwaqo lapho imisebenzi yezandla yamaSwazi idayiswa khona esitebeleni esifulelwe ngotshani, kanti ukushaya okunentshisekelo kungcinisa umdlali ezitholela phakathi kobhasikidi abalukiwe ngesikhathi ezama ukuthola ibhola. Noma kunjalo, ukuthola indawo engcono kokuluhlaza ngokushayo kwesibili kuhlale kuletha ipar evele idengeka.

Okunye ongakwenza ukushayela kokuluhlaza okugadwe ichibi elincane elinomchachazo lokhu okungaqinisekisa okungenani ibhadi.

Umgodi weshumi nesishiyagalombili
IPar 3, Stroke 11,153m, lena yipar enhle yokuqeda ngayo ngoba ineqguma lokushayela ibhola nokuluhlaza ... okukushaya kungekho lutho oludlalekayo phakathi nendawo. Okungakukhipha izindunduma eziyisithupha ezizungeze okuluhlaza.

Ukushaya okuqondile kuzokuphumelelisa kwipar enkulu noma okungenani ebhadini, kodwa umdlali kuyathandeka ukuthi adinge elinye ikilabhu okufana nokwesihlanu esikhundleni sokwesithupha. Uma okuluhlaza nezindunduma kugejekile kwesokudla, ukushaya kwesibili kumele kwenziwe kokuluhlaza okuphakeme okulele cishe amamitha angu 40 ngaphezu kwalapho kumi khona umdlali.

Umgodi wesibili

Ukushayela ngakwesokunxele komgwaqo ovulekile wendunduma kuzokuhlelela ukushaya kwamamitha angu 160 kokuluhlaza okugadwe kuwo wonke amacala isihlabathi nezindunduma zotshani. Ukunakekela kumele kube khona ukuvikela ukushaya okunesigqi njengoba lokhu kungakuholela ekudlaleni umshudo wesithathu unyuka intaba, kokuluhlaza ukhululeke.

Umgodi wesithathu

Umgodi wesihlanu

Izihlahlana ezingasemgceleni wesokudla uphelisa umgwaqo, kanjalo labo abashaya ngamandla bazama inhlanhla kumele bafike ekupheleni kanye. Abashaya kafushane bahlose ukuthola indawo enhle ngaphambi kokufika kokuluhlaza, okuvumela ukushaya okulula emva kwalokho kanti nebhadi elingenzeka.

Umgodi wesithupha
IPar 5, Stroke 12, 500m, lepar 3 ingenye yanzima ekhozini kunawo wonke, kanti futhi ayixoleli kwangampela nganoma ikuphi ukushaya. Ukushay egqumnei kumele kudlalwe kuqonde ngoba ngakwesokudla  imikhawulo kanti enye into ngakwesokunxele, okugcwele khona izihlahla ezinkulu ze-acacia ezinamagatsha avulekile ngokumangalisayo, kwenza ibhola lilahleke.

Izindunduma ezimbili ngakwesokunxele nakwesokudla zibamba ukushaya okusala kuphela ngaphandle kwendlela, ngesikhathi ngale kokuluhlaza kukhona ukungadlaleki kwangempela. Kodwa eqgumeni okuhle kungakutholela amaphuzu.

Umgodi wesikhombisa
IPar 3, Stroke 14, 163m, lepar enyukisa intaba ijabulela ukubukeka kanye kanye okuvulekile okunokulandelana kwezintaba ngasemaphethelweni. Kudinga ukushaya okuhle ngakwesokunxele komgwaqo ovulekile kanye nokunye okulinganayo kwesibili ukuvimba ukuzama okude kwesokudla lapho ulayini wama-gums aluhlaza sasibhabhaka eqeda khona ukuphela.

Okuluhlaza okundlalekile okungumakhelwane, okugadwe amaqabunga obhanana, kugadwe futhi izindunduma, eyodwa yazo ngakwesokudla, evulela umgwaqo ovulekile bese uzungeze okuluhlaza ngamamitha angu 94. Ngasekundleni enkulukazi, amamitha angu 37 ngaphesheya.

Umgodi wesishiyagalolumbili
Ipar 5, Stroke 10, 454m, lepar 4 emfishane idinga ukushaya okuqondile okukuyisa  egwaqeni ovulekile kwesokudla nakwesokunxele. Lokhu kuholela ekushayeni okuphakathi nendawo, okumele kushayelwe kokuluhlaza okunezindunduma okuvuleke ngamamitha angu 35 kusuka phambili kuya emumva.

Uma usukokuluhlaza, okundlalekile, ukubeka akuyona inkinga, kodwa umuthi okhulayo ngasemumva kokuluhlaza ukhombisa ukuphakama kwendawo ukuya, ngaleyondlela ukushaya okungaphezulu kungaba inkinga futhi.
