IStokesaver, iCourse Graphics
Umbuso wezintaba waseSwaziland unikeza abavakashi bayo izinhlobonhlobo zokuhehayo kanye nokwenziwayo - kusukela kwebukekayo imifanekiso, kuya ebucikweni obudlidlizelayo kanye nemboni yemisebenzi yezandla, kuya kokukhulu ukuzitholela ulwazi ngezemvelo, okufana nokuhlenga emanzini amhlophe, ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo kanye nokushayela ubuka indawo yasendle.

Sizothanda ukukwamukela ezweni lethu eliluhlaza nelinentokozo, bese sabelana nawe enye yezimfihlo ezimangalisayo zase-Afrika ezigciniwe! IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley ikukhombisa amahotela amathathu ahlukene, lilinye lihlaba umxhwele ngokwalo. Ukubukeka kweNhlangano Sun engasengxenyeni eseNingizimu yezwe endaweni enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuziphumulela kanye nokushaywa ngumoya. Bahambi bamaholide, izithunywa zemihlangano emikhulu, kanye nabavakashi bomhlaba nabafana nabo bakhetha ukubuyela futhi kwesinye isikhathi kulobubumnandi bokuphathwa kahle okukunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zemidlalo ehamba phambili, ezokuzithokozisa kanye nezinto nje zokuziphumulela. Zonke izivakashi zase-Ezulwini Sun naseLugogo Sun ziyamenywa ekubeni amalungu okufakela kweseduze iRoyal Swazi Golf Club.

Ukubuka ompetha bezabalaza izingqinamba eziningi zalemigodi engu 18 kungukubuka umdlalo omuhle kanti labo abazihambelayo nje ekhozini bangazijabulisa ngokubuka lokhu kubonakala kanye kanye kwezintaba nemihosha. Kubadlali ukudlala igalofu kumnandi kakhulu konomdlalo owehlukile, iRoyal Swazi Sun inikeza okujabulisayo okulinganayo kodwa ukucelwa inselelo kuzothile kokwaziwa kakhulu njengenye yamakhozi acolisekile emhlabeni. Lamakhasi alandelayo akunikeza imininingwane yokuchazwa ngomgodi ngamunye oseRoyal Swazi Sun ekhozini yegalofu. Siyathemba uyakujabulela ukudlala lemigodi. Okunye okumnandi kulendawo kuzokunika ulwazi lwangaphakathi kubavakashi ababhalisa njengabadlali begalofu laseSun International.

Indawo yokulala
Wonke amagumbi amakhulu angu 199 kanye namakhulukazi angu 3 akunikeza ubukhazikhazi ongabukhona, kanti anemibhede yamadabuli emibili, kanye nendlu yokugeza engaphakathi enesisefo, ucingo ongashayela ngaphandle ngayo, umabonakude wemibala, umsakazo, ipulagi yereyiza kagesi (110/220V), isomiso zinwele, kanye nezinto zokwenza itiye nekhofi. Ukudlela ngaphakathi egunjini akutholakali, noma kunjalo, siyakwazi ukugcina izicelo ezithile. Ihotela iLugogo Sun inenani elikhulu lamagumbi asehotela endaweni yoMbuso. Okuhehayo kwendawo
Kuhlale kukhona inhlokomo esheshayo ekhasino kanye nokugubha okukhalayo kwemishini yemiklomelo emikhulu ehotela eRoyal Swazi Sun.

Kukhona izindawo eziningi ezikhumbulekayo ngemizuzu nje zeRoyal Swazi Sun ukuphinda uzivakashele kanye nezitolo ezimangalisayo zemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla ukuzibukela nje. Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezilwane eziningi, izinyoni, izihlahla nezimbali ezingabukwa kumapaki ahlukene emvelo kanye nasendaweni lapho kugcinwe khona ezemvelo. Imakethe iMbabane, imakethe iMbabane yakha isizinda sobubenyebenye bemibala yedolobha elikhulu, kanti futhi kuyimpoqo kuwona wonke umuntu kusukela kubathwebuli bezithombe kuya kulabo abafuna ukuzizwela ukunambitheka (okungezindlela eziningi kuneyodwa) zempilo yangempela yaseSwazi. Ubuhlalu baseSwazi, izingubo zendabuko kanye zezinhlobonhlobo zemikhonzo kungathengwa. Imakethe yase-Ezulwini yokwenziwe ngezandla, inezinti eziningi zemikhonzo ongazikhethela kuzona. IMantenga  Cultural Village, iMantenga Cultural Village iqukethe inxuluma elinezindlu zasekhaya ezingu 16 kanye nemihlobiso yezandla yendabuko ebukwayo, ikhombisa ubuso obuningi obuveza impilo yamaSwazi yakudala, yombili yokuhlala komphakathi, ezomnotho kanye nezenkolo. Isizinda semisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla yaseMantenga inezitolo ezingu 11 ezidayisa okuhlukene kwezandla, ama-Workshop kanye namaDemo's, kanye nehhovisi lukuthola ulwazi lwezivakashi. Indawo ekugcinwa khona izilwane ezomisiwe yesizwe saseSwaziland, itholakala eduze kwezindlu zasePhalamende, iNational Museum iqukethe isidlidli kanye nokukunika ulwazi oluningi lohla lwezinto ezibukwayo ezikukhombisa imvelaphi yamaSwazi, ezendabuko, izingubo kanye nempilo jikelele. Izithombe ezidlala zikhombisa imilando yamaSwazi kanye nokuthelelwa okwangaphandle okukhanda ingxenye yamasiko amaSwazi kuzokuvezela ngokucacile abavakashi ngezemilando yombuso wamaSwazi. IMlilwane Game Reserve, akukho ukuvakasha kwase-Ezulwini Valley okugcwele ngaphandle kokungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary. Jabulela ubuhle bezinto ezibonwayo ezingciniwe lapho uzobona indlulamithi, izebra, inkonkoni, impala, inyala kanye nephilayo indlovudawana. Ifemu yamakhandlela yaseSwazi ayifani nalutho lwase-Afrika, amakhandlela enziwe ngezandla, enziwa ngamakhosikazi namadoda endawo enza imisebenzi yezandla. Isivakashi singabuka ukwakhiwa kwawo konke kusukela ekuthanjisweni okungajahile kwemovu emibili, kuya ekwakhiweni kokugcina komhlobiso. Izindlu zasePhalamende, izindlu zasePhalamende ziyavulelwa abavakashi abangangena ngamunye ekamelweni elilodwa ephelekezelwa ogadile osebenzayo bese futhi ehlanganyela ekulaleleni ukuphikisana ePhalamende.



Ukudla kwaseLugogo Sun
ILanga Restaurant, ukudla okumnandi ngokumangalisayo kwasekuseni kanye netafula lokudla kwakusihlwa kusevwa nsukuzonke, kanye nesigqi sansuku zonke sakusihlwa esikunika okuhehayo okudumile. Itafula lokudla kwasemini okumangalisayo kusevwa ngamaSonto kanye nenjabulo ebukwayo eyenzeka khona bukhoma. ISportman's Bar, umoya ofudumele omuhle ngokumangalisayo owulindele eSportman's Bar, etholakala enkundleni engasekungeneni kwehotela iLugogo Sun. Lendawo yotshwala enesigqi sezemidlalo iyindawo enhle ngokumangalisayo ukuzitholela imidlalo emikhulu idlalwa kumabonakude obekwe kahle ukuthi wonke umuntu abuke futhi ajabule. Ukudla lwasemini okululana nje kusevwa kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuMgqibelo.



Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye nezemidlalo ezibanjelwa khona.

Izingane ezineminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngakho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishinini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane Game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.




IValley yaseSwaziland enhle kunazo zonke ngokubukeka kwayo iphethe futhi enye imfihlo, ihotela iLugogo Sun.

Ingxenye esazulu yendawo yokuvakasha iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley itholakala e-Ezulwini Valley kanti kuyimizuzu embalwa ushayela usuka kweyobukhazikhazi iRoyal Swazi Sun. Ihotela libhekene nendawo ebukeka kahle ngokumangalisayo yezingadi zetropicana kanye nekhozi yegalofu. ILugogo Sun ingenkulu kunawo wonke amahotela endawo yokuvakasha kanti futhi yakhiwe ukuthwala amaqembu amakhulu abantu.



Indlu yokudlala yaseKamp Kwena itholakala eRoyal Swazi Sun kanti futhi inikeza imidlalo yosuku lonke, okubalwa kuyo imidlalo ethile, ukugibela amahhashi kanye kanye neminye imidlalo ongazikhombisa kuyo ukuhlakanipha yabavakashi banoma yiliphi ihotela abaneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12.

IFactory yeCarnival itholakala endaweni yokungena enkulu yasekhasino, iCarnival Factory ikhombisa uhlelo olumangalisayo lwevideo entsha kanye nemidlalo yezingane zindawonye.



Imidlalo yangaphandle
Uma usukhathele amathuba onke asendaweni yokuvakasha, ungathanda ukuzama ngaphandle usuku olulandelayo kanye nokuzikhethela kukahhafu wosuku.

IMdzimba Trail, uhambo lukahhafu wosuku lokuzitholela ulwazi lwangaphandle - uvakashele amakhaya aseSwazini, izindawo zemilando, isangoma sendawo, izimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla bese ujabulela amakhilomitha amabili uhamba phezu kwemangalisayo intaba ubuka. ILobamba Trail igxile emlandweni wesizwe nowezwe, uhambo olunguhhafu wosuku lukaLobamba luhlanganisa ukuya eNational Museum, iKing Sobhuza Memorial Park, iLobamba Royal Village, iSwazi Village yezamasiko, kanye neMatenga Falls nezimakethe zemisebenzi yezandla. Ubumnandi beSwaziland, uhambo olumangalisayo lweqembu lakusihlwa olugxile esitayeleni sempilo nezamasiko. Okubalwa ukungena eRoyal uMphakatsi (ikhaya lenkosi yamaSwazi) okulandelwa ukungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary ukulungiselela nokunambitha ukudla kwendabuko, kanye nomdanso wamandla weSibhaca.

ISwazi Arts neCrafs, chitha uhhafu wosuku uvakashela izindawo ezimangalisayo zezimakethe zokwakhiwa ngobiciko nemisebenzi yezandla e-Ezulwini, eMantenga, eMlilwane, naseMakerns, kubandakanya nengafaniswa nalutho olunye ifemu yamakhandlela. Enye futhi indlela engathathwa edlula e-Ezulwini Valley iya phezulu eMbabane, eMotshana kanye nedumile ifemu yezingilazi iNgwenya, ukubona abakhi bengilazi bamaSwazi besemsebenzini. IWildlife Trails, iMlilwane Hogs kanye neHippo Trails, uhhafu wosuku ubuka okumangalisayo, ubuka ihhipo kanye nezinyoni eziningi kanye nokubuka nje okwasendle okuningi. Okubaliwe isitobhi sesizinda semisebenzi yezandla kanye nendawo lapho kuphunyulwa khona okutholwa kuyo okokuqabula umzimba. IHlane Big Cats, usuku lonke uluchitha ulandela amabhubesi, ingulube yehlathi, kanye nengwe eHlane Royal national Park, okunokuzikhethela ukuhamba ngezinyawo okugadiwe. Ukudla kwasemini nokokuqabula umzimba kubaliwe.

IMkhaya Endagered Species, chitha usuku lonke ubukela ngokuvulekile konke okukhona usemotweni ubukela inyathi , indlulamithi, ubhejane omnyama, indlovu, utsessebe, kanye nokunye okuningi. Jabulela isitobhi sokuziqabula somgodi wamanzi kanye nokudla kwasemini okulula kwenhle ikambo esehlathini. Izinto ezibukwayo ezingaphandle, iwhite Water Rafting, umfula omkhulu Usuthu River, okunikeza ulwazi ongasophinde ulukhohlwe uma ufuna ukuzitholela ubuhle. Usuku olugcwele noma olunguhhafu, yonke impahla ibaliwe, kanye nokugadwa, ezokuthutha nokudla kwasemini. Ukubekisa indawo yesikhathi samanzi aphansi kubalwa kuko ukuhamba indlela ende ngezinyawo ukuhlamba emanzini ngesikebhe. Okunye okuhle kungahlelwa njengokukhwela intaba ngamabhayisikili akhona, iparagliding kanye nokuhamba nge 4 x 4.


Ezemidlalo  nezokuzithokozosa
Izivakashi zinezinto  zayo yonke iRoyal Swazi Sun Valley Resort kusukela ekuzikhetheleni nangesikhathi sekuza kwezokudlala ngaphandle. Ungabhukuda, udlale igalofu, ibhola lomphebezo kanye nelidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, zitholele izindlela zemvelo, uhla lungolungapheli ...

IRoyal Swazi Country Club, ikhozi ebukekayo yemiqhudelwano emikhulu yemigodi engu 18 eseSwazi Royal Sun Country Club ingenye okunokuthola kuyo umvuzo ongatholwa noma kuphi emhlabnei, ngezindawo zayo ezinezintaba ezingajatshulelwa kuzona zonke izindunduma okuluhlaza. Ipar 72 yekhozi eshanelayo eyavulwa ngo 1966 ilele phansi emimangweni yezintaba zeLubombo, ngezindawo zayo ezilinganayo ezingaqhathaniswa ezingu 9 zokuqala kanye nezisemumva ezingu 9 ezinenezela ngokugcwele ukubukeka nokundlaleka kwentaba. Okuluhlaza kanye nemigwaqo emikhulu evulekile kusezindaweni eziphezulu ekugcineni futhi zimema izindawo ezifana namachibi, izindonga ezicinaniswe okumilile, ngaphandle kwezindawo eziyizimbondela ezigijima eduze kwemigwaqo evulekile, kubonakala izindunduma ( enye yazo ebheke phezulu kakhulu eyenza ukuthi izitebhizi zikalayini kaloliwe zakhiwa ukuze zikwazi ukukhanda indlela), kuvunguza umoya nokunyakaza kwezihlahla okuhle ngokumangalisayo kanye nezitshalo zemvelo zendawo. Sekukonke, kungukuzitholela umvuzo wokuba kulendawo ngokuphelele kubo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane bawo wonke amazinga.

Ukubeka okuluhlaza, kukhona indawo yokuluhlaza eseduze neClub House, eyenzelwe abadlali. Indlu yesinukha, kukhona itafula eligcwele ngokuphelele lokudlala isinukha eliseCountry Club. AmaDarts, Kukhona amabhodi amabili abekiwe ukuhlukanisa amadoda ebafaneni! Umdlalo wokugibela amahhashi, izitebele zase-Ezulwini zitholakala ngaphansi kwe-Ezulwini Sun. Abafundisi abakufundele ukugibela amahhashi kanye nokunakekelwa kokugibela kuyatholakala zonke izinsuku. Amagceke okugingqa ibhola, kukhona amagceke okudlala ibhola eligingqwayo aluhlaza amabili nawo atholakala ngaphansi kwendawo evulekile yaseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nenobuntofontofo ukungenisa abadlali abangu 7 iyinye. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagceke aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakala Ezulwini Sun.

Amachibi okubhukuda neJacuzzi, ihotela ngalinye linechibi lalo lokubhukuda elinezambulela zalo kanye nezindawo zokuphumula. Okudayisa endaweni ethengisa ngotshwala kanye nohla lokudla okulula nakho kuyatholakala. Womabili I-Ezulwini Sun kanye neLugogo Sun zinamachibi okubhukuda ezingane. Bese kuba khona ijacuzzi enkulu engaphandle ehlanganisa ichibi lokubhukuda neRoyal Swazi Sun. IVolleyball, izinkundla zokudlala iValleyball zingatholakala uma ziceliwe kumahotela iRoyal Swazi Sun, iLugogo Sun nase-Ezulwini Sun.




Imidlalo yangaphandle


Izitolo
I-African Queen, izinhlobonhlobo zezingubo eziningi kanye nemvunula yamaSwazi yesikhumbuzo. IKatinka Boutique edayisa ngemfashini yezingubo zabesifazane zekhethelo zodwa. Isitolo seGolf Pro, kukhona izinto eziningi zekhethelo zokudlala igalofu. IPapaya, izimpahla zidayiswa kusukela kwezelogo kuya kwezibalulekile, amabhuku, kanye nezinto zokugeza nokugcoba. Indawo yokungena ezitolo eziseRoyal Swazi nayo iyatholakala.




Izitolo
I-African Queen, izinhlobonhlobo zezingubo eziningi kanye nemvunula yamaSwazi yesikhumbuzo. IKatinka Boutique edayisa ngemfashini yezingubo zabesifazane zekhethelo zodwa. Isitolo seGolf Pro, kukhona izinto eziningi zekhethelo zokudlala igalofu. IPapaya, izimpahla sidayiswa kusukela kwezelogo kuya kwezibalulekile, amabhuku, kanye nezinto zokugeza nokugcoba. Amaphephandaba endawo eBenson kanye nawaseNingizimu Afrika, amaswidi, izikibha, izikibha ezinemiqala kanye namakhadi emikhonzo okunye kwezinto ezimbalwa ezidayisa eBenson's.




Okuhehayo kwendawo
Kuhlale kukhona inhlokomo esheshayo ekhasini kanye nokugubha okukhalayo kwemishini yemiklomelo emikhulu ehotela eRoyal Swazi Sun.

Kukhona izindawo eziningi ezikhumbulekayo ngemizuzu nje zeRoyal Swazi Sun ukuphinda uzivakashele kanye nezitolo ezimangalisayo zemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla ukuzibukela nje. Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezilwane eziningi, izinyoni, izihlahla nezimbali ezingabukwa kumapaki ahlukene emvelo kanye nasendaweni lapho kugcinwe khona ezemvelo. Imakethe iMbabane, imakethe iMbabane yakha isizinda sobubenyebenye bemibala yedolobha elikhulu, kanti futhi kuyimpoqo kuwona wonke umuntu kusukela kubathwebuli bezithombe kuya kulabo abafuna ukuzizwela ukunambitheka (okungezindlela eziningi kuneyodwa) kwempilo yangempela yaseSwazi. Ubuhlalu baseSwazi, izingubo zendabuko kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zemikhonzo kungathengwa. Imakethe yase-Ezulwini yokwenziwe ngezandla, inezinti eziningi zemikhonzo ongazikhethela kuzona. IMantenga  Cultural Village, iMantenga Cultural Village iqukethe inxuluma elinezindlu zasekhaya ezingu 16 kanye nemihlobiso yezandla yendabuko ebukwayo, ikhombisa ubuso obuningi obuveza impilo yamaSwazi yakudala, yombili yokuhlala komphakathi, ezomnotho kanye nezenkolo. Isizinda sezemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla saseMantenga sinezitolo ezingu 11 ezidayisa okuhlukene kwezandla, ama-Workshop kanye namaDemo's, kanye nehhovisi lukuthola ulwazi lwezivakashi. Indawo ekugcinwa khona izilwane ezomisiwe yesizwe yaseSwaziland, itholakala eduze kwezindlu zasePhalamende, iNational Museuma iqukethe isidlidli kanye nokukunika ulwazi oluningi lohla lwezinto ezibukwayo ezikukhombisa imvelaphi yamaSwazi, ezendabuko, izingubo kanye nempilo jikelele. Izithombe ezidlala zikhombisa imilando yamaSwazi kanye nokuthelelwa okwangaphandle okukhanda ingxenye yamasiko amaSwazi kuzokuvezela ngokucacile abavakashi ngezemilando yombuso wamaSwazi. IMlilwane Game Reserve, akukho ukuvakasha kwase-Ezulwini Valley okugcwele ngaphandle kokungena eMlilwane Wildlife Sanctuary. Jabulela ubuhle bezinto ezibonwayo ezingciniwe lapho uzobona indlulamithi, izebra, inkonkoni, impala, inyala kanye nephilayo indlovudawana. Ifemu yamakhandlela yaseSwazi ayifani nalutho lwase-Afrika, amakhandlela enziwe ngezandla, enziwa ngamakhosikazi namadoda endawo enza imisebenzi yezandla. Isivakashi singabuka ukwakhiwa kwawo konke kusukela ekuthanjisweni okungajahile kwemovu emibili, kuya ekwakhiweni kokugcina komhlobiso. Izindlu zasePahalmende, izindlu zasePhalamende ziyavulelwa abavakashi abangangena ngamunye ekamelweni elilodwa ephelekezelwa ogadile osebenzayo bese futhi ehlanganyela ekulalaleni ukuphikisana ePhalamende.



Ukudla kwasehotela iRoyal Swazi Sun 
Indawo ethengisa ngokudla endlaleke kahle odongeni ebhekene echibi lokubhukuda leRoyal Swazi Sun, likunika ukudla kwasekuseni, okwasemnini kanye nokwakusihlwa okutholakala zonke izinsuku, okugcizelela ezindishini ezilungiswe ngokumsulwa oku-odwe etafuleni.

IPlanters Restaurant, lendawo ethengisa ngokudla kwe a la carte emangalisayo igxile kakhulukazi kokosiwe okusajusi, okhari abanamakha amnandi kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zezindishi zomdambi. Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala yasekhasino itholakala phakathi ekhasino, kukhona injabulo yasebusuku kulendawo ethengisa ngotshwala ehlala inokunama.

IPlanters Bar, umsebenzi uqhubeka  kuze kube isikhathi sasebusuku kulendawo etholakala ngaphakathi endaweni ethengisa ngokudla yasePlanters. Indawo ethengisa ngotshwala esechibini, iqeda ukoma komphimbo etholakala eceleni kwechibi. ICountry Club Bar, inokubukeka okungcono kunakho konke klendawo yokuvakasha kungajatshulelwa lapha eCountry Club Bar ebhekene nekhozi yemiqhudelwano emikhulu kanye ngale kwayo ezimangalisayo izintaba.




Ukuzithokozisa
Kukhona izinto eziningi ongazenza kwiValley yethu, kwabavakashi beminyaka yonke, kusukela ekhasino, kuya ezindaweni ezithengisa ngokudla, ezithengisa ngotshwala, kanye nezemidlalo ezibanjelwa khona.

Izingane ezineminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12 zinokwazo okuhlelelwe zona okuzijabulisa ngakho kanye nemidlalo ehlelwe eKamp Kwena ebanika okwabo kwezinsuku zonke zesonto. Uma uthanda ukuba nobudididi ematafuleni noma emishinini yokugembula, kukhona ikhasino yokuzijabulisa kwakho eseRoyal Swazi Sun Valley. IRoyal Swazi Sun Valley enhle ngokumangalisayo itholakala endaweni enhle ukungena kuyona kalula kulezindawo ezilandelayo ongazithanda, ngaphandle kokuhamba kakhulu: iSwazi Cultural Village, iSwazi Candle Factory, izimakethe eziningi ezahlukene zemisebenzi yezandla iNational Meseum , iMlilwane Game Reserve iMantenga Nature Reserve.



IKhasi lasekhaya
IRoyal Swazi Sun, yaziwa kakhulu njengekhaya lombuso waseSwaziland, futhi seliwine ukwaziwa oluphindaphindiwe kwamazwe ngamazwe eminyakeni eminingi, kanti namhlanje ihlela isibonelo esicolekile sobukhazikhazi kanye nokunakekelwa okusezingeni eliphezulu okunconywa amakhosi kanye nabanye abafana nawo.

Ihotela ligubezelwe intaba yase-Ezulwini Valley, enemihosha yayo ecinaniswe amahlonzi ezihlahla kanye namadwala anokumunga.  Kuhlale kukhona inhlokomo esheshayo ekhasini kanye nokugubha okukhalayo kwemishini yemiklomelo emikhulu ehotela eRoyal Swazi Sun.Kukhona izindawo eziningi ezikhumbulekayo ngemizuzu nje zeRoyal Swazi Sun ukuphinda uzivakashele kanye nezitolo ezimangalisayo zemisebenzi eyenziwe ngezandla ukuzibukela nje. Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezilwane eziningi, izinyoni, izihlahla nezimbali ezingabukwa kumapaki ahlukene emvelo kanye nasendaweni lapho kugcinwe khona ezemvelo.
Ulwazi lokuxhumana
	Okuhehayo kwasekhaya


Izitolo

IKamp Kwena
Indlu yokudlala yaseKamp Kwena itholakala eRoyal Swazi Sun kanti futhi inikeza imidlalo yosuku lonke, okubalwa kuyo imidlalo ethile, ukugibela amahhashi kanye kanye neminye imidlalo ongazikhombisa kuyo ukuhlakanipha kwabavakashi banoma yiliphi ihotela abaneminyaka engu 4 kuya kwengu 12.

Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla ezimbili zebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili ezitholakala khona ngaphansi kwamagceke aluhlaza okudlalela ibhola eligingqwayo. Izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla zebhola lomphebezo elinophahla phezulu eliseduze kwechibi eliseRoyal Swazi Sun kanye nezinye izinkundla ezimbili ezitholakala Ezulwini Sun.

Amachibi okubhukuda neJacuzzi, ihotela ngalinye linechibi lalo lokubhukuda elizezambulela zalo kanye nezindawo zokuphumula. Okudayisa endaweni ethengisa ngotshwala kanye nohla lokudla okulula nakho kuyatholakala. Womabili I-Ezulwini Sun kanye neLugogo Sun zinamachibi okubhukuda ezingane. Bese kuba khona ijacuzzi enkulu engaphandle ehlanganisa ichibi lokubhukuda neRoyal Swazi Sun. IVolleyball, izinkundla zokudlala iValleyball zingatholakala uma ziceliwe kumahotela iRoyal Swazi Sun, iLugogo Sun nase-Ezulwini Sun.

Ngokuvaleka kwezithombe kwenza ukuthi kusheshe isikhathi sokuvuleka kwekhasi. Ungazivula izithombe noma uzivale noma ngasiphi isikhathi. Manje, uma ukuxhumeka kukalayini wakho wocingo kuhamba kancane, ungazivala izithombe uze uthole ikhasi olifunayo bese uzibuyisela izithombe emuva futhi ukubuka isithombe esiphelele sokufunayo.

Indlu yokufuyela izinyoni, Izindlu zokufuyela izinyoni ongahamba phakathi kwazo ezinezinyoni eziyizinhlobo ezingu 887 zaseNingizimu Afrika, itholakala ezingadini zaseCascades.

Izingadi zeBotanic, izinkulungwane zezivamile, ezomdabu kanye neziphuma kwamanye amazwe izihlahla kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zokutshaliweyo kugcwele eSun City okuqala izikhungo eziningi ezahlukene, okubalwa kuzo izindawo ezomile, amahlathi acinene, izindawo eziswakeme kanye nokutshaliweyo okusezweni. Izingadi zeBotanic eziseSun City zibandakanya izindlela ezinhlanu ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo iBaobab Tour, iCascades Gardens Tour, iBeach Tour, iSpiderweb Trail kanye neLost City Croc Pit Tour. Lezizindlela zilungele abancane nabadala.

Izingadi zaseKwena zepulazi lezingwenya, izingadi zaseKwena ziyikhaya lezingwenya ezingaphezu kuka 300 zeNile kanti zitholakala nje endaweni yokungena enkulu engena eSun City. IPilanesberg National Park, ngaseceleni leSun City kukhona iPilanesberg National Park, lapho izivakashi zingathola khona okokuvusa amadlingozi kweBig Five; ingwe, ibhubesi, indlovu, inyathi kanye nobhejane.

Ukuhamba ngamabhalune ngokushona kwelanga, ukuzula kwezikhathi zasemini kanye nezoso zakusihlwa noma amabraai ehlathini kukunikeza umlingo wakudala wase-Afrika yangempela. Abaqaphi bendawo bakunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zohambo olukhulu kanye nokubukwa kwePilanesberg National Park. Zikhethela ukuhamba emini noma ebusuku ugibele, ukulandela umkhondo, ukuhamba uvakashela ezamasiko noma uhambe ngebhaluni. Idesika labaqaphi bendawo litholakala ehotela eSun City ukubekisa kanye nolwazi.




Ezemidlalo kanye nezokuzithokozisa
Izivakashi zinezinto zonke zendawo yokuvakasha eSun City lapho zingazikhethela khona uma sekuza ngakwezemidlalo zangaphandle. Kukhona emangalisayo iValley of Waves, enye yamapaki amanzi amangalisa umhlaba wonke lapho kukhona ukundiza emoyeni emanzini, ukudlala emanzini, ukushushuluza emanzini, kanye neminye imidlalo eminingi yamanzi, ungadlala ibhola lomphebezo kanye nebhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, uhambe ugibele ihhashi, uzitholele ukuhamba ubuka imvelo, uhla olungapheliyo ...




IValley of Waves
	Ezemidlalo
Imidlalo yangaphandle

Izindlela ezinconyawo
Izindlela eziqhamuka ngaphandle, uma uhamba ngasenyakatho uhambela ngeseWilliam Nicole Drive uya ngasezindleleni ezine eziphambanayo eWitkoppen Road. Jikela ngakwesobunxele ungene eWitkoppen Road idlula iFourways Mall ngakwesokudla sakho. Uma ufika ezibanini zokuqala jikela ngakwesokudla ungene kwiCeder Avenue. Qhubekela emgwaqeni ongu-T ngangamakilomitha angu 8.5. iLion Bridge Supermakert ingakwesokudla. Jikela ngakwesukunxele bese uthatha omgwaqo ojikela ngakwesokudla sakho wokuqala. Qhubekela phambili emgwaqeni ongu-T ngangamakhilomitha amabili, udlula ngaphezulu umgwaqo omkhulu angu R28. Ipulazi lezinkukhu lingakwesokunxele. Jikela ngakwesokudla emgwaqeni ongu-T ungene ku R512. Qhubeka njalo uze ufike komunye umgwaqo ongu-T uR27 udlule umgwaqo ojikela eLanseria Airport. Jikela kwesokunxele ngomgwaqo uR512 uye eMabaliesburg. Hamba amakhilomitha angu 9.4 futhi, ujikele ngaseBrits ngomgwaqo onguR512. Nqamula ulayini kaloliwe ngebhuloho elinqamula idamu iHartbeespoort. Emgwaqeni ongu-T jikela kwesokudla uye eBrits ngoR512. Hamba uye esitobhini esikhulu esinezindlela ezine. Jikela kwesokunxele uye ngaseBrits neRustemburg. Dlula umgwaqo wokuqala ojikayo oya eBrits. Hamba njalo ungajiki, dlula iTropical Gardens ngakwesokudla. Dlula umgwaqo uR27 ngakwesokudla kanye nebhodi elikhombisayo ukuthi: sun City 89km. Hamba uqonde ngqo ngangamakhilomitha angu 10 uze ufike ebhodini elikhombisayo ukuthi: Sun City 27 km. Jikela kwesokunxele bese unqamula ngaphezulu umgwaqo omkhulu, uzobe ususemgwaqeni okuholela ngqo eSun City.

Izindlela ezihamba ngaphakathi, uma ushiya isinxanxathela seSun City ujikela kwesokudla bese uhamba uqonde endleni enguR79. Emgwaqeni ongu-T jikela kwesokunxele bese uhambq uqonde edamini iHartbeespoort ngangamakhilomitha angu 15 bese ujikela kwesikunxele kuR 512 oya eRandburg unqamula ibhuloho elihamba phezu kwedamu iHartbeespoort. Emgwaqeni ongu-T jikela kwesokunxele kuR27 oya ePitoli, uR512 oya eRandburg. Hamba amakhilomitha angu 9.6 bese ijikela kwesokudla ngomgwaqo uR512 oya eLanseria Airport. Dlula umgwaqo ojikela esikhumulweni sezindiza bese uhamba amakhilomitha angu 3 bese kuthi ezimpambanweni zemigwaqo ujikele ngakwesobunxele. Qhubekela phambili udlule ipulazi lezinkukhu ngakwesokudla sakho. Nqamula phezu kumgwaqo omkhulu okhululekile u R28 emgwaqeni ongu T. Jikela ngakwesokunxele bese uthatha esokudla sokuqala bese uqhubekela kwiFourways Mall. Izindlela eziqhamuka ePitoli. Khetha uN4m uR27, uR514 noma uR513 esitobhini sezindlela ezine semigwaqo ephamabanayo ngale kwethanela yedamu iHartbeespoot. Landela indlela kusukela kulezimpabano mgwaqo njengoba zibekiwe kwimap yendlela.




Izitolo
Ungathenga izinto eziningi eSun City kusukela eziqedaphungeni, izincwadi kanye nokutahndekayo okusemgangathweni okokugqokela injabulo kanye nobucwebe.

Izitolo zezingubo. ISun City Collection. Izingubo zeSouvenir kanye nezipho njengesikhumbuzo sokuvakashela kwakho eSun City. Buka izingubo zase-Afrika zokuzogqokela nje okungenamcimbi kanye nezimfashini ezisemgangathweni zePlace of Adorment Beachwear ezitholakala eValley of Waves. Izingubo zemicimbi nezokuzigqokela nje uzikhululekele zeCatherine Moore Ladies. ISun City Trading. Izingubo zonke zabesilisa bonke abangazidinga. . IKookai yemfashini yabesimame yakamumva.

Buka izicathulo. Ukuzikhethela okuningi nokukhulu kwezicathulo zangaphakathi nezangaphandle - ezilungele noma yimuphi umcimbi! Ubucwebe. ICharles Greig Jewellers igama elaziwayo eNingizimu Afrika engcwetini  yamatshe ayigugu kanye nasebucwebeni. Ivulwa nsuku zonke ePalace iSzhwart Jewellers esesizindeni sezokuzithokozisa esiseLost City yeCoriors and Gifts.

IPalace Collection. Emihle imisebenzi enithwe ngesandla kanye nezikibha ezahlukile nezikibha jezi ezikhombisa imihlobiso egqugquzelwe ezobuciko bokwakha zasePalace. ITigers Eye, inezipho zase-Afrika kanye nemikhonzo. ISun Shop, isitolo esejwayelekile esidayisa amaphephandaba, amabhuku, oswidi, ugwayi kanye nezinye izidingo ezejwayelekile zomphakathi. Endaweni evulekile yokungena ehotela. ICabanas Collection, isitolo sukodlana okulula esitholakala ehotela iCabanas. Amabhuku kanye nezincwadi eCNA ( iCentral News Agency) ukuzikhethela okukhulu emabhukwini angaphakathi nawamazwe ngamzwe kuyatholakala eCNA.

ISun City Pharmacy, iSun City Pharmacy itholakala eLost City Entertainment Centre. Ukudla kwamakhekhe nokunye, zonke izinto ezimnandi zitholakala eLost City Entertainment Centre, kulabo abathanda okumnanjana. ISweet Discovery itholakala eValley of waves, iSweet Discovert iphethe izinhlobonhlobo zokusamakhekhe nokunye okuhambisana nako. Okujwayelekile, umthwebuli zithombe waseStudio Jano Resindent kanye nofakela amafulemu ezithombeni. Ucingo lwakhe: (014) 5574888. i-email jano@icon.co.za Isaluni elungisa izinwele, iRoyal Salon International elungisa izinwele ngabenzi bezinwele abaqeqeshiwe ukwenza izitayela. Itholakala ePalace. IManicures, abalungisi bobuso nabo bakhona. ISun Hair and Beauty, iSun hair and Beauty yona itholakala enkundleni yeibili ngasohlangothini lwangasempumalanga lwehotela iSun City. Igxile ekugundeni nasekwenzeni izitayela zase-Europe zezizwe zakhona. Uhlelo olugcwele lokulungiswa kwezinwele nokucwalwa kobuso luyatholakala, okubalwa kulo nezokuzinciphisa kanye nokunakekelwa ulele embhedni elangeni kanye nokuphathwaphathwa ngaemumva emhlane kweShiatsu.




Ezemidlalo
IGalofu, iLost City Golf Course kanye neGolf Club Gary player seyenze ikhozi yegalofu elicolekile nelikhumbulekayo eLost City, kanti waukho umgodi okhumbuleka kukhulu kune-par 3 weshumi nantathu. Okuluhlaza - okumise okwezwekazi lase-Afrika - kuvikelwe izindunduma ezintathu ezinkulu ngakwesokudla kanye nezingwenya ezingaphezu kuka-40 eziphilayo ngakwesokunxele. Ikhozi ayiyinde ngokungafanele kanti umgodi ngamunye unezihlahla ezimbalwa, ezikunikeza ukuzikhethela okuzovumelana wonke amazinga olwazi. Umqambi wekhozi ungum-Afrika kakhulu, ngemigodi eminingi inqamula ngaseceleni lentaba. Ukubukeka okutholakala ezihlahleni eziphekeme kuyamangalisa kanti futhi buze bunconyelwe ukuthi umuntu uvumela isikhathi eside ukudla lekhozi emangalisayo ukuze ancome lokukubukeka okumangalisayo, imisindo kanye namaphunga ase-Afrika.

IGary Player Country Club ibingelela amakhozi ukuwasombulula kanti sekube iminyaka engu-20 iGary Player Country Club ihlala idlala imiqhudelwano esemazingeni aphezulu, ukwakha idumela lekhozi eliklomelisa ngomdlalo omuhle futhi lijezise omubi, ikhozi edinga ukuyiqala ngesilinganiso esingadlulisiyo ngezikhathi lapho ibe ikhokhela ngobuhle bayo, ikhozi enothe ngokudlalelwa kuyo imidlalo emikhulu nenedumela yaseNingizimu Afrika - umdlalo odlalwa kanye ngonyaka weMillion Dollar Challenge. Kukhona into encomekayo ngokudlala kulekhozi okungukuthi imidlalo emikhulu seyadlalelwa kona, ukukwazi ukuqhathanisa umdlalo wakhao nowabo. Konke kuyingxenye yalesimangaliso esiyisipesheli sokudala iGary Player Country Club. ITitleist Golf Academy eseSun City, iTitleist Golf Academy yakhe endaweni yayo yodwa yeLost City Clubhouse kanti iphethwe nguTeddy Webber. UWebber , owayeqeqeshelwe ezokuvakasha kanti iqembu lakhe labaqeqeshi abakufundele abazimisele abakulungele ukufundisa ukudlalwa kwegalofu, banamakhono abalulekile kanye nobuciko kubavakashi kanye nabafundi abazibandakanya emidlalweni eminingi nebanzi ye-Academy. I-Academy inikeza kokubili kwangasese kanye nokwamaqembu ukufundiswa ngemali yabo ngezinsuku ezintathu ezikhethekile zokufundiswa ezibekwa phezulu. Lezizinsuku ezintahthu zokuqeqeshwa zilwela ekutheni ukwazi ukuhlangabezana nezimfuno zomdlalo:

Ukuthuthukisa umdlalo wakho wegalofu ngokufunda ukushuda okufanele ngokomthetho. Ukuthwala ukuzithemba ngokwengezela amakhono okwakha amashodi kanye nokwandisa ulwazi lwakho olujwayelekile nokudlala igalofu. Ukuthuthukisa ukukwazi kwakho ukulungisa amashodi aphambukayo ekhozini. Imininingwne yokubekisa: Ukutholala imininingwane ethe xaxa ekhona noma ukubeka indawo yakho, sicela ushayele uTitleist Golf Academy oseSun City kulenombolo yocingo: (014) 557-1555 noma ku: (014) 557-3711. Amanani: Isifundo sokufundela igalofu nomuntu nayedwa - imizuzu engu 45: ngu R140.00. Isifundo sokufundela igalofu seqembu - kusuka ebantwini abangu 3 kuya kwabangu 8 - imizuzu angu 90: nguR 80.00 umuntu eyedwa. Isifundo somuntu ngamunye esethwetshulwayo ngeVideo - imizuzu engu 60: ngu R 200.00. Izinsuku zeCorparate Golf - iGolf Clinic ngabakufundle izingcweti kuphela - imizuzu engu 30: ngu R 500.00.

IWaterworld, ichibi elikhulu elise-waterworld yilapho injabulo ihamba khona emoyeni. Dlala ipara-sail, ijetski, ukuhamba ngesikebhe kanye nokushushuluza emanzini noma vele nje uthathe elula ipedalo. Abaqeqeshi abanolwazi olunzulu bayatholakala ukwazisa izivakashi ngemininingwane ecolekileyo ngezemidlalo. Ukugibela amahhashi, izifundo ezifundiswa ngumhlali oqeqshayo, izindlela ezihanjwayo ezilandela imikhondo ethile kanye nokuhola uhambo, ukuzitholela ulwazi kanye nokuba ngumqali wokugibela ibhayisikili. Ibhola lomphebezo, kukhona izinkundla ezingu 11 zebhola lomphebezo ezitholakayo kuzona khona ezingu 5 ezinophahla olumboze phezulu. Ukufunidswa nakho kuyatholakala kumqeqeshi oyingcweti kwezebhola lomphebezo ongumhlali wendawo. Ibhola elidlalelwa ezindongeni ezimbili, kukhona izinkundla zalo ezimbili ezitholakala eGary Player Country Club. Ukukwela intaba, kukhona izindlela ezombili eziqanjiwe zokuzungeza ngamabhayisikili eziseSun City kanye namabhayisikili abaneminyaka yonke ayatholakala ngokuwaqasha endlini yekilabhu lebhola lomphebezo. Izindlela okuhanjwa ngazo ukugibela amabhayisikili nezokugijima, Kukhona izindlela ezingamakhilomitha amathathu namahlanu ezizungeze kokubili iGary Player neLost City Golf Course. Izindlela zonke zinhle ngokumangalisayo ukubukwa kanti zimakwe ngokwebanga nendawo eziya kuyo. IHealth Spa kanye neGym, isizinda sezempilo sitholakala egary Player Country Club lapho kukhona indawo yokuzilolonga, ijaccuzi kanye nokugeza ngesitimi kanye futhi nohlelo nokwelashwa nge-therapeutic.




IValley of Waves
Kude le nolwandle - yebo kukhona iparadesi yebhishi! Hlamba egagasini eliphakeme ngango 1.8 metre eValley of Waves. Gxambuzeka emanzini ushone phansi noma ugwilize uzungeze iLazy River Ride. Shintsha bese uphumula amabhishi asagolide ngesikahthi unambitha ezibandayo iziphuzo ngaphansi kwelanga lase-Afrika.

IValley of Waves ivulwa nsuku zonke kusukela ngo 09:00 kuya ku 18:00 ehlobo kanti ngo 10:00 kuze kube ngu 17:00 ebusika bese ikunikeza izinhlobonhlobo zobuhle bezinto ezikulindele ukuthi ukuzitholele zona futhi uzijabulise ngazo. Zihambele unqamule ubhuloho elihle nalo ngokwalo iBridge of Time elihlanganisa iLost City Entertainment Centre neValley of Waves. Eligadwe ezimangalisayo izindlovu ezivikela umnotho ongafaniswa ocashe phakathi ehholo lebaphathi zikhwama, ukulingisa okunobuhlakani bokuqhuma kwentaba yomlino ehlaza yenza, okudala intuthu kanye namatshe akhona ancibilikayo abhovumulukela phambili ephuma phakathi eTemple of Creation. Dlula iMonkey Spring Plaza - amisa isikhumbuzo somhambi wezinkawu ezasindisa isizwe sasemandulo endlaleni eyayikhona ngesikhathi sesomiso esikhulu - bese ungena eValley of Waves phakathi kweKong Gates emangalisayo. Okundlaleke ngaphambi kwakho iRoaring Lagoon, lapho amagagasi aphakeme ngangamamitha amabili egingqika kancane eza ngasenhlabathini emhlophe yasebhishi ethambile. ISacred River Ride izokuthatha ngohmabo olunokuthula ikuse emfuleni ongaphansi, omncane nomdala kuafana kungalandela isikhathi sakho sokiwina indlela. Ezinye izinto ezinhle zingazama zingakweyisa ngobumpi ngokunyakaza kwamanzi - iTemple of Courage - igwilizisa phansi ubuso becala lentaba echibini elihlwabusayo ngaphansi.

Emva kokuzamazama komhlaba kudicilele phansi impucuko yasemandulo, idayimane elidala kanye nezimayini zegolide zakhukhuleza izingxenye zazo kanti namhlanje zinikeza evusa amadlingozi indawo ebusheshelezi amanzi njengoba zijikela phansi ngaseceleni lentaba. Kukhona amahlathi ambalwa ahlukene e-valley, okubalwa kuwo iRain Forest, iBaobab Forest, iJacaranda Forest kanye neTropical Forest, aqukethe ezingandile izihlahla ezinhlobonhlobo. Qhubeka nokuhlola bese uzozithola usuphezu kweSway Bridge - elaklanywa iNkosi ukucupha labo ababefisela okubi umndeni wasebukhosini - liyanyakaza futhi liyazwinga njengoba ligxamalazele izihobhozi ezizamulayo phezu kwamanzi achachazayo ngaphansi. Zitholele iHidden Cave Falls ngokulandlea iHippo Gorge Trail, kusukela ezinyaweni zerayal Staircase noma thatha indlela emangalisayo ehlanganisa iRain Foresta enqamula iRoyal Staircase. Abahloli abanesibindi abangesabi lutho bazothola futhi iGong yeSun Lion. LeGong enhle ngokumangalisayo isiza abantu basemandulo ngokubathumela kwephephile iRoyal Arena kafushane nje ngaphambi kokuthi ukuzamazama komhlaba kudicilele phansi amakhaya abo. Uma udlula ngaseRoyal Arena, inkundla enhle yokudlalela imidlalo ezungezwe izihlalo ezakhelwe khona kanye neRoyal Baths, lapho amanzi ayo antukuntuku ayaziwa njengamanzi anamandla okuphilisa kanti futhi yayakhiwe ekuqaleni ngaphezu komchachazo wemvelo. Thatha ikhefu lokuzitholela okusamzana kwangempela e-Observatory Bar ebhekene neLake of Peace kanye neRoaring Lagoon noma uvakashele iFood Court lapho ukudla okunambitheka ngokwedlulele kutholakala khona.




Indawo yokulala
ISuna City iyakwazi ukukunikeza amagumbi amahle ngokumangalisayo angu 13 01 anakho konke kwawo ekuzikhetheleni kwamahhotela ahlukene, kusukela kweyomlando iPalace yeLost City kuya kweyejwayelekile nalapho ungaziphumulela khona iCabanas yeSun City.

Amahotela eSun City: iSun City Cabanas, iPalace yeLost City , iSun City Vacation Club, iSun City hotel, iSun City Cascades.



Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala eCabanas
ISun City Cabanas ikunikeza ukuzikhethela ekudleni okuthathul amatafula anesigqi asePalm Terrace, okosiwe okusajusi eMorula Restaurant kanye nokulula okusevwa emini eMotula Café.

Ukudla kwasekuseni okumangalisayo kwasePalm Terrace noma indawo yetafula lokudla kwakusihlwa, kuhleleke kwezinhel ngokumangalisayo izingadi eziluhlaza. IMorula Restaurant , iziteki ezinsobonsobo kanye nokosiwe okusevwa emoyeni okumemayo ngamanani aphansi.

Imorula Café iseva okulula kwasemini. IPool Bar itholakala endaweni elungiswe kahle ephezu kodonga ebhekene nechibi lokubhukuda, iCabanas Pool Bar inikeza ukuzikhethela kwengxubevange yotshwala lokuziqabula kanye nejusi yezithelo yamaqabuli bemizimba. Ezinye izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala.



Indawo yokulala
Ubumsulwa bemibalabala exubile besetshenzisiwe ekuhlobiseni iCabanas yona kanye ekunikeza amanani email angefaniswe. Isivakashi saseCabanas zingazikhethela phakathi kweyejwayelekile nenobukhazikhazi iCabanas. ICabanas eyejwayelekile ikunikeza isisefo sokugeza esingaphakathi bese kuthi iCabanas enobukhazikhazi yona ikunikeze indlu yokugeza ephelele enakho konke okudingekayo.

Izidingo ezejwayelekile zibandakanya ucingo olusebenzisa ushayela ngqo laphu ufuna iukushayela khona; isilungiso moya; umabonakude onemibala; umsakazo; isomiso zinwele; ipulaki kagesi yereyiza (100/220V); isitsha esinetiye nokhofi kanye nomshini wokukwazi ukuthola umlayezo kuwo. Isimo sezindlu zaseCabanas sime kanje:
Ezihamba ngazimbili ezejwayelekile zingu 	120
Ezihamba ngazimbili ezibhekene nechibi zingu	 24
Ezejwayelekile zemindeni zingu 	201
Ezemindeni ezibhekene nechibi zingu	32
Ezinobukhazikhazi zingu 	3
Inani lazo sezizonke zngu 	380




Izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala zaseCascades
Izivakashi zaseCascades zidla zikhanyiswe ngamakhandlela esitayeleni esimangalisayo ePeninsula Restaurant naseBar, ukudla okulula kuyatholakala eFishmonger Restaurant.

IPeninsula Restaurant, izindishi ezimangalisayo zokudla ezikhethwe ekudleni kwamazwe ngamazwe, lapho ubumsulwa bezithako buhlanganisa indalo elinga ulwazi lokudla okuhle ngokwedlulele. IFishmonger Restaurant, uhla lokudla kwasolwandle okumnandi keseva enhle indawo ngokumangalisayo. IVistas Bar inikeza ukubukeka okuhle ngokumangalisayo kwezingadi kanye nemihosha yamanzi.

IPenisula Bar, indawo enqunyiweyo yokuhlangana enhle yokuhlambululayo noma okuxutshiwe, iPeninsula Bar ihlanganisa indawo ethengisa ngokudla ngegama elilodwa. IVista bar, lendawo ethengisa ngotshwala esendaweni ephezu kodonga ehlelwe kahle, ivulwa izinsuku ezingu 7 ngesonto, ngokubukeka okumangalisayo kwezingadi kanye nimhosha yamanzi nako kunikeza injabula ephilayo ngoLwesihlanu ngangoMgqibelo ebusuku. Ezinye izindawo ezithengisa ngokudla notshwala.




ICascades inamagumbi angu 243 lapho amazwi emvelo afudumele nanothile ezokwamukela khona. Magumbi ahlotshiswe ngesitayela kanye nokuthinteka okuzothile.

Ubukhazikhazi obungafaniswa yikho okufunwa nsuku zonke, kanti igumbi ngalinye laseCascades libhekene nezingadi ezinhle ngokumangalisayo kanye namachibi okubhukuda. Iningi lalezizindlu ezinobukhazikhazi zinezindlu zokugeza ezithe khwace kanye nempahla yakhon ewubukhazikhazi . Izidingo ezejwayelekile zibandakanya izindlu zokugeza ezakhelwe ngaphakathi, ucingo okwazi ukushayela ngqo lapho ufuna ukushayela khona, isilungiso moya, umabonakude onemibala, umsakazo, isomiso zinwele, ipulaki yereyiza kagesi (100/220V); indawo encane yotswala, ukunakekelwa kwegumbi amahora angu 24 kanye nokukwazi ukuthola umlayezo. Isimo samagumbi aseCascades ami kanje:
Ezihamba kazimbili ezejwayelekile zingu	120
Ezihamba ngazimbili ezinendawo evulekile yezoso zingu 	12
Ezihmaba ngazimbili ezinobukhazikhazi zingu 	41
Ezejwayelekile zemindeni zingu	60
Ezejwayelekile ezinakho konke zingu 	6
Eyejwayelekile enakho konke enkulu iyi	1
Enobukhazikhazi bodwa bonke zingu 	2
Enkulu kunazo zonke enobukhazikhazi iy	1
Inani lazo sezizonke zingu		243.

I-Superbowl
Ikhombisa  abadlali abadumile, kanye nemidlalo emikhulu yamazwe ngamazwe eyenzekayo, imibukiso, imibuthano kanye nabadli. Kungahlala abantu abangu-6000 endaweni enobuntofontofo ukubuka kanye nabangu-1500 besidlo.

I-Superbowl iyinkundla emise okubuso obuyisishiyagalombili eneshashalazi eliphathekayo elakhiwe ngamapali okhuni bese yakhiwa ngezigaba ezikaleka ngo-2m x 1m x 1.5m ukuphakama. Ikhethenisi lendlu libubende ubusindayo kanti futhi livulwa noma livalwe ngogesi wakhona olihambisa kwenye indawo. Ukungena iseteji nasendlini yokushintshela kungasendlini engemuva. Isizinda zokuzithokozisa
Isizinda sokuzithokozisa sinikeza okumnandi kwawo wonke umuntu ngemiklomelo engawinwa emidlalweni ye-video nakweminye imidlalo ye-video ejabulisayo ehehayo.

Kukhona futhi nama-cinema amaningana, enhle nenesitayela esidala I-call bingo kanye nezindawo ezinigi ezidayisa ngokudla ongazikhethela kuzona nezidayisa ngokudla okusheshayo. Imidlalo inikeza amadlingozi angapheliyo ngemishini angamakhulukhulu ebuphithiphithini bekhasino kanye nokokuzithokozisa okwedlulele eSuperbowl.  Ikhasino ecinene; imishiniengamakhulu yokudlala ihlelwe phakathi kokucinana - dlala owodwa wemiklomelo eqhubekayo; iDream Machine, iMillion Mania, iMillennium Mania noma iPoker Magic  bese ungahamba usungumnini zigidi.

Joyina enye yamaphromoshini ethu bese ugoduka uya ekhaya nemiklomelo eminingi. I-Bongo Lounge; Zitholele amadada amabili, ikhiye womnyango, izinyawo ezimbili zenhlanhla kanye nezinyoka eziphilayo zingakwenza ube owinayo! I-bingo lingo ka-22, 21, 11 kanye no-55 okuwokukodwa  kwezinhlanganisela  zangampela ezingakwenza ube owinayo eSun City kwi-Bingo Lounge. Ivulwa ngoLwesithathu, oLwesihlanu, amaSonto nangamaholide omphakathi.

I-Showscan; Lecinema eyedlulele ikhombisa ukuxegaxega okusheshayo kanye  ne-simulator anyakaza ngokushintshashintsha. I-Ster Kinekor Theatres; Konama-cinema awu-4 okhombisa ezizanda kukhishwa. Okubukwa abadala nsuku zonke. I-Trade Horns Action bar; Indawo etshengisa ezemidlalo zodwa izikhombisa emphemeni kamabonakude kanye nokukhona kokuzithokozisa. Imidlalo ye-Novelty ne-Arcade; Ukujabula kwawo wonke umuntu kanye nemiklomelo engawinwa emidlalweni ye-video yakho konke okukhishiwe. I-Superbowl; Lendawo enhle ngendlela emangalisayo isilethela abadlali abadumile kanye nemibuyiso.




Ukuzithokozisa
I-Sun City isixhophe imiphakathi yakwamanye amazwe ngamakhasino ayo akhangayo, izindawo ezidayisa ngokudla kubachizi bako, ezemidlalo ngokwedlulele kanye nababukeli abakhethiweyo.

Okokuzithokozisa okugcwela ngezinhlobo zakho okukhona kusukela emishinini yokudlala kuya kuma-sfaris; imidlalo yezingane emangalisayo; ukugibela amahhashi uya egalofini; imisele yamagelengele yaseLost City... noma ngabe ufunani olwakho ozoluthola eSun City.



Isizinda sezokuzijabulisa
	Ihotela iSun City
Imidlalo yamatafula
Ikhasino itholakala ehotela iSun City kanti ivulwa nsuku zonke. Indawo yokungena ekhasino ihamba endaweni ekhanyayo ngokwemibala yezingcezu ezinkulu zasekhasino, etholakala ngemumva komthombo wezinhlamvu zegolide.

I-American Roulette ( enkundleni enkulu); ukudlala kusuka ku-R5 okuncane kuya kokukhulu uR200. I-Americna Roulette umdlalo omnandi, ogcwele intokozo ngokubheja okwehlukene okuningi kanti futhi udlalwa ngezingcezu zekhethelo ezibizwa ngezingcezu zemibala. I-Blackjack;  idlalwa kusuka ku-R50 okuncane kuya kokukhulu u-R2000. Inhloso yeBlackjack ukudonsa isandla samakhadi esinenani eliseduze kuka-21 kunesomphathi, ngaphandle kokuqhuma (okuwokungaphezu kuka-21). Isandla  esiphethe amakhadi amabili okunho-Ace nanoma u-10, uJack, uQueen noma uKing sibizwa ngeBlackjack bese sikhokha u-3 : 2.
 I-Sun City Stud Poker; okuncane uR20 kuya kokukhulu uR200. I-Craps (i-DICE) Ivulelwa izikhathi ezibalulekile nangeMigqibelo. Ukudlala kusuka ku-R10 okuncane kuya kokukhulu u-R1000.
I-Mini Punto Banco; Ukudlala kusuka ku-R100 okuncane kuya ku-R10 000 okukhulu. I-Punto Banco umdlalo odumile wekhadi ovumela abadlali ukuthi babhejele ibhank noma baphikisane nalo. Abadlali abangu-14 bangahlala etafuleni, emunye nendawo yakhe yokubheja ngaphambi kwabo. Ukwengeza kubadlali abamile, iPunto Banco ingangenisa futhi inani labadlali abamile. Uma udinga usizo ekufundeni ukuthi imidlalo idlalwa kanjani emakhasino ethu, singajabula ukukufundisa, ngasese uma uthanda. Sicela uthintane nedesika lePRO ukuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa kulenombolo eqhutshwayo u-1068.



Imidlalo yamatafula 

Ezokukweleta
Amakhadi okukweleta; Amakhadi okukweleta angamukelwa emananini anqunyiwe esikhathini esiyizinsuku eziwu-14, kuhambisana nomazisi wangampela. I-American Express, i-Diners, namakhadi e-Gold anqunyelwe ukungadluli ku-R2000. I-Amercan Express isivumela kuphela ukwamukela amakhadi aqala ngonombolo u-3768. Wonke amanye amakhadi anqunyelwe u-R500.

Mayelana nokukweleta thintana nomphathi wekhasino asemsebenzini noma umphathi wemishini oemsebenzini ngolwazo oluthe xaxa. Amasheke. Amasheke abantu nje kanye namakhadi okukweleta ahambisana nawo agarantiwe isheke azokwamukelwa kuya ku-R500 esikhathini esingangezinsuku eziwu-7, ehambisana nomazisi wangampela. Amasheke agarantiwe yibhange angamukelwa uma ehamba nomazisi wangampela nekhadi lakhona lokukweleta, yize noma amabhange enomgomo ngenani lamasheke agarantiwe esivunyelwe ukuwathatha ngosuku. Uyacelwa ukuthi uthintane nomshayi sisefo ngemininingwane emayelana nohlobo lwesheke ongalusebenzisa.

 Wonke ama-Travellers' Cheques ayamukelwa. Imali yakwamanye amazwe; yonke imali yakwamanye amazwe edumile uma ufuna izingcezu edesikini likakheshi ekhasino. Ukushintsha imali yakwamanye amazwe ukuthola amarandi aseNingizimu Afrika, sicela uthintane nomnyango wezezimali. Incwadi yemvume yokuba kwelinye izwe kanye nethikithi lendiza kuyadingeka uma ushintsha imali. 




I-Sun International - Umhlaba ovusa amadlingozi ngokuphindwe kankulungwane

I-Sun International igama elifana nobuhle emhlabeni nokunakekela nokujabula, eNingizimu Afrika - lapho ingumholi ongaphikiswa ekunakekeleni - nangaphandle, ngamaqembu e-Sun International agqame kwangu-20 amahotela aphezulu emhlabeni jikelele.

Sinikeza izivakashi zethu inhlanganisela engenakwahlulwa yamahotela akhiwe ngobungcweti obumangalisayo nalapho abantu bevakashela khona okuyindawo ebukeka ngokumangalisayo. Lokhu kuhlangene nomsebenzi wethu omuhle, ezemidlalo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezokujabula ezikhona, ukudla okumnandi okuphekwa abapheki abanamathalente, okwenza kube lula ukubona ukuthi ingani izivakashi zethu zile zibuyile njalo njalo - noma ekhefini lokuzijabulisa, imihlanano noma ukuzikhipha okungejwayelekile.

Siyakumema ukuzobona umhlaba wethu futhi, noma uyisivakashi esisha noma ungumngani omdala, siyethembisa ukukwamukela ngokushesha!

Izikhathi zokusebenza
Imishini yasehotela iSun City kanye nemishini yeJungle khasino ivulwa amahora angu-24 zinsuku zonke onyakeni.

I-Bingo Lounge isebenza ngoLwesithathu nangeSonto kusuka ngo-12:00 kuya ku-20:00, nangoLwesihlanu nemigqibelo kusuka ngo-12:00 kuya ku-24:00. Iyavulwa futhi nangamaholide omphakathi. Ukulungiselelwa okubalulekile kwamaphromoshini kuyenziwa kweBingo. Izikhathi zokusebenza zekhasino kanye neSalon Prive zisuka ngo-13:00 kuze kube nini, izinsuku eziwu-7 ngesonto. I-International Room ivulwa uma kulungiselwa kuphela.




Isikole semidlalo saseSun City
Ngezikhathi ezithize onyakeni, kukhona izifundo zamahhala ekhasino yaseSun City zokufundisa umdlalo weBlackjacj, i-American Roulette, iPunto Banco kanye neCrabs. Sicela ubheke kumpathi wemidlalo.




Imishini
Ikhasino lasehotela laseSun City linemishini yokudlala ewu-379. Ikhasino iJungle yaseSun City yona esesizindeni sokuzijabulisa kunemishini ewu-456.

I-Sun City inikeza umklomelo oqhubekayo omkhulukazi eNingizimu Afrika, ukuyibala nje, iDreama Machine neMillenium Mania, umklomelo wakhona omncane omangalisayo owu-R2 000 000. I-Dream Machine yona okhokha okuncane okungango-R1 000 000 nganoma yisiphi isikhathi emklomelweni omkhulu. Kukhona amabhange eDream Machine ehotela laseSun City kanye nasenkundleni yekhasino iJungle esizindeni sokuzithokozisa. I-Dream Machine umshini ofakelwa u-R1, ukuze uwine umklomelo, ungafaka kuze kube u-R3 (izinhlamvu eziwu-3). Kufanele uthole izimpawu zeDream Machine eziwu-3 uhleni kunoba ibaphi olayini abakhokhelayo.

I-Millenium Mania yiwo wodwa umshini  wokudlala eNingizimu Afrika okhokhela okuncane okungangezigidi ezimbili zamarandi- kodwa uma udlale zonke izinhlamvu zakho zika-50c eziwu-5. Kanti uma ukhetha ukudlala izinhlamvu eziwu-4 kuphela?  Umklomelo omncane kusayizo izigidi eziwu-2  zamarandi! Ngo-April umgumbuli onenhlanhla eCarnical City wawina umklomelo omkhulu wezigidi eziwu-3 nezinkulungwa ezingamakhulu ayisikhombisa zamarandi kwi-Millinniuma Mania ... Yebo, uma ufuna ukuba ngumnini zigidi ngokuphidwe kabili, usuyazi ukuthi kumele uye kuphi!

Ukuze uwine noma omuphi umklomelo oqhubekayo, kufanele udlale ngezingcezu eziningi. Izivakashi ziyacelwa ukuthi ziqale zibheke  izindawo zokubheja njengoba yonke imishini ikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi zingakhi izinhlamvu ezidingekayo ukuwina umklomelo omkhulu. Kodwa-ke, kungumsebenzi womdlali ukubheka ukuthi umshini uzimukelile yini zonke izinhlamvu ezifakiwe emishinini, njengoba kukhona izikhathi lapho izinhlamvu zingangeni zonke emshinini bese zidinga ukubuye zifakwe futhi. I-Sun City inokufakelwa kwemishini okusukela ku-50c kuya ku-R100 okubalwa kuyo isisindo, imidlalo yevideo kanye nemishini yePoker.

I-Gary Player Golf Course ne-Nedbank Golf Challenge
Yaziwa umhlaba wonke njengendawo we-Nedbank Golf Challenge wonyaka leGary Player elungiswe kahle futhi yaziwa iNingizimu Afrika yonke. Iyenye futhi engcono kakhulu.
Futhi okushiwoyo ngayo njengebekwa kunombolo -2 ezweni yibhuku iCompleat Golfer bese iba unombolo -1 ngabe Golf Digest (eNingizimu Afrika). Abaningi abadlali abadumile bayayincoma indawo evulekile esendaweni enhle kakhulu eyihlathi bese lokho kunezezela kokushiwoyo ngayo. Ukuze ukwazi ukuqhathanisa umdlalo wakho nowabo, ukuthi, "Ngishaya umgodi njengoba kwenza uSteve," noma, "Ngadlula indawo lapho u-Ernie noma u-Nick bama khona", kuyiyo ingxenye yokudlala iGary Player Country Club. 

Ukuyimaka nje ikhozi isiyonke ingaphezu kwamamitha awu-7 000 okwenza ibe enye yamade kunawo wonke emhlabeni. Kodwa ukushaya okwehlukene ikona okwenza kube bushane ukufinyeza ikhozi futhi bese iyadlaleka kubo bonke abadlali begalofu. Okuyenza ibe nomehluko kunayo yonke indawo zayo eziluhlaza, ezinamagqunyana ahlelwe ngendlela ekahle, nezindunduma zayo ezivikela ubuluhlaza buhlale busesimeni. Nemigwaqo emikhulu enotshani iKikuyu obuhle kanye namabhenti aluhlaza okotshani uluhlazisa ikhozi ibe sesimeni esihle ngaso sonke isikhathi.

U-David Frost, uSteve Ballesteros noBernard Langer bonke sebayiwina iNedBank Golf Challenge ngaphezu kokukodwa kodwa umdlalo owahlaba umxhwele kuyo yonke lemidlalo owango-1993 ngesikhathi uNick Price ewina ngo-264 - kumashumi amabili nane ngaphansi kwe-Par nama-Stroke awu-8 ngaphezu komdlalo odlule ongcono kakhulu. Umgodi ogqamile? Kona mihle yonke eGary Player Country Club, kodwa ukuzilinga nomvuza omisayo owesishiyagalolunye. Ukudlala le-par kusuka ekushayeni okungaphambili bese uba nokuhamba ukuya esiqhingini sokuluhlaza ngomjikijelo wesibili enselelweni yokungafaniswa nalutho ukuvivinya kwegalofu.

Umgodi wokuqala
I-Lost City Golf Course Par 4, Stroke 14, 405m; Umgodi okulula ukuqala ngawo ngokushayelwa kwawo okusegqunyaneni eliphakeme. Ukushaya okuhle ukubeka ibhola endundumeni yomgwaqo omkhulu elizokushiya nomshudo ocacili kokuluhlaza. Ukuqala ukuvele ushayele kokuluhlaza ngendunduma kwesikunxele nangemumva.

Kunengozana yamanzi ngakwesokudla ebizwa ngeThomson lagoon, engenayo nayo emdlalweni ngokushaya kwakho. Amagqunyana okushaya akude ngokubomvu. Okuluhlaza ngaphambili kubonakala ngokumnyama . Zonke izindawo zikhonjiswe ngamamitha.
		Umgodi olandelayo

I-Titleist Golf Academy
I-Titleist Academy yaseLost City Golf Course inikeza imali yokufunda kuwo wonke amazinga abadlali begalofu. I-Academy iphethwe inhloko yokufundisa ewufundele umsebenzi uTeddy Webber. U-Teddy ebenikezela ngemali eminyakeni angamashumi amabili eyedlule ebalelwa ngokwezifundo ezihamba ngazodwa kuya ezifundweni zamaqembu kuncike ezidingweni zomfundi.
Ukufunda kwezinsuku ezimbili noma ezintathu  yizo ezigcizelelwa iAcademy yeTitleist Academy, zonke izinto zomdlalo ezimele zifundiwe ziyenziwa ngaso lesisikhathi. Ukucutshungulwa kweVideo nako kuyatholakala kwabadlali abaqedayo, kanye nabo bonke ubunyoninco buyacutshungulwa ngesigaba ngesigaba. Konke kwe-Academy okutholakalayo kubalwa kuko lokhu kufundiswa okunobuciko. U-Teddy Webber angatholakala kulenombolo yocingo (01455) 71555 ngokuthola ulwazi oluthe xaxa oluphathelene ngokufunda komuntu noma ukufunda kweqembu.

Isifundo seqembu noma i-Academy kudume kakhulu ngemivuzo yokuhlanganyela.




Ikilabhu yamalunga
Ikilabhu yamalunga eKampa Kwena eyisipesheli iklomelisa izingane ngokuvakasha njalo. Izincwadi zezindaba amakhadi ezinsuku zokuzalwa kuyathunyelelwa amalunga, kanti futhi sonke isikhathi lapho abancane bebuyela eKamp Kwena, izincwadi zabo zemvume yokuya kwelinye izwe ziyagxivizwa.

Emva kokuvakasha kane bathola izipho zamahhala kanti futhi emva kokuthola izigxivizo eziyishiyagalombili ezincwadini zabo zemvume, bangawina ukuhlala kwamahhala kwelinye lamahotela aseSun City.




Imidlalo yamaholide
Ngamaholide ezikole, yebo, izinto zishisa ngempela eKamp Kwena ngoba iKwena ithanda ukuveza izinto eziningi  zokudlala kubangani babo abancane, kubalwa kuko ukuvakashela njalo eValley of Waves kanye nemicimbi njalo ebusuku.




I-Kamp Kwena
I-Kamp Kwena indawo yazo zonke izingane yokuvakasha ngoba zithola konke kokuvakasha kwazo endaweni yokuvakasha yaseSun City ngoba futhi izinhlelo zayo zokuzithokozisa zezingane ezineminyaka esuka ku-4 kuya ku-12 ziphezulu ngalendlela abayifunayo nokunyakaza kwabo abancane abakuthandayo.

I-Kwena, indawo enobungani bengwenya eluhlaza, ehlala endaweni abayichaza nge-"super-special Western wilderness fort" eyakhiwe yonke ngokhuni. Yakhiwe emagcekeni eCabanas ngaphandle kweWaterworld kanti futhi wonke umuntu uyazi ukuthi imicimbi emikhulu eshukumisayo ihlale yenzelwa kulendawo. Kukhone amaqenbu eClubs ezingane ezineminyaka esuka ku-2 kuya ku-3 ubudala, iqembu lasebekhulakhulile leminyaka esuka ku-4 kuya ku-8 ubudala neqembu leKooldudes labeminyaka eqala ku-8 kuya ku-12 ubudala. Manje kungaba imidlalo ezungeze ichibi lokubhukuda, imidlalo yokusukelana, ukudweba amapheshana, ukudlala ivolleyball, ukupenda ubuso, ukulwa bechelana ngamanzi noma bebukela imibukiso emincane omunye emva komunye, kuhlale kukhone okuthile okugcina abancane bejabulile njalo.




Imidlalo yamaholide
	Ikilabhu yamalunga
